1b1(rgyud): rgyug smad du/sar+b+bad+d+har+m+ma ma hA san te ba d+d+ha tsidat+ta ku la sa
1b2(rgyud): rAdza/bod skad du/chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems kun
1b3(rgyud): byed rgyal po bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la phyag 'tshal
1b4(rgyud): lo//'di skad bshad pa'i dus na/'og min gyi gnas chos nyid kyi mkha'
2a1(rgyud): dbyis nyid kyi klong sems nyid kyi gnas ye shes sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i gzhal yas khang na
2a2(rgyud): nyid kyi rang bzhin dang /nyid kyi ngo bo dang /nyid kyi thugs rje ye shes mngon du phyung ba'i 'khor 'di lta ste/nyid
2a3(rgyud): kyi rang bzhin gyi 'khor chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang /nyid kyi ngo bo'i 'khor longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku sa zhes
2a4(rgyud): bya ba'i 'khor dang /nyid kyi ngo bo'o 'khor longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku chu zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang /nyid kyi ngo bo'i 'khro
2a5(rgyud): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku me zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang /nyid kyi ngo bo'i 'khor longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rlung zhes bya
2b1(rgyud): ba 'khor dad+ma/ny-i kyi ngo bo'i 'khor longs spyod rtogs pa'i spyan ltakhru' zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang /gzhan yang drugs la shes
2b2(rgyud): mngon du byung ba'i sbru bu'i 'khyor 'di lta ste/da pa khams kyi sems nan zhes bya ba'i khyor dang /kAzunas
2b3(rgyud): sems can zhes b+ha ba'i 'khor dang /zugs med pa'i khams kyi sems can rnaMs b+hA ba'i 'khor dang /gnyen yang nyid kyi
2b4(rgyud): bzhin la lte ba'i 'khyor rnam pa bzhi 'di lta ste/shin tu rnal 'byor zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang /yongasu rnal 'byor zhes bya ba'i
2b5(rgyud): 'khor da /rnal 'byod chen po zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang /sem sna pa'i rnal 'byor zhes bya 'i 'khor de /nyid kyi drung po nin
2b6(rgyud): dang nyid kyi ngo bo dang /nyid kyi thugs rje rang bzhin 'byed pa mi mnga' bas thobs gcig go//gzhan yang nyid kyi rang bzhin
3a1(rgyud): rtogs pa'i 'khor 'di lta ste/sngar 'das pa'i srungs rgyas nyid la gnas pa'i 'khor dang /da ltar bzhugs
3a2(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyis don mdzad pa'i 'khor dang /sleng nas byon pa'i sangs rgyas nyid las 'byung ba'i 'khor dang /'byed pa mo
3a3(rgyud): mnga' bra'i rang bzhin gyis thabs gcig par bzhugaso//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des 'khor thams snod nyid kyi
3a4(rgyud): rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir 'khor thams cad nyid kyi sems nyid kyi thugs la thom por mdzad do//rang 'byung gri ye
3a5(rgyud): shes gsal bir mdzad//de nas thams cad chos nyid du ljon par bya ba'i phyir thams cad bsdus nas thig le chen po gcig tu
3a6(rgyud): bzhugs so//de nas sems dpa' de nyid kyi rang bzhin thig le chen po gcig tu bzhugs pa de las byung nas byang chub kyi sems
3b1(rgyud): kun byed rgyal po'i spyan sngar dga' ba'i sems kyis dang ba'i mdangs phyung ste 'khod pas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos sems dpa' rdo rje la smras pa/sems
3b2(rgyud): dpe'i rdo rje e mU ho/dge' ba'i sems skyes e ma ho/dang ba'i midangs phyung e ma hA/nga las byung ba oM me ho zhes gsungs pas/de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes
3b3(rgyud): zhus pade kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags//ston pa nyid kyang thig le spros mod dam//'khor rnams kun kyang thig le spros med dam//bstan pa kun
3b4(rgyud): kyang thig le spros med dum//dus dang gnas kyang thig le spros med dam//thams cad kun kyang thig le'i rang bzhin nu//ston pa'i ston pas ci zhig ston par mdzad
3b5(rgyud): 'khor du 'khor ba'i do ni ci la 'khor//'khor la bstan pa ci zhig ston par byed//dus dang gnas ni gcig pa ji lta bu zhes zhus so//de nas byang chub kyi
3b6(rgyud): sems kun byed rgyal po des sems dpa' rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs//kye sems dpa' chen po yid sgra la chug cig/ngas drin sbyar ba shad kyis/kye sems
3b7(rgyud): dpa' chen po//sems nyid kun byed rgyal po pa nyid ni//chos rnams thams cad kun gyi snying pa ste//snying po ma spros ye nas thig le yin//thig le yi nas
4a1(rgyud): /spros pa med pa'i don//ston pa dang ni bstan pa 'khor dus gnas//nga las byung bas ye nas thig le ste//nga yi rang bzhin thig le bstan pa yin zhes/
4a2(rgyud): gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las gleng gzhi'i le'u skye dang po'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad
4a3(rgyud): nyid las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba la gnas par mdzad do//de nas 'khor gyi rang bzhin las sems dpa'i rdo rje langs nas ston pa byang chub kyi sems kun byed
4a4(rgyud): rgyal po'i zhal du madrangs phyung ste 'khod nas zhus pa/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags//khyod kyi 'khor du bdag 'dus 'khod pa de//bdag ni 'tshol
4a5(rgyud): ba'i doni ci zhig mchis//bdag 'tshal don ni khyod kyis bstan du gsol zhes zhuso//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des nyid kyi rang bzhin dang /nyid
4a6(rgyud): kyi ngo bo dang /nyid kyi thugs rje las chos thams cad bkod pa ni nyid kyi rang 'byung gi ye shes chen po gcig las rang 'byung gi ye shes chen po lnga phyung ba ni 'di
4a7(rgyud): lta ste/zhe sdang rang 'byung ye shes chen po dang /'dod chags rang 'byung ye shes chen po dang /gti mug rang 'byung ye shes chen po dang /phrag dag rang 'byung
4b1(rgyud): ye shes chen po dang /nga rgyal rang 'byung ye shes chen po dang /rang 'byung gi ye shes lnga po des rgyan gyi rgya chen po lnga ni phyung /'jig cing brten pa'i khams chen po gsum ni bkod rgyan
4b2(rgyud): gyi rgyu'i lus lnga gcig tu blangs pa 'di lta ste/rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus sa zhes bya ba'i lus dang /rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus chu zhes bya ba'i lus dang /rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus me zhes bya ba'i lus dang /
4b3(rgyud): rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus rlung zhes bya ba'i lus dang /rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus na mkha' zhes bya ba'i lus la gcig tu lus thams cad blangs/ye shes lnga'i rigs so sor phye ste/rang 'byung ye shes
4b4(rgyud): zhe sdang gi rigs dang /rang 'byung ye shes 'dod chags kyi rigs dang /rang 'byung ye shes gti mug gi rigs dang /rang 'byung ye shes phrag dog gi rigs dang /rang 'byung
4b5(rgyud): ye shes nga rgyal gyi rigs dang /rang 'byung ye shes lnga'i rigs lus rgyan gyi lus can gyi chos nyid bkod do//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po de nyid kyang nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi
4b6(rgyud): ches nyid bkod pa de bzhin du bzhug so//de nas sems dpa' rdo rje de byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po'i spyan sngar yang 'dug nas/kyi ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags//nyid kyi
4b7(rgyud): thugs gcig rang 'byung ye shes las//rang 'byung ye shes rnam pa lnga byung nas//de las rgyan gyi rgyu lnga byung nas ni//ye shes lnga yis lus lnga blangs pa 'dis//kun byang
5a1(rgyud): rgyal po'i dgos pa ci zhes cho zhes zhus so//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des slar gsungs pa/kye sems dpa' chen po dgos pa ni/kun byed rgyal
5a2(rgyud): po byed mkhan nga las ni//ma gtogs pa yi byed mkhan gzhan na med//chos nyid byed pa yang ning los med//ston pa gsum yang 'god pa nga las med//'khor gyi tshogs
5a3(rgyud): yang 'god pa nga las med//de bzhin chos nyid 'god pa nga lba med//sems dpa' rdo rje khyod la nga yis ni//nga yi rang bzhin khyod le bstan par bya//nga la rang bzhin rnam pa gsum
5a4(rgyud): yod de//nga yi rang bzhin byang chub sems yino//byang ba dag gi rang bzhin bstan po ni//phun sum tshogs pa rnam gsum chos nyid byang //chub pa dag gi rang bzhin bstan pa ni//
5a5(rgyud): dgos pa tshogs pa rnam pa gsum gyis ni//nu mkho'i bzhin du kun la khyab par gnas//sems shes bya ba'i rang bzhin bstan pa ni//mi 'gag ma lus kun byed rgyal po
5a6(rgyud): ste//kun byas byang chub semasu ma lus byas shes gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po lngas chos nyid mngon du phyung nas bsnyen pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o///
5a7(rgyud): de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi sngon rol tu byed pa po dbyung ba 'di gsungaso//kye sems dpa' chen po yid rna ba dbang la zhugs kyi
5b1(rgyud): sna du bang sgra la rtogs shig/kyang ni kun byedu rgyal b+h+yo ste/dA ni kun byed byang chub sems//dmed pa yi skyon rol na//chos rnams 'byung ba'i snying po med//
5b2(rgyud): dri med pa yi ston ral na//chos kun byed po'i rgyal po med//nga med pa yi sngon rol na//ston pa bye bo yi nas med//du myed pa yi sngon ril na//bstan pa bye ba ye d+hi med/ med pa yi sngon
5b3(rgyud): rol nas//'khor zhes bya ba ye nas med//sems dpa' rdo rje rtog ma ste//sems dpa' chen po khyod nyid kyang //nga yi ngo bo sprul pa yin zhes gsungs//de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes
5b4(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la zhus bya/kye kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems//khyod ni ye nas chen po yin/ston pa dang ni bstan pa dang //'khor la sogs pa'i chos rnams kun//
5b5(rgyud): byed mkhan khyod kyis byas pas na//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun//byed mkhan khyod kyis byas par snang //snyan pa gcig gi rnam du ru yod//bstan pa gcig gam rnam pa du ru yod//
5b6(rgyud): 'khor rnams gcig gam rnam pa du ru yod ces zhus//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos slar gsungs pa/kye rang 'byung ye shes kun gyi ston par gcig/nga yi rang bzhin
5b7(rgyud): rnam gsum snang ba la//ston pa'i grangs ni rnam pa gsum du byung //nga ni de bzhin nyid du gcig pa las//chos rnams kun gyi chos nyid de bzhin nyid//de nyid byang chub sems las
6a1(rgyud): gzhan med do//du las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis//'khor la bstan pa rnam pa gsum du bstan//nga yi ngo bo gcig tu phyung nas ni//nga yi rang bzhin cig tu
6a2(rgyud): bstan pa'i phyir//kun byed nga yi 'khor du kun kyang gcig/de las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis//'khor gyi bye brag rnaM pa gsum du yod ces gsungs//sems dpa' rdo rjes
6a3(rgyud): zhus pa/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/khyod las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis//khyod sar 'gro ba'i lam ni yod dam med//med na khyod kyis sa ru phyin mi phyin//
6a4(rgyud): yod na bgrod nas phyin nas ma bgrod phyin//kye sems dpa' chen po nyan cig/nga lngas byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum la/nga yi sa ru bgrod pa'i lam med de//nga yi rang byung yau shes bstan
6a5(rgyud): pa yin//sku gsum ston pa de yi 'khor rnams la//rnam par thar pa'i lam ni rnam lnga ste//dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi lam du bstan//rang 'byung ye shes lnga yi lam lnga ni//
6a6(rgyud): 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang gti mug dang //nga rgyal dang ni phrag dog rnam lnga ste//rang 'byung ye shes rnam lnga kun gyi lam zhes gsungs//ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags//
6a7(rgyud): rang 'byung ye shes lam lnga bstan pa de//rang 'byung zhes ni ji ltar byung ba lags//ye shes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ci la gdags//lam zhes bgyi ba'i don ni gang la bgyi//'dod
6b1(rgyud): chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang //phrag dog la sogs rnam pa lnga po de//lam lnga yin pa'i don nA bshad du gus pa 'os zhus so//kyo sems dpa' chen po/rang 'byung ye shes
6b2(rgyud): rnam pa lnga lam ni//rang 'byung rgyu rkyen med par byung ba yin//ye shes 'gag pa med par gsal ba yin/lam ni rgyu rkyen med pas bgrod mi dgos//mi bgrod rang 'byung lnga la lam
6b3(rgyud): lngar bshed//'dod pa chos rnams bdag tu 'drid pa yin//chags pa bdag tu 'dod pa de la chags//zhi ba skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin la//spang ba cho 'phrul sna tshogs de la sdang //
6b4(rgyud): gti mug mi rtog pa yi ting 'dzin gyis//chos nyid mnyam pa nyid la dbye gsol med//nga ni ma nar ba yi byang chub sems//de bzhin nyid du ye nas rgyal bar byed//thams cad de
6b5(rgyud): bzhin nyid du gcig pa la//yin men sgro skur 'debs pa phrag dog byed//bgrod du med pa'i lam lnga bstan pa yin/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams tha~Md
6b6(rgyud): kun//rang 'byung ye shes lam lnga 'di las byung //'dod pa'i khams kyang rang 'byung ye shes yin//gzugs kyi khams kyang rang 'byung ye shes yin//gzugs med khams kyang rang
6b7(rgyud): 'byung ye shes yin//kun byed rgyal po nga yis byas pa'i phyir//ngas byas thams cad ye shes ngo bor bshad//khams gsum sems can rgyu drug thams cad kun//rang 'byung
7a1(rgyud): yA shos med par ngas ma bshad//de las ma gtogs pa yi byang chub sems//sangs rgyas kun gyi mes pongs ma bshad//kun byed rgyal po nga la
7a2(rgyud): rang bzhin la//chos nyid rnam pa gsum du bstan pa ste//ma skyes pa yi chos nyid dngos mi snang //de ni gzugs med khamasu bstan pa yin//skye ba'i cho 'phrul gzugasu snang
7a3(rgyud): ba ni//de ni gzugs kyi khamasu bstan pa yin//thugs rje yi shes ngo bo sngon phyung nas//bde sdug las de thugs rjes zad bya'i phyir//'dod pa'i khams ni thugs rjes phyung
7a4(rgyud): ba yin zhes gsungaso//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las chos thams cad kun byed rgyal pos byas pa las ji ltar byung ba'i khungs bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o///
7a5(rgyud): de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed mo des nyid kyi rang bzhin mtshan gyi chos bshad pa 'di gsung so//kye sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod nyon cig/nga ni ye nas rab 'byung ye shes
7a6(rgyud): te//nga ni ye nas chos kun snying po yan//da ni kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems//nga las mtshan 'di sems dpa' rtogs par gyis//nga yi mtshan 'di sems dpas rtogs
7a7(rgyud): 'gyur na/chos rnams thams cad ma lus rtogs 'gyur gyis//nga zhes bya ba'i snying po ste//chos rnams kun gyi snying po yin//rang 'byung zhe ni bya ba ni//rgyu rkyen med pa'i
7b1(rgyud): snying po bas//rgyal skyab kun las 'das pa yin//ye shes zhes ni byung ni//'gag pa myed cing ma bsgrings pas//chos kun ma lus ston par byed//nga ni nga chub sems la bya//
7b2(rgyud): ye nas bya ba'i don 'di ni//thog ma nyid nas gnas pa'i don//chos kun zhes ni bya ba ni//ston pa kun kyang chos nyid la//bstan pa kun kyang chos nyid yin//khor gnas dus kyi
7b3(rgyud): chos nyid de//chos nyid ma yin gcig kyang med//snying po bya ba'i don 'di ni//thams cad 'byung ba'i snying po ste//byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las//ston pa kun yang de las byung
7b4(rgyud): bstan pa gsum yang de las byung //'khor gnas dus kyang de las byung //thams cad 'byung ba'i snying por bshad//nga ni snying po sems nyid kyis//chos rnams ma lus kun
7b5(rgyud): byed de//kun zhes bya ba'i chos rnams kun//chos kun gang dang gang zhe na//ston pa dang ni bstan pa dang //'khor gnas dus ni thams cad kun//byed ces bya ba mkhan po ste//ston/
7b6(rgyud): pa dang ni bstan pa dang //'khor gnas dus ni kun byed pas//rang 'byung ye shes mkhan po yin//rgyal po zhes ni bya ba ni//snying po rang 'byung ye shes de//byed pa'i mkhan
7b7(rgyud): kun las rgyal//chos rnams byed mkhan kun las rgyal//byang ba'i don ni 'di lta ste//snying po byang chub sems de ni//rang 'byung yi nas rnam dag pos//kun byed
8a1(rgyud): rgyal byos rgyas pags//kun pang da dun pa dag pas//byung nas byu dang shad pa yin//chub ces bya ba 'di lta ste//snying po rang 'byung yong nas des//
8a2(rgyud): pa dang ni srid pa dang //snod dang bcud kyis bsdus pa dang //dus gsumasangs rgyas thams cad dang //khams gsum rgyud drug sems can+da dang //de bzhin nyid ni thams cad
8a3(rgyud): la//kun la chub ste khyab par gnas//des ni chub ces bya bar bshad//sems kyi don ni 'dri lta ste/snying po rang 'byung ye shes des//snang srid sdod bcud thams cad la/
8a4(rgyud): 'jug cing dbang skur gosal bar gtsad//des na sems zhes bya bar bshad//rgyu rkyen med pa'i snying po des//kun lnga dbang sgyur thams cad byed//kye sems dpa' chen po//
8a5(rgyud): nga yi rang bzhin rtogs gyur na//ston pa kun kyang rtogs 'byung //bstan pa kun kyang rtogs par 'gyur/'khor gyi bas tho pa rig 'gyur lo//dus gnas kun kyang tsa
8a6(rgyud): 'gyur rig/chos rnams thams cad nga yin pas//nga mi rang bzhin 'di rig na//rgyas rnams thams cad rig 'gyur bas//bya byed rnyil srub kun las 'das//mi
8a7(rgyud): lhun gyim grub par 'gyur zhes gsung po//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las nyid kyi mtshan bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi po'i//de nas byang chub kyi sems
8b1(rgyud): kun byed rgyal pos sems dpa' rdo rje nyid la rang bzhin bstan pa'i mdo 'dus pa'i don 'di bstan to//sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/nga yi rang bzhin 'di lta ste//yod nI gcig
8b2(rgyud): las med pa ste//bstan ni rnam pa gnyi su bstan//byung ni theg pa dgu ru byung //'dus ni rdzogs pa chen por 'dus//yin ni byang chub sems yin te//gnas ni chos nyid dbyings
8b3(rgyud): la gnas//gsal ni rigs ba mkha' la gsal//khyab ni snod bcud kun la khyab//byung ni snang srid kun tu byung //bstan du mtshan ma'i dngos po med//mthong du dmigs po'i
8b4(rgyud): yul dang bral//shes su tshig tu brjod du med//rgyu los ma byung skye po 'di//sgros kyis btags pa kun dang bral//don 'di nges par rtogs 'dod na//dpo ni na mkha' lta bur
8b5(rgyud): brtag/don ni chos nyid skye ba med//rtags ni sems nyid 'gag pa med//nam mkha' lta bu'i chos nyid la//na mkha' lta bu'i dpe yis mtshon//dmigasu med pa'i chos nyid la//
8b6(rgyud): dmig su med par mtshon te bstan//tshig tu brjod du med pa lnga//brjod du med pa'i tshig brjod de//dmigs med don gyi ngo bor bstan//bsdus te bstan pa'i don 'di ni//don
8b7(rgyud): gyi ngo bo 'grel pa ste//'di yis nga don rtogs par gyis//'di yis ngadon rtogs par byed/'di yis nga don ma rtogs na//don gyi sgra tshig ci bstan kyang //nga dang phrad par mi 'gyur
9a1(rgyud): /'gyur to//nga las gol yang bsgribs pas//chos kyi snyid po mthong mi 'gyun zhes gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po pas dron gyi 'grol dang
9a2(rgyud): le'u ste lnga pa'o///de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad nyid kyi rang bzhin la rdzogs pa de bstan pa'i tshi ga gsung so//kye sems dpa'
9a3(rgyud): chen po 'di nyon//kun byed rgyal po d+ma yis ni//ngo mi chos rnams dang por bkod//nga yi chos rnams mngon du phyung //nga yi ngo bo khyod la bstan//da yi rang bzhin bstan nas ni//tshig
9a4(rgyud): dang sgras kyang don mtshon nas//ngo bo bstan pas khyod kyis mthong //rang bzhin bstan pas a de rig/tshig tu brjod pas dor sgrar thos//shes gsungs nas cang mi gsung
9a5(rgyud): bar ches thams cad kyi ngo bor bzhug so//sems dpa' rdo rje 'khor gyi nang na langs na byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po'i zhabs mdangs phyung ste 'khod pas kun byed rgyal
9a6(rgyud): byos/kye sems dpa' chen po khyod nga la mdangs kyis 'khod pa de khyod kyis don ni 'dod pa gsol cig ces gsung so//de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes zhus pa/kyai ston pa'i
9a7(rgyud): ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags//chos rnams thams cad khyod kyi rang bzhin na//khyod kyis ston pa bstan pa 'khor bkod ci zhig lags//phun sum tshogs pa'i dgos pa
9b1(rgyud): ci zhig lags zhes zhus so//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungaso//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/chos rnams phun sum
9b2(rgyud): tshogs par bkod pa ni//nga nyid phun tshegs pa'i rang bzhin te//nga yi rang bzhin khyod la bstan par bya//nga yi rang bzhin spros bral mi phyed pas//chos dbyings gnas
9b3(rgyud): 'di nga yis byas pa yin//byang chub nyid las de na gzhan mi bzhugs//nga yi rang bzhin ma bsgribs kun khyab pas//gsal ba'i na mkha' ye shes gzhal yas khang //rang 'byung
9b4(rgyud): ye shes nyid las gzhan mi bzhugs//nga ni thams cad 'byung ba 'i snying po bas//chen po lnga dang khams gsum rgyud drug rnams//nga yi sku gsung thugs las gzhan med pas//
9b5(rgyud): dA yi rang bzhin nga yis bkod pa yin//dus gsum sangs rgyas khams gsum sems can yang //nga yi rang bzhi ni khyed la bstan pa yin//nga yi rang bzhin ma skyes spros bral phyir//
9b6(rgyud): mi gnas spyod yul yun las 'das pa yin//mi snang ting 'dzin bsgom pa'i yul las 'dus//nga yi rang bzhin khyed la mi snang yang //nga yi ngo bo khyod la snang byas pos//khams gsum
9b7(rgyud): chen po lnga dang rgyud drug rnams//snang ba'i rang bzhin byang chub sems lnga las//rang 'byung snying po ye shes lnga 'byung bas//ye shes lnga yi yul ldogs li byung bas//'dod pa lnga byung
10a1(rgyud): chags pa lnga byu nas//chags lnga so sor sbyin pa'i 'bras bu na//'gro ba drug gi khyad par so sor snang //'di ltar snang ba nga yis khyed la bstan pa yin//sku gsum
10a2(rgyud): theg pa rnam pa drug bstan pa//de yis bstan na khyed kyis ma mthong ste//de reng yi ngo bo re re ste//sku ro dang ni gsung re thugs re dang //kun gyis mthong ba'i ngo bo re re'o//de yod pa
10a3(rgyud): yi rang bzhin bstan pa yin//yang dag kun gyi ngo bo byang chub ngas//spros med dbyings kyi ngo bo nga yin la//sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas chen nga yin pas/rol pa khams gsum
10a4(rgyud): rgyud drug nga las shar//bde dang sdug bsngal las kyi khyad par te//yang dag ma nor nga yi thugs rje bstan//rgyu dang 'bras bu'i theg pa can rnams la//kun byed nga yi lung 'di
10a5(rgyud): bAsnun mi bya//nga yi lung 'di nges par bstan byas na//dge sdig las la rgyu 'bras yod zer nas//yang dag nga la sgro dang skur bstab pas//yang dag nga dang yun du phrad mi 'gyur
10a6(rgyud): dra ni ston pa kun byed byang chub sems//byang chub sems ni kun byed rgyal po ste//dus gsum sangs rgyas byang chub sems kyis byas//khams gsum sems can byang chub sem
10a7(rgyud): kyis byas snang srid snod bcud byang chub sems kyis byas//rgyu 'bras dpe don gtan tshigs mthun par byas//rgyu yi dus na 'byung tshon lnga byas la//'bras bu'i dus na khams
10b1(rgyud): gsum sems can byas//dpe yi dus na kun dpe na mkha' byed//don gyi dus na kun don skyo med byed//rtags kyi dus na kun byed byang chub sems//gtan tshigs dus na rang 'byung ye shes
10b2(rgyud): ston//rgyu 'bras dripe don gtan tshigs mthun par byas//byang chub sems kyis kun byas gcig ma byas//kun byas byang chub nyid kyi rang bzhin byas//cig ma byas pa nyid la bya mi dgos//
10b3(rgyud): kun byed de yi rang bzhin ma brtags par//nga yis byis pa'i chos la nges brtags pas//brkam zhing tshogs pa'i dbang gis snang ba 'grub//mi rtog sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'jig por 'gyur//
10b4(rgyud): cha mod dmu long lta bu'i rang bzhin no//kun byed rgyal pos byas par mi che bar//dbang po drug la yul drug snang ba la//sdug bsngal mthong nas dbang po 'gegs par byed//des ni kun
10b5(rgyud): byed byas pa mi tsha bas//skye 'gag med pa'i 'bras bu de la med//nges pa cig la bden pa gnyis byung nas//kun byed nga yis byas pa'i chos nyid la//don dam kun rdzob bden pa gnyis
10b6(rgyud): byung bas//bden pa gnyis kyi rgyu 'bras yod mi mnga'//rgyu 'bras 'dras pa'i 'bras bu de la med//med par tshol pa dag pa'i ting 'dzin dang //mi 'byung cho 'phrul yan lag sgos mnga'
10b7(rgyud): bas//brang dor med pa'i 'bras bu thob pa med//don gcig ting 'dzin rnam gsum sgom byed pas//bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhir rim par sgo mi byed pas//rtsol sgrub 'das pa'i
11a1(rgyud): byug+sa'am na //rgyun sa rgyu sa tu byud kun da shA r+m+ma/mdu ca slo ga gas sod lda sa//sa byung phyug sa dan
11a2(rgyud): /sa kun chub sems yin ma //na de rnam kha'i lci bu'i rang bzhin no//byang chub sems kyin yang de bzhin no// pa rgyu zlas ma sna ba ste/
11a3(rgyud): sems la san rgyu ma nas s+yAr+b+ba sa//sred gsum lam lnga 'gro ga /snang ba yang //nom smin las kyis mi spyod mnas su r+b+baste//khams gsu ma yin
11a4(rgyud): rmu su gsung thug ste//de bas snang snyid snod rlud thams cad kun//na m+b+ha b+hi'i nga na me gnas med pa bzhin//byang chub sems kyi/chen yul hU~M s+ya//sangs
11a5(rgyud): rgyas sems can snod bcud kun kyang gnas//thams cad kun par dag pa'i chos nyid la//gnyisu med de spos myur kun dang bral//gang gis med pa'i snying po sems ma
11a6(rgyud): mthod//bskul ba du mngodzin dang zang mo 'gyur//chos kun rtsa ba byang chub sems su gcig/sangs rgyas sems can snang srid srid bcud kun/thams cad 'byung ba'i chung
11a7(rgyud): chub snying po la//cig tu med las bgrangs na brjod mi long //songs rgyas su gsung sems can lus dag kyang //byang chub sems yin yi nas gzung 'dzin du
11b1(rgyud): gzung 'dzin bral ba gang gis grub pa de//des ni kun grub chos kyi rtsa ba grub//byang chub sems kyi mdo rtswa gcig pu la//sems zhing rtog lnga dga' bas rnam par bgrangs//gnyis dang
11b2(rgyud): grangs la dga' la nga yis bstan//ji bzhin rang bzhin chos nyid sems gcig la//sems la rang bzhin rnam pa gsum snang byas//rang bzhin gsum ni bkod pa'i mchog gsum
11b3(rgyud): ste//de ni phun sum tshogs pa'i chos nyid do//gnyis med gcig gi rang bzhin kun 'brel pas//rnal ma gcig la 'byor pa rnam pa bzhi//rnal 'byor rnam pa bzhi ye yul
11b4(rgyud): du bstan//sems nyid gcig la che ba lhur bstan pa//sems kyi rang bzhin yon tan lnga ldan pas//rang bzhin lnga la che lngar ming du btags//nges pa gcig la
11b5(rgyud): yin min sgros byung bas//gol sgrib the tshom rtog pa bsam yas ni//kun byed rtsol sgrub rtog 'das sel bar byed//yod med sgros skur the tsom gsal ba'i phyir//de
11b6(rgyud): bzhin nyid kyi byang chub mi rtog pas//ma nor nges pa'i lung dri gtan la 'bebs//de nyid yang ches mngon du bstan pa'i phyir//lA dong yid ches pa yi lung bcu yis//tshol sgrub bya me
11b7(rgyud): don bstan de yid ches//med par bden pa'i tshig dgu smras pa ni//snying po gcig la mthong ba'i yul dgu byung //rang ris mthong ba'o 'den pa'i tshig dgu smras//kun byed de la thams cad rdzog hA
12a1(rgyud): ste sa ma myong ///mngon nyi drug ng+gA byung ba yin//sangs skyes nga mi shes yin tan //sems can sus dang g+satshogs la sogs 'o//
12a2(rgyud): dang /dri n+yaslo pa thams cad rten/ \u0f7fsangs kyi po mi nas yin//sems las mya gtogs pa yi rgyas rnams ni//rdu las byung ba'i sangs rgyas snar 'dus ste//sbyin
12a3(rgyud): rgyal ze mas lud ma bstan//de stor bzhugs dang skad kyis byin pa la//ngan byed rgyal po byung chub lung mi ston zhes gsung so//byang chub kyi sems son byid rgyas tho sas
12a4(rgyud): ba gcig pa'i le'u ste drug //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid kyis byas pa las byung bri'i chos rnam par dbye ba 'di gsung s+ho//kye sems
12a5(rgyud): dpa' chen po//sems ni ji bzhin pa ming po ste//ji bzhin gnyis med bde ba chen po lo//rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa yongs kyis med//spros grol na mkha' bzhin du ye gnas
12a6(rgyud): la//dmigs pa'i yul 'das gcig ces bgrang du med//byang chub sems la bgrang zhing po chen med ni//sems kyis byas pa'i chos la rnam grangs byung //sems kyis/
12b1(rgyud): byas pa gang dag gang zhe na//snang srid snod bcud sangs rgyas sems can rnams//sems kyi rang bzhin ngo bo de las byas//byas nas mngon du phyung ste bstan pa ni//chen po lnga dang rigs
12b2(rgyud): drug snang ba dang //de yi don mdzad gzugs sku rnam gnyis ni//sems kyi rang bzhin dag tu phyung nas bgrangs shes bka' stsal to//de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes zhus pa/kye kun byed
12b3(rgyud): rgyal po e ma ho//kun tu bzang po e ma he//byang chub sems khyod e ma ho//dang por byang chub sems langs nas//rang dang chos rnams ma shes nas//kun mkhyen khyod kyi 'khor
12b4(rgyud): du 'dus//zhu ba'i dmigs ni mi chu bas//kun mkhyen khyed kyi bka' stsal pa//chos rnams gcig tu 'dus par ni//byang chub sems mdo bka' stsal na//gtsog lo gnyisu
12b5(rgyud): bstan pa yi//rnam grangs don 'di ji ltar lags zhes zhus//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos bka' stsal po/sems ni ye nas lhun gyis grub//nga ni sangs rgyas tha~Md
12b6(rgyud): kyi//lhun gyis grub pa'i snying po yin//nga ni thugs rje'i ngo bo ste//gong la dga' ba'i dus su ni//gang dga' ba yi don bya'i phyir//nga yi byas pa'i don bstan gyis//sems dpa'
12b7(rgyud): rdo rje khyed nyon cig/gcig la dga' ba de la ni//chos rnams gcig tu 'dus pa'i phyir//byang chub sems kyi ngo bo de//sems kyi ngo bo kun byed bstan//mtshan ma grangs la dgra
13a1(rgyud): ba la//kun byed rgyal pos byas pa yi//sna tshogs brjod kyis mi lang bstan//de yang nga yi rang bzhin bstan//gcig ni nga nyid snying po ste//gnyis byung
13a2(rgyud): yis byas pa ste//byas pa'i chos la bgrangs po yin//grangs kyi don ni gcig dang gnyis//grangs kyi mtha' ni brjod du med//brjod med kyis kyi snying po yin//brjod med snying
13a3(rgyud): po gcig tu bstan//gcig ni kun byed byang chub sems//byas pa'i chos ni rnam pa gnyis//rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam gnyis las//don dam kun rdzob rnam gnyis kyis//
13a4(rgyud): dpe don rtags dang gtan tshigasu//dus lung drang lung gnyi su bau shad//rgyu ni 'byung chen rnam lnga so//'bras bu khams gsum sems can yin//khams gsum sems can/
13a5(rgyud): rgyu byas nas//'bras bu sangs rgyas ming btags te//rgyu 'bras dpe don dri ru bstan//rgyu ni khams gsum sems can la//'bras bu sangs rgyas lung bstan pa//de ni drang ba'i
13a6(rgyud): lung du bshad//rnam pa gnyisu dbye bar bya//rgyuni 'byu chen rnam lnga yin//byas pa'i chos ni thams cad kun//sems nyid mngon du phyung po yin//de bzhin nyid du ma gtogs
13a7(rgyud): par//ma rig log rtog gzung 'dzin gyis//yul drug chos la nges brtags pas//'jig pa drug dang brten pa drug/'jig rten zhes su bshad pa yin//yul drug
13b1(rgyud): rmugs pa d+mag rten nas//chags drug+sa b+hU bsngal yang la//mya ngan myu na zhes su bshad//mya ngan mya ngan 'das shes pa//sgyus drug sgras mi rtog pas//skye drug gnas ma skye
13b2(rgyud): ste//sdug bsngal drug las 'das pa'i phyir//mya ngan 'das shos de la bya//ji bzhin snying po byang chub las//mAM btsal rang bzhin shar ba yi//'byung ba chen po lnga po yang //rang gi
13b3(rgyud): mtshan nyid rang 'dzin la//thams cad snying po byang chub kyang //dmigasu med pa'i ngo bo 'dzin//mtshan nyid mtshan nyid zhesu bshad//rang bzhin shar ba'i chen po lngas//chos kun bskyed
13b4(rgyud): pa'i snying po yin//de yis bskyed pa'i sems can rnams//rang 'byung yin par mi rtog par//spyod pa'i lam de rgyur bltas nas//rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung 'dod pas//rgyu zhes
13b5(rgyud): ming du brtags pa yin//'bros bu gang thob theg par bshad//spyod 'gegs sbyong ba rnams su bskrun//'bras bu zhes su btags pa ni//snying po rgyu las 'bras bur bi shad//
13b6(rgyud): snying po'i rang bzhin de lnga ni//skye 'jig med pa'i rang bzhin lnga//rdo rje zhes su bshod pa yin//rdo rje de sgrub phyi ba gnyis//sku dang gsung thugs ye shes ni//blang dor byas pa'i
13b7(rgyud): sgo nas ni//sku zla bzhin du grub par 'dod//blang dor med pa'i nang pa ni//rim pa gsum dang snying po yis//bdag nyid byis da mi shing ste//gang la'ang mi baspyod bya med
14a1(rgyud): 'di//kun gyi snying por dbyur pas na//bya ba med pa'i phrin las 'das//bya med bde ba spong byed pa//mi rtsol bde ba'i lung bsta bkod//bskal pa gsum/
14a2(rgyud): dang mi tshe bdun//zla drug lo gcig zla bcu drug/rtsol bar byed pa'i theg pa can//bya med ngo bo 'di bstan pas//mi rtsol lhun grub bde la gnas/'di la ma rdzogs gang yang
14a3(rgyud): med//gcig rdzogs gnyis rdzogs kun rdzogs pas//bya ba phun sum tshogs par badre//gcig rdzogs byang chub sems su rdzogs//gnyis rdzogs sems kyis byas
14a4(rgyud): par rdzogs//kun rdzogs phun sum tshogs par rdzogs//gcig la rdzogs pa'i lung 'di yis//sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'di la gnas//kun rdzogs pa yi don 'di yis//
14a5(rgyud): thams cad phun sum tshogs par byed//bya med 'di la gang gnas pa//lus 'di gang zag lha mi yang //dgongs pa chos nyid sangs rgyas yin//'di yis sems can don
14a6(rgyud): byas na//brtsol sgrub mi byed bde bar 'gyur zhes gsungs so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las rnam grangs bsdus pa'i lo'u ste bdun pa'o//
14a7(rgyud): ngo nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos byas pa'i chos thams cad de bzhin nyid tu gcig po las de bzhin nyid la rang bzhin gsum snang bar 'gyur ba de so sor snang ba 'di gsung/
14b1(rgyud): so/kyo sems dpa' chen po//nga yi de bzhin nyid gcig ni//phun sum tshogs pa gsum du snang //de bzhin ma skyes rang bzhin ni//de bzhin nyid de yul du snang //yul de kun gyi de bzhin
14b2(rgyud): nyid//de la kun kyang brtags byas nas//de bzhin nyid la lta byed pa//ma bsgribs rang 'byung ye shes ni//rgyu'abras ston pa sku gsum snang //la la rgyu yi ston par snang //la la
14b3(rgyud): 'bral ba'i ston par snang //l-i la 'bras bu'i ston par snang //thugs rje mngon du phyung ba yi//rang 'byung ye shes rnam lnga las//byung ba'i sangs rgyas sems can rnams//
14b4(rgyud): bstan pa'i yul dang 'khor du snang //de lta ba yi 'khor tshogs la//rgyu 'bras ston pa sku gsum gyis//de bzhin nyid kyi yul gcig la//'khor gyi lta ba so so bas//la la
14b5(rgyud): spong 'gegs yul du bstan//la la sbyong zhing bgrod par bstan//la lar byin rlab dag par stan//la lar blang dor gyis grub bstan//la lar rang rgyud dag pa ste//btsal zhing
14b6(rgyud): bsgrub tu yod par byastan//de ltar ston po sku gsum gyis//rgyu dang 'bras la dgongs nas bstan//rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam gnyis kyang de bzhin nyid las gamos pa med//kun byed
14b7(rgyud): yis lung bstan to//de bzhin nyid ni 'di lta ste//kun byed nga yang de bzhin nyid//ngas byas kun kyang de bzhin nyid//yul drug nga yis byas pa yin//dbang drug ra yi rig pa
15a1(rgyud): yis//rnam par shes pa'i tshogs rnams su byungs sa smon rdza sa /s+ho kun rlung na // sa m+b+ha
15a2(rgyud): ye shes la//khamapa gsum rgyud drug byung ba yang //de bzhin nyid byeng ba bad//de bzhin ny-id kyai rang badzin de/ rje'i su med pa ste//de bzhin gyicig tu gnas pa
15a3(rgyud): na ga TI /la 'byung rnas pa ba ni las byung /khyis sa pa'i nyid dun gyi ni 'i hU~M mas 'dzin//rjes rnam na
15a4(rgyud): gyi rna la ma'i ngo bo ste//ji bzhin de bzhin nyid tu ye nas gnas/shin tu rdul 'byung ma surnal 'byur ngo //rnam 'byi chen po sems dpa'i rnal 'byor
15a5(rgyud): bzlas//snying po don gyi rnal ma bya med la//bltas pas mthong ba'i yul ni rnam pa bzhi//sems dpa'i rnal 'byor yul dang dbang por mthong //byang chub lnga dang cho 'phrul rnam pa
15a6(rgyud): bzhis//byin gyis ba byas nas sems dpa'i lce gnyis lta//snying po don sbyirna lam mthong ba med//ma bcos de bzhin nyid du sems dpa' zhog/don gyi skyeng po rnal ma byi med
15a7(rgyud): la//rnam 'byor chen po rnams kyis mthong ba'o//ye nas ri rgyud dag pa'i dkyil 'khong sa//rgyu las 'bras bu ste maud kyil la bang ste//bsnyen pa sgri ba zin mi yin lan
15b1(rgyud): rdzogs byas nas//'phro 'dra bdag nyid lhun gyis grub parang blta//don gyi snying po rnal ma mthong ba med//ma bcos de bzhin nyid du rgyan bzhog/don gyi snying po rnal ma mdam
15b2(rgyud): yongasu rnal 'byor rnams kyis mthong ba ni//dbyings ni snying po rnal ma'i rgyur mthong la//ye shes chen po rnal ma'i 'bras dur mthong //snying po gcig l-I rgyu 'bras gnyis mtho
15b3(rgyud): sa//rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i rnal ma mthong ba mdo//ma btsas de bzhin yong su rnal 'byor zhog/don gyi snying po rnal ma bye med la//shin tu rnal 'byor rdzogs chen lha mthong ba/
15b4(rgyud): byang chub sems ni kun gyi snying por mthong //de nyid ma bcos drin gyi snying por mthong //lta ba ye nas bskum du med par bzhag/dam tshi ga ye nas bsrung du med par bzhag/phrin
15b5(rgyud): A yi nas brtul du med par bzhag/bzhag pas de bzhin nyid la rnal du 'byor//rnal 'byor rnam pazhi lta ze'i bye brag ni//yul gcig re re lnga yong bzhir dbye ba//sems
15b6(rgyud): dpa'i rnal 'byor bye brag bzhir dbye ba//yul dang dbang po rnam par mi rtog sems//des na sems dpa'i rnal 'byor nyid du bshad//byang chub byin brlabs cho 'phrul 'byin pa ni/
15b7(rgyud): de ni rnal 'byor chen po zhesu bshad//phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang ldan pa ni//yongasu rnal 'byor zhesu bshad pa yin//ye shes dam tshig rang bzhin med lta ba//shin tu rnal
16a1(rgyud): 'byo nga gongs par sems dpa' bzhed//blang dor med pa'i rnal 'byor de ma mthong //rnal 'byor chen po bye brag bzhir dbye ba//dang por ting 'dzin rnam gsum
16a2(rgyud): sems pa ni//sems dpa'i rnal 'byor zhes su bshad pa yin//rang rgyud dag pas ye shes lta byed pa//rnal 'byor chen po zhes su boshad pa yin//bsnyen sgrub rnam
16a3(rgyud): bzhi yongasu rdzogs pa ni//yongasu rnal 'byor zhes bshad pa yin//thams cad bdag nyid chen por blta ba ni//shin tu rnal 'byor zhesu bshad pa yin//rtsol sgrub 'dis pa'i
16a4(rgyud): rnal ma mthong ba min//yongasu rnal 'byor bye brag bzhir blta ba//ting 'dzin rim pas bdag skur mi bskyed par//chos nyid rang rgyud dag par sems dpa'i phyir//sems dpa'i rnal
16a5(rgyud): 'byor zhes su bshad pa yin//yab yumo thebs drang shes rab mi ltos par//snying po tsam gyis dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i phyir//rnal 'byor chen po'i dgongs par
16a6(rgyud): bshad pa yin//snang ba rang bzhin med pa'i chos nyid du//spyod pas yongasu rnal 'byor nyid du bshad//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cod kun//rgyu dbyings 'bras bu
16a7(rgyud): ye shes lta ba'i phyir//shin tu rnal 'byor zhesu bshad pa yin//rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i rnal ma mthong ba min//shin tu rnal 'byor bya breg rnam bzhi ni//blong dor med pa'i
16b1(rgyud): byang chub sems de ni//sems dpa'i rnal 'byor zhesu bshad pa yin//rtsol sgrub 'das pa'i byang chub sems de ni//rnal 'byor chen po zhes su bshad pa yin//rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i
16b2(rgyud): byang chub sems de ni//yongasu rnal 'byor zhesu bshad pa yin//yin min sgro dang skur pa 'das pa'i phyir//shin tu rnal 'byor zhes nga yis bshad//yongasu rnal 'byor la sogs
16b3(rgyud): gsum po las//rang 'byung ye shes che dang mi ldan pas//lam la bgrod cing sa la sbyongs par byed//dam tshig tshul srun lta bston byed pas//gom pa drag dal lta spyod yod ma yin//
16b4(rgyud): de bas shin tu rnal 'byor lta spyod ni//ye nas kun byed nyid kyis byas pa'i phyir//lam lo mi bgrod sa la sbyongs mi byed//dam tshigo mi srun lta ba sgom mi byed//byang chub chen po'i
16b5(rgyud): lam nus kun 'byung phyir/byang chub nyid la byang chub nyid mi bgrod//bgrod sa byang chub nyid las med pa'i phyir//byang chub nyid la byang chub nyid mi sbrengs//dam tshig rang bzhin byang chub
16b6(rgyud): nyid yin pas//byang chub nyid la byang chub nyid mi srun//sgom pa'i rang bzhin byang chub nyid yin pas/byang chub nyid kyis nyid la sgom du med//lto ba'i yul ni byang chub nyid yin pas///
16b7(rgyud): byang chub nyid kyis nyid la bltar med phyir//shin tu rnal 'byor lta spyod bya med 'di//rang 'byung ye shes gom pa drag dal tsa ni//kun byed rgyal po nga yi gom pa yin//rgyu 'bras
17a1(rgyud): theg pa can gyi spyod yul min zhes gsungs so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las chos nyid kyi rang bzhin lus chos nyid kyi yul kun la bkod pa'i le'u
17a2(rgyud): ste brgyad pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des rgyu 'bras kyi theg pa bgrod lam nor bas rdzogs pa chen po las grol sa dang sgrib par gyur pa 'di gsungaso///
17a3(rgyud): kyi sems dpa' chen po/byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin 'di nyid ni//chos kun ma lus pa yi snying po ste//mA skyes rnam par dag pas sgrib pa myed//bgrod pa'i lam dang bral bas
17a4(rgyud): golas med//ye nas lhun gyis grub pas btsal du med//chos kun snying po byang chub semasu gcig/gcig la rnam par bgrangs pas gol sgrib byung //bgrod tu med la bgrod
17a5(rgyud): pas golas byung //dmigs med bltas pas ma mthong sgrib pa byung //de bzhin nyid du thams cad gcig pa la//rgyu spyad 'bras bu phyi mar 'dod pa ni//pha rol phyin bcu sa bcu
17a6(rgyud): thob 'dod pa//bskal pa gsum gyi bar du grol nas bsgrib//phyi nang rtog pa dag pa rnam gsum gyis//byang chub lnga dang cho 'phrul yan lag gis//dam tshig sdom pa tshul
17a7(rgyud): bzhin dag na yang //mi tshe bdun gyi bar du gol zhing bsgrubs//rgyal spyod cing 'bras bu lta ba ni//lha spyod so so gnyisu bltas pa yis//gnyis me la mi che gsum
17b1(rgyud): bsgribs gol//gol po gcig la glang der byed pa de//gcig tu ma mthong gAnyi su mthong byas na//blang dor ma bral bar du grol zhing bsgribs rang 'byung gcig la yin pa gsum
17b2(rgyud): bsgoms pas//rtsol bral lung las gol zhis lung ston cig/rje ltar snang zhing srid pa'i chos rnams lnga//snying po de bzhin nyid du ma rtogs par//dbyings dang ye shes rgyu 'bris
17b3(rgyud): bltas pa'i phyir//rgyu yi spros dang 'bras bu'i skur yin pas//sgro skur gnyis bral yid ches bar du smrig/med bye'i 'bras bu 'dod pa rnam drug no//rgyu la bden pa ga sa
17b4(rgyud): kyis thob byod dang //dag gsum spyad pas 'bras bu thob byed dang //lta spyad so sos thob par 'dod pa dang //blang dor spyad pas thob par 'dod pa dang //rig pa gsum bsgoms
17b5(rgyud): thob par 'dod pa dang //rgya 'bras dbyings nyid ye shes bltos pa yis//thob par 'dod pa'i nges thob rnam pa drug/gol sa drug dang sgrib pa drug drug ste//byang chub sems las
17b6(rgyud): gol sgrib skyon yin pas//des thob drug gi skyon yon gsal bar gsung //rtog spyod gnyis kyang gol sa sgrib pa la//gzung 'dzin gnyis kyang gil so sgrib par bshad//
17b7(rgyud): lta spyod gnyis kyang gol sa sgrib par ba shad//lha spyod blang dor rtsel sgrub rgyu 'bras 'dis//mi rtsol bde ba tshol kun gol sgribs//byang chub sems ni na mkha' lta bu ste/
18a1(rgyud): na mkha' lta bu sems nyid chos nyid la//lbu bas bsgom med dam chog sung du med//phrin las btsal med ye shes sgrib pa med//sa la sbyangs myed bgrod
18a2(rgyud): nga'i lam yang med//phra brgyas med gnyis med 'brel pa med//sems las ngas lung gaud+d+hin la 'byings pa med//sgro skur 'das pas mun dag la bzang mod//rdzogs
18a3(rgyud): chen byang chub sems kyi lta ba'o//ltar med gcig la sgom byed drug byung bas//la grol la sgribs lta ba'i grol sgrib byung //bsrung med gcig la sdom pa drug bsrungs pas///
18a4(rgyud): la gol la sgribs dam tshig gol sgrib byung //btsal med gcig la phrin las drug rtsol bas//la gol la sgribs phrin las gol sgrib byung //bsgribs me de gcig la ye shes
18a5(rgyud): drug byung bas//la gol la bsgribs yaM shes gol sgrib byung //sbyangs med gcig la sbrang thob drug byung bas//la gol la bsgribs sa yi grol sleb byang //bgrod med gcig
18a6(rgyud): la lam bgrod drug byung bas//la gol la sgribs lam gyi gol sgrib byung //gzung med gcig la 'dzin byed drug byung bas//la gol la sgribs chos kyi gol sgrib byung //
18a7(rgyud): gnyis med gcig la 'brel pa drug byung bas//la gol la ri sgribs 'brel pa'i gol sgrib byung //bden pa gcig la nges pa drug byung bas//la gol la bsgrubs lung
18b1(rgyud): gi grol sgrib byung //brjod med gcig la brjod byed drug byung bas//la gol la bsgribs man ngag gol sgrib byung //kun gyi snying po byang chub sems 'di ni//ye nas rang gi
18b2(rgyud): rang bzhin lhun grub pas//rang bzhin bcu yis btsal zhing bsgrub me dgos//nga yi rang bzhin kun dpe na mkha' 'dra//na mkha' dgo la kun kyang rtsol ma byed//na mkha' dag la
18b3(rgyud): kun gyi rtsal bya ru//na mkha' kun byas rtsol sgrub kun las 'das//de bzhin kun byed snying po byang chub sems//nga nyid spyod yul kun lngas 'das pa'i phyir//nga la ltar med sgom du ye
18b4(rgyud): nas med//de bzhin rang bzhin bcu po des kyang ni//'das pa nga la bya ru yod ma yin//rgyu dang 'bras bu'i theg pa can rnams kyis//rang bzhin bcu yis nga la btsal byas nas//nga dang
18b5(rgyud): yi rang bzhin mthong 'dod pas//mkha' la gom bor sa la lhung ba bzhin//rang bzhin bcu pos bgrod pas ltung bar 'gyur//nga yi rang bzhin nges par khungs bstan pa//nga ni spyod
18b6(rgyud): yul kun las 'das pa'i phyir//lta bsgom du med pa de bzhin du//rang bzhin bcu la de bzhin don med kyis//rang bzhin bcu la don yod ma rtogs shig/nga ni bltas pas mthong
18b7(rgyud): bi'i yul med pas//blta bor ma byed de bzhin nyid du zhog//spros bral ma skyes bral ba'i rgyu med pas//sdom pa dang ni tshul khrims bsrung mi dgos//snying por ye nas
19a1(rgyud): lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir//rtsol bu dang ni bsgrub pa bya mi dwagos//rang 'byung ye shes sgrib pa med pa'i phyir//rig pa'i ye shes gsal bar bskyed du med//
19a2(rgyud): thams cad nga yi sA ru gnas pa'i phyir//sbyongs nas bgrod pa'i sa na yod ma yin//nga yis kun la khyab par gnas pa'i phyir//nga la bgrod par bya ba'i lam yod min//
19a3(rgyud): ni ye nas gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phyir//phra bA zhes ni ming du gdag su med//nga yi gzugs kyis kun la khyab pa'i phyir//gnyis shes bya ba ye nas yod ma yin//nga ni ye
19a4(rgyud): nas rang 'byung ye shes la//nga la gzhan gyis gtan lnga dbab tu med//nga ni kun gyi byang chub snying po bso//gsong ba'i man ngag gzhan na yod ma yin//sgro dang skur pa
19a5(rgyud): kun las 'das pa'i phyir//chos rnams kun gyi la ni nga yin bzlas//nga med pa yi yul ni gzhon med pas//lta ba bsgom du med par la yang bzlas//nga las gzhan du
19a6(rgyud): bsrung du med pa'i phyir//dam tshig bsrung du med par la yang bzlas//nga las gzhan du btsal du med pa'i phyir//phrin las btsal du med par la yang bzlas//nga las gzhan
19a7(rgyud): du gnas pa med pa'i phyir//sa la sbyang du med par la yang bzlas//nga la sgrib pa ye nas med pa'i phyir//rang 'byung ye shes yin par la yang bzlas//nga ni ma skyes chos/
19b1(rgyud): smon pa'i phyir//ba rgyas nyid yin par la yang bzlas//de las gzhan du 'grod tu med pa'i phyir//lam pa bgrod du med par la yang bzlas//sangs rgyas sems can snang nga /
19b2(rgyud): snod bcud kun//snying po byang chub nga las byung ba'i phyir//ye napa gnyi su med par la yang bzlas//rang 'byung ye shes gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir//lung chen thogs dbebs
19b3(rgyud): yin par la yang bzlas//chos rnams thams cad de las med pa'i phyir//kun byed da ni kun gyi la bzla'o//ngam shes pas sgrib pa'i ngo bo ba shad//nga las gzhan btsal
19b4(rgyud): go bas byung ba yini//lus dang shes bya rnam bya gnyi su bstan//mo mthong blo ni las kyi sgrub pa yin//ma shes pa ni shes bya'i sgrib pa yin//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams
19b5(rgyud): thams cad kun//snying po byang chub sems kyi ngo bo bas//maM reg ma shes sgrib gnyis ngo byor ba shad//btsal zhing bsgrub po gol sa ngas bla shing //kye sems dpe
19b6(rgyud): chen po nyon cig/ji ltar snong ba'i chos rnams thams cad ni//rang yin gzhan men de la rang rtog na//de ni rang la rang gis bi sgribs pa ste//rang gi rang bzhin de yis shes pa
19b7(rgyud): men//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun//sems dpa' nyid yin nyid las gzhan med gyis//mi rtog mnyam pa nyid du bde bar mnas//de la bde
20a1(rgyud): don ni 'di lta ste//rang bzhin chen po bcu la bal mi dgos//rang bzhin chen po bcu lam btsal bas//stsol sa sgrib pa drug drug bcu po yis//sum
20a2(rgyud): brgya drug cu gol sgrib mtha' yas med//kye sems dpa' chen po//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun//rang gi snying po byang chub mngon byung gis//'di ma yin gyi
20a3(rgyud): chos ni gzhan ma bshad//'di la ma rtog shig par nga lung ston//sems dpa' khyod kyis 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la//ngas bstan bzhin du tshogs la lung ston cig ces
20a4(rgyud): gsungaso//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las gal sgrib skyon sel gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid kyi rang
20a5(rgyud): bzhin phun sum chags pa 'di gsungs//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/kun byed nga la thams cad tshogs pa'i phyir//de phyir phun sum tshogs shes bya bar bshad//
20a6(rgyud): kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum las//ston pa bstan pa 'khor rnams byung ba'i phyir//kun byed ces ni de la btags pa yin//dang por ston pa phun sum tshogs pa
20a7(rgyud): ni//kun byed nga yi rang 'byung ye shes las//rang bzhin rnam pa gsum du byung ba de//sku gsum ston pa gsum du bstan pa yin//chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs pa
20b1(rgyud): dang //sbrul pa'i sku dang rnam pa gsum du bstan+ta//sku gsum de yaM rang bzhin bstan pa ni//chos kyi sku yi rang bzhin bstan pA ni//ma skyes gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang bzhin bzhugs//
20b2(rgyud): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sgra yi rang bzhin ni//ji ltar 'dod pa'i longs spyod rdzogs par bzhugs//sprul pa'i sku yi rang bzhin bstan pa ni//ji ltar 'dul ba'i sku ru sprul nas
20b3(rgyud): bzhugs//sku gsum ston pa de yi bstan pa ni//phyi nang gsang ba rnam po gsum du bstan//ston pa rgya sa sku'i bstan pa 'di lta ste//gsang ba gsum gyi rang bzhin bsten pa ste//
20b4(rgyud): gzhi ma chos nyid dag gi rang bzhin las//gsang ba bskyed dang gsang ba rdzogs pa dang //gsang ba rdzogs pa chen po'i rang bzhin gsum//kun gyi spyod yul ma yin gsang ba
20b5(rgyud): bshad//med pa'i rim pa gsum skyed gsang ston pa//de ni gsang ba bskyed pa zhesu bshad//gsang ba rdzogs pa zhesu bstan pa ni//nang gi shes rab ting 'dzin gsum mi rtogs//
20b6(rgyud): ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad la//nang gi ting 'dzin shes rab snying po brjod//rang rgyud dag pa yi nas lhar byas nas//rang gi lus kyi rdo rje skye mched rnams//lha spyod
20b7(rgyud): blang dong gnyis med bdag nyid 'dod//de ni nang gi gsang ba rdzogs par bshad//gsang ba rdzogs pa chen po bstan pa ni//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad ni//nga
21a1(rgyud): 'dzin gusu ma gyis byang chub sems ma bskrad//snying po yi ga 'bru brjod nas rdzogs ma byas//kun byed du ni rdzogs pa chen po ste//nga la ma rdzogs pa na glang
21a2(rgyud): yang med//nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum bstan pa ni//rdzogs cheni byang chub sems gsum bsten pa yin//de ni gsang ba rdzogs pa chen por bshad//de ni ston pa chos sku'i
21a3(rgyud): bstan par bshad//ston pa longs spyad pa'aM bstan pa ni//bye ba byed pa'i phyi ba sde gsum ste//bya ba byed pa'i rtog can sngo pa ni//dang por
21a4(rgyud): rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin gyis//phyi nong rtag pa dag pa gsum bsgoms pas//rtog pa'i gza' skar dus tshod sgo nas 'jug/byang chub dang ni cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyis//bdag
21a5(rgyud): drang ye shes lha ni rje khol tshul//dog pa gsum gyi mchod pa de byas nas//myed par sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub 'dod //don dam kun rdzob gnyis kyi sgyu mar bshad//lta ba
21a6(rgyud): skyed pa gnyisu 'byed pa yi//gnyis la brten nas don gcig sgrub byed pa//yod pa'i spyod pas med pa'i dran sgrub pas//rten med mkha' le spyang mo nyug pa 'dra//blang dor med
21a7(rgyud): po'i phyi ba'i gsod pa ni//mi rtog ting 'dzin byin rlabs cho 'phrul gyis//thams cad byin rlabs ye shes sems par byas//mchod pa phyi nang gsang ba gsum mchod
21b1(rgyud): /smra nga ba du rgyun d+ha d+hA / danan dun rtunas na pa 'jog nu ra/ da pas byu ba ma ma
21b2(rgyud): na shrIH/sbyin sa bstan pa ni/lhun sa rgyul ba na na ma ste gsum// 'i na su sh+tha //
21b3(rgyud): di /shes y-i la/ ga ga sa byung \u0f7f/de ste ma na padag nga na/ sbyin sa
21b4(rgyud): narnam /byu hU~M/gzugs da lta rji m+b+ha // gas skye m+b+hag rnamags m+b+ha d+hu//de 'du
21b5(rgyud): //'di chags rnam bdag rten po dag su pan//'dul bste tshig sna gsus bu y-in//gti mugi 'dul ba'i gnyen pa gsus pa //da ste'i sde
21b6(rgyud): tshigs steng gsu sa//na sdang 'dul ni ginyen po dag smras pa na//mngon pa'i skye sted ni khri tshig stong gsungs//dug gsum chu mnyam 'dus gnyen po
21b7(rgyud): gsum yis te khri chag snying gsungs/spying ba rgya zla ba ni snang gsungs pa med //dge sasu mi gnyen pos 'dri'i phyir ba suMs pa na//mtshan nyid
22a1(rgyud): gsum ste//sgro na mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa gsum//de ni bsdus pa'i don zhes bstan pa yin//mdo sde la yang bshad lugs bsdu
22a2(rgyud): dang gnyis//so sor dbye ba'i don du bstan pa yin//dug gsum rgyu las 'bras bu ngan song gsum//sems can rgyu la las spyod dge sdig gnyis//'bras bu mtho ris
22a3(rgyud): ngan sang rnam gnyis so//mtshan nyid rgyu las rab tu bsgrags pa yin//'di ni sngar gsungs de gsung phyis gsung 'gyur//'od don brjod du med pa'i don 'di ni//sa ma ma
22a4(rgyud): gsungs da ltar mi gsung ste//spru l-I pa'i sku yis phyis kyang gsung mi 'gyur//de dag sprul pa sku yis bstan par bshad//kye sems dpa' chen po//kun byed nga yi
22a5(rgyud): rang bzhin rnam gsum la//'khor gyi dang po ston pa sku gsum shar//sku gsum ston pa gsum gyi 'khor bstan pa//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ston pa chos
22a6(rgyud): kyi sku yis 'khor snyan pa//nga yis byas pa'i 'khor ni thams cad kun//nga yi rang bzhin chos kyi sku 'khor yin//sangs rgyas sems can snang srid snod bcud kun//
22a7(rgyud): chos kyi sku yi 'khor du ma 'dus med//ces gsung so//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ston pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yi 'khor bstan pa//mos spyod do na yi
22b1(rgyud): sa la 'das pa yi//dang po rab tu dga' ba'i sa mnan nas//sa bcu chos kyi sprin gyis pa rnams//don longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yi 'khor du brtan//ston pa sprul pa sku yi
22b2(rgyud): 'khor bstan pa//mu stegs mur thug rgyang phan byal ba bzhi//bla med byung chub lam la gtan gal bas//dbang po sems bskyer thugs rje byon rlangs nas//dge sbyong pho mo dag
22b3(rgyud): bsnyen pho ma bzhi//ston pa sbrul po'i sku yi 'khoro du bstan zhes gsungaso//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/nga las byung ba'o ston pa sku gsum gyi//sku gsum so so rang re/
22b4(rgyud): gnas bstan pa//ston pa ches sku'i gnas ni 'di lta ste//'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang ste//yang dag don gyi 'og min de ruM bshad//ston pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i gnas
22b5(rgyud): bstan pa//'jig rten mtshan ma kun gyi steng gyur pa//gnas kyi 'og mun khang bu brtsegs pa yi//gzhal yas khang de gnas kyi 'og min bshad//ston pa skyel pa'i sku yi
22b6(rgyud): gnas bstan pa//sprul pa'i sku ni rab bdun shAkya thub//gnas ni bya rgod phung po'i gnas bstan te//yang dag thugs rje sprul pa nges med gnas shes gsungs so//kye sems
22b7(rgyud): dpa' chen po nyon cig/nga las byung ba'i sku gsum ston pa yi//'dul ba'i zhing khams khyad par bstan pa ni//chos sku ston pa'i 'dul ba'i zhing khams ni//chos kyi dbyings
23a1(rgyud): kyi mtha' yi sngaklas pa dang //num kha'i khams kyis ji ltar khyad pa de//chos kyi sku yis 'dul ba'i zhing khams yin//ljongs spyod rdzogs pa sku yA 'dul
23a2(rgyud): ba'i zhing khams ni//nga las byung ba'i gzugs sgra dri ro rog/ji ltar 'dod pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pas 'dul//sprul pa'i sku yis 'dul ba'i zhing kha mos ni//'jom+bu'i gling ni
23a3(rgyud): bye ba phrag brgya las//rang 'byung ye shes thugs rjes rgyud drug 'dul//de ni 'thun pa'i bye brag bstan pa yin//nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum de//rgyu 'thun 'bras bu
23a4(rgyud): 'thun la rang bzhin gcig/rgyu ni byang chub semasu kun 'thun la//'bras bu sangs rgyas yin par kun kyang 'thun//rang bzhin chos nyid ngo bo gcig par ba stun//'dul ba'i
23a5(rgyud): dus la su phyi phye ba med ces gsungaso//kye sems dpa' chen po yang nyon cig/kuni byed rgyal po de las byung ba yi//sku gsum ston pa de yi bshad lugs ni//ston po chos
23a6(rgyud): sras byin gyis rlabs kyis bshad//longs spyod rdzogs pa rang gi ngo bos bshad//sprul pa'i sku ni tshig dang don sdebs nus//gang zag rna ba'i dbang por tshig don ston//chos
23a7(rgyud): sku byin gyis brlabs kyis bshad pa ni//kun byed de yi rang bzhin bstan pa ste//skye ba med las skye ba'i cho 'phrul du//ji ltar snang srid snad bcud thams cad kun//ngo bo
23b1(rgyud): thugs rje cho 'phrul phyung ba ste//rang bzhin byin gyis brlabs kyis bshad ces bya//longs spyod rdzogs sku rang gi ngo bo ston//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun//gzugs
23b2(rgyud): sgra dri ro rig la sogs pa yi//'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad rdzogs par ston//rang gi ngo bos bshad tsas da yis bstan//spel skyes tshig dang yi ges bsde bas bshad pa/
23b3(rgyud): ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun//ston pa'i ngo bor ston pas ma rig ste//snyan pa zhes pa'i khyad par 'dod sprul pa sa//don rnams tshig dang yi ger sgra brjod pas//
23b4(rgyud): tshig gi sgra des don de go byas nas//don dri tshig sku yAs bshad pa yin//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/kun byed pa ni sku gsum ngo bo ste//mi rtog mnyam pa nyid du gnas
23b5(rgyud): ba ste//spros bral chos kyi sku yi ngo bo yin//rang bzhin 'byung ba'i skye ba'i cho 'phral de//'dod pa 'byung ba'i longs spyod rdzogs sku yin//thugs rjes ji ltar 'dul ba'i ngan
23b6(rgyud): mdzad pa//nga ni sprul pa'i sku yi ngo bo yin//kun byed rgyal po'i rang bzhin rnam gsum gyis//gang la gang gis 'dulnga ba'i skur ston mdzad//bsten pa'i rang bzhin brjod du
23b7(rgyud): med pa'i don//gang la gang 'tsham de yis don mdzad po//de ni bstan pa dun sum tshogs par gsungs//'khor gyi rang bzhin dang pa gang 'dus nas//de la 'dus nas
24a1(rgyud): de yi gdung 'tsho ba 'dzin//de la phun sum tshogs pa'i 'khor zhes bya//du ni ston pa kun byed byang chub sems//dun byed gcig la rnam pa gsum dgrangs
24a2(rgyud): pa//kun bye dang dngang myi rang bzhin dang //nga yis byas pa'i chos dang rnam pa gsum//nga ni sten pa kun byed kun gyi mes//nga yi rang bzhin rnam pa bcur bstan pa/de na
24a3(rgyud): bstan pa kun gyi snying por bshad//kun byed nga yis byas pa'i chos rnams ni//dus gsum gcig ni bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang //khams gsum gnas pa'i 'gro
24a4(rgyud): ba thams cad kun//dbye ba med par 'khor gyi dam par byas//kun byed gcig gis phun sum tshogs byas pas//sems kyi dgos pa kun byas phun sum tshogs//gang
24a5(rgyud): la gang dgos dgos pa tshogs pa la//kun byed nga yis phun sum tshogs par bshad//ston pa'i rang bzhin rnam pa gsum bstan pa//'khor gyi dang po ston pa sku gsum
24a6(rgyud): shAr//ma skyes gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang bzhin de//'khor gyi dang po ston pa cho sa sbyar shang //skye ba'i cho 'phrul kun bzangs rol pa de//'dod spyod longs spyod TIg sa
24a7(rgyud): ba'i sku ru shir//sna tshogs ji ltar 'dod pa byung nas ni//de dang 'thun pa kun kyang tshi mi byed pa//don sna tshogs sprul sku zhesu bshad//sku gsum ston pa grags phyogs
24b1(rgyud): mthong ba na//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' bzod thob gsum//gang 'thad ston pa'i sku la de 'dus na snga//de dang 'thun pa'i gan su don ston bzhugs//bstan pa'i rang bzhin
24b2(rgyud): yang ni de 'dra ste//sku gsum gang gis 'khor la gang ston pa//grang la gang gis 'dul ba'i don rnams kyis//sangs rgyas lha mi 'jig rten las dag la//bstan pas
24b3(rgyud): 'dul phyir phun sum tshogs zhes bshad//mi gnas chos sku dbyings na bzhugs pa yis//dus gsum sangs rgyas khams gsum sems can la//spros med byang
24b4(rgyud): chub sems ni chos sku bstan//ye shesra longs spyod 'og min bzhugs pa yis//sa bcu pa yi byang chub sems dpa' la//byang chub sems de sku dang ye shes bshad
24b5(rgyud): thugs rje sna tshogs nges med sprul pa yis//bzod thob gang na 'dus pa'i 'khor de la//ma nges gong gis 'dul ba'i don yang bstan//smon lam las bzang rkyen gyis
24b6(rgyud): bar mchod//nga yi thugs rje sems dpa'i dus l+ya bab//ngas bstan 'khor gyi nang nas khyod sdud dang //gnyis med don nyid nga yis bstan pa gsum//tshogs pas
24b7(rgyud): dus gnas rang bzhin de la tshangs//phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa gsum po de//ye nas dkon pa'i dkon mchog gsum du bstan//kun byed nga yi sku gsung thugasu
25a1(rgyud): /rgyu ko nas su rgyas na rdzogs// la / dang r+m+ma//na du sa kon slong badzin/
25a2(rgyud): sa/ma ni ba sa rnaMm ga pa ni//khyed rlu ga nga shug mdu / ma pa ma
25a3(rgyud): / rlog sa sa gsu ma gas// sbyin ma du slogs//rlon su shes pa'i na du m+b+ha smrig
25a4(rgyud): zhes gsus pang //sa da 'dud tsug su zhugs// / sa su sa da slo
25a5(rgyud): na sa la gyid/ pa sa //ud myed pa nas na sa sa / ma
25a6(rgyud): gru du kyishes gatshun kyi ma su rgya ma su su
25b1(rgyud): 'di gas so//kya sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang rtsa ba ni 'di lta ste/da ni chos kun rang bzhin yin pa ste//nga yi rang bzhin lasra na chos gzhan
25b2(rgyud): med//rten pa sku gsum nga yi rang bzhin min//dus gsum sangs rgyas nga yi rang bzhin yin//byang chub sems dpe'i nga yi rang bzhin yin//rnal 'byor rnam bzhin de yi ra
25b3(rgyud): bzhin yin//'dod khams gzugs khams gzugs medo khams gsum yang //kun byed nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa yin//'byung chen lnga yang nga yi rang bzhin yin//rgyud drug son
25b4(rgyud): ngayi rang bzhin yin//snang ba za dang yi rang bzhin yin/srid pa thaM nga yi rang bzhin yin//snyid bcud bsdus pa yi rang bzhin yin//nga yi rang bzhin las ni gzhan med pas//chos rnams kun
25b5(rgyud): gyi rtsa ba nga las 'dus//dA las ma 'dus pa ni gcig kyang med//ma skyes pa dang skye ba'i cho 'phrul dang //thugs rje'i rang bzhin rnam pa gsum byung ba//de ni ston pa gsum gyi ra
25b6(rgyud): bzhin yin//snga pa de lta phyi ba dus gsum yang //nga nyid gcig tu gnas pa'i rang bzhin las//sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu gnas pa'i phyir//de yang de yi rang bzhin
25b7(rgyud): bstan pa yin//de nyid gzung 'dzin bral bas byang ba dang //rnamakha' ba ni du kun khyab pa dang //chos rnams kun gyi sang po byed pa'i phyir//byang chub sems kyi rang mi rang bzhin
26a1(rgyud): yin//kun byed nga ni gcig tu gnas pa la//nga yi rang bzhin de bzhin rnal ma la//rnam bzhi 'byor pa rnal ma gcig tu 'byor//des na nga yi rang bzhin yin
26a2(rgyud): par bshad//kun byed nga yA lus ngag yid gsum las//'byung yang nga yi rang bzhin de las 'byung //'dus kyang ngo yi rang bzhin de la 'dus//yin yang nga yi ngo bo de yin
26a3(rgyud): pas//khams gsum nga yi rang bzhin yin par bshad//kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rnam lnga ni//nga yi ngo bo rnam lnga phyung ba ste//na mkha' rlung chus me snang ba lnga//kun byed nga yi
26a4(rgyud): rang bzhin bstan pa yin//kun byed nga yi thugs rjes mngon phyung nas//rang 'byung ye shes rnam lnga bstan pa ni//'gro ba rigs drug sems can snang ba yang //kun byed nga yi
26a5(rgyud): rang bzhin bstan pa yin//kun byeng rgyal po dA yi rang bzhin las//snang srid snod bcud bsdus pa thams cad kun//thams cad ngas byas nga las byung ba'i phyir//ngar ma 'dus
26a6(rgyud): pa'i chos ni gcig kyang med//nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum ya//kun byang nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum ston//snga pa da lta phyi ba dus gsum gyi//rnam gsum gcig
26a7(rgyud): tu gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyang //snga phye med par kun byed rang bzhin gnas//gzung 'dzin bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yang //kun byed nga yi rang bzhin sems dpar
26b1(rgyud): byed//nalnga 'byor rnam bzhi rnal mar 'jog pa yang //kun byed du la rdul du 'jog par byu //AnA byed rgyal pos thams ca du byusmra pa bzhin//thams cad kun byed rgyal po nyid du 'dus rgya
26b2(rgyud): gsungs so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po los chos thams cad k+She rtsab byang chub kyi snyoms kun byed rgyal po nyid kho nar 'dus pa'i le'u ste bcu gtsog pa'o//
26b3(rgyud): de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po de yis chos thams cad kyi khungs kyi mdo 'di gsung so//kye sems dpa' chen po//nga ni kun gyi lung khungs yin pa ste//ji ltar snang ba
26b4(rgyud): chos rnams thams cad kun//thams cad du las byung bar shes par gyis//chos kyi spyi khungs chen po 'di nyon la//chosde rnams thams cad 'di ltar lung sten cig/kun byed rgyal po
26b5(rgyud): byang chub sems nga ni//lung chen kun gyi rgyal po nga yin pas//ston pa gsum yang dang po de la byung //lung zhes bya ba ston pa'i bka' la gdags//man ngag kun gyi rtsa ba dA yan pas//
26b6(rgyud): sboms las ma rtogs pa yi chos nyid ni//dus gsum sangs rgyas khams gsum sems can la//kun byed nga yis yang dag bstan pa med//rgyud dang mdo sde kun gyi spyi 'grel
26b7(rgyud): yin//rgyud dang mdo sde ston pa'i ston pa yang //kun byed nga yi rang bzhin phyung ba yin//ston pa dang ni bstan pa gnyis ka 'brel//kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems ngani//bstan pa
27a1(rgyud): kun gyi yang rgyu yin par bshad//da las byung ba'i ston pa skug sum gyis//bstan pa'i 'dul ba mdo ste mngon pa dang //tan tA sa sar stan+ti 'bum sna dang //
27a2(rgyud): bskyed rdzogs gsang ba la sogs col sgrub can//kun kyang rnal sgrub 'das pa da ma bgrod//rtsol bo nyid kyis 'das pa de yi mthong //des ni bsten pa kun gyi yang rje yin
27a3(rgyud): par bshad//kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems nga ni//theg pa kun gyi nying khung yin par bshad//ston pa gsum gyi gnas pa'i theg pa gsum//nges par gnas pa
27a4(rgyud): theg pa gcig las med//gcig ni kun theg byang chub sems kyis//de ni theg pa kun gyi nying khur bshad//kye ni ma rig pa yi mun bsal nas//ye shes chen po'i smyung
27a5(rgyud): ba mched par byed//de yang ji lta bu zhes bstan zhe na//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun//byang chub de bzhin nyid du ma rog ste//ma rig rtag pa'i mun par 'gribs
27a6(rgyud): pa la//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams tha~Md kun//kun bying byang chub sem kyis byis khri phyir//kun byed byang chub sem su rig byas nas//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun//so sor rtog pa'i
27a7(rgyud): mun pa bsal nas kyang //rang 'byung ye shes chen po snang ba mchod//des na ma rig mun sel snang ba ched ces bya//kye sems dpa' chen po//rnam par rtog pa'i dra ba dral
27b1(rgyud): nas ni//non mongs pa yi phreng thag gcod par byed//ji ltar snang ba'i chos 'di thams cad la//rgyu dang 'bras bu'i theg parnyan rnams kyis//la las dug mthung spong ba'i rtog pa byed//
27b2(rgyud): la las sems chags pa yi yul mthong nas//bden gnyis ma chags pa yi rtog pa byed//la las rnam dag bya ba'i yul mthong nus//dag pa gsum dang byin rlabs cha
27b3(rgyud): 'phrul gyis//rje dang khol gyi tshul du rtog par byed//la las rang dag pa yi rang bzhin lo//bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhis bsgrub 'dod rtog byed pa//thams cad kun byed byang chub
27b4(rgyud): sems da yi//sems las gzhan ma yin rtog dral nas ni//so sor rtog pa'i nyon mongs phreng thag gcod ces gsungs so//kye soms dpa' chen po//kun byed rgyal po
27b5(rgyud): byang chub sems da ni//khyod kyis nga yi rang bzhin 'di rtogs la//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun//nga las gzhan med pa ru lung ston cig/khyod kyis nga yi lung
27b6(rgyud): 'di bstan 'gyur ni//khyod la 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs thams cad kyis//kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs 'gyur nas//kun kyang nga yi rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur//kun kyang
27b7(rgyud): yi rang bzhin gyur pa no//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad la//kun kyang spong 'gegs bden gnyis sbyang mi byed//gtsang sgras dag gsum byin gyis rlob mi byed/
28a1(rgyud): /ting 'dzin sems bskyed rtsol dang bsgrub mi byed//thams cad kun byed nga ru byas zin pas//kun byed nga ru thams cad mnyam pa nyid//mnyam nyid nga yis mnyam
28a2(rgyud): nyid phyi mi dgos//mnyam nyid bya mi dgos par sngar lung bstan zhes gsungs so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgya lnga po las nges par lung khungs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu
28a3(rgyud): gnyis pas+ho////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po dus lung thams cad kyi rgyal po yin pa'i phyir//chos thams cad kyi spyi lung bshad pa'i bshad
28a4(rgyud): lugs 'di gsung me//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/nga ni chos kyi spyi lung yin pa'i phyir//gtan tshigs don gyi bshad lugs rnam lnga ni//spyi don rnam pa lnga yis
28a5(rgyud): bshad pa ste//lo rgyas don gyi bshad lugs bstan pa dang //rtsa ba don gyi bshad lugs bston pa dang //yo ga don gyi bshad lugs bstan pa dang //dgos pa don gyi bshad
28a6(rgyud): lugs bstan pa dang //tshig gi don gyi bshad lugs bstan pa'o//dang po yid ches pa yi khungs bstan phyir//lo rgyus don gyi bshad lugs bstan par bya//chos kun
28a7(rgyud): rtsa ba sems su 'dus pa'i phyir//des na rtsa ba'i don de bstan par bya//theg pa'i khyad par so sor dbye ba'i phyir//yo ge don gyi rtsa ba bstan par bya//rtsol bsgrub bya mi
28b1(rgyud): dgos par bstan pa'i phyir//dgos byed don gyi dgos pa de ru bstan//mi rtogs don de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir//tshig gi dron de sgra ru brjod par bya//kye sems dpa' chen po///
28b2(rgyud): lo rgyus don gyis dgos pa bstan pa ni//dang por yid ches pa yi khungs bstan phyir//lo rgyus don gyi shod yugs bstan pa ni//rang bzhin byin gyis brlabs kyis bshad lugs dang ///
28b3(rgyud): rang gi ngo bo bstan pa'i bshad lugs dang //don gyi sgra tshig bsdebs pa'i bshad lugs so//kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum las//nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis//
28b4(rgyud): rang bzhin dang ni ngo bo sgra tshig gis//ji ltar byung ba'i khungs des yid kyang ches//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/rtsa ba don gyi dgos pa bstan pa ni//snang srid snod bcud bsdus
28b5(rgyud): pa thams cad dang //sangs rgyas sems can bsdus pa thams cad kun//kun byed byang chub nga yis byas pa'i phyir//thams cad byang chub sems las ma gtogs pa//gzhan
28b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba ye nas med pa'i phyir//kun kyang byang chub semasu bstan pa'i phyir//rtse bo don gyi dgos phyed bstan pa yin//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ya ga don gyi dgos
28b7(rgyud): ched bstan pa ni//kun byed nga las byung ba'i sku gsum gyis//longs spyod sku dang chos sku'i bsten pa yi//tan tra la sogs yo ga sde rnams la//so so'i khyad par bye brag
29a1(rgyud): yod kyis kyang //rgyu 'bras 'das pa nga yi bstan pa ni//rdzogs chen u ti yo gA'i don 'di ni//zlog pa shan 'byed rdzogs pa'i lung zhes bshad//des na yau
29a2(rgyud): ga'i don gyi dgos pa ston pa yin zhes bya/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/dgos ched don gyi dogs pa bstan pa ni//bskal pa dpog tu med pa'i sngon rol nas//kun byed byang
29a3(rgyud): chub nga la dad pa yi//las dang skal ldan shin tu rnal 'byor pa//lta ba bsgom med dam tshig bsrung du med//phrin las btsal med lam la bgrod du med//sa la sbyang med
29a4(rgyud): rgyu dang 'bras bu med//dron dam dang ni kun rdzob rnam gnyis med//bsgom zhing bsgrub tu med par mthong ba dang //sems bskyed med cing gnyen po med mthong ba//kun byed sems
29a5(rgyud): kyi rang bzhin mthong ba yi//de lta bu yi dwagos ched bstan pa yi gsung so//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/tshigri go don gyi dgos pa bstan pa ni//kun byed byang chub
29a6(rgyud): sems du de bzhin nyid//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams bstan pa nI//kun byed de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin te/tshig dang yi gre skyu ru ma bsgrags na/gang zag yod kyi dbang po
29a7(rgyud): rig pa yis//de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin gang mi snang //des na tshig dang yi ge sgra ru bsgrags//des na tshig gi don gyi dgos par bshad//kye sems dpa' chen po//
29b1(rgyud): gang dang gang gi lho rgyus bshad pa ni//ston pa bstan pa 'khor gyi lo rgyus te//ston pa kun byed rang bzhin rnam gsum las/la gyi rang bzhin sku gsumya ston pa byung //
29b2(rgyud): gsum ston pa'i bro shad lugs rnam gsum ni//ston pa bstan pa gsum gyi lo rgyus yin//gang dang gang gi rtsa ba bshad pa ni//nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis//
29b3(rgyud): ji skad bstan pa'i chos rnams thams cad kun//rtsa ba byang chub semasu bstan pa'i phyir//ston pa dang ni bstan pa 'khor rnams kyi//rtsa ba don gyi gtan tshigs bstan pa
29b4(rgyud): yin//nga yi rang bzhin de bzhin nyid gcig la//rnal 'byor rnam bzhi yo ga'i bye brag ni//lta ba spyod pa dam tshig bsgrub pa dang //mi mthun khyod par so so'i bye brag de//
29b5(rgyud): shin tu rnal 'byor rtsol bsgrub 'das pas 'byed//des na yo ge'i don gyi gtan tshogs bstan//dgos ched dron gyi ngos tshig bstan pa ni//dgos ni khams gsum sa ni
29b6(rgyud): thams cad kun//rang sems de bzhin nyid de mthong 'gyur na//sangs rgyas tshig gi sa la mi gnas te//da lta nyid nas shin tu rnal 'byor thob//las med skal pa chung ba
29b7(rgyud): rnams la ni//ma gab mngon tu phyung yang mi rtogs te//gang zhig nor bu rin chen 'dod pa de//shing la byi dor byas pas mi 'gyur bzhin//las bzeng skal ldan shin tu
30a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor la//lta ba dam tshig phrin las sa lam dang //sems bskyed rgyu 'bras bsgom bsgrub gnyen po med//don dum kun+da rdzob rnam gnyis med
30a2(rgyud): mthong ba//des na sems kyi dro bzhin nyid mthong bas//de lta bu la dgos pa'i dgos ched yon zhes gsungs so//tshig gi don gyi dgos pa'i nges tshi ga ni//med pa'i don
30a3(rgyud): bcu med pa'i sgra dang tshig/tshig tu brjod pas bya med don mthong nas//bya mi dgos pa'i kun byed de thob pas//tshig gi don gyi dgos pa bstan pa yin zhes gsungaso//byang
30a4(rgyud): chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las sems kyi bshad lugs kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid kyi gsang ba
30a5(rgyud): dam pa'i gdams ngag 'od gsungs so//kye sems dpa' chen po//kun byed nga ni kun tu gsang ba'o//nga las byung ba'i sku gsum ston po la//nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum
30a6(rgyud): mi bstan gsang //nga la gnas pa'i dus gsum sangs rgyas la//nga yi rang bzhin mi bstan gsang bar bya//nga la 'dus pa'i 'khor tshigs thams cad la//nga yi rang bzhin
30a7(rgyud): mi bsnyen gsang bar bya//nga yis byas pa'i khams gsum sems can la//nga yi rang bzhin mi bstan gsang bar bya//nga yi rang bzhin ma gsang bstan byas nas//sku
30b1(rgyud): gsum stanu pa nga las 'byung mi 'gyur//sku gsum ston pa nga las ma byung na//bstan gsum theg gsum 'khor gsum tshogs mi 'gyur//bstan gsum theg gsum 'khor
30b2(rgyud): gsum mtshogs na//sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog gsum//bla med byang chub kun gyi rig pa med//nga las byung ba'i dus gsum sangs rgyas la//de yi rang bzhin
30b3(rgyud): mgasang bstan gyur nA//sku gsum ston gdum med pa'i skyon du 'gyur//de la 'dres pa 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la//nga yi rang bzhin ma gsang bstan 'gyur na//ston gsum
30b4(rgyud): ga pa khyad par phyed mi 'gyur//de yi saM byas pa'i khams glosum sems can la//nga yi rang bzhin thugs rjes bstan gyur na//ston pa gsum gyis bstun pa'i gsad med 'gyur
30b5(rgyud): ston pa gsum gyi sa bstan pa'i gnas med na//kun byed da yis byas pa'i chos rnams la//phun su ma tshogs bzhi su su zhig 'dogs//des na kun byed rgyul blo nga yis ni//
30b6(rgyud): de yi rang bzhin nga yis phyung nas ni//nga lang yi rung bzhin nga yis bstan//nga lus byung ba'i ston pa 'khor rnams la//bstan pa'i lung ni kun byed ngasna ma po gro/shin tu rnal 'byor
30b7(rgyud): kun byed nga yin pas//de la kun byed rang bzhin bstan par bya zhes gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las skal med la gsong ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//
31a1(rgyud): mama.as sam ma cas mtha/am thas#sa mam yam sa ma la ma mas yas #
31a2(rgyud): /de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid kyi lung chen po mngon tu phyung ba'i lung 'di bstan to//rje sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/kun byed rgya la
31a3(rgyud): nga yis ni//mngon du phyung ba gsum bstan te//de yi rang bzhin rnam gsum ngas bstan pa//do na rnams ston pa'i ston pa dang //don rigs 'dod pa'i 'khor rnams dang //mo nor nges//
31a4(rgyud): pa'i don dang gsum//kun byed nga yis mngon tu phyung //don ston mngon du phyung ba ni//chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs//sprul pa'i sku dang rnam pa gsum//'khor gyi dang po
31a5(rgyud): ston pa sku gsum ste//don ston pa yi ston pa de//gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang bzhin dang //de yi ngo bo ston pa dang //thugs rje'i rang bzhin don mdzad gsum//rang bzhin gsum
31a6(rgyud): las mngon du phyung //ston pa gsum yang mngon phyung ba'o//don rigs 'dod pa mngon phyung ba//ston pa gsum gyi 'khor gsum ste//de bstan pa yi bye brag ni//dus
31a7(rgyud): gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang //khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can kun//mi rtog mnyam nyid gnas pa de//kun byed nga yis mngon phyung 'khor//dbang po
31a8(rgyud): yul gyi rnam pa la//nyon mongs mi skye rnam mi rtog/rang gi byang chub sems nyid la//chos dang chos nyid rtog byed pa//dang po sa nas bcu par bsgribs//sa bcu byang
31b1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' dang //longs spyod 'dod yon rnam pa lngar//mthong ba'i ston 'khor rnam gnyis kyang //nga yi ngo bor mngon phyung yin//de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin la//rig pa yid
31b2(rgyud): kyi dbang ba des//brtags pas mthong ba'i shes pa des//lA las rtag pa nyid du mthong //la las stong pa chad par mthong //rgyu 'bras log par mthong ba yi//mu stegs rnam
31b3(rgyud): bAzhes byin rlabs nas//rgyu dang 'bras bu lung bstan pa'i//sdig spong sems dag rnam bzhi ni//bskal pa chen po gsum bar du//gnas pa'i 'khor dang ston pa yang //
31b4(rgyud): yis mngon du phyung ba smin//ye shes rig pa'i yul can la//yang dag nges par mngon du phyung //kye sems dpa' chen po//mngon du phyung ba zhes bya ba//gang gis gang mngon phyung
31b5(rgyud): bA ni//gang gis nga yis mngon du phyung //gang shig mngon du phyung ba ni//sems de nyid mngon du phyung //gang gi don du mngon phyung ni//yul lo so sor lta ba yi//'khor
31b6(rgyud): gyi don du mngon phyung yin//la li spong ba'i don du phyung //la li 'gegs pa'i don tu phyung //la la skyongs pa'i don tu phyung //la la dag byed don tu phyung //la lar blang dor don tu
31b7(rgyud): byung //l-i lang 'dag nyid don tu byung //la las spring ba'i yul du mdzong //le lo sa dgag pa'i tshul du mdzo//la las sbyangs pa'i yul du mthong //la las dag
32a1(rgyud): bya'i yul du mthong //la las blang dong yul du mthong //lwa las dbang sgyu'i yul du mthong //rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ston pa yi//'khor tshogs rnams
32a2(rgyud): kyis de ltar mthong //sems dpa' chen po//de yi rang bzhin mngon phyung ba//'di ni nges par lung ston cig/nga ni khyed kyi ngo bo ste//nga yi rang bzhin phyung ba ste//khyed kyi rang
32a3(rgyud): bzhin phyung ba yin//khyed kyi rang bzhin phyung ba des//rang gi rang bzhin shes par gyis//rang gi ngo bo shes par gyis//rgyu 'bras 'khor la lung ston cig ces gsung so///
32a4(rgyud): de nas sems dpa' rdo rje des rgyu 'bras kyi 'khor la 'di skad ces gsungs so//kye rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ston 'khor rnams//ston pa'i ston pa kun byed kyis//kun byas
32a5(rgyud): phun sum tshogs par byas//phun sum tshogs pa mngon phyung ba//rang gi rang bzhin mngon phyung bas//rang gi rang bzhin yin par rtogs//rang gi ngo bo yin par rtogs//
32a6(rgyud): de la gzhan yin ma rtogs par//rang nyid yin par kun gyis rtogs//rang nyid yin par ma rtogs te//yul der rang du ma rtogs par//yul de dgra dang tsher brtags nas//
32a7(rgyud): rang gi rang bzhin de spangs nas//bskal pa brgya phrag yun ring su//chos nyid rang gi sems mi mthong //rang sems chos nyid ma mthong na//bskal pa brgya drag yun rings
32b1(rgyud): su//rang gi byang chub de spod 'gyur//bya mAd bde chen de mi 'thob//yul de rang du ma rtogs byar//yul de rkyen gyis dgrar brtags nas//rang gi rlung bzhin de bkag na//bskal pa
32b2(rgyud): brgya phrag yun rIngs su//chos nyid rang gi sems mi mthong //rang sems chos nyid ma mthong na//bskal pa brgya phrag yun rings su//rang gi byang chub de 'gegs pas//bya
32b3(rgyud): medo bde chen de mi thog/yul de rang du ma rtogs par//yul de sbyangs pa'i yul mthong nas//rang gi rang bzhin sbyongs byed na//bskal pa chen po gsum bar du//chos nyid rang gi
32b4(rgyud): sems mi mthong //rang sems chos nyid ma mthong ste//rang sems sbyang med gdeng dang bral//yul de byang chub rong dag lnga//gzung 'dzin dri ma yod mthong nas//phyi nang rtog pa
32b5(rgyud): dag gsum gyis//khrus dang gtsang sgra dag byed pa//drug pa'i rang soms ma mthong ba//rang sems drag pa de dang bral//mi yi skye ba tshe bdun du//rang sems chos nyid de mi mthong ///
32b6(rgyud): blang dor med pa'i byang chub lnga//blang dang dor ba'i yul mthong nas//rang 'byung nyid la blang dor byas//rang gis rang la blang dor byas//bor ma chod kyis tshe gsum du//rang sems gnyis
32b7(rgyud): med de mi mthong //lhun gyis grub pa'i byang chub la//btsal zhing grub pa'i yul mthong nas//sems bskyed ting nge 'dzin rnam gsum gyis//thams cad dbang spyad bdag tu
33a1(rgyud): byed//rang gi byang chub btsal med la//bcol bas grub par 'dod pa'i phyir//bcu drug zla bas chos bsgrubs nas//stong dang brgya drug lo yos na/
33a2(rgyud): lugs longs sgra bzung nas ni//rang sems spyan grub bskyod rtog byed//rlung sems chos nyid mngon phyung 'di//rgyu dang 'bras bu rtog byed pa'i//tshul sgrub can la phan
33a3(rgyud): med kyang //las dang skal bar ldan bya yi//dgas ched don tu phyung ba yin zhes sems dpa' rdo rjes gsungs//de nas kun byeng rgyal pos nyid kyis lung bstan pa/
33a4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po/chos nyid mngon tu phyung ba rang sems yin//rgyu dang 'bras bu theg pa can rnams kyis//rang sems mngon tu phyung ba ma gtogs te//spong rlung
33a5(rgyud): 'gegs pas bskal pa yun rings gnas sbyongs shing bgrod la bskal ba gsum du gnas//dag byed khrus dang gtsang smras mi che bdun//byin rlobs blang dor can gyi myi
33a6(rgyud): tshe gsum//dbang smad bdag 'dod lo stong byur+m+ma drug tu//longs su chu lugs de yi rang sems rtog/rnam rtags dus ni mi grol ba chen thob//kyi sems dpa' chen po
33a7(rgyud): nyon cig/rgyu 'bras theg chen bzhin du ma yin gyis//kun byed nga yi lung 'di nges par zung //ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad dang //rang sems chos nyid
33b1(rgyud): ye nas gcig yin pas//rgyu 'bras lugs bzhin 'di la rtog ma byed//rang sems de bzhin nyid la rtog ma byed//rang sems de bzhin nyid la brtag bya ru//rang gi byang chub ngo ga
33b2(rgyud): de ltar snang ba yin//'di las mi rtogs so sos ming brtags pa//kun rdzob snang la don dam mi snang 'dogs//don dam kun rdzob gnyis med bden pa cig/bden pa yang dag depa
33b3(rgyud): par yod ma yin//yang dag 'degs pa nga yang 'khrul pa yin//bde ba 'dod pa chags pa'i nad yin pas//'dod pa med pas bde ba len par byed//sangs rgyas bsgrubs
33b4(rgyud): pas grub pa ma yin te//ma btsal rang bzhin gnas pas lhun gyis grub//ma btsal rang bzhin gnas la mi rtog zhog/sangs rgyas don gyi bla dgas maung 'di la//sangs rgyas yang
33b5(rgyud): dag yod par nga mi ston//gang zhig sangs rgyas yod par mthong ba ni//chos nyid dbyings las sangs rgyas mi rnyed de//sangs rgyas ma lta rang sems bya med rtogs//brtags na med
33b6(rgyud): de rang sems ye nas gsal//dngos su mi snang rang sems kun la khyab//yin pa'i ngo bo snang ba 'di yin te//'di min mnyam pa'i rgyu 'bras theg chen la//spong 'gegs
33b7(rgyud): sbyong ba byin rlabs sna tshogs kyis//rang sems chos nyid bya med de las gol//rang gam gzhag nas gzhan ma rgyang du tshol//bya med bde bor rtsol ba
34a1(rgyud): dang du len//chi chud pa yi nad tu dri las med//mA yengs ting 'dzin 'dzin pa'i rtod phur yin//da nas yin la yengs pa'i shor ba med//ma yengs ting 'dzin
34a2(rgyud): re ba'i sku mkhan des//rgyu 'bras theg chen drang po'i lung bstan yin//ye nas yin la yengs med shor med de//rtsol sgrub kun gyi gnyen po 'joms byed de//rgyu 'bras
34a3(rgyud): ston pa'i ston pa 'khor rnams la//kun byed nga yi lung 'di bstan gyur na//rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung zhes sgro skur 'debs//sangs rgyas 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor ting 'dzin
34a4(rgyud): can//ting 'dzin 'dod pa'i ma bcos rnal 'byor spangs//ma bcos rnal ma kun gyi chos nyid yin//chos nyid las ni sangs rgyas gud na med//sangs rgyas ming du brtags
34a5(rgyud): pA bla dgas yin//chos nyid bya ba gzhan med rang sems te//rang sems ma bcos chos kyi sku ru bshad//ma bcolnga pa la ye nas skye med pas//skye med don la bcwal
34a6(rgyud): zhing bsgrub tu med//btsal zhing bsgrubasra pas bya med 'grub mi 'gyur//kye snrums dpa' chen po nyon cig/chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs sku dong //sprul pa'i sku
34a7(rgyud): dang ston pa rnam pa gsum//theg gcig theg gnyis theg pa rnam gsum gyi//ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga yis byung //nga ni ston pa kun gyi 'byung gnas yi ni//nga yi
34b1(rgyud): rang bzhin rnam pa gsum las phyung //spros bral skye med dga' ba'i 'khor rnams la//de yi rang bzhin gzung 'dzin bral ba las//mi rtog mnyam pa nyid kyi chos sku byung //chos
34b2(rgyud): sku'i 'khor ni phye ba med pa ste//ma skyes mnyam po nyid kyi don bstan pa//de ni lhag ma med pa'i theg par bshad//de yi rang bzhin kun tu snang ba la//'dod pa dag pa'i 'khor
