34b3(rgyud): gyi tshogs rnams la//de yi ngo bo longs spyod rdzogs par phyung //ngo bo de la lta spyod rdzogs byed ston//de ni thun myong myen pa'i theg pa ste//nga yi rol pa'i ngo bo phyung ba yin//
34b4(rgyud): nga yi rang bzhin thugs rjer 'byung ba las//ji ltar 'dul bar sprul nas don mdzad pa'i//sprul pa'i sku dang 'khor tshogs rnam bzhi la//rgya 'bras 'tsham pa thugs rjes
34b5(rgyud): phyung ba yin//kye sems dpa' chen po//mdor na mngon du phyung ba'i lung zhes pa//nga yi rang bzhin 'di ltar bstan pa la//mngon du phyung ba'i lung zhes bstan pa yin//kun
34b6(rgyud): byed du yi rang bzhin gcig pu la//snang ba'i yul ni rnam pa gsum snang la//de las byung ba'i chos ni 'di lta ste//sangs rgyas sems can snang srid snod bcud kun//kun
34b7(rgyud): byed nga yi rang bzhin mngon phyung yin//'di las gzhan yin pa ru rtog byed pa//kun byed nga dang phrad pa'i skal med pas//'khor gyi dang po ston pa sku gsum gyi//rim pas
35a1(rgyud): sbyangs pa'i rgyu 'bras theg 'khor yin//kye sems dpa' chen po//nga yis mngon tu phyung ba 'di/gzhan ma mngon tu phyung ba med//de nyid mngon tu phyung
35a2(rgyud): ba yin//chos nyid mngon tu phyung ba yin//rang sems mngon du phyung ba yin//ma nor mngon tu phyung ba yin//nges pa mngon tu phyung ba yin//de bzhin mngon tu phyung ba yin//
35a3(rgyud): kye sems dpa' chen po//nga yi rang bzhin mngon tu phyung ba 'dis//che ba lnga yi sangs rgyas mngon tu phyung ba yin//che ba lnga yi sangs rgyas 'di lta ste//nga yi do bo mngon
35a4(rgyud): tu phyung ba ni//snang srid snod bcud nga yi chos nyid 'di//kun la smad bas mngon par phyung ba yin//bya mi dgos pas ye nas sangs rgyas yin//rtsol grub med pas yaM nas
35a5(rgyud): che bar bshad mngon par sangs rgyas zhesu bshad pa yin//nga yi rang sems mngon tu phyung ba 'di//snying por gyur pas kun gyi bdag nyid yin//bya mi dgos pas ye
35a6(rgyud): nas sangs rgyas yin/rtsol sgrub med pas ye nas che bar bshad//bdag nyid chen po sangs rgyas che bar bshad//ma skyes spros bral mngon tu phyung ba 'di//ye nas
35a7(rgyud): gzung 'dzin bral bas chos kyi dbyings//bya mi dgos pas ye nas sangs rgyas yin//rtsol sgrub mi dgos ye nas tsho bar bshad//chos dbyings sangs rgyas che ba yin
35b1(rgyud): par bshad//nga yis nges par mngon du phyung ba 'di//dpa' don rtags ni rnam pa gsum bsten te//chos nyid don la namakha'i dpe stan te//byang chub sems kyi rtags kyi ngas
35b2(rgyud): brgya// tsam za ba rnams la mngon po ni//dpe don rtags kyis de yin spangs rgyas badzin//nga yi rang bzhin ma nor nyid 'di ni//su lo man du phyung yang mi snang bas//de ni
35b3(rgyud): mnor pa yi rang bzhin la//bzhin ni bcos pa med pa'i rang bzhin te//nyid ni ngo bo nyid la btags pa yin//de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin de nyid la//dus gsum sangs rgyas yod
35b4(rgyud): pa'i sgrol mi 'degs/khams gsum sems can med pa'i skur mi 'debs//rtog dpyod bsam pa cir yang dgongs med pas//sangs rgyas med pa'i che bar nga yis bshad//
35b5(rgyud): ces gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las rang bzhin rnam pa gsum mngon du phyung ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o///de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed
35b6(rgyud): rgyal po des sems dpa' rdo rje la gdam ngag phyog pa 'di gsung so//kye sems dpa' rdo rje chen po 'di nyon cig/de ni ye nas kun byed rgyal po yin//ston pa bstan pa 'khor
35b7(rgyud): dus ngas byas nas//ston pa'i bstan pa yang ni nga yi byad//bstan pa nga yi rang bzhin de ston la//'khor yang nga yi ngo bo de phyung nas//dus gnas nga yi rang bzhin de ru ni//
36a1(rgyud): kun byed nga yi rang bzhin bstun pa las//dra mun chos ni gcig kyang bstan pa med//sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod nyid kyang //kun byed nga yi rang bzhin
36a2(rgyud): bstan pa'i phyir//khyod kyang dri las nga yi phyung ba yin//kun byed pa ni ye nas byas zin gyis//nga gdod bya dgos kun la lung ma ston//de gdod bya dgos 'khor la lung
36a3(rgyud): bstan na//'khor rnams rtsol ba'i nad kyis zin par 'gyur//rang 'byung ye shes med pa'i skyon du 'gyur//byang chub sems la 'chos pa'i skyon du 'gyur//de bzhin nyid
36a4(rgyud): la 'chos pa'i skyon du 'gyur//skyon gyis yon tan khyad du gsod par 'gyur//brdzun gyis bden pa bslus pas bslad pas na//min pa'i rtsol bas bya med yin ma sgrub/
36a5(rgyud): sems dpa' khyod kyis kun byed nga rig gis//nga yis byas pa'i chos rnams thams cad kun//ye nas rang 'byung ye shes de bzhin nyid//ston gsum nga yi rang 'byung ye
36a6(rgyud): shes yin//bstan pa gsum yang nga yi de bzhin nyid//'khor rnams kun kyang sems dpa' rdo rje'i tshul//dus gnas phun sum tshegs pa thams cad kun//kun byed
36a7(rgyud): rgyal po nga yin byang chub sems zhes gsungaso//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las sems dpa' rdo rje la gdams ngag phog pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o///
36b1(rgyud): de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des nyid kyi sku gdung 'di zung shig par gsungaso//kye sems dpa' chen po 'di zung zhig/sku gdung ring spel rtag 'chang na//rgyal ba'i yang
36b2(rgyud): mes kun byed nga dang mnyam/zhes gsung so//de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes zhus pa/kye dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi yang mas poston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po labs//
36b3(rgyud): sku gdung ring srel rtag tu zung zhig pa//sku ni rgyal ba gang dang gang gi rmi gdung ni sangs rgyas gang dang gang gi gdung //ring bsrel zhes ni ji lta bu la bgyi zhes bus so//kye sems
36b4(rgyud): dpa' chen po nyon cig/sku ni nga sras rgyal ba gsum gyi sku//gdung ni dus gsum rgyal ba nga yi sems//dus med rtag tu sems dpa' 'di 'chang na//dus gsum sangs rgyas
36b5(rgyud): rnams kyi mchod pa'i rten//sku gdung ring bsrel zhes ni de la bya//kyai ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags//sku gdung ring bsrel de ltar lags na yang //de la dus
36b6(rgyud): gsum sangs rgyas ji ltar mchod//mchod pa la ni yon tan tso zhig mchis zhes zhus so//kye sems dpa' chen po khyod nyon cig/nga yi sku gdung ring bsrel de la ni//dus
36b7(rgyud): gsum sangs rgyas rtag tu sems ltas mchod//de yi yon tan mi 'bral de thob nas//chos rnams kun byed rgyal po nus par 'gyur zhes gsungaso//byang chub kyi sems
37a1(rgyud): /kun byed rgyal po lhas sku gdung gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pargya//de nas byang chub kyi snrums kun byed rgyal po desna chos thams cad rgya
37a2(rgyud): chos nyid nga nyid yin pa'i lung 'di gsung so//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/snang srid snod bcud thams cad kun//snang ni nga yi ngo bo snang //dag ni chos nyid dbyingasu dag
37a3(rgyud): 'dul ba rnam pa sna tshogs ston//sku gsum sna tshogs byung nas ni//theg pa gsum ni ngo yang ston//rgyu 'bras can ni des tshim byed//'das pa yul la mi ltos pas/
37a4(rgyud): rgyal mi sgrub 'bras mi 'dod//'dod pa med pa'i dgongs pa dang //rang bzhin lhun gyis grub par 'gyur//ye nas yin la bya mi dgos//don rnams ji bzhin bskyod med pas//
37a5(rgyud): ji bzhin pa la bsgrub mi dgos//chos kun rang bzhin lhun grub phyir//dus gsum sangs rgyas grub pas kyang //rtsol zhing sgrub pa'i lung mi 'bogs//bcol na gang btsal
37a6(rgyud): ting 'dzin des//mi grub ting 'dzin nad du che//kye sems dpa'o chen po//da min ston pa thams cad kyis//bya ba'i phrin las sna tshogs dang //bsam pa'i ting b+ha dzin rim
37a7(rgyud): pa dang //phro ba'i 'od zer sna tshogs dang //lta ba'i yul ni ci dmigs kyang //ji bzhin pa la g.yos pa med//bya ba'i las kyis grub pa med//bsam pa'i ting 'dzin yal
37b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur//bro ba'i 'od zer zhi 'gyur na//de lta yul gang yang mthong ba med//des na bcol ba'i las ma byed//kye sems dpa' chen po//yul las btsal bas grub pa'i lung de ni//rgyu dang /
37b2(rgyud): 'bras bu'i theg can ston par byed//rgyu dang 'bras bu'i theg can chos nyid ni//chos dang chos nyid rnam pa gnyis phye nas//chos kyis chos nyid tshol ba rnyed lung med ces gsungaso//byang chub
37b3(rgyud): kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las btsal bas mi 'grub pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des btsal bas grub pa'i le'u 'di gsungs//
37b4(rgyud): kyi sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis//bstan pa'i theg pa rnam gsum bstan pa na//ston pa gsum gyis mi stsol lung ma bstan//kun byed pa
37b5(rgyud): yis theg gcig bstan pa ni//btsal bas grub pa'i lung du ngas ma bstan//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/kun byed byang chub nga yi rang bzhin las//ma btsal rang bzhin lhun
37b6(rgyud): gyis grub pa ni//rgyal ba kun gyi snying po sku gsum te//da yis rang bzhin ma bcos chos skur grub//nga yi ngo bo ma bcos longs spyod rdzogs//nga yi thugs rje mngon phyung sprul
37b7(rgyud): sku gsum//btsal nas grub pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa med ces gsungaso//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/sku gsum kun byed nga ro 'dus pa ste//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams
38a1(rgyud): dmAsmra sa kun//dang canan ba zugs sa p+ta bac+doMs gsam//sgyu gsu pa da yid bzhin nyid du bstan//da dang nga yi bzhin nyid las ni//sangs rgyas
38a2(rgyud): zhes bya'i yon tan sgros kyang med//sems can zhes bya'i skyon gyi rnam pa med//mi rtog mnyam pa nyid du de bzhin gi nas//'di las mya gtogs pa ni gzhan med pas//sangs
38a3(rgyud): rgyas rnams kyis 'di las lhag pa yi//kun byed nga la nges lung mnos pa med//byed mkhan kun byed rgyal po nga yis kyang //mi rtog mnyam nyid de bzhin nyid 'di las//
38a4(rgyud): nyid la nyid kyisku bstan pa rdul tsam med ces gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byong rgyal po las ma bcol lhun gyis grub pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//
38a5(rgyud): dedonas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi byung khungs nyid las byung ba 'di gsungs//kye chos kun sdud pa'i rdo rje nyon//kun byed rgyal po byang chub
38a6(rgyud): sems//de ni chos kun sta bon yin//nga ni chos kun rgyu yang yin//nga ni chos kun sdong po ste//nga ni chos kyi gzhi ma yin//de ni chos kyi rtse ba yin//ji ltar snang ba'i chos
38a7(rgyud): rnams sun//'dus pa'i phyir na snying por bshad//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams ca ni//skye ba'i phyir nas bon yin//rdo ltar snang ba'i chos rnams sun//'byung ba'i phyin
38b1(rgyud): rgyu yang yin//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kyi//yan lag 'byung bas sdong po yin//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun//nga la gnas pas gzhi ma yin//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun//
38b2(rgyud): ngo yin pas na rtsa bar bshad//kye sems dpa' chen po rdo rje nyon cig/kun byed byang chub sems dA ni//rang bzhin ma bcos rnam gsum las//ming tsam sku gsum byung tshul bstan//nges
38b3(rgyud): par sku gsum ston pa yang //de bzhin nyid las g.yos pa med//kun byeng byang chub sems nga ni//ma skyes gzung 'dzin bral ba las//chos sku skye med ming tsam byung //nges par chos
38b4(rgyud): sku ming tsam ste//de bzhin nyid las g.yos pa med//kun byed byang chub sems nga yi//ngo bo ming tsam mngon phyung ba//longs spyod rdzogs sku ming tsam tshul//nges par longs spyod
38b5(rgyud): rdzogs sku de//de bzhin nyid las g.yos pa med//kun byed byang chub sems nga yi//thugs rje sprul sku mngon phyung ba//thugs rje ma bcos rang bzhin las//ming tsam sprul/
38b6(rgyud): sku tshul phyung ba//nges par sprul pa'i sku de yang //dri bzhin nyid las g.yos pa med//de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin las//sku gsum g.yos pa med pa bzhin//sku gsum/
38b7(rgyud): bstan pa'i chos rnams dang //sku gsum 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams dang //chos rnams kun la'ang g.yos pa med//ma g.yos pa yi chos nyid la//rgyu dang 'bras bur/
39a1(rgyud): btags byas nas//rtsol dang bsgrub pa byas nas ni//rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung 'dod pa//kun byed pa las byas pa yi//rgyu 'bras 'das
39a2(rgyud): las gol ba yin zhes gsungs so//kye sems dpa' tshun khyod nyon cig/nga lngas byung ba'i sku gsum ston pa dang //nga las byung po'i dus gsum sangs rgyas dang //
39a3(rgyud): dalas byung ba'i 'khor gnas dus la sngogs//kun kyang de'i byang chub sems yin no//sems dpa'i' rdo rje de la rtog myi rtog/sems dpa' rdo rje de la ma rtog shig/
39a4(rgyud): nganI ye nas kun byed byang chub sems//nga yis byas pa kun kyang byang chub sems//nga yi rang bzhin ye nas rnam dge byed//nga yis kun la khyab pa ye nus chub//nga yis rang
39a5(rgyud): bzhin gsal ba yi nas sems//nga ni na mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin gyis//ye nas yin pa'i byang chub sems kyis ni//'jig rten rgyu mar snang ba'i chos bzhin du//sku
39a6(rgyud): gsum ston pa dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams//bu dang tsha bo 'khor gyi tshul byung nas//ma nor bden pa'i gdam dgra 'byogs pa bzhin//byang chub sems ni na mkha' bzhin
39a7(rgyud): bstan nas//kun byed byang tshul na mkha' bzhin du bstan ces gsungs//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po'i mdo las chos thams cad byang chub sems kun byed las
39b1(rgyud): byu ba'o khungs kyi lhoru m+b+ha nyi shu pa'o///de nas byung chubats+tsha sems kun byed rgyal pa das rgyas thams cad khungs kyi rgyal po yon par nga pas byu
39b2(rgyud): tshig 'di gsung so//kyai sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod nyon cig/nga ni chos rnams kun byeng rgyal po ste//sku gsum ston po'i pha mo nga yin la//duso gsum sangs rgyab ku
39b3(rgyud): gyi mem pa yin//la ts+tshe gnas dus kyi ston pa'i snron ma byed//kun byed de y-i rang bzhin rnam gsum las//sku gsum ston pa nga las byung bsna ni//skye bsum
39b4(rgyud): sugapa rnam gsum gyis//ci dusag rnam po gsum yid bstan//de yang kun pa dang yis brtan pa yin//kun byed rgyal po skyes ba ni 'ong//
39b5(rgyud): kun las khyad par 'phags pa'i phyir//gtan tshigs dron gyi bshad lugs rnam pa lngas//ma nor nges pa'i gtan chags khungs bstan to//kye sems dpa' chenapo
39b6(rgyud): kun byeng rgyal po byang chub sems//byang chub sems ni ye nas rdzogs pa che//rdzogs pa chen po rgyu 'bras 'das//rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i bshad lugs bstan pa dang /
39b7(rgyud): kun byed byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin los//sku gsum ston pa byed ba'i bshad lugs dang /rnam pa gnyis kyi bshing lugs bstan pa'o//kun byed byang chub sem/
40a1(rgyud): kyi bshad lugs ni//byang chub sems ni rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i phyir//gtan tshigs don gyi bshad lugs lnga yis bshad//sku gsum ston pa
40a2(rgyud): gsum gyi bshad lugs ni//phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa lnga nang du//chos kyi sku ni byin gyis brlabs kyis bshad//longs spyod rdzogs pa rang gi ngo bo ston//sprul pa'i
40a3(rgyud): su ni don rnams tshig tu sdeb//sku gsum ston pa'i bshad lugs rnam gsum ste//rwa yi rang bzhin rnam gsum bshad lugs yin//kun byed de ni rgyu 'brus 'das
40a4(rgyud): ba ste//rgyu 'bras 'das pas spyod yul kun las 'das//kun las 'das pa'i chos nyid byang chub sems//byang chub sems ni kun gyi snying po yin//snying po yin
40a5(rgyud): bas yid chos khungs kyang bston//byang chub sems ni chos kun rtsa ba ste//rtsa ba yin pas thams cad don yang 'dus//byang chub sems ni khyad par kun las 'pha/
40a6(rgyud): khyad par 'phags pas theg pa'i sha nau yang 'byed//byang chub sems rtogs chos 'di kun sangs rgyas//des na skal ldan dogos ched bstan pa yin//sems kyi rang
40a7(rgyud): bzhin tshig tu brjod med ste//ma brjod sems kyi rang bzhin ma snang bas//mi snang mtshan du med ces ma brjod na//kun kyang rang sems mi mthong stsal sgrub byed/
40b1(rgyud): ngos na brjod med tshig gi don yang bshad//des na gtan tshigs don gyi bshad lugs lngas//kun byeng rgyal po byang chub sems kyi don//ma nor nges par gtan la 'bebs par
40b2(rgyud): byed//rgyu 'bras med par gtan la phab pa yinA//thams cad byang chub sems yin yid kyang ches//byang chub sems yin ye nas yid ches pas//sems la bcal ba med par
40b3(rgyud): yid kyang chos//btsal du yi nas med par yid ches pas//mi rtsol badre ba chen po dang la gnas//kun byed du yi rang bzhin de ltar gnas//kun byed nga las sangs rgyas gzhan
40b4(rgyud): med do zhes gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las gtan tshigs bshad lugs kyi le'u ste/nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems
40b5(rgyud): kun byed rgyal po des sems rnal du gzhag pa'i phyir/bya med rdzogs pa'i lung khungs chen po 'di gsungaso//kye sems dpa' rdo rje khyod nyon cig/kye bya med yul ni mi gnas nam
40b6(rgyud): mkha' 'dra//mi gnas dmigs pa'i yul med mi rtog chos kyi lam//bsngo ba'i cha shas phra mo'i yul la byung ba ste//rtog sgom chos kyi sku ni khyad par don med pas//rang 'byung
40b7(rgyud): ye shes mi rtog kun tu ji bzhin gnas//bya bral yul la mi gnas gnyen pos bcos su med//yan lag chos kyi dbang gis snying po'i yul tshol zhing //rnam pa cir yang mi
41a1(rgyud): rtog thabs kyis de la rol//snying po rang bzhin 'byung bas chos sku gzhan na med//rdul phran gcig la gtses shing phyogs bcu kun dang bralnga//mi gnas don
41a2(rgyud): nyid legs pa'i ye shes rang 'byung ste//mngon gsum kun la mi rtog yangs pa'i snying po la//rnam dag lam dar zhugs nas mnyam pa'i rgyal po thob//mi 'gyur 'gyur ba/
41a3(rgyud): med pas chags pa'i gnas med do//de bzhin bzung ba'i yul med sems kyi gnas kyang med//mngon gsum thob par 'dod nas rgyu la rtag tu sgom//sgom tshogs bde ba
41a4(rgyud): de la mnyam pa'i don mi 'byung //sku gcig kun la khyab pas basman pa'i chos med de/mtha' la thug pa med pas dbyings la bri ba med//chos kyi rol bas nyams phag lhag pa'i
41a5(rgyud): gnas med de//rang 'byung che ba'i yul la kun tu ji bzhin gnas//ngo mtshar mthong ba'i yul med de la mthong ba'i mig/gang la thos par mi rigs snyad pa kun dang bral//chos dang
41a6(rgyud): chos min rtag tu 'dres shing mtshungs//don dam chos shes lhag pa'i gnas shes bshad pa'ang med//'khrul dang byang chub lam de rtog pas thob pa 'ang med/rang 'byung ye shes nyid
41a7(rgyud): kyang tshig gi mtha' dang bral//ye nas rgyas pa'i bdag nyid mngon gsum gnas pa la//gib ma gzugs kyi dpe bzhin de la rtog pa 'byung //med de med pa ma yin med pa'i snying
41b1(rgyud): po 'byung //stong de stong pa ma yin stong pa'i yul la gnas//na mkha'i rang bzhin de la 'byung ba'i dran pa skye//ba bral zin pa'i bde ba 'dod pa med pas len//bza' ba'i yul med de la
41b2(rgyud): ye shes 'byung ba rtsom//sngon gyi drang srong rje su chags pa'i yid kyang 'jog/rnam rtsol 'bad pa'i gdung ngos kun tu zin ta re//rang bzhin lam der zhugs pas thams cad mkhyen pa yi//
41b3(rgyud): ji bzhin pa zhes rnam rtog de phyir rtog bsgom pa//bde ba chen po 'dod pa'i chags pa'i nad yin te//mi g.yo mnyam par gnas pas sman chen ma byas na//mtho ris bgrod pa'i rgyu dus nyon mongs
41b4(rgyud): zin par 'gyur//lam med lam du zhugs pa rnams kyi nad che ba//phyin par 'dod pas ri dgas smig rgyu snyegs pa 'dra//snyed pa'i yul meng 'jig rten gsum du mi 'byung zhing //sa
41b5(rgyud): bcur ltos pa'i gnas kyang byang chub sgrib pa yin//shin tu myur ba'i ye shes bsam pa kun dang bral//gshes gnyen kun las 'byung ba'i nor bu rin tshon bzhin//dmigs pa med cing
41b6(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i gnas la mi ltos par//rang gi rang bzhin legs par re ba tha mad skong //brtags na med la bzhag na legs par 'byung ba che//dngos su mi snang chags pa'i cha lugs
41b7(rgyud): kun la ston//bdag dang gzhan du bral ba'i ston mkhan rin chen mdzod//thams cad grub pa'i yul zhes bdag med snying rjes bstan//nang nas ma g.yos nang du btsal ba'i
42a1(rgyud): gnas myed de//yul phyir chags la yul la bsngo ba'i dmigs pa med/mi 'byung mi 'jug bdag med snying rje de yis nI//gzhan gyi nor min mi 'ong ye nus
42a2(rgyud): gnas pa yin//bde ba 'dod na bde la rgyab kyis phyogs//bde bas zin te bde bas bde ba tshe la//byang chub 'khrul pa yi rngam chos la za//'di lta'i yul can sangs rgyas mthong ba
42a3(rgyud): med//sangs rgyas med pa sangs rgyas ming yang med//sangs rgyas ston pas ming du brtags pa nor//sangs rgyas gzhan nas thob byad nor pa'i lam//gzugs med chos kun
42a4(rgyud): bshad pa rdul tsam med//zin dang chags dang bral dang ni//dngos po med dang rnam par spong //bdud rtsi chen po'i rang bzhin la//bza' ba'i thabs la rag pa med//yangs so che'i rgyo//
42a5(rgyud): chen po//chung ngu rnams kyi gnyen po yin//tshe la dmigs pa'i cha bsnyams nas//chung chad rnams dmigs dang bral//gsung dang rgyas dang dmigs dang snang //rgyu mkhan ri mo'i
42a6(rgyud): rnam pa bzhin//'byung 'jug ye shes rmugs pa yis//de yi dbang las skye bar 'gyur//'di ni theg pa kun gyi rgyal//btang ngo bzhag go rang bzhin te//'dod pa med cing len pa
42a7(rgyud): med//brod pa rdul tsam mi bskyed do//khyud chen na mkha' lding ba bzhin//spro ba med cing bsdu ba med//sbyor bar mi dogs bza' ba med//rgya mtsho bzhin du ye gnas la//chos
42b1(rgyud): rnams ste rtogs 'byung bar byed//yon tan namakha'i mtha' dang mnyam//basmra bya'i gnas des pA med//byang chub snying por de ma thag//ting 'dzin rgyal po chen po 'byung //snang ba rgya
42b2(rgyud): chen po bzhin//mi rtogs no mkha'i mthu'i ltar yangs//kun tu bzang po'i spyod yul l-I//skye zhing 'pho bo'i chos med de//rgyu rkyen yan lag bcu gnyis po//skur pas brtags pas
42b3(rgyud): bshad pa yin//'khrul pa rnams kyi sgo tsam du//mkhas pas de bzhin shes par gyis//'gro brgyud drug snang ba yang //dang po'i lam du shes par bya//'dod spyod snying rdzas
42b4(rgyud): brlan pas na//gang du dga' bar byang chub spyod//shAn pa smad 'tshong mtshams med lnga//kha na ma tho 'jig rten spong //yongasu rdzogs pa chos kyi rtsis//bde ba che las gzhan
42b5(rgyud): med do//yang chos thams cad do bas na//chos kyi rang bzhin de bzhin pas//chos kyis rgyas nyid byanal ba dang //nA mkha' na mkhas btsal ba dang //gzhan la ltas pa'i
42b6(rgyud): chos nyid ni//me yis me bsod pa 'dra ste/shin tu dka' ba'i las byed pa'o//rnam par mi rtog snying po 'di//yongs kyi rgyud la sbas pa med//mi len byang chub spyod rnams pa/
42b7(rgyud): rnam kyi tu ra gnas shes gsu so//phyi me rdzogs pa'i lung bcu mos mi gnas yul med kyi ma m+bi nyi shu rtsa gnyis la///de nas byang chub kyis pas sun da
43a1(rgyud): rgyal po des//lta ba yul med kyi lung 'di gsung so//kye sems dpa' chen po nyen cig/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams ni//rang gi byang chub sems yin
43a2(rgyud): pas//de la blta ba'i yul ma mchis//mi rtog pas na mnyam pa nyid//de bzhin na mkha'i dgongs pa ste//rnal 'byor zhes ni de la bya//dbang po lnga lo snang ba rnams//rang
43a3(rgyud): gsal de la mi rtog pas//de yang na mkha'i dgongs pa gnas//rnal 'byor de bzhin nyid du gnas//tshig dang yi ge don brtags pas//tshig yig don la brtag med
43a4(rgyud): pas//rtog med mnyam pa de bzhin nyid//de yang na mkha'i dgongs pa gnas//bsam du med pa'i don 'di ni//na mkha' bzhin du ye gan so zhes gsungaso//bya med rdzogs
43a5(rgyud): pa las lta ba yul med kyi na mkha'i dgongs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste rtsa gsum pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des/bya med rdzogs pa'i
43a6(rgyud): lung phyag rgya bzhugs tshul kyi le'u 'di bstan to//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/sems nyid kun tu bzang po yi//bzhugs tshul bstan pa 'di lta ste//byang chub
43a7(rgyud): sems su bzhugs tsam na//chos rnams kun gyi snying por bzhugs//de rtogs kun byed rgyal po yin//kun byed rgyal po 'gyur ba med//des na 'gyur ba med par
43b1(rgyud): swAn//rgyas kyi.A r+yA zhugs tsaman+ta//bzung 'dzin sgra dang bral nas banugs//gzung 'dzin bral la 'gyur ba med//longs spyod rdzogs srung bzhugs bam na//'dod du spyan
43b2(rgyud): lnga ldan pas//'dod pa phun sum tshogs par bzhugs//sprul pa'i rgyu ru bzhugs tsam na//gang gis 'dul ba'i dus tsam ni//gang po gang dgos sku sprul nas//dgos pa
43b3(rgyud): phun sum tshogs par bzhugs//dus gsum 'gyur ba med para'i bzhugs//chos kun phyag rgya na mkha'i mtshan nyid do//nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid//sku gsum mtshan
43b4(rgyud): nyid de bzhin gnas thams cad de bzhin nyid du gnas//ji ltar snang ba'i chos kun ni//ji bzhin pa la bcos su med//btsal zhing sgrub pa thams cad kyis//snga pa bgrod pas
43b5(rgyud): phyin pa cig kyang med//snga pa byas pas zin pa cag kyang med//sgyu bas shing btsal bas snga pa grub pa med//thams cad ji bzhin pa la 'gyur ba med ces gsungaso//byang chub kyi
43b6(rgyud): sems kun byed rgyal po lnga byam rdzogs pa phyag rgya 'gyur med kyi lung gi le'u ste rtsa bzhi pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des khams gsum
43b7(rgyud): gyi sems can la rang gi sems ston pa yin par bstan pa 'di gsung so//kye khams gsum sems can thams cad kun//rang gi byang chub sems de ni//sngon pa yid
44a1(rgyud): par mngon byastan na//skal pa brgya phrag stong du ni//rang sems ston par ma mthong bas//kun byed rgyal po nga yis ni//rang sems ston pa mngon
44a2(rgyud): phyung bas//rang sems ston pa'i chos nyon cig/kun byed rgyal po nga yis ni//kun rgyu byang chub sems las ni//sems kyi ngo bo 'byung chen lnga//ston pa byang chub sems lnga
44a3(rgyud): byung //sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku//chos ni rang gi ngo bos 'chad//ston ni rang go rang bzhin ston//ston pa longs spyod rdzogs sku de//dgongs pa nyid la nyid mi rtog/
44a4(rgyud): yul chos gzhan la 'ong rtog mi byed//byang chub sems kyi ston pa lngas//kun kyang chos nyid de bzhin ston//byang chub sems kyi ye shes des//ston pas yi skur byung nas
44a5(rgyud): tshig dang yi ges mi ston te// gi rang bzhin ston byed pa//bdag tu mi rtog gzhan mi rtog/mi rtog mnyam pa'i dgongs pa ston//khams gsum sems can thams cad
44a6(rgyud): kyis//de rtogs sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam//rtsol ba'i chos nyid mA bcoMl 'grub//byang chub sems kyi ye shes des//ston pa chu yi srur byung nas//tshig dang yi ges
44a7(rgyud): mi ston te//rang gi ngo bos ston byed pa//bdag tu mi rtog gzhan mi rtog/mi rtog monyam pa'i dgongs pa ston//khams gsum sems can thams cad kyis//de
44b1(rgyud): sgyogs sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam//rtsol ba'i chos ni ma bcul 'grung //byang chub sems kyi ye shes des//ston pa me yi srung byung nas//che bya dang yi gsam ston do//rang
44b2(rgyud): gyi ngo bos chos ston pa//bdag tu mi rtog gzhan mi rtog/mi rtog mnyam pa'i dgongs pa ston//khams gsum sems can+da thams cad kyis//de rtogs sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam//
44b3(rgyud): rtsol ba'i chos nyid ma btsal grub//byang chub sems kyi ye shes des//ston pa rlung gi skur byung nas//tshig dang yi ges mi ston par//rang gi ngo bos chos ston pa//bdag gzhan
44b4(rgyud): gnyis mi rtog par//mi rtog mnyam pa'i dgengs pa'i ston//khams gsum sems can thams cad kyis//de rtogs sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam//rtsol ba'i chos ni
44b5(rgyud): ma bcol grub//byang chub sems kyi ye shes des//ston pa na mkha'i skur byung nas//tshig dang yi ges mi ston to///rang gi ngo bos chos ston pa//bdag gzhan gnyis mi
44b6(rgyud): rtog par//mi 'byed pa yi dgongs pa ston//khams gsum sems can thams cad kyis//sngon phyung ston pa de rnams kyis//rlung gi ngo bos chos 'chung pa//'di yis kun kyang
44b7(rgyud): rig par gyis//kye khams gsum sems can thams cad kun//kun byed rgyal po nga yis ni//khyed rnams nga yis byas pa'i phyir//nga yi sras yin pa dang mnyam//nga dang mi
45a1(rgyud): gnyis nga yin phyir//nga yis khyed la mngon phyung ba//nga yi ngo bo ston pa lngas//rang bzhin rnam lha gcig tu bstan//gcig ni kun byed de yin gyis//
45a2(rgyud): de bzhin khyed kyang yid ches kyis//kye khams gsum sems can mo lus kun//nga med tsam ni khyed kyang med//khyed med tsam gyi dus tsam na//ston pa lnga yang 'byung mi 'gyur
45a3(rgyud): mi rtog chos kyang ston mi 'gyur zhes gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las rang sems ston par phyung ba'i le'u ste rtse lnga pa'o////de nas
45a4(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos sems las byung ba'i chos chen po la ston par byung ji rtag su ma skyes pa byang chub sems ston par zhal gyis bzhes pa 'di gsung so//kye sems dpa' chen po
45a5(rgyud): nyon cig/bsam 'das brjod du med pa'i byang chub sems//ston pa'i sgron mar gyur pas+ya yon tan rab sngags pa//chos kyi snying por gyur pas 'jam dpal gzhon nu nyid//
45a6(rgyud): bya bral lhun rdzogs bde ba'i lhun la gnos//tshul khrims la sogs spyod pa rgya mtsho'i gzhor gyur pa'i//ji snyed rnam par grol ba'i lam bstan pa//bde gshegs
45a7(rgyud): yum 'gyur kun gyi mtshung lam de//de med mo 'byung de phyir de ni rnam grol mchog gi lam//phra zhing shes dka' kun gyi lam ste mi rtog rtog las 'das//mi gnas/
45b1(rgyud): mi dmigs spros med bsam pa kun dang bral//chag gis mra phebs dbyibs dang kha drag spyod yul med//bstan cing brtags par dka' la brjod du rdul tsam med//sngon gyi drang
45b2(rgyud): srong lam du gang zhugs pa//bsgom chags lam gyi nad kyis zin taro//bston pa'i lung bzhin tshig gi mtha' spyod lAm du de mthong na//de ni rtog pa'i rgyun 'brangs smig rgyu snyegs
45b3(rgyud): pa 'dra//yang dag lam ni tshig gis mtshon du med//yang dag nyid du bstan pa nga yis 'brul//drag dang ma dag gnyis med 'dres shing mtshungs//rnam pa cir yid mi 'byed
45b4(rgyud): ye shes gti mug dang //thogs med gsal ba'i mar me bsam pa kun dang bral//ngang gis mi g.yo rmugs shing ting 'dzin rgyal por gnas//mngon sum mthong bas
45b5(rgyud): mthong med mngon sum mthong ba'i mig/de phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan zhes de la bya//mtha' dang dbus med yangs pa'i snying po la//mi len mi 'dod mnyam pa'i rgyal
45b6(rgyud): por gnas//sems dang bag chags gnyis mid 'dres shing mtshungs//'dzin pas rtags shing snang ba'i chos rnams ni//rang gi rgyan du snang bas mi 'dod spong mi byed//cir yong
45b7(rgyud): mi dgongs thabs kyis de la rol//kun dang mi mthun yongs kyis spong ba'i chos//nyon mongs lnga dang mtshams med lnga po yi//rnam dag lam der zhugs ngas mnyam
46a1(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po thob//bud med la sogs kun kyang spyod mi byed//long rgyas don gnyis tshad ma'i blor bzhag nas//ting 'dzin gsum pau brtan nas byu
46a2(rgyud): pa'i mtha' spyod pa//rtsod bral lung las gol zhes 'khrul pa yin//bye bral lhun rdzogs bde ba'i lhun la gnas//ye shes rang 'byung che ba'i snying po nyid//mi gso mi
46a3(rgyud): 'gyur bsnyad pa kun dang bral//zin pa'i bdud rtsis rtsa lnga ba'i sdug bsngal 'jims//bya bral zin po'i yul la ji bzhin gnas//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/
46a4(rgyud): chos rnams thams cad thig le chen po'i rang bzhin yin pas na//spros pa med cing bsdus pa med//skye ba med cing 'gag pa med//'grog pa med par de bzhin gnas//
46a5(rgyud): rnam par mi rtog snying po 'di//na mkha' bzhin du ye gnas pas//rtog pa'i sgra bsam yul las 'das zhes gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las
46a6(rgyud): bye med rdzogs pa sgom du med pa'i le'u ste rtsa drug pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po ngas nyid kyi bdag ngag phog pa dang /'thun pa'i lung
46a7(rgyud): chen po rim gyis bstan te/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/chos rnams thams cad nga las byung ba na//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun//ye nas
46b1(rgyud): rnam dag dbyings kyi lung du bstan//phyi dang nang kun ye nas chos kyi dbyings//ye nas rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul la//sangs rgyas dang ni sems can granyisu med//lam dang gnyen
46b2(rgyud): pos bcos su bral yod//bsgru bI med rtsal skyabs smon pa med pos na//bya med lhun rdzogs snga ma de nyid dan//rtog spyod rnam dag gnyis med chos dbyings la//log rtog byis
46b3(rgyud): pa'i spyod pas ci zhig bslus//gnyis med bde tshon sems can kun spyod la//'khrul pasnga nor pa'i lam du bstan pa yang //gong du bstan pa'i lam tshon de la mi gnyis pas//
46b4(rgyud): mnyam par shes pas sangs rgyas kun gyi rje//nga dang bdag tu rtog pa mu rtogs 'khrul pa'i lam//byis pas bslus pas chos spyod rtog pa'i lam la btsud pa ni//phyin pa'i
46b5(rgyud): dus med rtogs pa'i dus med pos//chos nyid chos tshol rnyed par ga la 'gyur//tshad mar ma gyur slob dpon smre 'dra'i lung //bston dang lam nor rtog pas zin ta re//de bas
46b6(rgyud): gser la nag chung gtong ba yi//slob drapon yang dag ston pa'i rin chen mchod//ring thang dpag tu med pas bslu bar 'os shes gsungaso//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po
46b7(rgyud): las bya med rdzogs pa rnam dag dbyings kyi lung bstan pa'i le'u ste rtsa bdun pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid kyi rang bzhin 'gyur med 'di
47a1(rgyud): gsung so//kye sems dpa' chen po nyan cig/nga yi rang bzhin dbyings la 'gyur ba med//nga yi ye shes na mkha' 'gyur ba med//nga yi chos nyid
47a2(rgyud): bzhin 'gyur ba med//nga sems chos kyi snying po 'gyur ba med//de bzhin thams cad 'gyur ba med pa la//nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis//rgyu dang 'bras bur
47a3(rgyud): chos la ming brtags nas//sprul pas lung bstan dbang po yul spong 'gyur//rang rkyen chos lnga 'chang ba'i sems can la//rang 'byung chos nyid yin par lung ma bstan//
47a4(rgyud): ngan 'gro sdig sgrib che zhes lu nga bstan nas//lus ngag yid gsum sdig spong dge bcu spyod//rang 'byung chos la blang dor spyad pa'i phyir//rang 'byung ye shes bskul
47a5(rgyud): mangs phred mi 'gyur//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/sprul pa rang les 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs lnga//rang 'byung ye shes lnga yi chos spangs la//ye shes
47a6(rgyud): lnga spong dgra lnga tshoms lung bstan//dgra lnga rang 'byung ye shes ma rtogs te//rang sems spong 'gyur nga yis lung ma bstan//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/rab
47a7(rgyud): gi sems las byung ba'i chos nyid la//don dam kun rdzob bden pa rnam gnyis kyis//sbyangs nas rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung zer nas//bskal pa gsum gyi bar du sbyong
47b1(rgyud): byed pa//ldom dad pa rol phyin bcus rang mi 'gyur//sems nyid 'gyur bar du yis lung ma bstan//kye sems dpa' chen po nyan cig/rang sems chos nyid ting 'dzin byin brlangs
47b2(rgyud): nas//dag pas chu zla bzhin du gsal byas nas//rder ltas de la mnyes pa'i mchad phul bas//de lar 'dod grub pa thob ra ba//chu zla med de rang sems ma rtogs pos//skye ba
47b3(rgyud): bdun gyi bar du rang 'byung gi/ye shes yod ces nga yis lung ma bstan//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/rang sems byin brlabs cho 'phrul bsgoms pa yI//ting 'dzin ye
47b4(rgyud): shes sems dpa' grogs mnyam des//bdag 'dod pa yi dngos grub ster re ba//rang 'byung chos nyid de la 'dod len med//rang sems bye med ma che gsum mi phrad//kun byed
47b5(rgyud): nga yis lung bstan ma yin na/kyai sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/rang las byung ba'i chos nyid ltar byas nas//phyag rgya bzhi dang snying po 'phro 'du yis//mi 'gyur ba yi chos
47b6(rgyud): nyid rgyur sgrub byed//sems kyi tod 'dzin dbang gis thob sems pa//des kyang thob par dra yis lung ma bstan//kye sems dpa' chen po nyin cig/gzhi myi dbyings la 'byu
47b7(rgyud): ba mod pa'i phyir//dbyings de 'gyur ba nga yis lung ma bstan//dbyings la dbang sgyur byed pa'i sku gsum gyis//rang 'khor zhig nas tshol ba'i ting 'dzin bstan//des na
48a1(rgyud): 'dron pa'i lung du bstan pa yin//de bzhin na mkha' 'gyur ba med pa de/rang nyid na mkhas na mkha' 'grub mi 'gyur//de bzhin chos nyid 'gyur ba
48a2(rgyud): med pa de//rang nyid chos kyis chos nyid 'grub mi 'gyur//de bzhin sems nyid 'gyur ba med pa de//sems nyid rang gis sems nyid 'grub mi 'gyur//mi 'gyur sbyar bar byed
48a3(rgyud): pa'i ting 'dzin ni//dus dang sman lam ra ba 'jog pa yi//dus la ltos pas ting 'dzin che ched 'gyur//kun byed nga yis nges lung bstan pa med ces gsungaso//byang chub kyi sems
48a4(rgyud): kun byed rgyal po las bya med rdzogs pa 'gyur med btsal mi rnyed pa'i le'u ste rtsa brgyad pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des sems rnal du
48a5(rgyud): bzhag pa 'di gsung so//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/nga ni kun byed byang chub sems//chos rnams thams cad nga yin te//nga yi rang bzhin thams cad ni//ye nas rnal du
48a6(rgyud): bzhag pa yin//nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa ni//rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya//ston pa bstan pa 'khor gnas dus//rnam lnga rang bzhin rnal du bzhags/snyan pa'i rang bzhin 'di
48a7(rgyud): ltar bzhag/chos sku ma bcos rnal du bzhag/rang ba'i rang bzhin de bzhag yin//longs spyod ma bcos ngo bo bzhag/nga yi rang bzhin gzhag pa yin//sprul pa ma bcos
48b1(rgyud): thugs rje bzhag/nga yi rang bzhin gzhag pa ste//rang 'byung ye shes bzhag pa yin//gnas ni gang na gnas pa'i gnas//de yang rnal du bzhag pa yin//dus ni snga phyi gang
48b2(rgyud): chags dus//rnal bzhag dus su tshogs pa yin//kye sems dpa' chen po de nyon cig/phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa lnga//mA bcos rnal du bzhag pa las//chos zhes bya ba
48b3(rgyud): gzhan yod med//kye sems dpa' chen po/phun sum tshogs par ma lus pa'i//chos ni gcig kyang yod ma gsungs//kyang ni rnal du bzhag pa yis//thams cad chos nyid
48b4(rgyud): grol ba yin//ston pa ma bcas chos nyid grol ba yin//bstan pa ma bcos chos nyid grolnga ba yin//'khor yang ma bcos chos nyid grol ba yin//kye thams cad grol bar
48b5(rgyud): bshad pas na//rang lus ma bcos lha ma sgom//slu ba'i tshig dang ngagra ma 'chos//ting 'dzin ma byed sems ma 'chos//bcos pas rnal du 'byor med pas//rnal du ma 'byor
48b6(rgyud): grol mi 'gyur//ma grol chos nyid mnyam mi thob//kye sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste/byang chub sems kyi kun byed rgyal po ni//ye nas 'das pa'i rnal du bzhag pa la//
48b7(rgyud): lta ba rnams kyis rnal du 'jog mi shos//rdzogs chen kun byed ye nas rnal bzhag la//nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyis thos mthong na//dug skye zer nas rang sems spong
49a1(rgyud): 'gegs 'gyur//des kyang lta ba rnal du 'jog ma shes//bskalnga pa grangs med 'jog mi shes la gnas//theg men mdo sdes
49a2(rgyud): rdzogs chen thos 'gyur na//rang sems de bzhin nyid du ma rtogs te//ji bzhin nyid du 'jog pa ma shes te//bgrod cing skyong lnga bskal pa gsum du gnas/
49a3(rgyud): rjesu rnal 'byor sems dpas thos 'gyur na//'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams de bzhin la//rang sems de bzhin nyid du ma rtogs pad+mo//ji bzhin rnal du 'jog pa ma shes
49a4(rgyud): pas//byang chub yan lag cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyis//byin rlobs sems la mi cho bdun par gnas//rnal 'byor chen po rnams kyis thos 'gyur na//rgyu dang 'bras bu'i
49a5(rgyud): bdag nyid yin pas na//ye nas yin la gdod rtsol sgrub par byed//stong phrag gnyis dang brgya phrag drug tu ni//ji bzhin rnal du 'jog pa mi shes te//ting 'dzin
49a6(rgyud): gsum gyi sa la gnas par byed//yongasu rnal 'byor rnams kyis thos 'gyur na//ye nas yin la rgyu 'bras mying brtags nas//ji bzhin rnal du 'jog pa ma shes
49a7(rgyud): te//rgyun dag pa chos kyi dbyingasu grub//'bras bu dog pa ye shes dkyil 'khor grub//bar mchod kyis mi tshe gcig tu gnas//shin tu rnal 'byor rnams kyi/
49b1(rgyud): zos 'gyur na//yo nas sangs rgyus sa la gnas par 'gyur//byA med badra ba chen po di yis thob//bsgrub pa med par ye nas spangs rgyas thob//lha mo sems can dbang po ma
49b2(rgyud): 'thun te//la la dbang po sbyangs po'i 'phro can yod//lA la dbang po yi nas tshig chod yod//des na dgos ched don zhes bstan pa yin//a ti yig rdzogs pa chen po zhes bya ba/
49b3(rgyud): A two zhes ni sgra yi tshig N+DI bstan//A ni ma skyes chos nyid rnal du bzhag/tI nI ma btsal lhun gyis grub par bstan//yo gI shin tu rnal 'byung rdzogs rkyen la//rgyu dang 'bras bu
49b4(rgyud): yod zer sgra byed pa//de ni rdzogs chen rtogs po'i don mi ldan//don dam kun rdzob gnyi su smra byed na//sgro dang skur pa 'debs pa'i tshig yin te//de yos gnyi su med pa rtogs pa
49b5(rgyud): med//dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtogs pa yang //gnyi su ma mthong rnal bzhag nyid du 'dod ces gsungaso//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyalnga po las dgongs pa rnal du
49b6(rgyud): bzhag pa'i le'u ste rtsa dgu pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po dus nyid kyi snying po sems dpa' rdo rje la sems dpa'i rdo rje nyid kyi rang bzhin bya med rdzo klas
49b7(rgyud): pa'i lung mi nub pa'i rgya'i mtshan 'di gsungaso//kye sems dpa' rdo rje khyed nyin cig/sems dpa' rdo rje khyod nyid la//nyid kyi rang bzhin bstan por bya//nyid ni kun byed nga yin
50a1(rgyud): tI//dA na ye nas byang chub sems//byang chub sems ni 'di lta'o//des na byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgya lnga po des mi nub par rgyu lnga mtshan nam
50a2(rgyud): mkha' tshe 'di gsungs//rdo rje sems dpa' na mkha' te//kun+da bzang yangs pa chos kyi dbyings//rnam dag lam chen kun sgrol phyir//mi skye mi 'gago cing mi dragengs//
50a3(rgyud): byams pas don nyid rnam sbyangs phyir//snying rje chen po tsar mi mdzad//che bas che ba'i zab mo yis//yon tan cir yang bsngags pa med//don rnams ji bzhin mi
50a4(rgyud): bskyod de//bya ba med pas gro pa bos grol//nges 'byung ye shes btsal med pas//grol na grol ba'i lam yang ston//'byung ba chen po bcom ldan 'das//grol
50a5(rgyud): pa kun la rang bzhin gnas//phyin ci log tu rnam brtags kyang //grol ba rang 'byung gzhan las min//che ba'i ye shes rnyed dka' ba//shes rab thabs la rten
50a6(rgyud): pas 'grub//ming tsam gzhan la rten 'dra yang //mngon sum bde ba rang lngas 'byung //cho 'phrul chen po dka' ba min//yon tan kun dang stobs kyi rnams//
50a7(rgyud): shin rtog pa phra ba yis//de ma thag tu rang las 'byung //snang ba med pa'i chos nyid ni//ma bco la bzhag pas bsgoms pa yin//de dang der ni rnam
50b1(rgyud): bcol na//de las de bzhin de ma 'byung //mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid ni//rna dbang gzhan las thos mi 'gyur//dro bzhin lho'i dbang pos kyang //de la brjed du rdul rnam med//
50b2(rgyud): 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal byang chub sems//kun tu chub pas rnam par grol//de la bskyod pa med bzhin du//nA mkhwa'i mkha' ltar mnyam par gnas//khyad pa ri tsi re yang
50b3(rgyud): mtshungs pa la//las so zhes ni rnam par brtags//ci ste las kyi dbang 'gyur na//rang 'byung ye shes yod ma yin//rgyu nyid rdo rje rkyen dang 'dra//ma skyes pos na 'jig pa med//
50b4(rgyud): gdon nas snying po byang chub la//bcilta ba'i bsam pas dbyings mi bskyod//yon tan chen po'i bsam gtan ni//byas ma gtan nyid pas bsam du myed//ma bsam ma sbyangs
50b5(rgyud): chos bzhin du//rlom rtog nyid las ye shes skyes//phra bo'i sgo mor ming brtags te//sems kyi dben pa lam tshol zhing //dgon pa'i rgyud du dben 'dran cing //brtagaso na
50b6(rgyud): rnam par rtog 'gyur bsgom//rgyu dang 'bras bu ri ming brtags te//dge sdig gnyis ka rnam par sel//'jig rten 'di la 'byung ngo zhes//blang dong brod pa mchog tu bskyed
50b7(rgyud): chags dang ma tshogs tshig gi lam//dbu ma bzhin te brag cha 'dra//bde dang sdug bsngal rgyu 'thun zhes//'gro ba'i mgon po sems pa sa gsungs//'dod chags
51a1(rgyud): /k+She snang guN+DI myug pA//rgyu chub chen po'i lam+b+ha las byu //sman spyod yon tan rnam lnga yang //nis ny+Ni kyis kyi rgyun gyis klu smras//rnamA
51a2(rgyud): rtog pa skye med cing //rtog pa de nyid na mkha' 'dri//mi chags na mkha'i bsdu ba las//rlung don tshun po na mkha' 'byung //rtog medo mnyam nyid chos kyi sku//gzung bas mi zin
51a3(rgyud): chu zla 'dra//kun tu bzang po'i rol pa yis//A yi kA li zab tu bstan//'di ni a dang 'dzes pa'i ta//ba dang yan lag spros pa bzhin//'jig rten yongs kyi spyod yul la//
51a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas gsung gi zab mo 'byung //e mra'o sangs rgyas spyod yul 'di//btsal bas rnyed pa'i gnas med de//drug gi chos bzhin yul med pas//mdongs pas
51a5(rgyud): na mkha' brlabs pa bzhin//gong nas gong du tshangs pa'i lam//bya bral chos dang mthun pa min//ci ste lam la bgrod 'gyur na//nam mkha'i mtha' bzhin thob pa med//
51a6(rgyud): de ltar de bzhin de yi phyir//de la de bstan da yang thob//de ni snying po de bas na//de las de 'byung ngo mtshar che//sngon gyi de dang dra ltar dri//de bzhin de yi gan su che//de ltar
51a7(rgyud): de yi lam 'dra ba//de ni de yi rang bzhin no//de dang 'dra ba yongs kyi lam//zla ba las byung rten dang bcas//kun gyi mnyam nyid yin pa la//phyogasu bltas pas grub pa
51b1(rgyud): //rgyur 'dod sa ro//na ma d+ma ts+tsha s+yA hrA / yang rnam pa skyon yon pa sa//do na sa ts+tsha// nag s+ho smra spyod//smra
51b2(rgyud): med gdid nas 'byung //chos mus khyab pas gcig dri'i phyir//tshe nga'i chen po rang bzhin gnas//srid pa gsum na sbyor ba yang //ming tsam myu myur snang ba ste//'khor los skye
51b3(rgyud): ba'i gnas chen yang //sgyu ma sbyong ba'i bsti gnas yin//rnam spyod dus la ltos pa rnams//dus de 'byung bar mi 'gyur te//ma bral smon pa spyod pas na//stong pa'i mtshan nyid
51b4(rgyud): gsungs pa bzhin//cig ste rnam pa yongs kyi med//rnal 'byin ma khi byA la me gnas//me byung ma skyes snying po la//zlos btigs chos kun ga la yod//phyi nang gnyis
51b5(rgyud): ka nyid nang //zab mo cha shas rtogs yul med//srid bri ming ma log pa'i stongs//dbus ting 'dzin mnyam dang bral//de la hrI tshigs byi dang nang //rang bzhin phung po kham
51b6(rgyud): bzhin gnas//dus gsum 'di dang mi 'bral bas//tha tshigs ming du btags pa med//mi g.yo ba ni sku yi n+ya//mi dru skyod pas ni ye shes te//mi len pa ni bradag med
51b7(rgyud): cing /mi 'dor tshig bal mnyam nyid do//gang dang gang gi gang du yang //kun 'khol kun spyod bdag las byung //'di lo skyes pa bud med ces//mnyam pa'i rgyal pos
52a1(rgyud): yong ma gsungs//'dri la btul zhugs drag shul gyis//gan su bya ba'i ming med de//a dang parad+ma ni rnam ldan na//sgyu ma'i bde ba 'byung bar
52a2(rgyud): 'dod//rang bzhin gcig tu ma nges pas//ji ltar bltas pa de ltar snang //snang 'dod rtsol sems bde ba yang //de ni de sgrib skyon chen yin//byang chub yan lag
52a3(rgyud): kun gyi sgo//cha lugs bsgoms pas chu zla bzhin//ma gos mtshags 'byung 'gyur yang //bsgoms pas byis pa'i spyod yul bzhin//dkyil 'khor khro gnyer
52a4(rgyud): cha lugs kyis//khro bdag chen po'i lus bzung nas//yi ge mngon du byung na yang //zhi ba de nyid mthong ba mi no//nyon mongs pa yi dbang gis na//ta la'i mgo
52a5(rgyud): bo bcad pa dang //sa pon ma yis bsregs pa dang //de yi dbang du mi 'gyur ston//rnam grangs brgya stong phrag yas pa//gang ltar spyad kyang me tog skye//mtshan ma med
52a6(rgyud): pa'i dbang gis ni//bsti gnas de las 'byung mi 'gyur//gleng bral 'dri la gnas pa ni//rnal 'byor de ni skal pa bzang //bdag drang gzhan don mi 'byed pas//rgya ma lhun
52a7(rgyud): brub yul la rel//lhag ma med pas yongasu rdzogs//'gyur ba ma yin drang por gnas//na mkha' bzhin te mtha' mnyam zhing //gzhan la ltos 'gyur tsha sem
52b1(rgyud): yo//rgyu sa sgyu ba nga na// sa pa da pa m-i ga sa//du ga ga pa //man ga snun na/ klu k+ShA
52b2(rgyud): dka'//mngan sum ma branas kun tu khyab//ming tsam 'di zhes bstan par ni//rdo rje sems dpas mtshon du med//ngo mtshar rmad byu rol pa 'di//bya bral na mkhar bzhin du
52b3(rgyud): gnas//ci rA yang mi dmigs gti mug las//dri ma thag tu rAng las byung //'di ni thams cad mtshungs pa'i lama?//'gro ba kun gyi rang bzhin gnas//bus pas bslad pas
52b4(rgyud): 'khrul pa'i phyir//sman nyid sman pa tshol ba bzhin//go ba'i yul ni bde ba che//'di ni rnam dag 'jig rten yin//de la phyogs kyi 'od 'dus pas//phyogs bzhi mtshams
52b5(rgyud): dang blo 'og 'grub//mi nges 'ja' tshon kha dog las//rigs kyi khyad par mngon par snang //de bzhin g.yo rdul mi g.yo ba//'byung ba lnga pas gtso tshon yin//'das
52b6(rgyud): dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi//tha snyad ming la mi gnas te//skye 'gag med par rnam brtags shing //de nyid dus gsum chen por sbyor//mnyam pas rim par bkod pa med//
52b7(rgyud): gcig pas phyogs bcu bsnga dang bral//tshogs kyi rgyan rnams bkram pa yang //rang bzhin gnas pas 'brim pa med//skyon gyis gnas pas mi bsngo zhing //gdong
53a1(rgyud): nas dag pas bdud rtsi yin//'du mched bcu gnyis khyad par du//lhag pa'i bsam pas bzung ba med//yid kyis bsam pas yon gdag ste//bltas dra//
53a2(rgyud): tshogs ni bkram pa'o//mthong bar gyur pas dngos grub la//de nyid mnyam bzhag rdzogs pa'o//yud tsam bzung bas sbyor ba yin//dga' bar gyur pas dam tshig ste//dzangs
53a3(rgyud): kyis gang thabs bskyod pa yis//gnyis med sbyor ba phul ba yin//mi bzung gtong bsA gtor ma yin//bya ba med po'i las rnams te//mi rtog ye shes bgegs bsngal
53a4(rgyud): nas//mya gsung mnyam gzhag sngags tshig go//bla ma mchod dang gtong ba dang //de bzhin bsod nams thams cad kyang //mchags mi ga mo'i stobs med na/byas na 'ching
53a5(rgyud): ba chen por 'gyur//dri bas de lung dri nyid la//de la de sbyar sgrib par 'gyur//de ltar de la de rtog na//de la de nyid grub pa med ces gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po
53a6(rgyud): las rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin mi nub pa'i rgyun mtshon gyi le'u ste sum cu pa'o///dri nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des kun byed kyi rang bzhin bya mod
53a7(rgyud): rdzogs pa lhun gyis grub pa 'di gsungs//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/sna tshogs rang bzhin mi gnyis kyang //cha shas nyid du spyos dang bral//ji bzhin pa zhes mi
53b1(rgyud): rtog kyang //rnam par sna mdzad kun tu bzang //zin pas rtsol ba'i nad sbyangs te//mun gyis gnas ngas bzhag pa yin zhes gsung so//byang chub kyi snyoms kun byed rgyal rtsa
53b2(rgyud): sa rdo rje tshig drug gi le'u b+h+rU~M sum cu gcig bya'o//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des sems dpa' rdo rje la mo byas don grub kyi lung ngos pa tshig
53b3(rgyud): bzhi'i le'u 'dri ga skyeng so//kye sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar don rig gis/ji ltar snang ba de bzhin nyid du gcig 'di la su yad ches d+maR+Sha m-i byed cig/ma bac+doMs mnyam pa'i
53b4(rgyud): rgyal po de la ni//mi rtog chos sku'i dgongs pa de la gnas shes gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las nges pa tshig bzhi'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o//
53b5(rgyud): de nas byang chudab kyi sems kun byed rgyal po de nyid las byung ba'i chos nyid de nyid kyi rig pa'i ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje zhes bya ba/chos thams cad rig byar byed pa'i rgyal po
53b6(rgyud): rang byung gi ye shes de lnga nyid kyi rang bzhin rtogs par dka' ba 'dri bstan to//kye sems dpa' chen po yid kyi dbang pos sgra rtogs shig/rtswa yis don de rtogs rigs byos/
53b7(rgyud): kun gyi gan+da ni chos kyi dbyings yin na//dbyings kyi smra ba ra im rig par byed//kun gyi lhang yul na mkha'i khams 'di la//na mkha'i sgra don ji ltar rig par byed//mngon du
54a1(rgyud): gsal ba 'byung ba lnga yin na//mngon du snang ba'i don ni ji ltar rig/de las byung bal khams gsum sems can ni//de yi don ni ji ltar rig par byed//
54a2(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal pos nyid phyir nga lnga nyon zhes gsung so//kyi ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags//khyod kyi rang bzhin shin tu rtogs dka' ba//rnam bzhi bstan pa'i
54a3(rgyud): sgra yis bdag gis rtogs//dbyings kyi sgra yis 'byed pa med par rtogs//na mkha'i sgra yis mA bsgribs gsal bar rtogs//'byung ba'i sgra yis kun gyi snying por rtogs
54a4(rgyud): sems can sems kyis sgra don de rig byed//de rig kun byed shin tu rtogs dka' rig/kun byed nyid las gzhan zhes bstan pa med ces gsung so//de nas kun byed rgya
54a5(rgyud): pos rig pa'i rgyal pos slar gsungs pa//nga yi rang bzhi ni rtogs dka' 'di rig na//chos kyi mdo rtswa yan lagu kun rig gis//rig pa'i rgyal po zhes mtshan yang btags
54a6(rgyud): kye byed pa'i rgyal po kun byed byang chub sems//khyod kyi rang bzhin 'di lta chos nyid 'di//sems dang ye shes chos nyid rig pa ste//de yi rang bzhin bdag gis 'di ltar mthong //
54a7(rgyud): sems nyid spros bral sgra ni chos nyid sgra//sems nyid ma bsgrings sgra ni na mkha'i khams//sems nyid ngo bo snying po 'byung ba'i sgra//rig pa so sor rtog pa sems can sems//
54b1(rgyud): sems kyi rang bzhin las ni gzhan med de//kun byed rgyal po sems las gzhan med de ces gsungaso//kye sems dpa' chen po//nga yi rang bzhin de ri gla na//kun byed nga yi rang
54b2(rgyud): bzhin rig pa yin//nga rig gcig rig kun rig thams cad rig/sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod la ni//rig pa'i rgyal po zhes su ming btag so//kye rlig pa'i rgyal pos de
54b3(rgyud): ltar rig gyur na//dA las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis//bstan pa'i theg pa rnam pa gsum byung nas//rgyu las 'bras bu 'dod pa gsum gyis ni//bya ba'i las ni
54b4(rgyud): lta spyod sna tshogs kyis//'bras bu gsum ni gang dang gang sgrub pa//rig pa'i rgyal pos chos de ji ltar rig ces gsungaso//rig pa'i rgyal pos slar gsungs pa/kye
54b5(rgyud): kun byed rgyal po khyod las byung ba yi//sku gsum ston pa khyed kyi ngo bo gsum//de gsum bstan pa rnam gsum khyod kyi ldem dgongs te//rig pa so so'i sems la
54b6(rgyud): ldem dgongs bstan//de dag gang la dgongs nas ldem pa ston//mi 'phro zhi gnas tshol la dgongs pa'i phyir//rang re gang 'thad yul lnga ldem du gzhug/sku gsum
54b7(rgyud): ston pa drang lung ston pa des//la las sa dang lam gyi 'bras bu bstan//la las dngos med chu zla'i 'bras bu bstan//la las nyid kyis nyid bsgrub 'bras du bstan/
55a1(rgyud): sku gsum bstan pa ldem dgongs lung bstan te//nges par ma bstan drang ba'i lung bstan+na tI//mi 'phro zhi gnas dz+wal ba'i ting 'dzin yin//rgyu 'bras
55a2(rgyud): theg chen drang ba'i lung du bstan zhes gsung so//kye rig pa'i rgyal po sems dpa' rdo rje nyon//don dam nges pa'i lung zhes bstan pa ni//rig pa'i rgyal pos rig
55a3(rgyud): bstan du med//mi gnas dmigs par bya ba'i yul ma yin//mi rtog rtog las 'das pa'i rang bzhin la//ting 'dzin mi bsgom bsam pa'i yul dang bral//'dod pa'i
55a4(rgyud): sems med blang ba'i 'bras bu med//mi rtog ji bzhin pa ru gnas pa des//lam la ma bgrod sangs rgyas sA ru phyin//rig pa ma sbyangs rang 'byung ye shes rnyed//phrin
55a5(rgyud): las ma btsal rang bzhin lhun gyis grub//dam tshig mi sdom rang bzhin rnam par dag/yul dang dbang po de bzhin nyid du gsal//sangs rgyas sems can gnyi su ma
55a6(rgyud): mthong ste//de bzhin nyid du thams cad gcig par mthong //de bzhin nyid la gcig drang du ma med//ma byung ma skyes pa yi snying po la//spros kyis btags pa'i tha snyad ga la
55a7(rgyud): yod//kye sems dpa' chen po rig pa'i rgyal//sangs rgyas sems can snang srid snod bcud kun//kun byed nga yi rang bzhin smos skur bral//nga yi rang bzhin de bzhin
55b1(rgyud): gats+tshagal//sdug du ma ston pas so sor bstan pa yang //de bzhin nyid la drang ba'i lung bstan yin zhes gas so//byang chub kyi sems kun b+h+yo N+ya lta pA las smra pa'i lung /
55b2(rgyud): de drang ba'i lung bstun po'i lcel ste sum rgyug sum pa mo///de nas byu chu kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des sa sargyas thams cad kyi dgengs pa nyid la
55b3(rgyud): ngas pa'i mede 'di gsung so//kye rtogs pa'i rgyal po skye nyon cig/kun byed rgyal bya nga yis ni//dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//dgongs pa'i don ni d+ha la 'dus
55b4(rgyud): nga yi rang bzhin 'di la ni//sku 'dus gsung 'dus dgongs pa 'dus//de yi sgro nyon dgongs 'dus kyis ces gsung so//kyo ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags//chos kyi sku dang
55b5(rgyud): longs spyod rdzogs//kun+da bzang rdo rje sems dpa' dang //rnam gzigs gtsug tor la sogs te//rab bdun shAkya thub pa dang //stong rtsa gnyis kyi sangs rgyas dang /
55b6(rgyud): lhun gyis grub dang rdul skyed kyi//dgongs pa khyod la 'dus legs sam zhes zhus so//de nas kun byed rgyal pos yin pa'i sgra brjod pa//kye rtogs pa'i rgyal po dri nyon
55b7(rgyud): ga/tote yin pa'i sgra brjod do//dpe dang don dang rtog gsum gyis//dgongongs po 'dus pa'i don ston po//nga yi rang bzhin na mkha'i 'dra//de yi na ni chos nyid yin//
56a1(rgyud): yau dro bo byang chub sems//kyo du ni ma bsgribs rtogs pa med//rtog med na mkha' chos kyi sku// ni mI rtog blang dor med//brang dor med de na mkhar
56a2(rgyud): 'dra//na mkha' blang dor med pa bzhi no//kun tu bzang la brang dor med//blang dor med pa nga las 'dus//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/kye nga ni ma skyes na mkha' 'dra//ma
56a3(rgyud): skyes pa yi na mkha' bzhin//rdo rje sems la skye ba med//skye med dgongs pa de la 'dus//rnam gzigs rabs bdun shAkya thub//stong rtsa gnyis dang rdul snyed dang //
56a4(rgyud): lhun grub sangs rgyas thams cad kyang //dgongs pa na mkha'i rang bzhin te//skye med mi rtog blang dor med//dpe yis dA la 'dus par bstan//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon
56a5(rgyud): gong bshad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//dgongs pa don gyis 'dus pa ni//kun byed rgyal po'i rang bzhin ni//spro ba med par bstan pa bzhin//sangs rgyas kun
56a6(rgyud): la skye med pas//skye med chos nyid 'dus par bstan//kun byed rgyal po'i rang bzhin la//chos nyid 'gag pa med pa bzhin//gong bshad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
56a7(rgyud): chos nyid la ni 'gog pa med//des ni chos nyid 'dus par bstan//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/rtags kyis 'dus par bstan pa ni//rtogs ni kun rtags byang/
56b1(rgyud): chub sems//kun byed rgyal po sems kyis ni//chos kyi sku dang kun tu bzang //rdo rje sems la sogs pa yi//dus gsum sangs rgyus ma lus pa'i//snying po rtags ni sems/
56b2(rgyud): 'dus//des na depe don gsum du 'dus//kye kun byed rgyal po nga la ni//spyi 'dus sgo 'dus dgongs pa 'dus//spyi 'dus dpe don rtogs 'dus la//sgro 'dul rnam pa lnga 'dus
56b3(rgyud): te//chos sku dgongs pa 'dus pa ni//mi rtog mnyam pa nyid 'dul la//mi g.yo cho 'phrul 'byin par nus//longs spyod sku yi dgongs 'dus pa//mngon sum rang bzhin snang ba dang //
56b4(rgyud): 'dod pa tshogs pas 'byin par 'dus//kun bzang dgongs pa 'dus pa ni//ji ltar snang ba thams cad kun//bzang ngan blang dor med pa ru//kun byed mngon du phyung ba 'dus /rdo rje sems
56b5(rgyud): dgongs 'dus pa ni//mi skye mi 'gag dgongs pa 'dus//rabs bdun shAkya thub pa dang //stong rtsa gnyis dang rdul snyed dang //sku gsung thugs kyis dron mdzad pa'i//byung yang sku
56b6(rgyud): gsung thugs las byung //sku gsung thugs kyi chos nyid la//sku gsung thugs kyis don mdzad tshul//de yang kun byed nyid du 'dus//chos kyi dbyings kyi pho drang ni//nga ru me 'dus
56b7(rgyud): gcig kyang med//nam mkha'i khams kyi gzhal yas na//nga ru ma 'dus gcig kyang med ces gsungs pas der sems dpa' rdo rje sngangs te rgyal lo//der brgya la sangs nas zhus pa/
57a1(rgyud): kye 'dus pa'i rgyal po de nyon cig/byas pa'i chos dang kun 'dus na//ma byas pa yang kun 'dus sam//ma byung ba yang kun 'dus sam//chos kyi dbyings
57a2(rgyud): dang na mkha'i khams//mu stegs phyin ci log lta ba//rtog chad gnyi su lta ba yang //khyod kyi ma nor dgongs yin na//sangs rgyas sems can ci la gdugs//mu stegs
57a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas ci la rgya cher gsung so//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyal po des bka' stsal pa//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/nga yi
57a4(rgyud): rang bzhin rtogs 'gyur na//kun kyang 'dus par yid ches na//sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis ni//da yI rang bzhin rtogs mi 'dra//rtogs mi 'dra bas yid mi ches//kun
57a5(rgyud): byed byang chub sems rtogs shig/kun byed byang chub sems rtogs na//rang 'byung byang chub sems de yis//rtag chad gnyis kyi mtha' bsal te//ma skyes gzung 'dzin
57a6(rgyud): bral ba yis//rtag pa'i dngos po mtha' bsal la//rang 'byung ye shes 'gyur med pas//med pa chad pa'i mtha' yang gsal//mu zhes bya chos kyi dbyings//stegs
57a7(rgyud): zhes bya ba rtogs pa'i gnas//sangs rgyas sems can gnyis mthong ba//kun byed byang chub sems ma mthong zhes gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kuni byed rgyal po
57b1(rgyud): las dgongs pa 'dus pa'i lung gi le'u ste sum cu bzhi pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid kyi bstan pa gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin pa rdzogs/
57b2(rgyud): pa chen po'i gzhung rgya 'bras rtsol bsgrub las 'das pa 'di bstan te/kye sems dpa' chen po//nga yi spyod yul ni dka' ba ste//sgo dang lta ba dang no da mi tshig dang //phrin las
57b3(rgyud): dang ni bgrod lam gnos pa dang //ye shes chos nyid rnam pa brgyad po 'dri//sku gsum theg pa rnam pa lnga po yi//theg pa gzhan dang lta spyod mi 'thun te//sgo ni btsal du/
57b4(rgyud): med pa'i sgo nas 'jug/lta bu bsgom du med par bstan pa yin//dam tshig bsrung du med par bstan pa yin//phrin las btsal du med par bstan pa yin//lam la
57b5(rgyud): bgrod du med par bstan pa yin//gnas sbyang du med par bstan pa yin//ye shes mi rtog bskyod pa med pa yin//chos nyid ji bzhin bcosu med pa yin//kye sems
57b6(rgyud): dpa'i chen po don 'di ni//rgyu 'bras theg pa can la bstan 'gyur na//'jig rten rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos bzhin du//rgya las 'bras bu 'byung bas mi rigs zer//rgyu ni khams
57b7(rgyud): gsum sems can las bsgrubs nas//'bras bu dus gsum sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'dod//rgyu ni lta ba bsgom pa byas pa yis//gang bsgoms 'bras bu de thob 'dod pa
58a1(rgyud): na/bsgo ma ba de yis 'bras bu thob pa med//thams cad ji bzhin pa yi chos yin pas//ji bzhin pa la 'chos por byed pa ni//brdzun gyis bdon pa bslus
58a2(rgyud): pa sdig re che//lta bsgom dam chog la sogs rtsol bsgrub kyis//dbang pa yul la yid pa bral nas ni//dben pa la yul la thabs kyis khrid nas ni//rtog med mnyam
58a3(rgyud): pa'i thabs kyis bstan pa yin zhes gsungs so//byang chub kyi sems kun byeng rgyal po las rdzogs pa chen po'i lung bstan pa'i le'u sde sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o//
58a4(rgyud): de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi sku gsum thugs kyi rang bzhin du 'dus pa 'di gsungaso//kye sems dpa' chen po/
58a5(rgyud): nga yi rang bzhin 'di rtogs shig/nga ni byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin te//byang chub sems ni kun byed rgyal po yin//kun byed rgyal po'i rang bzhin sku gsung thugs//
58a6(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyis ma byas gcig kyang med//dus gsum sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs kyos byaso//khams gsum sems can lung dag yid gsum yang //
58a7(rgyud): kun bye nga yi sku gsung thugs kyis byas//snang srod snod bcud bsdus pa thams cad kyang //rje bzhin ma bcos pa yi chos nyid du//kun byed nga yi sku gsung thugs
58b1(rgyud): kyis byas shos gsungs pa dang //sems dpa' rdo rjes slar nus pa//b+h+yo kun d+hAng rgyal po byed pa'i bdag po lags//ma rig ma rtogs don 'od bshad du gsol//ji ltar byas pa
58b2(rgyud): bdago la bshad du gsol zhes zhus pas//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/nga ni sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te//sku ni chos nyid mngon du phyung ba des//kun bzang rol pa
58b3(rgyud): smad du 'byung ba byas//gsung gi sgra tshig mngon du bsgrags nas ni//don gyi chos nyid tshig gis go bar bstan//thugs ni rang 'byung ye shes 'gag med kyis//ston pa
58b4(rgyud): ye shes sgron ma byas nas ni//chos nyid don gyi ngo bo ma nor ston//kye sems dpa' chen pos don 'di rtogs par gyis//snang sred snod bcud de ltar snang ba las//nga la sku yi
58b5(rgyud): ngo bo gzhan med pos//rang gi ngo bos 'chad cing sten pa yin//sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis kyang //ma rtogs gzhan la khyod kyis lung sngon cig/kye sems dpa'
58b6(rgyud): chen po nyon cig/sa chu me rlung ni mkha'i sgra grag dang //rgyud drug sems can rnams kyi sgo tshig 'di//kun byed nga yi gsung las gzhan med pas//tshig sgra don gyis bsdeg/
58b7(rgyud): bshad de la bya//kye sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis kyang //ma rtogs gzhan la khyod kyis lung ston cig/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/khams gsum rgyud drug sems
59a1(rgyud): can thams cad dang //'byung tshon lU yI mi rtog mnyam nyid dang //chos nyid mi skye mo rtog mo 'gag ste//kun bye nga yi thugasu de las med//sems
59a2(rgyud): dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod kyis ni//ma rtogs gzhan la khyod kyis lung ston cig/sems dpa' chen pos 'di lung ma bstan na//nga yi rang bzhin shin tu mi rtogs te//ma
59a3(rgyud): rtogs pa dang phreng por mI 'gyur na//dus gsum spangs rgyas rnams kyi gdung 'tshob pa//khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can thaMd dang //la dgu lung dgu rgal ba'i sa bcu dang /tshal
59a4(rgyud): dbang sgyur phyag rgya lhun gyis grub pa dang //rig 'dzin gsum la sogs pa'i gdung 'tshob kyis//kun byed ngapa dang yun du phrad mi 'gyur//kun byed nga dang yun du ma phrad na//
59a5(rgyud): khams gsum rgyud drug gnas pa'i sems can gyis//rang gi rang bzhin rang gis ngo mi shes//sra bcu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yos//grangs med pa yi
59a6(rgyud): bskal pa gsum bgrangs kyang //kun byed du dang phrad par yong mi 'gyur//des kyang rang gi rang bzhin shes mi 'gyuraro//lus la dbang sgyur rig 'dzin gsum gyis kyang //lus
59a7(rgyud): kyis sangs rgyas longs spyod sku bzung nas//yid kyi dbang po rang sems mthong med lta//des kyang kun byed rgyal po nga dang ni//rang gi rang bzhin gnyis med de mi mthong //
59b1(rgyud): mamathong bar du chog chad nad kyis zan//de baspang yi rang bzhin lung ston cig ces gsung so//byang chub kyi snyoms kun byed rgyal blo las sku gsung thugasu 'dusang stso la'u sgra mang chu
59b2(rgyud): rtsa drug pa'o///de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des rdzogs pa chen po'i chos nyid bsgom du med pa 'di bstan te//kyai sems dpa' chen po rdo N+Di li sogs
59b3(rgyud): rig 'dzin gyi ni sa la gnas pa dang //sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang //khrims gsum sems n+dan dus la bab pa yo//kun gyi don chen kun byed nga yin gyis//
59b4(rgyud): yi rang bzhin chos nyid byang chub sems//chos nyid sems la bsgom med rtogs par gyis//rgyu 'bras ston pa'i sku gsum ston pas ni//nga yi rang bzhin chos nyid bsgom med la/
59b5(rgyud): 'jig rten rgyu 'bras chos dang don 'thun pa//rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung bar lung bstun nas//bsgrim pa'i lung na 'di ltar so sor bstan//chos nyid byang chub sems gcig ngo ba la//
59b6(rgyud): sdug bsngal kun 'byung bden pa rna pa ba zhis//sdug bsngal kun 'byung dran song rgyu zer na//chos nyid byang chub sems de spong bar byed//de yis chos nyid mi mthong spangs pa yin//chos
59b7(rgyud): nyid byang chub sems kyi ngo bo la//don dam kun rdzob bden pa rnams gnyis kyis//sbyin dang tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa bcus//sa bcu lam la sbyangs te bgrod pa yis//tsha
60a1(rgyud): ma mthong sbyong ba'i sa la gnas//chos nyid byang chub sems kyi ngo bo la//gza' dang rgyu skad dus tshogs bzang sgo nas//byang chub lnga dang rdzu 'phrul chen po bzhis//
60a2(rgyud): 'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad la//byin gyis brlabs nas lha yi skur bsgom pa//de yis rang sems bsgom med mthong ba mon//chosra gcig byang chub sems kyi ngo bo
60a3(rgyud): lA//ting 'dzin gsum dang tshi ga rnam pa lngas//rwa rgyud dag pa'i rdo rje phung po la//bsnyen sgrub rnam pa bzhi yi lha bsgoms nas//snang lnga rang bzhin med par byed pa ni//bcol
60a4(rgyud): zhing bsgrubs nas rang sems lhar bcos pas//des kyang rang sems bya med mthong ba min//rang gi chos nyid byang chub sems lnga ni//kun byed rgyal po ston pa'i ston pas
60a5(rgyud): rang sems ye nas chos nyid grol ba la//ston pa gsum la bsgom pa'i lung ma bstan//sgom sgrub btsal na rang sems spangs pa yin zhes gsungs//kye sems dpa' chen
60a6(rgyud): po rang sems grub 'dod na//'dod pa med pas grub pa yin pa'i phyir//rtog med mnyam pa nyid las nas mi byed//blang drang dor med yul la rang bzhin gnas//g.yos
60a7(rgyud): pa med pa'i ngangal dang gis gnas//sems ni ji bzhin pa yi ngo bo de//chos rnams thams cad de bzhin nyid du grub//ji bzhin pa la 'chos par ma byed cig/ngo tsa
60b1(rgyud): las gzhan du ma sgrub cig/rang nyid yin gyis gzhan du ma tshol cing //btsal na rgyal byas dbyings nas rnyed mi 'gyur//sngar byas zin pas da ni byed mi bdog/sngar grub zin pas/
60b2(rgyud): dgrub mi byed par//mi rtog cir mi dgongs la mnyam par zhog/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/snga rabs 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang //rang gi sems las
60b3(rgyud): gzhan du chos btsal med//ji bzhin ma la 'arjesu par byed ma myong //ting 'dzin rnam par rtog pa bsgom me myong //rang sems mi rtog pa yis grub pa yin//dra ltar bzhugs dang
60b4(rgyud): slad kyis byon pa yang //rtog med mnyam pa nyid kyis grub par 'gyur zhes gsungaso//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyalnga po las bsgom du med pa'i mdo lung gi le'u ste sum cu
60b5(rgyud): rtsa bdun po'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des 'khor gyi ston pa'i bstan pa gol sa dang sgrib par gyur pa 'di bstan to//kye sems dpa' chen po
60b6(rgyud): nyon cig/'khor gyi ston pa rnam gsum gyis//bstan pa gsum ni grol sgrib ste//de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ngas pa tho pA'i theg pa drug/rdzogs pa chen po'i gol sar bstan//
60b7(rgyud): de yang ji lta bu zhe na/byang chub sems dpa'i mdo sde ni//kun tu 'od kyi sa 'dod pa//bden pa gnyis kyi rtogs dpyod kyis//chos nyid stod pa na mkhar 'dod//a ti yo ga'i//
61a1(rgyud): bude chen ni//rtog dpyod 'das pa'i byang chub sems//rtog dpyod 'das lnga mdo sdes bsgyings//rdzoblasan+d+han+na rtog drang dpyod pa ni//mdo sde dag tu grol dang /
61a2(rgyud): bshad//kri ya rdo rje 'dzin 'dod pa//drag po rnam gsum sgor zhugs nas//gzung dzi na dag pa'i yul la gnas//e ti yo gi'i bde chen ni//gzung 'dzin 'das pa'i byang
61a3(rgyud): chub sems//gzung 'dzin 'das la krI yas bsgribs//rdzogs chen gzung dang 'dzin byed pa//kri ya dag tu grol bar bshad//u pa ya ya lta spyod ni//kri ya spyod cing
61a4(rgyud): yo ga sgrub//lta spyod 'brel pa'i don med pas//gnyi su med pa'i don ma rtogs//a ti yo ga'i bde chen ni//gnyisu med pa'i byang chub sems//gnyi su med las u pas
61a5(rgyud): bsgribs//rdzogs chen gnyi su 'byed pa ni//u pa ya ru gol brla bshad//yo ga stug po bkod 'dod pa//mtshan ma yod med sgor zhugs nas//phyag brgya bzhi la gcer
61a6(rgyud): byed de//blang dor med la 'jug mi nus//a ti yo ga'i bde chen ni//blang dor med pa'i byang chub sems//blang dror med la yo gas bsgribs//rdzogs chen
61a7(rgyud): blang dang dor byed pa//yo ga dag tu gol bar bshad//ma hA rdo rje 'chang 'dod pa//thabs dang shes rab sgor zhugs nas//rang rgyud dag pa'i dkyil
61b1(rgyud): 'khor la//bsnyen sgrub rnam bzhi sgrub par byed//a ti yo ga bde chen ni//rtsol sgrub 'das pa'i byang chub sems//rtsol sgrub 'das la ma hA sa sgrib//rdzogs chen rtsol sgrub
61b2(rgyud): byed pa ni//ma hA yo gar gol bar bshad//A nu dbye med sa 'dod pa//dbyings dang ye shes sgor zhugs nas//'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams la//rgyu ni dag pa'i dbyings lci ba//
61b3(rgyud): 'bras bu ye shes dkyil 'khor lta//a ti yo ga'i bde chen ni//rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i byang chub sems//rgyu 'bras 'das la a nu bsgribs//rdzogs chan rgyu 'bras
61b4(rgyud): gnyis lta na//a nu yo gar gol bar bshad//lta spyod gnyis kyi grol bsgrib bstan//kye sems dpa' chen po rdzogs pa chen po'i lte spyod ni/rgyu 'bras sgrub dang mi
61b5(rgyud): 'dra ste//lta spyod byang chub sems de ni//na mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin te//na mkha' la ni rtog spyod 'das//gang zhig rtog dpyod byed pa dris//byang chu ba na mkhre 'a bzhin du
61b6(rgyud): 'grub//rtog dpyod gnyis byung gol sgrib po//lta spyod na mkha'i rang bzhin lnga//gang zhig gzung drong 'dzin byed pas//byang chub na mkha' de mi 'grub//gzung 'dzin gnyis byung
61b7(rgyud): gol sgrib po//lho skyod rnam pa gnyis byung nas//na mkha' gnyisu med pa bzhin//byang chub la ni gnyi su med//gang zhig gnyi su med pa des//byang chub na mkha' de mi
62a1(rgyud): 'grug/lha spyod gnyis byung gol sgrib po//byang chub na mkha'i rang bzhin do//na mkha' la ni blang dor med//grang zhig blang dor byed pa des//byang chub
62a2(rgyud): na mkha' de mi 'grub//blang zhing dor ba gol sgrib po//byang chub na mkha'i rang bzhin de//na mkha' la ni rtsol sgrub med//gang zhig rtsol sgrub byed pa des//byang chub
62a3(rgyud): namakha' de mi 'grib/rtsol zhing sgrub pa gol sgrib po//byang chub na mkha'i rang bzhin de//na mkha' la ni rgyu 'bras med//gang zhig rgyu 'bras gnyis lta bas//
62a4(rgyud): byang chub na mkha' de mi 'grub rgyu 'bros lta ba go la slob po//kyi sems dpa' chen po chos kun na mkha'i rang bzhin te//na mkha' la ni rang bzhin med//nam mkha'
62a5(rgyud): la ni dpe yang med//na mkha' la ni tshad kyang med//chos rnams thams cad ma lus pa'i//don ni 'di ltar shes par bya//kye sems dpa' chen po 'di rtog shig/
62a6(rgyud): theg par la lta ba ra//lta ba'i yulnga ni gzhan med de//chos nyid byang chub sems 'di la/gzhan du lte ba'i yul me pas//lta ba zhes lta nor bar bshad//theg pa
62a7(rgyud): re la dam tshig re//byang chub lam gyi skyil ma byed//byang chub gzung 'dzin med pa'i phyir//gzhan du bsrung du med pa'i phyir//dam tshig la yang bsrung du med//rdeg pa
62b1(rgyud): re lo phrin las re//byang chub lamA gyo stong gro gus byung //byang chub lhun gyi grub pa'i phyir//phrin las btsal du med pa yin//las kyis lhun gyi grub 'gyur med//thag pa
62b2(rgyud): la gnas sa re//byang chub lam gyi gzhi rten byed//rdzogaso chen byang chub sems sa lo//dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang //sku gsum ston pa be zhugs pa dang /
62b3(rgyud): khams gsum sems can ma lus dang //snang srid snod bcud gnas pa'i phyir//sa la sbyangs shing bgrod du med//theg pa re la chos nyid re//rdzogs chen tshes nyid byang
62b4(rgyud): chub sems//sems las ma gtogs chos med pas//theg pa'i chos kun byang chubo sems//rdzogs chen rang 'byung ye shes ni//yul la rtog par mi byed de//mi rtog
62b5(rgyud): mi bskyod ye shes so zhes gsungaso//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las lta spyod kyi gol sgrib bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o///
62b6(rgyud): de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des nyid kyi rang bzhin thams cad la gol so dang sgrib pa med pa rgyal ba'i snying po yin pa 'di gsungaso//kye sems dpa' chen
62b7(rgyud): po nyon cig/nga ni kun gyi byang chub sems//des na kun gyi snying por bshad//sku gsum ston pa rnam gsum dang //dus gsum sangs rgyas bzhugs pa dang //kham pa
63a1(rgyud): grasam sems can thams cad dang //snang srid snod bcud thams cad la//'byung ba'i snying po nga las med//de yang ji lta bu zhe na/mi rtog mnyam pa de nyid
63a2(rgyud): las//skye ba med pa'i ches sku byung //rang gi ngo bo de nyid la sa//'dod pa longs spyod rdzogs sku byung //thugs rje byang chub chen po las//sbrel pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad byung //
63a3(rgyud): dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang //sngar 'das pa yi sangs rgyas kyis//rang 'byung ye shes sems nyid de//mi rtog rtogs nas sngar sangs rgyas//da ltar mi
63a4(rgyud): rtog dang la bzhugs//da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang //rong 'byung byang chub sems de ni//mi rtog pas na 'gro don mdzad//slad nas byon po'i sangs rgyas
63a5(rgyud): rnams//byang chub rang 'byung ye shes de//mi rtog pa'i lung bstan nas//'gro ba'i don la 'byung bar nges//rig 'dzin dang ni sa pa rnams//rang 'byung byang chub sems
63a6(rgyud): de ni//bltos pas mthong ba ma yin no//rang sems snying po de ru phrad//khams gsum sems can thams cad kyi//rang 'byung ye shes bklag med pas//dbang
63a7(rgyud): po yul lo rig gsal ba//ma bcos pa yi byang chub sems//de nyid snying po yang dag bshad//snang srid snod bcud thams cad kyang //nga yis ma bskyed gcig
63b1(rgyud): kyang med//kun rgyud las ma byung med//des na kun gyi snying por bshad//nga ni kun las rgyal ba ste//sku gsum las kyang nga rgyal la//sangs rgyas gsum yas nga rgyal lo//
63b2(rgyud): rig 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' dang /khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can dang //snang srid snod bcud thams cad kun//byed pa nga yin kun las rgyal//kun byed byang chub
63b3(rgyud): sems de yis//bstan pa kun gyi sngon rol du//byang chub sems kyi bstan pa bkod//byang chub sems kyi bstan pa 'di//kun gyis dgod par mi nus te//de ya ji ltar
63b4(rgyud): dgod ce na//chos la bya ru med pa'i phyir//btsal ba med pa'i sgo nas 'jug/byang chub sems las med pa'i phyir//byang chub sems kyi chos nyid la//sems kyis
63b5(rgyud): bsgom du med pa'i phyir//lta ba bsgom du med pa bkod//gzung 'dzin 'das pa'i chos nyid la//dam tshig bsrung du med pa dgod//ye nas lhun gyis grub pas na//
63b6(rgyud): snga la sbyangs du med pa bkod/byang chub sems ni bgrod pa'i gnas//sems kyi sa la bgrod med pas//lam la bgrod du med par bstan//chos nyid byang chub sems
63b7(rgyud): yin pas//chos nyid gzhan du lta mi byed//ye shes rang 'byung ye shes te//yul la rtog pa'i ye shes min//kun byed byang chub sems nga ni//lta spyod kun las rgyal
64a1(rgyud): pa dang //byed pa'i snying po yin pa'i phyir//rgyal ba'i snying po zhes bshad ces gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las rgyal dang
64a2(rgyud): snying po'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des byang chub kyi sems nyid kyi rang bzhin po ston pa 'di gsungaso//
64a3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/bdag gi bstan pa 'di bkod pas//dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang //rig 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' dang /khams gsum
64a4(rgyud): sems can thams cad kun//rtsol dang sgrub pa ma byas par//ye nas sangs rgyas lung bstan pas//'khor gyi ston pa rnams gsum gyi//rtsol sgrub byed
64a5(rgyud): pa'i brtan pa gsum//gol sa sgrib pas zhig par 'gyur zhes gsung so//de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes slar zhus pa/kye ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags//khyod
64a6(rgyud): kyi bstan pa byang chub sems//byang chub sems 'di sangs rgyas na//khams gsum sems can sangs rgyas sam//khams gsum sems can sangs rgyas na//
64a7(rgyud): khams gsum gnasu ci ste 'khor zhes zhus//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos slar gsungs pa/kye sems dpa' chen po 'di nyon cig/byang chub
64b1(rgyud): sems las byung ba'o//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun//chos nyid mngon du byung ba ste//de bzhin nyid du gcig pa yi//chos nyid yul ni lnga snang la//'dod mi 'dod ni/
64b2(rgyud): lnga lnga las//nyon mongs sdug bsngal skya zer nas//chos nyid yul lnga spong byed pa//rang 'byung ye shes snang ba de//bskal pa gsum du mi sbrengs pas//khams gsum
64b3(rgyud): gnasu 'khor ba yin//de bzhin nyid du gcig pa yi//chos nyid yul ni snga snang la//'dod dang mi 'dod lnga snang la//'khor ba'i rgyu ni yin zer nas//chos nyid lnga po
64b4(rgyud): 'gegs par byed//rang 'byung ye shes snang ba de//bskal pa du mar mi khyabs pas//khams gsum ge ni su 'khor ba yin//de bzhin nyid du gcig pa yi//ches
64b5(rgyud): nyid yul ni lto snang la//'di de dang mi 'dod lnga yul byung //chags pa'i gnas ni yin zer nas//chos nyid lnga po sbyongs par byed//rang 'byung ye shes snang ba de//bskal
64b6(rgyud): ba yun du mi sbyongs pas//khams gsum gen su 'khor ba yin//chos nyid mngon du byung ba yi//de bzhin nyid du gcig pa yi//chos nyid yul ni lnga snang la//'dod
64b7(rgyud): mi 'dod lho byung bas//byin brlabs gnas ni yin zer nas//phyi nang dag par byin gyis rlob//chos nyid lnga po dag par byed//rang 'byung ye shes snang ba de//mi tshe bdun
65a1(rgyud): du byin mi rlob//khams gnas su 'khor ba yin//byang chub sems las byung ba yi//chos nyid mngon du phyung ba yi//de bzhin nyid du gcig pa las/chos
65a2(rgyud): nyid yul ni lnga snang las//'dod dang mi 'dod lnga 'byung ste//mtho ris nga ni song rgyu zer nas//de bzhin nyid la blang dor byed//ring 'byung ye shes snang ba de//rang gi skyen gyis dor
65a3(rgyud): me btub//mi btub dor bar byed pas 'khor//byang chub sems las byung ba yi//mngon du phyung ba'i chos nyid de//de bzhin nyid du gcig pa las//chos nyid yul ni lnga
65a4(rgyud): snang ste//'dod dang mi 'dod yul lnga ste//sku gsung thugasu shes byas nas//sku gsung thugasu gdod sgrub byed/ye nas yin la sgrub byed pas//sgrub pa nyid kyis 'khor
65a5(rgyud): bi yin//kye sems dpa' chen po de bas na//byang chub sems spangs pha rol ni//rang 'byung ye shes yA nas med//'khor ba spangs pa'i pha rol no//mya ngan 'das shes
65a6(rgyud): bya ba med//chos can spangs pa'i pha rol na//chos nyid bya Tha ye nas med//thams cad de bzhin nyid du gcig/de bzhin nyid du gcig pa la//de bzhin nyid la bcos las nor//de ni
65a7(rgyud): mi nor ba yi ming //bzhin ni bco su med pa'i don//nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid bstan//de bzhin nyid la 'chos ma byed//de bzhin nyid la 'chos byed pa//byang chub sems la su
65b1(rgyud): 'chos pa//des ni 'khor ba'i snying po bsgrub ces gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal byo las byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o///
65b2(rgyud): de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pa 'di bstan to//kye sems dpa' dam pa rdo rje khyod//nga yi rang bzhin 'di ltar shes par gyis//
65b3(rgyud): nga ni ston pa'i sgron ma byang chub sems//dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po yin//khams gsum sems can kun gyi pha dang ma//snang srid snod bcud kun gyi rgyu yang yin//
65b4(rgyud): nga las ma byung ba no go cig kyang med//da ni mi gnas kun tu khyab pa'i phyir//de ni ye nas dus gsum sangs rgyas yin//nga ni mi rtog mnyam par gnas pa'i phyir//rtog med
65b5(rgyud): mnyam nyid chos sku ye sangs rgyas//nga yi ngo bo kun tu longs sbyod phyir//nga nyid longs spyod rdzogs skur ye sangs rgyas//nga nyid rang 'byung ye shes snang ba'i phyir//nga nyid thugs
65b6(rgyud): rje srul skur mngon sangs rgyas//des na dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi snying por bshad//nga yi ye shes byang chub sems snad pa//rang 'byung ye shes lnga po rgyud drug sems//
65b7(rgyud): des na khams gsum sems can pha dang ma//snang srid snod bcud kun gyi ngo bo yang //nga yi ngo bor byung ba snang bas//nga nyid ye nas snang ba sangs rgyas yin//nga la gnyis
66a1(rgyud): med gcig tu 'dus pa chu//sdud par byed pa sems nyid chu yin no//nga ni thams cad mnyam pa drod snyom me//kun la mnyam par gnas pas
66a2(rgyud): me sangs rgyas//nga ni thogs med yong zhing g.yo ba yin//thogs med g.yo bsA rlung du mngon sangs rgyas//nga ni ma sgrib kun khyab gsal ba'i phyir//nam mkha' zhes ni
66a3(rgyud): med btags sangs rgyas yin//nga las ma byas pa yi sangs rgyas ni//'byung chen srid pas bsdus pa'i chos la med//'byung ldi nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa ni//gcig la
66a4(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa lha'i rang bzhin tshang //snang ba sa la sdud pa chu yin te//mnyam pa me la g.yo ba rlung du gsal//ma sgribs gsal bas na mkha'i rang bzhin te//gcig la nye shu rtsa
66a5(rgyud): lnga tshang ba ni//byang chub sems kyi che ba'i yon tan bstan//chos la gnyis med byang chub sems su gcig/gcig gis kun byas kun byed rgyal pos byas shes gsung so///
66a6(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las ngo bo gcig pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe gcig pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad
66a7(rgyud): kyi byang chub kyi sems kho nar sangs rgyas pa 'di gsungaso//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/kye chos kyi sku ni byang chub sems//byang chub sems las chos kyi sku/
66b1(rgyud): rdul tsam sus kyang bcos pa med//des na sangs rgyas sems las med//longs spyod rdzogs sku byang chub sems//byang chub sems la longs spyod sku//sems las byung ba'i gzugs/
66b2(rgyud): rnams las//longs spyod rdzogs las sku gzhan med//sprul pa'i sku ni byang chub sems//byang chub sems kyi sprul pa las/'gro ba'i don mdzad gzhan ma med//dus gsum sangs/
66b3(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyang //byang chub sems las gzhan med do//snga rabs 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams//rang sems ma bcos sngar mthong rtogs//da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs
66b4(rgyud): rgyas rnams//ma bcos pa yi rang sems des//ma bcos ji bzhin rtogs gyur nas//da ltar 'gro ba'i don yang mdzad//slad nas byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams//rang 'byung sems
66b5(rgyud): nyid 'di la ni//sbyar bar 'chos par lung ma bstan//da ltar ting 'dzin sems mi 'chos//ma bcos lam du zhugs nas byon//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams la//byang chub semasu
66b6(rgyud): ma rtogs te//bcos shing bsgrubs pas grub mi 'gyur//ma rtogs bcos pas grub par byed//bskal pa du ma'i grangs bgrangs kyang //mi rtsol bde ba phrad mi 'gyur//skye
