66b7(rgyud): sku gsum sems las ma bcos phyir//sku gsum ston pa'i mdo lung las//'chos par byed pa'i don 'byung ba//de ni ston pa sku gsum yang //nyid kyi ston pa rang
67a1(rgyud): bzhin ston pa min//de bzhin 'chos par byed pa yi//ston pas bden tshul ji bstan yang //nges lud ma yin drung lung yin zhes gsung sngo//byang chub
67a2(rgyud): kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las bco su med pa'i le'u ste zhe gnyis pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi ston pa nyid
67a3(rgyud): yin par zhal gyis bzhes pa 'di gsungs so//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/nga ni chos rnams kun gyi ston pa ste//nga yi rang bzhin rnam pa gsum las ni//ston pa
67a4(rgyud): yang ni rnam pa gsum du bstan//bstan pa yang ni rnams gsum nga yis bstan//de 'dzin 'khor tshe gras gsum yang nga yis bstan//ston pa gsum yang gang dang
67a5(rgyud): glagrang zhe na//chos kyi rang bzhin ston pa'i ston pa dang //chos kyi ngo bo ston pa'i ston pa dang //don gyi sgra tshig ston pa'i ston pa'o//chos kyi rang bzhin ston pa'i ston pa ni//
67a6(rgyud): skye ba med pas byin gyis brlabs phyung ste//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun//chos kyi de bzhin nyid du ston par byed//chos kyi ngo bo ston pa'i ston pa ni//
67a7(rgyud): ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun//ston pa nyid kyi sku ru phyung nas ni//chos kyi ngo bor de las med par ston//chos kyi sgra chog ston pa'i ston pas ni
67b1(rgyud): chos rnams kun+da gyi ni sgyu bsdus nas//ma rigs mo shos+t+ra khams gsum sems can la//don de sgyu dang tshig blos bsdebs nas ston//des na ston pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa
67b2(rgyud): bshad//de 'dzin 'khor ni rnam pa gsum bstan te//shin tu rnal 'byor rtsol sgrub 'das pa'i 'khor zhugs yid ches sangs rgyas su la gnas/rigs 'dzin sa dang dang por/
67b3(rgyud): bcu pa'i 'khor//ma thob nye reg bsgom pa'i sa la gnas//sems bskyed mos pa spyod pa'i 'khor rnams ni//rgyu dges 'bras bu dug 'joms sa la gnas//de ni ston pa gsum
67b4(rgyud): gyi 'khor du bstan//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgya lnga po lpags//skyon po gsum dang 'khor tsho gas dri ltar na//bstun pa rnams gsum ji ltar bstan par bgyi zhes zhus
67b5(rgyud): pas/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/chos kyi sku'i bstan pa de bzhin nyid bstan te//de bzhin nyid la rnam pa dbye ru med//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun///
67b6(rgyud): sems kyi ngo bo yin pas de bzhin nyid//de la gang su sgom zhing 'chos byed pa//de yis chos su bstan pa rtogs po med//snang ba med pa'i chos nyid byang chub la//ma nor
67b7(rgyud): de bzhin nyid du ma tshogs te//de la gang su 'chos shing sgom byed pa//de yis rang sems bcos med de mi rig/snang srid chos med byang chub sems//sems kyi de bzhin
68a1(rgyud): nyid 'byung de bzhin nyid//de bzhin nyid du ma rtogs so sor mthong //de bzhin nyid ni dbyings nas tshol byed pa//dus gsum rgyal bas bcol yang ma
68a2(rgyud): brnyed do//kye sems dpa' chen po rten cig/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bstan pa longs spyod de//longs spyod lnga ni chos nyid longs spyad cig/gzugs la sogs pa'i
68a3(rgyud): longs spyod lnga la ni//gcig la'ang lnga lnga nyi shu rtsa lnga spyod//rtsa lnga longs spyod de ni sgo lnga yi tshul//tshul ni chos nyid don gyi ngo bo nyid du bshad//sangs rgyas sems
68a4(rgyud): can kun gyi longs spyod du//longs sku nga yi gzugs la spyad du med//rig 'dzin sa bcu rnams la nga yis bstan zhes gsungaso//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon
68a5(rgyud): cig/sprul sku bston pa thugs rjes don 'tsham ste//khams gsum sems can bsam pa thA dad la//sku dang gsung dang thugs ni rnams gsum gyis//bsam
68a6(rgyud): pa tha dad sku gsung thugs rjes bzlog/dbang po yul la zhen pa de bzlog nas//dben pa'i yul ni gang 'thad de bstan nas//des ni nga yi thugs rje 'dren lung byed//
68a7(rgyud): kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/nga ni chos rnams kun gyi ston yi ni phyir//sangs rgyas la yang nga yi rang bzhin bstan//sems can la yang nga yi rang bzhin bstan
68b1(rgyud): rang bzhin bstan pas bston par zhal gyis bzhes//nga yi rang bzhin 'di ltar rig par gyis//ston pa dang ni bstan pa 'khor rnams ni//nga yi rang bzhin gsum las gzhan med de/
68b2(rgyud): ston pa dang 'byung ye shes 'gag med min//bstan pa nga yi rang bzhin ma bcos yin//de 'dzin 'khor ni nga yi ngo ngos 'dzin ces gsungaso//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyu ba/
68b3(rgyud): po las ston par zhal gyis bzhes pa'i le'u ste zhe gsum pa'o///de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid la bya ba med pa'i don 'di gsungaso
68b4(rgyud): kye sems dpa' chen po bya ba med pa'i don 'di ni//kun bye nga yi rang bzhin te//nga la bya ba med pa na//nga ni ye nas byas zin pas//bya ba med pa'i chos nyid yin//chos nyid
68b5(rgyud): nga yi rang bzhin las//rang bzhin de la bya ru med//rang bzhin rang bzhin bya ba de//bcosu med pa'i rang bzhin yin//bcos med byang chub de la ni//sems dpa' rdo rje khyod ma
68b6(rgyud): 'chos//sems dpa' rdo rje de 'chos ni//kun byed nga la 'ches pa yin//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun//kun byed nga yi rang bzhin yin//kye sems dpa' chen po
68b7(rgyud): khyod nyon cig/nga yi rang bzhin 'gyur med la//bsgoms na 'chos shing bsgyur ba yin//nga ni ye nas lhun grub la//bsgrubs nang la bcos pa yin//nga la bgrong pas
69a1(rgyud): phyin pa myed//nga la bcol bsdu grub pa med//nga la sbyangs pas byung ba med//nga la ma lta yul med kyis//nga la ma bskyod lam med kyis//dul
69a2(rgyud): ma sbyongs sgrib med kyis//mi gnas dmigs pa'i yul dang bral//spros med bsam pa'i yul las 'das//'dzin pas brtags pa'i chos rnams ni//nga yi ngo bo
69a3(rgyud): bstan pa yin//de la spong bgegasu byed pa//bskal pa gsum gyi bar du ni//kun byed nga dang phrad mi 'gyur//spang bar bya ba'i chos de ni//rang gi ngo bo yin par bshad
69a4(rgyud): kye sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems ni kun byed rgyal po ste//kun byed byang chub sems kyis byas pa ni//byang chub sems las gzhan du byas pa med//byang
69a5(rgyud): chub sems ni ye nas mo nor yin//ye nas yin pos ye nas nor po med//nor ba med pa'i bden rdzun sgros mi 'dogs//rgyu bden 'bras bu rtsol bsgrub kun las
69a6(rgyud): 'das//byas zin rtsol bsgrub 'das pa ma rig nas//rtsol bsgrub bya byed bsgoms nas grub lta na//byang chub 'grogasu de las che ba med//mi gnas mi rtog cing
69a7(rgyud): yang dgongs med pas//mi rtog mnyam pa'i yul la rang bzhin gonas//ye nas byas zin rtsol po'i sems mi 'byung //bde chen de la gang su gnas pa'i//chos rnams
69b1(rgyud): kun gyi snying por de 'gyur ro//de yis bdag gzhan kun gyi don mi byed//gcig 'dus thams cad 'dus pa'i snying po des//ma blta sa dus gsum sangs rgyas thugs kyang
69b2(rgyud): glas la//ma sgribs sems can kun gyi sems kyang snang //kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/kun byid nga yis sems can don byas zin//nga yis ngan byas gzhan gyis bya
69b3(rgyud): mi dgos//gzhan la ltos pa'i chos ni nga lung min//nga la kun rdzogs ye nas byas zin rdzogs//ye nas byas zin lta ba bsgom mi dgos//ye nas rnam dag dam tshig
69b4(rgyud): srung mi dwags//ye nas byang chub sa la kun gnas pas//rig 'dzin sa dang sa bcu sbyangs mi dgos//ma btsal yAM nas lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir//btsal ba'i phrin las ye
69b5(rgyud): nas bya mi dgos//rang 'byung ye shes yul la mi rtogs pas//rig pa'i ye shes yul gyis gsal mi dgos//bde chen chos sgo sems kyis gcig pa'i phyir//
69b6(rgyud): snga phyi dus gsum med de khyad par gcig/phun sum tshugs dang dus gnas kun cig dang //thams cad cig phyir da la kun rdzogs te//rdzogs pa chen po nga la kun rdzogs
69b7(rgyud): pas//lte spyod dam tshig phrin las dam tshig la ni//gong bshad bzhin du bcol zhing bsgrub mi dgos//de ltar ma rig rtsol bsgrub byas 'gyur na//rgyu 'bras 'das po'i
70a1(rgyud): don dang 'gal 'gyur nas//bya med bde tshun de dang mi phrad do//rtsol bsgrub nas kyis ma rig de zin 'gyur//de bas rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i rdzogs chen la//
70a2(rgyud): skal med rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pas//rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos la spyad par bya zhes gsungs so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las rdzogs chen skal med
70a3(rgyud): don med kyi lce'u ste zhe bzhi pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos rdzogs po chen po la lta ba bsgom med kyi mdo lung 'dri bstan to//kye sems
70a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po rang gi lta ba bsgom med ni//kun byed nga yi nga la bsgom du med//kun byed nga ni sgom pa'i yul ma yin//nga ni ma bcos kun la rang bzhin gnas//rang bzhin /
70a5(rgyud): gnas pa yi bsgom du med pa de//nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis//nga las mngon du phyung ba'i chos nyid la//bskam chags lnga yi sdug bsngal yin zer nas/
70a6(rgyud): ma bcos mi 'dzegs brtul zhugs spong 'gegs bsgom//de lung bstan par ma bcos don dang 'gal//mu stegs sde bzhi sprul pa'i thugs rje yis//byin brlabs/
70a7(rgyud): 'khor du bkod nas lung bstan pas//bya bral bde ba de nyid thob mi 'gyur//kye sems dpa' chen po//nga las mngon du phyung ba'i chos nyid la//bskem chagaso lnga yas
70b1(rgyud): sdug bsngal skye zer nas//dang po sA na sa bcu par sems dpa' la//bden pa rnam pa gnyis kyi rtog dpyod kyis//don dam med la kun rdzob yod pA ru//sprul pas lung bstan
70b2(rgyud): rtog dpyod sgom pa byed//ma bcos ji bzhin nga yi dron dang 'gal//kye sems dpa' chen po//nga las mngon du phyung ba'i chos nyid de//ma bcos ji bzhin pa yi chos nyid la//longs//
70b3(rgyud): spyod rdzogs pas 'khor la lung bstan pa//ji bzhin bcos pa med par mA rtogs te//phyi nang snod bcud dag par byin brlabs te//byang chub yan lag cho ga kun sgo nas//bsgom
70b4(rgyud): pa'i ye shes lha ni snang bar byed//skad cig mchod nas gshegs gsol ting 'dzin bshig/ying bsgom yang bshog byis pa'i bdago khang 'dra//ji bzhin ma bcos nga yi don
70b5(rgyud): dang 'bral//kye sems dpa' chen po nyan cig/nga las byung ba'i smyon pa lung ston gyis//nga yis phyung ba'i chos nyid mngon phyung la//ting 'dzin mtshan ma yod med sgor zhugs nas/
70b6(rgyud): chos nyid gcig lnga blang dor byas nas ni//ye shes dam tshig so sor bsgoms nas ni//grogs po dag gis dngos grub ste ra ba//gcig la gnyisu ltas pa'i bsgom pa nor/
70b7(rgyud): ngo bo gnyi ga la gnyis kyis thob pa med//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/nga yi rang bzhin mngon du phyung ba la//phung po 'byung ba rnam shes dbang po la//rang rgyud dag pa rdo rje
71a1(rgyud): lhur byas te//bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhi cho ga bsgom byas nas//sems kyi bro 'dus 'phags mchod 'gro don byed//phro 'dus bsdus nas dngos grub
71a2(rgyud): thob 'tshal bas//rang gis rang gis dngos grub thob par bsgom//de yang sems kyi ting 'dzin tshe chad 'gyur//rdzogs chen lta ba sgom du med pa ni//kun byed nga yi sems
71a3(rgyud): kyi yon tan te//byang chub sems kyi che ba'i yon tan gyis//btsal zhing bsgrubs pa'i dka' ba spyad mi dgad//rgyu rkyen med pas btsal ba'i las mi dgos//'bras bu'i
71a4(rgyud): rang bzhin gzhan nas bsgrub mi dgos//chos nyid rang yin bsgom pa bye mi dgos//ma skyes pas na 'jig pa'i gnyen po med//gzhan la ma ltos bsgom gnas tshol
71a5(rgyud): mi byed//nga la gang zhig sgom par byed pa des//bsgom pa nyid kyis ngo dang phrad mi 'gyur//chos nyid mngon du phyung ba nga yin pas//sdug bsngal mi skye rnam par spang
71a6(rgyud): mi dgos//rang 'byung yin pas skye 'jig med pa'i phyir//ma rig rten 'brel dbang po dgag mi dgos//rang 'byung rnam dgra chos nyid sbyang mi dgos//ye nas dag
71a7(rgyud): pas gtsang sbra byi mi dgos//ye nos lhun grub rtsol bsgrub bya mi dgas//bltas pas ma dag pa yi chos med de//de bzhin nyid dang rnam snang kun tu bzang //dbang
71b1(rgyud): bo drug la snang ba'i chos rnams kyang //ye nas de yin de las gzhan ma med//de la gang zhig bsgom dang bsgrub byed pa//de ni mdongs pas na mkha' steg pa 'dra//nga yi rang
71b2(rgyud): bzhin spyod yul kun las 'das//nga yis mngon du phyung ba'i chos rnams ni//nga yi ngo bo kun gyis mthong bya'i phyir//sna tshogs dbang po ngo la bstan pa yin//de lang yi rang
71b3(rgyud): bzhin kun rtogs shig/de la nga yi rang bzhin ma mthong ni//kun byed pa yi theg pa bstan mi bya//rdzogs pa chen po'i don dang skal med pas//rgyu 'bras thag pa drang ba'i lung la
71b4(rgyud): bzung //da ni ye nas spyod yul 'das pa 'di//rgyu 'bras dga' ba'i skul pa med rnams la//bstan na sgro dang skur pa 'ong pa'i phyir//bstun ni rong gi sems la skur btab pas//
71b5(rgyud): drug tu skye zhing gtan du 'khor bar 'khyam//kyi sems dpa' chen po dadon rtogs//de ni spyod yul kun las 'das pa'i phyir//tshig gis mi phebs dbang po'i spyod yul 'das//
71b6(rgyud): yI rang bzhin bsdus tI thig ler gnas//ma spros gnyis med ye nas gcig tu bstan//dam tshig bsrung ba'i bsgom pa bya mi dgos//phrin las btsal po'i bsgom pa bya
71b7(rgyud): mi dgos//lam la mi bgrod sa la mi sbyongs te//rang las gzhan du chos nyid tshol ma byed//rang 'byung ye shes mi rtog g.yos pa med//gzhan gyi lung min kun byed pa
72a1(rgyud): /yi lung //rgyu 'bras 'das pas tshul dang sgrub mi byed//ma byung bas na dngos po sgrom mi byed//ma skyes pas na 'jig pa'i dogs pa med//dam
72a2(rgyud): snang bas dmigs pa bsgom dang bra'o//bde chen bdal ba'i klung dkyili no//mi rtog mnyam pa'i rang bzhin gnas//chos nyid snang ba med pi'i rang bzhin la//rig pas
72a3(rgyud): mi rtog ti 'dzin ma byed cig/kye sems dpa' chen po//bsgoms nu gang bsgom du yo nad yin gyis//kun gyi snying po byang chub sems yin na//byang chub sems ni
72a4(rgyud): gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phyir//sgom par bya ba rdul tsam yod ma yin//gong bshad bsgoms pas 'bras bu m+b+ha thob bzhin//de yang bsgoms pas thob par lung mi ston//
72a5(rgyud): kye sems dpa' chen po la ltos//nga ni kun byed byang chub sems yin te//kun byed byas pas kun byas nyid du byas//kun ni ma lus pa'i sgrar bshad de//byed pa'i
72a6(rgyud): snying po de yis tha ma sna cung byed//byung ba gzung du yod pa ma yin la//chub pa kun gyi snying pos sdong por chub//sems ni rlung 'byung ye shes kun tu sems shes
72a7(rgyud): gsungs//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po lis lte ba bsgom med kyi le'u ste zhi lnga pa'o///de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des rdzogs pa
72b1(rgyud): chen po des rdzogs pa chen po'i dam tshigs bsrung du med pa 'dri gsungs so//kye sems dpa' chen po rton cig/rdzogs chen dam tshig bsrung du med bstan pa//kun byed byang chub
72b2(rgyud): sems kyi rang bzhin ni//ma skyes spros drang bral po'i rang bzhin gyis//skye ba'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs yul byung na sa//yul de rang gi rang bzhini yin zhes byas//de lo mi rtog
72b3(rgyud): rtog pa'i yul las 'das//yul la mi 'dzin spong dang len med pas//med pa phyal ba gcig pulpAn grI ba ste//bsrung bar bya ba'i sngo khrims kun dang bral//bsrung med nga las
72b4(rgyud): byung ba'i ston gsum gyis//mu stegs sde bzhi thugs rjes byin brlabs nas//'dul ba phog pa'i 'khor ni bdi bzhi lnga//bsrung bde bya ba'i khrims ni 'di lta ste//rdzab
72b5(rgyud): dang ni yan lag bsrung bar grangs//nyis brgya lnga bcu lnga brgya lnga bcu khrims//bsrung ba'i 'dus na grangs dang don mi shes//des na sdom pa mi thub bsrung thabs med//
72b6(rgyud): rdzogs chen ci spyod rtog pa kun las 'daso//sdom pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas grangs myang bya//lus ngag yid la bsdus pa rnam pa gsum//dbang po yul las sdug
72b7(rgyud): bsngal byung nas ni//lus kyi 'gro 'dug gom pa bor so med//ngag gis tshig brjod don gyis bden par dga'//yid kyis bsam pa bden pa kun pas 'gali ma nor
73a1(rgyud): bsdam pa kun kyang bsgrub du med//lus ngagra bsdom pa rgyu mdung dam po des//bden nyid don dang phrad pa shin tu dka'//bsrung med nyams pa med dang
73a2(rgyud): phrad mi 'gyur//bsrung med nyams pa med pa kun byed lung //kye sems dpa' chen po nyin cig/nga las byung ba'i ston pas lung bag pa//gzu' dang rgyu dkar dus tshig
73a3(rgyud): bzang sgo nas//phyi nang gtsang ma'i khrus kyis dag byas te//sdom pa tshul khrims 'gro don zhal mchis pa//gang yang dam bcas tshul bzhin mi 'grub ste//dam
73a4(rgyud): bcas ma grub bshags pas sems mi 'dag/bsrung med de dang yun du thig rings nyams//kye rdo rje gsang ba gsum gyi dam tshig ni//rtsa ba gsum dang yan lag
73a5(rgyud): lnga rnams te//rtsa ba gsum nI sku gsung thugs 'dus te//rgyu ni lnga yi skur bsgomasA lus kyang 'ching //dag ni 'dzab dang ting 'dzin zhi ba min//yid kyi ting 'dzin phro
73a6(rgyud): 'dus bzung nas ni//rtsa ba mi rtog dam tshig bde dang bral//yan lag rnam pa lnga ni 'di lta ste//dang por shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni/phung po lnga dang 'byung ba rnam pa la/
73a7(rgyud): rnam shes dbang po yul la sogs pa rnams//lha dang dkyil 'khor rang bzhin shes par bya//shes bya shes byed med pa des ma mthong //spyad par bya ba'i dam
73b1(rgyud): namasan//ston 'gazhan mabyon byangs pa dang //mo tshangs spyod dang brdzun du smra ba dang //rnam pa lnga no thabs mkhas spyod byed pa//ma spyod nyams mthong rtog dang
73b2(rgyud): bcas nas skyed//de yang mi rtog moHmi dang bral ba yin//dang du blud pa'i dam tshig rnam lnga ni//dri chen dri rlung la sogs mdze sa lngas//rgyal ba'i sku lnga 'di las
73b3(rgyud): 'grub zer nas//dpa' bo 'bru lngas 'phro 'du byas nas ni//rgyal ba'i sku lnga dang du len byed pa//dang du ma blangs sku lnga mi grub rtog/blang dor bral ba'i rtag 'das de ma
73b4(rgyud): grub//mi spang ba yi dam rdzas rnam pa lnga ni//'dod chags zho sdang la sogs dug lnga po//gsang bu rdo rje'i dam chog chen po ru//nyon mongs lnga bsgyur ye shes rnam pa
73b5(rgyud): ldang//dug la mi spong ye shes rnam lder lan//blang dror med pa'i bde ba des ma grub//grub par bya ba'i dam tshig rnam lnga ni//phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga rnam dang //rnam
73b6(rgyud): shes yul rnams dkyil 'khor grub byed pa//ting 'dzin gsum dang cho ga lnga rdzogs nas//rgyal ba'i reg lnga'i dkyil 'khor grub byed pa//ting 'dzin tshig lnga yis
73b7(rgyud): sems rtsel byed//mi rtog ma bcil lhun gyis grub dang 'gal//bsgom pa'i sku ni me rtog mdza' tshon 'dra//cho ga bzlas brjod 'dzab kyang rtsi kya 'dra//rtsol sgrub spyod
74a1(rgyud): lhun gyis grub mi 'gyur//med par bsgrub pas shin tu grub pa med//kun byed pa la bsrung ba'i dam tshig med//rgyu rkyen med pas rtsol zhing bsgrub
74a2(rgyud): mi dgos//lhun gyis grub pas spyad par bya mi dges//ye shes yin pas shes par bya mi dgos//rang 'byung yin pas rgyu dang rkyen mi dgos//bzang ngan med pas breng
74a3(rgyud): drod bya mi dgos//dngos po med pos medo pa zhes su bshad//dngo su mi spyod ye shes ma 'gags pas//de lta byul pa zhesu btags pa yin//sems kun ga
74a4(rgyud): cig pur btags pa yin//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun//yid ches byang chub semasu rdzogs pa'i phyir//lhun gyis rdzogs pa zhe su ngi yA bshad//
74a5(rgyud): che grangs bkres skom blun lkugs chos nyid la//sku gsum 'khor sngangs 'bros pa'i tsha gA drug/gong be shad bzhin du btsalo zhing bsgrub mi dgos//rgyu nyid rang
74a6(rgyud): 'byung ye shes yin pa'i phyir//las kyi rkyen gyi dbang du de mi 'gyur//chos nyid rang bzhin cir yang 'gyur med pas//btsal bas grub par nga yis lung ma bstan//
74a7(rgyud): rang 'byung ye shes kun dang mtshungs med pas//rgyu rkyen las kyis rang 'byung de mi 'grub//bden pa nyid kyis brtan la dbang du med//nges pa gcig la bden pa
74b1(rgyud): rnam pa gnyis//ma nges the tshom can gyi lung de la//des pa cig tu bstan pa ga la yod//rnal 'byor gang zag chos la rlom byed ni//ston gsum rgyu 'bras lung la brten smra ba//
74b2(rgyud): de la bden gnyis tshad ma bzhin yang dgus//kun byed nga yis chos kun byas pa'i phyir//ngas byas chos la bden pa gnyis mi dgos//ngas byas chos la bden pa gnyis
74b3(rgyud): dgosu//ngas byas thams cad byang chub semasu byas//byang chub sems la don dam kun rdzob med ces gsungaso//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las dam tshig bsrung
74b4(rgyud): du med pa'i le'u ste zhe drug pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des rdzogs pa chen po la phrin las btsal du med pa 'di gsungaso//kye sems dpa'
74b5(rgyud): chen po nyon cig/kun byed nga ni rdzogs pa chen po ste//rdzogs pa chen po lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir//phrin las ye nas btsal du med par bstan//phrin las btsal du
74b6(rgyud): yod par lung ston pa//nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis//rang ra 'khor la btsal ba'i las phog pa//bcas pa'i las ni rang res so sor bog/sprul pas btsal ba'i rgyu la las
74b7(rgyud): phog pa//lus ngag yid gsum tshad med bsgor zhugs nas//lus kyi sdom pa srog gcod sku g.yam spang //ngag gi sdom pa ngag khyal tshig btsu pa dang //brdzun dang phra maM
75a1(rgyud): la sogs ngag gos spang //yid kyis man pa sems gnod soms log lta spang //dge bcu sdod pa'i las do rgyur bkod nas//sbyin pa tshul khrims pha rol
75a2(rgyud): byin bcu las//spyad na sa dang kun 'ad thob 'dod pa//tshe chad las ni bskal pa gsum du spyod//de yang kun byed pa yi sa lung phog min//longs spyod rdzogs pas 'khor
75a3(rgyud): lo lung phog pa//rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sgo nas las phog pa//sems can ting 'dzin las ni 'di lta ste//khrus dang gtsang sbrar phyi nang dag byas te//cho 'phrul las kyis byin gyis
75a4(rgyud): brlabs nas ni//ye shes sems dang dam tshig gnyis lhas nAs//ting 'dzin las kyis mchod ni du gshegs gsol byed//las des mi tshe bdun du che chud 'gyur//chos
75a5(rgyud): kyi sku las longs spyod skur bzhengs nas//rnal 'byor chen po'i 'khor la lung phog pa//bdag nyid chen po yin par lung bstan nas//rang rgyud dag pa'i dkyil 'khor
75a6(rgyud): de rnams la//kha dog rigs dang sbyar ba'i lha bsgoms nas//zhe lhas zhi bar byed pa'i las byed pa//rgyas lhas rgyas par byed pa'i las byed pa//dbang lhas dbang du srud
75a7(rgyud): pa'i las kyang byed//dag lhas stongs par byed pa'i las kyang byed//tshe la gnas dang phyag rgya rig 'dzin 'grub//phrin las rnam bzhis tshe chad grub pa med//mi rtso
75b1(rgyud): bya mod las ni ngo mo 'grub//rdzogs tshon rgyu 'bras ye nas 'das pa'i phyir//btsal zhing bsgrubs pas bya med grub pa med//rgyu 'bras lta ba'i ston pas lung bstan pa//'jig rten
75b2(rgyud): mtshan ma'i chos la ched btsugs nas//rgyu las btsal nas 'bras bu grub byed pa//sems la rgyu mdo yen sa 'bras bu med//byang chub sems la skye ba med pa'i phyir/'jig rten
75b3(rgyud): skye ba'i chos la dpe blangs nas//skye las 'jig pa 'byung bar sgros mi gdags//rang 'byung rgyu'abras 'das pa ma brtags par//'jig rten mtshan mo'i chos la tshong badzugs nas///
75b4(rgyud): rgyo las btsal bas 'bras bu 'byong zer ba//de ni rgyu 'bras theg pa drang lung yin//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ye shes ye shes zhesu bstan pa ni//rang 'byung ye shes ma
75b5(rgyud): 'ogags kun dang mtshungs//rgyu las ma byung mtshungs med ye shis de//thams cad bskyed pas gzhan nas chos 'byung med//'jig rten rgyu 'bras chos la tshod btsugs nas//btsal
75b6(rgyud): ba med pa'i 'bras bu 'byung mi'i gyur//byang chub sems ni rgyu rkyen med pa'i phyir//'jig rten skye 'gag chos la tshod myi gzugs//byang chub sems ni rkyen gyis mi bskyed pas/
75b7(rgyud): 'jig rten rkyen bskang chos la dpe mi len//kye sems dpa' chen po//che ba 'dod nas bsgom bsgrub rtsol byed pa//bsgom bsgrub btsa lo bas che ba de mi 'grub//che b.rang 'byung
76a1(rgyud): yau nas che ba yin//bsgoms na sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'chos pa yin//sangs rgyas dgongs pa gang zhig 'chos byed pa//de yis sangs rgyas thams
76a2(rgyud): cad sbyangs pa yin//de yis sangs rgyas spongs pa ma yin to//de yis rang gi byang chub sems spangs pas/rang gi rang bzhin bskal por phrad mi 'gyur//kye sems dpa'
76a3(rgyud): chen po//sems kyis ting 'dzin sgom pa ma byed cig/ye shes yul la rtog par ma byed cig/ngag gis 'dza ba dang snying po bzla mi dgos//lag gis 'dud byed phyag rgya
76a4(rgyud): bca' mi dgos//sems kyi ting 'dzin 'phro 'du las ma byed//ngang la gnus pas g.yos med lhun gyis grub//rang bzhin gnas pas sus kyang bco su med//mr-i bcol
76a5(rgyud): ji bzhin pa ru gnas pa des//bya ba med pa las kyi mchog tu bstan//don de rtogs pas las rnams mi byed de//las ma byas pas de bzhin nyid du gnas//de bzhin nyid
76a6(rgyud): la gang zhig su gnas pa//de yis ma nor ma bcos 'grub par 'gyur//de ni ma nor bzhin ni ma bcos yin//nyid ni ma nor ngo bo nyid la bya//de bzhin nyid las sangs
76a7(rgyud): rgyas chos med do zhes gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las phrin las btsal du med pa'i le'u ste zhi bdun pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi
76b1(rgyud): sems kun byed rgyal po des/chos thams cad gan ma kun byed nyid yin par zhal gyis bzhes pa 'di gsungaso//kye sems dpa' tshon pa nyan cig/kun bya dang ni kun gyi byang chub
76b2(rgyud): sems//byang chub sems ni ches kun gzhi ma ste//kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum las//phun sum tshogs pa'i dgos ba kun kyang tshang //rang bzhin gsum ni 'di ltar
76b3(rgyud): shes par bya//skye ba med dang 'gag pa med pa dang //mi 'grog skye ba'i cho 'phrulnga 'byung ba gsum//gsum ni phun sum tshogs par bstan pa yin//ma skyes skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin
76b4(rgyud): las//chos kyi gzhi ma bstan pa phun sum chags//su bsgrib so ma bkag yi rang bzhin las//ston pa gsum gyi rang bzhin phun sum tshogs//ma skyos skyo ba'i cho 'phrul ngo ngo
76b5(rgyud): las//'khor gyi rang bzhin rnam gsum phun sum tshogs//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/nga yi rang bzhin chos nyid gcig pu la//nga ma 'ag gos po'i ston pa rnam gsum
76b6(rgyud): gyis//skye ba'i cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i 'khor gsum las//nga yi chos nyid de bzhin nyid gcig la//rtogs par bya ba'i thabs kyi go zhi ma drug/lta ba chos nyid mthong ba'i gzhi
76b7(rgyud): ma byed//des ni mthob par bya ba'i thabs yin te//ma skyes dmigs par bya ba'i yul med pas//bltas pas de bzhin nyid la mthong ba med//dam tshig rang skyon sel
77a1(rgyud): n+d+ha ts+tsha//man pa chud med mas son//de bzhan rnye lce bslad par sprul me pas//bslangs smras na ts+tsho ste pa dang/
77a2(rgyud): las nA~M prA par byed pa'i gang+gA ma byung //bcol bas grub par byed pa'i thabs sbyin /de bzhin nyid la btsal po yul myed pas//de bzhin nyid la las kyi grub pa rnyed/
77a3(rgyud): lam gyis bgrod pas phyin pa gzhi ma byung //ngas ni gnas phyin pa'i thabs yin te//de bzhin nyid la lam gyis bzod med phyir//bgrod pas phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid
77a4(rgyud): yin//sa ni gnas par byed pa'i gzham byed//des ni snang mi dwags pa'i thabs yin te//de bzhin nyid la thams cad kun gnas pas//gnas par bya ba'i sa la skyed du med
77a5(rgyud): ye shes rtogs par byed pa'i gzhom byed//des ni chos nyid dag pa'i thabs yin te//de bzhin nyid kyi rdzogs bya'i yi'i med pas//rang 'byung ye shes yul la rtog pa
77a6(rgyud): nga //rgyu sems dpa' chen ba nyon cog/byung chub sems ni chos kyi gzhi yin pas//ga gis sa lta spyod drug drug gis//sgra 'bris ltos pa'i labar
77a7(rgyud): bstan pas//der rang 'thad bsam par re los//lha spyod gzhi ma drug la btsal byas kyang //de bzhin nyid la bcil ba'i yul med pas//btsal las de bzhin nyid la
77b1(rgyud): bcos pa'i phyir//rang sems gzhi ma btsos mod de mi phrad//kyo sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/lta ba bsgom du med ces bstan pa ni//chos kyi rtsa ba rung las med pa'i phyir///
77b2(rgyud): rang gi rang la blta ru med pa'i phyir//rang med yul ning yis bstan pa med//des na lta ba bsgom du med ces bstan//dam tshig bsrung du med ces bstan pa ni//bsrung bas mi thub
77b3(rgyud): rang gi sems mi khegs//rang 'byung ye shes yin par bsrung du med//kye phrin las btsal du med ces bstan pa ni//rdzogs chen sgyu 'bras ye nas 'das pa'i phyir//phrin
77b4(rgyud): las rgyu las bsgrubs nas 'bras bur 'dod//rdzogs chen 'bras bu 'dod pa med pa ni//phri ni las btsal du med ces bstan pa yin//lam la bgrong du med ces bstan pa
77b5(rgyud): ni//kye dus gsum sangs rgyas khams gsum sems can la//bgrad pa byang chub sems kyi lam la bgrod//semasu sangs rgyas sems can gnyi su med//des na
77b6(rgyud): sems kyis sems la lam bgrod med//sa la spyad du med ces bstan pa ni//chos dbyings byang chub seMs kyis 'di la/sbyangs pas thob par 'dod pa rgyu 'bras can//chos nyid byung
77b7(rgyud): chub sems kyis 'di la//sbyangs bcos byas grub srong ni ngas ma bstan//ye shes yul la mi rtog zhes bstan pa//yul de ye nas rang 'byung ye shes te//ye shes
78a1(rgyud): la ni ye shes yul ma mchis zhes gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la sna chos thams cad kyi gzhi ma kun byed nyid yin par bstan pa
78a2(rgyud): le'u skye zhe brgyad pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des thams cad nga lo gnas pa'i sa 'di bstan te//kye sems dpa' chen po//kun byed rgyal
78a3(rgyud): po de nyid ni//kun gyi byang chub snying por gnas//byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni//chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang ste//dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang //khams gsuM
78a4(rgyud): sems can thams cad kun//klong chen sems kyi gnas de na//mi gnas pa ni gcig kyang med//kun gyi gnas dang sa yin te//'du 'bral med par de na bzhugs//de la
78a5(rgyud): sbyangs zhing bgrod mi dgos//de la sbyangs te bgrod 'gyur na//rang gi sems de 'chos pa ste//bcas pas rang sems 'byongs mi 'gyur//de ni spris kun gyi gnas//kyi sems
78a6(rgyud): dpa' chen po nyon cig/nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis//rgyu 'bras dga' ba'i 'khor rnams la//sa mdo rnam pa gsum bstan to//bskyed pa'i sa dang spyod pa'i
78a7(rgyud): sa//bsgrub pa'i sa dang gsum bstan te//bskyed pa'i sa ru sems pa zhi bskyed//spyod pa'i sa ru sems slod bcus//bsgrub pa'i sa ru grub 'dod pos//de ni drang ba'i
78b1(rgyud): lung du bstan pa'i phyir//yang dag ngas par lung ma bstan//yang dag nges par nga yi lung 'di nyon//byang chub sems la rgyu rkyen mod pa'i phyir//bskyed pa'i sa ru byang chub sems
78b2(rgyud): mi bskyed//bskyed po'i sa ru byang chub sems bskyed na//chos dbyings na mkha' byang chub sems mi shong //dge sdig las la dran pa dbang sgyur bas//phyi yul chos nyid spangs
78b3(rgyud): pas mi spongs te//rang 'byung ma shes mi khegs bzhin du 'gegs//rang 'byung ye shes yul la mi rtog bzhin//bzung dang 'dzin pa yod ces 'joms par byed//ngas
78b4(rgyud): na byang chub sems la skyes pa med//spyod pa'i sa ru byang chub bcu spyad pas//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun//byang chub sems la g.yos pa med pa ni//na mkha'
78b5(rgyud): lta bu'i chos nyid snang por zad//nam kho'i la ni g.yos pa rdul tsam med//de bzhin byang chub sems la g.yos pa med//grub pa'i sa ru byang chub grub 'dod pa//kun tu
78b6(rgyud): 'di dang ma chags pad+ma'i spyan//rdo rje 'dzin dang stug po bkod pa dang //'khor lo chags chen rdo rje 'chang ba dang //rgyu 'bras kun bzang dbye ba mengs drang //byang chub bsgrub pa
78b7(rgyud): sa ru ming btags pa//sems kyi rang bzhin rgyu rkyen bral ba'i phyir//bsgrubs pas grub pa'i 'bras bu ngas ma bstan//sems kyi rang bzhin drug snang bstan pa yin//
79a1(rgyud): sems kyi rlung bzhin drug ni 'di lta ste//rang 'byung yo shes ma 'gags pa yI rtags//dbang po sgo lnga kun tu gsal ba la//kun tu 'od kyis
79a2(rgyud): zhes btabs pa yin//yul la mi rtog chags pa med pa la//ma chags pad+ma spyan du btags pa yin//skye 'jig med pa'i byang chub sems de la//rdo rje 'dzin pa
79a3(rgyud): zhe su nga yis btags//rang gi rang bzhin chos nyid dpag med la//rang 'byung yo shes mi rtog mnyam par bkod//stug po bkod pa'i sa zhes btags pa yin//
79a4(rgyud): byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin dkyil 'khod de//rang la gnas pa'i chos rnams thams cad lnga//yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen sa rnams te//sku gsung thugs la skye
79a5(rgyud): bo 'jig med pas//rdo rje 'chang gi sa zhes bshad pa yin//byang chub sems la rgyu 'bras gnyis myed de//sems las byung ba'i chos rnams thams cad la//bzang ngan
79a6(rgyud): blang dod yi nas med pa'i phyir//dbye ba med pa'i sa zhes nga yi so bshad//des na byang chub sems kyi chos dbyings la//dus gsum sangs rgyas khams gsum sems
79a7(rgyud): can kun//de nas 'byung zhing de ru gnas pa'i phyir//chos dbyings byang chub sems ni kun spyod sa zhes gsungaso//sangs rgyas sgrub pa'i sa zhes btags pa de//byang
79b1(rgyud): chub sems kyi rang bzhin de las ni//gang bu shwad bzhin du byang chub sems la gnas shes sbyang du myed pa'i sa bstan to//byang chub kyi sems kun byang rgyal po las
79b2(rgyud): rdzogs pa chen po'i sa la sbyang du med pa'i le'u ste zho dgu pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des byang chub kyi sems rang byung ba'i ye shes la sgrub pa med
79b3(rgyud): pa 'di gsung so//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ye shes ye shes zhes bya ba//ye shes ye nas shes pa yin//rang 'byung ye shwas ye nas shes//yul la rtog pa'i ye shes
79b4(rgyud): dwe/yul las byung bas rang 'byung min//yul med tsam na gsal ma byed//des na rang byung ye shes de//ye nas shes pa'i ye shes yin//ye shes zhes ni dri la bya//'khor
79b5(rgyud): g+hi ston pa'i ye shes ni//yul la brtags pa'i ye shes de//gang su yul la rtog byed pa//de ni rig byed ye shes yin//rig par bya ba'i yul de ni//byang chub sems las byung
79b6(rgyud): ba'i phyir//de ni yul med byang chub sems//ye shes rang las byung ba'i phyir//de la ting 'dzin sgom mi byed//ting 'dzin sgom pa mi byed pas//ting 'dzin bag chags sogs mi 'gyeb//
79b7(rgyud): bko tshogs med pa'i chos nyid do//dus gsum sangs rgyas dgongs par bshad//dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//dgongs pa'i yul la me rtog ste//mnyam pa nyid
80a1(rgyud): du ye nas gnas//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//rang byung ye shes thugs de la//ye nas rtogs pa med pa'i
80a2(rgyud): byir//sangs rgyas dgongs pa mi mdzad de//rtog pa'i yul ni kun dang bral//shin tu rnal 'byor gang zag gang //su yang rung ba de yis ni//rtog pa med la gnas gyur na//
80a3(rgyud): dI nI sang+yas rgyas dgongs pa mdzad//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/rang byung ye shes spangs rgyas dgongs pa mdzad//rang 'byung ye shes yul la myi rtog pas//rnam par
80a4(rgyud): rtog pa'i bag chags gos mi 'gyu//las ni ting 'dzin btags pa'i bag tshogs yin//mi rtog pa la bag chags yod ma gsungs//mi rtog pa yi rang 'byung ye shes
80a5(rgyud): lnga//sems kyi rang bzhin dbang po sgo lngar bshad//rang 'byung ye shes de la 'gag pa med//byang chub sems kyi ngo bo mngon snang la//rang 'byung ye shes mi 'grag so sngor
80a6(rgyud): gsal//rang gi rkyen gyis snang bas dror mi byed//ting 'dzin mi rtog bag chags sog mi 'gyur//'di yang dus gsum sangs rgyas dgongs pa mdzad//gang du mi rtog 'di la
80a7(rgyud): su gnas la//ngal mi gnas 'gro ba'i don mi gnas//chos sku byang chub sems la 'di gnas te//dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus//kye sems dpa'
80b1(rgyud): chen po cig don da //rig pa nyamasu mngon sum rtog par gyis//rang 'byung ye shes yul la lngar gnas pa//ye shes lnga ni yul lnga 'dod ma yin//yul 'dod ldan yo shes lha la
80b2(rgyud): snang //yul de yi nas ye shes yin pa'i phyir//yul dang ye shes gnyi su dus me bstani//des na yul yang rang 'byung ye shes yin//rang 'byung ye shes gtsug las med
80b3(rgyud): pA lA//da las byung ba'i 'khor gyi ston pa yin//yul la bsten nas yA shes ming btags pa//rnam pa grangs kyi ye shes byung ba ni//rnam brtags pa yi ye shes gcig
80b4(rgyud): glis ni//yul cig rang bzhin so sngor snang ba la//yul can la ni yul gyi ming btags pa//de ni nges pa ma yin 'khrul pas btags//kun byed nga yi rang 'byung ye shes
80b5(rgyud): min//kun byed nga yi rang bzhin gcig pu lA//'khor gyi 'dod pa rnams kyis ming btags pa//la las byang chub sem su ming btags la//l-i las chos kyi dbyingasu ming
80b6(rgyud): yang btags//la las na mkha'i khamasu ming yang btags//lA las rang 'byung yo shes ming yang btags//lA las chos kyi sku ru ming yang btags//la las longs
80b7(rgyud): spyod rdzogs par ming yang btags//la las sprul pa'i sku ru ming yang btags//la las sku gsung thugasu ming yang btags//la las thams cad mkhyen par ming
81a1(rgyud): yang btwAd s+ya/la las rnam pa thams cad mong yang btugs//la las yo shes pazhi dang gsum du byargyags//la ltas yo shes sngon ming gags /
81a2(rgyud): lalus dpying sa dang ye shes med btags pa//rang 'byung byeng chub sems ni gcig la btags//rlung b+h+ya nga la mthing tshad smras pa yin zhes pasmrang so//khyu dzum+bu gyis
81a3(rgyud): kun byed rgyal po las rang 'byung ye shes bstan pa'i le'u spyi lnga bcu pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des rdzogs pa chen po'i lam la bgrod du med
81a4(rgyud): pa 'od gsung so//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/kun byed rgyal po du ni byang chub sems//byang chub sems ni kun gyi lam chen te//gnas dang yul dang sangs rgyas so dang
81a5(rgyud): gsum//gzhan ni med de 'di na rang bzhin gnas//chos kyi dbyings dang chos nyid 'di na gnas//na mkha'i khams dang gzhal yas 'di na gnas//sangs rgyas sa dang yul
81a6(rgyud): ni byang chub sems//gzhan du bgrod pa rje lam dang gnas mod de//bzod pas na mkha'i lam la phyin pa med//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/lam la bgrod pa yod
81a7(rgyud): par lung ston pa//ji las byung ba'i ston de sku gsum gyis//bgrod pa'i lam ni lnga dang gsum bstan te//de la bgrod pas phyin par 'dod pa ni//rgyu dang 'bras bu thab
81b1(rgyud): par 'dod yon na//rdzogs tshun bskyod du mad dang mo mthun//tshogs dang skor bsgom mthong skyob pa ltar//gas blaHsa bsags nas gzung 'dzin gnyis tshams te//blaskams
81b2(rgyud): pas rjes mthong thob pa'i 'bras bu de//bai phred du med po'i lam dang mi phyed pas//bde chen rtsol sgrub 'das pa ming mi phrag/'bras bu bya sing bar bstan pa lam gsum no//
81b3(rgyud): bzhin nyid dung kun tu smang la sogs//sgra gsu m+b+ha mAM zhes goms par bsgoms pa des//rang 'byung chos la rgyu 'bras basbyin bsgrub gdas//bskyod pas sgrol sgrub 'das
81b4(rgyud): sa mi phyin//rang sems spros bral chos kyi dbyings yin pas//spros bral de na sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs//de bas lam la bgrod par ma byed cig/rang sems ma
81b5(rgyud): bsgribaso na mkha' bzhin du gsal//de na dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs//de bas lAm la bgrod par ma byed cig/rang sems mo bcos chos nyid ji bzhin
81b6(rgyud): ga/de la dus gsum sangs rgyas lhun gyis grub//de bas lam la bgrod par ma byed cig/gal te ma rig lam la bgrod gyur na//phyin pa'i dus med rtogs thob dus med de//
81b7(rgyud): bgrod pas sangs rgyas sa ru phyin pa med//sangs rgyas rang sems rtog pa bral ba yin//bgrod pas rang sems rtog bral der mi byin//lta ba bsgoms pas ting 'dzin
82a1(rgyud): yul dang phrad//ting 'dzin de yis rtog bral mnya ma dang bral dam tshig bsrungs pas ma nyams 'dzin la gnas//mA nyams 'dzin pas rtog med mnyam
82a2(rgyud): dang bral//phrin las btsal bas grub pa'i ting 'dzin byed//grub pa'i ting 'dzin mi rtog mnyam dang bral//sa la sbyangs pas gnas pa'i ting 'dzin byed//'byongs pa'i ting
82a3(rgyud): 'dzin rtog med mnyam dang bral//chos nyid btags pos gsal ba'i ting 'dzin byed//tIng 'dzin gsal byas rtog med mAnyamra dang bral//ye shes gsal bar rtogs
82a4(rgyud): pa'i ting 'dzin byed//gsal bar rtogs pa'i ting 'dzin mi rtog bral//kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/'dod pa'i ting 'dzin ji ltar gsal ba des//'dod pa med pa bde
82a5(rgyud): bla grub par byed//bye bral zin pa'i bde ba chen po de//mi rtog 'dod pa med pa de yis blangs//ting 'dzin mi byed bag chags mi sdog pas//rang 'byung ye shes las
82a6(rgyud): kyi dbang mi 'gyur//rang 'byung ye shes chos sku'i snying po de//btsAl bas mi 'grub rang bzhin gnas pas 'grub//grub par bya ba'i don rnams kun dang bral//don zhes
82a7(rgyud): bya ba'i ming ci mi btags pa yin//yang dag nyid du sangs rgyas ming tsam yin//sangs rgyas ming du 'dogs par byed pa ni//nges pa'i lung med drang ba'i lung du bstan//
82b1(rgyud): de las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis//chos dang sangs rgyas dge 'dun dkon mchog gsum//yod par ming btags de gnyen bsgrub pa ru//nga las byung blo'i 'khor ni sems
82b2(rgyud): can la//bde yo skyed do sdug bsngal der blangs nas//'di las ma gtogs pa yi bde ba ni//gzhan med zer nas lta spyod sna tshogasde pa//spyad pas grub pa'i lung 'di bstan
82b3(rgyud): pa yin//bya med kun byed nga yi lung ma yin zhes gsungaso//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las lam la bgrod du med pa'i le'u stong gcig pa'o////
82b4(rgyud): de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des bya med rdzogs po 'dod pa med pa 'di gsungs so//kye sems dpa' chen po//chos rnams thams cad grub 'dod na//'dod
82b5(rgyud): pa'i sa ni ma sgrub cig/'dod par byed pa'i sems de ni//mi len thams cad spong ba yin//'di ni rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i phyir//'bras bu 'dod nas rgya mi sgrub//mI rtog rang
82b6(rgyud): bzhin gnas pas 'grub//'dod pa'i ting 'dzin thams cad spong //'dod med thams cad len par byed//ting 'dzin pas 'dod pa 'dzin//'dod pa de ni yang dag mina?//
82b7(rgyud): yang dag gzung du yod ma yin//byas pa'i las ni thams cad kyis//ma bcol lhun gyis grub pa sgrub//ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa de//byas pas grub pa ma yin te//
83a1(rgyud): ma byas ye nus lhun b+his grub/'dod pas thams cad kun spungs pas//grub pad+ma byed pa'i glegasu tshwa//'dod pa'i ting 'dzin bag chags des//
83a2(rgyud): bag chags des ni sems 'dzin yin//'dzin pas bde ba de spod byed//mi 'dzin bde ba kun len+da pas//ji bzhin pa yi rang bzhino//ji bzhin bcos pa med pa de//sangs
83a3(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa gcig/bde ba che las ma gtogs po//'dod dang 'dzin pa ga lo yod//mi bla nas pA la dmigs pa med//mi rtog pa la 'dzin pa med//med pa
83a4(rgyud): don gyi snying po de//'dod pa med pas thob par 'gyur//gang la 'dzin chags med pa des//ting 'dzin te 'dzin pa'i mchog/kun zin ye nas grub zin pas//gtang gzhag
83a5(rgyud): mi rtog grub pa'i rgyal//kye sems dpa' chen po sna tshogs bsgoms pas gicig mi gsal//gsal ba ting 'dzin gang byed pa//de la'ang ting 'dzin yod ma yin//de
83a6(rgyud): bzhin nyid gcig po la//sangs rgyas sems can gnyi su phye//bde dang sdug bsngal gnyis phye nas//bde ba dang du blang lung bstan//sdig pa rgyab tu bor lung bstan//de
83a7(rgyud): ni nges pa'i lung dang 'gal//kye sems dpa' chen po//gcig la gnyisu ma 'byed cig/bde ba sdug bsngal byang chub gcig/sangs rgyas sems can sems su
83b1(rgyud): gcog/snang srid snod bcud chos nyid gcig/bdon brdzun gnyis kyang chos nyid many+dzum//bdo ba ma ljon sdug ma spyod//rang bzhon gnas pas kun kyang 'gyug//ba la rgyags
83b2(rgyud): pa sdug bsngal yin//kun gsal da la rtog med pas//do ni rang 'byung ye shes yin//ye shes bag chags mi sogs pas//las kyis gos parA ga la 'byu/
83b3(rgyud): rgyu 'bris ye shes ting 'dzin rtag/rtog pa'i ye shes bag chags can//ye shes bag chags dbang bsgyur bas//rtog pa'i ye shes bsgom mi bya//rtog pa'i ye shes
83b4(rgyud): bsgom byas pas//mi rtog mnyam dang bral bar 'gyur//ting 'dzin rtsol ba'i nad kyis zin//kye sems dpa' chen po//kun byed nga ni byang chub sems//thams cad byang chub
83b5(rgyud): sems yin la//byang chub sems las thams cad med//sems las sprulnga pa'i chos ni sna tshogs te//sna tshogs sbrel po cir yang snang ba ni//sems can gzu
83b6(rgyud): dang dbyibs dang kha dog dang //ji ltar snang ba de la dad pa re//dad pa de yis 'thad po'i chos ston pa di nI ye shos thugs rje sprul par bshad//de yang rang bzhin chos la g.yas
83b7(rgyud): pa med//sangs rgyas rang bzhin chas la g.yos med pas//dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyi chos nyid yin//chos nyid las ni sangs rgyas gud na med//sangs rgyas
84a1(rgyud): las ni sems can gud na med//sems can mi rtog sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin//byang chub sems ma byung gi bar du ni//sangs rgyas dang ni sems
84a2(rgyud): can+da gnyis kra med//de bas sangs rgyas kun pas sems nyid bsngags//sems nyid mi 'gyur 'gyur ba yi nas med//chos nyid bsgyur bas g.yos pa rdul med par//
84a3(rgyud): gcig la rim pa dgu dang brgyad khri stang //'byed pa'i ston pas gcig gi don mi rtogs//gcig ma rtogs pas kun don rtogs mi 'a gyur//des na sems gcig don
84a4(rgyud): de rab tu rtogs zhes gsungs//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las ma g.yos 'dod pa med pa'i le'u steng gnyis pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems
84a5(rgyud): kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad g.yos pa med pa 'di gsungaso//kye sems dpa' chen po de rtogs shig/nga rtogs chos rtogs g.yos pa med//kun byed rgyal
84a6(rgyud): po ston po de nyid ni//byang chub sems la g.yos pa med pa de//thams cad byang chub sems las g.yos med cing //rang 'byung ye shes rgyu rkyen med pa de//rgyu dang 'bras
84a7(rgyud): bu kun las shin tu rgyal//rgyu 'bras theg pa can la shin tu gsang //ma skyes rdo rje chos kyi dbyings na rgyal//rgyu 'bras can la mi sgra shin tu gsang //sems nyid
84b1(rgyud): ma 'gags na mkha'i dbyings na rgyul//rgyu 'byas can la mi smra shin tu gsang //snad srid snod bcud mad ces chos nyid rgyu la//rgyu 'das can la mi sku shin tu gsang //nam/kha
84b2(rgyud): rlu chus mi snang ba la//byang chub sems kyang bod shin tu rgyu la//rgyu 'bras can la mi skye shin tu gusad//khams gsu mi drug gsum thugs ya~M shAswA
84b3(rgyud): bras can+d+ra laM myi skye shin tu gsang //byang chub sems kyi rang bzhi ni kun byed la//ma yil ma shrI rang bzhin zhi ba med//chos dbyed sa rang bzhin skyes med zhi ba de//ba~M yul
84b4(rgyud): ma ni rang bzhin spros pa med//rang 'byung ye shes ma bsgribs glasal ba de//mkha' lam yal ma zhi zhi ba med//snang srid snod banod chos nyid rang bzhin te//mu yA la ma ni
84b5(rgyud): rang bzhin zhi ba med//chos rnams thams cad ma ya lA ma bri ba//rang bzhin gsal te ngo blo g.yos pa med//g.yos med chos la rgyu 'bras sgrub byed pa//de ni nga yi lung
84b6(rgyud): smin 'dang lung yin//nga ni 'did pa med pas kun grub ste//mi 'dang 'dod pa med par rang bzhin 'grub//grub ces bye ba du y-is smras pa med//rgyu 'bras grub 'dod rnams kyi
84b7(rgyud): tshig tu'i//de ni sgo dang skur ba'i sgra ru che//yod dang med dang grub dang ma grub dang //sgro dang skyur pa thams cad kun//mi rtog pas ni mnyam pa nyid du gnas//mnyam pa nyid las
85a1(rgyud): sgyu sa na // rgyun rnams ngas sugasas//sngags smra gos sus spya pa s+ho//
85a2(rgyud): na ldan // la byams pas 'ad sgyu spyod pa na// ses su gzhan rlol bung byung ba y-i//de sa kyi dbye sa dang lce'i mas/
85a3(rgyud): da pa Sh+Ta k+Sha smra/ ma zhin gnas pa / sems nanapa / sa
85b1(rgyud): che ba'i yul la rang bzhin gnas//rang bzhin ma bcos pa yi ming yin la//che ba ma btsos bya la lam zhes brjod//sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs dang ni//sems can
85b2(rgyud): rnams kyi lus ngag yid gsum la//bzang ngan che chung khyad par yod ma gsungs//mi rtog chos nyid mnyam pa nyid du gnas//mnyam pas chos dang chos min gcig kyang med///
85b3(rgyud): sems can rgyu med sangs rgyas 'bras bu med//rgyu 'bras ston pa ston pa nyid lung nor//de bas d+ya las byung ba'i chos mnyam pas//nga las byung ba bzang ngan med mnyam gcig ces
85b4(rgyud): bsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin g.yos pa med pa'i le'u steng gsum pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal
85b5(rgyud): po des nyid kyi rang bzhin rang 'byung gri ye shes yin la/rang 'byung gi ye shes de don gyi ngo bo lnga dang ldan te gang zhe na/don chos thams cad 'byung ba'i snying po dang //don ma nor nges
85b6(rgyud): pa'i ngo bo dang don rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i ngo bo dang /don byar med po'i ngo bo dang /don chos thams cad gtan la 'bebs pa'i ngo bo dang lnga'o//de la rang 'byung gi ye shes de la sdus pa'i
85b7(rgyud): mdo lung ni lnga/phyi ba'i mdo lung ni lnga bcu rtsa bdun po 'di gsungaso//kye sems dpa' chen po don 'di nyon cig//kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems nga ni//rang 'byung ye shes
86a1(rgyud): /chen po gcig la ni//rang 'byung ye shes sdus pa lnga las no//phye ba'i mdo lung lnga bcu rtsa bdun te//nga yi da bo lnga bcu rtsa bdun yin//de yi ngo bo ji ltar yin
86a2(rgyud): zhe na//ye shes ngo bo chos kyi snying po las//mngon du phyung ba'i ma do lung bcu yang bstan//ye shes mnor nges pa'i ngo bo las//ma nor nges pa'i mdo lung bcu yang bstan//ye
86a3(rgyud): shes rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i ngo bo las//rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i mdo lung bcu yang 'byung //ye shes bya ba med pa'i ngo bo las//bya med rdzogs pa'i mdo lung bcu yang 'byung //
86a4(rgyud): ye shes gtan la 'bebs pa'i ngo bo las//gtan la 'bebs pa'i mdo lung bcu yang 'byung //sems nyid ye shes ngo bo rnam lda las//mdo lung bcu tshan rnam pa lnga byung
86a5(rgyud): ni//rang bzhin ngo bo yid ches lnga bstan yin//bdun ni nges par bstan pa'i le'u bdun gyis//gcig gis gzhi bstan gcig gis gdams pa bstan//lnga yis so so
86a6(rgyud): dgos pa lnga yang bstan//de yi don gyi bye brag bstan pa ni//dbang po chos nyid mthong bar bya ba'i phyir//mngon du phyung ba'i mdo lung bcu yang bstan//yin min yid ches
86a7(rgyud): rtog pa gsal ba'i phyir//ma nor nges pa'i mdo lung bcu yang bstan//kun byed rgyal po'i rang 'byung ye shes de//rgyu rkyen dag la rag ma las pa'i phyir//rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i
86b1(rgyud): mdo lung bcu yang dAstan//kun byed rgyal po'i rang 'byung ye shes des//bya byed rtsol sgrub bya mi dgos pa'i phyir//bya mod rdzogs pa'i mdo lung bcu yang bstan//kun byed rgyal
86b2(rgyud): po'i rang 'byung ye shes des//nyid kyi rang bzhin gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir//gtan la 'bebs pa'i med lung bcu yang bstan//de la don byed dgros pa lnga yod de//chos nyid
86b3(rgyud): mngon du phyung ba'i mdo lung la//chos nyid mngon du mthong ba'i dgos pa yod//chos nyid ma nor mngon du ma thob pa des//lta spyod dam tshig la la bgrod mi dgos//ma nor nges par ston
86b4(rgyud): pa'i mdo lung la//ma nor yid ches nges pa'i dgos pa yod//sems nyid ma nor yid ches mngon pa des//sangs rgyas bsgrub mi dgos pa'i dgos pa yod//rgyu rkyen rag ma lus
86b5(rgyud): pa'i mdo lung la/rtsol sgrub bya mi dgos pa'i yon tan yod//rtsol zhing sgrub pa bya mi dgos pa des//mi rtso lo bde la gnas pa'i dgos pa yod//bya med rdzogs pa'i mdo
86b6(rgyud): lung bstan pa la//ma byas rong bzhin rdzogs pa'i dgos pa yod//bya med rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i dgos pa des//ye nas lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i dgos pa yod//gtan la
86b7(rgyud): 'bebs pa'i mdo lung bstan pa las//dus gsum sangs rgyas khams gsum sems can dang //snang dri rnyed bcus bsdus pa thams cad kun//rgyu med nges pa rang 'byung
87a1(rgyud): bya med pa pa/mdo lung lnga dang mthun par gtan la 'bebs//gtang+gA la 'bebs pa'i mad rtsa bstan pa ni//dus gsum sangs rgyas dang par lung bstan pa
87a2(rgyud): chos nyid na mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin la//lnga phyi dus gsum lta ba'i sems can rnams//phye ba dran med lnga pa dag chags 'gags//sems can na mkha'i chos nyid mi shes
87a3(rgyud): mthong //sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bya'i ngos tshig ni//chos nyid byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin lnga//spros med dbyibs dang dbang po'i spyod yul sangs//nam mkha' bzhin du
87a4(rgyud): kun la khyab cing rgyos//sangs rgyas ming du btags pa nga yis med//khams zhes bya ba'i gtan tshig bstan pa ni//mang zhing rgya che ba yi mtshan nyid de//khams gsum
87a5(rgyud): sems can gcog gi dbang po lis//dpag gis mi lang bas na khams shes btogs//yang dag nges par med du btags pa med//sems shes bya ba'i des tshig
87a6(rgyud): bstan pa ni//rgyu rkyen med pa'i rang 'byung ye shes des//ma 'gags kun la dbang po sgo lngar gsal//de la sems shes bya bar gsal bar bshad//snang srid snod bcud
87a7(rgyud): bsdus pa thams cad kun//skye ba med las cho 'phrul snang ba de//sna tshogs srid pas snang srid ce su btags//snod dang bcud ces bya bar bstan pa ni//'byung lnga snod kyi
87b1(rgyud): mya nang na rgyud rtsub bcud//gnas pas snod bcud tsesu btags pa yin//kyar byong bya ba lhag ma mA lus pa//bslus pas kun byeng rgyal po'i rang bzhin lngar//pad lung lnga bcu rtsa bdun
87b2(rgyud): byung nas bsdus//kun byed rang bzhin ldi ru 'dres par bstan//snying po mngon du 'byin pa'i rang bzhin dang //ma nir nges par ston po'o rang bzhin dang //rang 'byung rgya 'bras 'das pa
87b3(rgyud): rang bzhin dang //bya byed rtsol sgrub 'das pa'i rang bzhin dang //mthun par gtan la 'bebs pa'i rang bzhin dang lnga'o zhes gsung so//kye snyan pa kun byed rgyal po lags/
87b4(rgyud): sems dpa' rdo rje bdag gi reg pa yis//kun byed rang 'byung ye shes gcag de la//dgos pa phun sum chags pa lnga byung ste//rang 'byung ye shes chos kyi snying po las//snang
87b5(rgyud): zhing srid pa'i chos rnams thams cad kun//ma snang ba la mngon du 'byin nus pas//ches kyi snying po yin par yid kyang chos//rang 'byung ye shes gcig gi ngo bo de//don dam kun/
87b6(rgyud): rdzob badren brdzun gnyis med par//ma ner nges pa'i byang chub sems ston pas//the tsom su mo nyi med par yid kyang ches//rang 'byung ye shes gcig gi ngo bo de//rgyu la mi rten
87b7(rgyud): rkyen la mi sgrub pas//gzhan la rag ma las pa'i rang bzhin gyis//rang 'byung ye shes yin par yid kyang ches//rang 'byung ye shes gcig gi ngo bo de//rgyu rkyen med par ldan
88a1(rgyud): gyis grub pa'i phyir//phrin las btsal zhing bya byed bya mi dgos//ma btsal lhun gyis grub par yid kyang ches//rang 'byung ye shes gcig gi dro ngo
88a2(rgyud): de//rang 'byung ye shes ye nas ma bsgribs pas//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad gsal//chos rnams thams cad gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir//ston pa'i skyon
88a3(rgyud): ma yin par yid kyang ches shes gsungs//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las mdo lung thams cad kun byed nyid kyi rang bzhin du bsdus nas bstan pa'i le'u ste nga ba zhi
88a4(rgyud): pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad byang chub sems las gzhan med pa'i mad+mo 'di gsungs//kyai sems dpa' chen
88a5(rgyud): po nyon cig/ji ltar snang srid snod bcud bsdus pa dang //don dang tshig tu brjod pa thams cad kun//byang chub sems yin pa ni 'di lta ste//chos kyi dbyings dang na mkha'i
88a6(rgyud): khams 'di yang //ma spros mi bsgribs pa yi byang chub sems//'di las gzhan yin bdag gis gsungs pa med//na mkha' rlung chus mo snang ba yang //byang
88a7(rgyud): chub sems kyi ngo bo bstan pa yin//'dod kha mos gzugs khams gzugs med khams gsum yang //byang chub sems kyi ngo bo gsum snang yin//de
88b1(rgyud): ston pa yi ston pa sku gsum yang //byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin rnam gsum yin//sems nyid ye shes ma 'gags 'dod khams snang //sems nyid ngo bo snang ba gzugs
88b2(rgyud): kyi khams//sems ni rang bzhin mo skyes gzugs med khams//rang bzhin ma skyes spros bral chos kyi sku//sems nyid nyid la nyid spyod ljongs spyod rdzogs//sems
88b3(rgyud): las sems sprul sems kyi don mdzad sprul//dmyal ba la sogs 'gro ba ris drug go//chu gling bkres skom blan lcags ltung 'gyur rnams//me rtog mnyam pas rje bzhin
88b4(rgyud): chos nyid grol//rang 'byung ye shes yul la mi rtog pas//las kyi bag chags skyon yon kun dang bral//yon tan mi len skyon rnams mi dar byas//bde ba mi sgrub
88b5(rgyud): sdug bsngal spang du med//ji bzhin pa tra ye nas g.yos pa med//de bzhin bsgyur bas 'gyur ba'i chos gung med//'dod pas ljon pas thob pa'i chos kyang med//chos
88b6(rgyud): rnams rang bzhin 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ni//sems las rang 'byung ye shes 'a byung ba 'dra//'dra zhes ming btags rang 'byung ye shes yin//rang 'byung ye shes chos
88b7(rgyud): nyid yul gcig la//chos gzhan mthong nas ye shes de spong byed//rang 'byung ye shes de dang phrad mi 'gyur//spong 'gegs yul can dag la ming mi grag/don dam kun
89a1(rgyud): /rdzob bdon pa rnam gnyis kyis//sbyangs kyang bskal pa gsum gyi bar du rdzogs//dug gsum spyod dang mtshan mod sbyor zhugs nas//byang chub yan lag
89a2(rgyud): kun gyi sgor zhugs nas//cho ga rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin rim pa yis//rang 'byung ye shes tshe bdun par du spangs//thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sgor zhugs nas//skye me
89a3(rgyud): shes rab thabs kyis bskyod 'gyur nas//snad la rang bzhin med par rang bsgoms nas//cho ga lnga dang yo byad yan lag dang //dam tshig tshul dang rab tu brtson 'gyur no//rig
89a4(rgyud): 'dzin sa ste lo stong drug brgya ru//longs su 'dod pa'i ting 'dzin yengs med byed//longs su thob nas rang sems bzod tshol lta//stong phrag gcig na mi rtog mnyam bzod
89a5(rgyud): bad+mad//kyai sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod nyid kyang //nga lung ma nor khyod kyis bston cig/kye sems can lha mi rnams ni shes pa rtsing //dbang po yul la yengs pa'i rang
89a6(rgyud): bzhin gyis//sems can mi shes gang bstan tshim pa la//ma ne nges pa'i lung chen ma bston par//rgyu 'bras drang lung don dam kun rdzob bstan//bden brdzun gnyis
89a7(rgyud): kyis shes pa de tshim nas//bskal pa yun rings bden brdzun gnyis la gnas//de bas dang por rang sems ma nor bstan//bstan pas ma nor btsal med lam phrad
89b1(rgyud): nas//da lta nyid nas ma rtsol sa la gnas//btsal du med pa'i lam dang de phrad 'gyur//ting 'dzin bsgom mi dgos dang de phrad 'gyur//mi brtsol bde la gnas pa de yos
89b2(rgyud): thob//ma nor nges par rang sems de thob pas//ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'i yon tan ni//sems bskyed mi dgos lam le bgrod mi dgos//sa la mi sbyongs lta ba bsgo
89b3(rgyud): mi dgos//sdom pa tshul khrims dam du gnyer mi dgos//kyai sems dpa' chen po lung ston cig/'jig rten mtshan ma'i chos 'di bsgrub pa bzhin//lus kyi las su
89b4(rgyud): bya byed lha mi sgom//dag ge las su sngags dang tshig mi brjod//yid kyi la su ting 'dzin gisal mi dgos zhes gsungaso//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las chos
89b5(rgyud): thams cad byang chub kyi sems las myed pa'i le'u ste dra lnga pa'o////de nas sems dpa' rdo rje des byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po de chos thams cad
89b6(rgyud): kyi ngo ba dang byed pa po yin par nyid kyi 'khor thams cad la tshig sgrags pa drang rtogs pa phul pa 'di bsgragaso//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byeng rgyal po lags//bdag gis
89b7(rgyud): khyod kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa ni//chos rnams thams cad khyod kyi rang bzhin gcig/chos nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang ngo do//kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags//na mkha'i
90a1(rgyud): khams kyi gzhal yas khung 'dri yang //kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags//skyo med chos kyi sgra yi ston pa yang //kun byed rgyal po yin par rab
90a2(rgyud): tu grags//'dod spyod longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku 'di yang //kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags//thugs rje ye shes sprul pa'i sku 'di yang //kun byed rgyal po
90a3(rgyud): yin par rab tu grags//'dod pa'i khams kyi 'dod chags khams 'di yang //kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags//gzugs kyi khams kyi nga rgyal khams 'di yang //
90a4(rgyud): kun byang rgyal po yin par rab tu grags//gzugs med khams kyi yid kyi lus 'di yang //kun byed rgyal pa yin par rab tu grags//snga rabs 'das pa'i sangs
90a5(rgyud): rgyas nyid la gnas pa yang //kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags//da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas don mdzad kyang //kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags//slad kyis
90a6(rgyud): byon pa'i nyid las byung ba yang //kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags//rnal 'byor rnam bzhi nyid la lci ba yang //kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu glags//snang sred snod
90a7(rgyud): bcud 'byung ba lnga bsdus pa//kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags//kun byed rgyal po las ni ma rtogs par//sangs rgyas sems can snang srid snod bcu de dang //chos
90b1(rgyud): /spyo kla sangs bsdus pa tham sa la//kun byud rgyal po las na gzhan mo sdang zhes sems dpa' sa pan s+ho/byung chub kyi sems can byung rgyal ba la sa sems dang du sa/
90b2(rgyud): kun byed kyi rang bzhi ni rtogs pa'i sgo nas paskyigs pa'i le'u steng drug pa'o///de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byung rgyal po las sems dpo' rdo rje la bstan pa gtad pa
90b3(rgyud): le'u 'od gsung sa//kyi sems dpa' rdo rje 'ad zung shig/khyed ni rang 'byung ye shes te//khyod ni ngo yis snying por byung //ngo yi rang bzhin 'di zung cig/nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum
90b4(rgyud): las//sgra gsum ston pa byung ba yang //de yi rang zin na khyod kyis zung //de yi bstan pa rnam gsum yang //byAstan pa smra ba'i sprin gyis//dus gnas 'khor la sogs pa
90b5(rgyud): yenganyid kyis byas par lung ston cig/kun byed nga mo rang bzhin nam//kun byed nga sim tshun bshad bzhin//khyod kyis dri yi rang bzhin zung //nga ni kun gyi rang bzhin yin//
90b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas mes po nga yin gyis//sangs rgyas kun gyi mes po gyis//kun byed rgyal po nga nyid ni//sku gsum ston pa'i pha yin gyis//khyod kyis sku gsum pa ma gyis//dus
90b7(rgyud): gsum sangs rgyas mes po byis//sems can kun gyi yang mas po//smra ba yi seng ge smra ba yi che//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun//sems dpa' chen po nyid dang ni//
91a1(rgyud): kun byed rgyal po nga la sA na//gzhan yin smra bar ma byed cig/sku gsum bstan pa'i nang nas ni//rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam gnyis las//rgyu la bskyabs nas
91a2(rgyud): 'bras bur 'dod//sems can sangs rgyas ming btags nas//sems kyis sangs rgyas 'bras bur sgrub//'di ni nga yi stan pa mi ni//kun byed nga yi ro nga bzhin ni//rgyu dang
91a3(rgyud): 'bras bu gnyis las 'das//sems can sangs rgyas gnyis myed pas//sangs rgyas sems kyis sgrub ma byed//kun byed rgyal po nga nyid ni//sems nyid rang 'byung
91a4(rgyud): ye shes so zhes gsungaso//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po'i mdo las bstan pa gtad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o///byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po rdzogs
91a5(rgyud): so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI saM ha pra b+hA dang //bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba pa gong bi ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o///de nas byang chub kyi sems
91a6(rgyud): kun byed rgyal po rang 'byung ye shes skye ba med par rtogs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhug so//de nas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa des 'di skad ces zhus so//kyai ston pa'i
91a7(rgyud): ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags//legs par gsung ba'i mdo dag mthar phyin na//ston pa gsum po nyid kyis ji ltar rtogs//bstan pa gsum po nyid kyis ji ltar
91b1(rgyud): rtogs//labo nus dus kyi rang bzhin rdo ltar rdzogs//nyid kyis ji ltar gas pa'i dgongs pa don//bdag cag rnams la legs badzos rgyun du gastsol zhes zhus so//
91b2(rgyud): de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal mi rtags pa bshad pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud phyi ma 'di gsung so//kyi sems dpa' rdo rje don 'di legs par nyon//ston pa'i ston pa kun
91b3(rgyud): byed rgyal ba yi//nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis//so sor 'dul ba'i don du gang gsungs pa//ston pa re dang gnas dang 'khor dgra dang //bstan pa sdud pa so so
91b4(rgyud): gnas par rtogs//kun byed dA yi rang bzhin rtogs pa min//kye kun byed nga yi rtogs tshul bstan pa ni//dra nyid skye ba med pa rang bzhin te//de las byung ba'i chos ni thams cad
91b5(rgyud): kun//rang 'byung skye ba med pa'i dbyings rtogs//kye sems dpa' chen po legs par de nyon cig/nga nyid skye ba med par ngas rtogs pas//ston pa gsum yang skye ba med par
91b6(rgyud): rtags//bstan pa gsum yang skyo ba med par rtogs//'khor gnas dus kyang skye ba med par rtogs//'das pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba med par rdzogs//dA m+b+ha r+ya byung ba'i sa
91b7(rgyud): rgyas bzhugs pa yang //skye ba med pa nyid du rab tu rtogs//ma byon spyod kyis 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas yang //skye ba med pa nyid du rab tu rtogs//kye ston pa kun byed nyid kyis rtogs
92a1(rgyud): pa ltar//sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis rtogs par gyis//sems drapa' rdo rjes de ltar mi rtogs na//kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs mi 'gyur//nga yi rang
92a2(rgyud): bzhin khyod kyis ma rtogs na//snying po'i rang bzhin bcu dag rtogs mi 'gyur//rang bzhin bcu yi don la rmongs pa yis//bsgom du med pa'i lung bcu ji ltar rtogs//kye
92a3(rgyud): yis chos rnams ji ltar bstan pa ltar//sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis rtogs par byos//nga yis rang bzhin skye med rtogs pa ltar//kun gyi rang bzhin skye med rtogs
92a4(rgyud): par gyis//ston pa gsum yang skye ba med par rtogs//bsten pa gsum yang skye ba med par rtogs//'khor gnas dus kyang skye ba med par rtogs//dus gsum sangs
92a5(rgyud): rgyas skye ba med par rtogs//rgyu drug sems can skye ba med par rtogs//sa tshu me rlung na mkha' lnga po yang //skye ba med pa'i dang du rab tu rtogs//khams gsum srid
92a6(rgyud): gsum skye ba med par rtogs//'dod lnga yul lnga skye ba med par rtogs//des ni chos kun byang chub sems nyid do//byang chub sems ni kun byed rgyal po nyid//kun byed
92a7(rgyud): rgyal po skye ba med par rtogs//chos kun rtsa ba byang chub kun byed nga nyid de//nga nyid mi skyes dbyingasu rtogs pas na//kun kyang skye med dbyingasu rtogs par 'gyur zhes
92b1(rgyud): gsungs//byang chub kyi sems kun+da byed rgyal po lus rtogs pa gleng ba zhi'i le'u ste du brgyad pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal blos lta ba bsgom
92b2(rgyud): du med pa rtogs pa 'di gsungaso//kyai sems dpa' rdo rje legs par gartogs shig/cho sde rnams kun gyi rtsa ba kun byed la//lta dang blta bar bya ba yod ma yin//gang la
92b3(rgyud): glang ltar snying po gang rtogs pa//kun byed du yi rang bzhin rtogs pa yin//kye ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams mA lus kuni//kun byed skye ba med par kun gnas par//su zhig
92b4(rgyud): snying po'i don la rtogs 'dod pas//kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs par gyis//kye kun byed nga yi rang bzhin ma rtogs par//so sor bstan pa'i lung dang yid 'thad cing ///
92b5(rgyud): sku gsum ston pa'i don la gang 'jug pa//kun byed nga yi don dang shin tu 'gal//kye ston pa kun byed nga nyid ma gtogs par//lta ba'i rang bzhin kun mkhyen skye med 'di//
92b6(rgyud): 'das dang da ltar ma 'ongs sangs rgyas kyis//mi rtogs mi rtogs rtogs par lung mi ston//mi skyes skye ba med pa'i sangs rgyas kyang //kun byed nga yi lung dang phrad nas ni/
92b7(rgyud): des kyang lta ba skye med rab tu rtogs//sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bar byin gyis brlabs//kye kun byeng rgyal po ston pa'i lung med ni//dus gsum sangs rgyas khams gsum/
93a1(rgyud): snyoms nan dang //ma skyes lam lA lta ba'i rnal 'byo dang //la dgu lung dgu rgyalnga yang sa bcu yis//rang r+yang dngos po'i don lnga rtags spyod pas/
93a2(rgyud): ma skyes snying po'i don la sgrib pa'i phyir//rgyu 'bras bral ba'i byang chub snying po 'di//kun gyid+d+ha don de rtogs pa med//kyang bas ston pa kun byed de yis kyang oM'
93a3(rgyud): sems dpa' rdo rdu la/sku gsum ston pa gsum gyis ga klad pa'i lung //de lam gnas shig parang lung ston//de ltar nges pa'i lung 'i
93a4(rgyud): ma bstan na//dus gsum rgyu la ba kun gyi yang mes po//kun byed rgyal po nga yi gdung chad nas//kun kyang lha kho r+ya ba'i lam la gzhol bar 'gyur/kye
93a5(rgyud): sems dpa' rdo/khyud kyis kyang //lha dang ma blta yul la 'das pa la//gang byaltas don la rnam rtag mched pa'i phyir//rgyu 'bras can gyi lta ba khyod ma rtog s+ho//
93a6(rgyud): shin tu rnal 'byor mi gnas theg pa la//byaltas shing brtags pas mthong ba'i don 'gug paste//ma bcos snying po kun byed rang bzhin//bltos pas ma
93a7(rgyud): med pa'i don du rtags//kye kun byang rgyal po byang chub sems nga ni//chos rnams kun gyi blta ba'i mi long ste//gas 'i rang bzhin med par kun 'am bas//
93b1(rgyud): bltas rang bzhin gsalnga bar lung bsnun to//ma skyes de bzhin nyid kyi yul nyid la//bsdu ba'i yul med mthong ba chen por rtogs shes gsungs//byang chub kyi sems
93b2(rgyud): kun byed rgyal po las skye ba med pa'i le'u ste nga dgu pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos dam tshig bsrung du med par rtogs pa 'dra gsungaso//
93b3(rgyud): ston po'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis//nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis//dbang po'i khyad par rim par lung bstan pa//kun byed bsrung du yod pa'i don du rtogs//
93b4(rgyud): la las sdom dang 'dul khrims dag par rtogs//la las rig 'dzin sdom pa drag par rtogs//la las grangs dang rtsa ba yan lag rtogs//ji ltar brtags kyang rtogs
93b5(rgyud): par lung me bstan//kun byed rgyal po'i dam tshig 'di//bsrung dang mi srung phyogs ris med par bstan//gang gis bsrung dang mi srung med rtogs pa//kun byed nga yi dam tshig
93b6(rgyud): rtogs pa yin//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga //rtsub byang chub sems su kun gcig las//kun kyang snying po'i dam tshig yin pas no//bsrung dang mi slu
93b7(rgyud): don la 'das par rtogs//kye kun byed rgyal po'i lta ba'i dam tshig ni//skye med na mkha' lta bur phyogs 'das pas//gang gis de dag legs par rtogs pa de//kun
94a1(rgyud): byed rgyal po'i dam tshig rtogs pa yin//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byeng rgyal po ngas//dam tshig bsrung du med par lung bstan pa//tshig tu rtsa ba'i rgyud
94a2(rgyud): las gang thos pa//'dis ni don de legs par rtogs pa yin//kye kun byed rgyal pos snga bar lung bstan ltar//dus gsum tsha sna nyid 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir//kun
94a3(rgyud): byed rgyal po nga yi dam tshig ni//dus gla sum du ni bsrung du med par rtogs//kye chos rnams rtsu ba sems su gcig pa ltar//dam tshig rtsa ba bsrung du med par gcig/
94a4(rgyud): de yang rang sems skye med rtogs po yin//phyel blo dang ni med pa gcig pu dang //lhun gyis grub par bsrung ba kun las 'das//kun byed rgyal po'i dam tshig rnam
94a5(rgyud): grangs te//skye ba med par rtogs pa'i rnam grangs yin//snying po srung du med par don gcig la//rtogs dang mi rtogs khyad par la dgongs nas//drang dang nges pa gnyi su
94a6(rgyud): rnam phye nas//bsrung du yod dang med par lung bstan to//kye 'dis ni dam tshig bsrung med rtogs pa'i phyir//dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa rtogs pa yin//gang
94a7(rgyud): gis 'di ma gtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa//rang sems snying po'i don la shin tu 'gal//kyo kun byed nga yi dam las gang 'das shing //sku gsum ston pa'i dam la
94b1(rgyud): /gnas pa dag/bskal pa brgya phrag du ma rnamasu yang //snying po'i don dang phrad par shin tu dka'//de phyir kun byed dang ya lung thob pas//dam tshig bsrung du med par rtogs par
94b2(rgyud): byos shes gsungs//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las bsrung med dam tshig gi'u ste drug cu pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des phrin
94b3(rgyud): las btsal du med pa 'di gsungaso//kye sems dpa' rdo rje legs par rtogs shig/ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga'i//rang bzhin las byung ston pa sku gsum gyis//so
94b4(rgyud): so ji ltar 'dul ba'i skur byung nas//phrin las btsal bas dan dang phrad par rtogs//lus kyi las su phyag rgya bca' bar rtogs//ngag gis sngags dang bzlas par rtogs/
94b5(rgyud): sems kyis phro 'du ting 'dzin bsgom par rtogs//sgo gsum yal bar gnas pas grub mi rtogs//kye ston pa kun byed nga yi phrin las ni//btsal bar bya med phrin las lung
94b6(rgyud): bstan pas//don dang mi 'gal bsam pa mthar phyung bas//phrin las btsal du med par khyod kyis rtogs//kye ston pa kun byed nga yi phrin las ni//bdag don lhun gyis grub pas bya
94b7(rgyud): med rtogs//gzhan don dbyingasu gcig pas btsal med rtogs//de ltar khyod kyis nges par gyis//kye kun byed byang chub semasu kun byas pas//byang chub sems la bya mi
95a1(rgyud): dgas pa smras//ma b+has bya bral sbyang blo byung chub la//d+ma dang mi b+hA ba d+hA gang gis bdag/ n+d+ra m+mung+ga rgyal bo sa tshun lasan//smras la du/
95a2(rgyud): phyag rgya ba car med rtags//dag gis bzlas brjod byer med snying bar rtogs//sems kyis hUM 'du sgrom dang brel bar rdzogs//'dus dang mkhyen da ltar bzhugs pa ya /
95a3(rgyud): blon los bya mad rtogs nas mngon sangs rgyas//dus gsum rgyus pa rtogs la rag lus pas//sems dpa' rdo rje zlos nas rtogs par gyi ste//kyai dA las rgya
95a4(rgyud): 'i ston po sku gsum gyis// rgya me dpa dang ga pa'i lung bstan pa//ma d+h+r-ig mtshan mag+na snrel dga' ba la//'dul bye'i rtog pa grangs stan pa yin//de byed kun byung
95a5(rgyud): yis lung bstan pa//thos pa'i don la ma nar brtag par byos//bya rtsol kun dang bral ba'i phrin las kyis//ma byas don kun rtogs pas rtogs pa 'chad//kyi sems dpa'
95a6(rgyud): dodon 'di legs par rtogs//snying po bya rtsol med pa'i don rtogs pas//bya dang mi bya med par don rjen byas//kun byed rgyal po'i phrin las 'di rtogs shig/kye ston pa'i
95a7(rgyud): rgyal po kun bye dang yis ni//byis pa thams cad mtshan ma'i lam du bstan//bya grol phrin las nges don 'di rtags pas//'gro ba kun byed rgyal po nyid du 'gyur//snying
95b1(rgyud): po bya bral sgo gsum ma nor bste//bya rtsol 'das pa'i don la rtogs pa ni//dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa gcig pa'i phyir//ma nor lam la rtogs pa nyid mchog yid
95b2(rgyud): zhes gsungs so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las sgo gsum bya ba med par rtogs pa'i le'u ste drug bcu gcig pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun
95b3(rgyud): byed rgyal pos dkyil 'khor bskyed du med par rtogs pa 'di gsungs//kye sems dpa' rdo rje don 'dir rtogs shig/nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis//mtshan ma grangs
95b4(rgyud): la dga' ba'i gdul bya la//tshogs dang dkyil 'khor bskyed du yod par bstan//gang zhig sku gsum lam la bsten byas nas//mtshon ma grangs kyi sgo nas rtog byed pa//bskal
95b5(rgyud): pa bye ba brgya phrag yun ringasu//dkyil 'khor bskyed du med pa'i don mi rtogs//kye de bas ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas//tshogs dkyil 'khor bskyed rang bzhin lhun grub yongs
95b6(rgyud): rdzogs pas//ma byas rang bzhin grub pa'i chos nyid pa//bskyed cing bsag tu med pa'i doran rtogs na//kyo kun byed nga yi dkyil 'khor brtan pa ni//rang las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor
95b7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i lung //ma lus snying por rdzogs pas bskyed 'bri med//ma bskyed dus gcig rdzogs pa dkyil 'khor rtogs//kye dkyil ni ma nor don gyi snying po la//'khor ni
96a1(rgyud): 'khor 'das bde chen rdzogs par ldan//de ni dkyil 'khor snying po kun gyi rtsa//dkyil 'khor ma lus 'di la 'dus par rtogs//kye kun byed
96a2(rgyud): rgyal po nga yi dkyil 'khor ni//ma lus snying por rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor te//gang gis de dag rdzogs par gang rtogs pa//dkyil 'khor bskyed pa med pa'i don la mkhos//
96a3(rgyud): kyi ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas//kye med byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor gyis//'gro dang 'od med kun tu khyab par bdal//rtogs pas skye ba med pa'i don la 'jug/
96a4(rgyud): kye rang 'byung ye shes lnga yi dkyil 'khor ni//rtogs dang ma rtogs don la rag lus pas//bskyed dang mi bskyed gnyi su mthong ba yin//dam po rtogs na bskyed dang mi bskyed
96a5(rgyud): med//de phyir sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis kyang //sgra lam gnas don nyid rtogs par gyis//gang gis de la rtogs pa skyes ma thag/kun byad rgyal po don la 'byor par 'gyur/
96a6(rgyud): kye rgyal ba ma lus 'dus pa'i snying po ste//rang bzhin khyab par gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di//ma bskyed rang bzhin gnos pa'i don 'di la//rtogs pa ci bder mnos la
96a7(rgyud): ma bcol cig/kye rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin kun byed ngas//dkyil 'khor bskyed du med par don rtogs pas//de yi rang bzhin sgra ma thos yin par//sems dpa'
96b1(rgyud): rdo rje khyod kyis rtogs par gyis//kye kun byeng rgyal pa chags snang rnam pa lnga//skye med byang chub sum su bstan pa ltar//sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis rtogs nas kyang //de bzhin
96b2(rgyud): 'khor la khyod kyis lung ston cig ces gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos dkyil 'khor bskyed du med par rtogs pa'i lo'u ste drug tu gnyis pa'o//
96b3(rgyud): de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos dbang la bskur du med par rtogs pa 'di gsung so//kye sems dpa'o rdo rje don 'di des rtogs shig/nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste/
96b4(rgyud): ra las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis//dbang la bskur thabs yod par lung phob pa//mtshan ma'i rtog pa'i lam la zhen chags pas//nga yis nga bzhin mo mthong bskal par
96b5(rgyud): 'gyur//kyer ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste//nga yi rang bzhin kun byed khyab rtogs pas//nga la gnyis pa'i don ni med pa'i phyir//bskur dang mi bskur don dang bral bar rtogs//
96b6(rgyud): gang zag mtshan mu grangs la dgo' pa la//dbang gi grangs dang bskur ba'i rim pA bstan//mA bcos don la gnas pa'i gong zag le//ma bskur rang bzhin gnas pa'i
96b7(rgyud): rim pa bstan//kye kun byed rgyal po'i rang bzhin kun khyab pas//de ltar 'jug cing rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor la//ma bskur rang bzhin gnas pa'i don rtogs pas//dbang la
97a1(rgyud): bskur thob med par lung ston cing //kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas//bsgyur thob med par rtog snga nas lung bstan pas//skye med rnam dag ma
97a2(rgyud): kyi dbang thob nas//rang bzhin brgya yi dbang la rtsol mi 'gyur//sngags dang phyag brgya'i dpung la rI mi 'jug/rdzas dang mtshan ma'i dbang la sems mi 'tshogs//rang rgyud
97a3(rgyud): dag pas mtshan ma'i lha mi bsgom//gza' dang rgyu skar dus tshigs rim pa med//kye ston pa'i rgyal po nga yis rtogs pa ltar/sku gsum ston pa gsum gyis ma rtog
97a4(rgyud): pas//rang bzhin bcu yi don la bsgribs pa'i phyir//kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs pa med//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas//'khor gyi dang sku sku gsum
97a5(rgyud): ston pa las//rang bzhin ma bcos ji bzhin lung phog pa//mtshan ma'i 'jig rten lha la rten mi 'cha'//chags la mi rten dbang la rag mA lus//skye med rig pa'i
97a6(rgyud): dbang la kun rdzogs pas//ma bcul bde bar bzhag pas don kun rdzogs//kye nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste//sku gsum ston pa nga yis bkod pa yin//dus
97a7(rgyud): bstan bcos kyang nga yis bkod pa yin//rang nyid rang la bkod pa bya ma dgas//kye de ltar kun byed rang bzhin gang rtogs pas//thams cad kun byed rang bzhin
97b1(rgyud): de rtogs pas//kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs kyis la//mtshan 'di lhag 'dzin zhe na pa'i dbang la ma rten cig gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las rang
97b2(rgyud): 'byung rtoms pa'i dbang gi le'u ste d+han+ta cu gsum pa'o///de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po sA lam lo bgrang du med par rtogs po 'di gsungs/
97b3(rgyud): kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yi//rang bzhin ma skyes gcig tu gnas pa lo//skye med mngon du rtobyas paro dka' bri'i phyir//'khor gyi dang po ston pa sku gsum gyis//rang
97b4(rgyud): rang dga' ba'i lam la bzung ba'i phyir//lam gyi khyad por bgrod du yod par bstan//blo chung rgyud nas don la 'dren pa'i phyir//drang ba'i lung du nga yis rtogs pa yAn//kye tshogs
97b5(rgyud): dang sbyor lam mthong lam bsgom po'i lam/mthar phyin rim pa bskal pa brgya phrag dang //chos gsum bdun sogs dus der 'grub pa rtogs//de yis nga yi lam 'di rtogs
97b6(rgyud): mi 'gyur//kye kun byed rgyal po nga yi lam bshad pa//nga nyid skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin la//'jug dang mi 'jug tshig las shin tu 'das//de phyir lam la bkrong du med
97b7(rgyud): par rtogs//lam lngar snang ba rnam rtog mtshan ma'i grangs//ngo nyid mtshan ma'i yul las 'das pa'i phyir/mtshan ma'i lam gyis bgrong du med par rtogs//kye kun
98a1(rgyud): dang stso lam lda ma med//skye zad ldan nan na por gartog pa'i phyir//gcig gi rang bzhin rtogs pa du yi phyir//lam la 'grod mod gcig tu
98a2(rgyud): rtogs pa yin//lce sngon po'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po //de la 'jug pa'i rim pa'i lam mod de//rang 'byung ye shes dus gcig rdzogs pa'i phyir//ma bgrodar
98a3(rgyud): bzhin bzhag pas phyin par 'gyur//de phyir sems dpa' rdo rje khyod nyid kyis//nga la rim par bgrod par mi byed cing //kyang ni mtha' brel na mkha'i rang bzhin te//nAm pa
98a4(rgyud): snatha' la bgrod cing tshad ltar//dA la rang bzhin lam gyis begad 'dod pa// chad na du de las che ba med//de phyir sems dpa' rdo rje rtogs nus kyang //khyod kyis 'gyur
98a5(rgyud): gyi nang du lung ston cig/da ltar nga yi rang bzhin lung bstan pas//kun kyang nga yi rang bzhin nyid rtogs 'gyur//'jig rten mtshan pa'i me lo zhen mi 'gyur//rnam grangs tshig
98a6(rgyud): gi la mo la ts+tshed mi 'gyur//ma bcom bder bzhag rtogs pas pha rol phyin//kun gyi snying po'i lam dang phrad par 'gyur//kye nga ni kun byed chos kyi gzhim ste//lam
98a7(rgyud): sdus bcur skyon pa'i spyi gsung yang //ngas rab shin mngon du snyan pa yin//de ster khyod kyis legs par rtogs par gyis//mi btsas bgrod med kun byed kun
98b1(rgyud): /na da du blas// nga na/rnas pa 'an zu su rnanas sun na sa dun rgyu
98b2(rgyud): / ma 'di mi gsapa// mau pa masbyin ga
98b3(rgyud): da///cing las byung ba'i sbyin pa sku gsum gyis//dan pa'i rim du bska co stongs pa'i phyir//rnam rtog blangs la dag pa'i gang zug so//sA yi rnam gras
98b4(rgyud): drug tu bstan//skrun pa de bzhin 'khyor gyis de rtogs//rnam rnyog blo yis grangs la spyod par byed//kyai su drug /grangs kyi rang bzhin bstan pa ni//kun
98b5(rgyud): rdorje 'dzin pa dang //rdo rje 'chung dang stug po bkod pa da//pad+ma spyan dadu rdo rje sems dpa'i sa//rim bskyod rnal 'byor don du gsungs pa ste//lha dang ting 'dzin khyad pa'i/
98b6(rgyud): chen phreng //kyi sbyin pa byin byed rgyal pas bstan pa//ji ltar rdzing ba'i chos rnams mi lus pa//skye mo gyim kyi sbyi suM gcig pa'i phyir//saM yo khyad par med de
99a1(rgyud): gcig tu rtags//kun bye dang yI sA la ma sbyar na//rtog pa'i sa yi rnam grangs kun thob kyang //sngo so rang gi rnam rtog snang ba lngas//kun bye nga dang phrad
99a2(rgyud): par lung mi ston//kye kun byed rgyal po sa yau rang bzhin ni//ma bcos ma sbyangs rig pas lhun rdzogs so//sbyangs shing bgrod kyang don dang mi phrad kyi//rang bzhin rtogs pas
99a3(rgyud): dus gcig rdzogs par byed//kye theg gcig kun byed byang chub sems kyis//skye med khyab pas rtogs pa'i rang bzhin ni//gang ltar bgrod pa na mkha'i mtha' tshol 'dra//
99a4(rgyud): mim bgrod rang bzhin bzhag pas grol bar ston//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po de//sa yi ngo bo nyid shar ba'i phyir//nga yis sa la mtho dman rim pa med//kun byed
99a5(rgyud): nga yi sa 'di rtogs par gyis//de nyid kun gyi mdun du mngon byung yang //sku gsum 'khor gyis rnam rtog grangasu rtogs//kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs pa zab mo yang //gang ltar
99a6(rgyud): bltas pas mthun par lung mi ston//kya nga yi 'khor gyi dang po sku gsum gyis//rang dang mos pa'i 'khor la chos bstan pa//sku gsung thugs kyi theg pa re re dang //sa
99a7(rgyud): lam re 'bras bu re re bstan//kun byed nga yi sa las ma rtogs pa//rnam grangs sa des nges pi lam mi rnyed//des na sems nyid kun theg sems kyis//
99b1(rgyud): ba'i sa la bstan par rtogs par gyis//sa ya rang bzhin snang med 'di rtogs nas//kun byed byang chub sems kyis la gnas shes gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po
99b2(rgyud): lasA sa la sbyang du med par rtogs pa'i le'u ste drug cu lnga pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos spyod pa blang dor med par rtogs pa 'di gsungaso//
99b3(rgyud): kyang ni ston po kun byed rgyal po ste//nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis//la las dge sbyong sdig pa dor bar rtogs//la los cang smre blang dor gnyi su rtogs//la las gtsang
99b4(rgyud): sme blang dor gnyis ka spyad par rtogs//spyad dang ma spyad med pa'i don ma rtogs//gang dag spyod pa 'di la gnas pa ni//rang rang gnyan po'i rtogs pa byang ba yis//dmigs pa yid
99b5(rgyud): la sbyangs pa rtogs par 'gyur//blang dror med pa'i spyod pa rtogs mi 'gyur//kye kun byed rgyal po'i spyod pa bstan pa ni//dge sdig blang dor gtsang smra che chung kun//skye med byang chub
