99b6(rgyud): sems su kun gcig pas//glang dang dor ba med pa'i don du rtogs gcing dang mi gtsang med pa nyid du rtogs//spyad dang ma spyad gnyisu med par rtogs//mtha' dang dbus su 'byung
99b7(rgyud): pa med par rtogs//gzhi rtsa sgyu med byang chub semasu rtogs//kye kun byed rgyal po'i spyod pa bstan pa ni//gang ltar spyod pa da ltar mi 'gal te//byas dang ma byas gnyis
100a1(rgyud): kAskye med pas//shes pas gang ltar spyad pa skye med do//rje kun byed rgyal po nga yi spyod pa la//mkha' ltar gnas pas grangs dang tshad gzung med//
100a2(rgyud): gnyis med pas yin min phyogs la 'das//kun byed byang chub sems kyi spyod par rtogs//'dod pa lnga yang sems kyi spyod par rtogs//chags sdang lnga yang sems kyi spyod
100a3(rgyud): par rtogs//rgyan gyi rgya lnga sems kyi spyod par rtogs//khams gsum srid gsum sems kyi spyod par rtogs//sgyu med mi rtogs pa yi spyod pa ni//rgyal ba kun gyi
100a4(rgyud): myos pa ngas ma bshad//kye de phyir sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis ni//kun byed do ya spyod pa 'di rtogs la//brang dang bad par kun gyis rtogs pa'i byed//nga yi 'khor
100a5(rgyud): gyi nang du lung ston cig/kun byeng nga yi spyod pa ma gdog por//sku gsum ston pa'i 'khor la gang zhen pas//'jig rten log pa'i lta spyod la 'chol nas//blang ngor
100a6(rgyud): med pa'i sbyin pa rtogs mi byed//de ston po'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis//'khor gyi nang spyod pa'i lung bstan pa//ma chags brang dang med pa'i spyod pa yis//thams
100a7(rgyud): cad skye mdo mnyam par rtogs lung bstan//sems dpa' rdo rjes 'khor la lung bstan pas//'khor kyang blang der med par rtogs par 'gyur//'khor dong mya ngan 'das pa'i
100b1(rgyud): chos rnams ni//skye ba med pa na mkha'i rang bzhin ltar//da dang khyod kyis rtogs pa ji lta bar//khyod kyis 'khor gyi nang du lung ston cig/lnga par lung bstan thos pa la brten nas/
100b2(rgyud): rtogs pas kur byed nyid la gnas par 'gyur zhes gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po lus spyod pa dang dur med par rtogs pa'i le'u sgo drug cu drug pa'o//
100b3(rgyud): de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos ye shes rang la slob pa med par rtogs po 'od gsung so//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas//ji ltar 'dul ba'i thabs su
100b4(rgyud): bstan po'i phyir//nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyi//sgrib pa bsal zhing ye shes bsgrub par rtogs//sku gsum ston pas 'khor la de ltar bstan//'khor gyis go zhing
100b5(rgyud): rtogs pa de bzhin te//rang rang mod pa'i don la zhen pa'i phyir//kun byed du yi 'khor du 'du mi byed//kye kun byed nga yis 'khor la lung phog pa//ji ltar snang grags gnas pa'i
100b6(rgyud): chos rnams kun//ma skyed de bzhin nyid kun gcig phyir//sgrib dang mi sgrib chos su gnas mo byed//de phyir ye shes sgrib par dwa mi 'byed//sgrib dang mi sgrib chas su ris mi
100b7(rgyud): lha/mthar thug med po'i don la grangs mi grangaso//rgyu dang 'bras bus snying po'i don mi skyed//kye ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga yis dka'//sku gsum ston pa'i lung dang mi
101a1(rgyud): 'thun pas//skye med gcig la mtshan ma'i grangs mi 'grang //yul shes mi blta gnyen pa'i tshogs mi bsten//rig dang ma rig skye med dbyings
101a2(rgyud): gcig pas//gcig la gnyis 'dzin ma nA m+b+ha'i grangs mi 'dribs//rnam par mi d+h+r-ig 'du shes nang mi 'jog/ris 'jog ma yin dus gcig kun mkhyen pa so//de ltung
101a3(rgyud): sems dpa' rdo rjes rtogs par gyis//kye skyon pa kun byed du mi ye shes nyid//bgrang du med la bgrang na mtha' las 'das//tsha bA ri le ye shes grangs bstan pas//
101a4(rgyud): brjod pas de dag ma rdzogs lung bstan to//kun byed rgyal po nga yi ye shes ni//rnam par mi rtogs spros pa kun dang bral//rabazhi gdul med ma khe'u ltang gnas pa ste//
101a5(rgyud): skye ba med pa zhes su bstan pa yini//rang byung ye shes gaTI gA las ma ga yos kyang //rnam pa'i khyad par ma bachis skye bar gsal//de ltar gang gis rig cing rtags
101a6(rgyud): nyid//kun byed rgyal ba'i skyes su lung bston to//nga yi ye shes skye med rtogs pa ji ltar byudra//sems dpa' rdo rjes de ltar rtogs par gyis//kye nI maM shes
101a7(rgyud): shun byeng rgyal po ste//ma rig pa yo lta bsil bar byed//sgrub pa'i dra ba maM lus gci byed cing //ye shes snang po rgyas par mchid par byung //kun byed nga mi rang 'byud/
101b1(rgyud): ya shes to//nga las ma byung dang 'byung yA nas gtsug med pas//shos ma lus nga yis bkod pas na//da ni yo shes rgyal ban smra bshad//rten rmongs ye shos gsapa
101b2(rgyud): bar byed 'didi na//kun bye dang yi lung ni rtogs par gyis zhes gsungs//byang chub kyi sems kun bying rgyal po las ye shes 'i sgrib pa med par rtogs pa rI le'u ste drug cu bdun
101b3(rgyud): pa'o///de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byang rgyal pos lhun grub bcol du med par rtogs pa 'di gsung so//kyang ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste//du ni lhun grub bci lda
101b4(rgyud): med pa yin//nga yi rang bzhin khyod la bstan par bya//khyod kyis nga yi den la legs rtogs shig/kye nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste//nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis//
101b5(rgyud): ngayi rang bzhin shin tu rtogs dka' bas//so so'i thobs kyis btsal du yod par bstan//de yang ji ltar nges par bstan zhe na//la la bden pa bzhi yi lam zhugs nas//nyon
101b6(rgyud): mongs ye shes spong ldan rtsol bar bstan//la la rten 'brel lam la zhen pa yis//nyon mongs ye shes dgag bsgrub rtsol ba bstan//la la bden pa gnyis kyi lam la 'jug
101b7(rgyud): byas nas/spangs shing rtsol bas 'bras bu thob par bstan//la la gzung 'dzin bya ba'i rtsol ba yis//grub pa lho gsal tshul du gnas par 'dod//la la las dang ting
102a1(rgyud): tshul ba yis//blang ngor sgo nas 'bras bu thob par 'dod//la la ting 'dzin rnam gsum rtsol ba yos//drang dor byas pas 'bras bu thob pa ba dod//
102a2(rgyud): la ting 'dzin 'phro 'du'i rtsol ba yis//bla na med pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod//la la rgyu 'bras ting 'dzin rtsol ba yis//sku gsung rdo rje sems dpa'i 'bras bu thog/
102a3(rgyud): kye 'di dag btsal zhing bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu yis//kun byed de yi rang bzhin rtogs me 'gyur//kye kun byed rgyal po nga yi rang bzhin ni//kun la khyab kyang mi rtogs mchog
102a4(rgyud): tu gsang //nga yi rang bzhin ma mthong gsang ba'i phyir//rtsol sgrub can gyi theg pas skur btab pas//bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig yun rang su//nganang gro tha ma'i gnas
102a5(rgyud): su de skyes nas//bde ba bral zhing dbang po mtshang zhing //snying po'i don dang bral zhing bskal par 'gyur//kye nga ni ston pa kun byed byang chub sems//nga ni mtha' lhar yongasu
102a6(rgyud): khyab pa'i phyir//kun dang 'brel zhing yongs kyi don byed pas//btsal zhing bsgrub pa yod par lung mi ston//nga yi don 'di khyod la bsten pa yis//btsal zhing/
102a7(rgyud): bsgrub tu med par nges par rtogs//sems dpa' rdo rjes ji ltar rtogs pa de//nga yi 'khor la khyod kyis lung ston cig/kya nga ni ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir
102b1(rgyud): d+hi ltar rtogs pa khyed la lung bstan pas//khyed kyis chos kun da ltar rtogs par 'gyur//de nas rtsol bskyab mod par dbugs phyin pas//kun byed rgyal po nyid du lung bstan
102b2(rgyud): to//de byas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa yis//mi bcos bskal par sbyongs pa'i skyes bu la//'bad rtsol myed par sA la bzhag pa'i phyir//ban lo bslob med par rtogs par /
102b3(rgyud): lung ston cig ces gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las lhun grub brtul du med par rtogs pa'i le'u ste drug tso brgyad pa'o////de nas byang
102b4(rgyud): chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces bsgrags//kye khyod ni kun byed rgyal po ste//ji ltar snang de'i chos rnams kun//byed pa'i rgyal po
102b5(rgyud): khyod kyis byas//mo lus khyod kyis kun byas kyang //byed pa'i rgyal po khyod nyid la//bya mi dgos te gdod nas grub//dus gsum sangs rgyas khyod kyis byas//byams
102b6(rgyud): gsum sems can khyod kyi.oM byas//rgyud drug lam lnga khyod kyis byas//skye bzhi 'gro lnga khyod kyis byas//ston pa gsum yang khyod kyis bkod//bston pa gsum yang khyod kyis
102b7(rgyud): pa //sdung pa gsum yang khyod kyis bkod//dus gsum la borang yong khyod rgyas bad//rang 'byung lnga yang khyod las byung //rkyen gyi rgyu lnga khyod kyis bkod//rang bzhon du
103a1(rgyud): yang khyod kyis bstan//kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems//mdo lung kun gyi ngo bo khyod//bstan pa'i me long mun sel sgron//'khor gyi mun pa sel
103a2(rgyud): mdzad pa//khyod ni rgyal po kun gyi mes//rang 'byung thobs mchog kun gyi yab//'byung gnas shes rab kun gyi yum//spros pa med cing zhi ba med//ngag las 'das
103a3(rgyud): shing snying po med//mkha' ltar dag cing spyod yul 'das//kun gyi rtogs par bya ba'i yul//sgro skur 'das pa chos kyi dpyongs/thog ma tha ma dbus las 'das//'gro
103a4(rgyud): lo 'byung gnas snying po can//rin chen pad+ma'i snying po ltar//yud 'phrog tshim pa med pa'i sku//theg pa'i snying po dag gi rgyan//sku gsung thugs la mtshan med de//
103a5(rgyud): bdag gis rtogs dka'i don rtogs pas//rgyal ba kun gyi yang mes po//kun byed rgyal po khyod la 'dud ces stod cing bsgragaso//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun
103a6(rgyud): byed rgyal pos sems dpa' rdo rje la 'di skad ces bsgrags pa mdzad do//oM ma ho/sems dpa' rdo rje'i sku//rgyal ba kun gyi'ang sku gsung thugs//gsang ba'i
103a7(rgyud): mdzod la mnga' brnyes shing //smra ba'i seng ge bla na med//dam pa'i gsang ba rtogs pa'i thugs//gsang ba rgya mtsho sgrogs pa'i gsung //yon tan lhun grub
103b1(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sku//khyod ni rgyal ba'i srasna po ste//kun byed rgyal po nga nyid ltar//rgyal ba kun gyi mes po gyis/sa khams rnams kyi mun sel gyis//rnal 'byor pa
103b2(rgyud): rnams gyi bla mo gyis//gosang ba kun gyi rgyal po ste//bston pa phyi ma gsang ba 'di/rnal 'byor pa la lung ston cig ces gsungs//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal
103b3(rgyud): pA las rtogs pa bsgrags shing /bstod pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa dgu pa'o////rgyu de phyi ma zhes bya ba mdo lung bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so////de nas byang chub
103b4(rgyud): kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos chos thams cad skye ba med par mnyam pa la gzigs shing dgongs nas cang yang mi gsung bar bzhugaso//de'i tshe sems dpa' rdo rje da ljid kyang
103b5(rgyud): ston pa de ltar gyur pa yang rig/chos thams cad skye ba med par rtogs pa la dgongs nas cang yang mi smra bar 'khod do//de nas phyogs bcu nas lhags shing 'khod pa'i 'dus
103b6(rgyud): phal mo tsha dag gis de ltar rtogs nas sems dpa' rdo rje la 'di skad ces bsku lo//yang dag par skul to//nges pa dam par bskul to//oM ma ho/sems dpa' rdo rje chen
103b7(rgyud): po bdag cag la sman gdags pa'i slad du rtogs pa'i don la ji ltar bsgom pa de ston pa la zhu ba'i dus la bab po//nges par dus la bab po zhes bskul bas sems dpa'
104a1(rgyud): rdo rje de dga' ba'i mdangs dang bcas te dang zhing mos pa'i mdangs phyung nus spyan las langs te ston pa'i mdun du 'di skad ces zhus so//kye ston pa
104a2(rgyud): ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags//khyod kyi mdun du bdag 'khod de//bdag 'tshal ba'i don ci zhig mchis//bdag 'tshal don ni khyod kyis bstan du gsol zhes zhus
104a3(rgyud): bya las byang chub kyi sems kun byed nyid cang yang mi gsung bar bzhugs te sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces zhus so//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lpags//
104a4(rgyud): chos skus skye med thib le'i rang bzhin la//ston pa gsum po nyid kyis ji ltar bsgom//bstan pa gsum du nyid kyis ji ltar bsgom//sdud pa gsum du nyid kyis
104a5(rgyud): ji ltar bsgomo//'khor gnas dus kyi rang bzhin ji ltar bsgom//chos rnams kun gyi don lnga ji ltar bsgom//bsgom pa'i lung bcu bdag la bstan du gsol zhes zhus//
104a6(rgyud): de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungaso//kye sems dpa' rdo rje don la nga bsgom shi ka/bsgom du med pa'i chos nyid byang chub la/bsgom
104a7(rgyud): dang bsgom par bya ba gnyis med na//ma bsgoms rang bzhin bzhag na bsgom pa yin//don ni kun don skye ba med pa ste//rnam rtog mtshan ma de bzhin rig byas nas/
104b1(rgyud): dran pasam yid la rgyu ba ma lus kun//skye ba med pa'i ngang las ma yongs pa//gang ltar bsam kyang sgom pa yin shes na//ma bsgom gang ltar bzhag kyang yangs pa med/
104b2(rgyud): da las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis//mtshan ma bsgom la dga' ba'i gang zag la//rang rang gang ltar 'thad pa'i lung bzhin du//bsgom du yod ces kun la lung du bstan//
104b3(rgyud): kye ngan ston pa kun byed rgyal po la//ston pa rang 'byung rig pa'i ye shes las ma bsdus ston pa gsum yang de la 'dus//ston po de la bsgom du med par bstan//bstan pa brjod
104b4(rgyud): bral rig pa mtshon 'das la//bstan pa gsum yang de la 'dus te gnas//ma bcos rig pa'i gzhal yas 'og min na//gzhal yas gsum yang de la 'dus par bshad//
104b5(rgyud): ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun//snying po byang chub sems lam kun 'dus pas//'khor gsum dus gsum kun tu 'das par bshad//ma bsdus rang bzhin 'du ba
104b6(rgyud): ye shes ni//sdud pa de las gzhan pa yod ma yin//ma bsgom rang bzhin bzhag pa'i lung 'di la//bsgom du yod dang med pa'i lung mi ston//re dogs sgro skur 'dzin pa'i
104b7(rgyud): sems mi 'jog ces gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las bsgom du yod med bsten pa'i le'u ste bdun cu pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun
105a1(rgyud): byung rgyal pos lbub sgom mod kyi dgongs pad+ma de gsungs//kye de ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste//de las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis//mtshan ma
105a2(rgyud): rtog pas 'dul ba'i gang zag la//mtshan ma rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin grangasu bstan//la las zhi ba'i ting 'dzin bsgom par byed//la las zab ma'i ting 'dzin bsgom par byed//
105a3(rgyud): la las zhi gnas lhag mthong 'brel pa yi//bdag med ting 'dzin la gnas par byed//la la mtshan ma dag pa la brten naso//mtshan ma rje dang 'bangasu dmigs par byed//la
105a4(rgyud): la lta spyod 'brel med la brten nas//'brel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par byed//lo la mtshan med don la brten byas shing //mtshan ma'i ting 'dzin la gnas par byed//la las
105a5(rgyud): rang rgyud dog pa la brten nas//rnam gsum 'phro 'dra'i don la gnas par byed//la la rgyu 'bras dag pa gtsor byas nas//'od kyi ting 'dzin la gnas par byed//'di dag
105a6(rgyud): na me sa te//sbyin ba kun gyi rgyal po'i sbyang sa bstan//sbyin pa ban bye dang yis yong bstan pa//sa lus skye med rnam dag ti dzin te/
105a7(rgyud): bsgom dang mi sgom rkyen la rag ma lus//sgom bya ji ltar snang ba'i rdzas rnams kun//gang du ji ltar bzhag pa'i tshul med par//ma btsal rang sar gzhag pas
105b1(rgyud): bsgoms pa yin//kye bsgom du med pa'i man ngag 'di dag la//tshig dang sgra lngas 'das pa'i don yin phyir//snga rabs kun byed rgyal pos lung ma bstan//phyi rabs kun byed
105b2(rgyud): rgyal pos lung ma ston//de ltar kun byed rgyal pos lung bstan med//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis//ma nor dgongs pa'i don la lung bstan pa//sgo skur 'das pa
105b3(rgyud): don gyi snying po la//bsgom dang mi bsgom mkha' la brtsad pa 'dra//rtogs pa'i don la mA yengs dgongs pa ste//dngos po ma yin dngos po med ma yin//phyogs min phyogs
105b4(rgyud): las 'das pa ma yin par//bsgom dang mi sgom phyogs la gnas mi byed//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byang rgyal po ngas//bsgom dang mi sgom mtshon par mi nus ltar//snying po
105b5(rgyud): don la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor dang //sems dpa' rdo rje de la gnas par bya//kye dus gsum ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis//skye med byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa lnga//ming dang
105b6(rgyud): tha snyad tshig tu 'di'o zhes ma bstan mi ston bstan par mi mdzad do//lta ba bsgom du med par don rtogs na//bsgom dang mi bsgom res 'dzeg ldog pa'i lam//dam pa'i dgongs
105b7(rgyud): pa skye med thugs chud na//dam pa de la log dang ma log med//kye kun byed rgyal po nga yis lung pog ltar//ma sgoms bsgom du med par rtogs goms nas//skal ldan
106a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor gang zag su yang rung //kun byung rgyal po nyid du lung bstan to zhes gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la sa lta ba sgrom dbyer
106a2(rgyud): med pa'i le'u ste bdun cu gcig pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos bsrung du med pa de bzhin nyid du gnas pa 'di gsungaso//ston pa'i ston po kun byed
106a3(rgyud): rgyal po yis//rnam rtog mtshan ma'i lam la gnas pa'i bar//bsrung dang mi srung khyad par gnyis mthong ba//rtsa ba yan lag bcas par bsrung bar bstan//kye kun byed pa
106a4(rgyud): ni ye nas de bzhin nyid//de bzhin nyid la gzung 'dzin med pa'i phyir//chos rnams de ltar gang gis rtogs pa la//bsrung dang mi srung 'du shes 'jug pa med//kye nga ni ma
106a5(rgyud): bac+doMs kun byed byang chub sems//gnyen po mi bstan yul la 'jug mi byed//rang 'byung lhun grub rig pa'i dam tshig la//'da' nyams med pas ched du bsrung ba med///
106a6(rgyud): rang rig ma nor blo yi ched ma yis//mA bcos snying po'i don la 'jug par byed//skye med thug su ches kun ro glacig pas//'jug dang mi 'jug mtha' la nga mi gnas//kye
106a7(rgyud): sems dpa' rdo rje don la goms par gyis//dgongs don gsang ba'i rig pa ma shor na//tshig dang sgra la 'dzin pa'i goms pa dag/kun byed nga yi lung dang phrad mi 'gyur///
106b1(rgyud): bsrung du med pa'i dam pa'i dgongs pa 'di//kun tu yo nAs mya bsrungs gnas pa la//kun byed nga yi dgongs pa ma goms na//ji ltar bsrungs pa che chud nang du 'gyur//kye kun byed
106b2(rgyud): nga yi dgongs pa'i dam tshig ni//ma yengs dran pas dngos po ye she su//ma bcos sus kyang ma byas rang 'byung ste//rig pas dbang bsgyur bsrung dang mi srung med//ji ltar snang ba'i
106b3(rgyud): chos rnams thams cad kun//rang 'byung snying por gsal bas dbang sgyur bas//kun byed rgyal pos byas pa'i chos rnams la//rig dang mi rig gnyis ka'i yul las 'dis//
106b4(rgyud): kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis//bsrung dang mi bsrung yul las 'das pa bstar//sems dpa' rdo rjes don la goms byas nas//nga yis 'khor la de ltar lung ston
106b5(rgyud): cig/nga yi 'khor la de ltar lung bstan na//bya ba'i 'du shes lam las grol bar 'gyur//skye ba med pas kun kyang zhi bar 'gyur//kun byed rgyal po nga yis thugasu 'gyur//
106b6(rgyud): kye nga ni kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems//nga la sgo dang skur pa'i yul med pas//gang la se mos par ma byed bsgom ma byed//sgo gsum btsos par mi bya lhug par bzhag/
106b7(rgyud): bza' dang rgyu skar ches grangs dus tshod med//yid la mi byed sngags dang phyag rgya bral//de bas kun byed byang chub sems nyid la//bsrung dang mi bsrungs tshoms med par bshad
107a1(rgyud): ces gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las lta bsgom 'dar med pa'i le'u ste mdun nu gnyis pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi
107a2(rgyud): sems kun kyed rgyal pos bya med rtsol ba dang bral bar rtogs pa 'di gsungaso//kye nga ni kun byed rgyal po ste//kun byed rgyal po nga yi dgongs pa ni//bsam pa'i yul las
107a3(rgyud): 'das pas bsgom du med//kye sems ni ji bzhin pa yi ngo bo ste//ji bzhin pa la 'chos par byed ma myong //rang 'byung nga la rgyu rkyen kun dang bral//sgo gsum btsalnga med lhug
107a4(rgyud): pa nyid du zhog/gang zhig bya rtsol mtshan ma'i rjes 'brangs pa//kun byed nga dang phrad par mi 'gyur//kye ston pa'i kun byed de yi phrin las ni//bya ba med pas rtsol ba'i las
107a5(rgyud): mi byed//dmigs pa med pas bsgom pa'i 'du shes bral//'du 'bral med pas ma brjod yid la zhog/byung tshor skye ba med pas gsal 'gyur nas//gang yang byas pa
107a6(rgyud): med pa las kun grub//kye nga sgo ni pa kun byed rgyal po ste//rgyal ba kun gyi phrin las ngas byas kyang //rang 'byung ye shes bya med rdzogs pa'i phyir//ji bzhin pa yi las
107a7(rgyud): la byed ma myong //mab co la ji bzhin nyid du sems dpa' zhog/ji bzhin ma bcos rgyal ba'i dgongs pa la//sems dang sems las byung ba ci skyes kyang //de nyid skye med
107b1(rgyud): nyid du gnas shes na//bya rtsol mtshan ma'i 'du shes kun dang bral//kyo sems dpa' rdo rje ji bzhin nyid bsgoms shig/rtog pa dang sar grol ba'i lta ba la ma yongs rang bzhin bzhag
107b2(rgyud): pas bye btsal med//kun kyang rang 'byung rang sar+ya grol ba yin//kye sems dpa' rdo rje ji bzhin nyid bsgoms shig/rang lus mi bcos dbang po mi rtul te//ngag kyang mi gdams
107b3(rgyud): bya rtol byang yang med//sems kyang gang gtang mi g.yo'i dang la bzhag/bya ba med pa'i phrin ltos 'di bsgoms pas//byas pa med par don kun rdzogs par 'gyur//kye ji bzhin
107b4(rgyud): rtsol bral bde ba chen po la//sgo gsum mo rtsol bcos shing dmigs mi byed//yid la mi byed mtshan ma'i rjes mi 'o bras//rang 'byung ye shes bde ba'i don la bzhag/'di
107b5(rgyud): ni rang 'byung 'odags pa dgongs pa ste//kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs pa'i phrin laso//kye sems dpa' rdo rje ji bzhin nyid bsgoms shig/ma bcos ji bzhin nyid la 'jug pa la//tshang ma mi dgro gnyen
107b6(rgyud): bos ces ma dgos//N+Di ba'i don lam bcos de bzhin zhig kye bya ba med pa'i rang bzhin las 'di la//sgo gsum rtsol ba byas pas zin mi 'gyur//kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs pa la gnas pas//
107b7(rgyud): nga yi dgongs po srid las lhun gyis grub ces gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las ji bzhin pa la bya rtsol dang bral bar gnas pa'i le'u ste bdun nu gsum pa'o//
108a1(rgyud): de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos snying po 'du bral mod byar gnas pa 'di gsung so//kye ji bzhin pa la sems dpa' rdo rje sgrom//smyon
108a2(rgyud): bya'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis//snying po dgod du med par bstan pa ni//ji bzhin gtso 'khor med pa'i don du bstan//kye rig pa'i rgyal po gsal bar dbang bsgyur bas/sring
108a3(rgyud): po rtsol bsgrub 'das pa'i bdag nyid de//rtogs pa ye shes mchog gis len par byed//'di ni kun byed rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor yin//kye ston pa'i ston po kun byed rgyal
108a4(rgyud): po yis//snying po sku yi dkyil 'khor bkod pa ni//ji ltar spang zhing gnas pa'i chos rnams kun//skye ba med pa'i chos dbyings ngang la bkod//snying po'i don la blang
108a5(rgyud): drong med pa'i phyir//de yang kun byed nga yis bkod pa yin//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yiso//snying po gsung gi dkyil 'khor bkod pa ni//ji ltar grags
108a6(rgyud): shing gnas po'i chos rnams ni//skye ba med pa'i dbyings las tshig gis gsung du bkod//snying po brjod du med pa'i gsung la 'dus//de yang kun byed rgyal pos
108a7(rgyud): bkod pa yin//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis//snying po rigs pa'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa ni//ji ltar dran rig rtog pa thams cad kun//ma skyes kun
108b1(rgyud): b+hu ny+dza byedon du rig/kun byed nga sku gsung thugs lda nAM//mu baHsu rnal du bzhag pa'i tshul la por gsum+b+ha//ma ga/ dus gtsug rdzogs pa'i don rtags pas smyan zla
108b2(rgyud): snying po don lnga 'jug par byed//kye sems dpa' rdo rje ji bzhin nyid bsgoms shig/rang 'byung snying po mchog gi dkyil 'kho la//sgo gsum lhag pas ji bzhin dang bzhi gi na//
108b3(rgyud): kun byed nga yi dgongs par gnas pa yin//snga rabs 'das pa'i kun rnyed rgyal pos kyang dgongs pa rnal du bzhag pas don rdzogs la//ma byon dus kyi kun byed rgyal pos kyang /
108b4(rgyud): mo bcos rnal du bzhag pas don rdzogs 'gyur//da ltar bzhugs pa'i kun byed rgyal pos kyang //dgongs pa rnal du bzhag te gnas pa yin//kye sems dpa' rdo rje chen po
108b5(rgyud): khyod bsgoms shig/nga yi 'khor du gtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa//kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs pa 'di nyid la//ma bco la rnal du bzhag par lung ston cig/dgongs pa rnal du
108b6(rgyud): bzhog pa'i don 'di ni//kun gyi spyod yul sbyin pas shes shrIng //mnyam par bzhab pas rtogs pa'i yul las 'das//kun byed rgyal po de la gnas par byed ces gdus
108b7(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las snying po dan la gnas 'i'i le'u sti bdun du yin pa'o///de ces byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal bas rig pa dpong sgyur
109a1(rgyud): gnas pa 'di gsung so//kye sems dpa' rdo rje ji bzhin nyid bsgoms shig/rig pa'i rgyal pos gsal bar dbang sgyur nas//mtshan ma'i bde
109a2(rgyud): bla'i dbang la rAg mi lus//rtogs nas mi rtog don la ji bzhin zhog/kye kun byed rgyal po dbang thob rig pa nA//dngos po ma bcos ji bzhini rtag tu shar//rgyu dang rkyen med
109a3(rgyud): zhi ba mchog gi lam//bzhi bzhag gang ltar bzhag kyang de nyid dang //kun byed rgyal po thabs chen rtogs pa'i dbang //kun kyang ji bzhin yul la 'jug pa no//skyon dang
109a4(rgyud): yon tan gnyi ga mnyam zhes pas//'jug dang mi 'jug tshig las shin tu 'das//kye kun byed rig pas dbang sgyur dgongs pa 'di//ngag gis smrar med dmigs pa'i
109a5(rgyud): yul las 'das//dran pa zhi zhing spros pa med pa ste//mkha' ltar khyab cing phyogs ma yongs kyis med//kye sems dpa' rdo rje de bzhin nyid bsgoms shing //bsgom dang
109a6(rgyud): mi sgom yul las 'das pa la//gnyi ka 'byung 'jug re dogs med pa yis//mAnyam par mi 'jug don la bsgom myi byed//dbang dang dngos grub mi len bcos su
109a7(rgyud): med//kun byed rgyal po nyid la gus par gnas//kye ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga nyid ni//rang 'byung sgom du med pa'i snying po ste//ye shes gsal la sgrub pa med pa
109b1(rgyud): yon//dbang ni rtogs pas re dogs bcad pa yin//'di la nges par 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pa//shin tu rnal 'byor rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i lung //mA bcos ye shes kun byeng rgyal
109b2(rgyud): po la//gang ltar 'di ltar 'jog ces lung mi ston//snga bar ma gsungs phyis kyang mi gsung zhing da ltar byung bar gsungs par mi mdzad do//kye ston pa'i ngo bo kun byed rgyal po yis//
109b3(rgyud): bsgom zhing bsam du med pa'i chos nyid la//ma bsams yal bar gnas pas 'khor ba nyid//btsal zhing bsgoms pas rtog pa'i mtshan ma'i lam//de bas re dogs bcas
109b4(rgyud): pa'i ting 'dzin ni//gnas pas grol bar kun byed lung mi ston//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis//rtogs pas gnyi ka'i 'ching ba rab bcad nas//mi 'gal mnyam
109b5(rgyud): pa'i don la gnas byas pas//kun byed nga yi dgongs pa lhun gyis grub//kye gang gis 'ching ba de rtogs pacad byas shing //grol bar mi 'jug mya ngan 'das mi len//snying
109b6(rgyud): po'i don la phyogs ris dmigs mi 'dzin//don la mi bsgom snying rje yul mi 'jug/kye kun byed rgyal po nga yis gang bstan pa//sems dpa' rdo rjes don la goms par gyis//
109b7(rgyud): ye shes dran pas dbang sgyur rig pa'i ngang //'di ni kun byed rgyal por nges lung bstan zhes gsungaso//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las rig pa dbang sgyur la gnas pa'i
110a1(rgyud): pa'i le'u ste bdun cu lnga pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos sring po don gyi lam 'di gsungaso//kye sems dpa' rdo rje don la da
110a2(rgyud): bsgoms shig/snying po mi rtogs don gyi lam 'di la//nam mkha' mtha' ltar gnas pas mi khyab med//skye med min pa med pas mi sgoms med//rtog dpyod yul las 'das
110a3(rgyud): pas dmigasu med//snying po mtshan ma 'das pa'i yul 'di la//bgrod pa'i yul las 'das pas bgrod mo byed//lam la mi bgrong sa la mi spyod zhing //mi rtog bde la
110a4(rgyud): gnas pas lhun gyis grub//kye kur byed rgyal po de yis lam nyid ni//chos kyi dbyingasu gcig pas bgrod du med//snying po don dang 'grogs pas yengs pa med//thig le
110a5(rgyud): gcig tu 'dus pas gar mi 'gro//kye de ya don la sems dpa' rdo rje bsgom//bsgom du med pa'i don la ma bsgoms na//mtshan ma'i grangs la bskal pa brgyar bsgoms kyang //
110a6(rgyud): kun byed nga yi dgongs pa rtogs mi 'gyur//rnam rtog yul la mtshan ma'i grangs las 'das//kun byed bya mi dgos la byar yang med//bya ba mtshan mi'i rnal 'byor rjes
110a7(rgyud): gis shing //bya bas mi zin rtog pas rtog pa 'jil//chu las rnyog ma bzhin te byis pas bsrungs//kye sems dpa' rdo rje don la legs par bsgoms//nga ni ston pa kun
110b1(rgyud): byed rgyal po ste//dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi lam 'dren pas//khyod kyang lam la legs par zhugs//'das pa'i sangs rgyas skye med lam du zhugs//ma byon skye med lam
110b2(rgyud): lo 'jug par 'gyur//da ltar sangs rgyas skye med nyid la gnas//des na kun byed rgyal po kun gyi lam//kye lam 'dir 'jog tsong bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor po//de lta nyid
110b3(rgyud): nas rgyal ba'i sa la gnas//dgongs po mi 'dzin phyogs ris gzung du med//snying po'i lam la 'jug dang mi 'jug 'das//kye rnal 'byor dus gcig 'jug pa'i skal ldan
110b4(rgyud): la//kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs pa bstan byas nas//rtogs pa'i rlung la dran zhing 'dris pa las//bsgom zhing 'jug tu med par lung ston cig/kyang ni ston pa kun byed byung
110b5(rgyud): chub semasu byas//ma lus kun byas byang chub semasu byas//sems nyid skye ba med pa'i lam du byas//skye med bde ba'i lam la 'jug tu med//skal ldan rgyal sras
110b6(rgyud): dam par nges pa la//kun byed de yi la ma~M 'di goms byas nas//bgrod mod rtsal med snying po'i don rtogs nas//kun byed rgyal po nyid du the tshom med ces gsungaso//byang
110b7(rgyud): chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las snying po lam la gnas pa'i le'u ste bdun cu drug pa'o///de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos don la spyang du med
111a1(rgyud): dru gsung so// sems dpa' du rtogs pa'i don la bsgoms//sto b+hu'i smyon pa sman byed rgyal po yis//bsam gyis mi khyub sa pa'i dus brgyud
111a2(rgyud): pa/snying po rtogs pa'i sa zhes bshad pa yin//bde tshe ni nges pa'i dus su gang bstan pa//de ni goms pa'i so zhes bshad pa yin//gzhan dag rtsol zhing spyod pa'i khyod
111a3(rgyud): par dag/khams gsum 'khor ba'i snying po bsgribs pa'i sa//sa zhes bya ba gnas pa'i khyad par te//gang la gang gnas de ni sa yin no//kye sku gsum ston pa'i sa la grangs
111a4(rgyud): bgrangs kyang //kun byeng rgyal po'i sA la rim pa med//sa dang sa yi rim pa'i khyad par yod//ces pa sku gsum ston pas 'khor la bstan pa yin//kye ston pa'i ston
111a5(rgyud): pa kun byed rgyal po yiso//mnyam nyid skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin la//thabs dang snying po rtogs pa'i gang zag gis//sgrib dang sa yis byed par bstan//kun byed rgyal
111a6(rgyud): po de yi rang bzhin ni//du ma gsum 'byung 'jug mi byed yid la byed pa med//ris su mi lta mtshan ma'i yul mi tshol//kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs pa'i lung du bstan//
111a7(rgyud): kye kun byed rgyal por yi dgongs pa ni/tshig dang yi gos mtshon po ma rnyed cing //sgra dang tshad mas gtan la dbang du med//skye bo med pas 'gag pa med pa yin//'phel
111b1(rgyud): med cing yongasu 'grib mi byed//mtshan ma min zhing de nyid min pa'ang min//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun//skye ba med pa'i ngo bar
111b2(rgyud): byin brlabs pas//rtogs pa sna de nyid dang du ldog par 'gyur//kun byed rgyal po'i byin rlabs kyis//sems dpa' rdo rjes ji ltar rtogs pa ltar//phyi rabs kun byed lung la dang
111b3(rgyud): pa la//dngos po skye ba med par byin rlobs shig/da ltar skem du med pa'i snying po la//ma yengs dran pas bzung ba man ngag yin//kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems 'dra la//
111b4(rgyud): bshad pas ma yin tshig su bcad pas min//bsgom pas ma yin ma bsgoms pas kyang min//snying po sngags dang phyag rgya kun las 'das//kye kun byed rgyal po nga yis bstan
111b5(rgyud): pa'i sa//ma lus 'di la brten pas spyod len med//phyogs cha myed par khyab pas che chung med//chos kyi dbyingasu gnas phyis rtog dang mi rtog med//dri phyir dus gcig
111b6(rgyud): gnas pa'i sa 'di la sems dpa' rdo rje legs par gnas par gyis shes gsungaso//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las don la sbyang med kyi le'u ste bdun cu bdun
111b7(rgyud): pa'o//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos mnyam pa la blang dor mod pa'i dgongs pa 'di gsung so//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgya ma po yis/
112a1(rgyud): /mod drung chub snyoms kyi rang bkun pa//d+hU ban m+b+ha b+h+yos+yA gnas pa'i da sa p+ta la//rlung dang do pa yod par lung ma bstan//sgyu med rang bzhin//
112a2(rgyud): kun gyis 'dus byed pa//rlung dor med par rtogs par lung bstan to//kye sems dpeng rdo rje snang pa'i don lce bsgom//dAnA sa rI na snying po la//byung dor rnam
112a3(rgyud): rtog bcos pa'i yul med de//rang bzhag bde ba mchog gis goms par byed//kun byed rtogs na snying po kun+da gnas pas//snying po'i don la blang dor lung ma
112a4(rgyud): bstar//skye zhing 'jig pa'i rgyus su 'du lung ma bstan//bzung ngan gcung smai'i rjes su 'ang lung myi bstan//rtog pyod bsam pa'i yul lus 'das par byesta/
112a5(rgyud): sems dpa' rdo rjes des ba sgoms shig/bsgom dang bsgom pA b+ha ba yul nyid ni//ma b+h+yon+dos kun byed sems kyi rang bzhin la//bsgom dang mi bsgo ma rnam
112a6(rgyud): yul las 'das//kye kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems pa ni//nga yi 'khor du 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la//blang dang dor ba'i chos nyid mi ston//gcig
112b1(rgyud): la gnyi su dbye ba'i chos ma ston//rtog dang dpyod 'das rtog dpyod pas ma myi byed//ma gcos ji bzhin pa lnga 'tsho snga ma byed//bya ba gang gtang ci snang chos nyid la//ma
112b2(rgyud): bsams rang bzhin bzhag pas grol bar ston//kye sems dpa'o rdo rje chen po dade bsgoms shig/brang dor med pa'i chos nyid byang chub lo//mkha' ltar gnas pas lus sems
112b3(rgyud): bcosu med//'du shes zhe na 'jig/med pas bsgom du med//mkha' ltar rab zhi rnyog pa kun bral la//yul la mi 'jug dgongs pa'i dmigs 'jug bral//kye sems
112b4(rgyud): dpa' rdo rje legs par da bsgoms shig/dbang po yul la mi rtog sems mi sdud//gnyen po ma brten lus sems rgyud ma sbyongs//lus sems ma bcos snying po'i
112b5(rgyud): don tu rtogs//kye kun byed rgyal po dA yi spyod pa ni//ma btsal lkug par gnas pas don kun rdzogs//snying po'i don du 'dus pos blang dor med//re dogs rnam par chad pas
112b6(rgyud): mya ngan 'das mi bsgom//kun byed nga yi spyod pa gang rtogs pas//dus gsum skye med don du mnyam pa la//'jug dang mi 'jug tshig las shin tu 'das//'di ni rlung dor med
112b7(rgyud): par lung bstan to zhes gsungs//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las mnyam pa la brang dor med par bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun cu brgyad pa'o///de nas
113a1(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems kun byeng rgyal pos rad+ma 'byung snying po'i rlung la sgrub pa bsal du med pa'i dgongs pa d+ma di gsung so//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed
113a2(rgyud): rgyal po yis//snying po slob med dgongs par lung bstan pa//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa//skye med chos kyi dbyings kun gcig bris//skye med snying
113a3(rgyud): thugs kyi rang bzhin la//sgrib pa mi sgrib khyad par bstan pa myed//kye sems dpa' rdo rje legs par de bsgoms shig/skyo med chos kyi dbyings suM gcig pA la/
113a4(rgyud): sgrib dang mi sgrib spong len gang 'dod pa//dam pa'i snying po'i don dang 'gal bar 'gyur//kun byed byang chub sems kyis lung bstan pa//skye myong bsgoms pas skye ba
113a5(rgyud): snying por gsal//mkha' ltar rtog dpyod 'das la gang gnas pas//sgrib drang myi skye bo byang chub semasu gnas//kye kun byed rgyal pos 'khor la lung bstan
113a6(rgyud): pa//ye shes sgrib med gsal ba'i don du bstan//rang 'byung rgyu rkyen med pa'i snying por gnas//rtogs pas sgro skur 'das pa'i dgongs pa yin//kye de phyir sems
113a7(rgyud): dpa' rdo rje sgoms shig/rang 'byung ye shes dmigs pa kun las 'das//rtogs pa dmigs pa'i don du gzhog mi byed//yul las 'das pas rnam shes srung
113b1(rgyud): mi byed//dngos pa stong par gsal bas sgom mi byed//rnam pa snying par gsal ngas re dogs med//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byeng rgyal po yis//ma bac+doMs 'khor gyi nang du
113b2(rgyud): lung bstan pa//ma bcos snying po chos kun rtsol ba la//ji ltar snang ba gtan la 'bebs par byed//snying po rang bzhin gcig gi don rtogs na//kun gyi rang bzhin kun byed
113b3(rgyud): nyid du 'dus//nges na kun byed nga yi don mkhas na//bsam gyis mi khyab chos la mkhas par 'gyur//kun byed pa yi don la goms gyur na//kun gyi don la gnas shing
113b4(rgyud): bloms pa yin//kye sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da bsgoms shig/ji ltar snang grags chos rnams thams cad la//snying po rtogs goms don nyid gcig las myed//
113b5(rgyud): snying po mngon du phyung nas gang bstan pa//rang bzhin skye ba med pa'i don du rtogs//mi yengs re dogs chad pas dgongs pa yin//kye sems dpa' rdo rje legs par nga bsgoms
113b6(rgyud): shig/ji ltar snang ba'i chos su gang bstan pa//kun byed rgyal po mtshan pa'i thabasu bstan//thabs de'i lung dang 'gal bar ma byed ci /kun byed nga yi sras su zhugs
113b7(rgyud): rnams kyis//kun kyang skye med don du rtogs 'gyur na//'khor dang mya ngan 'das par mi sems te//snying po rang bzhin rtogs dpyod bral bar bstan zhes gsungs so//
114a1(rgyud): byang chub kyi snyoms kun byed rgyal b+h+yo las mi bsgrib pa'i lde'u ste bdun du dgu pa'o///de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal bas
114a2(rgyud): lhun grub re dogs las 'das pa'i dgongs pa 'di gsungaso//kye sems dpa' rdo rje legs par de bsgoms shig/nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste//ji ltar snang ba'i chos
114a3(rgyud): rnams ma lus pa//kye sems kyi rang bzhin nyid du bsten//kye sems kyi rang bzhin lhudan gyis sgrub pa'i phyir//grub dang ma grub gnyis lung myi ston//'di deng sdug
114a4(rgyud): bsngal gnyis rtog me byed//'khor dang mya ngan 'dres pa der dogs bral//lhun grub sems kyi rang bzhin cir snang bas//mi byung stong pa'i don du sgyu ma byed//ge'its+tsha
114a5(rgyud): po rtog dpyod las 'das pas grub cing brten pa'i phyogasu zhen mi byed//kye sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da sgoms shig/lhun grub rtog dpyad 'das pa'i snying po lnga//
114a6(rgyud): grub dang mo grub don la rtog mi byed//de phyed khyod kyang rtog par ma byed cig/kye lhun grub bye rtsa la 'das pa'i snying po la//gang gi phyogs ldog med pa'i zhen pa ni//
114a7(rgyud): ji ltar ngus pa mkha' la rtsod pa ltar//kun byed nga yi rang bzhin mthong mi 'gyur//gang gis gang spangs ldog par 'dod pa ni//re dogs 'jigs pa'i sems dang
114b1(rgyud): ma bral bas//mtha' bral mtha' la zhen pa'i gang zag gis//d+hun grub pa snying po'i don la ji ltar rog/kye sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da sgoms shig/ma skyes pa
114b2(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i don snad dus//snang ba dngos por mi lta 'jig mi byed//snang ba skye ba med par rang grol bas//stong pa mi bsgom ji bzhin rtogs pas grel//kye ston pa'i ston
114b3(rgyud): pa kun byed rgyal po ngas//ji ltar snang ba'i chos ni thams cad kun//ma skyes rnam par dag par lung bstan pas//ji ltar ste ba med po nyid du rtogs//kye nga las byung ba ston pa sku
114b4(rgyud): gsum lo//sems nyid skye ba med par kun smra zhing //rang bzhin med pa'i don la kun rtsod kyang //skye med mngon sum dus kyis rtogs pa med//de phyir kun byed rgyal po'i lung 'di
114b5(rgyud): la//shes nas ma yengs dron la gnas pa las//rtsol bas mi 'jug gnyen pos sems mi sbyongs//yul la mi 'jog dran pa'i sems mi sdud//gang ltar 'byung ba de nyid
114b6(rgyud): don yin pas/kun byed nga yi don la 'jug par gyis//k+She ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis//ma bcos sems kyi 'khor lnga lung phog pa//ma lus skye med rtogs
114b7(rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor pa//rang bzhin bcu las rtsol bar ma byed cig/kun byed byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin la//shes pas gzung 'dzin mi shes spang med pas//rtogs pa
115a1(rgyud): dbang spyad don la gnas pa yis//kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs pa lhun gyis grub ces gsungaso//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las lhun grub
115a2(rgyud): re dogs bcad pa'i le'u ste brgyad bcu pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la sems dpa'i rdo rjes 'di skad ces zhus so//kye ston pa
115a3(rgyud): kun byed rgyal po lags//ji ltar snang ba'i chos ni khyod kyis byas//bstan pa'i dam chos mya lus khyod kyis bkod//dram pa'i rang bzhin khyod kyis bstan pas na//khyod kyi rang
115a4(rgyud): bzhi ni rtogs na chos kun rtogs//de bas chos kun nyid kyi rang bzhin 'di//'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsal bar ma rig pas//don du ji ltar gnas pa bshud du gsol zhes
115a5(rgyud): zhus so//de nas byang chub kyo sems kun byed rgyal pos mdo lung rgyud la bsdu ba 'di gsungaso//kye sems dpa' rdo rje legs par nan tan gyis//ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal//
115a6(rgyud): po yis//'khor la mdo lung bsdus pa 'di phog pa//legs par bstan pa'i don la nan tan gyis//kye nga yi rang bzhin skye med don cig la//rgyud kyi rang bzhin rnam pa gsum
115a7(rgyud): du bstan//gdams pa rnam pa gsum gyi rim pa yis//rgyud ni rtsa ba'i rgyud dang phyi ma dang //phye ma'i phyi mas don rdzogs bstan pa yon//kye rtsa ba thos pa'i rang bzhin
115b1(rgyud): bstan pa ni//nga yi rang bzhin lnga bcu rtsa bdun gyis//dngos po'i don kun gtan la phab pa ste//sems dpa' rdo rjes legs par nan tan gyis//kye nga yi rang bzhin lnga bcu rtsa bdun
115b2(rgyud): ni//mngon du byung ba'i mdo lung bcu po dang //desA par bstan pa'i mdo lung bcu po dang /rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i mdo lung bcu po dang //bya med rdorje pa'i mdo da bcu po dang //gtan la 'brings pa'i mdo lung //
115b3(rgyud): bca ba ngang //dgos ched sor bstan pra lnga bcu lnga//gcig gis gzhi bstan gcig gis godrams pa bstan//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis//mngon du phyung ba'i mdo lung
115b4(rgyud): bcu bstan pa//dang po dang ni bcu dang gnyis bstan pa//bcu gcig pa dang gsum dang nyi shu pa//bco lnga pa dang nyi shu lnga pa dang //nyi shu rtsa gcig drug pas rdzogs pa yin//gangam
115b5(rgyud): ngag phog pas mngon phyung mthong ba'i phyir//bcu drug pa yis mngon phyung dgos pa bstan//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis//nges par bstan pa'i mdo lung bcu bstan
115b6(rgyud): ba//bzhi pa sum cu gsum cu pa gau sum pa//bcu gnyis pa dang lnga dang gsum bcu gnyis//sum bcu drug dang sum bcu bzhi pa dang //nyi shu dgu dang bcu bdun pa yis
115b7(rgyud): rdzogs//ngas par de stan pa'i dgos pa yid mes dag/lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa yis bstan pa yin//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis//rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i mdo
116a1(rgyud): lung bcu bstan pa//shing du gtsug pa bcu bzhi sum nu brgyud//dgu nas s+ho gu dgu pa//bcoM brgyud pa dang shrI bcu dang //u wAn+tag slo mang/
116a2(rgyud): bstan pa yin//rgyu 'bras 'das pas rtsol bsgrub bya mi dgos//bdun pa nyid du ngos por bstan pa yin//kye sten po'i ston pa kun byang rgyal po yis//bya med rdzogs pa'i lung
116a3(rgyud): bcu bstan pa ni/nyi shu gnyis dang sum cu pA dag dang //nyi shu bzhi dang nyer brgyad de nyi shu bdun/sum cu gcig dang nyid gsum nyi shu drug/zhi bzhi lnga bcu drug pa sna bstan pa yin//
116a4(rgyud): ma byas rang bzhin rdzogs par bstan pa'i phyir//bzhi bcu gsum pas de'i dgos pa bstan//kyai ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis//gtan la 'bebs la'i lung bcu bstan pa
116a5(rgyud): ni//rje brgyad pa dang sum cu dgu pa dang //bzhi bcu lha dang so bdun zhe drug pa//zhe bdun pa dang zhe dgu nga gci gaM pa//lnga bcu po dang lnga bcu gsum pas rdzogs//gtan la phebs nam
116a6(rgyud): bcos bcos med pas//bzhi bcu gnyis pas dgos pa bstan pa yin//lnga bcu bzhi pas rtsa ba'i gzhi bstan nas//lnga bcu bdun pas btad cing gdams pa ste//rtsa ba'i
116a7(rgyud): rgyud de thos par gces pa yin//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po des//bsam pas gtan la phab ste bstan pa ni/rtsa ba'i rgyud du gsungs pa'i don rnams kyang //rdzogs
116b1(rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin bcu ru bstan pa'i phyir//rtogs pa'i mdo lung bcu ru bstan pa yin//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis//bsgom pas nges par 'byin par bshad pa ni//
116b2(rgyud): rang bzhin bcu ru dgosaM pas bshad pa yang //skye ba med pa'i don du bsdus te bstan//skye med rtogs pa'i don las mA yengs pas//bsgoms pa'i mdo lung bcu ru bsdus
116b3(rgyud): te bstan//'od las 'phros shing thams cad 'dir 'dus pas//kun bgyi rtsa ba don gyi 'grol ba'i lung //kun byed nga yi sras su gyur pa la//ming gis don mtshon skye ming
116b4(rgyud): rtogs phyir bstan//kye sems dpa' rdo rje legs par nan tan gyis//theg pa'i rna ba byang chub sems kyi lung //kun byed rgyal pos bsdus pa'i rtsa ba 'dri//sems dpa' di rje
116b5(rgyud): legs par rtogs 'gyur na//rgyal ba'i rgyal ba kun byed rgyal por 'gyur//de phyir kun byed nga yi 'khor rnams la//sems dpa' rdo rjes don 'di lung ston cig/skye med
116b6(rgyud): byang chub sems su lung ston cig/'khor 'das dbyingasu gcig par lung ston cig/rgyu 'bras dus gcig rdzogs par ston cig ces gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal
116b7(rgyud): po las dgod pa don lnga mig gi le'u ste brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la sems dpa' rdo rjes gus pa'i tshul gyis bstod pa/
117a1(rgyud): na ston rgyu 'gro//m+b+ha/sum rgyus nga nan tshu hU~M / mas sugs sas smyan //na dun
117a2(rgyud): byed rgyal po khyod la 'dud//kye ston bu'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod//'das pa'i sangs rgyas kun byed khyod kyi byas//ma byon pa dang da ltar byed cing mdzad//ston pa kun byed/
117a3(rgyud): rgyal po khyod la 'dud//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byeng rgyal po khyod//khams gsum srid gsum byed mkhyen khyod kyis byas//rang 'byung lnga dang rgyan gyi rgya lnga dang //ye shes lnga
117a4(rgyud): byobyas kun byed khyod la 'dud//kyi ston pa'i ston pa kun+d+ha byed rgyal po khyod//sku gsum ston pa gsum yang khyod kyis byas//sku gsum thugs gsum mA lus kun byas pas//
117a5(rgyud): ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod la 'dud//kye ston bya'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod//sku gsum bzhugs pa'i gnas kyang khyod kyis byas//'khor gyi dang po sdud pa yang
117a6(rgyud): nyid khyod las byung //ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod lce bdud//kyi ston pa'i ston pa ku ni byed rgyal po khyod//'dus pa'i 'khor yang nges par khyod kyis byas//bstan pa gsum
117a7(rgyud): yang nges par khyod kyis byas//kun byed rgyal po nyid la phyag 'tshal 'dud//kye ston pa'i ston po kun byeng rgyal po khyod//zag med shes rab rtogs pa gsum
117b1(rgyud): bstan pas//'khor gyi mun pa'i dkyil 'khor snang mdzad pa//kun byed rgyalu po nyid la phyag 'tshal 'dud//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byeng rgyal po khyod//nyid kyi thugs ga ga tu rang
117b2(rgyud): ye shes las//'byung zhing sdud pa'i rtsa ba khyod nyid pas//chos kyi snying po khyod la phyog 'tshal 'du//kyi ston pa'i ston pa kun byang rgyal po khyod//ma rig pa'i lam ni bsal
117b3(rgyud): nas kyang //ye shesa? snang ba kun tu mched par byed//ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod la 'dud//kye ji ltar snang ba'i chos ni thams cad kuno//rang 'byung nyid pas rgyu rkyen kun dang bral//
117b4(rgyud): ma bcos snying po ji bzhin gsol bas na//rang 'byung ye shes kun byed rgyal po nyid//ji ltar brtags kyang gting mtha' dbus med de//kun gyi 'byung gi nas bsam pa
117b5(rgyud): yul las 'das//skye 'gag dmigs 'jug las 'das rnam par ni//su zhig 'jug cing dmigs dang dad pa dag/'di la dman par dmyigs med pas//mi rtsol ba la
117b6(rgyud): gnas shing dbugs phyin 'gyur//chos kyi rtsa ba kun byed rgyal po las//ji ltar gnas pa rtsol sgrub kun dang bral zhes gsung so//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las
117b7(rgyud): rjesu bstod pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la sems dpa' rdo rje legs par 'dun nas zhus pa/kye
118a1(rgyud): /ston pa'o ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/ji ltar snang zhing grags dA'i chos rnams kun//rang 'byung ye shes gcig tu bstanu pa'i mdo//
118a2(rgyud): chos kyi rtsa ba kun byed rgyal po'i rgyud//phyi robs rnal 'byor gang dang gang dag las//bstan cing gdams pa legs par bya shAng du gsol zhes zhus so//de nas byang
118a3(rgyud): chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos skal ldan la gad mos pa'i don 'di gsungaso//kye sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da nyon cig ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgya lnga po ngas//
118a4(rgyud): ji ltar snang zhing gra gau snga po'i chos rnams kun//ngas byas byed dang byed 'gyur snying po'i don//gzhi rtsa kun 'das snying po byang chub rgyu//dgongs pa mngon du phyung ba'i mdo
118a5(rgyud): lu ba sa//ngad dang dam tshig brtson 'grus che ba dang //snying rje yi rang skyo dang yid ldog med//lus dang bu dang chung ma bran dang nor//gang la'ang ma chags dad dang dga' bas
118a6(rgyud): 'brug/'di dag dad dang dam tshig rtags yin pas//snying po'i don dang ldan pas sbyin par bya//grags pa spang zhing nga rgyal bral ba dang //dam pa snying po'i don phyir
118a7(rgyud): lus srog yangs pa med//bka' las mi 'da' rtags dang ldan pa la//snying po don dang skye med bstan pa sbyin//gang gis snying po'i bstan pa bdag thob no//'ji
118b1(rgyud): mtsha nams bdug la tsaM bag+ni ste//thob na bya dag gis dkru' bsgrub bo zhes//dam bca' legs par granas na bstan pa sbyin//ji srid bdug dang slob dpon 'tsho ba'i bar//lus
118b2(rgyud): bsrog gi 'brel ba ma mchis pad+ma//khyod kyi bka' bzhin bsgrub ces gnas phor la//bstan pa'i snying po kun byed rgyalo po sbyin//mdor na lus dang sob kyang 'bul bya zhing /
118b3(rgyud): rdzas dang zhing yul rkang 'gros smos ci dgos//gal te bdag la dgongs par ma gyur kyang //dam pas blangs te dkon mtsho gra gsum la 'bul//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byang
118b4(rgyud): rgyal po yis//snad min log pa'i gang zag bstan pa ni//grags dang 'jig rten chos la dgra' ba dang //nga rgyal dam par mi bkur yid thung ldog/'phyar zhing rdzas dang dad par mi
118b5(rgyud): ldan te//rang chod nyams len btson thabs 'dod pa dang //bstan pa yongs la 'phel zhing mi 'thun zhing //sgro skur bdag gzhan gnad sems bsgom pa min//'di la
118b6(rgyud): mi bstan mchog tu gsang bar bya//sngon du rtags dang dad pa brtag bya'i phyir//rin chen dbyig dang chas pas gus mnod gyis//chags sems nga rgyal gzhan sems ma nges
118b7(rgyud): la//de la kun byeng rgyal po bstan mi byi//snying po'i don la blang der mi gnas kyang //mi ma yin dang 'byung pos par gcod cing //mkha' 'gro gyur pa can gyis gnyi ga
119a1(rgyud): la//dus min 'tsho dang 'jigs pa'i dbang gyur nas//sgo skur dbang gis snying po'i thog pa nub//de bas rigs ngan gang zag spang bar bya/'jig rten
119a2(rgyud): zhen pa dbral zhing rgyud brtag phyir//lus dang longs spyod bla mas kun blangs la//nus dang mi nus khyad par rtags ldan nas//snying po don bstan kun byed rgyal po sbyin
119a3(rgyud): zhes gsungaso//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las bstan pa gang la bzhag pa'i le'u ste brgya bcu rtsa gsum pa'o////de nas byang chub kyi sems
119a4(rgyud): kun byed rgyal po la sems dpa' rdo rjes legs par mdangs phyung ste 'dun nas zhus pa/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po legs//nyid kyi thugs gcig rang 'byung
119a5(rgyud): ye shes las//skal ldan dus gcig grol bar mdzad pa'i mdo//mtshan gyi khyad par bdag lu bshad du gsol zhes zhus so//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed
119a6(rgyud): rgyal pos mtshan gyi rnam grangs rnam par phye ba 'di gsung so//kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis//mtshan gyi khyad par phye ste bshad pa ni//ji ltar snang ba'i chos
119a7(rgyud): rnams thams cad kun//me lus kun byas byed cing byed 'gyur te//nyid la bye mi dgos te lhun grub pas//kun byed rgyal po zhes su bstan pa yin//kyo snying po la dri ma
119b1(rgyud): med pa dang //ma btsal ldan gyi grub pa'i don ldan pas//'di la brtul zhing sgrub pa mo mnga' ste//byang chub sems zhes nges par bstan pa yin// ma 'dod nas grub pa'i chos nyid
119b2(rgyud): la//rgyu dang rkyen med bcol med snying po 'di//me bsgribs kun la phyogs ris med gsalta bas//rang 'byung ye shes zhes su bstan pa yin//kye ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams
119b3(rgyud): thams cad kun//mu bcos ji bzhin da la kun snang bas//phyogs ris gnyisu chad pa'i don med de//bka' yi 'brel pa chos kyi me lhong yin//kyai ji bzhin ma bcos snying
119b4(rgyud): po rnal ma la//'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa 'byung sdud pa//blang dor 'dzin chags brgya las rnam grol te//snying po don gyi theg pa bstan pa yin//kye 'das dang ma byon da ltar rgyal ba
119b5(rgyud): la//kye med 'od las kye ba ma gzigs pas//mi bcos thil le gzung 'dzin las 'das pas//lta ba'i me long zhes su bstan pa yin//kye nga ni ma bcos rnga bzhin po la//skyo
119b6(rgyud): 'dogs skur 'debs don las kun 'das te//dus gsum rgyal ba nga las byung bas na//rgyal ba'i yum zhes nges par bstan pa yin//kye ma bcos skye med kun byed rgyal po la//
119b7(rgyud): ma btsal dgos pa'i yon tan tshong rdzogs pas//btsal zhing bsgrub pa kun las 'das pas na//rgyud kyi rgyal po zhesu bstan pa yin//kye ma bcos don la ma nor blo 'jog pas///
120a1(rgyud): snang ba dan la sgro dang sbyar ba dral//gcig mi 'gal don du gang bston pa//ma bcos don gyi lhung du bstan pa yin/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal
120a2(rgyud): pos lung bstan pa//skye med byang chub sems dang ldan pa'i don//gnyis med snying por ro gcig gnas pa la//kun gyi med ni mdo ru bstan pa yin//kye ma rig pa'i mun pa
120a3(rgyud): sel ba yin/me shos snang ba mched par byed pa yin//sdug bsngal rgya mtsho gcod par byed pa yin//snying po don la goms par byed pa yin//kye ngas ni ma rig pa
120a4(rgyud): dmigs bsal nas//skye med byang chub sems ni mngon bstan nA//skal ldan rnal 'byor mig dang ldan pa dag/bya ba med par rang bzhin grol bar 'gyur//theg pa'i yang snying
120a5(rgyud): bka' yi rdzogs chen 'di//man ngag snying po lung dang ldan rnams kyis//rang bzhag bde bar gnas na gesal bar 'grub//ma bcos mi 'gyur 'jug cing rtsol ba med/
120a6(rgyud): kye nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste//theg pa'i rtsa ba chos kyi snying po'i lung //sku gsum ston pas ma gsungs rgya che ba/skye ba med par ston pa'i sems rgyud 'di//dus gsum
120a7(rgyud): rgyal lo sngon tshad mi gsungs te//phye ma me gsung da ltang ston mi mdzad//kun byed rgyal pos 'pho 'gyur mi mnga' bos//sde bar gsungs shing phyis kyang gsung 'gyur
120b1(rgyud): //da stong byu bdag ngas pas sprul ldan la// par bstan pas 'dud mod grol ba'i ltung //rlud+mo lung mngon du na pa'i dka' rgyud 'd-i//mo 'phrul na nub sgyu na
120b2(rgyud): /sbyin byed rgyal pi nges pa byed la gted ces gsung sa//byang chub kyi sems kun rgyal po//lces rkyen gyi rnam grangs basbyin gyi le'u skye brgyad ni rna bzhi pa
120b3(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po lta bu na mkha' ltar mthu dbus med pa'i rgyud namakhro'i snying po mchog gi don gis ba mchog gi mdo lung brgyad bzhi pa rdzogs/
120b4(rgyud): rgyug b+h+yo mkhan pa la gyi seng ge ma n+d+ha ba~M da/slong don nis bskye sa te gtan la sgrub pa 'i///rgyu gdos dadu//sarba ta thAg
120b5(rgyud): ta twAdz+nyAn+da gud+d+ha AHgar+b+ha b+hU ha badz+ra tan+t+ra sid+d+hi yo g+na A~M ga mA sa mA dza sar+b+ba bid+ha s+yA twAMm+b+hat+mA g+h+nAn+d+ra sa b+hI sa ma ya d+har+m+ma pad+mA ya bi b+hu ha nA ma stu tAM/bru zhi'i skad du/hon pa nir la to la
120b6(rgyud): bri bru~M hriM t+tA pe t+yai tA sing 'u ni 'u blo hang pang ri la 'ub pi suM bang ri zhe til pa'i mamu kyang klu'i drung rad ti/bod skad du/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs gsang ba'i
120b7(rgyud): ye shes don gyi snying po rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor grub pa'i kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa chos kyi rnam grangs rnam par bkod pa zhes
121a1(rgyud): bya ba'i mdo////byam po dang po ste thog ma zug pa/bcom ldan 'das dpal sgrol byed thugs rje'i rgyal po shin tu rnam par grol bya nyid
121a2(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal//'di skad 'gro ba bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bcom ldan 'dis gseng ba pa'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po ji
121a3(rgyud): skad du rnam par 'gro ba'i skyes bu smra ba'i seng ge de 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa na 'khod cing sems can gyi ris tha dad pa na bzhugs te bsam
121a4(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa bsam du med pa'i chos dpag tu myed pa'i rgyul ba kun gyis bsngags pa'i 'dro 'bral med pa'i gzungs/thams cad rig pa gsang sngags kying po
121a5(rgyud): ji snyed pa'i ji bzhin pa/chos thams cad kyi me long de nyid mi 'phrul bdu nyan cing ma nor bar ston te rnam par 'gro ba ni 'di lta ste/sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa'i zhing khams
121a6(rgyud): mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba rdo rje 'od zer gyis rnam par brgyan pa na rdo rje phung po'i ri bo la skyes bu chen po sems dpa' rdo rje zhes bya bar byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag sa
121a7(rgyud): ya'i 'khor dang bcas to//sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid rang gi ston pa la nyan cing rang gi nyon 'khor la de bzhin ston te/yongasu 'das
121b1(rgyud): kyang de bzhin nyid du bsnyad pa'i sku nas de rnam par 'gro bar byed do//sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ba'i zhing khams dpal dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rin po che'i phung po rnam par bkod pa na po
121b2(rgyud): du r+ya 'od mtho ba zhes bya ba'i ro bo la skyes bu chen po rdo rje rin chen zhes bya bar byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag sa ya'i 'khor dang btsos te//sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'ong
121b3(rgyud): gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid rlung gi ston pa le nyan cing rang gi nyin 'khor la de bzhin ston te/yongasu 'dus nas kyang ji bzhin par bskyed pa'i sgo nas de rnam par 'gro bar
121b4(rgyud): byed do//sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi zhing khams pad+ma nan zhes bya ba pad+mo mdzes par bkod pa na/pad+mo'i phung po'i ri bo lnga skyes bu chen po chos kyi spyan zhes bya bar byang chub
121b5(rgyud): sems dpa' bye ba phrag sa ya'i 'khor dang bcas te/sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid rang gi ston pa la nyan cing rang gi nyon 'khor la de bzhin
121b6(rgyud): ston te/yongasu 'das nas kyang ji lta bar bskang ba'i sgo nas de rnam par 'gro bar byed do//sangs rgyas gdon mi za bar grub pa'i zhing khams rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba in dra
121b7(rgyud): nI la'i dra bas brgyan pa na rin po che sna tshogs bkod pa'i spo zhes bya ba'i ri bo la skyes bu chen po rdo rje las zhes bya bar byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag sa ya'i 'khor dang
122a1(rgyud): /bcas te/snyoms la 'khor gsal blugs sngags kyang ba de nyid rang gi n+d+ha pa la nyan cong dang ga na la byung la du banan sbyin /so su
122a2(rgyud): 'das nas kyang ma nor bar btasmras pa'i smonas de rnam par bgro dang byed do//sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhing khams byung chub kyi snying po can zhes bya bar sems
122a3(rgyud): tshogs kyis bstan pa na chos kyis mtho ba zhes bya ba'i ri bo la skyes bu chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya bar byang chub sems dpa' bya ba phyug sa ya'i 'khor dang bcas te/
122a4(rgyud): sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo ba de nyid rlong gi ston pa la nyan cing rang gi nyon 'khor la de bzhin ston te/yongs 'das kyang de kho na nyid du nges
122a5(rgyud): pA'i sgo nas de rnam par 'gro bar byed do//sangs rgyas thub pa'i dbang po'i zhing khams mos pa can mi mjed kyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu zhes bya ba rdo rje gdang
122a6(rgyud): gyis rnam par ba rgyun pa/gnod sbyin gyi gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang na skyes bu chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po zhes bya bar byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrogs
122a7(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi rigs can mang po'i 'khor dang bcas te/sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid rang gi ston pa la nyan cing rong gi nyen 'khor la
122b1(rgyud): de bzhin sbyin to//de bzhon du sa sa rgyas bsam gyos ma khyung bru'o khams dpag tu med pa dgrangs myod pa'i sgros buchen ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' byong drag
122b2(rgyud): snga ma brjod kyis me lang shi'i 'khor dang bcas te/sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsol ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo mtha' yas de nyid dang rang gi skyon pa drug la nyin ni rang rang gi
122b3(rgyud): nyen 'khor dag la de bzhin ston te/yongasu 'das nas kyang nges par brtags pa'i sgo nas da rnam par 'gro bar byed do//de bzhin du chos kyi skye'i zhing khams snying po bya
122b4(rgyud): chub zhes bya ba na rgyu la skyes bu zhes bya bar rgyal 'tsho ba skyes bri bas mA gyis maM khyab pa'i 'khor dang bciswA te/sems kyi rang bzhin ye nas sa sa rgyas par
122b5(rgyud): b+hur+ya bI gsong stegs kyi ngo bo de nyid lnga dgongs pa nges par 'grol to//de bzhin du sems can skyes bu bsam+b+ha gyis mi khyab pa/lha'i ris dang lha ma yin gyi ris dang /
122b6(rgyud): klu'i ris dang /maM'i ris dang /gnod sbyin gyi ris dang /srin po'i ris dang /byol sing gi ris dang /yI dgas kyi ris dang /dmyal ba'i ris la sogs pa 'jig rten dag go/
122b7(rgyud): phyogs bcu tha dad pa na ded dpon tha dad pa'i skyes bur gzugs tha dad par rnam par snang ba dag rang rang gi lus kyi 'khor tha dad pa dang bcas te/sems kyi me long 'ad gas /
123a1(rgyud): bags sngags kyi d+yo ba de nyid rang rlung gi thub pa'i dbang po la rang rang gi skad dang bang dang mos pa sna tshogs kyis nyan cang ming dang mtshan mar pat+tAgs pa nan
123a2(rgyud): nas rang rang gi nyen 'khor lo de bzhin ston to//de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang la la ni byang chub kyi rigs can dag go/la la ni byang chub pa dag go/la la ni
123a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dgo//la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag go/la la ni byang chub chen po drag go/de bzhin du gzhi lnga las btags pa tha dad du
123a4(rgyud): grogs pa ni 'di lta ste/rjesu yid ring ba dag dang /ma skyes pa'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dag dang /chos la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag pa
123a5(rgyud): dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa dag 'dun pos phyogs pa dag dang /rnyed pas mos pa dag dang /yongasu bsti gnas pa dag dang /skye ba gcig gis thogs pa
123a6(rgyud): ngag dang /srid pa tha ma pa dag dang /lam du 'jug pa dag dang /'gro ba dag dang /phyin pa dag dang /phyir 'ong ba dag dang /gnas pa dag dang /smon pa pa dang /ldang ba pa
123a7(rgyud): dang /'jug pa pa dang /gnas pa pa dang /rdzogs pa pa dang /rtsol ba pa dang /slob pa pa dang /mi slob pa pa dang /goms pa pa dang /mngon du gyur pa pa dang //rgyud
123b1(rgyud): du byung ba po dang /rigasu nges pa dang /chosu shes pa dang /chos lugs pa dang /rgyal 'chab pa dang /rigs thams cad pa dang /gzungs sngags pa dang /rigs sngags pa dang /
123b2(rgyud): gseng sngags pa dang /rigs gsum pa bzhi pa lnga pa dang /tshogs pa pa dang /sbyor ba pa dang /mthong ba pa dang /sgom pa pa dang /mthar phyin pa pa dang /'dun pa'i rnal 'byor
123b3(rgyud): pa dang rigs chen 'byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang /dbugs chen 'byin pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang /lung chen thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang /rtsa lo chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang /
123b4(rgyud): tshig gi tshogs pa dang /yi ge'i tshogs pa dang /ming gi tshogs po dang /brda'i tsho gas pa dang /tha snyad kyi tshogs pa la sogs pa she dag go/de dag las gzhi gsum pa ni
123b5(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi ngo bo nyid la 'jug go//spyod pa dang /gnas pa dang /thob pa dang /phyir lta ba dang /yongasu rdzogs pa'o//de kun tu bsgral gnas pa dang /sa la gnas pa dang /
123b6(rgyud): che la gnas pa dang /phyag rgya chen po dang lhun gyis grub par gyur pa 'ba' zhig go/de ltar na 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dzam+bu'i gling tha dad pa
123b7(rgyud): bye ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu dang bcas pa mtha' yas par 'jig rten gyi sgron ma bye ba mtha' yas par shar ba de dag kyang 'khor ba thog ma
124a1(rgyud): tha ma myed pa nas brjod kyis mi lang ba'i khamasu bskulnga pa tho mya tha ma med pa brjod kyis mi lang pa'i skabs la rtag par rgyun gyi 'khor mo 'byung /
124a2(rgyud): zhing sgron ma'i bya bas lha mi'i 'jig rten gyi mun pa bsal nas sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byas te/nyi za'i dkyil 'khor nub pa ltar yo ngasu mya ngan 'da' zhes
124a3(rgyud): thams cad nas thams cad du yongasu grags shing rnam par snang ngo //sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las thun mong bca' bzhi'o le'u ste dang po'o//
124a4(rgyud): de nas ji ltar de ltar 'di ltar mi 'jed ces bya ba'i 'jig rtena~M gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i ston pa rdo rje thub pa'i dbang po de skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya pa la byung ste/yun ha cang
124a5(rgyud): mi ring ba zhig bzhugs te yongasu mya ngan las 'das par dgongs nas yul yangs pa can zhes bya bar 'khor mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs par dbyer gyi ngo bo
124a6(rgyud): gsum 'das nas 'jig rten gyi slob ma la gdams dag gsum bzhag pa'i slad du 'khor 'dus pa rnams kyi nang na rdzu 'phrul cher spyod la bka' stsal pa//rdzu 'phrul
124a7(rgyud): can khyed deng la 'jig rten drug gi phyogs btsu na pa'i slob ma gang dag 'khod pa 'dre par phyogs pa dag gang ji snyed pa rnams bsdus shig/nges par bzhag par bya ba
124b1(rgyud): dgra yod do zhes gsungs pa dang /rdzu 'phrul can des chos kyi skad cig gis go bar bsgrags nas thams cad bsdus pa ni 'di lta ste/rgyal po'i zhing 'gyur ris drug gang su dag/
124b2(rgyud): 'di par dras shing phyogs pa kun nyon cig/deng 'dir rgyal ba bdud rtsi gsum 'jog gis/dug gsum 'joms par 'dod pa kun 'dus cig/de skad ces bsgrags pas
124b3(rgyud): dam pa'i rigs can lnga ma gtogs 'di lta ste/sngagaso kyi bsam gtan chen po'i nang du yang dag 'jog pa bskul ba chen po lang kwa'i mnga' bdag blo gros thabs ldan la sogs
124b4(rgyud): pa las gzhan thams cad 'dus par gyur to//de nas 'dus pa de dag las bka' stsal pa/kye grogs po dag shos par gyis shig/chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o//'byor
124b5(rgyud): pa thams cad ni mthar chud pa'o//dngos po thams cad ni nges par 'jig pa'o//gang zag gi srog gi dbang po la skye zhing yod pa'i phyir nga yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bas su dog
124b6(rgyud): the tshom ma mchod pa rnams dri ba gyis shing //de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /'khor deng 'dus par gyur pa'i rig 'dzin gyi rgyal po kun rdor zhes bya ba de rang gi stan las langs
124b7(rgyud): te/seng ge'i lta sangs kyis ston pa'i zhal du bltas nas 'di skad ces gsol to//khyod ni na mkha'i rang bzhin te/'das dang mi 'da' yod mi mnga'//'jig rten pa la
125a1(rgyud): 'thun 'jug tu//'da' bas yongasu 'dul bar dgongs//khyod ni 'jig rten sgron mar shar//lha m-i'i 'jig rten thams cad kyi//mun pa'i dkyil 'khor kun bsal/
125a2(rgyud): nas//sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsal mdzad de/sa dang rnam thar la spyad pa s+ho//byang chub thob par 'gyur ba yi//'dren pa'i theg pa rnam gsum la//gang dag rim par bkod
125a3(rgyud): lagasun//mnyam pas blang dor med spyod cing //byang chub gzhan nas mi 'tshol ba'i//thabs mchog dpag gis mi lang ba'i//nges pa'i theg chen yongs mu gsum//rgyal
125a4(rgyud): ba'i dgongs pa tshig gsum po//glidam dag lung du me bzhag ni//blo chung mun pas rmongs pa rnams//nges pa'i blo gros gang la bzhag/rnam par thar pa'i theg pa gsum
125a5(rgyud): gad bsdus gang la ga gri bsdu//'jig rten gsal ba'i nyi nub na//sgron ma gang+ga gis mdzad par 'gyur//bstan pa 'jig pa'i log sdu ba//rgol ba gang gis tshar gcod
125a6(rgyud): 'gyur//de skad ces gsol pa dang //bcom ldan 'das kyi sra bka' stsal pa/rig pa 'dzin pa chen po lagaso//khyod kyis dri ba lnga dris pa ni shin tu leg so//'di lta ste/
125a7(rgyud): de kho na nyid du nges pa'i theg pa chen po ste/gnas skabs gnyis dang bcur 'byung ba ste/gang rmongs pa gdung bsol ba na yang 'byung //gang 'jig rten gyi sgron ma yongasu
125b1(rgyud): bkod pa na yang 'byung /gang gis d+hes pA snad pa na yang 'byung /snying po byang chub nyid du nges pa na yang 'byung /dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa na yang 'byung /gdul bya skangs
125b2(rgyud): la bab pa'i ched ni yang 'byung /byin gyi brlabs las stong ba na yang 'byung //rgyud pi thabs kyis grags pa na yang 'byung /glang gi ched du mdzad pa na yang 'byung /lung rkyen
125b3(rgyud): nges par bstan pa ni yang 'byung /las rgyud yongasu gcod pa na yang 'byung /dgongs pa rnam par 'gro ba na yang 'byung /de dag ni thams cad kyi thams cad nas thams cad du
125b4(rgyud): kun tu yongasu rnam par snang ngo //snang bar gyur to//snang bar 'gyur zhes bka' stsal pas dri ba dang po'i yongasu rtog pa chad do//de nas yang ston pas dri ba gnyis pa dkar sna
125b5(rgyud): pa/rig pa 'dzin pa chen po blo dang ldan par bya'o//gros kyis chod par bya'o//thabs kyis zin par bya'o//bsam pa dag par bya'o//brjod pa drang por bya'o//spyod pa legs par
125b6(rgyud): bya'o//don btsal bar bya'o//dgos ched brtog par bya'o//nges pa rnyed por bya'o//badren par smra bar bya'o//tshig mi 'gyur bar bya'o//ji skad skyes pa bzhin du bya'o//sgo gsum
125b7(rgyud): la ma nges par bya'o//sngags gsum la bslab par bya'o//grong khyer gsum gshig par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas/dri bo gnyis pa'i yongasu rtog pa tshod do//denas
126a1(rgyud): yang ston pas dri ba gsum byuka' stsal pa/rig pa 'dzin pa 'di lta ste/nga yos sgron mya gang nag pa//snod gsum dag tu snang ba ste//zhi gnas
126a2(rgyud): lhag mthong las mtha' gsum+b+ha//drang por shes pa'i rgyud gsum la//de nas yi ge'i tshogs nyid la'o//chu chung rim pa'i blo yod phyir//thog pa'i rim pa de bzhin
126a3(rgyud): ta//bsdu ba'ang che chung gnyis kyis so//rnam pa gnyis kyi khyad par las//'jug pa'i yul yang de kho na'o//gang la mos pa de nyid du'o zhes bka' stsal pas dri ba
126a4(rgyud): gsum pa'i yongasu rtog pa chad do//de nas yang ston pas dri bo bzhi pa dang lnga pa tshig le'u gcig pu bka' stsal pa/gzhan yang drwa ba tha ma gnyis/gcig gis
126a5(rgyud): yongasu chod par byas//chos kyi spun du byas pa yi//rig pa 'dzin pa khyod nyon cig/sgron ma byed pa'i bya ba yang //sngon du 'byung ba'i lung bstan pa'i//'gro ba'i lus
126a6(rgyud): kyi sems dpa' dog/byung nas gsil byed log sun 'byin//de skad ces bka' stsal pas//dri ba bzhi pa dang lnga pa'i yong su rtog pa chad de yongasu mya ngan las
126a7(rgyud): 'das par gyur to//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mang chen po las gdams ngag nges par bzhag pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o///
126b1(rgyud): tshe de'i dus na gang dag mi chen po rnams ni yongasu gdung ba med par nang du yang dag 'jog go//byis pa rnams ni yongasu gdung bar gyur ta blo ya ya bor gyur cing shin tu
126b2(rgyud): nas rtag par rab tu ngu'o//'jig rten pa la lAni shI la thig par gyur/li la ni brgyal cing 'bog par gyur/la la ni la myes na sI ra bam pa bzhin du gyur to//de bzhi
126b3(rgyud): du thams cad khu tso mang po pha shi ba bzhin du kyi hud kyi hu de zhes gdung ba'i sgra sgrog so//lhag dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang srong ni yid du mi 'ong bar gyur to//bcud kyang
126b4(rgyud): sems kyi dkyil 'khor mog mog par gyur to//chos 'od par phyogs pa rnams ni mdangs nag por gyur to//bdud kyi cha 'dzin cing gzhan gyi bde ba rnams ni bden gyi dkyil
126b5(rgyud): 'khor dkar por gyur te kun kyang bca'u ka'i chog sgrogs par gyur to//de nas lo brgyad dang bcu gnyis 'das pa ni dam pa'i rigs can sems dpa' chen po dag nang du yang
126b6(rgyud): dag 'jog lnga langs pa dang /'jig rten gyi ston pa nub par gyur pas rmag chad bar ngus nas kyang rang rang gi mngon par shes pas lang kwa'i yul gyi grong rdal gyi mtsho gling
126b7(rgyud): rim la ya gnam lcags yod pa'i rtsal rdzu 'phrul gyi bya bas mngon par rab tu 'dus so//yongs 'dus nas 'dus pa de kun kyang mgrin gcig tu shin tu nyams thag
127a1(rgyud): pa'i ngangos smre sngags kyi gdung ba bton pa ni 'di lta ste/e ma'o kya hud a ma'o blong //ston pa'i sgron ma'i 'od nub na//'jig rten mun pa gang gos
127a2(rgyud): sel//tshad ma'i zhal de mi bzhugs pas//rjed mas gsungs pa'i bstan pA la//'jug par 'tshal ba'i 'gro ba rnams//log par 'jug par mi 'gyur ram//tshad
127a3(rgyud): mar dam bcas gang zag gris//nges ma rnyed pa'i gang zag lo//phan par bya phyir bka' bkrol byas//gtan la phe bras par 'gyur zhig gu/legs nyes 'byed pa'i
127a4(rgyud): spyan zum pas//bka' nyid khyad du gsod pa'i//skyon gyi spyi gtsug mthar phyin pas//log stobs 'phel bar mi 'gyur ram//log pa'i bstan pa'i sprin 'khrigs
127a5(rgyud): pos//bden pa gnyis kyi nyi zla nub//'phro bA gang zhig lam tshol ba//mun par 'khyams par mi 'gyur ram//ston pa mya ngan 'das 'og tu//bdud dang srin po
127a6(rgyud): mu stegs dang //gnod sbyin 'byung po mi ma yin//ma rungs bdug pa gsus 'dul 'gyur//dri med bstan pa'i bdud rtsi 'di//nub na shin tu ma rung na/rtsal dang
127a7(rgyud): ldan pa su zhig gis//'bar zhing snang bar byed par 'gyur//bslab pa dam pa'i rin po che//bral na shin tu ma rung na//skyes bu dam pa gang zhig gis//tshul rnams
127b1(rgyud): dzin par byed par 'gyur//ston pa mau na gas de rjes na//skyon pa'i slob mdze skyed pa//'phags dang gang zag tha dad pa//lung bstun 'byung ba grangs smrig/dAstan pa rnamapa
127b2(rgyud): 'dru ba gro/mos pa tha dad par bzung nas//yin dang mA yin che 'dzin cing //rtsod pa 'phel bar mi 'gyur ram//de nges par rigs gcig la//rigs mi 'thun pa tha dad
127b3(rgyud): spyod//rigs gcig tha dang rig sa rnams//bsrung cing bcos par myi 'gyur ram+b+ha//drin thang med pa'i rin po che//mi mkhas gang zag tha dad pas/na mongs 'dod pas
127b4(rgyud): khrod dbang gis//dug dang rje bar mi 'gyur ram//chos kyi rgyal po ston pa ste//'di mngon phan chad zhal bzhugs tshe//ma rungs pa rnams 'tshe bgyid na//gdug pa dang bar
127b5(rgyud): mi 'gyur ram//gang 'dir bsten pa gnas pa'i yun//ji srid gcig tu gnas par 'gyur//gang 'dir sngar 'byung gang sngar 'byung //phyis 'byung dus 'di ji ltar 'gyur//ston pa/
127b6(rgyud): bstan pa tha ma'i tshe//nges par ji ltar 'gyur shig su/bslab pa 'dzin pa'i slob pa rnams//tha ma ji ltar 'gyur zhig gu/'di nas mya ngan 'das 'og tu//gang ltar su'i srin
127b7(rgyud): bar gshegs//zhing khams phyogs ni gang na bzhugs//de nas bstan pa ci zhig sgrogs//da yong 'jig rten mgon med rnams//mgon dang skyabs su gang zhig 'gyur//
128a1(rgyud): 'phrul gyi blo dang gros stor na//blo dang gros ni gang nas btsal//nges pa'i don 'di ma rnyed na//da yong ngos don gang lngas gzung //mchod gnas yid
128a2(rgyud): rten mi bzhugs na//sku gdung ji ltar 'gyur zhig su//slad kyis mchod gnas ci la bgyi//da ltar ston pa 'dres 'og tu//gdung 'tsho ba skyes bu 'byung 'gyur ram//e
128a3(rgyud): ma'o kyi hud e ma'o blong zhes yongasu gdung ba bton to//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las thog mar dam pos gdung ba gton pa'i le'u ste/
128a4(rgyud): gsum pa'o///de skad smras te gdung ba las//srid gsum 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig pa//rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyis gsan//snying rje'i bdag po de dag
128a5(rgyud): kun//lcang lo can gyi pho brang du//gsang ba'i bdag po gnas su 'dus//bskul ba chen po 'di skad gsungaso//gsung ba pa'i bdag po khyod//sngon gyi go cha yal
128a6(rgyud): lam ci///'jig rten sdug bsngal mi shes sam//snying rje'i sa la babs nas kyang //'jig rten gdung ba gsal ba'i rigs//so so'i rigs kyi cha gzung bas//ma
128a7(rgyud): rungs pa dag kun btul te//'dod khrid thab su tshig rnams kyis//las kyi cha dang spyod 'thun par//'du shes bsgyur ba byas nas ni//bka yi 'gro ba bshad sbyar
128b1(rgyud): nas//yang dgra don la dgod pa'i rigs//de skad rnam par bskul ba las//dpa' bo rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos//gdul dka' 'dul la mkhas pa'o//'jig rten kun
128b2(rgyud): lu rgyal ba'i mchog/gsang ba'i rtags 'dzin rdo rje can//dgyes shing gdan las bzhengs nos ni//cho 'phrul chen po kun bstan nas//'jig rten log pa
128b3(rgyud): gtso bo rnams//skal dang ldan par lung bstan pa//lesA dang ska lnga par rab ldan zhing //rgyal bas 'byung bar lung bstan pa'i//bsod nams chen po'i skal can rnams//
128b4(rgyud): sprul pas ji ltar lung bstan bzhin//da ltar dus la 'dir bab gyis//'khor bya'i snying por lung bstan phyir//cho 'phrul rnams kyi byin brlabs kyis//bstan pa'i
128b5(rgyud): snying po dam pa zhig/ji ltar ba shad cing lung bstan bzhin//sgral ldan can la bgro bar bya'o//drag shul can zhes bya ba'i ri//dgon po chen po'i gnas 'di ni//
128b6(rgyud): shes snying po can rnams kyi//theg chen gsang ba 'byung ba'i gnas//theg ma tha mA'i dus med par//dam pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yin//thog ma tha ma med pa
128b7(rgyud): yi//rgyal ba dpag tu med pa yis//dam pa'i dgon gnas chen po der//sems kyi dkyil 'khor me long bzhin//bstan pa de ltar bdag gis kyang //thog ma tha
129a1(rgyud): mA mod pa ru//sbrul ba'i d+has nr-i kAr byung ba//bdag kyang de bzhin gyi 'phru m+bu spyad smos bzlas s+ho//sa s+ya rgyu smra du mo dgo sa pa 'dus par
129a2(rgyud): mdo chen po las gang gi gdung ba sel bar 'gro ba'i le'u spyi bzhi pa'o///de nas de'i rgyu de nyid du//gnod 'dul rgyulo blos hUM gsungs nas//mi
129a3(rgyud): gnas kyi 'jig rten khams//gling bzhi pa las 'dzam gling gi/drag shul can zhes bya ba'i ri//gnod sbyin 'du ba'i sa yin te//chos 'dzin rigs kyi grub gnasu//thug
129a4(rgyud): rjes la mngon sprul gshegs//sa rnams yongasu g.yos 'gyur te//rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul gyis//thams cad sbyangs te bde bar snang //sngon du snang ba'i skal
129a5(rgyud): ldan can//dman pa'i lus 'dzin dam pa'i rigs//mi las rgyal rigs du mi tshe//rgyal bu rgyal byin ltas su shar//de rgyu dam pa'i rigs can rnams//dga' ba
129a6(rgyud): bcas the tshom skyes//spobs pa chen po'i dri ba dris//e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad re che//skyes bu chen po khyed su zhig/gang nas byon te gang ltar byung //gang la brten nas gang
129a7(rgyud): du byon//don gyi chad ka ci zhes dris//cho 'phrul chen pos 'di skad du//nga ni cis kyang mi bskyod de//mi 'khrug rdo rje sems dpa' yin//snying rjes g.yo zhing bskyod pas
129b1(rgyud): na//srid pa gsum gyi gnyen gAn+dig po//stong pa chen po nga yi yul//rdo rje rigs chen nga yi gdung //phya ni thabs mchog dpag tu med//ma ni shes rab brjod las 'das//thog
129b2(rgyud): mA med pa'i dus kyi tshe//nga yi yid bzhin nor bu stor//nor bu rin chen bdud rtsi de//yod par ma shes stor bar tshor//de tshe kun nas dbul ba dang //thar med nad kyis gzir 'gyur
129b3(rgyud): zhing //mun po mun nag smag tu 'khyams//bgrod par bya ba'i lam yang stor//gdungs par gyur kyang der ma shes//de tshong yi bshes gnyen mchog/byams mgon dam pa zhig/
129b4(rgyud): ge bstan//e ma'o khyod ci mi shes sam//mthong yun kun tu bde ba yi//don srid chen po 'byung 'gyur ba//nor bu rin chen ma brlag gam//'on te yod par mi shes sam//
129b5(rgyud): 'di ni chad par 'dug go ma ci/de skad ba shes gnyen mchog des snyan//de ched yos slar sman po//do ni srid chen po 'byung ba de//yod pa ma shes stor bar tshor//'di dang phrad par
129b6(rgyud): bya yi thabs//gshes gnyen khyod kyis lung ston cig/dam pa de yis dmigs bstan pa//de dang myur du phrad 'dod na//btsal ba'i thabs la brtson bya dgos//sa mkhan
129b7(rgyud): dam pas dmigs mtshon te//mun snang khams dang sa khams dang //sna tshogs lam rnams bgrod byas nas//bcol kyang gzhan nas mi rnyed de//rang gis khams nyid
130a1(rgyud): cha/nas 'byung//don don chen n+te pA//m+b+ha m+bu rnams so/khyim yin te/ gyur ba po//rlu rnams kyi rnyed gnas ya//duskad sa nas nga/
130a2(rgyud): gang tshe btsal ba'i ched phyir du//dmya ba de la lam smyos te//blo gros dam pas nges bcad+ma nas//theg tshan cad shes de zhen te//mun sted gnyis kyi khams nas 'das//
130a3(rgyud): gnan 'drang chu bo bzhi rgol te//sna tshogs ldum bgrod kun+d+ha btsal+le nas//dam pa rnams kyi lam du zhugs//sa dang rnam tha lam bgrod de//mya ngan 'das pa'i gong khyer bsnyam/
130a4(rgyud): rgyu rin chen rtsed bcad na//ma byung mi rnyed rang nyid kyi//chos nyid dbyings kyi khyim nas rnyed//rnyed pa nyid ni rnyed med de//stong pa nyid na'ang stor brel med//yod min med man
130a5(rgyud): rnyed med//gzhan nas m+me b+h+ya nga 'byung bar//shes la rnyed btag so mA shes la/nga sheste the snyad btogs par zad//yod dang stong dang rnyed pa'i dus//thog ma med pa'i dus
130a6(rgyud): nas so//de ltar chos nyid med pa las//sprul pa snang ba'i dus 'dir ni//mun snang gnyis kyis khams 'dir 'ongs//da ni thabs kyi gnyen pa mkhan//'khor ba'i chu
130a7(rgyud): mtha' mde las//srid gsum bsgral bar dam bcas kyis//thar pa pa dod pa lam 'dir shog/nga ni thabs kyi mig mkhan te//'jig rten long ba dpag med rnams//
130b1(rgyud): lding thob bsngal bar dgra bcas kyis//gang zhig mthong 'dod lam 'dir shog/nga ni thabs kyi sman pa ste//grong khyer gsum gyi nad pa rnams//gcod rnying sbyang bar dam bcas
130b2(rgyud): kyis//gang zhig bde 'dod lam 'dir shog/nga ni thabs kyi snga mkhan te//'gro ba lam ldog lam stor rnams//ma nor khrid par dam bcas kyis//yang dag lam 'dod
130b3(rgyud): lam 'dir shog/nga ni thugs rje spyan ras mkhan//'khor ba'i dgra dpung 'jigs pa las//thams cad bskyab par dam bcas kyis//'jigs dang bral yod lam 'dir
130b4(rgyud): shog/nga ni rdo rje rjong chen te//la khor ba'i g.yul chen dmag dpung las//'gro ba'i 'bras sar dam bcas kyis//glang zhig mkhar 'dod lam 'drir shog/nga ni thabs kyi
130b5(rgyud): tshong dpon te//'dod pa rgya mtshos mi ngoms rnams//gter chen sbyin par dam bcas kyis//gang zhig gter 'dod lam 'dir shog/nga ni thabs kyis sgron ma ste//mun nag smag
130b6(rgyud): tu khyams pa rnams//mun nag gsal bar dam bcas kyis//gang zhig snang 'dod lam 'dir shog/nga ni yid bzhin nor bu ste//yang dag yid bzhin 'dod pa rnams//yid bzhin
130b7(rgyud): bskong bar dam bcas kyis//lhun gyis grub 'dod lam 'dir shog/nga ni bka' yi lde mig ste//bka' sgrom thar ram gsang ba rnams//rnam par 'byed par dam bcas kyis//ga
131a1(rgyud): zhig gleng 'dod lam 'dir shog/ ni bkAr yi 'grel ba ste//gsung gi sgrogs bam zab mo rnams/nges par dgrol bar dam bcas kyis//glang dag
131a2(rgyud): shes 'dod lam 'dir shig/rnam dag lamatshan kun sgrol 'di//skal ldan grang zhig suM bzhugs pa//nar bu rin chen 'od 'bar ba//nges par 'chard gyis brtson par gyis//
131a3(rgyud): de nyid sems kyi me long ste//mngon sum gsal bar rtogs ma thag//'gro ba'i lus la sangs rgyus yin//rdo rje gsang chen gsang ba'i//ngos don pa'i mdzod mchog rnams//
131a4(rgyud): 'dir bgros gsal bar shad sbyar bas//lha dang mi'o rig 'dzin las//rim par brgyud de grags par 'gyur//lha mi 'jig rten thams cad kyi//mun pa'i gdung ba kun
131a5(rgyud): bsal nus//sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur//ci phyir mun pa'i gdung bar zhugs//thub pa mya ngan 'das gdung ba//de ni na mkha'i sku mnga' ba//'dar dang
131a6(rgyud): mi 'dar mi mnga' ste//'pho 'gyur med pas na mkha' bzhin//de skad sprul pa'i sgra 'byung bas//sngon du byung ba'i rigs can rnams//mchog tu dga' ba cher skyes te//
131a7(rgyud): dga' mugu rangs pa'i bsam paM yis//lus btud shin tu gus sbyang ni//spyan sngar 'dug te 'di skad gis la//mtshan mo'i mun nag sprin dus nas//glog 'gyur ba snang stan
131b1(rgyud): stu bur//zlog ma tha ma med pa yi//de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid las//rnam dag lam chen de nyid du//byung ba'i skyes bu don grub khyod//dam pa rnams kyi gsang 'dzin rnying /
131b2(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag por grags//bka' rnams 'gro bor khyod bsngags pas//khyod ni bka' bgrel chen por grogs//sems kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la//mdzod gsum
131b3(rgyud): gsang ba'i nyi shur bas//shes bya'i mun pa kun gsal phyir//khyod ni gsal ba'i nyi mar grags//gdul dka' ma lus kun 'dul zhing //bdud kyi bdud sde bdud rnams 'joms//
131b4(rgyud): 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'joms byed pas/khyod ni bdud kyi bdud du grags//de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid//sems nyid rang bzhini 'od gsal ba//chos kun gzugasnga brnyan
131b5(rgyud): snang bas na//chos kyi me long zhes kyang grags//dug 'joms sman gyi dkyil 'khor gyis//zug rngu 'dzin pa bla na med//nad do cog gri dgrar gyur pas//khyod ni smin pa'i rgyal
