131b6(rgyud): por grags//dga' mgu rangasra par mdzad pas na//khyod ni gdung ba sel bar grags//'dod pa yang bzhin skong byas na//khyod ni yid bzhin nor bur grags//dam pa rnams
131b7(rgyud): dang 'thun mdzod la//bdag cag rig pa 'dzin rnams la//dam pa'i sprul pa gang lhar nug/dam pa'i sgron ma ji ltar bkod//dam po'i gsang lung ji ltar 'byung //gsang ba rgyud kyi
132a1(rgyud): madz+dza//na cu ga sa pa ts+tshab //rnam par rdza tshwa so pa gas g+sa//ng+yas rgyas kun gyi dgos pa 'dus pa
132a2(rgyud): mdochen po las lung dam pa bkri byung gsol ba btanA pa'i le'u ste lnga pa//de skad ces gsol ba btab pa las//gos dra ba'i bdag pos bka'i sprub
132a3(rgyud): pa/snron du byung byu lung bstan pan+te//'gro bgrus kyi semaswA da rnams//gdung sngags dr-i dang baHsU pAlI/sgra ma'i rtog pa da lA gyis ston//sems kyi
132a4(rgyud): 'khor de bzhin nyid//namakha' bzhin du nub pa med//rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal bas//de lce gang sgrib de nyi sel//tshad ma gnyis kyis gang gzul ba//shes
132a5(rgyud): byad yang tshad myur 'gyur//legs nyes rtsi ba 'ang de nyid pas//de nyid de la 'gyur ba med//sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal bas//dkar bas dkar ba'i nyi zla med//sangs
132a6(rgyud): rgyas mya ngan yong mi 'da'//chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te/le lo n+dan la phan gdags phyir//sprul pa rnams ni 'da' tshul ston//ji ltar na mkha' zhig 'gyur na//
132a7(rgyud): de tshe mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur//gang dag gdug pa ma rung ba//bdag med stong pa'i stobs kyis 'dul//rang bzhin 'di gsal spris bral ba'i//bstan pa rgya mtsho'ang
132b1(rgyud): da pas//rang 'byung sad+d+hartsal can gyis//rgyun tu 'byur ning snang bar byed//bslab pa skrag pa'i sems nyid pas//bsgrub pa kun kyi ma g+h+ra 'di ni//sa rab snang ba rgyas
132b2(rgyud): 'byung ba'i//'gro ba lus kyi sems dpar 'dzin//mtha' thug med pa sems can rnams//byang chub snying phyir ye gnas pas//de bzhin nyid du rgyud nges phyir//kun kya
132b3(rgyud): mi sgri ba de lung ston//sems nyid yod dang med do zhes//byis pa rnams ni rtsod par byed//mkhas pa yi nas rtsod dang bral//yod me rtog pa'i tshig ma brjod//nga yi gas
132b4(rgyud): sngags gsang ba 'dri//sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang yin phyir//grang mi dpogs por gzhan dpags pa//gsang bar sgra gcig tha dad 'byung //dam pa rnams kyi gsapa
132b5(rgyud): lung 'di//gang dag mi shes rmongs 'phyar bas//dug dang bdud rtsir rje bas ni//phung byed gnyi ga sreg par 'gyur//kun gsal me long 'od po che//ma 'dres yongs rdzogs
132b6(rgyud): ston pa de//mkha' ltar 'pho 'gyur med pas na//'tshe ba'ang glog 'gyu sprin bzhon med//byang chub snying po yod kyi bar//de srid bstan pa gnas pa yin//thog ma tha ma
132b7(rgyud): med pa nas//byung bas snga phyi yod ma yin//dang po med las byung brjid pas//tha ma 'ang brjod bral med par 'gyur//gdung 'dzin thog ma'ang de bzhin nyid//tha ma
133a1(rgyud): /de las gzhan mi 'gyur//'di nas de bzhin nyid 'dir gshugs//bdal khyab chen po'i zhing na bzhugs//sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba//
133a2(rgyud): de bzhin nyid du rnam par snang //byis pa'i ched du cho 'phrul zhig/me tog bkod pa'i 'jig rten na//mi grags pa zhes bya bar snang //snang ba 'ang nyid na snang ba med//de bzhin
133a3(rgyud): nga khams gang dag tu//sprul pA yi sangs rgyas snang mdzad pa//sgyu ma'i 'phrul ba ji bzhin du//mi snang 'od kyang gzhan du snang //mi bskyod rdo rje thugs mchog kyang //
133a4(rgyud): thugs rje sprul pa'i byin brlabs kyis//'jig rten khams ni dpag tu med//mun snang bang 'byung rang bzhin yi//skye med ye shes nyid kyi dbyings//gdod nas bde gshegs snying
133a5(rgyud): po las//rnam rtog glo bur las kyis bsgribs//de nyid 'gro mgon skyabs chen yin//rgyal ba'i dgongs pa tshig gsum po//'phrul gyi blo dang gros mchog ste//
133a6(rgyud): yun gyi don srid tshan po las//blo gros dam pa'i yul du snang //rgyal ba kun gyi thugs 'jug pa//ji bzhin pa'i de kho na//nyid du dris pa'i ngo bo la//blo bzhag de nyid
133a7(rgyud): nges pa yin//chos kun na mkha'i mtshan nyid de//ye shes sku can rgyal ba rnams//sku la dngos can dngos med par//sku gdung ring bsrel ji ltar byung //sems can
133b1(rgyud): rnams la phan don du//med pa nyid las sprul pa'o//sgyu ma rung dasrel yungs 'bru rnam//thugs rje thabs kyis bzhag tshul bstan//nges par rang bsrol gang 'dod pa//bye ma
133b2(rgyud): dag las mar 'dod 'dra//gang tshe 'bras pa te ba tI la 'a bru smin//de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur//gzugs snang brang sgrogs snying po can//sku dang gsung thugs snying po can/
133b3(rgyud): mched gnas yid rten dam pa zhes//'gro mgon rdo rje sems dpas bshad//dpag tu med pa'i rgyal ba rnams//'khor ba'i sems can rgyud las byung //'khor ba'i sems
133b4(rgyud): can rgyun bcad na//sangs rgyas rgyun yang chad pa yin//dper na na mkha'i gzha tshan ni//dang po gzhan nas 'ongs pa dang //tha ma gzhan du song ba med//de nyid rang 'byung rang zhe ltar//
133b5(rgyud): sprul pa rang 'byung rang bzhi pos//de nyid de la nub pa med//'das kyang ma bral tha dad man//ma 'das pa na'ang gcig min te//'da' dang mi 'da' las 'das pas//bral dang ma
133b6(rgyud): bral grwa la yod//des na gang la ci phyir gdung //gdung ba rmongs pa 'khrul pa yin//e ma'o ngo mtshar ji lta bu//'di ga ji ltar 'khrul zhig gu zhes gsang ba'i bdag blo
133b7(rgyud): des sen rnams pa lta ba'i tshul gyis go zhes btab pas rmongs pas gdungs pa rnams dga' mgu rangs nas gdung ba yongasu sangs te sems ma bcos par gnas te de bzhin gyi
134a1(rgyud): /dkyil lwa byud rnams cud 'dugasal bu gyur to//don sa ka ba dag pos gsang da ba dag pa la gsol pa/gas ba pa bdag pa chen po darda
134a2(rgyud): thams pad de sa /\u0f7fseM 'jig rten sa //sbying ba 'i glangs skyes pa 'i dun gyi ni
134a3(rgyud): la ba ste/'das pa'i dus kyi gdung ba ji snyed pa yang bsal to//da lta mi 'dzud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams di yi gdung ba yang gas la//'jig rten gyi khams gzhan rdus byed
134a4(rgyud): kyi gdung ba yang byas pa/me 'ongs pa'i gdung ba ji snyed pa yang sel bar 'gyur//de bas na gang dag yongasu gdung ba rnams ni mi shes pa/rmongasmai pa/shed ma bye ba khon
134a5(rgyud): g+ho shes pa/marmongs pa mkhas pa sha bye ba rnams ni gang du yang gdung ba myed pa gdung ba dang bral ba yin zhes thos byas la ka'i bdag pa la sogs 'gro
134a6(rgyud): kyi snyoms dpa' rnams yong su gdung ba las song so//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dris pa'i ma chen pa las gang rmongs pa gdung ba stsal ba zhes bya ba ladu
134a7(rgyud): 'o/theg pa chen pa nges par 'byung ba'i tshul la sa song mongs pa'i gdung po sel ba'i gtam rgyud brjod po chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes rnam par bkro
134b1(rgyud): byung tshul bstan pa dang po'o////de nas lang ka'o bdag pos sngon du gnad pa'i tshi ga bcu gnyis bI gnyis babA du sgron ma yongasu bkod pa nA yang 'byung zhes lung bstan pa yongasu dro ba'i
134b2(rgyud): phyir gsang ba pa'i bdag po la gsol ba/gsang ba pa'i bdag po sngon bdag gis phyin ci ma log par thos pa/grang rmongs pa rnams kyi gdung ba sel cing sems can rnams kyi
134b3(rgyud): sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsol bar byed pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi blo gros dam pa'i mdzod/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dgongs pa de kho na nyid gsang ba dam
134b4(rgyud): pa phyin ci ma log pa yang dag pa'i lta bo/sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa/theg pa chen po de 'degs pa'i yul tshad ma nub par gyur phan chad du 'byung bar 'gyur zhig gu
134b5(rgyud): zhes dris pa las/gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/lang ga'i bdag po cig 'di ji snyam du sems/khyod mi shes sam/yul ched ma nyid kyis bka' stsal gyis/kud dzir
134b6(rgyud): chos kyi spun la bka' stsal pa 'di lta ste/rig pa 'dzin po khyod kyi dri ba 'di lta ste/de kho na nyid gsang ba dom pa de na gnas skabs gnyis dang bcur 'byung ba ste/gang rmongs
134b7(rgyud): pa gdung ba sel ba na yang 'byung /gang 'jig rten gyi sgron ma yongasu bkod pa yang 'byung /gang gis nges pa rnyed pa na yang 'byung /snying pa byang chub nyid du nges pa na yang
135a1(rgyud): 'byung /dgongs pa nges par 'brel pa na yang 'byung /gdul bya skabs la rab pa'i chad na yang 'byung /byin gyi rlabs las snang ba na yang 'byu
135a2(rgyud): brgyud pa thabs kyis grags pa na yang 'byung /gang gi ched du mdzad pa ni yang 'byung /lung chen nges par bstan pa na yang 'byung /las rgyud yongasasu gcod pa na yang
135a3(rgyud): 'byung /dgongs pa rnam par bgro ba na yang 'byung ste/de dag ni thams cad dang thaMd nas tha~Mng du yongasu rnam par snang ngo //snang bar gyur to snang bar 'gyuraro zhes lung bstan
135a4(rgyud): pa gang du grogs pa mi shes sam zhes smras pa las/lang ka'i bdag pos smras pa/e ma'o gsang ba pa'i bdag pa de ni bdag gis thos pa dam pa thos so//thos
135a5(rgyud): pa'i mchog thos so//gsang ba pa'i bdag po yongasu rmongs pa gdungs pa ni sangs pa lta na/sgron ma yongasu bkod pa na yang 'byung zhes pa ji lta ba bzhin du glags pa
135a6(rgyud): ljags/mi mched kyi 'dzeg rten gyi khams 'dir da ltar yongasu 'das pa 'di sgron ma bkod pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ram/'dus pa 'di yang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi
135a7(rgyud): zhing khams 'di 'ba' zhig gi sgron ma sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das sam/'on te 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dag na zhing khams ji snyed pa'i sgron ma bkod pa'i
135b1(rgyud): sangs rgya mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur zhes dris pa las/gsang ba pA'i bdag pos smras pa/lang ka'i bdag po de ji snyam du sems/'di yang sgron mA zhes bya ste/da ltar
135b2(rgyud): 'das pa ni zhing khams mtha' dag gI sangs rgyas lta zhog/'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag swa ya'i sangs rgyas lta yang zhig/'dzam bu'i gling gi rngog gi sangs rgyas gcig
135b3(rgyud): yongasu mya ngan las 'das par zung cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/zhing khams 'di ni sprul pa'i sangs rgyas nya ba gcig gi zhing khams yin pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du bsam
135b4(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed pa 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med pa na sgron ma'i bya ba mdzad do//de dgra ji lta ba de ltar sprul pa'i sangs rgyas rdul snyed kyang de
135b5(rgyud): bzhin du blta'o//de nas lang ka'i mnga' bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dris pa/gsang ba pa'i bdag po mi mjed kyi zhing khams 'dzam bu'i gling gcig
135b6(rgyud): gI sprul pa'i sangs rgyas nyag gcig mya ngan lasau 'das pa 'di sangs rgyas gang gi sprul par yongasu bzung bar bgyi/gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/lang ka'i bdag po
135b7(rgyud): 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las sprul pa cha gcig 'ba' zhig kho nar zung shig/smras pa/gsang ba pa'i bdag po zhing khams 'dir shAkya
136a1(rgyud): thub pa zhes bya bar grags na 'di ji ltar yongasu shes par bgyi/smras pa/lang ka'i bdag po de ni rdo rje sems drapa'i sprul pa'i bla dgas
136a2(rgyud): 'ba' zhig go/lang ka'i bdag pa de ci'i phyir zhe na/rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas/'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpung gtan bcom pa'i
136a3(rgyud): phyir thub pa chen po zhes yongasu gragaso//ji ltar 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcur yang thub po chen po zhes bya bar yang grags pa ni 'di lta ste/lha'i gnas su thub
136a4(rgyud): pa chen po srid thub 'dzin zhes bya bar brag so//lha ma yin gyi gan su thub pa chen po rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya bar grag so//mi'i gnasu thub pa chen po shAkya seng+ge zhes
136a5(rgyud): bya bar grags//byol song gau gan su thub pa chen po rnam par gnon pa zhes bya bar grag so//yi dgas kyi gan su thub pa chen po rnam par snang byed ces bya bar glagaso//
136a6(rgyud): dmyal ba'i gnas su thub pa chen po chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar grags//kye lang ka'i bdag po der yang ma zad de/de ji lta ba de ltar de bzhin du me mdzod kyi 'jig rten
136a7(rgyud): drug gi phyogs bcu na thub pa drug gi sgron ma yongasu snang ba de lta de ltar rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha
136b1(rgyud): yas pa na rdul snyed kyi thub pa drug gi sgron ma mtha' yas par snang bu yang 'di lta ste/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gling bzhi pa stong phyag bcu gnyis 'das pa na 'jig rten

140b7(rgyud): la lar ni lha'i cha byad kyis so//la lar klu'i cha byad kyiso//la lar ni lha ma yin gyi cha byad kyis so//la lar ni bdud kyi cha byad kyiso//la lar ni gnod sbyin gyi cha byad

141b1(rgyud): rgyaba'i phyir dbang po lta bur snang ngo //de bzhin du spyo thams cad kyi gzugs snang ba ni 'jug sred dang /sred med dag dang phyug dang /stobs ldan dang /nor 'dzin dang /snuT dang /radang /

141b5(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing khams mtha' yas pa na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan sna tshogs par shes pa ni brjod kyis mi long ba'i bskal pa
141b6(rgyud): smros kyang shar phyogs gcig pu'i spyangs rgyas kyi zhing na bzhugs pa'i mtshan gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs//de bzhin du phyogs bcu thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na
141b7(rgyud): 'khod pa'i sems can rnams brjod kyis mi lang ba'i bskol par smras kyang mtshan gyi mthar ni mi rdzogs//ji ltar sems can mos pa chung ngu rnams kyis rdo rje sems dang
142a1(rgyud): zhing khams tshad med pa dang mtshan mtha' yas pa thos na blo ga chad pa dang myos par 'gyur ro//ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i zhing khams de dag thams cad/
142a2(rgyud): na sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsalnga ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid 'ba' zhig yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu phyin tsa ma log par rims kyis dang gcig car bar ston
142a3(rgyud): to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rdo rje sems dpa'i zhing khams na 'khod pa'o sems can chen po de dag ni sems kyi rang bzhin sna tshogs pa'i phyir/blo shin tu zab pa dang /mi zab
142a4(rgyud): pa dang /yangs pa dang /dog pa dang /brtan pa dang /'gyur ba dang /rno ba dang /rtul ba dang /myur ba dang bul ba dang /shas rtag pas bsngags kyi ngo bo nyid kyi gtam rims kyis pa
142a5(rgyud): dang gcig char bar thos nas de dag la yang mi skrag mi dngang gi dga' zhing mgu ba dang /rangs par 'gyur ba'i phyir sna tshogasu snang ba'o//de na gnas pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang
142a6(rgyud): thung ba dang /ring ba dang /dpag tu med pa dang /brgya pa dang /brgyad khri bzhi stong thub pa yi no//longs spyod ni ji lta bsams pa bzhin du 'byung ba yang yod/dka' bas 'byongs pa
142a7(rgyud): dang /mi 'byongs pa yang yod/kun kyang lung bstan pa thob pa sho stag go//sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' mtshan gang gis thos pa des rgyal ba mang po la sngon du bya ba
142b1(rgyud): byas pa yin//rdo rje sems dpa'i zhing khams nyid du nges par 'byung ba yin no//rgyal ba rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin//theg pa chen por ngas par 'byung ba dag yin//

142b3(rgyud): gling gcig gi sangs rgyas nyag cig 'di mya ngan 'das pa yino//de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa'i sangs rgyas mtha' dag la mya ngan las 'das pa yang yod mu 'das pa

142b6(rgyud): bdag pos smras pa/lang ka'i bdag po rdo rje sems dpa' ni sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba gsang ba bsang sngags kyi ngo bo ji bzhin pa'i de kho nA la bya'o//lang ka'i
142b7(rgyud): bdag pos dris pa/kye gsang ba pa'i bdag pos sems kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi ba ni gang de bzhin du 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba dang /gsang sngags kyi ngo bo zhes bya ba dang /
143a1(rgyud): rnga bzhin pa'i de bzhin pa de kho na nyid ces gang la dzA gyi/gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/la kwa'i bdag po sems shes bya ba ni ma byas ma bcos
143a2(rgyud): sna tshogs su 'byung ba'o//dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni thig le gang yin pa nyid do//'od ces bya ba ni snang ba'o//gsal ba zhes bya ba ni gang mi shes pa las gzhan gang gis
143a3(rgyud): kyang ma bsgribs pa'o//gsang ba zhes bya bi na slar byed pa spyod yul du ma gyur pa' bya'o//sngags shes bya ba ni yon tan gyi 'byung gnas su brjod pa la bya'o//ngo bo nyid
143a4(rgyud): ces bya ba'i ni dngos po med pa mi dmigs pa kun 'byung ba'i gzhi la bya'o//ji bzhin pa zhes bya ba ni ma bcos ma smad pa la bya'o//de bzhin pa zhes bya bo ni ma byas ma
143a5(rgyud): gtogs pa la bya'o//de kho na nyid ces bya ba ni ma nor mi 'gyur ba la bya'o//yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa/gsang ba pa'i bdog po ma byas ma bcos po zhes bya ba ni grang /
143a6(rgyud): sna tshog 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni ji lta bu gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/lang ka'i bdag po byed pa po med la bya bas btsal du med pa'i phyir ma byas pa'o//gzhi ji bzhin
143a7(rgyud): pa'i phyir mo bcos pa'o//gang med pa las rgyun du 'byung zhing yul tha dad la 'gro ba legs pa dang /nyes pa dang /gnyi ga ma yin pa sna tshogs 'byung ba ste gang de nyid
143b1(rgyud): ni na mkha' lta bu'o//de rgyan ni 'byung ba ste/sprin dang khugA rlangs dang 'ja' rlan la sogs pa lta bu'o//yang dris pa gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la rI'i phyir rdo rje sams dpa 'a zhes bgyi/
143b2(rgyud): smras pa lang ka'i bdag po de kho na nyid ji bzhin pa de ni thams cad nas thams cad du gnyan po med pa/pa 'gyur med pa/skye 'gakas med po/de kho na nyid sems rang rig pa/
143b3(rgyud): dgongs pa nges par 'grel ba las cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung ba'i dngos po med pa nyid bcom pa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya'o//lang ka'i bdag po de la ni bla na med pa'i
143b4(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems zhes kyang bya'o//chos rnams kyi chos nyid de bzhin nyid ces kyang bya'o//sems kyi stong pa nyid ces kyang bya'o//mtha' las 'das pa zhes kyang bya'o//dbu mar
143b5(rgyud): mi dmigs pa zhes kyang bya'o//sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos gzhi zhes kyang bya'o//sprul pa kun gyi 'byung gnas zhes kyang bya'o//sangs rgyas kun gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen zhes
143b6(rgyud): kyang bya'o//zhing khams kun gyi sgron ma zhes kyang bya'o//thugs rje thabs kyi 'byung gnas zhes kyang bya'o//chos thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba zhes kyang bya'o//lang ka'i
143b7(rgyud): bdag po dag kyang gang gi don du de ltar btags kyi de kho na nyid la ni ming du btags pa med de/de dag ni bla dgas nyid du rig par bya'o//lang ka'i bdag po de'i phyir ni sangs
144a1(rgyud): rgyas ni bla dgas so//chos kyang bla dgas so//byang chub kyang bla dag so//de bzhin du dbyings dang ye shes dang chos kyi sku dang /sku tha dad pa dang /sems can
144a2(rgyud): dang /'jig rten la sogs pa thams cad du btags shing chags pa ji snyed pa dag bla dgas 'bra' zhig tu rig par bya'o//lang ka'i bdagra po bla dgas gang yin pa ni
144a3(rgyud): blo bur du btags pa ste/ye nas ldan pa ni ma yino//lang ka'i bdag po gal te ye nas ldan pa zhig yin na ni/gang blo bur pa thams cad mi 'byung bar 'gyuraro//lang ka'i
144a4(rgyud): bdag po blo bur ni sprin bzhin te thar zub pa ma yin/ye nas ldan pa ma yin/brtog bzod pa ma yin no//lang ka'i bdag po de'i phyir ming drang /brda' dang tha snyad dang mtshan ma
144a5(rgyud): dang /btags pa dang /las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa thams cad ni blo bur pa ste 'byung ba dang sangs pa dang /sgribs pa dang /dang par rig par bya'o//lang ka'i bdag
144a6(rgyud): po gal te la sra dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la so pAd+mo bu du ma btAgra sA na ni de bzhin nyid ces bya ba de de ltar ma rung ba zhig nA lang+ga ka'i bdag po de bzhin nyid de ni gang gi dbang du
144a7(rgyud): mi 'gyur ba'i bla dag su rig par bya'o//lang ka'i bdag po de'i phyir chos thams cad mid med/tshig med/brjod du med/tshig gi lam chad pa'o//smras pa/gsang ba
144b1(rgyud): papa'i badrug po gang ming du btags pa'i gzhi la graN+DI'i don tsam du yang mi rtog gam/smras pa/lAng ka'i bdag po bzhi'i don tsam du yang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/de ci'i phyir zhe na//
144b2(rgyud): gzhi'i don tsam zhig ni 'di zhes sangs rgyas nyid kyis btsal kyang mi brnyes//de bsra na blo bur gyi rtog pa dang /mI rtog pa lA sangs rgyas dang /sems can zhes btags par
144b3(rgyud): zad kyi de bzhin nyid de la ni sangs rgyas sems can du cung zad kyang med de/'on kyang byis pa rnams ni blo bur dag gis sprin gyis bsgribs pas blo bur gyi chos dag tshad du byed
144b4(rgyud): cing 'khor ba dang byang chub gnyisu rtog par byed do//sems can dang sangs rgyas gi nye su rtog par byed do//smras pa/gsang ba pa'i badrag po 'o na sems can dang sangs rgyas 'di
144b5(rgyud): gnyis ji ltar shes par bya/smras pa/long ka'i bdag po stong pa nyid du shes par bya'o//smras pa/gsang ba pa'i bdag po stong pa nyid ci la gnas/smras pa/lang ka'i bdag
144b6(rgyud): po stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad la gnas so//smras pa/gsang ba pa'i bdag po chos thams cad ci la yang gnas/smras pa/lang ka'i bdag po chos thams cad stong pa nyid kho
144b7(rgyud): na'i phyir ci pa yang mi gan so//smras pa/gsong ba pa'i bdag po stong pa nyid la gnas pa ci la gnas pa lags/smras pa/lang ka'i bdag po stong pa nyid la gnas pa ni
145a1(rgyud): byams pa chen po gnas bya ste gang spyod pa nyid des sums n+dan gyi don yongasu rdzogs par gnas pa'o// na na/sangs rgyas dang sems
145a2(rgyud): can la stong pa nyid las dron ci yang med pa'i phyir//smras pa gsang ba pa'i bdag po sangs rgyas dang sems can kun stong na glang gi thugs rje chen pos gang la ji ltar mdzad/
145a3(rgyud): thugs rje chen po de gang gi tshig bla dwags lags/smras pa/lung ka'i bdag po che sna thams cad stong pa nyid la rang bzhin gyis gnas byas na gnyisu ma mthong bas snying rje'i
145a4(rgyud): yul med pa ni thams cad kyi snying po byang chub tu yo bsgral pa'i phyir snying rje chen po yin lnga/byis pa'i snying rje dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i sems can srog bton
145a5(rgyud): pa dang gang thar bar bton pa de ni snying rje chung ngur rig par bya'o//lang+ga kau'i badrag po de bas nA snying rje chen po la rgyun tu gnas pas gnas par bya'o//lang ka'i bdag po gang snying
145a6(rgyud): rje chen po la gnas pa dag ni sems can 'ga' yang grol bar mi byed 'ching bar yang mi byed de/rdo rje mtshon gyis dngos su bsad pa medo par bsad pa kho na'o//de ci'i
145a7(rgyud): phyir zhe na/sems can med pa las sems can du btags pa'i phyiraro//snying rje chen po de ni de bzhin nyid dang glo bur gnyis kyi khyad par gyi tshig bla dag su rig par bya'o///
145b1(rgyud): 'i bdag pad+mo lta bas na 'di lta skye mtha' yas ming du gags pa'o//yod mthong sbrang blugs chos rnams sam//bla dgus tsam du btags par zad//de la drongs gzhu dang
145b2(rgyud): la yod//gang la ming du btags pa'i gzhi//med rgyu btags tshugs bstsu byas 'grub cing //gang du bltas par snang ba yin//des ni bye med byas pa zin//mi srung ba las
145b3(rgyud): kun snang ba//thams cad thams cad glo bur snang //snang nyid med pa'i sgying byo ste//yod med gnyi su'ang dmigs pa med//sangs rgyas med las sangs rgyas dang //byang
145b4(rgyud): chub chos nyid la sogs pa'i//tha dad mong gi bla dag sde rnams//myi shes rmongs lnga bstan phyir btags//de nyid la ni sangs rgyas dang //byang chub chos nyid la sogs pa'i//
145b5(rgyud): zla sbyang ming gi bla dgas rnams//ming med tshig tu brjod pa med//chos nyid na mkha'i dkyil yongs nas//ye shes nyi ma'i sku gsal bas//thugs rje sgron ma'i 'od zer
145b6(rgyud): gyis//gti mug kun gsal rnam par snang zhes smras pasu/lang kwa'i bdag po la sogs pa 'gro ba lus kyi sems dpa' rnams gzhan la ri rtsol med par dbugs
145b7(rgyud): byin par gyur to//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgengs pa 'dus pa'i mad chen po las gsang sngags rang gi ngo bo bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o///theg pa chen
146a1(rgyud): nges par 'byung ba'i tshul las sgrol ma yongasu bkod pa'i gtam rgyud brjod pa chos kyi phyag rgyu'i ye shes rnam par bgros pa skye byang tshul bstun pa
146a2(rgyud): gnyis pa'o////bam po gnyis par zug pa//de nas lang ka'i bdag pos yong gsang ba pa'i bdag po la sngon byung ba'i tshig bcu gnyis pa'i gsum pa'i gang
146a3(rgyud): gis nges pa rnyed pa na yang byung zhes bstan pa dris pa/kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyid kyis theg pa chen po gsang ba dam pa byung ba'i tshul ston pas lung bstan pa gtam
146a4(rgyud): du brjod pa'i skabasu gang gis nges pa rnyed pa na yang 'byung zhes bkod pa de ji lta ba zhig du rnyed de grags pa lags/smras pa/lang ka'i bdag po gung gis gsang sngags
146a5(rgyud): kyi ngo bo rdo rje sems dpa' de kho na nyid kyi nges pa phyin ci ma log pa rnyed pa de kho na nyid la bya'o//smras pa/gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi ngo bo rdo rje sems dpa'
146a6(rgyud): de gang nas byung /gang na gnas/gang du snang /ji ltar byung de skad ces dris pa la sra/gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/kye lang ka'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi ngo bo
146a7(rgyud): nyid rdo rje sems dpa' de ni 'khor ba dang bcas mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis kyi khams nas byung ngo //sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs dang sems can kun gyi sems
146b1(rgyud): lnga gnas so//zhing khams mtha' yas par snang ngo //ye ji bzhin pa dang /rgyud dag par rang byung ngo //yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa/glas ba pa'i bdag po rdo rje sems dpa'
146b2(rgyud): nyid du nges pa byang la bzhag par bgyi/gsang ba pa'i dadage pos smras pa/ le ka'i budage po rdo rje sems dpa' ni gcig dang tha dad pa'i ngo bo nyid las grol te tshes rnams kyi
146b3(rgyud): chos nyid ma bcos ma smad pa/snying po byang chub tu ye nas gnas pa dri la ye ji bzhin pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' zhes gdag so//sems can kun gyi sems kyi chos nyid gang
146b4(rgyud): mthong ba'i gnas skabs lnga ni rgyud dgu pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' zhes gdag so//de bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad kyang ye ji bzhin pa dang /rgyud dag pa'i sang+yas rgya su rnams
146b5(rgyud): par snang ngo //de blas na rdo rje sems dpa'i nges pa ni thams cad kyi ye ji bzhin pa de kho na nyid la bzhag par bya'o//yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa/gsang ba pa'i bdog po
146b6(rgyud): sems can kun gyi snyems kyi chos nyid de gang lags/gang zhig mthong na de mthong ba lags/de skad ces dros pa las/bras dbu pa'i bdag pos smras pa/lang ka'i bdag
146b7(rgyud): po sems can kun gyi ji lta ba de mthong na mthong ba yin//sems can kun gyi ji lta ba de ni bla na med pa'i byang chub yin no//de la ni chos rdul tsam yang mi dmig so//de ni nam
147a1(rgyud): mkha'i mtshan nyid do//de la ni byang chub bya yang med la byang chub par bya ba'ang med do//de la ni sems can yang med la sems can du gdags pa yang
147a2(rgyud): med do//chos can yang med la chos can du gdagra swa pA mid do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi mtshan nyid yin la byang chub ni na mkha'i mtshan nyid de//
147a3(rgyud): nAn mkha' ni mtshan nyid thams cad bral ba'o//de'i phyir byang chub ni soms las btsal bar bya'o//sems de ni rang bzhin gyis yongasu dgra pa'i phyir nang na yang med//
147a4(rgyud): phyi rol na yang med gnyi kar yang mi dmigaso//sems de ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gzi/mi gzi/gzigs par mi 'gyuraro//de ji ltar ma gzigs na kha dog tu ma
147a5(rgyud): gzigaso//dbyib su ma gzig so//mun par mA gzigaso//snang bor ma gzigaso//pho mor mi gzig so//ma ning dri mi gzig so//khams gsum gyi rang bzhin du ma
147a6(rgyud): gzig so//lha'i sems su ma gzigaso//klu'i sems su ma gzigaso//de bzhin du gnod sbyin gyi sems dang /dri za'i sems dang lha ma yin dang na mkha'i lding dang
147a7(rgyud): mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /byol song dang /yi dgas dang /dmyal ba la sogs pa 'gro ba ris tha dad pa'i sem su ma gzig so//
147b1(rgyud): bad ma pa pa masmra dang bral rna phyir zhun/snyoms kyi rang bzhin ga du yin pa don du rje sems dang rang 'byung na yo shes yin pa sna shos don rnamakhan
147b2(rgyud): rang bzhin te nga bzhin med phyir ro//yang ljang ka'i bdag pos dris /kye gsang ba pa'i badrug po sems can+da gyi sems de ci'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'i rang 'byung gi ye shes yin/
147b3(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag dos smras pa/lang ka'i bdag po sems can gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gleng yin pa 'di la gnyi su med ning gnyis
147b4(rgyud): byang myed do//rdo rje stan ni/'dis ste/gang rdzogs pa'i sems kyi de bzhin nyid gang yinanu pa de n+na dz+nyA sam+b+has pa' de bzhin //rdo rje sems da pa'i'adi zhin nyid gung chen
147b5(rgyud): pa de ni de kho na nyid do//gang chags pa med pa'i sems kyi de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do//rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid do//gang zhe sdang
147b6(rgyud): gi sems kyi de kho na nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do//rdo rje sems depe'i de bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid do//gud byams pa'i snrums kyi de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems dpe'i
147b7(rgyud): de bzhin nyid do//rdo rje sems depa'i de bzhin ni de kho na nyid do//gang gti mug gi sems kyi de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do//rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid
148a1(rgyud): /ni kho na nyid do//gang shes rabardzun po'i de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems da pa lji bzhin nyid do//rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de khon nyid //gang na tsa

148a7(rgyud): spro ba'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /'byed pa'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /'khrug pa'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /zhi ba'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /'thab pa'i sems kyi

148b6(rgyud): phu nu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /dgra bo'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /dbang phyug gi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /tshangs pa'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /gtogs 'dod kyi sems
148b7(rgyud): kyi de kho na nyid dang /dbang po'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /tshogs bdag gi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /kun tu rgyu ba'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /tshong pa'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /zhing
149a1(rgyud): rgya du rgyu ldan da /rgyu gas du du mams da ldan na da/smyog+sa d+hA'i sums ldan da du//smon pa sams bang+ka d+hA

149a3(rgyud): gser tu lci bu'i sems kyi de khon nyid dang /kun tu bsrung ba'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /ser sna sna bu'i sems kyi de la na nyi dang /gtong ba lta bu'i sems kyi rdo nyid
149a4(rgyud): drung / auM m+mA nu'i snrum+b+has b+hi kho na nyid dung /lci 'bru bA m+b+ha bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyi dang /TIkA m+b+ha bu'i sems kyi kho na nyi dang /sbyin lta bu'i snrums kyi de kho na nyid /

149a6(rgyud): sems kyi da khon ng+ge dang / byi lta bu'i sems kyid kho na nyid dang / sgra lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid da/rgyan kyi 'byug sgra lta bu'i sems dang /sing+ge sa du
149a7(rgyud): dang /dung ba lta bu'i sems dang /spang ma lta bu'i sems dang /chu srin lta bu'i sems dang /rus sbal lta bu'i sems dang /sprul pa lta bu'i sems dang /me he lha chu'i
149b1(rgyud): sems dang /'ug pa lta bu'i sems dang /spre'u lci bu'i sems dang /bya rog lta bu'i sems dang /rta lta bu'i sems dang /gzhad lta bu'i sems dang /kang kra lta bu'i sems dang /sbyang
149b2(rgyud): ki'i sems dang /wa'i sems dang /glang po lta bu'i sems dang /lug lta bu'i sems dang /khra lta bu'i samyas dang /khyim lta bu'i sems dang /khyim med pa'i sems dang /thar pa'i sems
149b3(rgyud): dang /srin po'i sems dang /mi rgod kyi sems dang /na chung gi sems dang /rgyal po'i sems dang /slad 'tshod ma'i sems dang /'phyon ma'i sems dang /bram
149b4(rgyud): ze'i sems dang /shan pa'i sems dang /yi dgas kyi sems dang /dmyal ba'i sems dang /tsher ma'i sems dang /shing bal gyi sems dang /sa 'og gi sems dang /na mkha'i

149b6(rgyud): sems dang /khri mon gyi sems dang /me lce'i sems dang /thu lum gyi sems dang /mar me'i sems dang /nyi ma'i sems dang /zla ba'i sems dang /dngul gyi sems dang /gser
149b7(rgyud): gyi sems dang /me stag gi sems dang /rlung gi sems dang /chu'i sems dang /mdung shing gi sems dang /gtun shing gi sems dang /sgo yi sems dang /shing leb kyi sems
150a1(rgyud): dang /mi'i sems dang /sA'i sems dang /'dam gyi sems dang /rnyog chu'i sems dang /tshon ci'i sems dang /nor pa'i sems dang /dug gi sems dang /sman gyi
150a2(rgyud): sems dang /kha zas kyi sems dang /chu dong gi sems dang /mda'i sems dang /ral gri'i sems dang /'khor lo'i sems dang /gzhu'i sems dang /sgrog gi sems dang /
150a3(rgyud): shing gi sems dang /lan tshwa'i sems dang /spu gri'i sems dang /thig gi sems dang /rdo rje'i sems dang /ri rab kyi sems drang /rgya mtsho'i sems dang /pha bong gi sems
150a4(rgyud): dang /zhang gi sems dang /phug gi sems dang /skye ba'i sems dang /me tog gi sems dang /'bras bu'i sems dang /rtsa ba'i sems dang /yal ga'i sems dang /sdong
150a5(rgyud): bu'i sems dang /mngar ba'i sems dang /kha bA'i sems dang /sbyar ba'i sems dang /che ba'i sems dang /blag pa'i sems dang /bska ba'i sems dang /yi ge'i sem+ba dang /che tsha'i
150a6(rgyud): sems pa lde mig gi sems dang /phya gag lta bu'i sems dang /kun dga' ra ba lta bu'i sems dang /dbyar sprin lta bu'i sems dang /me ldong lta bu'i sems dang /til gyi
150a7(rgyud): mar khu lta bu'i sems dang /dgun chad lta bu'i sems la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i sems kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do//
150b1(rgyud): rnams dpa da bzhon nyid gang yin pa dri ni ji sbyin pa'i rdo khon lji do//dz+ha lang ka'i bdag po de ci'i phyir zhen//rdo rje sems dpa lji bzhin nyid rlom bcos ma smyud/sa b+h+yAsam gtag
150b2(rgyud): ji bzhin pa yin la/sems can kun gyi sems kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dri yang ma bcos/ma bslad ma byas/ma gtags ji bzhin pa de kho na nyid yin pa'i phyir//gang thams cad
150b3(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i spyan gyis kyang de gnyis kyi rang bzhin so sor ma gzigs mi gzigs gzigs par mi 'gyuraro//gang rgyal 'tshab kyis bu rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i shes rab kyis
150b4(rgyud): glang so sor mu phyed mi phyed phyed par mi 'gyur ro//kye lang ka'i bdag po gang gAsang sngags kyi nges pa rnyed par 'dod pa rnams kyis sems kyi de kho na nyid do shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyi
150b5(rgyud): zhe na/bya ba'i rnal 'byor pa ltar sems tha dad par snang ba rnams bya ba med pa'i rnal 'byor pa ltar sems de kho na nyid gcig tu smang la de kho na nyid gcig ni de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa min pa'i phyir
150b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje sems dpas kyang sems kyi de kho na nyid thugasu chud pas gsang sngags kyi nges pa rnyes so//de ji lta zhe na sems kyi de kho na nyid ni rnam par dag pa'i
150b7(rgyud): sgo yino//chos snang ba'i sgo yin no//chos kyi dbyings yin//chos kyi glegs 'om chen po yano//chos kyi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin chen po yino//kye lang ka'i bdag po de yang 'di
151a1(rgyud): lta ste/gang gis sems kyi dri kho na//gasdang ba'i snying po des rnyed na//'dren pa'i tshig gles mA bkrol yang //sems la chos 'byung 'bum phrag yas//smra ba'i
151a2(rgyud): sgo mor thams cad gsal//don la nges pa'i gtan tshigs ni//tshig tu mtshon te 'dzin par nus//chos rgyun ting 'dzin thob pa yin//kye lang kwa'i bdag po de ltar na sems kyi de kho na nyid
151a3(rgyud): ni byang chub chen po yin la byang chub chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ste//de yang sangs rgyas kun gyi bdud rtsir gyur pa 'di lta ste/byang chub sems kyi chu med na//rgyal ba rnams kyang skams
151a4(rgyud): par 'gyur//byang chub sems kyi chu bo 'dis//sngon zhe na mtha' dang rdos skams rlon//sems kyi rang bzhin stong nyid pas//de las byung ba thams cad stong //de stong pas na byang chub kyang //
151a5(rgyud): stong nyid snying po de kho na//rang 'byung ye shes chu chen po//rmad 'byung rgya mtsho'i klod dkyil nas//byang chub bdud rtsi'i chu byung bas//rgyal ba thams cad bsil bar mdzad//'di na gsang/
151a6(rgyud): pa'i snying po ste//rdo rje sems dpa'i de kho na//nyid tu nges pa'i ngo bo yin//rgyal ba kun gyis dam par bsngags//de pas de'i phyir lang ka'i bdag po sems kyi de kho na nyid do shes
151a7(rgyud): par bya ba ni yun gyi don srid chen po'o zhes gsang ba pa'i bdag po des de skad smras pas thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i de kho na nyid du rnam par grol ba'i lam du gyur to//sangs rgyas
151b1(rgyud): kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rdo rje sems dpa'i de kho na nyid bston pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o////de nas yang lang ka'i bdag pos gsang ba pa'i bdagu po la bris pa/gas
151b2(rgyud): ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de sems kyi de kho na nyid de grang gi spyod yul du gyur/smras pa/lang ka'i bdag po de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod yul du gyur gyis
151b3(rgyud): radang /sa la gnas pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar brtag por dka' zhing bstan par dka' la brjod pa'i tha stod rnams dang bral ba'i phyir ro//yod lang ki'i bdag
151b4(rgyud): pos dris pa/kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems kyi de kho na nyid gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de gang dam pa rnams kyi spyod yul las ma gtogs pa gzhan dang thun mong ma lags na ni 'o na gang
151b5(rgyud): bya ba'i rnal 'byor pa rnaMs kyang sems kyi de kho na nyid la lta zhing sems kyi rgyud kun tu btsal na gang de'i tshe nang gi sems kyang ma mthong /phyi'i sems kyang ma mthong /nang dang phyi'i sems
151b6(rgyud): kyang ma mthong //gang phung po la sems ma mthong /khams la ma mthong /skye mched la ma mthong /des sems ma mthong ba dang /sems 'di go las byung zhes bltas na de 'di ltar semaso//
151b7(rgyud): gang dmigs pa yod pas na sems 'byung ngo //de yang 'di ltar sems//dmigs pa de yang gzhan nam ci//sems dpa' de yang gzhan nam gang //dmigs pa de nyid sems yin
152a1(rgyud): /yin nam//sems dpa'adro nyid dmigs pa 'am/gal te dmigs pa de yang gzhan//sems dpa' dri'ang gzhanan ni de kho na nyid mi gcig ste gnyi su 'gyuraro//'on
152a2(rgyud): te gcig pa zhig yin na ni sems la sems kyis rje su lta zhing sems kyis sems mthong ba mi rig so//'di lta ste dper na ral grings de nyid gcod mi nus pa
152a3(rgyud): dang /sor mo'i rtse mo des de nyid la reg par mi nus pa bzhin sem+ba de la sems des dmi Da mi nuso zhes bltas na 'di ltar mthong ste/gang rag ma lus pa/sems la gnas med pa/rten
152a4(rgyud): med pa/chad par ma yin/rtag par ma yin/spungs par ma yin/rgyu las ma byung /rkyen gyis ma bskyed/de las ma yin/gzhan las ma yin/de nyid ma yin/gzhan ma yin//rigs/
152a5(rgyud): med pa/rgyu med pa/mi 'phro bo/mi snang ba/ngo bo nyid med pa ji lta ba de bzhin du mthong ngo //yang dag po mi g.yo ba/bden pa/cung zad kyang ma mthong /rnam par ma mthong /mi rtog/rnam par
152a6(rgyud): mi rtog/mi bskyod mi sems/mi spro/sems gzugs med pa/gang byung ba yang gzugs med pa/gang la gzugs med pas byang chub la yang gzugs medado//sems kyi rang
152a7(rgyud): bzhin ni byang chub po//byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni chos thams cad do//chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni de kho na nyid//sems 'di ni 'di ltar myur ba/rab tu myur ba/mi gnas pa/
152b1(rgyud): rgyu zla/spre'u lta bu/rlung lta bu/smig rgyu ba lta bu/chu'i rgyun lta bu/mar mo lta bu/lus gzugs lta bu/ring du 'gro ba/grwar yang mi g.yo ba/slar log ga/yul la gnas pa/drug
152b2(rgyud): gi spyod yul ba/kun shes pa/gcig tu thub pa/mi 'byung ba/thams cad 'byung ba/zhi gnas pa/tha dad pa gcig pa mi g.yed pa/kun tu g.yeng ba sems dus gsum du mnyam
152b3(rgyud): par shes pa/sems de kho na par shes pa/ji ltar rang gri sems shes pa de ltar gzhan gyi sems kyang rab tu sheso//rang gi sems ji ltar stong pa de ltar thams cad kyi sems stong par ra
152b4(rgyud): tu shes so//rang gi sems mnyam par shes pa de bzhin du thams cad kyi sems mnyam par rab tu shes so//des chos thams cad mnyam par rab tu sheso//chos thams cad
152b5(rgyud): mnyam pas byang chub mnyam par rab tu sheso//des sems chos thams cad kyi dbyings rab tu shes so//thams cad kyi dbyings de ni kun gyi thun mong ma yi no zhes sems la gnas
152b6(rgyud): pra sems la spyod pa/sems la dbang ba sems la lta ba/sdems mthong ba sems ngo shes pa lagasun gsang ba pa'i bdag po ci'i phyir dam pa 'ba' zhig gi spyod yul yin
152b7(rgyud): gyis pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin zhes smra/gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/lang ka'i bdag pod de ltar yin mod kyi/de dag thams cad nas thams cad du sems kyi
153a1(rgyud): khon+ti nyid nga rgyu'i mtshan nyid 'ba' zhig tu ngas par zad kyi 'bras pa nyid du yang sam shes//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di lta ste/gangs dngas pa rnams ni drab ba na/
153a2(rgyud): rgyur yongasu chud pa ste/bzhi gang zhe na/gang dra ba chen po dang dA ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang /dra ba gcig pa'o//de yang byis pa rnams dang /smyon pa rnams dang /'du shes chung ba rnams
153a3(rgyud): dang /'du shes gcig pa rnams kho na ste/grangs pa rnams ni sems rgyu 'ba' zhig las mi shes pa'i phyir 'du shes gcig pa ste/de dag ni dra bangar chud pa//drangs
153a4(rgyud): pa sha dge bas 'bras bu nges par rnyed par shin tu dka' ba yin na//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lang ka'i bdag po 'di ltar sems 'bras bu'i dri kho na gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas rnams
153a5(rgyud): kyis kya gsung du med pa/rdo rje sems dpas kyang mtshan du med pa yin na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lha ci smos/yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa/gsang ba pa'i bdag

153b3(rgyud): bdag po skyengs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa ltar na gsang ba pa'i bdag po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba
153b4(rgyud): dam pa ma nor ba de kho na nyid the chem thams cad gcod pa lags na 'bras bu de kho na nyid gsang ba ston mi spyod pa de shin tu ngomatshwa che ba ltar na bdag cag gis nam nges pa rnyed par 'gyur
153b5(rgyud): zhig gu zhes smras pa las/gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/kye dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag rdo rje sems dpal
153b6(rgyud): nyid kyis kyang gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid ma rnyed kyi bar du bskal pa grangs med gsum snyed dpag tu med pa'i dka' ba spyad kyang rnam pa thams cad ma mkhyen no//de ji lta zhe na/
153b7(rgyud): ji lta ji ltar rgyud yong su dag pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med 'byung ba dang 'byung ba yang de kho na nyid kyi nges pa ma rnyed kyi bar du dka' ba spyod pa ste/'di ltar bskol pa bzang tsho 'a
154a1(rgyud): 'og tu mtha' 'khob kyi bskal pa'i rigs ngan drug cu 'byung //de'i 'og tu bskal pa grags ldan zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu 'byung //de'i 'og tu
154a2(rgyud): rigs ngan gyi bskal pa stong phrag brgyad cu 'byung ngo //de'i 'og tu bskal pa kor ma bkram pa lta bu la sangs rgyas stong phrag brgya bcu 'byung ngo //de'i 'og tu mun pa'i bskal pa
154a3(rgyud): sum brgya 'byung //de'i 'og tu bskal pa mdzes ldan rgyan bya ba la sangs rgyas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa lnga 'byung ngo //de bzhin du mthe' thug pa med par sgron ma'i bskal pa dang
154a4(rgyud): mun po'i bsgral pa rtag par rgyun gyi 'khor por 'dron par 'byung //de ltar na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la sangs rgyas stong rtse gnyis 'byung //bskul pa bzang po 'di'i sngon

154a6(rgyud): de 'das pa'i sngon du bskal pa bzang rgyan zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi byung ngo //de 'das pa'i sngon du mun pa'i bskal pa lnga brgya byung ngo //de 'das
154a7(rgyud): pa'i sngon du bskal pa mthong dga' zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu byung ngo //de 'das pa'i sngon du mun pa'i bskal pa bdun brgya byung ngo //de 'das pa'i sngon du
154b1(rgyud): bskal pa dga' ba zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas stong phrag drug cu byung ngo //de la sogs pa mtha' yas par mun pa dang sgron ma'i bskal pa 'dren mar thog ma dang tha ma med par byung zhing 'byung ste/
154b2(rgyud): gang sgron ma ji snyed pa byung zhing 'byung ba rnams kyang gsang sngags kyi nges pa de kho na nyid ma rnyed kyi bar du dpag tu med pa'i dka' ba spyad kyang rnam pa thams cad ma mkhyen me mkhyen

154b5(rgyud): dus na tha ma'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i bstan pa la rgyal rigs dang /rmangs rigs dang /rje rigs dang bram ze'i rigs dang /gdol pa'i rigs dang /lnga lus mchog
154b6(rgyud): chen po lnga 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/khye'u bde skyeb zhes bya ba dang /khya'u tro li ta zhes bya ba dang /khye'u dpa' sbyin zhes bya ba dang /khye'u las byin dang /khye'u dum bur zhes bya ba byung ngo //de'i
154b7(rgyud): tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' ni khye'u bde skyob zhes bya'o//de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas tshe mtha' yas ni khye'u tra li ta zhes bya'o//de'i tshe de'i dus ni sangs rgyas ren

155a3(rgyud): skangs ni sem spro baN+Di bskyed cing ga d+hAn pa'i lam brgyud nas bgrod de 'gyur ba ma nges pa'i sa par gan so//de'i tshes sa r+g+haMs sus rmi sum stong la ji tshom

155b1(rgyud): skyes bu de//'khor los skye ba'i cha byad du//rin chen bdun dang dpung tshogs kyis//dbang sgyur thabs kyi theg pa ston//yang lung chen thob pa'i skabasu sems bdun rdzogs tu
155b2(rgyud): lhan cig gnas pa'i dri ma dag pas ri ba~M las rgal te dmigs pas 'bras bu skye ba'i sa par go na so//de'i tshe sangs rgyas bdun khri bdun stong la lung thos pas rtog chen la gnaso//
155b3(rgyud): de ying 'di lta ste de'i tshe skyes bu dam pa de//'bras bu nyid la lam shes pas//lam gyi yan lag bden rdzogs ste/gzhan dag smin par bya ba'i phyir//ji ltar 'dod ltar thabs mchog sbyor//
155b4(rgyud): yang rtsal chen rdzogs po'i skabasu sems gsum bskyed cing mtha' drug chub nas gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i sa par gnas so//de'i tshe sangs rgyas brgyad khri brgyad stong las
155b5(rgyud): lung bstan pa thos nas rdeng du gyur to//de yang 'di ltar/de nasu rgyal 'tshub skyes bu de//chos kyi rgyal po gang de yi//gdung 'tsho ba dga' ldan thog chen ston//mi gnas bcu dus
155b6(rgyud): chos phul snang //lang klo'i de dag po da ltar na las dang po ba'i rigs kyi bu de dag ni rigs lngar skye ba blangs pa de nas kyang bskal pa dpag tu med pa brjod pa las 'das pa'i/
155b7(rgyud): thog pa dang thi ma med pa'i dus na sangs rgyas lngal gyi chung mchog tu sems bskyed nas le ngo las sbyang ba'i rgyal po rnam par snang byed kyi bu lngar skyes pa ni 'di lta ste mdze
156a1(rgyud): pa'i me tog dang //bsam gyis mo khyab pa'i dpal dang //nor sbyin 'dzin dang //zla chas dpal dang /kun la mdzes pa'i'o 'od ces bya ba lngar gyur te/de dag las
156a2(rgyud): kyi dang po 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor par gyur pa nyid la yid la byed pa zhes bya ba thob bo//des na mkha' la 'gro ba'i ltas mthong bar gyur to//de nas rigs chen 'byed pa'i rnal 'byor
156a3(rgyud): par gyur pa nyid la 'phro 'du gcig pa ting 'dzin thob bo//des bdag nyid yi ge'i phreng bar snad pa'i lhas mthong bar gyur to//de nas dbugs chen phyin pa'i rnal 'byor pAr snang
156a4(rgyud): banyid la yongasu mi ldog pa'i ting nge 'dzin tho'o//des 'jig rten gyis khams nor bu chen po che sa ga bar spyod pa'i ltas mthong bar gyur to//de ni pa lung chen thob pa'i rnam
156a5(rgyud): 'byor du snang ba nyid la de bzhin nyid kyi ting 'dzin 'thob bo//des seng ge dag la zhon te thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i ltas mthong bar gyur to//de nas rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i
156a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor du snang ba nyid la kun tu snang gi ting 'dzin thob ste/des nyi zla'i 'khor lo skong bas thams cad 'od kyis gsal bar byed pa'i lhas mthong bar gyur to//lang kwa'i
156a7(rgyud): bdag po de la gyur du zin kyang gsing sngags kyi ngo bo de kho na nyid kyi nges pa rnyed pa ni ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lang ka'i bdag po gang las dang po pa'i rigs kyi
156b1(rgyud): bud+mo dang /rgyal 'chab skyes bur gyur pa na skyes bu dam pa rdo rje sems dpa' dang /skyes bu dam pa rdo rje rin chen dang /skyes bu dam pa rdo rje chos dang /skyes bu dam pa lus kyi rdo rje dang /
156b2(rgyud): skyes bu dmo pa rdo rje dgis zhes bya bar zhing khams thams cad du grags so//de lo la lar ni rgyal 'tsha ba skyes bu zhes bya bar brjod cing de ltar grags//la lar ni srid pa tha me pa zhes
156b3(rgyud): bye bar brjod cing gagos so//la lar ni sa chen po'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar brjod cing grags kyang sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa gsang ba dam pa da dung nyam su ma myong ste mnyam pa la
156b4(rgyud): 'jog dgos pa'i phyira'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/skyes dam pa de dag gis nam mnyam pa la ma bzhag gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa nyamasu ma myong nas yang dag pa'i rtog pas dang ngo'i sangs
156b5(rgyud): rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mnyam par bzhog pa dang ma bzhag pa mi mnga' bar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen na bdag
156b6(rgyud): tsog gis bskal pa dpag tu med par dka' ba dpag tu med par bgyi ze thams cad rdzogs par bgyis kyang mnyam pa la ma bzhag gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa myong bar ma
156b7(rgyud): gyur pa 'di ngo mtshar lags//bde bar gshegs pa 'di ngo mtshang lags//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' rdo rje snying po des bka' stsal pa/kye skyes
157a1(rgyud): bu dam pa rnams gang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du lhun gyis grub par 'dod pa rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nas thams cad du yongasu rdzogs
157a2(rgyud): par bya ba gsum las khyed rnams kyis gang bya ba yongasu rdzogs par byis/bsrung ba yongasu dag par byasu zin kyang da dung blo gros kun tu chub par ma byaso//de bas na gdod ma nas
157a3(rgyud): rnam pa rnams kyi de kho na nyid la blo gros kun tu chub par gyis shig dong /da yongasu chub pa bzhin dam pa rnams kyi dgongs pa myang bar 'gyuraro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa las//

164a3(rgyud): brjod kyis sa lang ngo //su tshe'i tshad ni dpag tu med pa 'ba' zhig//zhi khams der 'khod pa'i sems can chen po rnams ni rigs 'dzin chen po 'ba' zhigo//tshe tshad kya de nyid kyi rig

164a5(rgyud): ba dang /rnam par 'gro ba ni ting 'dzin 'ba' zhigo//chos kyang bya ba med pa'i chos nyid de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa 'ba' zhig//longs spyod kyang chos nyid zab mo 'ba' zhig la longs spyod//
164a6(rgyud): rig 'dzin de dgra kun kyang rigs lnga 'ba' zhig ste/da ci'i phyir zhe na/thams cad kyang rigs lnga las byung zhing lngar snang la lngar smin pa ste/lnga las gyur pas lngar nges pa ni 'di lta ste/
164a7(rgyud): gang zhe sdang gi rigs dang /nga rgyal gyi rigs dang /'dod chags kyi rigs dang /phrag dog gi rigs dag/gti mug gi rigs dang /bzod ldan gyi rigs dang /kun gdung gi rigs
164b1(rgyud): dang /drug 'byung gi rigs dang /rgyud ldan gyi rigs dang /gnas ldan gyi rigs dang /dmangs rigs dang /rgyal rigs dang /rje'u rigs dang /bram ze'i rigs dang /gdol pa'i rigs dang /
164b2(rgyud): kun snang gi rigs dang /rigs gcig pa'i rigs dang /tha dad pa'i rigs dang /bya ba byed pa'i rigs dang /thams cad 'byung ba'i rigs dang /rdo rje'i gdung dang bde'i rigs dang /nor bu'i gdung
164b3(rgyud): dang snga'i rigs dang /pad+ma'i gdung dang sde'i rigs dang /gzhon nu'i gdung dang sde'i rigs dang /glang po'i gdung dang sde'i rigs 'ba' zhig//de bzhin du thams cad nas thams cad du snang ba'i sangs
164b4(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mtha' thugs pa med pa rnams kyang las dang 'jug pa'i dbang gi rigs lnga 'be' zhig//ji bzhin pa'i dbang gis nas thams cad nas thams cad du rigs
164b5(rgyud): kyi mtshan ma med do//tha snyad med do//rnam pa med//yul medo//'jug pa med do//sangs rgyas pa med do//lung bstan pa med do//nges pa rnyed pa med do//thams cad nas thad du byang chub
164b6(rgyud): nyid do//stong pa nyid do snying pa nyid do//de kho na nyid do//yang dag pa nyid do//nges pa dam pa nyid do//gzhan ma yin pa nyid do//skye ba med pa nyid do//'gag pa med pa nyid do//de bzhin nyid
164b7(rgyud): mnong pa nyid do//chos nyid do//chos kyi dbyings nyid do//bsam gyis mi khyab pas bsam du med pa nyid do//yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid do zhes lul bstan pa dang /de kho na nyid
165a1(rgyud): gsang bdam pa'i sgra dpal rdo rje snyoms dpa'i de kha na nyid stong pa nyid las blangs pasas bu dam pa rnams thams cad nas thams cad du byang dru tu snang
165a2(rgyud): nyid du nges pa rnyed do//kye lang ki'i bdag po byang chub kyi sems de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa de 'di ltar dka' bro/'di ltar zab bo//'di ltar rgya che ba/'di ltar bsam du med pa khasam
165a3(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir gang gi nges pa rnyed par dka' ba ni de lta bu'o//de nas yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa/kye gas ba pa'i bdag po byang chub kyi sems de kho na nyid gsang ba dam
165a4(rgyud): pa'i rgyun dang bcas pa zhig gam/'on te rgyun chad pa zhig/gal te rgyun dang banas pa zhig na ni ye shes chen po skye 'gug dang /bcas pa yino//don tu rgyun chad pa zhig na ni de
165a5(rgyud): shes ye shes kyi khyad par dang dgongs pa dgongs pa'i go 'phang med par 'gyur ro//de skad ces dris pa dang /gsang po pa'i bdag pos smras pa/kyi lang ka'i bdag po byang chub kyi sem+ba/
165a6(rgyud): de kho na nyid gsung ba dam pa de ni skye 'gag med par rgyun dang bcas pa'o//dris pa gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang gi rgyun dang bcas pa lags/smras pa/lung ka'i bdag po ye shes
165a7(rgyud): rgyun dang bcas pa'o//snying rje rgyun dang bcas pa'o//phrin las rgyun dang bcas pa'o//yon tan rgyun dang bcas par byin brlabs rgyun dang bcas pa'o//smon lam rgyun dang bcas
165b1(rgyud): pa'i phyir rgyun ma chud pa'o//dris pa gsang ba pa'i bdag po de dag la ci'i phyir rgyun zhes bya ba smras pa/lang+ga ka'i bdag po rgyun gyi rang bzhin du 'byung ba'i phyir ro//dris pa rgyun gyi rang bzhin gang /
165b2(rgyud): smras pa/ljang kwa'i bdag po glang med pa nyis rgyun gyi rang bzhin te 'di lta ste/rgyu ni dang bcas phyi'i byang chub sems/med rgyu btags chags bltas par snang //snang 'dod sdug bsngal chen
165b3(rgyud): po'i nad//de nyid che yon rgyun mi 'chad//kun tu rgyun dang bcas pa yi//gsang ba dam pa de kho na//sgron ma dam pa gang dag gis//skyes bu dam pa gang dag la//de nyid chen par de nyid rgyud//
165b4(rgyud): dgongs pa snang ba ma gtogs pa//brjod pas bstan yod ma yin te//med rgyu snang med gang na thang ba/ye gtad ma bcos ji bzhin te//de nyid nges pa de kho na//cir yang mi snang dpyod
165b5(rgyud): dang bral//bsam med yul las 'das pa'o//kye lang ka'i bdag po sangs rgyas kun gyi dam pa gsang ba'i snying po 'di la thams cad nas thams cad du gnas par bya'o//de ci'i
165b6(rgyud): phyir zhe na/glang las kyi chos kyis bskyangs pa rnams kyi bsnyed kyi bskul par los dka' ba dpag tu med pas 'bad bsngal kyang /dam pa ma thob pa gang dag gis bya ba med pa'i don
165b7(rgyud): gyis thang cig yud tsam pa gsung ba 'di la mos pa tsam gyis gdon mi za bar dam pa gsang ba thob par 'gyuraro//de'i phyir lang ka'i bdag po 'di la gnas par bya'o//'di las mi
166a1(rgyud): 'da' bar bya'o//de skad ces smras pa/lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa rnams bla gros dam pa'i nges pa rnyed par gyur to//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus
166a2(rgyud): pa'i mdo chen po lngas skyes bu dmo pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o////theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba'i tshul las gang gis nges pa rnyed pa'i gtam rgyud brjod
166a3(rgyud): pa chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes rnam par bgros pa ste byung tshul bstan pa gsum pa'o//de nas yang lang ka'i bdag pos gsang ba pa'i bdag po la sngon du byung ba'i tshig bcu gnyis
166a4(rgyud): pa'i bzhi po snying po byang chub nyid du nges pa na yang 'byung zhes lung bstan pa yongasu dri ba dris pa kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyid kyis theg pa chen po gsang ba dam pa byung ba'i tshul gtam
166a5(rgyud): du brjod pa'i skabasu snying po byang chub nyid du nges bya na yang 'byung zhes bkod pa de ji lta ba zhig tu nges te byung ba lcags smras pa/lang ka'i bdag po gang dam pa dag thams cad
166a6(rgyud): nas thams cad du snying po byang chub nyid du snang ba'o//smras pa/gsang ba pa'i bdag po skyes bu dam pa gang dgra yongasu nges pa rnyed de snying po byang chub tu gnas pa na thams cad nus
166a7(rgyud): thams cad du ji ltar snang /gang snang ba zhig na ni ma byung ma skyes par mi rung ba zhig/mi snang ba zhig na ni rgyun gyi ye shes dang rgyun gyi snying rje 'byung bar mi rung ba zhig na 'di ji
166b1(rgyud): ltar yongasu shes par bgyi/de skad ces dris pa las/gsang ba po'i bdag pos smras pa/kye lAng kwa'i bdag po da ni 'di lta ste/snying po byang chub ji lta bA la skyes bu dam pa de bzhin pa nyid
166b2(rgyud): de/snying po byang chub gang yin pa de ni skyes bu dam pa de nyid la skyes bu dam pa gang yin pa de ni snying po byang chub nyid de skyes bu dam pa zhes ni ma mthong la snying po byang chub ces ni ma dmigs
166b3(rgyud): so//dris pa gang ma mthong ma dmigs na ni dam pa rnams kyis gsungs pa ltar na gang de nyid mthong ba des chos thams cad mthong ngo //chos thams cad mthong ba des snying po byang chub
166b4(rgyud): mthong ngo zhes gsungs pa dang /gang de kho na nyid nges pa rnyed pa des nges pa rnyed do zhes gsungs pa las 'gra' bar gyur na 'di ji ltar yongasu shes par bgyi/de skad ces dris po las
166b5(rgyud): smras pa/kye lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste/gzugs snang gang mthong rdzas rnyed min//ma mthong de mthong nyid nges pa//brjod med gang rig nyams rnyed la//mthong snyed tha snyad tsam du
166b6(rgyud): brjod//rnam dag lam chen de nyid du//byung ba'i skyes bu dam pa dag/don chen ra tu des rnyed de//mi dmigs pa'i ngang nyid la//mi g.yo mi rtog pa yid tshe//mi gnas chos sku
166b7(rgyud): ngo bo nyid/rang 'byung ye shes na mkharatshe/ma 'dres yongasu rdzogs pa'i ngang //mi spyi mi 'gog de bzhin nyid//smras bsam brjod med rtog las 'das//so so rang gi spyod yul
167a1(rgyud): dbus mthar mi dmigs ji bzhin nyid//snying po byang chub kun yum lA/ma spros bde bzhin lhan na pa'o//yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa//gsang ba pa'i bdag
167a2(rgyud): po byang chub kyi snying po de kho na nyid de ji tsam zhig na gnas par 'gyur/mtshan dang rang bzhin ci lags smras pa/lang ka'i bdag po kun tu ma nges te/des tshigs dang /zla ba dang /
167a3(rgyud): zla bo phyed dang /zhag dang nyi ma dang /thun dang thun phyed dang /skad cig dang thang cig dang /yud tsam dang /de ma thag pa dang /de kho na nyid pa dang /bskul pa dang /bskal pa tshad med paso///
167a4(rgyud): mtshan nyid dang rang bzhin med paso//mi dmigs pa'o//goms par byas pa'o//nges par brtags pa'o//yong su spyad pa'o//cir yang snang ba'o//yin par nges pa'o//kun nas
167a5(rgyud): 'byung ba'o//thams cad 'das pa'o//yongs la khyab pa'o//yod gis skyes pa'o//rnam par dag pa'o//gar yango ma grub pa'o//khyab pa med pa ma khyab pa med pa mthon dman
167a6(rgyud): med pa/che chung med pa bzang ngan med pa/yang so dog med pa/rgyu 'bras med pa/pho mo med pa/rigs rgyud med pa/gzugs med pa/las dang rnam smin med pa/phyi nang med/
167a7(rgyud): ba/skye ba med pa/'pho 'gyur med pa/mun snad med pa/snga phyi med pa/mtha' dbus med pa/bdag gzhan med pa/rtsol sgrub med pa/blang dor med pa/rang gis ma
167b1(rgyud): pa/yod gos 'ad ga sngal pa/mA bskrad pa/ma byung ba/ma smyos pa yin na/yang ka'i bdag po na mtshan nyid dang rang bzhin mims 'dre/byung rgyub rdzi snying po ni steng byad du mi snang ba las/
167b2(rgyud): 'das te mtshan nyid dang rang bzhin mi dmig so//de ltar ni lang ka'i bdag po gang skyes bu dam pa dag snying po byang chub tu gnas te mi dmigs pa de la rdo rje sems dpa'i stong pa nyid de kho na nyid
167b3(rgyud): dam pa de las de dge bgam pa'i phyir 'di skad ces 'byung ngo //k+She skyes bu dam pa dag gang snying po byang chub mthong nga mo//skyes bu dam pa rnams snying po byang chub de kho na nyid de las
167b4(rgyud): 'di skad ces 'byung ngo //kye bshes gnyen dam pa byang chub kyi snying po ni bdag cag gis ma mthong bA r-i mthong lagaso//bka' stsal pa/ji ltar ma mthong bar mthong /gsol pa/byang chub
167b5(rgyud): kyi snying por mi mthong bar thams cad byang chub kyi snying por mthong lag so//dka' stsal pa/byang chub kyi snying po zhes gang la bya/gsol pa/bshes gnyen dam pa byang chub kyi snying po ni sangs
167b6(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi gsang ba dgongs pa dam pa la bgyi'o//bka' stsal pa/skyes bu dam pa dgongs pa dam pa zhes gdul bya/gsol pa/thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang legs pa de khyen
167b7(rgyud): nyid de//bka' stsal pa/ci'i phyir thams cad kyi rang bzhin la gsang sngogs zhes bya/gsol pa/thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de ni gang gis kyang mi mthong /mi rtogs/
168a1(rgyud): spyod yul du ma gyur/smar med pa/brjod pa las 'das pa/bsam du med pa/bsam gyis mi khyab pa/brtag par dka/'a zhing bstan par dka' ba'i phyir
168a2(rgyud): lags so//bka' stsal pa/skyes bu dam pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin mthong ngam/gsol pa/bshes gnyen dam pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni bdag cig gis ma mthong lag so//
168a3(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ci'i phyir ma mthong /gsol pa/mi dmigs pa'i slad du'o//bka' stsal pa/skyes bu dam pa khyed kyis thams cad kyi rang bzhin ma mthong ngam/gsol pa/bshes
168a4(rgyud): gnyen dam pa bdag cag gis mthong lagaso//bka' stsal pa/skyes bu dam pa ji lta bur mthong /gsol pa/thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de ma bcos/ma slad/ma byung //
168a5(rgyud): ma skyes ji bzhin pa de kho na nyid ye ji bzhin pa'i dkyil 'khor du mthong lag so//bka' stsal pa/sangs rgyas mthong ngam/gsol pa/ma mthong lagaso//bka' stsal pa
168a6(rgyud): ci'i phyir ma mthong /gsol pa/mi dmigs pa'i slad du'o//bka' stsal pa/ma mthong ngam/gsol pa/mthong lagaso//bka' stsal pa/ji lta bur mthong /ge sel pa
168a7(rgyud): thams cad de bzhin nyid du sangs rgyas te kun la khyab pa'i slad du rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du mthong lagaso//bka stsal pa/sems can mthong ngam/
168b1(rgyud): gsol pa/ma mthong lag so//bka' stsal pa/ci'i phyir ma mthong /gsol pa/mi dmigs pa'i slad du'o//bka' stsal pa/ma mthong ngam/gsal pa/mthong lcags so//
168b2(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ji ltar mthong /gsol pa/thams cad rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor du mthong ljagaso//bka' stsal pa/skyes bu dam pa khyed byang chub kyi snying por 'dod dam/
168b3(rgyud): gsol pa/bshes gnyen dam pa yongasu smin to//bka' stsal pa/ci'i phyir mi 'dod/gsol pa// skyes bu dam pa zhes bgyi ba nyid dang sems can sems can zhes bgyi ba nyid
168b4(rgyud): byang chub kyi snying po las ma g.yos pa'o//thams cad kyang de bzhin nyid las ma g.yo sa pA'o//bka' stsal pa/skyes bu dam pa byang chub kyi snying po gang nas btsal/gsol pa/gang nas
168b5(rgyud): kyang mi tshol lo//bka' stsal pa/ci'i phyir mi tshel/gsol pa/thams cad byang chub kyi snying po nyid de/gang na yang mi gan so//bka' stsal pa/skyes bu dam pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing //
168b6(rgyud): khams yongasu bgrod par 'dod dam/gsol pa/yong su bgrod par mi 'dod do//bka' stsal pa/ci'i phyir bgrod par mi byed/gsol po/sems can gyi ris mtha' dag sangs rgyas kyi
168b7(rgyud): zhing rnam par dge pa nyid kyi slad du'o//bka' stsal pa/skyes bu dam pa mi g.yo ba la mi rtog pa nyid du gnas sam/gsol pa/mi rtog pa la mi 'jug lags//bka' stsol pa
169a1(rgyud): ci'i phyir mi 'jug/gsol pa/bdag nyid mi rtog pas da gdon mi rtog pa la 'jug mi 'tshal ba'i slad du'o//gal te bdag yA nas rnam par mi rtag
169a2(rgyud): pa ma lags na ni rnam par mi rtog pa la bdag 'jug pa zhig na thams cad ye nas rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o//bka' stsal pa/skyes su dam pa snying rje chen po 'byung ba
169a3(rgyud): 'dod dam/gsol pa/'byung bar mi 'dod lagaso//bka' stsal pa/ci'i phyir mi 'dod/gsol ba/kun tu mi g.yo la gso//bka' sprul pa/ci'i phyir mi g.yo/thams cad
169a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas pa nyid kho na bas snying rje'i yul mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//bka'o stsal pa/skyes bu dam pa sems can rnams kyi don chad du spyod dam/gsol pa/me spyod lag so//
169a5(rgyud): bka' stsol pa/ci'i phyir mi spyod/gsol pa/thams cad ye nas de bzhin nyid kho na'i slad du'o//bka' stsal pa/skyes bu dam pa chos kyi sku lhun gyis grub par 'dod dmo/gsol pa/
169a6(rgyud): grub par mi 'chil lag so//bka' stsal pa/ci'i phyir grub par mi 'dang /gsol pa/'dus pa lngas byung ba'i slad du'o//bka' stsal pa/skyes bu dam pas rnams yongasu gsal
169a7(rgyud): bzod par 'dod dam/gsol pa/yongasu bgrod par mi bgyid lag so//bka' stsal pa/ci'i phyir mi bgrod/gsol pa/thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sa la ma bgrod par phyin
169b1(rgyud): ba'i phyur ro//bka' stsal pa/sgras bu dam pa snying po byang chub dang po gang gis byastan/gsol pa/gshe sa gnyen dam pa 'thun pa'i dpen gang yang ma mchis to//drabo gang gas kyu
169b2(rgyud): bskyon du ma mchim pa lag so//bka' stsal pa/dbo mtshon du med dam/gsol pa/chung zad du 'thun pa'i dpe gzung na 'di lta ste/nam+me kha'i dang /nyi ma dang /nor bu rin po che dang /rin po
169b3(rgyud): che ga sir dang /smin ma dang /dug 'gyur rtsi dang /gser 'gyu rtsi dang /bai DUr+ya dang /rgya mtsho chen pA dang /rdo'i snying po dang /rtsal gyis non pa dang /yul la 'jug pa dang /gsar
169b4(rgyud): rdo rin po che dang /mngon par spro ba bskyed pa lta bu lag so//bka' stsal po/skyes bu dam pa'i snying po byang chub de mtshan pa'i ming ji ltar grags/gsal pa/gshes gnyen
169b5(rgyud): dam pa ming ni bla dgas te/ming la nges pa grang yang ma mchis la gso//bka' stsal pa/ming gis mtshon du med dam/gsol pa/gang+gA yongasu mi dmigs pa las brjod pa'i dbang
169b6(rgyud): du mtshon na ming ge rnam grangasu brtags pa ni tha dad pa ji ltar btags pa de ltar tshogs par glags te snying po byang chub nyid dang /de nyid dang /de kho na nyid dang /de bzhin nyid dang /
169b7(rgyud): ji bzhin pa dang /ma nor ba dang /ma bcos pa dang /gzhan ma yin pa dang /chas nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /pos me gyis mi khyab pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /gso
170a1(rgyud): sngag sna dang /gzung sngags dang /rig sngags dang /theg pa chen po zhes yongasu grags pa lag so//bka' stsal pa/skyes bu dam pa dgra snying po byang chub du
170a2(rgyud): ji ltar snang /gsol pa/snying po byang chub de skad cig kyang snang ba mi srid lagaso//bka' stsal pa/ci gang du yang me snang ngam/gsol pa/ji ltar bltas pa de ltar snad lag so//
170a3(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ji ltar yongasu snong /sol pa/'di lta ste/kun tu khyab pas snang ba med pa nyid do//gar yang ma sbas mthong ba med pa nyid do//ye nas ma bral ngo mi shes pa
170a4(rgyud): nyid do//brtags nam mthong ci re yang snang ba nyid//sna tshogs snang yang dngos po med pa nyid do//bskal bar khyams kyang stor bral med pa nyid do//sna tshogs bsgo yang 'gyur ba med pa
170a5(rgyud): pa nyid do//rdul cha med par snang srid khyab pa nyid do//stong pa nyid las sna tshogs 'byung ba nyid do//dngos gau zhi med par cir yang brtags chags pa nyid do//brtsal gnas med par
170a6(rgyud): ci bskabs 'grub pa nyid//gzugs mtshan med par cir bltas snang ba nyid do//cir yang med par cir yang rig pa nyid do//khyab brdal 'u ba chub gcig mtha' yas pa nyid//
170a7(rgyud): kun brel nyag cig ci ma spangs pa nyid do//byi dang nang med kun du nang nyid do//mtha' yas byung yang zad pa med pa nyid do//ma bzung ma brtags gang du chags pa nyid do//gdos
170b1(rgyud): med par rtag par ltung ba nyid do//'dogs pa med par nu mkha' la 'gyu ba nyi dang //yan lag med par sgra rnams bgrad pa nyid do//gar yang myug mos kun tu phyin pa nyid//bad pa
170b2(rgyud): med par thags med rgyur ba nyid do//tha dad spros kyang gcig las ma g.yosapa nyi//gcig las ma g.yos sne tsheDa snang ba nyid//dzad 'jug pas la ma nyi//gang yang ma spangs pos 'khong nga nyid//mi shes
170b3(rgyud): 'khrul pas san nyid//chu bo cheni sgrol pas rtswa nyid//rnam pa na grod pag/dmigs pa med pas byang chub//rnam pa sna tshogs pas sems nyid//kun la mkhas pas shes rag/
170b4(rgyud): thams cad gsal bas teng 'dzin no//ma bgrod par phyin pas gnas nyid do//med pas rab nyid do//dri ma chur bas mchog nyid do//rnam par 'phags pas phul tong //
170b5(rgyud): dang gnyen po med pas bla na med pa nyid do//gting mi brnyed pas zab pa nyid//dpag tu med pas na gsang ba nyid do//phra bas na mi gsal ba nyid//thams cad 'byung bas choso//mi
170b6(rgyud): 'gyur bas de kho na nyid do//go 'phang nyid pas byang chub sems dpa'o//rgyunas ngas khyab pas sangs rgyas nyid do//gzhir gyur pas rtsa ba nyid do//thams cad bskyed pas
170b7(rgyud): yum nyid do//de las byung bas yab nyid do//godung rgyud 'dzin pas sras nyi de//rang byung ba nyid pas dbang bdag nyid de//de bzhin nyid pas gdung chen po nyid do//'da' bar dka'
171a1(rgyud): dan/bas thugs dam chen po nyid do//rnam par 'tsho bas srog nyid do//zad mo shes pas gtor chen po nyid do//'dod pa bsgrub pas nar nyid do//rgyun gyi snying rjes
171a2(rgyud): kun gyi bya ba byed pas bran nyid do//rnam par brjid pas sku nyid do//sgra brjod byung bas gsung nyid//thams cad mkhyen pas thugs nyid//'dod dgu 'byung bas yon tan nyid///
171a3(rgyud): bya ba byed pos phrin las nyid do//yuli la bgrod pas 'dod pa nyid do//de nyid la spyod pas longs spyod chen po nyid//rgyur gyur pas yo byad chen po'o//de gongs pa tshang bas tshogs
171a4(rgyud): chen po'o//bya ba rtsal med pas don thams cad grub pa'o//sna tshogs 'phrul bas cho 'phrul nyid//mtshan mar byung pas phyag rgya nyid do//gzhan nas mi tshol bas bsnyen pa nyid///
171a5(rgyud): rang las byung bas nye ba'i bsnyen po nyid do//snying po nyid pas bsgrub pa'o//'bras bu nyid pas sgrub pa chen po'o//bka' stsal pA/skyes bu dam pa dag byang chub kyi snying po de rje
