198b2(rgyud): par byang chub par bya snyam/de skad ces grag pa las stong pa nyid de las 'di skad du grago/kye de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad don gang gi dbang gis zhing khams kyi bya ba yong su rdzogs
198b3(rgyud): par 'gyur/de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dang tha dad du rnam par snang bar mdzad par 'gyur/de skad du grag pa las/yang thams cad kyi de kho na nyid las bskul ba gsum gyis bskul
198b4(rgyud): ba'i dang po 'di skad du grag go//stong nyid mi g.yon mkha' le//mi spyod bde bar gshegs mdzad pa//mi dmigs mi rtog de bzhin nyid//rtog pa sna tshogs skyed par mdzod ces grag/
198b5(rgyud): de la yang skyes bu dam pa de nyid las 'di skad du grag go/mi rtog dang las rtag nyid du//brtags pas stong pa gang byung ba//de nyid rtog pa chen po ste//gang mi rtog pa rtog pa'i rgyu zhes
198b6(rgyud): gra go//yang thams cad kyi de nyid las 'di skad du grag+ho/na mkha'i dbyings kyi snying po las//rang bzhin kun tu snang ba'i 'od//yongs la khyab pa snying rje'i yum//mtha' yas rgyal srid
198b7(rgyud): skyed par mdzod ces grago/yang skyes bu dam pa de nyid las 'di skad du grag/kun 'byung kun gzhi chos kyi dbyings//ma skyes mi 'gag kun tu snang //smra bas ma rjod med yul
199a1(rgyud): las 'das//mtha' yas mtha' yas bskyed pa'i yul zhes grag go//yang thams cad kyi dri nyid las 'di skad du zag glo/tha dad rnam par snang mdzad na//gdung
199a2(rgyud): gi phyag rgya'i ye shes las//rgyal ba rnams ni yi ger snang //yi ge'i ye shes skyed par mdzod ces gra go//yang skyes bu dam pa de nyid las 'di skad du grago/de nyid yi ge'i rang
199a3(rgyud): bzhin te//rang byung ye shes muM du gsal//sems nyid yA ge'i rang bzhin te//sno tshogs yi ge hUM du snang //rgyal ba'i yi ge'i rang bzhin te/phyag rgya yi ge oM la sogs//
199a4(rgyud): thams cad yi ge'i rang bzhin te//ma skyes gsang ba'i yi ge a zhes grago/yang thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid lngas 'di skad du grago/ye shes pha rol phyin rdzogs pas//rnal
199a5(rgyud): 'byor rig pa'i sgo mtshon pa//thugs kyi rtags snang snang ba mdzad//rnam grol ye shes bskyed par mdzad ces grag/yang skyes bu dam pa de nyid los 'di skad du grag/
199a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes ni//rtag tu rnam rtog med las 'byung //mi rtog rnam grol ye shes thugs//rtog la rnam rtog mtshon mar snang zhes gra go//yang tha~Md kyi de bzhin
199a7(rgyud): nyid las 'di skad du grag/stong nyid mi rtog mo long las//ma skyes mi 'gag gzugs snang ba//mkha' la 'ja' snang ji bzhin du//dbyings las phyag rgyar bzhengs su
199b1(rgyud): gsol zhes grago/yang skyes bu dam pa de nyid las 'di skad du grago/de bzhin nyid du mi dmigs kyang //rang bzhin kun tu snang ba'i dbyings//ma 'dres yong su rdzogs pas na//phyag
199b2(rgyud): rgya'i gzugs mchog rnam por snang zhes phrag//de ltar bskul ba dang po des yong su rdzogasnga par bskul bas skyes bu dam po de kho na nyid stong pa nyid kyi dbyings de yis stong pa nyid kyi sku rnam
199b3(rgyud): par snang ba ni ji lta ji ltar chu zla'i dkyil 'khor snang ba'am/na mkha' la 'ja' snang ba'i tshul du byung nas gong ma nges pa'i ye shes kyi gnas pas gnas pa la de bzhin gshegs pa
199b4(rgyud): zad kyis bskul ba gnyis pa 'dis nges par bskul ba ni 'di lta ste/rang bzhin ma byung ma bcos de bzhin nyid//ye nas mi g.yo bde ba chen po'i dang //brtsal zhing g.yo ba 'di la ci
199b5(rgyud): yang med//ye shes dbyings nyid tshig gi tha snyad de//de nyid dngos dang dngos min 'byung gnas nyid//cis kyang mi tshugs mi chod mi shigs pa'i//ye nyid ji bzhin brede mchog mi
199b6(rgyud): g.yo ba//rdo rje sems mchog na mkha'i snying po che//dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa'i bshes gnyen po//'phags rje sprul pa mang po 'byung ba'i gnas kun gyi rang bzhin me
199b7(rgyud): long 'od po che//rgyal ba mtha' yas skyed pa'i yab yum mdzod//gang dag byang chub snying por mtshungs pa yi//rang dag dbyings las ma g.yos byang chub sems//gang du dang
200a1(rgyud): pa rnam dag sangs rgyas kun//khams gsum nas byung rdo rje snying po'i lus//mtha' yas rtog las yi ge sna tshogs sprul//smras kyi tshogs kyis mdzes
200a2(rgyud): par bskor ba'i dkyil//gzugs skur bostan nas nyon mongs spyad du gsol/gang du dang po rdo rje snying po ni//khams gsum nas byung bde che ni lhun gyis grub//gtum thung
200a3(rgyud): gdug pa thabs kyis grol mdzad phyir//dri med sna tshogs blos ni hUM du sprul//'od zer tshul gyi phreng bas bskor ba'i dkyil//sngon gyi thugs dam smon lam dbang gis na//
200a4(rgyud): cis kyang mi bskyod gzugs sku bstan du gsol//gang du dang po rnaM par snang mdzad ni//khams gsum nas byung cir yang snang bar mdzad//rmongs byed mun pa thabs kyis grol
200a5(rgyud): mdzad phyir//rnam dag byang chub blos ni oM du sprul//gzugs mang tshul gyis phreng bas bskor ba'i dkyil//sngon gyi smon lam thugs dam dbang gis na//cir yang snang bI gzugs
200a6(rgyud): sku bstan du gsol//gang du dang po yon tan 'byung gnas ni//khams gsum nas byung yid bzhin rin po che//'dod pas rmongs pa thabs kyis grol mdzad phyir//rnam dag
200a7(rgyud): 'byung gnas blos ni swaM du sprul//rin chen phreng bas mdzes par bskor ba'i dkyil//sngon gyi smon lam thugs dam dbang gis na//'dod pa kun 'byung gzugs sku bstan du
200b1(rgyud): gsol//gang du dang po 'od dpag med pa ni//khams gsum nas byung gsung rab snang mtha' yas//chags pas rmongs pa thabs kyis grol mdzad phyir//rnam dag dri med zlos ni
200b2(rgyud): oM du sprul//gsung snyan yi ge phreng bas bskor ba'i dkyil//sngon gyi smon lam thugs dam dbang gis nA//sna tshogs ston pa'i gzugs sku bstan du gsol//gang du dang po gdon/
200b3(rgyud): mi za ba ni//khams gsum nas byung sna tshogs cir yang mdzad//bya ba rmongs pa thabs kyis grol mdzad phyir//rnam dag nan tan blos ni hi du sprul//mdzad pa gar gyi phreng bas bskor
200b4(rgyud): ba'i dkyil//sngon gyi smon lam thugs dam dbang gis na//thams cad mdzad pa'i gzugs sku bstan du gsol zhes bskul ba gnyis pa des yongasu rdzogs par bskul bas chos
200b5(rgyud): nyid sgyu ma las ye shes sgyu ma'i sku snang ba ni ji lta ji ltar me long gi dbyingasu bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba bzhin du ye shes rang snang bar gnas pa las/de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md
200b6(rgyud): kyis bskul ba gsum pa 'dis mngon du rdzogs pa longs spyod rdzogs par bskul ba ni 'di lta ste/de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa khyod//'jig rten mngon rdzogs rgyas mdzod la/
200b7(rgyud): snying po byang chub ji bzhin pa//sems can ngan du snang bar mdzod//'jig rten khams ni dpag meng du//ji snyed bde bar gshegs pa yi//sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis
201a1(rgyud): kyang //mtha' dag don du rnam snang mdzad//khams gsum 'dor ba'i nad pa la//gzhan gyis phan pa'i sman ma mchis//yang dag bdud rtsi'i sman sbyar byas//
201a2(rgyud): 'khor ba'i gcong rnying sbyang mdzad pa//sdug bsngal zug rngu'i nad sel ba'i/sman pa che mchog gtso bo gshegs//nad do cig gi dgrar gyur pa//bdud rtsi sman gyi rgya mtsha
201a3(rgyud): yis//log pa'i nad dgras gzir ba yi//nad pa'i tshogs kun spang bar mdzod//rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i skyes bu nyid//snying po byang chub la dgongs la//'od zer snang ba rgyas
201a4(rgyud): bkye ste//mun pa bsal ba'i dgongs pa mdzod//kye ma skyes bu don grub pa//bya ba byas shing byed pa byas//khur bor bdag don rjes thob pa//gang 'dir 'dul ba'i dus la
201a5(rgyud): bab//gtsar ma'i gnas mchog 'og min gyi//chos kyis mthong ba'i gzhal ya sau//rdzogs longasngo spyod pa'i skur gshegs te//snying po bskur ba'i bye ba mdzod ces rnam
201a6(rgyud): par bskul bas//ji lta ji ltar sprin mthongs nas//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba dang //mi g.yo ba yi dbyings nyid las//gzugs sku nyi ma shar ba ste//chos kyi mtho ba
201a7(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i gzhal ya su rnam par snang bar gyur to//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las gang gi cho 'phrul bskul ba'i le'u ste/nyi shu gsum pa'o//
201b1(rgyud): de nas chos kyi rgyal ba rdzogs langs spyod pad rdo rje ga 'byad yongasu bsdu ba'i mtshan ma mdzad pas mtha' jug pa da pa'i zhing khams stug pa dasad pa nas dbang tu mang pa'i rgyal ba kun
201b2(rgyud): nas yongasu 'dus par gyur to//de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas snying rje yongasu rol pa'i tshogs kyis gcig tu 'thun par bgros pa/kye kye sangs rgyas rnam pa mang po 'byung ba'i tsho gas sna
201b3(rgyud): po/kun tu rab tu 'dir 'byung ba//sred pa ldog pa'i gdug po can//'khor bya'i sra bon rtsub mos 'phangs//sdug bsngal chen po'i yi dwags rnams//las kyis 'jig rten khams 'dir
201b4(rgyud): 'byung //drag po log pa'i dka' thub kyis//srid pa gsum gyi bdag por smin//dregs pa ru dra'i gdugs dpal gyis//'gro rnams mthar rlog 'joms byed 'di//gdul ba'i
201b5(rgyud): zhing mchog rmad du byung //snying rje'i bdag po kun 'dus nas//las ngan las kyi rgyun bcad do//bde chen sa la gzhag par rigs zhes 'groso//sangs rgyas rdo rje'i gdung dang sde'i
201b6(rgyud): tshogs kyis gcig par bgras pa//kye ma'o 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams//'ongs pa'i dus na sngon byung ltar//da ltar dus 'di nyid du byang //lung lo go mngon pa'i ri bor bsregs///
201b7(rgyud): rang rgyud bsregs pa'i bslad pa can//bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yi//grang tshan myos pa drag po tshe//shin tu mi bzad dug chen gyis//'dod 'bod par gsad bsreg pas/
202a1(rgyud): ro gling dur khrod mthar zhen pa//ji lta'i thabs kyis phan par 'gyur zhes bgros so//sangs rgyas nong bu'i gdung dang snga'i tshogs kyis gcig tu 'thun par bgros pa/
202a2(rgyud): nag po'i gdug pa bsnyen pa 'di//ji ltar de dgar bzhag 'gyur na//mi bzad dug mtsho chu rlabs kyis//nog pa'i khams su rgyas 'gyur bas//dam pa rnams kyi rgyun gcod
202a3(rgyud): tsing //nyi ma sgron ma 'jig par 'gyur//de tshwa las kyi mun po yis//thams cad mun nag smag tu 'khyams zhes bgros//sangs rgyas pad+mo'i gdung dang sde'i tshogs kyis mgrin
202a4(rgyud): gcig tu 'thun par 'gros pa//gang 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba//las kyi 'khor los 'phangs pa yo//blo gros ldog pa'i ru da de//snying po dbyings nas byung ba ni//skyes bu
202a5(rgyud): dam pa'i sbyor ba yis//bdud kyis bdud btul gnyer bkod ltar//da ltar 'di tshe byung ba ni//dug 'gyur brtsegs pa'i ro bo 'di//rdo rje khros pa'i tho chen gyis//brlag ci pa
202a6(rgyud): gzhom pa dus la bab ces bgros so//sangs rgyas gzhon nu'i gdung dang sde'i tshogs kyis mgrin gcig tu 'thun par bgos pa//khong nas 'khyal ba'i dug chen po//thar
202a7(rgyud): med mi bzang nad kyis zin//rtag chad khamasu shi ba'i ro//lim lag lam stor dmus long 'di//ye shes khros pa'i cho 'phrul las//'bor 'phro 'khrug pa'i gzar
202b1(rgyud): tshon gyis//smag chen mun nag gzhom pa'i phyir//ye shes can gyi spyod yul nas//rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun 'dus te//ye shes rdo rje khros pa yi//cho 'phrul sprin phung gti byas pa'i sa//
202b2(rgyud): 'thun 'jug byis pa'i chu byad kyis//rnam paro rol pa'i mngon spyod kyis//dug chen rgya mtsho mo bskams na//'angar ni snying rje rkyen mtshams mam//chos nyid snying rje chen po yi//gang
202b3(rgyud): 'dir dam tshig dam pa'i phyir//dngos po bzhi yi bstan pa mdzod ces bgroso//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las 'dus pa chen pos rnam par bgros pa'i le'u/
202b4(rgyud): ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o////de ltar 'dus pa chen po'i dka' bgros yongasu chad nas las rnam bzhi gang gi gdul ba'i skabs la bab par dgongs pa yis gang de rnam par brtag
202b5(rgyud): pa'i phyir thub dka' gzhon nu rdo rje snying por gnas gyung pa'i 'od zer las sprul pa thub pa'i dbang por byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis sprul pa de la bsgo ba//thub pa'i dbang po dus
202b6(rgyud): 'di lags//ji bzhin bden pa'i byin brlabs kyis//dngos po bzhi yi me dpung bzlog/byang chub snying po bskul bar mdzod ces yongasu bskul nas thub pa'i dbang po des dung khrod kyi bdag
202b7(rgyud): po de'i phru mar snang bar mdzad nas thams cad zhi ba'i smra bar smras pa las//dur khrod kyi bdag po des tha'i khe brdabs nas 'di skad du smras//bu chung khyod kyis bdag thul ba ma yin te/sngon
203a1(rgyud): da gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon drag po zhes bya bar gyur pa na kho na nyid lta bu mang po byung nas dA'i bstan pa la zhugs shig/nga'i bka' nyon cig zer ba las kyang ma
203a2(rgyud): mnyan nang khyod kyi dbang du bdag ga la rjen go zu se mo dor gzod la rang gi dka' thub la bde bar mnos shig ces bsgo nas bdud kyi dngos po bzhis yongasu zhams pas gtsang
203a3(rgyud): ma ris kyi 'phags pa rtog pa la zhugs nas phyir log/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang sangs rgyas pad+ma'i gdung dang sde'i sprul pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs//
203a4(rgyud): dbang phyug lnga yongasu bsgo ba//rgyal ba kun gyi chos sku pad+ma'i gdung //chos rje 'od dpag med pa rdo rje chos//spyan ras gzigs spyil hri lus rngam chen ston//dag gi dbang phyug rta
203a5(rgyud): gdang zhal gyis gnon zhes yongasu bskul pas sbrul pi rdo rje rta gdong chen pos dur khrod kyi bdag pa chen pog na su snang bar mdzad nas ha ha hi he hI hu lu hu lu hu lu khres lhang lhing
203a6(rgyud): tsher tsher rta skad drag po'i dbyangs phyung ba las/srin pa'i phru ma yongasu sra zhum zhing bag 'khums pa tsam du gyur yang dur khrod kyi bdag po kho na ngo bo des rang gi nga rgyal gtum
203a7(rgyud): skad du ru dra ma tra ma ra tra zhes bsgrags nas rnam par brjid phyung ste 'gyings pa las zil gyis ma non te slar kho na ngo bo des slar bsgo ba/mgrin bu sngon yang khyod lto bus bdag
203b1(rgyud): ma non pas khyod kyis bdag rngon pa ma yin te nyid kyi gnas gang yin par brko bar nos shig ces tha'i kha brdab pa byas te//yang bdud kyi dngos po bzhis yongasu zhams pas gtsang
203b2(rgyud): ma ris kyi 'bogs pa rtog pa skyes nas phyir log snyam pa las/de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha' lta bu la gtsang sme mi mnga' bas ma log par slar nyen pa las kho na ngo bo nges thim
203b3(rgyud): par dza mas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dog gi dbang phyug des 'thun 'jug tu kho na dga' ltar thim du hun no//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa des da bu kho na'i gtsug tu phyung zhabs
203b4(rgyud): kho na'i mthil du byung nas rdo rje hU~M zhes rgyas par lus kun tu rgyas te kho na des ma bzod pa'i nga ro 'od kyi sgo mthar bton pa ni a tsama'o//ci mdzad myur bar mdzod ces bton no//de nas de bzhin
203b5(rgyud): gshegs pa nges kho na de'i sgrib pa sbyang po mdzad nas bde ba kho nar kho na'i gtsug tu phyung ste na mkha' la rta'i dbyangs phyung bas srin po'i tshogs pur mer thor shug tu gyur te zil gyis non cing
203b6(rgyud): brag 'khums nas gsol pa//dpa' bo chen pa'i 'bang su mchi//ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsol cig ces zhus pas//de bzhin gshegs pa des gsungs pa/ngas nI khyod ma btul
203b7(rgyud): gyis khyod kyi gnyen po rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang gis dbang bskur ba shin tu gtumajam 'khrug pa ma rungs shing mi bzad pa bdud kyi dud cheni po
204a1(rgyud): 'jigs byed 'bar ba zhig 'byung gis de la skyab su dong cig ces gsungs te/chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du mi dmigs par gshegaso//de nas gsang ba 'dus
204a2(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'dus pa chen po rnam par bgros nas phrin lngas bzhi yi sgo gang gis gdul ba'i skabs la bab pa brtags na//gang zhi rgyas kyis
204a3(rgyud): 'dul ba mi 'dra nas dbang drag gis 'dul bar dga' bgros dam par nges par bcad pa'i mdo yongasu gsung ba ni 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam grol spyod pa'i tshogs
204a4(rgyud): kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa/shin tu 'gog pas zhi ba la//khros pas phan par mi 'gyur te//rnal 'byor ma bachos de nyid las//zhi bar de bzhin gshegs kun
204a5(rgyud): mdzod//rnal 'byor tshul can zhi bas kyang //srid pa'i myu gu 'gag nus ni//rnal 'byor yod med stong pa'i mthus//'gog pa bslang ba smos ci dgos//shin tu rdo skams
204a6(rgyud): rlan pa la//gang du 'gog rnams bslang ba'i phyir//'gog med stong pa'i chos nyid la ste//sna tshogs mi 'gog ji bzhin mdzod ces nges pa dam par bcad do//de nis de bzhin
204a7(rgyud): gshegs pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa//shin tu stong pa rgyun chad la//dngos pos phan par mi 'gyur te//rgyun gyi byang chub
204b1(rgyud): las//maud 'gyur de bzhin gshegs kun mdzod stong nyid tshul can stong pas kyang //ci yang med par gnas 'gyur na//med pa las byung rnal 'byor mthus//mthar zad mu zlog smras
204b2(rgyud): ci dgros//shin tu rgyun chad bzlog pa dang //gungad du med lngas skyes pa'i phyir//rgyun dang bcas pa'i stong nyid la//tshe yon rgyun gyi 'chad par mdzod ces nges pa dam par bcad do//de nas
204b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid mi 'gyur ba'i tshogs kyi sa bka' bcod pa'i mdo gsungs pa/shin tu ther gzug rtag pa la//med pas phan par mi 'gyur te//snying po byang
204b4(rgyud): chub de nyid las//bdag nyid chen por thams cad mdzod//mi 'gyur tshul can rtag pas kyang //dngos po brtan g.yor byed nus na//bdag nyid chen por lhun grub mthus//ther zug
204b5(rgyud): zlog pa smos ci dgos//bdag tu zhen pa zlog pa dang //dngos 'dzin bka' mgo bsgyur ba'i phyir//bdag med rtag pa chos nyid las//byed med rang bzhin nyid du mdzod ces nges pa dam
204b6(rgyud): par bcid do//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i gdung dang sde'i tshogs kyis bko' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa//shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la//zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te//
204b7(rgyud): shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las//khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzod//khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang //'jig rten gsum dag skrag nus na//sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pa
205a1(rgyud): yis//khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos//gdul dka' ma lus gdul ba dang //dam tshig la sdang rnam spyad phyir//'bar ba chen po gar dgu las//
205a2(rgyud): dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgyar mdzod ces nges pa dam par bcing ngo //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje snying po de kho na nyid nges pa zhes bya ba'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i
205a3(rgyud): mdo gsungs pa shin tu log par zhen pa la//bden pas phan par mi 'gyur te//gsang chen sbyor ba'i ldem dgongs las//thams cad 'thun 'jug nyid du mdzod//mdzad
205a4(rgyud): spyod tshul can sprad pas kyang //thams cad bka' zlog byed nus na//thugs rje 'thun 'jug mdzad spyod kyis//lam log drang song smos ci dgos//dngos po dngos po dgrol ba
205a5(rgyud): dang //dug gis dug nad bsal ba'i phyir//thabs mchog dpag gis mi lang ba'i//mjed po gar gyi phyag rgyar mdzod ces nges pa dam par bcad//de nas de bzhin
205a6(rgyud): gla shegs pa nor bu'i gdung dang sde'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa/shin tu 'jungs shong bsgoms pa la//btang bas phan par mi 'gyur te//mAd la
205a7(rgyud): mi zad kun 'byung las//thams cad mi zad nor bur mdzod//dka' thub tshul can 'gags pas kyang //tshe gcig 'tsho bar byed nus na//med la 'dod dgur 'byung ba yis//
205b1(rgyud): khams gsum gdung ba smos ci dgas//'jungs pa tshim par bya ba dang //yongasu gdung ba bsal 'i'i phyir//thog chen gsung ba'i longs spyod lngas//nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgyar mdzad
205b2(rgyud): ces nges pa dam par bcad do//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzhon nu'i gdu dang sde'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i ma do gsungs pa//shin tu le lo g.yeng ba la//bskulo bas
205b3(rgyud): brtson par mi 'gyur te//bya batshul med pa'i chos nyid las//thams cad bya ba med par mdzod//mi g.yo'i tshul can gnas pas kyang //dam pa'i las lam gcod byed ni//bya bral
205b4(rgyud): mi g.yo bde chen pos//'jig rten g.yeng ba smos ci dgos//mi khom lam rgyud bcad pa dang //le lo g.yeng ba'i dgra gzhom phyir//btang snyoms rnal 'byor chen po las//
205b5(rgyud): bya med gnas par phyag rgyar mdzod ces nges pa dam par bcad do//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa glang po'i gdung dang sde'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa//shin tu
205b6(rgyud): gti mug rmangs pa la//bstan pas go bar mi 'gyur te//khyad par cir yang mtshungs pa las thams cad gau ta mug chen por mdzod//gti mug tshul can rmongasA pas kyang //zang
205b7(rgyud): nun par byed nus na//mi 'byed blang dor med pa yis//khams gsum rmongs pa smos ci dgos//mun pa'i skye mched gzhom pa dang //rmongs pa na mkha' byi ba'i phyir//gti mug
206a1(rgyud): rnam dag ye shes las//ma 'dres yongs rdzogs phyag rgyar mdzod ces nges pa dam par bcad do//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo'i gdung dang sde'i
206a2(rgyud): tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa//shin tu chags shing zhon pa la//gnyen pos phan par mi 'gyur te//chags rab chen po'i ye shes las//thams cad
206a3(rgyud): chags pa chen por mdzod//chags pa'i tshul can spyad pas kyang //khams gsum khrag tu byed nus na//'dod chags rnam dag chags spyad pas//khams gsum zhe na
206a4(rgyud): chags smos ci dgos//'dod chags khrag mtsho bsgom pa dang //chags pas chags pa btsod pa'i phyir//'dod chags rnam dag ye shes las//'dod chags gar gyi
206a5(rgyud): phyag rgyar mdzod ces nges pa dam par bcad//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bkas bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa//shin tu dngos por zhen pa la//bkag
206a6(rgyud): pos phan par mi 'gyur te//shes rlab thabs kyi dro bo las//thams cad 'thun 'jug spyod par mdzod//'thun 'jug tshul can 'thun pas kyang //khams gsum log
206a7(rgyud): par byed nus na//thugs rje gar gyi mdzad spyod kyis//'jig rten blo log smos ci dgos//de la sogs pa mtha' yas snyed//'jig rten 'jig rten mtha' yas kun//
206b1(rgyud): 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis//drangs te yang dag gsang bar sbyor//khro la byams dang khro tshul mdzod//zhi la zhi ba slong sbyong nyid //drag shul can lnga drag po nyid//g.yem la
206b2(rgyud): g.yem dang gnyen por mdzod//chags la chags dang rnam spong nyid//g.yed la sems sdud gra yeng ba nyid//rmongs la khyab par mnyam pa nyid//ri la ting 'dzin ri bo nyid//phrag dog can//
206b3(rgyud): la phrug drog tshul//de la sogs pa mtha' yas snyed//kun gzhi mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i//na mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas par//khyad par 'dod pa'i lus can gyi//kun gzhi
206b4(rgyud): kun gyi dbyings na dpa'//rdo rje snying po rab tu gnas//sems can sangs rgyas kun gyi dbyings//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin nyid//ye nas yin par nges pa na//mtha' thug med pa'i
206b5(rgyud): sems can rnams//ji ltar dga' ba 'dod pa bzhin//mA bklag mA btsos ji bzhin por//nges pa nyid du gyur pa yi//thabs mchog dpag gis mi lang ba'i//mdzad spyod gar thabs
206b6(rgyud): sprin phung gis//ji ltar spyad kyang de nyid las//ma g.yos mi gos dbyings na dpa'//nyid du nges pa'i ngo bo las//mtha' yas dpag tu med pa yi//sgo nas thams cad ma bkag par//
206b7(rgyud): ci dga' nyid du bde drangs te//dam pa rnams kyi nges par mdzod//'dir ni nan tan drag shul gyis//mi bzang 'bar ba'i ye shes las//dur khrod bdag po rab 'jigs pa'i//che
207a1(rgyud): mchog 'bar ba'i phyag rgyar mdzod ces nges pa dam par bcu do//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgrongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las bka' babros dam pa
207a2(rgyud): bcad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/nyi shu lnga pa'o////lang ka'i bdag po de'i tshe de'i dus na kho bo 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa zhig gis shes bzhin du gang yongasu
207a3(rgyud): sred pa'i phyir yang 'khor der 'khod par 'gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskul ba'i go cha blo gros thabs ldan zhes bya ba zhig la yongasu dris pa/kye sems dpa' chen po
207a4(rgyud): yi dwags chen po 'di rgyu ni gang las byung /rkyen ni ci las byung /'bras bu ni cir smin/rigs ni gar gtogs/las skal gyi spyod pa ni ci spyod/ma btul na ciganod/btul na ci
207a5(rgyud): zhig dgos//de skad dris pa las/bskul ba'i go cha chen po des smras pa/sems dpa' chen po gsang ba ba'i bdag po yi dogs chen po 'di gang legs pa'i rgyu rkyen las
207a6(rgyud): ni ma byung /nyes pa 'ba' zhig gi rgyu rkyen las byung ste/rgyu ni mun po'i ri byo lngas byung ngo //rkyen ni bka' bgo log pa'i dka' thub drag po las byung ngo //'bras bu ni sdug
207a7(rgyud): bsngal gyi ri bor smin no//rigs ni rmong rigs 'khor ba gdol ba 'byung po yi dwags su gtogaso//las skal gyi spyod pa ni 'khor ba'i dngos po bzhi la 'jol nyag tu
207b1(rgyud): spyod do//'dri ma pa la n+da lus can gyi byang chub snying po rang du nub pa'i rgyun du 'gyur ro//btul na ni kun gyi snying po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mngon du nye bar 'chang bar 'gyur zhes smra
207b2(rgyud): po dang /khro bos de la 'di skad ces smras//a mi'o sems dpa' tshon po 'o na dus 'di ni dus la bab pa'o//lus 'di las kyi mchog/gsang ba 'di ni gsang ba'i yang gis
207b3(rgyud): ba dam pa'o//thul kun tu rab tu thul//dus la bab pa'i bskabs chen 'dir//lis la bab pa'i sems can 'di//stongs lnga bab pa'i thugs rje yis//'du shes bsgyur ba
207b4(rgyud): thugs rje'i mchod//stong gsum ma lus bton pa bas//'bum gyi char yang mi phod do zhes nye bar bsku'o//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ngan bag gnas
207b5(rgyud): gyur pa skyes bu dam pa rdo rje 'dzin du snang ba nyid la yongasu bsgo ba mdzad pa/rgyal ba kun gyi gsang mdzod pa//thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin//drag po btul zhugs chen po
207b6(rgyud): can//dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal//sngon gyi go cha chen po'i mthus//sangs rgyas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//gdul dka' drag po 'dul mdzad pa//bdul
207b7(rgyud): kyi bdud de bdud rnams 'jom//sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i sku//'jig su rung nga'i dpa' byad can//gtum rngam 'khrug pa'i ngo bo yis//dur khrod bdag po rang
208a1(rgyud): chom zhes yongasu bskul byas//skyes bu rdo rje 'dzin pa de//lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di//'byung po'i rgyal po sra dbang du byas//shin tu gtum rngam 'khrug
208a2(rgyud): pa des//lha mi 'jig rten brlag ma khang //bzhin dngo mdangs kyang mi gsal bar//kun tu mog mog bor gyur nas//dus ma yin pa'i mun pa yod //mun neg smig tu gyur
208a3(rgyud): pas 'thibs//cha dang grang dang nad dam rims//ma nges sna tshogs kun tu rgyas//rlung mer 'brug dang ser ba dang //rnag khrag rdo dang mtshon cha'i char//dus ma yin par kun tu
208a4(rgyud): 'byung //skye dman 'tsho ba'ang log par gyur//gdug pa sna tshogs sems can gyis//shin tu nyams thag gdungs 'gyur ba'i//mgon med pa yi 'jig rten te//mkhyen//
208a5(rgyud): te thugs rjes gdung ba ni//rab tu rngam pa'i brtul zhugs kyis//rdo rje chos kyi rta gdong lnga//rdo rje tshig tu 'di skad du//ngag gi dbang phyug rdo rje'i gdong //yang ka'i yul
208a6(rgyud): gyi grong rdal gyi//dbus kyi ri bo maM la ya//rko rka thad mar rgya mtsho'i do//drag shul yod pa'i rtse la dong //rdo rje thabs kyis blta ba'i yul//dur khrod bdag po tshogs dang bcu
208a7(rgyud): mi ngams skyabs lings chen po la//khams gsum rdo rje bya smon thong //cis kyang mi bskyod 'khrugs pa'i//sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos//rdo rje sems dpa'
208b1(rgyud): de bzhin nyid//rdo rje snying po srid gsum mgon//stong pa chen po'i ni mkha' la//'bar 'a chen po gar dgur mdzod//thugs rjes la gshegs nas kyang //'thun 'jug byis
208b2(rgyud): pa'i spyod pa mdzod//med la kun 'byung stong nyid las//ji bzhin pa yi rgyal ba dang //stug po bkod pa'i zhing khams na//rnam dag lam gshegs rgyal po rnams//bdag ni
208b3(rgyud): bka' yi las mkhan te//bka' yA las kyi dus byung bas//sangs rgyas kun gyis gdul bka' bla//de dag ma lus bdag gis btul//ma grol ba yang bdag gis
208b4(rgyud): dgrol//gang ma bsgral ba bdag gis bsgral//dbugs ma byung po dbugs phyung ste//yang dag nyid la dgod par bgyi//dgrongs pa gsang ba kun 'dus la//rmad 'byung/
208b5(rgyud): gsung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis//mtha' thug med pa'i sems can rnams//snying po bskul ba'i byin rlabs mdzod ces rdo rje 'dzin pa des drug tu bskul ba las//chos kyi
208b6(rgyud): dbyings kyi pho brang nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ye shes chen po'i me dus mtha'i bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i thugs rje'i sprin pung na mkha'i mtha' klas par
208b7(rgyud): 'thibs nas//'bar ba chen po'i gar dgur mngon spyod du mdzad nas rdo rje'i rta'i tshogs la bkas bsgo gsong kun tu rab tu song //rta yi rdo rje stabs dgu yis//'jig rten
209a1(rgyud): blo dgu'i 'dod pa ston//'jig rten nag po gtum pa'i tshogs//dur khrod skyabs lings spyod pa la//rdo rje rtog pa'i bya sgron gyis//'khor ba ma bsgral bar
209a2(rgyud): du 'di//dam bcas go che gyon pa yi//snying rje chen po'i rtog 'jug gis//'khor pa'i sa mtha' chos por gyis zhes drag tu bsgo bas//rdo rje chos rab dga' 'khor lo//gzig
209a3(rgyud): dbang rdo rje spyan rab ste//rdo rje pad+mo rab dga' ba//snang mdzad ngag gi dbang phyug tshogs//byang chub chen po cang shes gtso//thabs chen dgu yi rdzu 'phrul gyis//rdo rje rta gdong sprul
209a4(rgyud): pa'i tshogs//na mkha'i khams kun yongs bkang nas//ma la ya yi rtse la lhags//'khor ba ma stongs par du ni//thugs rje dbang gis spyan ras gzigs//sdug po
209a5(rgyud): bkod pa'i rgyal ba yang //dgongs pa gsang ba gcig tu 'dus//khams gsum yo bsgol snying por dgongs//dus gsum gtan sprugs byin rlabs mdzod//'khor ba chos
209a6(rgyud): nyid spyan ras gzigs//sdug bsngal byang chub lam du mdzad//las nyid rang byung ye shes 'grel//rnam smin+da sun phyung rdo rje nyid//yA nas ji bzhin ma bcos pa'i//rang byung
209a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen por dgongs//ges bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa yang //sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje las//sprul pa'i sras mchog rdo rje 'dzin//gzhon nu bye ba sa yar mdzad//
209b1(rgyud): thams cad dbyar gyi sprin phung bzhin//na mkha' dbyings kyi mthas klas par//ma la ya yi rtse la lhags//'thun 'jug thabs kyi cha byad du//gang 'dir byis pa'i spyod pa yis//bdud kyi spyod
209b2(rgyud): yul kun mdzad de//'jig rten kham su byis par bstan//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las los bzhi rdo rje skos kyi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu drug pa'o//
209b3(rgyud): de nas 'thun 'jug skyes bu des//'thun pa'i spyan gyis gang gzigs na//las kyi yi dwags drag po de//dngos po bzhis ni dbang byis pa//rnam par smin pa'i dngos po ni//bam
209b4(rgyud): ri thod pa mkhar gyi rtsor//khrag dang bshang gci shri chen dang //rkang dang klad pa glad rgyas dang //rnag dang chu ser la sogs pa'i//'dam gyis phru ma yongasu bskor//'bu dang shin tu 'bru
209b5(rgyud): chen po//sbrang ma sbrang rgod bung ba dang //sbrul dang sdig pa sdom la sogs//kang ka khA skrag 'ug pa'i tshogs//lce spyang stag seng la sogs pa'i//gdug pa can gyi 'khor gyis
209b6(rgyud): bskor//rtswa yi sde dpon ka ru ni//bu mo chung ma ma sring dang //'jig rten dbang phyug lha chen gyi//ma sring chung ma bu mo rnams//phrogs nas dbang du byas pa yi//slas dang byi mo
209b7(rgyud): bran mo'i tshogs//bcu gnyis dang ni rgyas la sogs//ma mo phra mon gnod sbyin mo//srin mo sha za khrag 'phrog ma//bdud kyi ming 'dzin bla rkun ma//blon mo dmag dpon sde dpon
210a1(rgyud): ma//rud dpon pho nya mngag par bcas//rang rang stan dang lag tshur bcas//ci ba gyi bka' nyan bka' sdod 'khor//spyod gtong rngam pa'i tshul du 'khod//srin
210a2(rgyud): po'i bu mo dri za brgyad//rtag snang wa sbyang bzhad tshogs dang //dur bya bya rag 'ug pa'i tsho gas//bstod cing rngam pa'i tshul du 'khod//srin po'i nye gnas chen mo brgyad//ke'u ra rtsa
210a3(rgyud): ri prA mo ha//pe ta l-I dang puk+ka si//g+hus ma ri dang sma sha ni//tsiN+DA l-I la sogs pa yi//gtum zhing rngam pa'i ma tshogs mu//shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugasu 'khod//dur khrodangs
210a4(rgyud): yi sgo srungs bzhi//brtson mo gdong mo gang log mo//de bzhin 'jug mo chen mo bzhi/gsang sgo 'dzin cing bka' sgo srung //dur khrod bdag mo gru 'degs
210a5(rgyud): ma//bskum pa shin tu bskam ma dang //ra ro dang khrag 'thung ma//chags pas myos pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod//ba ma ri thod pa brtsegs pa'i dbus//gnam lcags 'bar
210a6(rgyud): ba'i gzer chen gyis//brtan par btab pa'i nang bdag mo//nye gnas kro d+hI shwa ri mo//thod sgrogs khrag gis bkang ba dang //'bru mar rdzas lnga chung sbyar ga/rtag pAr rang gi/
210a7(rgyud): longs spyod 'dzin//chags pas myos shing brkam pas na//'dod pa'i dbang mo brkam par grags//ru tra'i phru ma grong rdal de//'a bar po chen po'i gar dgu yis//bcom
210b1(rgyud): ldan dbang du mdzad pa'i phyir//sde dpon btul ba'i 'khor 'dus pa//'jig rten dbang phyug mthu tshon rnams//phal cher las la gram skabs//dpa' chen rdo rje 'dzin pa de'i//de nyid yang /
210b2(rgyud): dag dngos min pa'i//gzhon nu snum nas bton pa'i sras//rdo rje gzhon nu skye ba brtsegs//mthong gnag khro gnyer ral pa can//'byur ba tshan po'i gar dgur mdzad//dur khrod bdag
210b3(rgyud): po ji bzhin du//dbu dang phyag zhibs der mdzad de//bdud rtsi lnga yi sbyor ba yis//bshung ba lnga ni bdud rtsir bsgyur//thams cad stong nyid bdud rtsir sbyangs//nye gnas lngas sogs
210b4(rgyud): 'khor mo rnams//spyod la ma chags ye shes dang //byas la mi sogs phrin las kyis//'thun 'jug khrig pa'i sbyor thabs kyis//dbang bsku so dang sbyangs sprul pa ni//sems
210b5(rgyud): dpa' ye shes sprul po'i tshogs//ke'u tse'u las sogs ma tshogs dang //seng stag la sogs yul du snar//'dod pa'i dbang mo brkang pa deng //chagos pa'i dbang gis gang mthong
210b6(rgyud): pa//spyir ni rang gi khyo bdag lta//lhag pa'i gzi chen 'bar bar mthong //snyam pa'i dbang gi the tshom skyes//e ma'o//bdag gi bdag po bas//shin tu 'od 'bar gzi byin che/
210b7(rgyud): 'di ji lta bar sprul pa zhig/mnyam du yid gnyis rtog pa las//thabs mchog rdo rje gzhon nu deso//srid skad thang gsum phyung ba las//the tshom rtog pa chad par gyur/
211a1(rgyud): /chags pa'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi//sku la nges par 'khril ba ni//tsan dan sbrul gyi gdong po la//chod pas bdas pa'i sbrul 'khrol bsdu//mi rtog
211a2(rgyud): tshad ma'i gdung sel ltar//gang la chags pa mi mnga' ba de//gang gi gdung ba rnam par sel//de ni sa sme ba brtsegs pa des//thams cad ci dga' 'byung ba yi//yid bzhin
211a3(rgyud): nor bu'i snying po de//nye ba'i rig pa 'di brjod pas//bya ba thams cad byed phyi'i mchog/oM b+hur kur/i tsi/ki phyi/u tsu s+sa krota hUM phaT/yang dag dngos min cho 'phrul 'dris/
211a4(rgyud): snang mdzad chen po'i cho 'phrul bsdus//gang du dang por sprul pa yi//oM gyi 'od zer mngon phab nas//dbang mo brkam pa'i lhumasu bzhag/gsang sngags mngon pa'i
211a5(rgyud): mthu can 'dis//srin po'i cha lugs ci 'dra bar//yi ge de yang der bsgyur te//gang de mngon sum lhum su bzhag/rdo rje lcags kyu 'od zer las//rak+Sha shrI he ru ka/ru dra ma
211a6(rgyud): dra ha ha hama?//bskyed rdzogs 'joms byed yi ge yi//mthu yis byin brlabs brtan par byas//dngos min rigs pa'i skyes bu de//rdo rje yab kyi sku la bsdus//drag
211a7(rgyud): shul stobs sngon skyes bu de//sgyu ma rdo rje cho 'phrul gyis//sangs rgyas gdug dka' rnams btsug nas//bdud dang 'jig rten log pa'i cha//byis pa'i spyod pa
211b1(rgyud): da bor nas//thugs ni dang po byang chub la//dgongs pa nges par 'grel te bzhugs//sprul pa rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po//sngar byung rgyal 'tshob skyes bu yis//lha gnas gsum du
211b2(rgyud): grags pa yi//gsung mdzod chen po dam pa'i lung //gsang ba 'dzin pa'i bdag po mdzod//de na sa yi dgas drag pa de//rang gi glan su rngon pa las//rang gi gnas dang long
211b3(rgyud): dang //'khor rnams mi snang mi 'dra ba//sngon ma mthong ba phral cher snang //kho na shin tu ma rengs te//e mra'o bdag gi phru ma 'di//ji ltar 'gyur zhes rnam par rtog/de che nye gnas/
211b4(rgyud): dbang mo yis//rang gi khyo bdag lon zhun te//e ma'o sgeg po dpa' bu khyod//gang 'dir ngan du rtog pa'i tshig/'khor gyi nang 'dir gsung ngam ci//dpa' bo khyod kyi dgongs pa gang //
211b5(rgyud): de hun ha na phan nyo pa ti//kho na 'am tsa sma rA tse//dpa' bo sgeg po zhe 'am nyid//kun lan+ta tsa pu thA thaM//gang du de ci ji ltar 'khrul//de skad tshig tu rton pa las//mdangs la chags pas
211b6(rgyud): 'dun pa dang //kho na'i rigs nyid des 'dzin pa'i//snyam nas dga'i thabs bzung //de nas dbang myi bskam pa las//pu tram+b+ha gu 'thon 'byung ba'i//thabs gsum grag pu'i sgra
211b7(rgyud): phyung bas//dpal gyi rngam skad drag po yis//drag po drag mo la sogs brgyal//de las slar log mthong snang ba//'jigs byeng chen po 'bar ba la//sngo gnag rngam pa'i ral
212a1(rgyud): can//dbu dgu phyug ni btsod rgyud pa//rdo rje gshogs pas drar snang khebs//brdzu lcags kyu ba thogs 'dra ba'i//sdom dang sdi dang sgrogs dang sbrul//
212a2(rgyud): 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis sa gzhi khebs//thod sgyogs sti ri rgyu zhags dang /nyi zla khyud dang 'ug pa khro//rdo rje mdung rtse gsum pa dang //za ma rtog dang rdul ya ba wi/ri rab
212a3(rgyud): spyi skor stong gsum 'phen//klu dbang 'bum gyis brgyan cing klubs//dus mtha'i bskal pa me ltar 'bar//khro gnyer sdang mig 'bar ba yi//nyi shu rtsa bdun spyan ras gzigs
212a4(rgyud): zhabs brgyad 'bar bas lha brgyad gnon//rdo rje srin po khyo bar gyur//lha dang bdud las rnam par grags//de nas yi dgas drag po de//kho na'i sems rtog rtas nas kyang //nga
212a5(rgyud): rgyal drag po'i gtum skad kyis//'khor gyi dbang phyug rnam par bskur ru dra ma dra ma ra dra/'du 'ad dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs//kun tu rab tu dam la 'du//gram gram dbang phyug
212a6(rgyud): chen po'i tshogs//kun tu rab tu las la gram//thung thung dbang phyug chen po'i cho gas//kun tu rab tu 'di la thud//dbang phyug dA yi phru ma lo//gang 'dir gdug pa chen po 'di//
212a7(rgyud): khyad kyis brlag pa'i 'dus la bab//gang 'dir bya mi bye rtag na//khyed ni shin tu rlag ma khad//mdza' bo gang la bya mi bye ba yi//yongasu rtog pa de dag med kyang bla//de 'dra'i/
212b1(rgyud): mdza' po sgyu ma yin pas na//de la mdza' zhesu zhig zer//rgol ba gang la bya mi bya ba yi//yongasu rtog pa de dag med kyang bla//de 'dra'i rgol ba sgyu ma yin pas na//de la dpa' zhes
212b2(rgyud): zhig zer//dam tshig gang srung mi srung ba'i//yongasu rtog pa de dag med kyang bla//de 'dra'i dam tshig sgyu ma yin pas na//de la dam par su zhig 'dogs//thams cad bya mi bya ba yi//
212b3(rgyud): yongasu rtog pa de dag med kyang bla//de 'dra'i spyod pa sgyu ma yin pas na//de la byed ces su zhig zer//gang la gang 'dir gang gi las rnams dus la bab ces dbang phyug chen po rnams
212b4(rgyud): la bskul bas/bdud kyi gzi byin ma bzod de bdud kyi chu 'dzin pa'i lha'i bu bye ba dung phyur gyi dmag tshogs dang dbang phyug chen po rnams shin tu sngangs 'khrugs rngam nas rod rod
212b5(rgyud): por gyur te/mya ngan gyi dug lo 'chubasu pa bzhin bdud kyi phru mar 'dus te bdud kyi ru mtshon phyar/mtshon cha'i sprin btibs bdud kyi sgyu 'phrul gyi dra ba bkram ste bso dang bya'i sgra
212b6(rgyud): bsgrags nas spags pa las/rdo rje rta'i tshogs kyis rdo rje snyam pa na'i stobs kyis rdzu 'phrul myur ba'i mdur shugs drag pos khro bo theg chen kun kyang mthun thag gcod pa'i rta'i
212b7(rgyud): mdung glu 'dis rnam par bskul pa/tri sgeg po dpa' bo 'jig su rung ba dang /dgod dang ga shaM dang 'jigs par byed pa dang /snying rje rnga ma dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i sku yi dngos po shin
213a1(rgyud): tu bsgyur ba yi//gar gyi phyab rgyu 'bar bas dbang phyug gnon// myos byed stong byas lhag par 'dud pa'i gzugs ston la//'dul ba'i dbang gis gshin
213a2(rgyud): rje stong pas lhag par 'jigs gzugs ston//zhi ba'i skur yang tshangs po stong pas lhag par rab tu ston//thams cad dkyil 'khor gsum du snang bar mdzod//ci rnam par 'dus
213a3(rgyud): bi'i de mthon thabs kyis gnon pas gnon//ho ho ha ha he he hi hi dgyes pa'i bzhad mos kheng//dbang phyug thams cad rab shig rab tu shig/rab kyi rtsal gyi stobs kyis ngo mthon
213a4(rgyud): dbang phyug gnon hri rtsal chen hu lu hu lu mig gsum pa las gsum grub drongs//hri rab kyi rtsal gyi stobs kyis ngo mthon mthu chen gnon//ru tra ma tra'i snying las dpal mos
213a5(rgyud): drongs shig rab drongs shig/rab kyis rtsal gyi stobs kyis do mthon tshangs pa non//tshangs las sgrol ma drongs shig sma ra tha//ci rab kyi rtsal gyi stobs gyis do mthon dga'
213a6(rgyud): dbang non//sbyor chen zhun gyis bdag la dag drongs shig/hri rab kyi rtsal gyi stobs kyis ngo mthon ru tra non//sbyor chen kro d+hi shwa ri dbang mo drongs shrig rab sa drongs shig/snying
213a7(rgyud): rje gang la phyi mo bya ba mi//yongasu rtog pa de dag med kyang bla//de 'dra'i snying rje sgyu ma yin pas na//de la su zhig snying rje zer/gdul bya gdul bar bya mi bya ba yi//yongasu rtog pa
213b1(rgyud): de dag med kyang zla//de 'du gdus b+ha sgyu ma yin pas na//de la gdul bar su zhig zo//haha sbrul rab tu sprul//kun tu rab sprul snang bar mdzod//gtum blang rnam 'khrug 'byur bar
213b2(rgyud): mdzod//rnam pa mang po sna tshogs khro bor log par lta ba yi//khro baM smang ba'i 'gro rnams rnam mang po//khro bo rgyud kyi ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas par//rgyal ba kun gyi thangs
213b3(rgyud): cho ga sgyu ma rab sbrul rnam par sprul//khro la ma g.yos ye shes bzhi mchog kun tu bzhengs shig bsnams//rnam pa mang po sna tshogs 'dod par snang ba'i 'gro ba rnams//rnam pa
213b4(rgyud): mang po'i 'dod chags rgyud kyis ma lus lus pa med pa 'dul mkhas pa//rgyal ba kun gyi thabs mchog sgyu mar rab sprul rnam par sprul//spyod la mi chags ye shes bde mchog kun
213b5(rgyud): tu myong mdzad bzhengs shing rol//rnam pa mang po sna tshogs rmongs par snang ba'i 'gro ba rnams//rnam pa mang po gti mu go rgyud kyis ma mes lus par 'dul mkhas pa//rgyal ba kun gyi
213b6(rgyud): thabs mchog sgyu mas rab sprul rnam par sprul//mnyel ma rmongs ye shes ma 'dres yongs rdzogs bzhengs shing dgongs zhes khro bo ma rangs mi bstangs drag po dgyes pa'i sgra
213b7(rgyud): grag stong 'dir ba byung bas bdud kyi cha'i dzin pa'i bdud bye ba dung phyur rnams bag bzhi bskums te zil gyis non//ru mtshon la sogs pa mtshon cha'i sprin phung ni stong pa nyid du sangs
214a1(rgyud): par gyur//mi snyan pa'i ngag rnams ni mngon du gyur te theg pa chen po gsang sngags kyi sgra ni di ri ri sgrogs par gyur to//dur khrod kyi bdag po ru dranag pa
214a2(rgyud): lta zhig ring gi 'khor gyis yongasu po ri tI rje bcan dam pa de la skyabasu dang //blo gros kun gyi yul dang bral//yi khaMs bsam pa chad cing thabs rlag nas kun nas 'khrugs te rnam par
214a3(rgyud): khrugs te rnam par 'khams nas rang gi ru dwa lnga yi sa bon mngon du phyug pas//ru lu ru lu b+h+yo zhes brjod//mgo gsum lag drug rkang bzhi pa//khros pa'i tshul du gyur pa las
214a4(rgyud): rje bcan rdo rje srin po des//kho na nyid du der mdzad de//byin brlabs yi ge mo phyed pa'i//dbang du 'khor ba'i sa bon lnga//byas nas ngag gi sprul pa phrogs//kho na dag gi dbang po
214a5(rgyud): nyams//de nas dur khrod bdag po des ra la ra la b+h+yo brjod pas//mgo dgu bco brgyad lag tu gyur//gang der rje badzin dam pa des//dag gi sprul pa nges par bcad//yang de
214a6(rgyud): dur khrod bdag po des//hu lu hu lu b+h+yo brjod pas//mgo brgyad bcu drug lag tu gyur//dpal chen rje btsun srin po des//kho na ci 'dra der mdzad de//der yang ngag gi brjod pa bcad
214a7(rgyud): gang de durang khrod bdag po des//ha la ho la b+h+yo brjod pas//nyi shu rtsa gcig mgo bo lo//bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis lag tu gyur//yang du rdo rje srin po des//de ci kho nar der mdzad nas//gang
214b1(rgyud): 'dir smra ba'i dbang po bcadra//yang der kho nar de nyid kyis//ra lI ra li b+h+yo brjod pas//lus ni tshad med po la ni//nad kyi bskal pa chub mar gtong //gdug pa'i mtshan cha lus las
214b2(rgyud): 'gyod//rje bcan rdo rje srin po des//kho na de 'drang nyid mdzad de//dag phrogs ngag gi sprul pa tshad//dper na skyes bu gang ba zhig/lce bcud khrag gis bor ba bzhin//shin tu myos
214b3(rgyud): te 'gyel bar gyur//kun gyi mnga' bdag chen po des//sA ma ya hUM gsung bsgrags pas/sngon byung dus na 'brel pa yis//srog gi dbang pos ma bzod de//gang der mdun gyis
214b4(rgyud): phyogs pa dang //rtse gsum kha T+wAM 'brar ba yis//ru tra'i ri bo bco ma dbang gi/phyag rgyas rol te phyal du sbyangs//nye gnas dbang gis mtshams sbyar ba'i//rang gi dam pa las
214b5(rgyud): sogs pa'i//mtha' thug med pa'i sangs rgyas dang //dpag tu med pa'i byang chub sems//stug po bkod pa'i mthong ba'i mthus//thog mo med pa'i dus mtha' nas//zhen
214b6(rgyud): pa'i mun nag sangs gyur te//skye ba dus mtha' med rnyed du//lus blangs las ni ci spyad dran//snyam du bton te zhabs drung 'khod//rab dga' btud nas gnod tshul du//glang
214b7(rgyud): deng shin tu ngus nas smros/oM mo i me'o e ma yang //dpa' bo lha rje thugs rje chu //shin tu bde ba'i /gnas gcig nas//snam du bton pathugs rje chung //dayang
215a1(rgyud): mdzad skan du med//mA du bskul na yun 'ad//'bad su mchi bdag lus 'grus//'bangs la nan tan ma chung cog/dod nas sman chad bka' bzhin du//
215a2(rgyud): yi lung bzhin rjesu skrag//gal te bka' bzhin ma bgyis sam//dam pa'i lung las 'gal gyur na//bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying //rul myigs skams nas tshig par
215a3(rgyud): 'gyur//ma sring bu mi chung ma rnams//'byangasu 'bul lo tshis ma chung //dbus su mchi skal ma ldan gyis//'bar bu'i dkyil 'khor mtha' la zhogo/phud la 'tshal skal mi
215a4(rgyud): ldan gyis//lhag ma zhal chab bron la stsol//nye gnas gdung ba'i ma srid rnams//de nas rgyal ba'i 'bangs yin gyis//khyed ni ci bgyi bka' yi las mkhan te//bka' yi
215a5(rgyud): las byung rtag par myur du skyabs//bdag kyang deng sngon lam log las spyad pas//dpag tu med pa'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal brgyud//da ni thugs rje las 'phro gnyis phrad pas/
215a6(rgyud): bde ba can gyi zhing du myur 'gri yis//rjesu bstan pa'i bka' la nyams snor//ji ltar ma byams bu la gdung ba bzhin//dam tshig can la dung dung gdung bar gyis//gang du sring
215a7(rgyud): byams ming la gdung ba bzhin//yal gam can la lhung lhung brje bar gyis//mdza' mo grogs la ji ltar gdung tshul bzhin//rnal 'byor can la kril kril rtser bar gyis//
215b1(rgyud): ji ltar g.yog byams dpon la snying brtse bzhin//dam pa rnams la nges par nye bar gyis zhes 'khor nye gnas rnams la gdams ngag bor nas dpa' bo chen po la skyabasu dong ste bka'
215b2(rgyud): che ba yongasu bsrung ba'i phyir rang rtags srog gi snying po phul te mna' dor ro//ru lu ru lu b+h+yo zhes rang gi srog la chad bzhago/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yongasu go nang ba ni 'di lta ste/
215b3(rgyud): oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hU~M zhes byin gyis brlabs te bsregs sbyangs btul nas dgongs khrol chung bar bzhugaso//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po la sna bdud
215b4(rgyud): yongasu btul ba'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o////de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs rnams 'di ltar rtog ste/e ma'i drag po chen po 'di//'di ltar
215b5(rgyud): mthu che ba 'di ltar dregs pa/'di ltar gti mug pa/'di ltar chags pa/'di ltar nga rgyal ba/'di ltar gtum pa 'di dpa' bo chen po 'dis rnam par non//nges par yang dag par
215b6(rgyud): non/kun tu rab non to snyam du rtog/de'i tshe de'i dus na de dag gi sems kyi rtog pas rtog pa drag po ru dra de'i sems kyis yongasu shes nas smras pa/kye nye gnas dam pa rnams gang
215b7(rgyud): de ltar ma rtog shig/sngon kho bo'i las kyi 'phro dang 'brel pa nye gnas dam pa kun gyis bshes gnyen de dang phrad pas las shes so//skye ba sheso//las mthong ngo //skye ba mthong ///
216a1(rgyud): las mngon du gyur to//skye ba mngon du gyur nas rang gi las la rang thag khos par gyur//ga skad cig mAr bde ba chen po'i g.yung drung gi pho brang mthong bas gang
216a2(rgyud): 'di ltar bud med dag snum pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen par gyur pa na 'di snyam du sdug bsngal 'di ni sngon du skyes pa bsten cing mang du spyad pa'i las 'bar zhig kho na'o snyam du
216a3(rgyud): yid la byed pa bzhin kho bo ying las 'ba' zhig la kha thag chad nas ji ltar ri gzar rtse nas sba ba 'dril ba gang gis ma zlogs po bzhin gdung ba chen po'i shugs kyis
216a4(rgyud): mthon pas shin tu gdung ba yin te/nye gnas khyed kyang rang gi las yid la gyis shig dang /gdung ba'i shugs rab ltar 'dril bar 'gyuraro zhes smras nas rmag chad par ngus
216a5(rgyud): nus shin tu skyes te yongasu gdung ba'i don bton pa 'di lta ste/thugs rje chen po bcom ldan rdo rje sems//dri med dung mdog mchog tu gzugs bzang ba//rnam dag 'od gsal
216a6(rgyud): nyi zla 'bum bdag zhing //dpa' bo 'od zer stong 'bar l-I mAM me baM//'jig rten gsum gyis mkhan ston par gr-igs//khams gsum 'gro ba kun gyi gnyen gcig po//
216a7(rgyud): byams mgon thugs rje'i lha khyod dgongasu gsol//bdag ni thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas/lam log lam stor srid pa'i 'khor lor 'khyams//sngon che las log
216b1(rgyud): srid pa smad pas nongs//sdig pa'i las rnams ci spyad rab gnod 'gyod//dad cing dregs pa'i las dbang de rtsan nas//'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtshor bying gyur te//zhe sdang 'bar ba'i
216b2(rgyud): mes ni rang rgyud bsregs//gti mug mun pa 'thibs pos shes rab ldongs//'dod chags rgya mtsho'i 'dam du rnam shes bying //nga rgyal drag po'i ri bos ngan 'gror mnan//phra dog
216b3(rgyud): rlung mar mchub mas 'khor bar g.yengs//bdag tu lta ba'i mdud pa dam pos bcings//'dod pa me 'dag dong 'dra'i 'ob su ltung //sdug bsngal drag po mi zad char du 'bab//'di 'dra'i/
216b4(rgyud): sdug bsngal shin tu bzod dka' zhing //sdig pa'i las dbang drag po me 'bar bas//rnam shes dbang po myu gu gdungs 'gyur te//phung po rgyu ma'i lus kyis mi bzod na//byams
216b5(rgyud): mgon thugs rje can gyis bzod lags sam//bdag ni blun rmongs las ngan sdig po che//las kyi dbang gis 'dod khams ru trang skyes//skyes par 'gyod do las la yi re chad//
216b6(rgyud): yi chang 'gyod kyang las dbang bcosu med//las kyi shugs ni chu bo'i gzhung dang 'dra//las dbang chu klung 'phral du ga la zlog/rna mo smin thams cad rang gi lus las byung //las
216b7(rgyud): kyi rlung mar drag po des bdas pas//bdag ni deng sngon skal pa grangs med du//'khor ba'i brtson ra mun par 'khyams pa la//nye gnas khyed kyi thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis/
217a1(rgyud): las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa gtan sbyangs nas//mu ltar byams pa'i zhabs drung dra ltar 'khod//nyi ltar 'odra 'bar zla ltar mdangs gsal ba'i//thugs rje'i zhal//
217a2(rgyud): nyid blta bas mi ngoms pa'i//thog ma med nas ma ri go ling thog gi/ldongs pa'i chu bur mig gis ma mthong na//'gro ba'i mgon khyod deng snga gang na bzhugs//las dbang drag
217a3(rgyud): po shin tu mi zad pas//shin tu skrag cing skyi g.yang rab 'jigs nas//dung dung gdungs pa'i smre sngags 'di 'don cing //nyam thag phongs pa'i nga ro gdon lags na//byams
217a4(rgyud): mgon thugs rjes dus 'dir mi dgongs no//nam zhig 'chi 'pho lus dang bral ba'i tshe//dge ba shes grogs dang bral nas gshin rjes khrid//de tshe 'jig rten nye dus mi
217a5(rgyud): stongs te//las kyi dbang gis bdag 'dra gcig bu khrid//dus der bdag la mchog skyabs ma mchis kyis//gang gi phyi shol dus la ma bzhes par//da lta nyid du bstun
217a6(rgyud): de mngon spyod mdzod//lus kyis mnar ba'i skye bo bdage 'dra la//thog ma med pa'i dus nas log brtags pas//khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas las ma thar te/
217a7(rgyud): bskal po grangs med skye ba de snyed du//gangs bcas lus blangs grangs med zhig 'gyur te//sha rus bsags na 'jig rten gtos dang mnyam//rnag khrag bsags na
217b1(rgyud): /rgyu mcha chen po tsam//las 'bri bsags na bsam 'das brjod ma ldang //khams gsum bgrangs shing skye shing khru brgyud rtsApa/byas pa'i las nus don med chud thos skye ba grang mod ji spyod tsa la/
217b2(rgyud): bgacig gcig kho na tsam gyi las//bla med byang chub don du rab skyed na//de tsam byas pa'i lus la don yod pas//don gyi yo da ye mya ngan 'das zin no//las kyi dbang bcan nyon mongs
217b3(rgyud): stobs che bas//sha khrag dra ba'i lus blangs 'khor bar 'khyoms//sdug bsngal bzod bka' srin pa'i btson rar chud//mi zod sdug bsngal drag po 'di lta bu//nye byas thaMd rang
217b4(rgyud): gi las las byung //thugs rje chen pos las ngan rgyud bcad de//nyon mongs las kyi rlung 'di bzlog tu gsol//ma rig log pa las kyi dbang btsan+da pas//mi sho sa mun pa'i
217b5(rgyud): nang du gtan 'khyams na//ye shes sgron ma'i zer gyis mi stong sra sam//nyes byas las kyi 'bras bu mi bzod na//thugs rje chen po'i phrin las mi mjed dam//phyin ci ldog
217b6(rgyud): gri g.yeng ser lcong lags na//thugs rje myur mgyogs phyag gis mi 'dzin namo//dug gsum bzod dka'i nad kyis gdungs legs na//thabs mkhas thugs rje'i sman gyis
217b7(rgyud): mi gso'am//las kyi rnam smin sdug bsngal me 'bar na//thugs rje bsil ba'i char rgyun mi 'bebs sam//sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying 'gyur na//thebs mkhas
218a1(rgyud): thugs rje'i lcags kyus mi 'dren nam//khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas su sbyang sbyang nus//nam zhig rang gi 'bras bu thob pa'i tshe//'phags pa'i
218a2(rgyud): thugs rjes 'tshal drin ma mchis//bdag nyid las 'phro brgyan pas bdag na lta//thugs rje zhes na su la ci zhig bgyi//dpa' bo khyod la thugs rje stobs mnga' zhing //sngon
218a3(rgyud): byung 'brel paM las kyi 'phro brtsan na//yal yol btang snyoms le lo ma mdzad par//snying nas da gzigs thugs rje rgyal ba'i lha//zhes rang gi nga rgyal gyi ri bo bcug nas
218a4(rgyud): luswA seng ger mngon par sprul nas zhabs kyi gdan khrir phu lo//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dul ba'i mdo chen po las tha ma dmun pa'i gdung ba bton pa'i le'u
218a5(rgyud): ste nyi shu brgyud pa'o////de nas rdo rje srin po des las kyi srin po de log par lta ba sun phyung bas lngas kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcad pa'i phyir spyo ba'i brgyad chen pos rnam par
218a6(rgyud): smyos pa ni 'di lta ste/sdig can log pa'i stobs ldan 'di//thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas//srid pa'i 'khor lo 'i khyams par nges//nyes byas rtsa ba rang nyid las/
218a7(rgyud): thams cad 'byung bar nyes par nges//bskal pa grangs med de snyed du//skye ba mang po lus blangs nas//gzugs phung grangs med zhig 'gyur zhing //sha rus stong gsum
218b1(rgyud): 'jig rten tsam//rnag khrag rgya mtshor 'khyil 'gyur yang //don med par ni chud zos pa//sus kyang ma byas rang gi las//de tsam cha gcig don spyad na//de tsam dron gyi sangs rgyas
218b2(rgyud): zin//lus rnams yongasu gtong ba yi//ma chags stobs ldan chen po rnams//bkres pas nyen po'i 'gro ba la//sha rus khrag tsam btang pos kyang //zag med rnam thar po de rdza
218b3(rgyud): na//zab mo'i don lta smos ci dgos//rang lus gtod par ma phod cing //chags pa'i mtha' la mngon zhen pas//khams gsum 'khor ba'i kha brgyud cing //zug rngu'i nad kyis
218b4(rgyud): gzir ba yin//srid pa'i brtson rang chud pa 'di//mkha' la mdud pas nyes par nges//mun pa'i glong du 'khyams pa 'di//khyad par rmongs pas nye snga par nges//thar mid 'dam
218b5(rgyud): du bying ba 'di//'dod skyed 'dun pas nyes par nges//blo ngan chubs gdungs pa 'di//tsha ba'i lus kyis nyes par nges//sdug bsngal ri bos non pa 'dri//nga rgyal brtsegs pas
218b6(rgyud): nyes par nges//'khor po'i rlung sgor lhung ba 'di//las kyi rlung gis nyes par nges//rang gis mnar ba'i ru tA khyod//ye nas rgyal ba'i sras yin no//srid pa'i 'khor
218b7(rgyud): lor ci ste 'khor//des na rang gi las yin te//sems nyid na mkha' lta bu la//gzugs snang rmo bur sprin gyis bsgribs//gzugs snang rtog pa rnam sbyang phyir//
219a1(rgyud): /shes rab bskal pa'i rlung gis patibadung po bka' mgu lag pasanyas//de nas mngon pa'i ri blo ba rgyags//de nas ying bzhin nor bu bsrabs//tha mar
219a2(rgyud): dngos po bzhi spyad pas//rnal 'byor theg pa chen po'i don//ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs//phyogs rtog yang dag nyid ma rtogs//ji bzhin mA spyad 'phra men gyis//ngan
219a3(rgyud): 'gro'i las lo ma rgyun btags pos//srid pa log pa'i 'bras bur smina?//e ma'o las ngan snying re rje//nga ni bka' yI las mkhan+da tA//bka'i yau las kyi ngas byung bas//
219a4(rgyud): dran 'gro gnasu 'khyams pa 'di//'khor ba'i gnas nas 'don pa'i phyir//las ngan las rgyun gcad par bya//dngos por smin pa'i sdig pa 'di//rdo rje na mkhi'i mtshon
219a5(rgyud): gyis bskyed//shar phyogs lam sgo'i 'jig rten na//yang dag thab lamo gcod byed pa//'byung po gtum po gdol pa can//khyod ni de bzhin nyid la sgribe//yang dag nges
219a6(rgyud): pa'i blo gros kyis//khungs bcad rtsed bcad bdag las byung //bdag 'dzin bdag gi rtog pa yi//phyin ci log stobs brtson 'grus kyis//gnas ngan len pa'i dre dpon
219a7(rgyud): byed//de nyid bdag rtog yin pas na//bdag med na mkha'i stobs kyis gzhom//dbang sgyur gnon pa'i thabs chen dang //gcod pa mngon pa'i mthu can dang //gzir bar
219b1(rgyud): b+h+yon+yo b+h+yos brlabs can gyis//dus gsum bgegs kyi bdag po non//a na ya/mahA shU n+ya taDA.A kau tA yA nAM/s+yArba b+hA bi ma tang kha ru tA nAn/sArba prA pA kha TA ku ru drA na/tham
219b2(rgyud): sto nyid ma skyes pas//bsad pas bsad pa med pa'i phyir//sgyu ma sbyong ba'i chu 'phrul 'di//snying rje chen po'i dam tshi go//nges par bsad pa'i dam tshig 'di//don ston bsad pa
219b3(rgyud): ma yin te//rnom shes gzugs bral rdo rjer bya//de nyid slar phab dri ma tshig mchog/rnam shes hUM gis bsdus nas ni/kho na de nyid gzugs la dab ba//sngon du gnas pa'i tshul
219b4(rgyud): bzhin du//ma nyams bde ba chen por sbyangs//ro langs rdo rje dam tshig 'di//rgyal ba kun gyi thugs dam ste//rdo rje mtshon gyis gang bsad pa//srog ni log rtog rdo rjer shi/rnams
219b5(rgyud): kyang ldang ba'i dus med pas//slar skye bo dag ga la yod//rnam shes gzugs dang mya bral na//'khor ba'i gnas las rnam thar 'phags//'chi med rdo rje byang chub sems//stong
219b6(rgyud): nyid ye shes bdud rtsi'i chu//dug chen 'thungs pa kun gyi gsos//shi ba kun slong sman pa'i mchog/lang ka'i bdag po de skad ces bka' stsal pas//ru tra nag po rgyud yongs
219b7(rgyud): byang ste lhag pa'i don nges par mthong ngo //sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rgyud yongasu sbyangs pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o////de nas de nyid du
220a1(rgyud): nges par phyogs pa'i phyir zhabs kyi 'khor lo spyi bos btegs pa'i mdun pas 'dun nas/'di skad du thams cad du brgyud pa rnam par grags pa sangs
220a2(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa skul ba zhes bya ba'i glu 'dis rnam par bskulo//oM chos kun rang bzhin dag pas na//bdag kyang rang bzhin rnam par dag/de bzhin gshegs pa
220a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi//thugs drim dbyig mchog bdag nyid ni//sems can 'byam klas ma lus kun//mchog nyid sgrub par sbyor bas na//rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun 'dus pas//
220a4(rgyud): sku yi dbyug tu bdag skyed cig/ye shes rin chen dbu rgyan mchog/gzi brjid phung po bla na med//sangs rgyas rin chen kun 'dus pa'i//rnam par rgyal la phyag 'tshalo//
220a5(rgyud): dbyig gau ye shes gtso mchog nyid//rdo rje dam pa mchog 'dzin pa//khyod ni dam tshig gtso lags kyis//dbang phyug rgyal por bdag skur cig/bdag ni rdo rje mngon du
220a6(rgyud): dbong skur bas//sangs rgyas kun gyis deng nyid bdag dbang bskur//bcom ldan thams cad mchog ni bdag lags te/mchog nyid sgrub phyir rdo rje blang bar bgyi//rdo rje rgyal
220a7(rgyud): thor khyod bzhugs pas//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste//rdo rje dam tshig mchog nyid kyis//grub pa phun gsum dbang bskur cig/chos kun rdo rje'i mtshan nyid de//rdo rje la
220b1(rgyud): nga mtshan nyid med//rdorje lta bu'i rnal 'byor pas//don kun du nyid du gus la//'di ni sang sa rgyas gsung dbyangs nyid//ye shes sems dpa'i dam chog bsnams//
220b2(rgyud): sems dpa'i dka' thub da ma//rtag tu bdog gis bcang bar gyi//hUM rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig dam pa srung //ye shrIs sems dpa' nye ba nyid du spyan/rig pa'i rgyal
220b3(rgyud): bdag la bstan par dgongs//gsang ba'i dbang phyug bdag nyid gas bai gsal//rtogs pa mchog sbyin bdag la dgyes pa skyed//'dod pa kun zhon bdag la chags par
220b4(rgyud): mdzod//dang po/sangs rgyas mnyam nyid thugs rje can//las rnams kun la dpag sems dge bar sbyar//dus gsum bde gshegs bdag gnas thams cad du//rdo rje
220b5(rgyud): can dang dam tshig sems dpor bsgrubs//de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa dgyes pa ces//rdo rjes bdado ga yod bstan du ma gtang zhig/kye rdo rje chos dbyings kun gyi rga
220b6(rgyud): mi gnas chags pa chen po ste//mi lus kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog/bde ba mchog gi dam pa lags//khyod ni dam tshig kun gyi gtso//rdo rje sems dpa' skyed mdzad ma
220b7(rgyud): sems can don bsgrubs phrin las la//thugs rje mnyam sbyor grub par mdzod//sangs rgyas skyon kun 'byung phyir//rin chen rdo rje bla na med//rdo rje chos kyi blo blangs pas/
221a1(rgyud): las kyi rdo rje byed gyur cig/sa ma ya ho zhes dam tshig nye bar blangaso//sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes ram kun tu bcaso//de nas yang dgra dngos min pa'o//rdo rje skye ba
221a2(rgyud): brtsegs pa'i sras//bdud 'dul rdo rje srin po des//rdo rje shugs kyi dam pa byin//hU~M hUM hUM bi shwa badz+ri kro d+ha dz+wa la mar+g+haM phaT phaT+Ta ha la ha la ri zhes gdul skyong drag pA'i dkyil
221a3(rgyud): 'khar du sbyangaso//ta kau ti kiM phaT/he le ha lA raM/trIN+The tAMSh+Ta khaM/kro d+ha kro d+ha yau zhes dang sa po thams cad stong par sbyangaso//oM zhes rang bzhin lhun gyi so grub pa'i dkyil
221a4(rgyud): 'khor du bcug/muM zhes ye ji bzhin dA'i dkyil 'khor du bzhugaso//hU~M zhes rtsa ba byang chub skyems kyi dkyil 'khor du gnaso//i dan te/ne ra gan te/bA ri hri da ye/
221a5(rgyud): nA ma paM stA ni/sa ma ya rak+Sha si/si tI pi na badz+ra/a mr-i to ta kiM zhes dam tshig rngam pa byino//oM AHhUM zhes sku gsung thugs kyi byin brlabs dam pa byi no//au badz+ra
221a6(rgyud): i mri tA/aM h+ye hi sarba ma na hUM hri tha zhes dbang dam pa byino//de nas yang las kyi srin po des rang gi ris kye lha la gsol pa btab pa/sngon tsha gong nas 'brelA pa yi//
221a7(rgyud): bdag gi nye gnas gang lags pa//las 'phro dang ni thugs rje yis//da lta nyid du 'bab par shog ces bskul bas//dpal rdo rje sems dpa' na mkha'i dbyings nas
221b1(rgyud): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor hrI gi snying po 'od zer dang bcas pas khro na nyid kyi snying khar thim pas rang gi ris dam pa nyid du nges par gyur to//ho zhes mthong ba yongasu dgra ste thams cad
221b2(rgyud): ma 'bres pa dang yongasu rdzogs par mthong //rdo rje zhes ming btags nas rdo rje theg pa'i gsang sgor bzhigo/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las
221b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa bskul ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o////de nas las kyi srin po de'i nyi gra nas 'dus pa'i tshogs phal po che rnams rang rang gi las
221b4(rgyud): dag pa dang /sangs rgyas mang po mthong ba dang /byin rlabs kyi 'od zer gyi rgyud spangs pas las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyud dang /skye ba snga phyi mtha' yas pa
221b5(rgyud): dus gcig tu gshegs par 'gyur te/the tshom chod pa'i sgo nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lce chen po rnams kyis shin tu ngus nas smos te/gar gyi dbang phyug
221b6(rgyud): gsan cing dgongasu gsol//bdag tsag ru tra'i mtha' la zhen pa rnams/lus dang las kyi 'khor ba'i dra ba 'di//bka' yi gtan tshigs zhi ba mos mA bkol zhing /
221b7(rgyud): shes rab zab mo dmigs bus me phye bas//rang rig ye shes blo dang mi ldan zhing //nges par legs pa'i gros kyis mchod de//gang thabs glog gis zhags pas
222a1(rgyud): mazin pas//rnam shes las kyi rgya mtsho'i dbas bsgribs te//de nyid de bzhin nyid du ngo mA 'tshal//gti mug rang sems bdag tu bzung bas nongs/
222a2(rgyud): shin tu 'gyod pas gnod pa'i tshul bzung bas//dpa' bo chen po khyod la skyabasu mchi//dngos po skyeng phyir bdag lus gdan du dbul thabs mabyas thugs rjes
222a3(rgyud): lus 'di bzhi su gsol zhes rang gi lus zhabs kyi gdan khrir phung //de nas 'grin nag po la sogaso pa klu chen po rnams kyis ngus nas smras te gsolnga pa//gzi brjid
222a4(rgyud): rgyal po mnga' bdag dgongasu gsol//srid pa'i dra bar 'khyams pa bdag cag rnams//bcing ba lnga yis kun tu bcings gyur pa//sus kyang ma bcings bcing bar
222a5(rgyud): byed med de//bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog las kyis bcing sau//sna tshogs lus dang 'du shes gnas la sogs//bdag 'dzin grong khyer gsum gyi btson ra 'dir//
222a6(rgyud): 'khor ba'i brtson chos rnams shes bcings pa la//bdag tu 'dzin pa'i mdud pa ma bkrol bas//kun tu bcings pa'i mdud pa rgyun mi 'chad//mi shigs dgrol
222a7(rgyud): bar dka' yi sdug bsngal las//thugs rje'i mdung dgrol thabs kyis dgrol du gsol zhes lus sku'i rgyan du phul//de nas srin pa'i rgyal po sha trang
222b1(rgyud): gsang bu la sogs pa rnams kyis shin tu ngus nas smras te gsol pa/dpa' bo sgeg po chen po dgrongasu gsol//mya ngan gling du 'khyams pa'i bdag cag rnams//me chen 'bar
222b2(rgyud): ngas gdungs shing sreg 'gyur ba//sus kyang ma bsregs sreg bar byed med de//mi zad rnam smin drag po nyid los byung //zho sdang 'bar bas rang rgyud bsregs pa la//
222b3(rgyud): bdag 'dzin khong nas 'bar ba ma bsad pas//kun tu sreg cing gdung pa rgyun mi 'chad//mi zlo ba/zhi bar dka' ba'i sdug bsngal las//thugs rje bsil ba'i char rgyun
222b4(rgyud): dbab du gsol//ji ltar khab len rdo la lcags 'du ltar//de nas bzung ste dpa' bo'i 'bangasuM mchi zhes so so'i thod pa khrag gis bkad pa bstabaso//de nas log sred
222b5(rgyud): can gyi tshogs kyis shin tu ngus nas smras te gsol pa/kun snang mun sel sgron ma dgongasu gsol//mun nag smag tu 'khyams pa bdag cag rnams//lam nor lam stor
222b6(rgyud): kun tu 'joms 'gyur te//sus kyang ma kag 'gog par byed med du//bdag tu rmongs pa'i ma rig mun pas bsgribs//rnam shes gti muge mun pas 'thibs pa la/
222b7(rgyud): bdag tu rmongs pas mun pa ma gsal pas//kun nas bsgribs pa'i mun nag rgyun mi 'chad//smug chen sangs par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal lo//mkhyen rabs
223a1(rgyud): gsal ba'i sgron ma bstan du gsol zhes skyabs dam par dong ngo //de nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i tshogs kyis shin tu ngus nas smras te//gsal pa/thabs
223a2(rgyud): mkhas thugs rje sman pa dgongasu gsol//grong khyed gsum du 'khyams pa bdag cag rnams//'khor ba'i gcod snying nad kyis zin gyur pa//sus kyang ma bzung 'dzin
223a3(rgyud): par byed med de//bdag 'dzin nyon mongs ma rig nod kyis bzung //zug rngu bzod dkas rnam shes gzir ba la//dngos por 'dzin pa'i gcong rnyeng ma sbyangs pas//kun
223a4(rgyud): nas gdung ba'i zug rngu rgyun mi 'chad//thar med 'tsho bar dka' ba'i sdug bsngal las//thabs mkhas thugs rje'i sman gyis sbyang du gsol zhes lus 'bangasu phulo//
223a5(rgyud): de nas gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis shin tu ngus nas skyes te gsol pa//thabs mkhas thugs rje gru gzings dgongasu gsol//'khor pa'i rgya mtshor 'khyams pa bdag
223a6(rgyud): cag rnams//sdug bsngal rba klong 'jiha su byed gyur po//sus kyang ma mnan gnon par byed med do//rnam rtog dngos por 'dzin pa'i ri bos mnan//las kyi chu bos
223a7(rgyud): 'khor bar g.yengs pa la//dngos por 'dzin pa'i bka' mgo ma bsgyur bas//las dbang drag po chu ba rgyun ma 'chad//mi thar 'bog par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal las/
223b1(rgyud): thabs mkhas thugs rje'o gru yos bsgral du gsol zhes skyabs dam par dang //de nas 'byung po'i tshogs kyis shin tu ngus nas skyes te gsol pa/rang 'byung ba du bya
223b2(rgyud): rgyal po dgongasu gsol//dug chen gling du 'khyams pa bdag cig rnams//kun nas myos pa myos shing nyams gyur pa//sus kyang ma sbyar sbyor bar byed med de//phyin ci log tu
223b3(rgyud): lta ba'i dug gis myos//dug chen nad kyis rnam shes gzir ba la//khong nas 'khyilo pa'i dug rtsam bcad pas//dug nad 'bar ba'o sdug bsngal rgyun mi 'tshong //mi zad
223b4(rgyud): bzod par dka' bo'i sdug bsngal la//rang 'byung drag pa'i bdud rtsis byug tu gsol zhes skyabs dam par dong ngo //de nas yang rdo rje srin po des bka'i stsal pa/yi no legs
223b5(rgyud): rigs kyi bu//ru dra dag gis khyod re 'khor//ru dra dag gis khyod re 'tshig/bdag tu 'dzin pas khyod re 'khor//bdag tu 'dzin pas khyod re 'tshog/zhe sdang dag gis khyod re
223b6(rgyud): 'khor//zhe sdang dag gis khyod re 'tshog/gauti mug ngag gos khyod re 'khor//gti mug dag gis khyod re 'chog/'dod chags ngag gis khyod re 'khor//'dod chags dag
223b7(rgyud): gis khyod re 'chog/chu ba bo zhe yis khyod re 'khor//chu bo bzhi yis khyod re 'chog/log par lto bas khyod de 'khor//log par lta bas khyod re 'tshog/ji ltar khyod ni thaMng //
224a1(rgyud): du//ye nas rgyal pa'i sras yin na//grong khyer gsum du ci ste 'khor//rang rang rnam rtog lngas kho na'o//las kyi rgya mtsho dba' zla bas mchog 'don tu
224a2(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i mdud pa dang //khong nas 'bar ba'i me chen dang //kun nas 'thibs pa'i tshun nag dang /dngos po rtog pa'i gcod snying dang //rnam par g.yong pa'i chu bo dang //khA zhes 'khyil
224a3(rgyud): pa'i dug rtsa rnams//rang byung rdo rjes ma byas na//gzhan la rig sol gdung skyes pa//chu 'dod smig rgyu snyeg pa 'di//gang 'dir nyid bdar ma sbyar na//gzhan gyis bde bar ga la
224a4(rgyud): 'gyur//ye nas bde bar gnas bzhin du//da gdod gang du bde tshol ba//bi tsa la bas rnyed par yong mi 'gyur//sdug bsngal nyid la mngon por rgyu//'o ma dag las mar byung ba/
224a5(rgyud): de nyid ye nas mar med pa//thabs na chog dpag med rgyal bas kyang //bsrubs pa ma gtogs da mi rnyed//de bzhin rang gi de nyid las//btsal kyang rgyal bas mi bsnyes na//khyed
224a6(rgyud): ci gzhan las bde 'dod dam//mi shes blo chung snying rdzogs bka' stsal pa dang //lung ka'i bdag po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'dus pa phal po che'i tshogs kyis gosal
224a7(rgyud): pa/kye skyes bu chen po bdag cag rnams reng rang gi de kho na nyid blta bar 'tshal na de ji ltar yongasu blta bar bgyi zhes gsol pa las/skyes bu chen po des bka' stsal ba/
224b1(rgyud): 'dus pa'i tshogs rgyal ba'i sras rnams rang rang gi de khon nyid mthong bar 'dod na dkyil 'khor chen po gsum gyi smr-i 'ba'u zhig tu 'jug par bya'o//de yang rtsa ba byang chub sems
224b2(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor 'ba' zhig gi sgor 'jug par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dkyil 'khor chen po gsum dang rang rang gi de kho na nyid so so ma yin tha mi dad do//de yang rtsa ba byang chub sems
224b3(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa'i phyir//de skad ces bka' stsal po las/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis gsol ba/dpa'o chen po bdag cag dkyil 'khor gsum du gzhug tu gsol
224b4(rgyud): skyes bu chen po yang dag par gzhug tu gsol/de skad ces gsol pa las/skyes bu chen po dris bka' stsal pa/rnal 'byor 'jug par byis pa khyed//'jig rten drug las drangs nas
224b5(rgyud): kyang //'das dang ma 'das sa mtshams kyi//'gyur dbang ma nges sa la bzhag ces gsungaso//de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis 'di skad gsol to//dpa' bo chen po dgongasasu gsol
224b6(rgyud): bdag cag skal ldan 'dus pa'i tshogs//sgo 'dir 'jug par 'tshal lags na//rgyal ba'i srasu gzung du gsol zhes gsol pa lus/skyes bu chen pos bka' stsal pa/skal ldan
224b7(rgyud): 'dus pa'i tshogs che ni khyed//bde bar 'das so legs par 'ongs//grub pa ring gi/gsang sgo 'di //su dag 'ongs pa slar mi ldog ces gsung so//de nas 'dus pa'i cho gas
225a1(rgyud): de dag byang chub tu 'gyur ba'i lhag pa'i sems 'di ltar skyoso//bdag cog mtha' yas sems can rnams//don gyi sangs rgyas yon mod kyang //rtog
225a2(rgyud): bA'i dbang gis 'khor ba la//byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do//sems nyid sangs rgyas yin pa las//mun pas bsgribs pas de ma shes//byang chub sems
225a3(rgyud): kyi lam 'di nas//sangs rgyas sa la 'jug par bgyi zhes gsol to//de nas yang 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis gsol pa/bde chen lhun grub gzhol yis 'drir//
225a4(rgyud): rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi nas//tshad med thugs rje'i sgo phye nas//byams pa'i zhal bzangs bstan du gsol zhes gsol to//de nas skyes bu chen po des 'di skad ces
225a5(rgyud): bka' stsal to//e ma'o skal ldan 'dus pa'i tsho gas//'khor ba'i lam sgo kun bcad de//byang chub lam la gzud pa'i phyir//rdo rje gesang sgo dbye bar bya zhes gsungs
225a6(rgyud): te zhal 'dzum pa'i mdangs las 'od zer phyung bas don la nges par 'jug pa'i sgo bye bar gyur to//de nas 'dus pa'i tshogos rnams mgu zhing rongos po'i sgo nas rnal
225a7(rgyud): 'byor du rnam par 'dun nas 'di skad ces gsol to//pho brang rmad 'byung gzhal yas nas//rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun bzhugs la//rnal 'byor nges par lhag par
225b1(rgyud): mas//rdo rje gdong la skyab su mtsho zhes gsol to//de nas yang 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsomya to//thog mau med pa'i dus mtha' nas//ma rIg log rtog dbang gis
225b2(rgyud): na//sdig pa byigyis po ci mchis pa//de dag thams cad so sor bshags shes gsol to//yang 'dus pa'i tshogs de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//rig 'dzin rdo rje rgyal ba
225b3(rgyud): yis//'khor ba ji ltar bsgral ba ltar//bdag cag rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir//rdo rje nyi ma sul du gsol zhes gsol to//de skyes bu chen pos bka' stsal pa/khyed ni dga' ba ci la dga'//
225b4(rgyud): khyed ni dad pa ci la dang //khyod ni mos pa ji la mos//khyer ni 'dod pa ji lta ba/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/bdag cag skal ldan bde chen po/
225b5(rgyud): rab dgyes sems la bdog cag dga'//mchog nyid den la bdag cag dang //e ma'o bde mchog dga'i tshal 'dir//sangs rgyas mdzad dka' spyad nas ni//'gro ba thaMd
225b6(rgyud): bsgral bur mos shes gsol to//yang 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/rgyal mchog skyes bu khyed ci 'dra//de 'dra kho nar spyad por bgyi//spyod po bsam rgyas rmad 'byung
225b7(rgyud): ba//'gro la phan pa'i don du spyad//'khor ba'i mtha' rings 'jig rten pa//ma bsgral ba ni bsgrol par bgyi//ma grol po ni grol bar bgyi//dbugs mi phyung ba dbyugs
226a1(rgyud): phyung ste//mya ngan 'das pa'i zhing khamasu//snying po byang chub nyid du sbyar zhes gsol to//de nas yang 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis dam chog bskul
226a2(rgyud): bar gsol pa//mi phyed gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pa//gnyis med don gyi dbyings las byung //dbyings ni mi 'jig rdo rje ste//'du 'bral med par gcig pas na//gsang ba
226a3(rgyud): gsum gyi dbyings nyid do//gnyi su med par nan ton mdzod ces gsol to//de nas skyes bu chen po des bka' stsal pa/rdo rjen gyi rnal 'byor khyed//rdo rje can du gcigu des na//
226a4(rgyud): gsad pa gsum du mnyam pa'i phyir//mi phyed rdo rje dam tshig ni//gsang ba gsum gyi dbyings nas phyung //dkyil 'khor gsum gyi dam tshig ni//grub ni 'jig pa'i dus
226a5(rgyud): med do zhes bka' stsal to//yang 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa//'du 'bral med par chos kyi srin//rigs me 'thun yang dam tshig gcig/'da' bar dka' bas
226a6(rgyud): bsdus pas na//dam tshig can du nan tan mdzod//ces gsol to//de nas yang skyes bu chen po des yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//gsang ba gsum gyi dam pa rnam//
226a7(rgyud): khyad kyis rab tu 'grus gyur na//de kun khros nas khrag chen po//nyams pa'i stong nas drangs te 'thung zhes dam tshig dam pa byin no//de nas yang skyes bu dam pa des
226b1(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/mu 'das sangs rgyas blo ldan khyod//bla med ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir//gyod skyong gsang ba gsum du bzhugs//rang gi mo lod nyid lnga ltos//gnas gsum/
226b2(rgyud): nyid du bkod pa yi//gsang chen gosang ba re bau gsang ba//mthong bso de bzhin nyid du'o gyuraro//gzhan min rang byung de kho na//blo chung rnams la ma smra shAg/gal te smras par
226b3(rgyud): gyur na ni//tha tshigs drag pos nyams 'gyur nas//me chen 'bar bya'i gnasu sred ces dam tshig dam pa bsgragaso//lang ka'i bdag po 'dus pa'i tshogs ngo dge 'di
226b4(rgyud): ltar gsang ba gsum gyi dam par bzhugs pa de'i tshe de'i dus na la la ni 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa she dag tu gyur to//la la ni rigs chen 'byed pa'i rnal 'byor la gan
226b5(rgyud): ba she dag tu gyur to//la la ni dbugs chen 'byin pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa shaM dgo tu gyur to//la la ni lung tshen thob pa'i rnal 'byor la gnos pa shi dag tu gyur to//
226b6(rgyud): la la ni rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa shaM dag tu gyur to//de ltar na de'i tshe de'i dus nyid na 'dus pa'i tshogs phal mo tshe de dag ni rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur
226b7(rgyud): bas dbang bskur te/lam ni rdo rje mu gu zhes bya bar grags par gyur to//de bzhin du la la ni chos kyi myu gu zhes bya bar gragaso//la la ni rin che ni myu gu zhes bya ngar grag so//
227a1(rgyud): la la ni zla bo'i rtsal zhes bya ba gagaso//l+ya la ni nyi ma'i mdangs zhes bya bar gragaso//la la ni seng ge'i rtsal zhes bya bar+ya gragaso//la la nI nam
227a2(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya bar grag so//bdag las ma rungs po kha cog ni la la ni rdo rje sbyang ki zhes bya bar gragaso//la la ni rdo rje dus mtshams zhes bya bar grogaso//la la ni rdo rje phyogs
227a3(rgyud): 'dul zhes bya bar gragaso//la la ni rdo rje dur khrod zhes bya bar gragaso//ru dra nag po de kho na nyid ni rdo rje ro langs dur khrod kyi bdag po zhes bya bar grags te/bskal ba chen
227a4(rgyud): po bzang po'i yun du gnas mas rnal 'byor yongs kyi mgon po dge bsnyen legs ldan nag po zhes bya bar gyur nas gang dag chos srungs pa rnams kyi srungs ma'i bya ba byed do//
227a5(rgyud): bsal ba de'i phyi ma la 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thal bas khebs pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa thal ba'i dbang po'i dbyangs zhes bya bar mngon par rdzogs/

227a7(rgyud): rab tu g.yos par gyur to//'gul rab tu 'gul/kun tu rab tu 'gul to//ldeg rab tu ldeg/kun tu rab tu ldeg/'ur rab tu 'ur/kun du rab tu 'u ro//che ma rab tu tsham/

227b2(rgyud): gyur to//'jig rten pa kun kyang ngo mtshar du gyur te mngon par bstod to//lha drang bcas pa'i 'jig rten pa kha cig ni de kho na nyid gsang ba dram pa lnga rjesu yo rang bar gyur to///
227b3(rgyud): kha cig ni ma skyes pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//kha cig ni chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag ge/kha cig ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas
227b4(rgyud): bar gyur to//kha cig ni lung bstan pa thob pa shre dag tu gyur to//de'i tshe de'i dus ni ru dra thar pa nag po la sogs pa mi'i thad pa can ma rungs pa rnams skyes bu chen po rdo rje
227b5(rgyud): ma rungs pa de la lus kyi bag gzhi sa la phab pa'i phyag rnal 'byor gyi lugasu byas nas thal mo sbyar spyi bos btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to//a ho su kha k+She bar+ya

228a1(rgyud): dri gan su dag gam/byang chub sems kyi dri lags sam/ro phun sum tshogs pa byung //rau gan su dag gam/ting 'dzin gyi ro lags sam/reg phun sum

228b3(rgyud): de dag gri gang bsam pa dang ci bcol ba'i ril yang bran gyi bya bas yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o//de dag gis kyang chos srung zhing chos bzhin du gnas nas bdag cag rnams kyi ci
228b4(rgyud): yang yid bzhin du grub pa/lha chen po rnams kyi gsang sngags 'jig rten mngon rtags kyi 'byung gnas rdo rje thu bo ches mngon pa'i mthu can du brjod pa dang /dam rjes dang /

234a1(rgyud): phyung zhen//sa m+b+ha rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa thams cad na rtog da do dang bral ba'o//ladaka' bdag po de'i phyir gsang sngags kyang ba la ni rab tu dbang
