273b2(rgyud): ka'i bdag po grong khyer gsum gyi ched du 'bras bu dang /rkyen dang /sgyu'o/lang ki'i bdag po bdag la sogs pa phreng khyer gsum gyi ched du mdzad pa yongasu snang bar mjed de/de dag ni
273b3(rgyud): thugs kyi mdzad pa yongasu snang ba'o//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs po 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las thugs kyi mdzad pa yongasu rdzogs pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o//
273b4(rgyud): de nas yang gas ba ba'i bdag ngos lang ka'i bo dag po la smras pa/lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi ched du yang dag pa'i gsung ba 'di yongasu gsung bar mdzodado//sangs rgyas
273b5(rgyud): rnams kyi dam pa ni//thams cad nyid las mi gzhan phyir//ci yang blang dror med pas nA//rdo rje na mkha' gdon mi za//lang ka'i bdag po yang rang sangs rgyas kyi ched du sdang pa rdo rje bston
273b6(rgyud): pa 'di gsung bar mdzad//ngag gi rdo rje si bye med//lus ni rdo rje snang ston ste//gang gi yid ni 'dir bcu pa ste/gsang ba nyid du rab nges pa'o//lang ka'i byodag po yang gseng ba mchog
273b7(rgyud): gi bdag po des nyan thos kyi ched du bslab pa rdo rje mdzad pa'i gsung ba brjod//sgo gsum rdo rje bya ba bcu//bsrung ba yongasu dag pa'i mtha'//zhi ba phyogs yid 'dir bcug ste//dam
274a1(rgyud): nyid du rab nges pa'o//lang ka'i bdag po yung skyes bu dam pa des rnal 'byor sems dpa'i cheng du lta ba rdo rje gsung ba 'di gsung bar mdzad do//tha~Md rnam rigau 'phru
274a2(rgyud): sdang ba//gzhan med de nyid dam par yod//rnam shes gang yin 'dor bcug ste//gsing po dam par rab nges pa'o//lAng ka'e bdag po yang skyes bu dam pa des gang gi mtha'
274a3(rgyud): yongasu sel ba dag gi ched du na mkha' rdo rje mdzad pa 'di gsung bar mdzadado//gang 'dir yod dang med pa yi//mtha' gnyis nges par rab gsol te//sems nyid gang yin 'dir
274a4(rgyud): bcug ste//dbu mar mi dmigs rang nges pa'o//lang ka'i bdag po yang skyes bu dam pa des tshangs pa la sogs pa gti mug can gyi ched du gti mug rdo rjer mdzad pa 'dri gsung
274a5(rgyud): bar mdzad//'jig rten kun gyi gti mug las//byang chub sems kyi rdo rje 'byung //gti mug rdo rje yid bcug nas//gsang chen theg par rab nges pa'o//lang ka'i bdag
274a6(rgyud): po yang skyes bu dam pa des gu lang la sogs pa gang 'dod chags can gyi ched du chags pa rdo rje mdzad pa 'di gsung ba mdzad do//'jig rten g.yo rdul pho mo gang //ji snyed
274a7(rgyud): gu lang u ma nyid//chags pa rdo rje yin bcu gnas//gsang chen theg par rab nges pa'o//lang ka'i bdag po yang skyes bu dam pa des bi s+thu la sogs pa gang zhe sdang
274b1(rgyud): can gyi tshod du gsod pa rdo rje mdzad pa 'di gsung bar mdzad//ji stod g.yo rdul sems can rnams//rdo rje mtshon chen gcig gis bsad//zho sdang rdo rje yid bcug nas//rdo rje theg

274b4(rgyud): pa gang phra ma can gyi ched du phra ma rdo rje mdzad pa 'di gsung bar mdzad do//rdo rje dam pa dbye ba'i mchog/log lta yang dag lta dbye byas//phra ma rdo rje yid bcug nas//rdo rje gsang bar rab
274b5(rgyud): nges pa'o//la dka' bdag po yang skyes bu dam pa des lha ma yin la sogs pa gong nga rgyal can gyi ched du gdal dka'i rdo rje mdzad pa 'di gsung bar mdzad //rdo rje gdul dka' ma

275a7(rgyud): yang tha dang mtha' yas par snang ba ste/yul la la ni dag par smin par mdzad//la la ni mi dag pas smin par mdzod//la la ni dge pa spangs pas so//la la ni gdams
275b1(rgyud): dAg s+ho//lalpAn trA m+b+ha so+o//la lan 'dam byas so//lA ldan chub so//la lan gtugs so//la la ni 'jigs pas so//la la ni Sh+Ta bas s+ho//la la ni 'dum gyis//la

275b6(rgyud): gyiste//la la ni smras so//la l+ya ni dris so//la l-I n+ti sa so//la lA ni dag gis so//la li ni chos kyis yongasu smin pang mdzad de//la yon gzugs spyad du mi 'ong byas//
275b7(rgyud): de bzhin du la la ni blo dang /dri dang /ro dang /ga yid du mi 'ong bas yang su smin par mdzad do//gang la la ni thub pa ma la ni sbyin mo 'chad par sgribs so//la la na
276a1(rgyud): cig smra bas so//la la ni ci yang mi brjod pas so//la la dag ni dam pa mthong bas so//lA la ni dam pa'i sgra so//la la ni ba shes gnyen dam pa'i
276a2(rgyud): smras//la lA ni mi rtog pa so//la la ni rtog pas so//la la ni sdug bsngal bso//la la ni bde bas so//lA la ni bdag med pas so//la la ni bdag yod pas so//la
276a3(rgyud): ni mngon spyod kyis so//la la ni zhi bas so//la la ni rgyas paso//lwa le ni dbang gis so//lA la ni mthar phyin pas so//la lA ni dug gsum sdug bsngal myong bar
276a4(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i sgras smin par mdzad do//la la ni bde ba myong bar 'gyur pa'i sgra so//la la ni bde ba mi slong bar 'gyur ba'i sgra so//la la ni srid po'i longs spyod spangs te dka' thub
276a5(rgyud): drag pos so//la la ni srid pa'i longs smod blangs te 'jol nyag tu spyod pas so//la la ni bkag pa'i thabs kyis so//la la ni gang la yang ma rig pa'i thabs kyis//
276a6(rgyud): la la ni bya ba rdzogs pa'i thabs kyiso//la la ni sbyin pas so//la la ni snyan pas so//la la ni 'thun pas so//la la ni spyod pas so//la la ni nang
276a7(rgyud): yongasu gtong bas so//la la ni phyi yongasu gtong bas so//la la ni thams cad gtong bas so//la la ni thams cad chags pas yongasu smin por mdzad//la la ni rnam
276b1(rgyud): bar ga yang bas so//la la na nang du yang dag 'jog gis so//la la ni 'dod pa bkag pas so//la la ni 'dod pa spong pas so//bAd de ltar mas pa tha dad la spyod pa dang /gzugs
276b2(rgyud): dang /sgra dang /lta ba dang /thabs dang /'dod pa dang /don tha dad par bstan pas yongasu smin par mdzad do//lang ka' bdag po de dag ni thabs kyis mdzad par rig par bya'o//sangs rgyas
276b3(rgyud): kun gyis dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las thabs kyi mdzad pa yongasu rdzogs pa'i le ru ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o////de nas yang gsad ba pa'i bdag po des lang ka'i
276b4(rgyud): bdag po la smras pa/lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang gi ched du sku'i mdzad pa ni 'di lta ste/ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa 'jig rten du bkod pas thams cad kye gzugasu snang ba
276b5(rgyud): ngas thams cad smin par mdzad pa de kho na'o//de ltar na gang gi ched du mdzad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi sgo
276b6(rgyud): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad spyod kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i mtha' dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i sprin phung la ni 'di 'am//gcig
276b7(rgyud): ces gang la yang gzung du med//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste/sems can mos pa tha dad pas/mtha' yas skye bo mgu dka' ba//rgyal bas kyang ni mi mgu/
277a1(rgyud): byas gang la'ang mos pa mtha' yas gsungs/lang ka'i bdag po gang dam pa rnams de kho na nyid las ma g.yos par sems can gyi khams 'du shes mtha'//
277a2(rgyud): thug pa med pa dang /sgra dang /gzugs dang /spyod mtha' thug pa med pa rnams mi mkhyen pa dang /mi gsan pa dang /mi gzigs pa dang /mi 'grel pa ni gang yang med de//de cing
277a3(rgyud): phyir zhe na/thams cad nas thams cad du srid pa byang chub nyid du ma 'dres par yongasu rdzogs pa'i phyir gang gi spyod pa byang chub ni mi g.yo ba na mi rtog pa nyid dang /sems nyan gang
277a4(rgyud): tipa 'bru ni gnas pa de la ring ba dang /nye ba dang //gcig dang /so sa ma yin te/de kho na nyid gcig pa'i phyir dbyings gcig tu gnyi su med par gnaso//lang ka'i bdag pa
277a5(rgyud): da dgu ni gang gi ched du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mdzad pa tshad du mdzad pa'o//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgos pa 'dus pa'i mong chen po las sku'i mdzad pa yangasu rdzogs
277a6(rgyud): pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o///theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba'i tshul las gang gi ched du mdzad pa na yang byung ba'i gtam rgyud brjod pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya yis
277a7(rgyud): rnam par bgros pa ste/byang tshul bstan pa dgu pa'o////de nas yang la ka'i mapar bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngas sngon du byung ba'i tshig
277b1(rgyud): bcu gnyis pa'i bcu pa'i lung chen nges par bstan pa na yang byung shes byung ba'i dri ba yongasu dris pa/kye gsang ba'i bdag po nyid kyis theg pa chen po gsang ba dam pa byung ba'i tshul ston pas
277b2(rgyud): lung bstan pa gtam rgyud du brjod pa'i skabasu lung chen nges par bstan pa na yang byung zhes bkod pa de ji lta zhig du lung bstan te grags pa lags/gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/
277b3(rgyud): lang ka'i bdag po gang dri ba de ni legaso//shin tu leg so//rab tu legaso//de ni 'di ltar 'khor ba thog ma med pa'i dbyingasu bskal pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i skabs la sangs rgyas
277b4(rgyud): thog ma dang tha ma med par gang gi sgron mar snang ba dag gi thabs gcig gi bya bas gang phyogs gcig du phan pa nyid du bye ba yongasu smin par byas te/thabs dam pas gar phyogs meng
277b5(rgyud): par phan pa nyid du yongasu smin par bya ba dag gang gi rje su gang 'gro bar dam bcas pa nyid des byung zhing snang bar lung bstan pa de yongasu grags par 'gyur gyi/sgron ma gang gis nyid kyi
277b6(rgyud): yul sdang ba las ma gtogs pa thams cad snang ba ni ma yin pa'i phyiraro//lang ka'i bdag po lung bstan pa de lar ji lta ji ltar 'di lta ste/bskal pa thog ma med pa la//ji snyed gang
277b7(rgyud): 'byung brjod mi lang //skabs las gcig byung 'dir brjod kyis//dom bcas go cha bgos khyod nyon//bskal pa kun bkod bya ba la//sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya 'byung //kun gyi
278a1(rgyud): /tha mar byung ba yi//bdag shegs mngon 'byung rgyal po des//'khor gyi nang du lung bstan pa//'jig rten gcig gam grang gtsug du//bskal pa gcig gi
278a2(rgyud): gnas skabs la//yul gcig rdo rje gdan gcig du//mdzad pa mthor phyin sangs rgyas gnyis//'byung bar yang dag dus ma mthong //byung na mi srid chos dang 'gal//sangs
278a3(rgyud): rgyas mya ngan 'das 'og tu//rmad 'byung gsang ba'i snying po nyid//rgya cher grags par 'gyur zhes//sangs rgyas kun gyis lung chen ston//ji ltar 'di yang de bzhin te//da ni mi
278a4(rgyud): bzhugs 'das 'og tu//kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa nyid brgya mthong 'dul ba snang bar 'gyur//de skad dam pa de lung bstan//gzhan yang bskul ba chen po nyon//bskal pa mtha'
278a5(rgyud): yas bya ba lnga//sangs rgyas sum khri lnga stong 'byung //kun gyi tha mar 'byung ba yi//sangs rgyas 'od mtha' yas pa des//'khor gyi nang du lung bstan pa//khri phrag phyed dang
278a6(rgyud): bzhi 'byung ba'i//sangs rgyas snga ma 'das rnams kyis//smon byas pa smin gang phyed du//dmo pa byung bar lung bstan bzhin//'dir yang yo su gzung bar gyis//nga 'dis na
278a7(rgyud): mi snang na//brgya brag gcig na don snang 'gyur//drag shul can gyis byin lung bstan//bskul po chen po gzhan yang nyon//bskal pa grags ldan bya ba la//sangs rgyas
278b1(rgyud): d+d+ha/byung //na gyi tha ma yang byu ba //sang sa r+b+bas rgyun b+h+yo shos gnyen des//'khor sbyin du lung bstan pa//sto phrag na drug byung dul//dam byung nan tu
278b2(rgyud): rnams kyis//gau gi tshong du lung bstan pa'in//ngani bad bar ga shegs byim//bcu phyug bcu ra gyur pa ni//'bras bu chub par snang ba yi//rdul brel dri med dam pa nyid//mchog
278b3(rgyud): gzhing khams dam pa 'dir//snang baM thob pa'i skal ldan nan//bram ze shis pa mo zhig la//gnod 'dul nyid kyis gragasmra par 'gyur//gzhon yang bskul ba chen po nyon//bskal
278b4(rgyud): pa bzang rgyun bya ba la//sangs rgyas bye brag brgyad du bye //de dag mtha' zang byung ba yi//sangs rgyas bzung rgyun dpal gyis kyang //'khor gyi nang du lung bstan pa//bye phrag rgyud
278b5(rgyud): s+ho//da sbyinag gasmos pa snyam yig//zlog pa'i byu bar lung gi zh-in//da mi snang ba do na nas//bad+ma phyug byed kyi dus dag ste/
278b6(rgyud): 'dun par grags par 'gyur//gzhan yang 'i sprul brtson po ni//bsgril pardugs sngon bya'o 'o//sangs rgyas bye phyog brgya rgyung //dgun mthu na
279a1(rgyud): dkon mchog dpal gyis kyang //'khor gyi nang du lung bstan pa//bye ba phrag brgya byung ba yi//de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis//nges pa dam
279a2(rgyud): par lung bstan bzhin//nga snang mi gnas de rjes la//lo ni brgyad cu rtsa gnyis la//gsang 'dus thog chen snying po 'di//byang chub snying po can zhes pa'i//sa le gser gling bya ba
279a3(rgyud): na/rgyal po bde skyob skal yod la//las dang thugs rje 'thun pa yi//chos kyi mi gcig 'bye 'gyur te//rigs ldan kun gyis thob par 'gyur//bskul ba chen po gzhan
279a4(rgyud): yang nyon//bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la//sangs rgyas brgya phrag bcu 'byung ba'i//bzhi par 'byung ba'i sgron ma nyid//thub pa'i dbang po de nyid kyis//'khor gyi nang du lung
279a5(rgyud): bstan pa//bye phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yi//mngon rdzogs rgyal po de nyid kyis//gang gi phyogs dag smin byas nas//theg chen rdo rje snying po nyid//rgya cher glags par
279a6(rgyud): 'gyuraro zhes//kun gyi lung tshun bstan pa bzhin//de ni 'di nas mi snang nas//lo ni brgya dang bcu gnyis na//lha gnas gsum du grags pa yi//bstan pa'i snying po dam
279a7(rgyud): pa zhig/'jam gling shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi mi las skal ldan rigs can de//rgyal po dzaM zhes bya ba la//sngon du ltas snang gnang 'gyur ba//drag shul can zhes
279b1(rgyud): bya ba'i ni//grogs kyi sems dpa' dman pa'i lus//lang ka'i bdag po la sogasal//lag na rdo rje snang bar 'gyur//dam pas de skad lung bstan snang //de la sogs pa myu
279b2(rgyud): yas par//thig mthe ma med pa'i bar//de lta de ltar grags pa yin//gsang ba pa'i dadag pos de skad ces gsungs pas lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa'i dman pa'i lus kyi
279b3(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams nges par yid rangs par gyur te/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rjesu byung ba'i lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o///
279b4(rgyud): theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba'i tshul las lung chen nges par bstan pa na yang byung zhes bya ba'i gtam rgyud brjod pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes rnam par bgros pa ste byang tshul bstan
279b5(rgyud): bya bcu pa'o//de nas yang lang ka'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/sngon du byung ba'i tshig bcu gcig pa'i dri ba yongasu dri ba/kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyid
279b6(rgyud): kyis theg pa chen po gsang ba dam pa byung ba'i tshul ston pas lung bstan pa gtam rgyud du brjod pa'i skabasu las rgyud yongasu gcod pa na yang byung zhes bkod pa de ji lta bu zhig du grags
279b7(rgyud): shing byung ba las//gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/lang ka'i bdag po gang gi dri ba de ni 'di lta ste/gang zhig 'dogs pa'i yul rnams las//gsum du nges par snang ba ni/dod la
280a1(rgyud): zhen dru nges pa 'byung //grang la dka' drug po gdal bya gsum//gang gis 'dag pa'i rdul gsum ni//'khor lo rgyun dang ngan dum nges//cho 'phrul mngon pa
280a2(rgyud): 'byung ba gsum//rang bzhin ye nas snang ba yin//ji lta 'degs pa'i thabs rnams ni//bsam gyis mi khyab gsum nyid du//snang ba de nyid gang yin pa//rang bzhin shugs dang
280a3(rgyud): gnyen po'i thabs//las rgyud gcod pa 'ba' shi go/'khor lo rgyun du snang ba yang //ye nas sangs rgyas grags pa lngar//'dus bya 'dul byed thams cad kun//lhur byung lngar
280a4(rgyud): gnang ldang 'dul sgrol//skyed dang 'tsho dang brten pa'o//rgyu dang rkyen dang gnas pa yi//mi rtog dang gis kun 'byung ba//med la mi zad rnam po gsum//gang gi dbyings dang mngon sum po//
280a5(rgyud): bdag nyid chen po de nyid ni//thams cad du yang sangs rgyas meng //lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste//gang dag dbyingasu sangs rgyas pa//chen po lngar snang gang 'di dag/'byung ba rgyun
280a6(rgyud): gyi bcom ldan 'das//thugs rje rtag pa'i sangs rgyas te//rang bzhin kun la khyab par gnas//ji ltar 'dod dong 'dod par snang //snang srid ston pa'i sgron mar grags//'byung ba rgya
280a7(rgyud): gyi rtag pa ste//rang bzhin stong pas mdzad par ston//lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang //mngon sum pa yi sangs rgyas ni//mkha'i dbyings kun tu mu med dbyings//khams
280b1(rgyud): gsum dngos dang pos mang kun//phyogs mtshams kun gyi lus dang gnas//kun gyi go skabs stong yod gnas//'gro dang mi 'gro'i rten sa ni//dngos po thams cad skye 'byung gnas//
280b2(rgyud): kun la dga' bar sbyor bar ni//bskol pa'i 'khor lo gcig tu gnas//gnyen sdud gzhan skyed rang bzhin gsal//gyes 'dzin mi ldog rgyun mi 'chad//dgon gdung kun rlan rnam
280b3(rgyud): par g.yo//bskol pa'i 'khor lo gcig tu gnas//kun smin mun sel kun ston slongs//gsugs gnyen kha dog gsal byung ba//bcud 'dzin yongasu rtas snang ba//bskal
280b4(rgyud): ba gcig gi 'khor lor gnas//mi gnas thogs med shugs kyis 'byung //gzugs med gzugs kyi mthu bas drag/yang g.yo khyab 'jug kun gyi rten//bskal pa 'khor
280b5(rgyud): lo gcig tu gnas//lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste//bdag nyid chen po'i sangs rgyas ni//kun shing yil 'phyo kun tu bzang //kun the go lhan stug ye shes gzugs//kun sdud
280b6(rgyud): mnyam sbyor ting 'dzin//sgrib sel lhag mthong shes rab 'bar//thogs med mo rmongs shes bya rdzogs//long ka'i bdag po gzhan yang ni//de nyid yin pa'i sangs rgyas na/
280b7(rgyud): na mkha' rnam par snang ba mdzad//sa ni mi g.yo rdo rje 'dzin//ma nyid rin chen 'byung bar ldan//chu ni mnyen gsal snang mtha' yas//rlung ni kun 'byed gdon mi zo//la
281a1(rgyud): bdag po 'di lta ste//gang 'dar sangs rgyas myed pa ni//thams cad stang pad+ma lo sangs te//des khyab ma 'dres srungs rgyas nyid//ma bcos yonas
281a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas pa//'byung ba chen po bcom ldan 'das//pang ka'i bdag po de dag ni//'khor la rgyun gyi theg pa ste//dang gis rgyun gyi 'khor lo ro 'byung //brtan g.yo kun la rang
281a3(rgyud): bzhin gnas//lang+ga ka'i bdag blo gzhan yang gang //don dam nges pa'i theg pa ni//gsum du nges par snang ba ste//kun 'a byung 'dren dang dka' thub rigs/dbang sgyur thabs kyi
281a4(rgyud): theg pa'o//gang 'dir 'dren pa 'di lta ste//yul gsum nges par snang ba ni//thA ma 'bring dang rab tu snang //tha ma'i yul du gyur pa ni//shin tu ya de'i las spangs te//
281a5(rgyud): yid 'ong 'dul ba'i tshul bzung nas//rang gi rtsa ba deng bskrun pa//so sbyor thar pa'i lam du snang //'bring gi yul du gyur pa yin//'di kun rten cing 'brel byung la//bdag
281a6(rgyud): med chos gcig med mthong bas//brjod mang sprul pa'i chos rnams ston//rang gi rtsal gyis par gnas pa'o//rab kyi yul du gyur pa ni//bdag med byams skams rtag
281a7(rgyud): lus 'das//yul med ma skyes phyogs dang bral//sa dang rnam thar 'dar bskrun pas//dngos med ngo bo nyid sku thob//lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang //dka' thub
281b1(rgyud): rab N+Dod \u0f7fg+hu na//do la sum kyis pasum spyad//tha ma dag la sma na//glu/shA zlum dang l+h+wa zhugs /mnyam nyid mo ga ma m+b+ha m+bo // na chung /
281b2(rgyud): nAs//rigs kyi rdo rje 'dzin gnas pa'o//'bring la rnam par snang ba ni//bye ba dag pa'i las skyed do//rnal 'a 'dzin mar ldan na//ma~M gI m+b+ha'i sem+b+has dpa' med na sum du/
281b3(rgyud): rigs bzhi rdo rje 'chang gnas pa'o//rab la nges par snang ba ni//sems nyid yul la tsa la rdzogs te//yul+le ny-id rig pas mngon mthong na//de nyid de ni mngon byas nas/
281b4(rgyud): rigs 'chang gnas pa'o//lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang ga/dbang sgyur thabs kyi theg pa yang //yul gyis rnam pa gsum snang ba//bskyed dang rdzogs dang ljo sa rdzogs/
281b5(rgyud): thu ma bskyed pa gang snang ba//thabs dang shes rab rnam dag las/bsten pa lnga la sogs pa'i chos//rgya yi ba lnga las rdzogs sangs rgyas//rnal 'byor tsal chen rdzogs
281b6(rgyud): pA'i snga//'bring la rdzi gros par gang snang bya//mnyam pas mnyam pa'i don mthong ni//mnyam rdzogs yul shes dbyings ye shes//kun rig kun rdzogaso kun tu snang //cho
281b7(rgyud): nyid mi 'gyur ba da ba'is//rab la yong su rdzogs pa ni//ye shes dbyings zhes bya ba'i don/tha snyad tsam du rtogs chud nas rtsal me rdzogs bral bsam yul 'das//
282a1(rgyud): rlan thams da rdzogs pa'i sgyid tshob sa//lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang glang //tshe 'phrul mngon byung thog pa yang //yul b+hi rnam pa gsum snang ba/
282a2(rgyud): phyir//dam pa'i 'khor lo bskor byas nas//bskal pa'i 'khor lo gcod par 'gyur//ci phyir sems can kha cig ni//chags pas zhen cing gdung bar 'gyur//gde tshe sems
282a3(rgyud): tson kha cig ni//shin tu rmongs shing 'thibs par 'gyur//gang gis sems can kha tsog ni//shin tu khro gtum gdug par 'gyur//'di ltar duge gsum smin pa la//
282a4(rgyud): gang gis phan par mi 'gyur te//mi rtag mtshan nyid bstan nas kyang //las ngan las rgyud gcad pa'i phyir//rang bzhin cho 'phrul mngon 'byung ba//khros na za byed ldi khros
282a5(rgyud): bas//ma lus bsgral nas stongs mdzad phyir//na mkha' khro bo zla byed che//thams cad thim par stongs par mdzad//de bzhin nyid du bsgral ba'i mchog/srid zhi 'tsho bral
282a6(rgyud): bskal pa yis//zhen pas chags pa'i las rgyud gcod//bzod ldan rmongs pa'i bskal pa yis//sems dang yid kyi las rgyud gcod//thabs 'dzin mtshon cha
282b1(rgyud): bskal pa yis//dngos po dngos po thams cad gcod//lhag mthong me yi bskal pa yis//nyon mongs dngos po thams cad srog shAzhi gnas chu yi bskul ba yis//nyon
282b2(rgyud): mongs dri ma thams cad 'khru//thogs med rlung gi bskal pa yis//shes bya thams cad kun tu spyod//shes rab na mkha'i bskal pa yis//mtshan ma'i rgas rgud thams cad
282b3(rgyud): stongs//las ngan myur du rkyen bcad na//gnas ngan dag las myur du sgrol//thobs dang theg pa gang dag las//tha ma'i tha ma yin par bshad//snyigs mar gyur pa'i skabs naM su//
282b4(rgyud): 'dul ba rnams gnyis nub pasA na//nyon mongs rnams ni dngos por snang //'das nas nub po zhes pa la//ma 'das ma nub de nyid ni//dus der shugs kyis 'dul ba yin//
282b5(rgyud): lad ka'i bdag po de ltar na//'di kun gsang ba dam pa yi//dbyings las gar yang ma g.yos shing //stong pa kho na'i dbyings nyid las//stong pa'i chos rnams byung bar
282b6(rgyud): zad//stong nyid gsang ba de khro na//theg chen gasdang ba de nyid do//gausang ba'i bdag pos de skad ces brjod pas ladwa ka'i bdag phyi la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems pa rnams
282b7(rgyud): thams cad gsang ba dam pa nyid du nges pa'i som nyid med par gyur to//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las cho 'phrul sngon byung gi le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi
283a1(rgyud): pa'o////theg pa chen po ngas par byung ba'i tshul las las rgyud yongasu gcod pa na yang byung bya ba'i gtam rgyud brjod pa chos kyi phyag rgya
283a2(rgyud): ye shes rnam par bgros pa ste/byung tshul bstan pa bcu gcig pa'o////bam po bdun par zug pa'o////de nas yang lang ka'i ri dag po byang chub sems dpa'
283a3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po des sngon byung ba'i tshig bcu gnyis pa'i tha ma dgongs pa rnam par bgro ba na yang byung zhes snang ba'i dri ba yong su dris pa/kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyid
283a4(rgyud): kyis theg pa chen po gsang ba dam pa byung ba'i tshul ston pas lung bstan pa gtam du brjod pa'i skabasu dgongs pa rnam par bgro ba na yang byung zhes bkod pa de lta zhig tu 'gros
283a5(rgyud): te grags pa lags smras pa/lang ka'i bdag po gang yongasu dra ba de ni 'di ltar zab pa/ches zab pa/'di ltar dka' ba/ches dka' ga rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/brtag
283a6(rgyud): pa rab tu dka' ba/dpag pa las 'das pa ste/gang rgyud yongasu dag pa'i sangs rgyas dang /grang sa la gnas pa rnams kyis kyang rab tu bgro bar mi nus pa yin na bdag gis yongasu
283a7(rgyud): 'gro bar lta ci smos te/gang gi spyod yul yang ma yin no//de skad ces smras paso/lang ka'i bdag po des 'di skad ces smra so//kye skyes bu chen po gsang ba'i bdag po nyon
283b1(rgyud): mongs par snang ba'i 'gro ba rnams la phan pa dang /snying brtse ba nyid du bgyi ba'i slad du mi chen po rnams kyi spyod yul/chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/gang du ma
283b2(rgyud): bkag pa'i chos nyid du longs spyod pa//thabs kyi theg pa chen po dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid de rnam par dgro zhing smra ba'i seng ge khyod kyis phyin ci ma log par bgro ba'i dus la khyab po//
283b3(rgyud): skyes bu chen po shin tu rab tu dus la bab po//nges par dam par 'gro ba'i dus la bab po//de ci'i slad du zho na/skyes bu chen po khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka'
283b4(rgyud): gosang ba chen po'i bdag por dbang gis dbang bskur ba lags te/gang rmongs pa rnams go 'byed pa dang /gad+mo 'thoms pa drang ba'i thabs sprin phung gi dra bas thams cad bde blag du
283b5(rgyud): drang ba'i slad du dgongs pa dam pa'i lus dgrol du gsol zhes bskul ba las/gsang ba pa'i blodrag po des 'di skad ces smraso//bskul ba'i go cha chen po khyod//kun la rab tu
283b6(rgyud): brtse ba'i phyir//gang la bskul bar khyod brtson na//'gro ba gleng bslang leg sro legs//'di ltar 'di skad bdag nyid kyis//des po'i don de kho na nyid//thos pa slong ba'i dus gcig na//
283b7(rgyud): thams cad na mkha' lta bu las//ring byung rang nyid du thos nas//gsang ba'i tshig ni 'di skad du//thos par gyur pa'i dus gcig na//'thun 'jug thabs kyi cha 'thun du//bstan
284a1(rgyud): nas drang ba'i thabs thos//lung gA gtan chags 'dra skad du//bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na//ldem dgongs sgyur bya'i'o tshul nyid kyis//bstan nas ba
284a2(rgyud): pa'i thub su thos//'dod rten tshig ni 'di skad du//rtogs par gyur pa'i dus gcig na//'od chen po la 'dod pa ni//thabs kyis dang pos nyid du chos//gsang sngags rdo rje na maH
284a3(rgyud): che//tshig gi spyod yul ma yin pas//brjod pas rtogs par mi nus te//bdag gis bgro bar rab tu dka'//dpe 'am ched ma 'am gtam tshigs sam//rjesu dpag pa'i shes
284a4(rgyud): rab kyis//rtogs par nus pa ma yin te//dmus long mkha' la mthos 'jal 'dra//'on kyang bka' yi gnyer gtad cing //log zhen thabs kyis drang ba dang //bskul ba khyod kyi
284a5(rgyud): dam tshig kyang //sngon gyi go cha gyon pa'i mthus//ma rtogs pa rnams tshig tsam gyis//mtshon nas rnam grol sa dag la//brgya de drang ba'i thabs nyid du//ci rigs tsam du 'gro bar

298a3(rgyud): bdag de'i tshe de'i dus na dam tshig chen mo rdo rje sems dpa' gyur pa la/bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des theg pa chen po gsang ba'i don bdag nyid
298a4(rgyud): kyis rgya cher ched du brjod cig pA dgod pa'i phyir bdag la nyi cher zhal 'dus pas gzigs te/'dzum pas bskul ba rnam par mdzadado//de nas bdag dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje
298a5(rgyud): sems dpa' zhes bya bar snang ba des yang dag par bskul bar rnam par rig nas rang gri bstan las langs te rang gi mtshan ma gnas lngar reg par byas nas theg
298a6(rgyud): pa cher po de kho na ny-id rgya cher brjod par bya ba'i ched du lce pad+ma'i steng du bzhag ste/shin tu gus pas lus kyi bag gzhis la phab pa'i phyag rnal 'byor lugasu byas
298a7(rgyud): nas sed+d+hi A sa kyis sbyin pa'i zhal du lhas te/'di skad du gsol te//rdo rje rgyal po tshi gas bdag dgongasasu gsol//chos kyi rgyal po mig la sgrol tshul mdzo/
298b1(rgyud): rgyal mchog bde chen sa la rab bzhugs te//smra ba'i lasu mchog rdo rje lho 'bar bas//sgra dbyangs rgyal po rnams kyis bdag byin rlob//gsang sngags rgyal po chos kyi me long 'di//
298b2(rgyud): rgyal mchog chos kyi rgyal po nyid kyi mthus//'dus pa'i tshogs la rgya cher brjod par 'os//a ho zhes gsol ba btab po las//gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des bdag rdo rje
298b3(rgyud): las kyi bka' bar sgo ba de rdo rje brjod pa chen por byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir rdo rje rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ljags kyi 'od zer las/
298b4(rgyud): badz+ra ka ma satwa tsakra ha ha haM/rdo rje rgya gram byi 'khor lo 'bar ba sems dpa' rdo rje kho na bdag de'i lag tu babs par gyur nas las kyi rdo rje'i dbang thob ste/rnam par smra ba chen po
298b5(rgyud): shin tu bra bkyil ba'i spobs pa can du byin gyis brlabs nas kun tu mi gzo ba rab tu bag dang ldan pa chen por gyur to//de nas bdag sems dpa' rdo rje des las kyi mtshan ma de
298b6(rgyud): lag tu blangs nas rdo rje tshig sna tshogs kyis lan lnga ste/rnam pa bcu gnyi su bskor nas/grangs gnyis dang lngar bsgyur bas zhing khams mtha' rnam par dge par g.yos te/g.yos
298b7(rgyud): rab tu g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yos/'gul rab tu 'gul/kun tu rab tu 'gul/ldig rab tu ldeg/kun tu rab tu ldeg/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/
299a1(rgyud): #\u0f7fsa samams mtha/a ma thas#sa#ma tham am #sa #
299a2(rgyud): 'du rab tu rung /kun tu rab tu lhur/kun tu chem rab tu chemya/kun tu rab tu chem/mtha' mthon ni dbus dma'/dbus mtho na ni mtha' dmara'/
299a3(rgyud): shar mtho na ni nub dma'/nub mthun no shur dma'o//lho mtho na ni byang dma'/byang mthon ni lho dma' bar gyur te/zhing khams thams cad bdag rdo rje sems dpa'u sha dag lta bur
299a4(rgyud): gyur nas gsang sngags kyi ngo bo nyid phyin ci ma log pa'i tshul gyis rgya cher brjod pa'i sgra rnam par brjod do//bdag sems dpa' rdo rje nyid rnam par rngom pa'i tshul gyis ston pa'i
299a5(rgyud): mdun log su seng+ge rdo rjes mtshon po'i khre la 'phyang bag gi tshul gyi rnam par gnaso//de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs 'khor phal mo che rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
299a6(rgyud): gsol to//e ma'o bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' rdo rje 'di ni 'di ltar mthu che ba/'di ltar gyis rabs che ba/'di ltar rgya che ba/'di ltar mkhas pa/'di ltar gsal zhing
299a7(rgyud): zab pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs dang 'brel cing thugs las skyes pa/de kho na nyid dang 'brel cing de kho na nyid las skyes pa lag so zhes gsol pas kho bo la bstod pa dang //
299a8(rgyud): lang ka'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das des de dag la bka' stsal pa/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs sems dpa' rdo rje 'di ni byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo//snying rje thams cad/
299b1(rgyud): bdog po//thabs thams cad kyi mchog/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rje btsun/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yab/rnal 'byor kun gyi rnal 'byor/mya ngan las 'das
299b2(rgyud): pa kun gyi ded dpon/bdud thams cad kyi yang bdud chen po//sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang bdud dka' 'dul ba/chos thams cad kyi mdzod gsong ba thams cad kyi bdag
299b3(rgyud): po/ye shes thams cad kyi 'byung gnas chen por gyur pa yin//de ci'i phyir zhe na/thog ma dang tha ma med par mnyam pa'i dus pa mtha' las kyang pha mtha' dpag tu
299b4(rgyud): mad cing bsam du med pa 'byam klas pa'i dus la/bya ba byas shing byed po byas pa/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yin te/de ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin
299b5(rgyud): du sbyor zhing chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin du 'brel pas rgyal ba thams cad kyi thugs las skyes shing thugs dang 'brel pa/thams cad kyi yab tu gyur pa yin te/de 'dra'o/
299b6(rgyud): zhes kho bo la bsngags pa brjod pa bka' stsal pa las/'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ngo mtshar lagaso//
299b7(rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa de ni 'di ltar ngo mtshar lag so zhes gsol te/sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa de li logasu btud nas lus kyi bag gzhi sa la phab pa'i phyag rnal 'byor gyi
300a1(rgyud): thugs byas nas rmad du byung ba'i me tog dang /tid 'dzin gyi mchod pa sna chags byas te/'di ltar chud du 'byung ngo margyur khyod//sang+yas rgyas thugs las
300a2(rgyud): rgyal sgrub pa//de ltar zhid 'drid snang zhig //rdul 'byor yang rgyur rgyal ba'i sras//rang bzhin kun dang gci shA 'brel bya'o//bai trA~M yi 'khor lo rab bskyong bas//rnam dag
300a3(rgyud): lam mchog dam pa dag/tshig gi sa mAts+tshin tAMgs so bar mdzad//A ho zhes gsol bu btib bo//lad ka'i bdag po de nas dam pa rdo rje bdug gis rdo rje bskor te bsgyur nas
300a4(rgyud): brjod bgra tu rdo rje tshig tu smras pa/oM hUM muM a ho//rgyal ba'i sras po cang mi gsung //mi gsung bas nas rgya cher bshad//bshad du med pa'i chos nyid 'di//rgyal po
300a5(rgyud): rnams kyis mye ba shad de//de ltar stonI pa rgyal mchog kyang //rnam par bshad par mi bzhed de//ra ba shad par dgongs pa'i//skye ba med pa'i sa nyid ni//mA
300a6(rgyud): son snying po da/nga po sprin du byung yin du/rgyab tu smra bar yod pa yin//sa nyid nugal ba zhes//rgyal ba rnams kyi yang dag bshad//de
300a7(rgyud): gyid//dka' ma stsal bar dgongs pa'o//degangs pa'i don rnams ning 'byin po//ji ster mi yang dkrigs brnyan ltar//dgengs don rig la snang byung ba//ma skyes
300b1(rgyud): bo'i don gyi san//tshig tu spros pa ma yin na'ang /mtshan mchog gi rnal 'byor bya//tshig la zhib la don la rtsing //tshig phyir blo 'brel rtsal zhan rnams//bkri bas bsam pa rlangs
300b2(rgyud): bya'i phyir//mi dmigs pa las dmigs pa yi//cho 'phrul tshig gis dri mtshon dgos//bder gshegs rgyal ba kun gyi thugs//gsang ba de nyid snying po'i don//mnyam nyid
300b3(rgyud): byang chub theg chen po//gsal bar kun la khyab snang ba'i//kun gyis de nyid mthong bya dgos//da ni dus gsum bzhugs pa yi//rgyal ba kun gyi snying po ste//stong par sbas pa'i
300b4(rgyud): rlodron 'di la//brda dang dpes mtshon lde mig gis//mnyam nyid rig pa'i sgo dbye'o//sbas pa'i don 'tshon 'byung ba'i rigs//ma mthong rnams la bstan par ga sha/de mthong de bzhin
300b5(rgyud): nyid du 'thad//ces gsang ba'i bdag po des chos thams cad dgongs 'brel yon lag bzhir 'dus par go cha bsgo so//de nas lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems
300b6(rgyud): dpa' rnams kyis kyang dgos 'brel yan lag bzhi'i sgo nas chos thams cad yongasu chub par gyur to////sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las 'brel
300b7(rgyud): pa dngos ched kyi yan lag bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o////de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos lang ka'i bdag po la bos te smras pa/lang ka'i bdag po
301a1(rgyud): de la 'dren pa'i yan lag gang zhe na/gang las gang du yong su 'dren pa ste/de yang 'di ltar 'gro ba rnam par yongasu bgro bar bya'o//lang ka'i dadag po 'di
301a2(rgyud): lta ste//yongasu 'dren pa'i yan lag ni//bcu drug gcig gis 'dren pas ni//smra brjod tshig gi yan lag rdzog/gang la lte dang sgo 'byed dang //sdud dang 'byor par 'dren pa dang //
301a3(rgyud): rkyen dang gzhan dmigs 'dzin pa'i tshig/ma bcos me long snrel gzhi rnams//me long bcu dang 'thun sbyar bas//tshig don rnam par sbyar ba yin//lang ka'i bdag po 'di
301a4(rgyud): ste/gang la lta dang lta ba ni//gang 'dir mkha' la 'gro ba ni//rtsal gyis nam 'phangs rlab su gcod//de bzhin de nyid 'dir 'gro ba//ma 'dres lta 'phangs rlab su gcod//
301a5(rgyud): bgrod par bya ba'i sa tshigs dag/rtsal tshad dag gi tshad du gcod//de bzhin don dang tshig mtshams dag/don gyi tshogs dang tshom su gcod//ji ltar gang gi kho bas 'og tu/
301a6(rgyud): sa khams meng po chud pa ltar//brjod pa'i rnam grangs mang po kun//gang gi ngo bo gcig tu sdud//gang dang gang ltar 'gro ba dag/drang por 'brel rjes gnod par snang //brjod
301a7(rgyud): dang brjod pa'i tshig mtshams dag/gang 'dir mi 'khrug 'brel bar sbyor//gang 'gro gan su bgrod pa ni//go yi 'gul mi mngon shugs kyis 'gro/yi ge brjod dang rang
301b1(rgyud): gnyer gyis//gang gi ngo bo de bzhin sbyar//gang zhig gang ltar gang 'gro ba//mi 'tsham pa la der 'tsham snang //brlang po zher 'debs skyon tshig rnams//gang mi 'tsham pa der 'tsham
301b2(rgyud): sbyar//gang dag yid la btags po'i zas//khong nas 'dod pa'i bcud 'byin byed//gang du dmig su 'dzin pa yis//gang mi gsal por mngon par ston//ji ltar sgra brnyan rgyun
301b3(rgyud): byung na//gang skye'i dus su yid ches 'gyur//de bzhin cad ma'i yul byung ni//macos de nyid yin par nges//gang 'dir dag pa'i me long gis//bzhin dang gzugs brnyan ston pa
301b4(rgyud): ltar/nye bar mtshon pa'i me long gis//gang mi mthong ba gsal bar byed//ji ltar snrel gzhi 'chol 'khrugs pa//snol mtshams 'phen sdung 'chol mtshams sbyor//
301b5(rgyud): rtsal chen rol pa'i stobs chen ltar//de nyid rig pa nyid du sbyor//lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni//gang smra brjid du 'dren pa yi//yan lag kho nar shes par gyis//zhes gsang
301b6(rgyud): ba pa'i bdag pos de skad ces smras pas/lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams thams cad la glang du smra ba'i sgo yangasu 'byed par
301b7(rgyud): gyur to////sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen pa las yongasu 'dren pa'i yan lag rnams par gros pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o//
302a1(rgyud): de nas yung gsang ba pa'i bdag po des sems dpa' chen po lang ka'i bdag po de la nges par bos te rnam par smras pa/lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta
302a2(rgyud): ste//gang du nges pa'i yan lag ni//gang la gang gis gang brjod pa//'bral bzhi bshad sbyor brjod pa'i sgo//yongasu dag pa lha nge ba'i//gang la spyan ras gzigs dang /
302a3(rgyud): gis//mtha' thug med pa'i 'gro gang dag/'di na snod bzhi kho nar gzigs//zhen chags can dang log sbed can//rigs rgyud can dang blo gros can//thams cad
302a4(rgyud): bzhir snang ba ste//'dod khrid sbyor dang nges par snang //de dag ras 'ga' cha bzhi ste//gang du dgongs pa gang nges pa//ngo bo dmigs dang bcas pa las//bka' don gtan /
302a5(rgyud): tshigs rigs pa bzhir//snang dang mi 'gal rgyas 'thad sbyar//thams cad med rgyu btags chags pa//bsgrubs 'grub ji ltar bltas par snang //gang dag gang la
302a6(rgyud): brda phrab pas//gang gi don len nyid du nges//zhes nges po dam pa nyid du bgos pas dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad brda tsam gyis gang gi ngas
302a7(rgyud): brnyes par gyur to////sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las nges pa dam pa'i yan lag bgros pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o///
302b1(rgyud): do nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po des dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' chen po lang ka'i bdag po la yid yongasu 'jug pa'i thabs kyis byos te smras pa/lang ka'i bdag po
302b2(rgyud): yan lag gi/mthar zad rtogs 'jug thabs nyid ni//rang bzhin 'byung sgo dbang sbyor dang //nges pa khong du chud ba yis//yang dag don la ngas gzhag bya//shes dang
302b3(rgyud): 'jug dang 'bras bu dang //lhun gyis grub pa'i mtshan nyid yin//de 'brel de dgos de mtshon dgos//de yi rjesu byed dgos yin//thos chungad dgoms dang nges par gyur//
302b4(rgyud): byi mthong zhugs dang thob pa yin//dro tshol de rnyed 'jug mngon gyur//bsnyen pa nye bsnyen bsgrub dang 'grub//de bzhin mnyam 'gyur rnal 'byor par//lhun grub la su rung
302b5(rgyud): ba'o//de ni nges par 'jug rims yin//gzhan gyi don du 'byung rims bzhi//g.yo dang cho 'brel snang mdzad pa'o//ji ltar rims bzhin spa ba yin//de shes dri ma skyes
302b6(rgyud): par shes//de dus dngos med shes pa dang //ye nas shes pa'i rim bzhino//thams cad mnyam nyid de nyid dang //bsgrub dang mi 'da' spyod 'thun rdzas//rang bzhin rnam pa
302b7(rgyud): sngar snang ba'o//gang mkhas che dang mang yas yangs//bsgyur dang rlabs chen cir ston dang //kun shong kun spyod pa der 'jug pa'o//bcom dang zhi dang mtha' rgyas dang//drung/
303a1(rgyud): par 'dus pa las bzhi'o//gang du sbyor ba'i yan lag 'dis//yan lag thams cad rdzogs pa yin//lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni yan lag yin
303a2(rgyud): te/yan lag des gang ltar brjod pa thams cad rnam par 'byed par shes par bya'o//de skad ces gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pas/dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams
303a3(rgyud): chos thams cad khong du chud par gyur to//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las 'jug pa thabs kyi yan lag las thabs rnam par 'grel pa'i le'u
303a4(rgyud): ste lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o////de nas yang lang ka'i bdag pos gsang ba pa'i bdag po la dris pa/kye gsang ba'i bdag po mdo yongasu dgrol ba zhes bgyi ba ji
303a5(rgyud): ltar lag/de skad ces dris pa las/gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/lang ka'i bdag po mdo 'di ni 'di ltar gang du gang ltar brjod pa thams cad mdo bzhi po 'di dag kho
303a6(rgyud): nar zad do//lang ka'i bdag po bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gang thos pas nges par 'byung ba dang gang gis mthong bas nges par 'byung ba dang /gang gis mngon sum par
303a7(rgyud): 'byung ba dang //gang nas gang du nges par 'byung ba med pa'o//lang ka'i bdag po de la gang thos pas nges par 'byung ba ni/kun gyi rang bzhin de bzhin nyid/gang gis
303b1(rgyud): thos pa de nyid du//dngos po med par kun khyab rgyas//de shes de bzhin nyid du chub//lang kwa'i bdag po gang gis mthong ba nges par 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/gang gis de bzhin do
303b2(rgyud): mthong na//mthong bas snang srid yengasu dag/gang la'ang nyam nga yod ma yin//de bzhin nyid der kun sangs rgyas//lang ka'i bdag po gang gis mngon sum par nges par 'byung ba ni//
303b3(rgyud): 'di lta ste/gang gis stong nyid de shes pa//der ni thams cad mngon sum du//stong pa nyid du nges par zad//de nyid mngon sum sangs rgyas yin//lang ka'i bdag po gang nas
303b4(rgyud): gang du nges par 'byung ba med pa ni 'di lta ste/thams cad de bzhin nyid dbyingasu//ye nas rnam rtog med sangs rgyas//gdod sangs rgyasu ga la yod//de bzhin de nyid kho na'o///
303b5(rgyud): lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni mdo ste/gang gis gang la gang ltar brjod pa mtha' yas pa mdo bzhi po de dag 'ba' shig kho nar zad do//de dag ni gang gi mdud pa rnam par 'grol
303b6(rgyud): pa ste chos thams cad rnam par grol cing rgya cher 'grel pa nyid du shes par bya'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag pos de skad ces smras pas dman pa'i lus kyi
303b7(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams phyogs thams cad gsel bar yongasu chub par gyur to////sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las mdo rgya cher
304a1(rgyud): 'brel pa'o le'u skye lnga bcu rtsa gsum pan//de nas yung la dka'i mnga' bdag byang chub sems dpa' snyoms dpa' chen po ngas gsang nga
304a2(rgyud): par de dag po de lta rtsa ba'i dri ba yongasu dris pa/kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang gi rtsa ba ni gang /nges par 'byin pa ni dang /gsang ba pa'i bdag po go dbye bar gsol/
304a3(rgyud): slu ba'i se shin tu po da bar gas la//de skad ces smras pa las//gsang ba ba'i bden kyi ma smras pa/long ka'i bden pa gang gi rtsa badri badzin leg so//shi
304a4(rgyud): yig so//dertsub ni ma long dang /myi mthun pa dang /nges pa'o//lang ka'i bdag pa ma 'dzin 'di ltar na mkha'i chos 'thun pa'i dpe nye bar bzung ba ste/nam 'a
304a5(rgyud): sna bde ltar gang zhes nges pa yang de sbyar m+b+ha//ling ka'i bdag khyod la na mkha' ga zhe na/'di lta ste/rang bzhin gcig pa dang /rmugs pa dang /go 'byed pa dang /
304a6(rgyud): skye ba med pa dang /'jig pa med pa dang /dbyibs med pa dang // dog med pa dang /'dus pa byas pa dang /gzung ba med pa dang /'dzin pa med pa dang /mtha' med pa dang
304a7(rgyud): dbus med pa dang /'phel ba med pa dang /'brid pa med pa dang /'gro ba med pa dang /'ang ba zad pa dang /gis pa med pa dang /'phrul ba med pa dang /chags pa med
304b1(rgyud): dang /gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa dang /stongs pa med pa dang /'gyur ba med pa dang /ma khyab pa med pa dang /mi 'byung ba med pa dang /ma chub pa med pa dang /
304b2(rgyud): skyo ba med pa dang /nub pa med pa dang /mtshan nyid med pa dang /rgyu med pa dang /rkyen med pa dang /'bras bu med pa dang /rtsol ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du byed pa med pa yino///
304b3(rgyud): long ka'i bdag po na mkha' ni yod pa las med par gyur pa ma yin/med pa lngas yod par gyur pa ma yin/de bzhin du gsal ba las mi gsal bar gyur pa dang /mi gsal
304b4(rgyud): ba las gsal bar gyur pa dang /tha dad pa las gi rig tu gyur pa dang /gcig pa las tha dad du gyur pa dang /yin pa las min par gyur pa dang /min pa las yin par gyur pa
304b5(rgyud): dang /nye bar las ring bar gyur pa dang /rang ba las nye bar gyur pa dang /de bzhin du che ba dang /chung bar gyur pa dang /bzang ba dang /ngan par gyur pa dang /bde ba dang /sdug
304b6(rgyud): bsngal bar gyur pa dang /khyab pa dang /ma khyab par gyur pa dang /'byung ba dang /mi 'byung bar gyur pa dang /dag pa dang /ma dag par gyur pa dang /grub pa dang /ma grub par
304b7(rgyud): gyur pa dang /mtho ba dang /dma' bar gyur pa dang /yangs pa dang /dog par gyur pa dang /dbyibs dang /dbyibs med par gyur pa dang /kha dog dang /kha dog med par
305a1(rgyud): gyur pa dang /phyi dang nang du gyur pa dang /skye ba dang 'gag par gyur pa dang /'pho ba dang /mi 'pho bar gyur pa dang /'gyur ba dang /mi 'gyur bar
305a2(rgyud): gyur pa dang /mun pa dang /snang bar gyur pa dang /sngon dang /phyi mar gyur pa dang /mtha' dang /dbus su gyur pa dang /bdug dang /gzhan du gyur pa dang /de bzhin du
305a3(rgyud): blangs nas dor bar gyur pa dang /dor ba las blangs par gyur pa med pa'i phyir na mkha' ni thams cad nas thams cad du ma bcos pa'o//de bzhin du 'di nyid kyang sbyar te/
305a4(rgyud): de'i phyir ma bcos pa'o//lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste/dper na na mkha' ni sus kyang ma byas/byed pa po med/rgyu las ma byung /rkyen las ma bskyed/dang por ma skyes
305a5(rgyud): tha mar mi 'jig/thog ma dang tha mar mi du mig/thob pa dang /ma thob pa med/re ba dang brtsalnga ba med do//de'i phyir na mkha'i ni sus kyang ma byas/byas pa med pos gnyen po med do//
305a6(rgyud): de bzhin du de nyid kyang byed pa med pa'i phyir mi byas pas gnyen po med//lAng ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste//gang zhig na mkha'i mtha' tshol ba//tshol bas rnyed par mi 'gyur
305a7(rgyud): te//sgo skabs yod par gang shes pa//de ni na mkha' rnyed pa'o//sems kyi sems nyid rtsad gcod pa//rtsa ba med pas rnyed ma yin//gzhi rtsa med 'byung gang shes pa//
305b1(rgyud): de ni sems nyid rnyed pa'o//sems kyis sems brtsal sems mi rnyed//su zhig sems kyi gting rtsa tshol//gang zhig sems kyi dbus mtha' 'byed//brtsal bas rnyed pa ga la
305b2(rgyud): yin//sems kyis sems la ji ltar mtshon//sems la dngos po yod ce 'am//sems kyi dngos po gang gi bya//dngos med dngos sprul byang chub sems//phyogs bral/
305b3(rgyud): chen po gang su zhig/phyogs gcig bral bas phyogs kun bral//brtags pa'i spyod yul las 'das pa//de nyid rtogs na de kho na//sems kyis sems btsal d+hod cig rnyed//
305b4(rgyud): drod de rnyed na byang chub sems//ci yang yin no gang yang rung //de nyid chos kyi don po mchog/des na 'khor ba'i chos nyid 'di//gnyisu yod pa ma yin te//'khor ba'i de//
305b5(rgyud): bzhin nyid de ni//chos nyid yin par lung du bstan//'khor bar 'khrul pa'i sgyu ma dang //rnam dag rnam byang sgyu ma gnyis//sems can sangs rgyas tha dad kyang //de bzhin nyid/
305b6(rgyud): las yong ye med//dper na ras snam rgyu gcig las//tshon gyi rkyen gyis bsgyur byos na//kha dog sna tshogs tha dad kyang //ras sngam nyid las ga lnga yod//log rtog yang dag
305b7(rgyud): rtog smin pa//sems can ye shes can 'di dag/rgyu gcig rkyen gyis bsgyur bi los//rig dang ma rig gnyisu snang //'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rmi 'dra ba//dbugs chen phyin nas
306a1(rgyud): rmi sangs ltar//thams cad bde chen byang chub sems//mkha' ltar khyab bdal nyid du snang //glo bur las zhes brtags pa kun//'dus byas yin tu ma
306a2(rgyud): skyes pas//de bzhin nyid des khyab bdal chub//brtsal med ye shes rang 'byung che///bam po brgyad par zug pa'o//lang ka'i bdag po 'di nyid ni//yin
306a3(rgyud): popar nges pa'i rtsa ba bdun//de brtag de nyid de rtogs na//de nyid rnam par nges pa yin//gling dang ri bo mu khyud bcas//lhun po'i rtse mo nyid nas gsal//de rnyed theg pa'i rnam
306a4(rgyud): byubyangs kun//de nyid chen po nyid mthong gsal//'jig rten 'od kyi rgyal po ni//gzi ldan gsal ba'i nyi ma yin//chos kun yongasu rdzogs gsal ba//kun snang chen
306a5(rgyud): pobo de nyid do//go spobs chen po ni mkha' ni//chen po bzhi yi glo 'byung ltar//gsang nyid 'dus pa de nyid kyis//brjod pa'i brjod kun gsal bar 'brel//gang gis bka' mi
306a6(rgyud): gsang thob na//mi gang gzhan la rag ma lus//gsang ba'i snying po kun chub na//sgra brjod gang la'ang brtsal mi dgos//rgyun dang bcas pa'i 'byung ba rnams//na mkha'i
306a7(rgyud): ngang las 'byung zhing snang //de bzhin sgra brjod 'byung ba rnams//de nyid zab mo'i dbyings nas 'byung //don du bya ba'i rnam grangs kun//mthar gyis 'bras bu grub par
306b1(rgyud): /sdud//grangs mang rgya tshor brjod mod kyang //de kun de bzhin nyid du 'dus//me long gsal ba'i snying po ni//bzhin gyi bu zugs brgyan ston pa ltar//de nyid chos kyi mo long gas//
306b2(rgyud): kwin gyis rang bzhin gsal bar byed//kun gyi rtse ba rang byung bas//rang bzhin cis kyang ma bcos pa'o//kun shes rig pa mi nub pas//'od gsal sdud pas phyogs kur
306b3(rgyud): mthong //thams cad de nyid der 'dus pas//dngos med ngo bo nyid du zad//de bzhin nyid du kun gcig pas//gnyis bya ba'i tha snyad med//rgyu nyid 'bras bu ri ye rdzogs pas/
306b4(rgyud): dogs gnyis bral de kho na//dor bar bya ba'i dngos med pas//blang bar bya ba ga la yod//mthong zing sbyangs zin byas pa zin//'dod pa grub zin spyom pa zin//de bzhin dngos/
306b5(rgyud): po grub zin pas//de nyid rnyed pa nyid las byung //kun brtags kun nyid dpon na snang //kun la sbyor bas don byed nus//the tshom chad pas 'thun par snong //mdor na gsum nyid
306b6(rgyud): kho na la//lang na gnyis nyid kho nar zad//nges par gcig las med pa yi ni//thams cad 'dir 'dus 'di las byung //kun gyi rtsa ba 'di shes ni//kun kyang ma bcos
306b7(rgyud): bzhin pa//de bzhin nyid do kun gyi mdo//sgyu mar kun snang dngos gzhi med//chags pa med pas yid mi 'khrul//na mkha'i ngang la rang bzhin med//brtag tu med pas
307a1(rgyud): dngos dang bral//snying po nyid las gzhan pa med//sna tshogs dag gi rgyun tu 'an//sgron mar snang bsdu mun pa sel//yid bzhin nur bu nyid las byung //
307a2(rgyud): skye 'gag med pas 'jigs dang bral//cir yang ma nges nyam mi ngo //chub ni bya brtsal kun dang bral//pho bo'i yul ni bgrod pa med//de nyid chen po'i tshig ra re re//rgyal
307a3(rgyud): bo kun gyi dgongs pa rgyud//gzhan du rtsa ba gsum bcad kyang //gsang ba'i don nyid nyid las 'byung //gang zhig gzhan du gang tshol ba//de ni gol ba'i lam du zhugs//rnam
307a4(rgyud): rtog mun pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs//gang ma rig pa de bsgribs yin//rnam par rtog pa de nyid bgegs//bgegs ni de nyid de las byung //gang la rnam rtog ma byung na//bdud ces bya
307a5(rgyud): bra ga la yod//bdud ni gang las byung zhe na//rtag tu 'grus las byung ba yin//'grus med nyid las bdud mi 'byung //ci phyir mi 'grus de nyid bdud//de bzhin skyon dang gom/
307a6(rgyud): sgrib ni//yon tan mnyam du mthong las 'byung //gal te yon tan mnyam mthong med//skyon dang grol sgrib ga la yod//de nyid skyon dang gol sgrib yin//gang nyid mngon
307a7(rgyud): du ma gyur na//gsang ba'i don byung gang bsrel yang //nad pa sman srel thabs med bzhin//nges pa'i thabs med gnas ngan 'khyam//yul dang mtshan ma dngos po dang //
307b1(rgyud): dran rtog thos mthong ji snyed kun//yid la ji ltar 'gyus pa bzhin//de nyid skad cig de ltar snang //rtag pa mi gnas skyed cig mo//mi nub ma chags pa de chen sems//sems kyi
307b2(rgyud): dbyings las ma gtogs pa//gzhan zhes gang yang med pas na//gol sgrib bya ba ga la yod//su zhig gol sgrib don du gnyer//gang gis gol sgrib ji ltar rnyed//gol sgrib nyid
307b3(rgyud): kyang de nyid dbyings//brtsal bas de yang de la thug/gzhan du btsal zhing de las byung //bltas pas mthong ba rtogs pa med//'ja' snang mun khung ji bzhin no//de nyid
307b4(rgyud): mthong ba'i khyod par las//spyod lam dngos bzhi gang spyad kyang //'ching bar mi 'gyur 'gro la 'gyur thabs//thams cad der sbyangs lam gnas mchog/gang nyid don gyi
307b5(rgyud): rjes tshol zhing //gol sgrib yongasu gcod 'dod pa'i//mtha' sel rnal 'byor sems dpa' bya//gang la zhen pa'i phyogs gzung ste//dbus mtha' lta ba de bzung bas//
307b6(rgyud): cho ga'i nges blo brtan pa can//de kun rnal 'byor yin mod kyi//yang dag don la rnal mi 'byor//spyod lam rnal du 'byor mod kyi//yang dag don du yod ma 'byor//
307b7(rgyud): phyogasu lta la zhen mod kyi//dam pa'i don du yongs ma zhen//glo bur las ro cher mod kyi//chos nyid kyi ni ro mtshor//bdog med phyogs bral zer mod kyi//phyogasu lta dang
308a1(rgyud): yong ma bral//brtul zhugs rtog pa tshoms mod kyi//gzung 'dzin rtog pa yong mchoms//dbus mthar rtog pa'i rnal 'byor pa//brjod pa tshig
308a2(rgyud): lam sgron ma yis//yang dag dbu ma'i gser tshol ba//rtog 'dod spre'u 'di gzung byas nas//rkun mo byi la gdags par bya//gser khu skar khung kun bkag ste
308a3(rgyud): re'u cha pang phung bshig nas ni//rgyal po'i dkor mdzod kha phye na//de dag longs spyod rdzogs bdag po//yong dag dbu ma'i lam tshol ba//rtog pa'i skyon lnga spang bar bya//
308a4(rgyud): rtog pa rigs bya'i ri ba dang //mtshan ma rgyu ba tshe ru ba dang //byung tshor 'byung ba rnam pa lnga//de yang 'di ltar rtog par byed//rtog pa la yang gnyis yod de//rags
308a5(rgyud): pA dang ni phra ba'o//de bzhin mtshan mu che chung gnyis//rgyu ba ring po thung ngu gnyis//tshor ba gsal ba mi gsal ba//byung tshur myur ba bul ba'o//'di ni don la sgrib pa
308a6(rgyud): yi//rtog pa chen po bgegs chen yin//ci phyir dbus nyid mi mthong byir//mun pa dang ni 'khrigs pa dang //kun tu 'thibs dang sprin phung dang //na bun lta bur sgribs
308a7(rgyud): pa yis//dpung nyid mi gsal mthong mi 'gyur//'di yang rnam pa gnyis gnyis te//mun pa mun nag chen po dang //kun nas 'thobs pa lta bu ste//yongs su
308b1(rgyud): 'khrigs dang bsgribs pa dang //'thibs pa chen po chung ngu gnyis//skyon chen 'thibs dang 'al 'ol dang //na bun gtams blun bun gnyis//gnas ngan gsum dang byad snang
308b2(rgyud): gnas//'dod pa bzhi yis bde gnas dang //bsam gtan gnas dang rgyun bzhi gnas//nyan thos rang rgyal sems dpar lhung //sgrib par gyur pa'i mun nag ni//mtshan
308b3(rgyud): ma'i g.yeng ba drug tu gnas//rang bzhin phyi nang mtshan ma dang //yid la byed dang gnas ngan len//'di dag rab tu gsal bar 'dod//gang tu dbu ma nyid lta che//dbu
308b4(rgyud): ma'i lam la sgrib pa'i skyon//rnam pa lnga byung gang sgrib pa//byung tshor bying rmugs 'dzin chags dang //ther zug phyal ba'i dbang gis ni//g.yang dang 'thebs dang 'gog
308b5(rgyud): pa dang //rtag tu med pa kho na yin//'di dag dbu mo'i skyon yin zhes//dbu mar sems dpa'i rnal 'byor 'dod//dbu ma nges pa'i lam tshol ba//dgon pa'i rgyun tu dben
308b6(rgyud): bzung ste//tshad ma gnyis kyis gzhal ba'i blos//rnam par rtog pa'i rjes gcod pa//yod med sngon rtog gang las byung //brtags pas rtog pa rtas las 'byung //
308b7(rgyud): rtog pa'i ri bo zhi bar 'gyur//des ni gnas ngan gsum du min//rtog pa gang las byung zhe na//mtshan ma nyid las byung ba yin//mtshan ma sgyu mar rab shes na//
309a1(rgyud): mtshan ma'i chos rnams zhi bar 'gyur//dus ni 'dod khams tha mar min+da//mtshan ma de yang ji ltar na//de yang 'byung ba dag las byung //dran pa/
309a2(rgyud): skyon dang zhir shes na//rgyu ba'i skyon rnams sel bar byed//'dod khams gnyis par de dag min//rgyu ba de yang gang de bzhin//de yang de ltar byung ba yin//de nyid de/
309a3(rgyud): ra shes rgyur na//skyon gyi tshur byi sel bar byed//'dod khams gsum po de yang min//de nyid de ltar der bcad na//gang de nang nyid khon//de nyid skyon du rab shes ma
309a4(rgyud): 'gug dang sto ba ga la yod//de ni 'dod khams bzhi par min//de yang gang las skye mched na//sems kyi chos lngas gyur pa ste//sems nyid rgyu mar ros shes ni//sems
309a5(rgyud): kyi chos rnams zhi bar 'gyur//phung po gzugs brnyan 'dra ba la//sems ni smig rgyu lta bur 'dod//yod med gnyis kyi mtha' las grol//de shes 'dod khams lnga par
309a6(rgyud): min//de sems yod pa'i dngos po 'am//maud ces bya bar mi blta bste//yu~M mtshan can du ltung mi 'gyur//byang rmugs can du ma gyur pas//bsam gtan ston
309a7(rgyud): du de mi 'gyur//'du shes rjesu ma 'brangs pas//sems can gnas su de yong min//kun 'byung kun gzhi nyid mthong bas//zhi ba'i gan su yongs ma yin//ni btsun
309b1(rgyud): bar mi lta bas//rAng rgyal gan su'ang ga la yin//rnam rig tsam du'ang min pas na//sems dpa' de yang der ma yin//stong nyid mnyam pa'i dbu ma la//so so tha dad dbyar
309b2(rgyud): med pas//sa yi rim pa sbyong ma yin//phyogs lta mthar 'das dbu ma nyid//rang bzhin med pa de nyid la//sems nyid kyi na 'da' skad cig mas//mi g.yo rgyun du dran par bya//
309b3(rgyud): de ltar de la mnyam gzhag no//rtags kyi tshor ba 'di ltar 'byung //drod dang rtags dang cho 'phrul dang //mngon par dang ni ye shes 'byung //drod ni g.yo dang thob pa dang //rtags
309b4(rgyud): ni 'byung dang brtan pa dang //cho 'phrul 'byung dang rdzogs pa dang //gang du rig pa thams cad gsal//der ni don rnams rdzogs pa yin//dper na mun pa sangs pa dang //snang
309b5(rgyud): ba byung dang na mkha' dang //kun du mthong dang thams cad gsal//des na de yi khyab par gyis//gang du chags pa'i mun bsal te//ji ltar rlung gis sprin phyags star//skad
309b6(rgyud): cig tsamaM gyi rnal 'byor gyis//mun pa'i khams de 'phyags par 'gyur//ji ltar mar mes mun gsal na//de nyid snang bar gyur pa bzhin//skad cig ma yin de rig na//
309b7(rgyud): sngon nas zhen pa'i mun pa sel//de gang rig pa de dag ni//de nyid de yi sgo phye zhing //de bzhin mig dang de ldan pas//mthong thos tshig la ma le'u bzhir sdebs//sa pa
310a1(rgyud): yin pas sa sa/dus mgu dang ma ldanan//mum la sa pasas rgyas//del bskyed cog rjod kyang //ngas pa ngas kya mon rba//
310a2(rgyud): byed//tshig phyir blo 'brangs dmu da dag/bskyab pa'i sa dang lam ma yin//tshig la mya 'bum phrag ni brjod kyang //gzhan la smra bar bya ma yin//gal te gang zhig gang
310a3(rgyud): spyo ba//log smar rje dka' rkun po/bar med rdo rje de ltung 'gyur//dor skyes tshul 'chos mkhan dag gis//nges pa'i blo shes ma bya bor/tshig lam yi gas khrid
310a4(rgyud): nas ni//gang maM nges par lom brjod na//srog chags kun gyi srog 'phrogs pa//ma des chos sgra de bas ste//des na mtha' dbus mnyam nyid la//bahud de jig ra
310a5(rgyud): dru jug pa//la 'byor g+hunas smin nga \u0f88\u0f90 dang // 'gro yid da myed pa dang //nam nya na mnyam pa'i khyam sas//de la btsun de dan//ma ga
310a6(rgyud): TI snang //de las de bzhin ma goms ni//phreng khyer snang bar de mi'o//de la ng+ge ltar blanA gas na//snang ba med pa ga la 'bru/de nyid mengon du gyur bas ni/
310a7(rgyud): zhi ba'i gnas de dag min//mad dang med pa'i mtha' 'dzin//mtha' las 'das pa'i rnal 'byor nyid//dang 'dir nges pa dam pa'i shes//gang dag 'di ltar dpa
310b1(rgyud): //bong la ri dgos med pa yi//gol slob nyid du nges par snang //ts+tshi phyir dbus mtha' 'byed pas na//dbus yod mtha' yang rang bzhon 'byung //dbus mod mtha' yang ngang gis//
310b2(rgyud): med/dbus mtha' 'byed pa de nyid nang //mtha'i dring dbus brel de kho na//mi gnas mi lon mi 'byed cing //ci yang ma yin mthong zos med//ci yang ma 'byed bya dang bral//
310b3(rgyud): snang med snang ba'i tha snod bral//bsam du med pa'i chos nyid ni//mi bsam de bzhin nyid du gzhago//bsam gyis mi khyab ches rnams kun//bsam med de bzhin nyid las med
310b4(rgyud): saM dang rnami thar las sogs pa//chos sku byang chub dkar po'i phyogs//kun kyang bsam du med pa yi//gol skyibs chen por gyur pa yin//'da' dka' chen po'i dka'
310b5(rgyud): thub na//ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na//dpog med rgyal ba 'da' bar dkal//gang gzugs med lngas gang 'dzin gol//bdal khyab chen po'i sa 'di ni//ye nas ma bgrod rang
310b6(rgyud): bzhin bkod//sa 'dir ma chub gang yang med//gang 'diras bkod gang bgrod gol//de bzhin de rig yo 'byung la//khyad par rim par 'byung 'dod gang //gang 'dir rmongs pa
310b7(rgyud): kho na'o//rang byung de las nges par grol//bsam yul dmigasu med pa la//btang snyoms chen po'i rnal 'byor pa//ji bzhin pa nyid yin bzhin du//lus dben sems
311a1(rgyud): 'chos gol sar zhugs//kun grol chen po de nyid la//bcings grol med par nges bzhin du//gang 'dir bka' thub rtog pas bcings//rnal grol /
311a2(rgyud): po nyid las gol//ye nas ma bcos nyid kho nar//gang gnas de nyid de kho na//de la gol sa ga la yod//gol sgribs nyid kyang de kho na//de skad ces bgros pas lang ka'i/
311a3(rgyud): bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams gang gi bcings pa las yongasu grol te re rtsol gyi the tshom chad par gyur to//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa
311a4(rgyud): 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las chos thams cad kyi me ldong bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o///de nas lang ka'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' sems
311a5(rgyud): dpa' chen po des/gsung ba pa'i bdag po la gang gi rtsa ba dri ba yongasu dris pa/kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po chos thams cad kyi rtsu ba zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/de ji
311a6(rgyud): ltar yongasu shes par gyi/de skad ces dris pa las/gasdang ba'i bdag pos smras pa/kye lang ka'i bdag po gang du dri ba dam pa 'di ni legasaso//shin tu rab tu legaso//
311a7(rgyud): gang chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba zhes bya ba de ni rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems la bya'o//de ni 'di ltar yongasu shes par bya ste/sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi chos nyid dang /sems
311b1(rgyud): non kun gyi sems kyi chos nyid du shes par bya'o//de ni mun snad gnyis snang yin te/lang ka'i bdag po de yang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de gsong
311b2(rgyud): ba'i gnas pad mo can zhes bya ba gtsug tor 'khor lo sbyar ba'i sprul pa'i lhums/gsang ba mchog gi pho brang na skad cig bzhugs pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/gang skyes bu dam
311b3(rgyud): pa dpag tu med pa dag de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa'i the tshom gcod pa dang /yongasu zhu ba dang /zhu bar ldog pa dang /the tsom chad nas slar dong ba dang /gang kho bo 'khor der
311b4(rgyud): 'dus par gyur par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba de ma mthong
311b5(rgyud): ma dmigs lags//yang dag par ma rnyed nges par ma 'tshal ba lag so//bgyod pas ma khyab lags na 'di gang ni mchis/gang du brtsal/gang zhig lcags/gang la
311b6(rgyud): bgyi/gang du stor/bcom ldan 'das dus kyi skad cig ma 'di nyid du bstan du gsol/bde bar gshegs pa 'di bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa las/bcom ldan 'das
311b7(rgyud): des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying po zhes bya ba chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba de ni sgrib pas ma mthong /med pas ma dmigs/zab pas ma
312a1(rgyud): rnyed dka' bus ma shes/myur bas ma slebs/yangs pas ma khyab pa yin te/'di mun pa'i khams na yod/grang khyer gsum du btsal//
312a2(rgyud): 'dri yan lag dang mdo dang rtsa ba yin/ngo bo de kho na nyid la bya/mun pa'i kham su stor/sems dpa' chen po de lta bas na mun pa 'di bsel ba'i phyir 'di'i rang
312a3(rgyud): bzhin la mkhas par bya'o//de bzhin du ngo bo dang /mtshan nyid dang /yan lag dang /ji srid pa'i yun dang /las dang /mun pa'i rnam grangs dang /de ba la sogs
312a4(rgyud): dang /bsal ba'i thabs rnams la mkhas par bya'o//'di la nan tan du bya'o//gang mun pa'i khams pa dag dang /chu gcig tu shes bya'o//de skad ces bka'
312a5(rgyud): stsal pa dang /kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das mun po 'di ci las byung /mun pa 'di yi rang bzhin ci/mun pa 'di yi ngo bo gang /mun pa
312a6(rgyud): 'di yi mtshan nyid ci/mun pa 'di yi yan lag tu/mun pa 'di yi rtsa ba gang /mun pa 'di ji srid cig gu nas/mun pa 'dri ci la sgribA/mun pa 'di'i bye brag
312a7(rgyud): du/mun pa 'di gang dang 'thun/mun pa 'di gang du 'thibs/mun pa 'di gang gis sol/mun pa zhes ci'i phyir bgyi/'di ci phyir 'thibs dra ba gang du 'dus
312b1(rgyud): 'di bshad du gsol/bde bar gshegs pa 'di bshad du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/sems dpa' chen po mun pa dang
312b2(rgyud): snang bas sdug pa'i chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni bzhi dang rtsa ba med par 'dus par shes par bya'o//de ltar ston pa'i mdo ni 'di lta ste/sangs rgyas byang chub 'byung ba yi//bskyed
312b3(rgyud): cing snying po de nyid de//pad mo khwa 'bus snying po ltar//rtsa ba 'khor ba'i dman pa yod//rtsa ba thams cad 'byung ba yin//rtsa ba med pa'i rtsa ba ni//chos rnams kun bya
312b4(rgyud): rtsa ba yin//khams gsum 'di dag nyid du 'dus//chos 'di zab ste mthong bar dka'//rtogs par yang ni mi nus te//mthar phyin sa la gnas pa yin//skyes bus kyang
312b5(rgyud): ni mthong ma yin//med pas stong pa'i chos nyid 'di//yod pa'i dngos por yod mi dmigs//dmigs dang mi dmigs tshig lam chad//rnam par mi rtog skyo bar med//
312b6(rgyud): gsal bas dus mtha' med bai ru//ma lus khyab par kun btsal yang //'di zhes bya ba'i dngos po zhig/mi rnyed rnyed par mi 'gyu ro//mkhas pas dus mtha' med
312b7(rgyud): pa ru//shin du bsgrims te cir brtags kyang //gang 'dir ci yang mthor ba med//mgyogs pas dus mtha' med bai ru//nyams thag chad pas brgyugs kyang ni/
313a1(rgyud): nga dung de nyid dbyings 'di las//gar yang ma phyin phyin pa med//skye med chos kyi sdong po la//rnam par bzhi yi yan lag gal//byang chub bla med
313a2(rgyud): snying por smin//de ni kun 'byung byang chub shing //'jug pa don la 'dod pa'i khams//mngon med 'dzin pa gzugs khamaso//snang med ma chad gzugs med nyid//
313a3(rgyud): gang de ched las byed las 'gyur//yul du gang 'gyur 'jug pa nyid//gang la 'jug pa de rnams shes//de yul mun pa'i khams gyur kyang //mun pa'i khams na
313a4(rgyud): de nyid snang //snang dang snang ba'i 'od byung ba//skye 'byung rtsa bI snying po nyid//phyogs rig nges mi rig pa yi//ngo bo nyid med de nyid do//mun khung gser sbyor ji bzhin du//
313a5(rgyud): 'khor ba mun pa'i mun nag tu//rin chen gsor dang 'dra ba yi//byang chub sems 'di sbyor bar gyur//mun pa'i khamasu gyur pa dag/mun pa'i 'du shes nyid du 'byung //
313a6(rgyud): mun pa'i khams pas gang shes pa//phra mo'i cha shas tsam yan chad//gang 'di blo chung byis pa rnams//ched du gleng zhing grang brjod pa//blo ldan kun la 'di brjod kyi//
313a7(rgyud): blun po'i ched du shes par gyis//'di yang 'di ltar yongasu snang //yan lag mdo dang rtsa ba ste//'byed dang 'gro la dang 'byin pa yin//yan lag drug tu gang grags//
313b1(rgyud): pa//mthong thos tshor myong reg gshes drug/'byung 'jug gcod pa'i yan lag yin//lang ka'i badrag po mdo bzhi ni gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gzhi'i mdo dang /dmyigs
313b2(rgyud): pa'i mdo dang /snang ba'i mdo dang /'jug pa'i mdo'o//de yang 'di ltar/mdo bzhi gzhig dang dmigs pa dang //snang dang 'jug pa lung bzhin bshad//lang ka'o bdag
313b3(rgyud): po de la bzhi'i mdo ni 'di lta ste/bzhi ni byis pa 'di ltar 'dod//gzugs med ming la mngon zhen pa//med pa'i khams nyid de kho na//shes pa kun gyi ngo bor 'byung //shes
313b4(rgyud): bya nyid de yul du snang //thams cad 'byung bar byed pa'i rgyu//ye nas ngang gis ma skyes la//mya bcos yod gis 'od gsal ba//rgyu rkyen med pas 'dus ma byas//yongasu
313b5(rgyud): ma chad yul kun la//shes la mi gsal lhan cig 'byung //khyab 'jug btang snyoms dngos med nyid//rnam par mi rtag dpyod dang bral//mi rtog de yi de nyid la//
313b6(rgyud): skad cig lnga phyi ji snyed pa//rgyun dang bcas pa'i chu bo bzhis//rgyun 'byung skye 'ogag bcas pa'o//gcig tu chad pa med pa yi//so so ris ltar mi snang bya//bye bras
313b7(rgyud): rnam par 'byed pa ni//'di dang 'di zhes ga la yod//tha snyad ginyis kyi bsngos pa'i chos//thams cad thams cad pa nyid de//kun 'bro kun 'jug kun la sbyor//dngos rig
314a1(rgyud): sna tshogs dbyer mi rig/g.yo ba nyid dang rnam par bkod//yongs myong gcod dang de 'dzin byed//lnga ldan mdun du ldan pa lnga//de ni kun tu so mas/
314a2(rgyud): pa yin//gang zhe na de 'dzin kun mi gtong //go skabs yod pa'i na mkha' ltar//chos kun gnas 'byung go yod pa//skyed smin srog dang len pa yin//rkyen ni gnyis
314a3(rgyud): dang mi ldan te//ma nges de nyid kho na la//thams cad du ni gnas pa yin//rkyen ni gang phred de nyid du'o//chos rnams rtse bar gcig pA la//de rgyun dbang gi rnam par
314a4(rgyud): gnyis//gzhi dang rten zhes grags pa la//rmongs dang shes pa'i khyad par snang //gzhi la kun 'gro kun la rmongs//rnam pa zhen pa'i blta gnas med//rkyen ni bzhi
314a5(rgyud): sbyor snang ba dang //'gyur med rnam dgra brtsal med gnas//de dag re zhing rgyu 'bras gnyis//snga ma snga ma gang dag gang //phyin ma phyin ma smin pa'i rgyu//de bzhin
314a6(rgyud): du 'khor bar 'byung //rten lnga de rgyun de dbang gis//rnal 'byor lngar snang gi nyen po lnga//smin pa'i dpe lnga sbyor dpe bzhin//skabs lnga lam lnga de bzhin sa//lnga lnga
314a7(rgyud): nga sti gnas dus lnga dang //gnas lnga mthar phyin rnam pa lnga//'dir dbye ba las lnga bcu drug/rdzogs par snang bas lngar bshad do//chos rnams kun gyi bzhir gyur
314b1(rgyud): pas//nor ba'i rkyen gyis 'khor bar snang //rang bzhin ji ltar yin pa'i don//nges par mthong na mya ngan 'das//kun gyi bla zhi dang drang de shes//chos kyi phung po da gsum
314b2(rgyud): 'byung //de drung rtsa ba sna tshogs len//dbyings dang 'byung gnas rgyu zhes grags//stong pa nyid dang mtshan nyid med//de bzhin nyid de ma nor ba//ma bcos gzhan pa yon
314b3(rgyud): pa nyid//ting 'dzin rtog pa stong nyid grags//lhag mthong zhi gnas rnam par thar//dbu ma mtha' bral bzung ba med//'dzin med chad med rtag pa med//skye med 'gag med
314b4(rgyud): rtog pa med//rnam par rtog med mtshan ma med//de bzhin bdag med gzhan med pa//'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med//dri med 'du ba 'bral ba med//phung med khams med skye ma
314b5(rgyud): med//yul med las med rgyu 'bras med//ma skyes snying po byang chub med//sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems//de ni mi skye mi 'gag la//de ni nam mkha' lta bu'o//chos
314b6(rgyud): kye dbyangs nyid chos kyi sku//mi rtog ye shes yin zhes grags//ma byung ye nas rang bzhin snang //ji srid len pa'i srid pa dag/gang sangs gang dag byung 'gas pas//sdug
314b7(rgyud): bsngal de rgyun zang bsregs pas//'gyur ba'i skabs lngas nges par 'byung //gzugs med mthong med yong ma yin//yod pas mthong ba'i yul du gyur//
315a1(rgyud): med yul du ma gyur pa//yod ces bya bar gang gis//mu mthu' med par 'byung ba'i rgyu//dngos med gzhi rten ngo bo nyid//de bas tha dad sna rdzunas
315a2(rgyud): snang //dbyings 'di med na kun dang 'grul//gal te med pa gcig yod na//'dzin pa phyogs kyang de lta bas//nams kyang grol bar mi 'gyur te//'ching ba'i
315a3(rgyud): mdud pa don yod//gang zhig mur 'dzin mthar lta ba//des ni mu med don ma mthong //mur 'dzin mkha' la mthos 'jal 'dra//mu med nyid la grol bar bshad/
315a4(rgyud): mur 'dzin grol 'dod grol ma yin//byed ma bskyod kyang 'brur ma rmin//shIl sgong bsgyur yang gting mi 'gyur//'ching bu bsgyur yang rin chen min//sa rdo bsres kyang
315a5(rgyud): 'drar mi rung //glog 'grus gzhi la mun pa med//mtshal ze zhun gcig mi srid skyes//bus pa nyid la mchod mi srid//chu bo snga bya rgyun mi 'brad//chos 'thun pa na rigs mthar yA/
315a6(rgyud): des na de bzhin nyid rjes bsngags//de nyid med na thams cad du//gang de lan yod gro la srid//de nyid med na rgyun bkag nas//ji srid cig na slar ldang ba//gang las
315a7(rgyud): byung de gang los min//gang med de med gnyis med na//gang las ldang ste gang mi 'gyur//de bzhin gang gis 'gags 'gyur na//skad cig ji srid de nas ldang //den
315b1(rgyud): de nyid kun gyi gzhi//lus dang dug sman ji bzhin no//'jug pa ljang ni rmi lAm 'dra//de ltar na 'di gcig pA 'am//'on te tha dad pa zhig yin//gcig dang tha dad ngo bo las/
315b2(rgyud): grol te dbyings sam kha dog ga mi//rnyodag chu'o ma'i chu bzhin no//de ni de nyid de brtsan nam//gal te de yi gzhi 'dri bocan//mi g.yo mi 'gyur g.yo dang 'gyur//ma byung ba
315b3(rgyud): dang de bzhin 'byung //na mkha' 'byung ba ji bzhin no//thog ma tha ma dus mi dmigs//ma nor ma bcas de bzhin nyid//rang bzhin kun tu snang ba'i dbyings//ma byung rang bzhin/
315b4(rgyud): ye nus gus la//gzhi 'am de rgyun zhes bya ba//shes rgyun thams cad skye 'byung ba'i//rtsa ba mthun can gzhir gzhag pa//sna tshogs 'brung rgyu de nyid do//dang ba'i mkha' la
315b5(rgyud): rgyu bri'i sprin//gser gyi grangs cim byung tshun chad//khug rlangs srin phung 'thibs zhes bya//'byung ba'i skad cig de sngon cad//dang ba'i mkha' nyid snang zhes bya//de bzhin de nyid de
315b6(rgyud): bzhir gzhag/mtshungs pa yin phyir dar snang ste//so so'i bye brag de tsa mo//de nyid de yi rgyu ba las//'jug pa'i tshogs rnams rtsal du snang //rtsi ba mthun chen 'phel 'gyur
315b7(rgyud): bas//gang dang gang du gang nyon mongs//mchin mar snang 'dzin g.yo 'bul bskyod//rang snang gang la de gsal rig/gang du lha dang gang 'dzin pa'i//de rgyun de las der 'di 'byung //
316a1(rgyud): gang tshor dang shes gang de shes//skrag cing dbang 'jigs dngos po nyid//me long me shel me 'byung gsum//gang dang phrad na de bzhin 'byung //
316a2(rgyud): me long mtsho rlabs rlabs chen gsum//ji srid de rgyun byung tshor rnams//de nyid rgyu yis rang bzhin lnga//me 'dzin de 'dzin 'dab 'dzin ltar//de nyid de yis de rgyun la//
316a3(rgyud): gang zhe na de 'dzin byed pa yin//ras dkar la sogs de dag ni//gang sgo'i dbang du de dag 'du'o//de nyid de yi rgyun de las//de yang de ltar snang ba yin//gnas pa de dag
316a4(rgyud): gang yin pa//der 'byung ba de nyid du'o//myur smin dus smin dus gnyis min//sa bon che chung 'phel 'grib de'o//sprin dang ling thog mun pa yis//rdzas gang mi mthong
316a5(rgyud): sgrib pa ltar//de'i rgyun 'khrigs mun pa yis//blta bya de nyid mthong ma yin//dang po gnyis dang phyi ma la//gsal dang 'gags dang tha dad snang //de nyid kun la 'gro ba'i
316a6(rgyud): phyir//gcig gis sna tshogs tha dad len//de nyid rtsal las 'jug pa drug/slar 'jug pa yang de nyid las//char rgyun smig rgyun ji bzhi no//mig nad dbang gis yul dag lA//
316a7(rgyud): tha dad ma yin ngo bo tsam//gang dang 'di gcig 'dres pa las//sgyu rtsal de 'byed de dag len//de nyid las byung de rnams 'byeng //gang 'dir sbyor zhing mi snang yang //gang gi
316b1(rgyud): dbang gis tha dad snang //de las de 'byung de nyid las//de bzhin de dag 'byung ba'o//dri nga'i dri 'byung gang gi dri//gang med gang la zhen pa ni//me 'dra mi gcig de nyid las//de nyid
316b2(rgyud): gzhan la de rgyun gzhan//gang gi ngo bo de gcig la//de yang gnas dang skabs kyis 'gyur//gang la bag chags rnam dag pa//dang bas thams cad gsal ba bzhin//gang gi rgyun
316b3(rgyud): sangs kun khyab rgyas//dbu ma rnam dag de nyid ces//mun pa'i spyod yul pa dag 'dzin//mun pa'ang de nyid de la 'byung //mun pa'i rang bzhin ngo bo dang //mtshan nyid yan lag
316b4(rgyud): rtsa ba dang //gnas dang sgrib pa bye brag chas//gang du gang gis gang phyir gang //de dag nges par dbye bar bya'o//lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni bzhi'i mdo zhes bya ste/gang mun
316b5(rgyud): pa'i spyod yul ba las kyis bsgyangs pa rnams la dgongs te mun pa'i chos rnams gsungs pa'o//lang ka'i bdag po de la dmigs pa'i mdo gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gzugs
316b6(rgyud): khams de 'dzin gnas gcig nyid//de 'dzin de nyid de la lta//de 'dzin der byed mun pa can//phyogs 'dzin phyogs med rnams dang gcig/ma nges spyir 'gro gnyis mi
316b7(rgyud): dmigs/sna tshogs med de bdag nyid 'dzin//dri med 'dzin med gzhan 'dra mod//de 'jug rten med khyab pa ro med//dus gsum dusu de 'dzin med//de 'dzin de la der
317a1(rgyud): 'dzin pas//gzugs min gnyis la chags khan so//lang ka' bdag po de la snang ba'i mdo gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'dod khams de 'jug de 'drang

317b1(rgyud): ga men//gsum pa rmongs byed dpa' byed rkyen//gang 'dir 'byung 'gyur dbang rten 'gyur//dbang po 'byung 'gyur rnam shes kyi//de dang cha mthun 'byung cha mthun//mnyam du

317b7(rgyud): lta bas brtan par gnas//gang 'di ro goms pa chung ba dang //rnam pa rtags dang mtshan ma dang //de byed yid nyams sogs 'gyur bas//yang dag blangs te der 'jug dang /
318a1(rgyud): sgribs dang gzhan gyis zin bu'o//lnga pa don rgyun chad byed pa//gsapa dang log pa'i stobs lhun dang //longs spyod 'thun pa'i glags rnyed dang //de dag
318a2(rgyud): rgyun mi 'chad 'gro dang //rgyun tu gcod ldog mi byed pa//log rgyun gnas byed don rgyun gcad//lnga gsum dang po mtshams sbyor ba//de las bzlog pa don rgyun ldan//banyis
318a3(rgyud): po nyid mtshams sbyor ba yi//'chi ba'i chos la gnyis yod de//dus dang dus ma yin de la//kha cig dus min 'chi ba yi//du rkyen zad dang de gzhan ma/ tshe yun ji rgyu yod kyi
318a4(rgyud): mun rig nA pi rkyen ma tshang //ya nga ma sbyangs las kyi rten//tshad las 'das dang mi 'phrod dang //gang ma sangs par gang non dang //rnying 'khrigs 'byin par mi byed dang //gang
318a5(rgyud): de 'gags par rgyun 'gog dang //so so'i gnyen po sten mi byed//ma goms 'thun 'phrod mi shes dang //dus min 'gro dang spyod pas nyen//de nas 'du shes gsum
318a6(rgyud): ldan te//don dang log pa btang snyoms ldan//don de gang ldan gang 'gro ba//sngon du de bsten de dran nas//gzhan gyis gsal bar byas kyang ni//rags pas 'byung
318a7(rgyud): dede bar du'o//'du shes phra bar rgyu ba'i tshe//de las ldog cing btang snyoms ldan//de sngon de bsten de 'byung la//btsal bar mi nus gzhan dag gis//bskul
318b1(rgyud): yang dran par yod mi nus//de dang gung ldan 'de 'gro ste//mi bzang drag po'i tshor ba yang //nyam su myong bar mi 'gyur ro//de yi dus na gang mthong bas//gang du ma mthong de nyid
318b2(rgyud): mthong //ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od rkyen gyis//snang ba lad kyis 'byung ba bzhin//mun pa'i khams nas snang bar 'gyur//rmi lam lta bur gzugs snang ba/yid 'ong sna tshogs
