318b4(rgyud): de 'gro ba//gong las bzlog pa ji bzhin te//mri bzang drag po'i tshor bas ni//shin tu zug gzer mi bzod de//g.yo 'gul mi snyen nga ro gdon//'khrul pa'i gang snang
318b5(rgyud): mthong ba na//byams pa la sogs gang zhig ni//gshed ma la sogs mi 'dod pa//'jigs pa'i gzugs ni sna tshogs su//mthong bas rdul 'byung ba sku gzing //
318b6(rgyud): yan pag g.yob cing mkha' la rlob//bshang gci 'byung zhing mig kyang ldog/snang ba'i khams nas mun pa'i 'byung //de yi de kun shes 'byung ltung //gang de
318b7(rgyud): mthar 'byung mi bde'o//btang snyoms de yis ma gsal lam//gzhan gyis gsil bar ma byas pa'o//gnyi su mi gsal btang snyam so//'di dag gang ldan gang
319a1(rgyud): 'gro yang //gang ltar goms pa kho narangs//gems pa la zhal de stobs ldan//glang mgoms pa gsal byas kyang //ma zhen dbang gis
319a2(rgyud): 'gag par 'gyur//gang de gnyis la mtshungs goms nu//dwer ni dang por gang gsal lam//gzhan gyis gsal bar byas po las//log par mi 'gyur gzhan
319a3(rgyud): mi 'jug/btang snyoms kha cig 'gyur ba yin//kha cig mi 'gyur rdzogs mi 'byung //thams cad kyang ni 'pho ba'i tshe//gang 'dir rgyu ba mi gsal ba'i//sgrub su ma
319a4(rgyud): bab par dag tu//yun rings dus na goms pa yi//gang la gang chags de 'byung ngo //de las dri yi de dbang gis//'dir de med par 'gyur shes nas//de 'di nyid la zhe
319a5(rgyud): sdang skye//gang ma 'ongs la 'jug par 'gyur//zhe sdang me yis zil mnan pas//gnas pa 'di yi rgyun 'gags te//gang ma byung la chags pa de//srid pa gsum gyis
319a6(rgyud): byar bdun pa//mngon par sgrub pa'i rten yin no//de yi dus na rnal 'byor pa//de bzhin de la goms tshad che//de tshe chags pa 'byung mod kyi//goms par gyur pa'i don
319a7(rgyud): stongs kyis//chags pa de zil gnon pa ni//ma gang rtsal dang ldan pa yis//shugs med dang dag /gnon bzhi no//byang chub rigs 'dzin rnal 'byor la//gang chags de
319b1(rgyud): 'byung mi 'gyuro//gnad kyi sdug bsngal mi bzod pa'i//gang la mthon dman ma gtogs pa//gzhan dag kun la 'byung ba yin//shin tu nyen dga' med phyir ro//sdug
319b2(rgyud): bsngal che chung gnyis kho na//gang 'gags gcig dang rims kyis 'gags//de nyid goms te gang ma 'gags//gtso bas de la der zhen gces//gsum pa srid gsum//
319b3(rgyud): bar bdun pa//brdzus skye dbang ldan las kyi 'gro/gang 'thun mthong yin gang mthong min//shin tu bde dang bde sdug bsngal//de sogs gang du skye 'gyur de'i//de dbyings
319b4(rgyud): 'dzin cing thogs pa med//de yi lus sam spyod yul ni//dri ma can du gyur pa rnams//mtshan mo mun nAg rdzas nag ltar//thams cad thams cad mthong bar 'gyur//gang
319b5(rgyud): dag dri med pa dag rnams//zla 'od dkar dang rdzas dkar ltar//de gnyis de mig dag pas mthong //gang de'i de tshad tha mo pa'i//sprul pa 'byung gnas lnga tshang bar//gang skye
319b6(rgyud): gnas ma blangs par du//de mig de yi mig lta bur//gang las thogs med skal mnyam pa'o//gang ltar kun la ma yino//gang skal mnyam pa'i skye gnas dang //
319b7(rgyud): de dag nyid gnas mthong bar 'gyur//gang dag dri mig thur du gsal//spyi tshugs 'gro la gzhan mthong min//dri med mthor gsal gzhan de bzhin//gang go zad du de nyid snang //
320a1(rgyud): gzhan ni gang ma tid bzhin no//bar bdun pa snying po can//sgru ba de ma rnyed par du//ridi ltar thogs na bdun pa'o//gang de ldan nangs med
320a2(rgyud): gcig gam gnyis sam gsum na 'ab//gang ma ldan na de rjes nas//yang bdun par du de na gnas//gang yong de gang mi ldan na//bdun phrag bdun gyi bar dag du//'dun
320a3(rgyud): nyid den de rje zhing //de rdzogs srid du de na gnas//des ni gnas pa de zad nas//gzhan du gnas pade 'dzin pa'i//gang de ji srid zil gyis gnon//bdun nyid bdun rdzogs pa
320a4(rgyud): phyin chad//nges par de med ga ye sring //gang nub gang snang de skabs na//skad cig gnas pas bar med//bdun zhing nub pa'i rang bzhin pas//nub pa'i srid pa zhes kyang
320a5(rgyud): bshad//bdun pa'i bar du gnas pas na//gang de bar bdun pa zhes bya//dri yi phyir 'brang dri rta bas//dri za nyar 'gro zhes kyang bya//de la brten nas de byung bas//de las byung
320a6(rgyud): gzhes kyad //skye ba'i dbye byas rmugs de 'dzin pas//sprin dang phyi ma'i tshul bzhin nA ne//skye ba mngon du byud pas na//mingan du grub pa zhes kyang b+h+yo//rtag tu zas la
320a7(rgyud): 'khar pas//nye bar 'khor bzhis kyang bya//gnyis kyi bar skabs yin pas na//srid pa mtshams spyir bo zhes bya//de ni gzugs can yid pas na//gzigs med pa /
320b1(rgyud): gnas medo//de na gnas pa'i srid pa de//sngar 'gags pa yi sbrid pa la//de dang de min btang snyoms pa//gsum la chags sdang zhe na goms pas//gar sngon gang la zhen pa bzhin//
320b2(rgyud): dus der de la mngon par dga'//sngon tshe legs nyes spyad pa'i yul//klung du gar gyur de nyid snang //de dag rmi lam bzhin mthong bas//mthong nyid yul du mngon par gyur//de tshe
320b3(rgyud): 'khrul pa'i gzugs mthong ltar//gang gis snga ltas 'byung bar 'gyur//bde rkyen mi ldan pa zhig na//de na gnas dang de nub na//dman par 'gyung ba'i snga ltas ni//srog chags
320b4(rgyud): sdem bu la sogs pa'i//gang du byung ba'i rigs 'thun mthong //ca tsa'i sgra dang 'dam bu'i thibs//nags tshal thibs po la sogs pa//ldum bu'i tshal dang dri sna tshogs//khang
320b5(rgyud): bzangs rdzing dang 'khrigs sprin gyis//nang du 'jug pa'i mtshan ma 'byung //gang 'dir dag pa pa zhig na//rigs mthong gyur pa'i snga ltas ni//zhi ba'i yul dang snyan pa'i smra//
320b6(rgyud): yid 'ong dbang po tshim pa dang //khang bzangs dang ni gzhal med khang //bskyed mos tshal dang snang yul su//'byung ba'i tshan ma snang bar 'gyur//'khor los sgyur rgyal la
320b7(rgyud): sogs pa'i//dag pas dag pa de rigs mthong //de na gnas pa'i snying po de//'dod la zhan pas zhen pa'i phyir//gang du dri byung dara'i bangs pas//nga dang ming dri 'byung yul//
321a1(rgyud): de la zhen pas tshim 'gyur te//'khrigs pas de la zhe sdang 'byung //des ni bar bdun rgyun 'gags byed//de zhen par bdun de zad nas//ngos ni de nyid du
321a2(rgyud): rtas te//gang du rtas pa'i snying po las//sogs pa'i lus can tha dad snang //drod rkyen rlan rnams de rigs 'dzin//de med khams de mi 'byung //de med ma yin mkha' rnam 'di//
321a3(rgyud): gang de ldan pa'i yul rnams ni//dpag par snang ni ring gyur kyang //thigs med mig res mthong tshor phyin//gang ga dbang gis de 'gro bas//rig pa nyid na phyin pa yin//
321a4(rgyud): de la de ring tha snyad med//ci phyir khyab 'jug gdos med//lus can rnams kyi spyod yul min//la la gang la zhen pa'i mthus//'thun par snang pa'i rigs can ngag/ga
321a5(rgyud): da 'phrog byed mthong bar 'gyur//don nyid na der 'khyims nas//de la de 'khor rtog dpyod 'dzin//zhen pas zhen pa'i rang bzhin ldang //gang de'i dbang gis der rmongs nas///
321a6(rgyud): phyon phyi log tu mthong gyur te//sgyu ma lta bur 'khrul bAr snang //gang du gang zag de 'du 'phrod//byed par de la de snang gas pa//gal te gnas pa'i chu len na//'byung la
321a7(rgyud): tshogs pa'i 'dod pa 'byung //de las bzlog pa de bzhin te//gnas 'gyur gnas dang bal bar 'dod//'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin te//gang du mi 'phrod de mthong 'gyur//
321b1(rgyud): de la de zhe na de dbang gis//gnas 'byung mtshan ma 'bab shig las//gang gzhan snang bar mi 'gyur ro//de yis de mthong de la khyims nas//de la de ma rangs ltar 'byung //do
321b2(rgyud): yis de yi rgyun 'gags nas//gad gas gang zin ji bzhin du//zhen pas srid pa de 'dzin byed//gang de de yi gangos kyis bzung //dam na 'gro gang de bar bdun pa//bsod la zhen
321b3(rgyud): goms de brtsegs pas//gang gnas gang yin de gnas na//bsad la sogs bde bar 'gyur//gang de de yis mthong ma thag/sngon du goms pas de rig nas//gsad bya snyam/
321b4(rgyud): du de rgyug byed//gsang yul skye ba'i gnas mthong nas//gsad lnga sogs pa'i las btsums pas//de dag 'khyims nas zhe sdang 'byung //de yis bar bdun rgyun 'gags nas//
321b5(rgyud): mon pa'i las blangs nyon mongs myong //de ltar gang du 'byung ba yi//gnas ris rnams kyi bar bdun pa//gang du 'byung ba'i gnas de na//gang zhig goms pa'i yul snad 'gro//
321b6(rgyud): de la zhe sdang skyong 'khyims pas//sad pa'i dbang gis de rgyun 'grag/de sdang byung ba ma byung len//bzhi pa'i skye gnas 'jug chos bzhi//shes bzhin 'jug gnas 'byung ba
321b7(rgyud): dang //de bzhin 'jug gnas mi shes 'byung //shes 'jug mi shes gnas 'byung dang //mi shes bzhin du 'jug gnas 'byung //'dzin dang 'dres pa'i nyer gnas pa/
322a1(rgyud): gnas gsum 'thun par skye 'don byed//skye gnams bon lngas rnams kyis//sa chad gsum meng+ga na//mngal du thams cad smin par 'gyur//
322a2(rgyud): de yang 'byung gnas gcig la gcig/zhin po drag pa'i byung slob su//mthar 'dzin pa'i bcud 'byung 'gyur//de nas de bzhin gnyi ga las//gang bcud theg la re re /
322a3(rgyud): gtan mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur//de nyid gang der 'das 'gyur naste//gang drod zhabs bzhin 'du ba yin//thams cad pa de der 'jug 'gyur//gang la ngo bo med pa de/
322a4(rgyud): dngos po ci byir 'dzin par 'gyur//dper nu mkha' gro 'dod dbang gis//sa khus dris pa'i spyisna 'dzin bzhin//gang med chags pa'i snyis 'dzin do//thams cad pa
322a5(rgyud): dbang des no//mi 'drul dngos min rta ba yin//de dge mer nur phyogs gang du//de zhugs pa nyid snying rten pa'o//gnas ma thag pa btang snyoms ldan//de mtshams de ni
322a6(rgyud): gnyi su 'gyur//'du mched drug 'dod skabs dag tu//gang gi dus na dngas slu ba//shin tu rtas par gyur pa yin//de bzhin 'dril dus 'dril ba de//'dren pa nas 'jug
322a7(rgyud): des rta pa'i//lnga gang 'di 'byung bas bskyed//gcig tu gang rten 'byung ba nyid//de nyid rten zhugs snying po'o//tha ma gnyis la dbang 'byung skye//khams bzhin rgyas
322b1(rgyud): sku snang smon 'dzin//yan lag rnams 'byed 'byin pa yin//gang dang gangags bzhin mdog 'gyur//gnas yin bzhin phyogs 'thun ltar g.yon//'byung nyid snrel zhi ben chun
322b2(rgyud): g.yas//gnas na gnas dus brgyad nyid do//maur nur ltar mkhrang yan lag 'gyur//de la der phyir 'byung ba dang //dbang po dang ni mtshan dod pa'o//yongasu rdzogs pa'i dus de
322b3(rgyud): na//bdur phrag pa'i rlung thung ste//gang gi nad ni rnyed par byed//'byung ba'i char gags rlung 'byung bas//g.yo 'gul can du 'gyur ba ste//srid 'byung lugasu ji bzhin bzlog
322b4(rgyud): de dag don gnas pa'i yun//bdun phrag suM bcu rtsa brgyad kyis//thams cad des ni rdzogs pa yin//ga ga rtsa drug bzhi rdzogs nas//gdon mi za bar 'gyur ba yin/
322b5(rgyud): dza pa 'byung ba'i chos bzhi la//gang las rnal 'byor 'byung gnas nyid//gang 'di de dgra bzhi phrag bzhi//bcu drug cho su grags pa la//gang skye ba dag kun 'dus pa'o//'di /
322b6(rgyud): lus kyi skye ba ste//thams cad thams cad byed pa ni//dang rang 'gyogs pa'i las yin zhes//mun pa'i spyod yul ba yis mthong //las kyis bskyangs pas sgribs pa la//
322b7(rgyud): dgongs te de dag mdor gsungs pa'o//lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni snang ba'i mdong shes par bya'o//lang ko'o bdag po gzhan yang 'jug pa'i mdo gong zhe na/'di lta ste
323a1(rgyud): de 'dod byed pa rnams gsum gnas//glo 'byed rgyun gcig rgyun gzhan byed//so so ris su bcad dbang byed//de nyid ldan pa de kho na//gang gi ngo
323a2(rgyud): bor byung tsam nyid//gang yang ma yin de dbu ma//kun tu mi 'chas rang bzhin blun//gsum gsum gnyis dang rkyen gsum dus//'dod khams yongasu rdzogs pa
323a3(rgyud): yin//lang ka'i bdag pa de dag ni mdo bzhi zhes bya ste/des de yongasu dgrol bar shes par bya'o//lang ka'i bdag po de la rtsa ba gsum gang zhe na/'di lta ste/
323a4(rgyud): dngus po'i rtsu ba dang /brjod pa'i rtsa ba dang /thams cad pa'i rtsa ba'o//lang ka'i bdag po de la dngos po'i rtsa ba ni ci yang med pa las cir yang snang ba'o//brjod
323a5(rgyud): pa'i rtsa ba ni cir yang snang ba'o//brjod pa'i rtsa ba ni ci yang med pa las cir yang 'gyur ba'o//thams cad pa'i rdza ba ni gang ci yang med pa las cir yang rig pa
323a6(rgyud): nyid do//lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni rtsa ba ste/des thams cad nges par 'byin pa'o//lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni 'di lta ste/chos kyi rgyal pos gang gsungs pa//
323a7(rgyud): thugs dang zhal dang lus lan gsum//don dang lung dang rgyud ces pa//gang 'dir gsum du grags pa la//gang dag 'di la rnam rtog pa//chos kyis rgyal po'i
323b1(rgyud): gsung gcig la//rlud dang lung dang don dam zhes//gsum du snang ba 'di ji lta//sgyum du rtag pa de gang dag/nyid kyis mkhyen te de gsal bar//dgos te gsum nyid rnam/
323b2(rgyud): bar gsungs//gang de slebs dang skabs 'phros pa'o//skyes bu'i thugs la gang gnas pa//zhal du ma byung den dpe nyid//gsung gi 'gyur bas de mtshon na//skyes bu
323b3(rgyud): rgyal po'i bka' lung yin//zhus lan phra men 'phel rgyas na//skyes bu rgyal pa'i bka' rgyud yin//thabs cha chags chung don dpag med//bya sla dpag dka' mon ngag
323b4(rgyud): dam//de nyid nges pa de kha na//ma bslad ji bzhin bcad pa lung //bcos bzhi gtam rgyud las rgyud dang //rtog chen yan lag 'brel bcas rgyud//gsum du gnang la
323b5(rgyud): gcig tu zad//dbyer med tshul gcig rang bzhin la//rtsal dang rnam par snang ba dag/ga cig ste rnam par yongs kyis med//de skad/sang ba mchog des bshad//las
323b6(rgyud): kyis bskyangs pa gang dag la//gang 'dir mun pa'i phyogs bshad pa//go tsa bgos pas shes par gyis//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po
323b7(rgyud): las chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba gang gis mun pa'i spyad yul bstan pa'i le'u ste/lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'o////de nas lang ka'i bdag po byang chub sems
324a1(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/gsang ba'i bdag po la yang yongs su drag pa'i dri ba dris pa/kye gsung ba pa'i bdag po rtsa ba gang la gang
324a2(rgyud): gi snang ba yongs su dag pa'i spyod yul gang lags/de skad ces gsol pa las/gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/long ka'i bdag po gang yong su dag pa'i dri ba da
324a3(rgyud): ni leg so//shin tu rab tu leg so//lang ka'i bdag pa de yang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pa ste/yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na ngang gis
324a4(rgyud): bzhugs pa de'i tshe de'i dus na gang dpag tu med pa'i rgyal ba dgongs pa kun nas 'dus pa dag la gang snang yongasu dag pa'i spyod yul du dgongs te/de kho na nyid snang ba
324a5(rgyud): de kho bos phyin ci ma log par yongs su 'gro bar bya'o//lang ka'i bdag po 'di la ste/mun khung gser stor sgron mes rang snang ltar//ma rig mun par sems
324a6(rgyud): ster rang snang ba//dgongs pa kun nas 'dus pa'i sgo ba 'di//sngar bas 'das pa'i dgongos par 'dus nas gsungs//chos kun rdza ba sems 'di nyid la 'dus//
324a7(rgyud): sems nyid gnas 'gyur ye shes ltar snang ba//de nyid don la nges par bzhag pas na//sems nyid gnas 'gyur ba yang de nyid yin//ye shes lnga nyid de la
324b1(rgyud): rdzogs pas na//ye shes lnga yang gcig tu 'dus pa yin//sems kyi chos nyid ji bzhin tu rtogs na//ye nas sangs rgyas ma nor ma bcos par//brdal khyabs nyid nor
324b2(rgyud): las 'dus par gsungs//gnas skabs de na yon med lta mthar thug/sems kyi de bzhin ji ltar yin pa dang //deng rgyun yod med shes par bya//de bzhin nyid la ga
324b3(rgyud): 'dir ji ltar blta//de nyid snang ba yin nam mi snang ba//'o na sangs rgyas yin nam sangs rgyas min//de las gzhan ma sangs rgyas yod dam med//'di ltar cir
324b4(rgyud): bzhag gos kyi mchod par bya//'di ltar dris nas de ltar gyur na yang //glo bur las lAm mI dgag de bzhin spyad//dris na kun gyi rang bzhin de nyid 'dus//de la bsam
324b5(rgyud): medang min der bzhag na//cing snang tsir srid mtshan mod de gcig pa//skye 'gug med pa'i de nyid yaM sangs rgyas//de nyid ma yangs pas na ma btsal yang //rdzogs pa
324b6(rgyud): spyir chib sa nyid yi nas non//de nyid nyams drong nyam su gsal na yang //chos kun sgo dang mi 'gal bstan pa'i phyir//ting 'dzin gsum ldan go la sa'i sgo bkag
324b7(rgyud): nas//drod chen gsum gyis dam pa'i dgongs pa myong //des na ting 'dzin rnam gsum nyams brnyed pas//'bras bu pha rol phyin drug rang bzhin rdzogs//sems
325a1(rgyud): nyid ma bcas na mkha' dngu la gzhag/de na dran tsam rtogs pa ci byung yang //de bzhin bac+doMs nyid kyis lnga bcad pas//ngang gis ma bcos yongs
325a2(rgyud): ges 'od gsal ba//gsang ba 'dus pa rnams kyis yin par bsngags//ma yangs skye 'gag med nyid ting 'dzin te//rnal 'byor gsum ngon de'i skabs na rdzogs/
325a3(rgyud): des na kun gyi bshes gnyen dgongs brgyad nas//dam pa'i don tu sems nyid shes par bya//de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yin pas na//gang gis 'di mthong de'i zha
325a4(rgyud): mthong yin//de mthong phan chad dam pa nyid yin pas//des na kun gyi bshes gnyen yin par grags//de lta'i don mthong gang dang gang zhig gis//ce la'ang mi lta
325a5(rgyud): de la zhen par bya//des na byas zin brtul med der nges nas//rang 'byung ye shes yongs su dag ces bya//des ni zin chags bde sdug ci byung ba//tshogs gnyis
325a6(rgyud): ma bsngags rdzogs par dam bca'o//mi rtog ting 'dzin mtshan ma rnam dag pa//chos nyid mngon gyur che yin rgyun mi 'chud//sgrib pa gnyis byang tshogs chen rdzogs
325a7(rgyud): pas ni//gang gi phyogs rnams 'thun par sa rnams non//'di ni kun 'dus dgongs spyod zab ma yin//gang dag kun gyi spyod yul ma yon//gang gis gang lta
325b1(rgyud): de'i don mthang ltar//gang dag 'khrul pa rnams kyis ma mthong bas//gdon nas zhen pa'i mun pa sangs dka'o//sa dang sa'i khyad par yod ces pa//mthong dang ma mthong gan+da med
325b2(rgyud): gsal dus na//dam pa'i dgongs pa lhun gyis grub nges pa'o//stong pa ma skyes rang bzhin khyad par ci//yod med rtag chad bya ba rtsal la sogs pa//kun nas lhun gyis
325b3(rgyud): grub par ye gnas pa'o//rgyu dang 'bras bu cir snang cir srid kyang //chos nyid de bzhin nyid kyi rgyan du snang //de nyid ma bkag yongasu rdzogs pa'i tshul//gang 'og la sogs
325b4(rgyud): sbyin yon gnyis po dag/mthong dang ma mthong re rtsel rkyen tsam gyis//rgyu 'bras so sor gsal zhes smra ba yang //thams cad de bzhin nyid du gcig par zad//de la ye nas
325b5(rgyud): 'du 'bral med bzhin du//mi mnyam mnyam pa'i spyod yul cir snang yang //ji bzhin nyid 'dri ma yin gang yang med//de nyid de la tshogs rdzogs thabs shes 'brel//des
325b6(rgyud): na dam pa 'dus pa'i dgongs pa rnams//don dam mo bcas sems nyid de la 'dus//sems kyi rang bzhin ma byas rang byung bas//ting nge 'dzin zhes dmigs pa kun dang
325b7(rgyud): bral//'di ltar nges pa'i byang chub sems de la//bgrod pa'i gnas dang lta ba'i gzugs med pas//mtshon ma kun mkhyen skyon yon yang ye med//theg chen gnyis
326a1(rgyud): rtags the tshom kun bcad cing //bla mad rdzogs pa chen por la bzlas pa'o//des na mtha' dpung 'byed pa chu phra ba//mtha' dpung 'byed pa nyid du
326a2(rgyud): kun gcig ste//khyad par 'phags pa'i don du kun 'dus gsungs//rgyur 'dod la sogs phyi nang yul dag la//dga' ba'i mtshan ma tsam du gnas pa dang //
326a3(rgyud): gang dag spyod pas chos rnams semasu 'dus//mtha' gnyis ngang gis gsal zhes smra ba yang //la bcad mthong bas gud na yang med do//gal te yod par
326a4(rgyud): 'dod na skyon chen yin//des na bsam gtAn so sor tsIr snang yang //byis pa'i spyod yul 'khrul pa nyid snang yin//dam pa dman pa sgyu ma smig rgyu'i tshul//
326a5(rgyud): rang bzhin skye 'gag med pas na mkha' bzhin//der ni kun 'dus kun la mthong ba me//ci yang mi snang ba nyid skyon med 'dod//de ni'akhrul pa yin pas
326a6(rgyud): btub ma yin//mthong dang ma mthong snang la rang bzhin med//kun 'dus gsang ba'i dgongs spyod zab mo ni//rang byung rang reg mngon sum snang dus na//
326a7(rgyud): rang byung ye shes de nyid mthong zhes bya//de ltar dgongs pa dam pa mthong ba'i tshe//rtog chags kun sangs mthong yul 'das pa ste//bya med snang med mi brtsal
326b1(rgyud): gzhags pa'o//dmigs pa'i yul med chos la ma chags pa spangs//mthong tshor bde lam mu mod brdal ba'i dbyings//gang 'gyur gang snang de las gar ma g.yos//de'i
326b2(rgyud): gtan tshigs de bzhin nyid kyis gsal//de'i don la kun 'dus dpyod ma mdzad//chos kun rang 'byung rang rig ye shes snang //de don ma skyes ma byung ma skyes te//rgyu dang
326b3(rgyud): 'bras bur btags pa yang ye med//de ltar gang rig de nyid cho gas gnyis rdzogs//don la mnyam bzhag blo bcos sbyin nyid ni//de dang 'gal zhing de dang phrad mi 'gyur//
326b4(rgyud): de las nges blo khyab par btang ba ni//de dang mi 'gal de nyid nges pa skye//rang rig dus na de la gnyi su med//snying pa de nyid rgyu 'bras lhun gyis grub//de'i dus na don dam
326b5(rgyud): nyams drod rdzogs//snang dang mi snang rtag chad la sogs pa//nyams drod nges par don gyi ting phol te//tha dad phyogs kyi the tsam 'di bcad pa'o//de nyid de la zhen des blo
326b6(rgyud): brtan zhing //gang dang 'brel pA sI lta ba'i thug chod na//dman pa'i lus la dam pa'i go 'phang nAn//dbang phyug yin pas de la gus phyag 'tshal//daye sgyu med pa'i ye
326b7(rgyud): byang chen po lngas//dbang po'i spyi ga nug nor bu bzhin du lta//kun nas 'dus pa'i dgongs pa tshig gsum po//yid ched nges pa'i blo yi rjeng du bya//tshig gsum ngon
327a1(rgyud): nges rnyed mngon du 'gyur//nges pa'i don+da ni rang rig kho nar zad//gsang ba'i bdag pos de skad ces smras pas/lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa
327a2(rgyud): dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams kyis chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba gtan la nges par phebs pa 'gyur te//sangs rgyas kun gyis dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po
327a3(rgyud): las tshwas thams cad kyi rtsa ba gang snang ba dag pa'i spyod yul bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o////bam po dgu pa zug pa'o//de nas yang /
327a4(rgyud): lang ka'i bdag po la sogs dman pa'i lus kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la yang gang gi dri ba dris pa/kye gsang
327a5(rgyud): ba pa'i bdag po 'dir nyid kyis chos kyi rnam grangs bcur bkod pa las rang bzhin ma bcos par bya'o zhes thos na de ji ltar yongasu shes par bya/rang bzhin ni gang //
327a6(rgyud): gang ltar nam bcos/de gang gi rang bzhin legs/de skad ces gsol pa dang /gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/kye dman pa'i grogs po dag/gang rang bzhin ni mi
327a7(rgyud): 'gyur ba'o//ma bcos pa ni rnal ma'o//'di dag ni gsang sngags kyi rang bzhin dang /de la lta ba'i rang bzhin dang /de las mi 'da' ba'i rang bzhin dang /de ltar spyod
327b1(rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin no//grogs po dag 'di lnga gsang sngags kyi rang bzhin ni 'di lta ste/nam mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin pas//rnam par rtog bral dang mi rtog/de bzhin sa yo rang bzhin pa
327b2(rgyud): thams cad 'byung ba'i rang bzhi no//me yi rang bzhin lta bu bas//dngos po thams cad med par byed//rlung gi rlung bzhin lta bu bas//grayo rdul mi g.yo 'i rdul kun sel/
327b3(rgyud): chu'i rang bzhini kho na bas//gzhan med de bzhin nyid du 'dus//sman gyi rang bzhin yin byas no//'khor ba'i gcod snying rnam pa 'byin//'di ltar 'tsho'i dri bzhin pas//
327b4(rgyud): 'tsho ba dag pa kun gyi gsos//gcod pa'i rang bzhin lta bu bas//sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rnam par gcod//nyi ma lte bu'i rang bzhin pas//mun khang snang ston gasngal ba
327b5(rgyud): nyid//ri rab lta bu'i rang bzhin pas//cis kyang bskyod cing g.yo' ba med//rgya mtsho lta bu'i rang bzhin pas//mi g.yo ba las byin rlabs 'byung //de bzhin rtsi yi rang
327b6(rgyud): bzhin pas//dug la sman 'gyur ji bzhi no//de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/rnam par rtog byal thams cad 'byung //ma bcos ma slad de bzhin pa'o//grogs po
327b7(rgyud): dag de dag ni gsang sngags kyi rang bzhin du shes par bya'o//zhes thos pa rnam par bgros pa'o//grogs po dag de la rang bzhin ni gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi nor mi 'gyur
328a1(rgyud): ngas bcad de//ma chags ma rtog nyam ming //dper na na mkha'i rang bzhin las//sprin dang na bun khug blangs dang //zla ba nyi ma skar tshogs dag/
328a2(rgyud): snang yang na mkha' bzhin du gnas//de bzhin nyid kye na mkha' las//mtshan ma ni rtog ce byung yong //chos nyid na mkha' bzhin gnas par//rnal 'byor can gyis
328a3(rgyud): blta bar bya//ji bzhin ma bcas de bzhin la//mthong dang ma mthong khyad par gyis//lta ba'i khyad par so sor blta//rnam par rtog nyid//log sred can
328a4(rgyud): la log rtog nyid//phyogs 'dzin tsam la tha snyad rdzas//phyogs shes tsam la sgyu mar snang //de nyid der nges na mkhar mthong //na mkha' bzhin gnas na mkha' la/
328a5(rgyud): na mkha' nyid du snang bar zad//glegs po dag de dag ni lta ba'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'i zhes thos pa nges par bgros pa'o//glags po dag de las me 'da' ba'i rang
328a6(rgyud): bzhin gang zhi ni/'di lta ste/chos nyid na mkha' lta bu 'dir//thams cing yongs kyis gcig pa la//bsrung dang mi bsrung phyogs dang bral//bsrung ba'i tshad
328a7(rgyud): gzungs ga la yod//na mkha' lta bu'i rnal 'byor pas//nam mkha' lta bu'i dam tshig bsrung //gang 'dir bsrung mtshams med na bde//des ni thams cad bsrungs
328b1(rgyud): pab yin//ci phyir thams cad thams cad kun//dam par nges pa yin pas na//tshad 'dzin tshad yod byed nyid nyams//gang la bsrung rta mi bsrung ba'i//rnam rtog de dag med
328b2(rgyud): kyang bla'i//de 'dra bsrung ba'i mtshams 'dzin pa//rgyu ma yin pas dam pa min//de la bsung zhes su zhig zer//bsrung dang mi bsrung tshig med de//chos nyid de la blang dong
328b3(rgyud): byed//dam par gyur pa ga la yin//bsrung dang mi bsrung chos rnams ni//bsrung du med pas de bzhin gzhag/de bzhin nyid kyi don dam la//ji bzhin pa yi blo bzhag ste/
328b4(rgyud): brjod pa med pa'i dam tshig gis//bsrung mtshams med pa'i ngang du bsdam//bsrung med na mkha'i dam tshig 'di//ji ltar grags pa'i rang bzhin la//sdom dang tshul khrims
328b5(rgyud): so sor snang //'jig rten pa la chad mdo brtsan//byas pa rnams la tshul shes pa//nanur son pa la sdom par grags//bla med mchog la dam par snang //gcig gi don
328b6(rgyud): las pa g.yos kyang //'dul ba'i ngo la so sar grags//de bzhin nyid ldan dam pa ste//de las 'das na tshig par 'gyur//gcig bsrungs pas na kun bsrungs pa'i//
328b7(rgyud): dam pa'i dam tshig chen po 'di//kun dang 'gal bar mi bya zhing //gang gi don du 'gyur bar bya//grogs po dag de dag ni dal ba'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o//
329a1(rgyud): zhes thos pa yongs su bgros pa'o//kye grogs po dag dri ltar spyod pad+ma rang bzhin gang zhon/'di lta ste/lus dang drug dang yod gsum gyi//mtha'
329a2(rgyud): gsum yongs su dag rdzogs na//dam pa'i spyod pa yin pas na//dman min dam po'i rigs shes bshad//rdo rje lus kyi spyod pa ni//phyin pa med las lus mi bcos
329a3(rgyud): gcig pu nyid pas gcig tu gnas//glang po'i lta stangs ji bzhin dang //de bzhin rnal mas gnas par bya//gang du gnas pas rtag par gnas//gnas pa de
329a4(rgyud): la chags mi bya//spyod lam rnam bzhir gar ldan pa//ma bcos rnal mar gnas par bya//gang gis gdung ba mi nyen pa'i//gnod pa skyob pa dag tsam las//
329a5(rgyud): bzang dang rgyan phyin bac+doMs mi bya//gang du ji ltar bde ldan sbyar//rdo rje sngags kyi spyod yul rI//bya ba med pa'i rnal 'byor bas//mchod rten dag gi las mi bya/
329a6(rgyud): glegs bam klag par mi bya zhing //gzugs brnyan brtsam pa'i lngas mi bya//lag go phyag rgya mi bcing zhing //ngag gi bzlas pa de la sgrib//rnal 'byor lus
329a7(rgyud): kyi phyag ma bya//rnyed dang bkur sti blta ma yin//khe phyir ma yin grags phyir min//ci phyir phyi rol g.yeng ba dang //shin tu g.yeng ba yin pa'i phyir//de la
329b1(rgyud): nyo ba ma yin pas//lus 'di rnal mas/gnas par bya'o//rnal 'byor nges pa'i bsam gtan pas//rdo rje sngags kyi khA zas ni//lhas zungs 'dzin pa'i rton tsam du//
329b2(rgyud): gar ldan 'byor ldan ma gtogs pa//zas phyir ched du sgrib mI bya//mchag dang nyam phyir ga lnga yin//ma bcos rnal ma ji bzhin bza'i//'tsho ba'i ched du btsas mi bya//
329b3(rgyud): chags dang ma chags spang byung med//blang bar bya ba ma yin zhing //blongs mos 'tsho bar yong mi bya//ci'i phyir de ni mi 'gyur phyir//'tsho ba yongasu ma dag pa'o//mtshams
329b4(rgyud): med pa las mtshams gcod pa//'di ni rnal 'byor can gyi las//shes bya nang gi chos nyid la//rnal 'byor don du 'jug pa na//phyi'i 'du 'dzi g.yeng ba yis//bar du gcod
329b5(rgyud): pa bsal ba'i phyir//phyi dang nang gi so mtsham su//'gro 'ong 'grul rnams gcad par bya//gang la gnas gzhi rten med pas//gnas bder lus bcos kha na med//zhen pas
329b6(rgyud): spyod lam bcos byed pa//des ni lus bcos bslad pa yin//bsam gtan lus dben bcos mi bya//de la de dben ma bcos pa//de nyid ye nas dben pa'i gnas//'di ni
329b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor mchog gi yul//ri phug gzhal med bcos mi bya//de nyid dpag med ma bcos pa'i//'di ni ye nas dmad 'byung gzhal//byed pa med par rang 'byung ba'o//rdo rje
330a1(rgyud): ngag gi spyod yul yang //dam pa'i ched du gnyen sgra lAs//gzhan du kha gsag ga zha min//brjod pa thams cad ngas pa nyid//gsong por smra zhing
330a2(rgyud): tshig mi 'gyur//ji ltar brjod pa de bzhin bya//thams cad kun tu smra ma yin//gang brjod don dang 'brel bar bya//skabs dang dgos che ma gtogs pa//rnam par
330a3(rgyud): 'chal par bya ba min//kun la dpes mtshon thog tu dbab//thams cad tshang bas tshad mar bya//ma bcos dang gi rnal 'byor pa//rdo rje ngag gi spyod par bshad//rdo rje
330a4(rgyud): yid kyi spyod yul ni//ma bcos ma g.yos bsam dang bral//mi g.ye ma rmugs gsal zhing gnas//'dod la ma chags sgro skur bral//blang med dor med chags
330a5(rgyud): sdang med//'chab bapatsam med de red 'byor min//phyogs bral mu med yongs su dag/go dgos lam nyid drang por song //duga'igyur spen bsngal mtshon char ldan//
330a6(rgyud): rdo rje rdzong la zhen pa dang //yid bzhin nor bu blo gros ldan//gang du mi 'gyur gang mi 'gyur//dbyings 'dir kun dang gcig pa dang //gang gi blo la mngon pa'i phyir/
330a7(rgyud): yongs su mthos dang bag yod dang //de nyid dbang las khrel yod dang //de la nga'am nga med pas//kun la yongs su ldan pa dang //thams cad de bas nges pa dang //
330b1(rgyud): gang 'di stong pas cir mi rtog/de nyid zhi bas 'khrug med dang //gang nas ci yang mi 'byung ba sdu//gzhan du tshol ba med pa dang //zang zing med pa tshul mo 'chos//bdung
330b2(rgyud): ba med pas 'dod pa med//ma chags 'byung bas chog par 'dzin//gang la mtshan mar mi 'dzin pas//gtsang sme med cing dus gsum med//de bzhin dam pa yod ma yin//
330b3(rgyud): sems nyid na mkha'i snying po de//glo bur sprin gyis gtibs spungs pas//shes rab rlung gi ma gtor bar//gzhi mkhan gyi spyod 'dra yis//sgrib bsal chos nyid gsal
330b4(rgyud): 'dod pas//ji ltar chus gsher byas pa dag/nyi ma sprin ltar grib pas yis//shin tu bsgribs par gyur pa na//byis pa'i rang bzhin mi shes pas//sprin chen 'dus pa'i
330b5(rgyud): phung po la//kha yis dbugs kyis bus byas nas//sprin bsal nyi 'od gsal 'dod 'dra'o//grogs po dag dra dag ni de ltar spyod pa'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o//zhes
330b6(rgyud): zas pa phyin cim log par/sangs rgyas kun gyis dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rnal 'byor rang bzhin gyi leSh+kaM zhes bya ste lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o//
330b7(rgyud): de nas yang lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la dri ba yongasu dris pa/kye gsang ba pa'i
331a1(rgyud): bdag po ljon shing bskyed par bya'o//zhes dam bca' bar gsungs pa de ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi/de gang gi ljon shing lags zhes dris
331a2(rgyud): pa las/bsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/kye grogs po dag shing ni byang chub kyi ljon shing ste/rkye na med pa'i 'bras bur srin pas gang mtha' dag gi gsos su 'gyur
331a3(rgyud): ba'i phyir ljon shing de bskyed par bya'o//grogs po dag 'di lta ste/de nyid rdo rje snying po las//gang gi zug rngu kun byed der//ma lus yongasu rdzogs pa la//gang gi dgongs
331a4(rgyud): pa nges 'brel ba//sbyor ba'i skabs bshad pa dang //de nyid rnam par 'gro bar bya//de la dgongs 'brel sbyor skabs bcu//'dun pa skyed dang rtsol ba sbyor//bslab par
331a5(rgyud): 'jug dang 'du shes 'gyur//sbyor nase rA tshor yul la 'jug/rtogs chen rdeng 'gyur la su rung //rgyun dang bcas pa'i sems skabs bcu//snying po de dag rgyun bcas
331a6(rgyud): phyir//rnal 'byor chen po'i skabs bcu yis//rnal 'byor rnam lnga'i khyad par lo//bcu drug rgyun gyis dra par rdzogs//de bzhin ye shes thams cad la//rnam pa bcu yi
331a7(rgyud): khyad par gyis//dang po nas bzung rdzogs par du//sbyor ba gang de sgrib pa nub par 'gyur//gang zag gis gang mthong der na//rig pa byang chub sems re 'byung //
331b1(rgyud): de nyid de nub gang zhe na//g.yo dang smon dang ldang ba dang //sbyor ba 'jug dag mi 'gyur ba//rig dang gnas dang rdzogs pa'o//gang gi gzugs brnyan gang snang ba//dngos medal
331b2(rgyud): snang 'thun pa'i dpe//phra mo tha mal chen po yi//skar mo zla tshes gnyis pa dang //gsum dang bzhi dang lnga pa dang //brgyad dang bcu drug lta bur snang //'dun pa skye ba'i skabs dag
331b3(rgyud): la//g.yob lhag pa'i sems 'byung te//mun pa'i sprin rum lta bu yi//gzer 'phro skar ma rab rab snang //rtsol ba sbyor ba'i skabs dag la//smon pa lhag pa'i sems 'byung
331b4(rgyud): ste/shin tu skar ma phal ba dag/gang la rab rib blta bu'o//bslab pa 'jug pa'i skabs dag la//ldang bu byang chub sems 'byung ste//ji ltar me yi gzer chen dang /
331b5(rgyud): skur chen lci bu rab rib snang //'du shes 'gyur ba'i skabs dag la//sbyor ba lhag/pa'i sems skye ste//ji lhor 'gal me 'kho rol dang //gcig pa'i zla chos lta bur snang /
331b6(rgyud): sbyar chen 'jug pa'i skabs dag la//'jug pa lhag pa'i sems skye ste//ji ltar sgron me lta bu dang //zla chos gnyis pa lta bur snang //'o myong ba yi skabs dge la//dga' ba
331b7(rgyud): lhog pa'i sems 'byung ste//snod kyi sgron ma lta bu 'am//gsum pa lta bur de snang ngo //yul la 'jug pa'i skabs dag la//mi 'gyur lhag pa'i sems 'byung ste//thob dang
332a1(rgyud): bstan la nye ba yin//bzhi pa lta bu'i rang bzhin snang //rtogs chen dag gi skabs dag la//rig pa lhag pa'i sems 'byung ste//rtags chen du/
332a2(rgyud): po nye bar brnyen//lnga pa lta bu'i rang bzhin snang //rdeng du gyur pa'i skabs dag la//gnas pa lhag pa'i sems 'byung ste//shin tu brtan pa'i sgron ma dang //brgyad pa lta/
332a3(rgyud): bu'i rang bzhin snang //rtags thob nyid na 'grub ces bya//las su rung ba'i skabs dag la//rdzogs pa lhag pa'i sems 'byung ste//gnyen po med pa'i sgron ma dang //
332a4(rgyud): cha la rdzogs pa lta bur snang //brtan pas nges par grub pa yin//sems nyid ye nas sangs rgyas la//rtog pas bsgribs pas de ma shes//byang chub sems kyi ljon
332a5(rgyud): shing las//bla med 'bras bu smin pa yin//des na grogs po dam pa dag/dam pa rnams kyis byang chub sems//kun tu rgyun dang bcas pa ste//rgyun meng chad pa dam
332a6(rgyud): pa min//rgyun nyid kyis na nges smin pa//gang du smin pa'i skyed shing de//byang chub dam pa ljon pa'i shing //'bras bu dam pa smin pa'o//grogs po dag de dag ni ljon shing
332a7(rgyud): dam pa bskyed pa'i dgongs pa nges par 'bros pa'o//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las/de kho na nyid gsang ba'i dam pa ljon shing bskyed pa'i
332b1(rgyud): le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o////de nas yang lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis dri ba yongasu dras pa/kye gsang ba
332b2(rgyud): ba'i bdag po dam pa rnams kyis rjesu 'jug par bya'o zhes dam bca' bar dgongs pa de dmo pa rnams kyi rjesu ji ltar 'jug par bgyi/de skad ces yongasu dris pa las/gsang
332b3(rgyud): ba ba'i bdag pas smras pa/kye grogs po dag de ni 'di ltar de man pa rnams kyi rjes ni gang nges par shes pa'i lam dam pa la bya'o//grogs po dag lam dam pa gang zhe na/
332b4(rgyud): de ltar de kho bos mthong thos pa'i skabs gcig na bshes gnyen dam pa nyid kyis nges par gsungs pa ngo bo nyid kyi sku gnyen po med pas rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang ldan
332b5(rgyud): te/rtag pa nyid dang /chad pa nyid dang /skye ba nyid dang /'gag pa nyid dang /dmigs pa dang /'dod chags pa nyid dang //zhe sdang ba nyid dang /gti mug pa nyid dang /nga rgyal
332b6(rgyud): ba nyid dang /phrag dog pa nyid dang /'dod po lnga dang /srog gcod pa dang /ma byin par len pa dang /'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /brdzun dang phra ma dang /ngag rtsub mo
332b7(rgyud): dang /chag 'khyil pa dang /brnabs sems dang /gnod sems dang /log par lta ba nyid do//mtshams med pa lnga dang /de dang nye ba lnga dang /lci ba bzhi dang /log pa brgyad
333a1(rgyud): dang /sle sha dang /bshang ba dang /gci ba dang /khrag dang /khu ba la sogs pa dag la nges par spyod pa ni dam pa rnams kyi lam dam pa yin par shes par
333a2(rgyud): bya'o zhes nges pa dam par gsungs pa las/kho bos de la 'di skad du/e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas smra rnams kyis//yang dag tshad ma'i gsung dag
333a3(rgyud): las//phyin ci log kun 'byung ci lags//de skad zhu ba 'dus pa las//bshes gnyen dam pas bka' stsal pa//phyin cig log pa zhen pa rnams//thabs mchog dpag
333a4(rgyud): gis mi lang bas//nges pa'i don la gzud pa'i phyir//khrid pa'i thabasu bstan pa yin//log zhe na gang la nges brtan yang //'jug par mi 'gyur spong 'gyur rnams//
333a5(rgyud): log spyod thabs kyis de drangs na//the tsom med par 'byung bar 'gyur//slu ba'i thabs kyis gzud pa'i phyir//so so mos pa sna tshogs kyis//lta spyod rnams dang 'thun
333a6(rgyud): 'jug tu//sbyar nas bsten 'brid thabasu gsungs//dper na log spyod byis pa rnams//pha mas bsdigs brod thabs kyis ni//bya ba'i las la gzud pa ltor//brtsi bas don
333a7(rgyud): la 'dren pa'o//de yang ji ltar la la zhig/chu bo ba mthar 'gro 'dod pa//gru bdag la brten pas 'gro/mthar son pa na 'bor ba bzhin//thabs sam theg pa'i bye brag
333b1(rgyud): rnams//bston pas drang ba'i thabs yin yang //don gyi nges pa rnyed ma thag/chu bo rgal ba'i gru bzhin 'dor//des na de bzhin nyid shes na//thams cad thams cad gang yang rung //
333b2(rgyud): dam pa'i lam tu nges pas na//lam gyi nang na nye lam yin//de skad ces gsungs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhug so//kye grogs po dag de bas na dam pa rnams kyi rjes lam dam pa
333b3(rgyud): 'dir zhugs na/thams cad nas thams cad du rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du shes pa dang /gsal ba dang /ma 'dres pa dang /yong su rdzogs par 'gyur te/'khor ba yongs
333b4(rgyud): su shes par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di shes par bya'o//mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su shes par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di shes par bya'o//gzhan yang cho 'phrul chen po nyi shu thob
333b5(rgyud): par 'dod pas kyang lam dam pa 'di yongasu shes par bya'o//rtog pa'i ri bo brgyad cu gzhil bar 'dod pas kyang lam dam pa 'di yongasu shes par bya'o//ltung ba'i sgo dgu chad par
333b6(rgyud): 'dod pas kyang lam dam pa 'di yongasu shes par bya'o//de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i thams cad thams cad yong su rdzogs pa'i/shes par 'dod pa gang dag gis dam pa'i lam
333b7(rgyud): 'di shes par bya/sems nyid dam pa'i lam nyid de//mkha' la bya lam rjes med bzhin//nyam nga log med dam pa'i lam//'di ltar nges pa'i lam 'di yang //kun gyi//
334a1(rgyud): shes par bya ba'i byur//tshig gi lam gyis gnyer mtshon te//brjod med tshig gi yul bral ba//de yi rang bzhin de nyid na//rang bzhin ma bac+doMs na
334a2(rgyud): bzhin nyid//de la ming med ming btags rgyus//mthong dang ma mthong ba dad 'gyur//de las spyad pa'i gzhir gyur te//brjod pas de nyid mthong bya'i phyir//tshig gi lam ni
334a3(rgyud): rnam grangs las//tshig lam sgo mo dpag med 'gyur//de las dam pa'i rjes gcad pa//go ga thugs las byung ba'i lung //sgron mas nye bor gter btsal ba//
334a4(rgyud): nye la me byang chub dam pa ni//gang byung rjesu de 'bangs na//'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'khor bar 'gyur//gang 'byung g.yo ba gang bkag pa//rgyun gyi 'gog pa nyid du 'gyur//
334a5(rgyud): gang 'byung med pa'i blun po pa//mur 'dzin mun pa'i lam du 'gyur//'di zhes gcig tu gang bzung ba//mtshan ma rtag pa'i ri bo yin//snga phyi med ces mu bcad
334a6(rgyud): nas//de med chad pa'i mu can yin//ma bcos nyid la yud tsam zhig/cir g.yos skye 'gag 'byung ba ste//de las gang 'byung gang 'phel ba//rnam grangs
334a7(rgyud): lam de 'phel 'gyur gyi//dam pa'i lam 'di rnyed ma yin//dper na 'gro gang byis pa dag/brib ma spangs nas rnam dag tshol//gang las byung ba de nyid kyis//
334b1(rgyud): bcolnga yang 'grib 'phel dag mi rnyed//de nyid ye nas de bzhin du//gang 'dir sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis//sha thad par ni lam tshol ba//don med bdud kyi lus yin no//
334b2(rgyud): de la tshig tu gang brjod pa//nam mkha' dag la rtsod pa 'dra//tshig tu sman dang spyad bshad kyang //nad pa'i tshogs la mi sman to//de nyid de bzhin ma gyur na//tshig lam de
334b3(rgyud): brjod de ma yin//gang 'dir gang spangs gang tshol ba//gzugs spangs nas ni grib tshol 'dra//sems nyid dam pa'i lam nyid pas//ma rig ye shes tha dad min//mi rtog pa ni
334b4(rgyud): lam 'dir cig/sems nyid sna tshogs par snang las//sna tshogs lam 'dir cig pa yin//dper na gser gyi rgyu gcig las//dbyibs dang gzugs ni tha dad par//byas pas
334b5(rgyud): de dag ming re grags//gang grags gser gyi ngo bor gcig/de ltar sems kyi rang bzhin la//mthong dang ma mthong khyad par gyis//gang ltar bltas dgu de ltar snang //snang
334b6(rgyud): yang de las gzhan mi dmigs//sgron ma 'bar ba'i rin chen ni//ji ltar ngan khung sbas gyur yang //de yi rang bzhin rang snang bas//'od ni mkha' la gsal bar 'gyur//
334b7(rgyud): de bzhin sems nyid rin chen sgron//lus ngan 'dam du bying gyur yang //rang byung rang zhi rang snang bas//ma bcos rang bzhin yongs kyis gsal//sems 'di nam
335a1(rgyud): mkha' ji bzhin to//kun khyab stong gsal sna tshogs 'byung //byung tshor gu yo 'gog thams cad kyang //rang bzhin gyis 'byung dang gi zhi//mdar//
335a2(rgyud): na ji ltar brtags bsams bzhin//'gyur pas thams cad ngo bo snang //ma bcos g.yo ba med nyid las//sna tshogs rgyu 'byung mi skyon zhing //cho 'phrul mi 'gag
335a3(rgyud): nyam nga med//ji bzhin na mkha'i rang bzhin la//blo bzhag ma yengs kho nar zad//de ni tshigs med don po che//de nyid dus gsum thams cad kyi//sangs rgyas 'byung
335a4(rgyud): ba'i ngo bo yin//de yi don la ji snyed gnas//mthong bas de nyid der goms na//lam rnyed lam mthong nyam drod ni//don gyis nges par 'byung ba lnga//gde ma yin la
335a5(rgyud): zin 'byung ba//byang chub dam pa 'byung bar 'gyur//mtshan ma rtog pa'i chos rnams la//nges pa'i blo gros 'byung ba yin//chos kun 'di ltar yin pa la//de ltar/
335a6(rgyud): ma mthong ngo mtshar che//de mthong de yang ngo mtshar che//e ma'o cig snyam du 'byung //de nyid ma mthong gang su dag/rtsol grub dka' ba'i tshogs chen gyis//dam pa'i la
335a7(rgyud): tshol ba ma re ring //de yi don 'byung de yod kyang //lam de rnyed par yang mi 'gyur//dam pa rnams kyi lam rnyed pa//dam pa nyid las dam pa yin//de ni brten
335b1(rgyud): brnyen mtshungs ma yin//zhi lus mthar 'gog gnyis mtshungs min//slob pa'i sa dang de mi mtshungs//rnal 'byor sems dpa' rtogs mtha' dang //gang mtshungs de 'dra
335b2(rgyud): mi mtshungs//de na rnam ngag lam chen ni//sems kyi gsang 'di yin pas na//dgongs pa kun las 'dus pa yi//gsang ba'i las 'di shes byas pas//btsal ba'i
335b3(rgyud): bya ba rgyu med de//lam 'di mthong ba de nyid kyis//dka ba rtsol ba gang med par//thams cad thams cad grub pa yin//sems kyi gsang ba gar gnas pa//de ni dben pa
335b4(rgyud): dam pa ste//dkon pa chen po mchog nyid du//dgongs pa kun nas 'dus pa gsungs//de nyid dpag med gzhal yas mchog/rmad 'byung nor bu yid bzhin khang //ma byas rang
335b5(rgyud): byung phyir nang med//kun tu nang du gyur pa yin//gang 'dir gang 'dus tshogs ma yin//de la de nyid tshogs 'dus mchog/chos kun bsdus pas 'byung ba med//dpag
335b6(rgyud): mang rgyal ba dgyes pa'i mchog/gang 'dir 'dod spyod yo byad min//de nyid yo byad chen po ste//lhag pa'i yo byad 'di shes na//yo byad kun gyi rtsa ba yin//sgom pa byed pa
335b7(rgyud): bsgom pa min//bsam bya dmigasu med pa ste//dam pa'i gsang lam 'di shes na//bsgom lam dam po 'di nyid do//bsrung zhes bsrung bar bya mi dmigs//stong nyid
336a1(rgyud): med 'byung gsang lam 'di//dbus mthar che bas tshig shes na//bsrung ba'i gsang ba dam pa'o//tshig lam mnyam brjod ma ming mig/gsang
336a2(rgyud): 'di thams cad gcig pa la//mnyam zhes lhag par ga la yod//dgongs pa kun nas 'dus dang mnyam//gang gzhan brtul zhugs spyod pa min//de la de gzhol
336a3(rgyud): rol spyod pas//thams cad 'dir brtul 'dir zhugs pas//brtul zhugs mchog tu kun 'dus gsungs//lam 'di dngos nyid sems kyi gsang //me grub zin pas
336a4(rgyud): gsol thob med//dngos grub rgyun mi 'chad pa zhes//dgongs pa dam pa kun 'dus gsungs//de ltar sems kyi gsang mthong na//sngon ma mthong ba'i lam mthos byas//
336a5(rgyud): mthong ba ci yang med pa nyid//gang la snang ba lam mthong yin//grogs po dag de dag ni dam pa rnams kyi rjes lam dam pa zhes bya ba 'di skad thos pa yongasu bskos pa'o//
336a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rnal 'byor rjes 'jug gi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o///de nas yang lang ka'i bdag po la sogs
336a7(rgyud): pa grogs kyi sems dpa' rnams kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la yongasu dri ba dris pa/kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'dir rin po che 'bar ba'i sgron ma bsrel bar bya'o zhes
336b1(rgyud): dam btsal bar dgongs pa ji ltar yongasu shes par dgyi/de skad ces dri ba yongasu dris pa las/gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/k+She grogs po dag rin po che 'bar ba ni 'ong rgya
336b2(rgyud): 'byung gnas lags te/'thor rlung tshogs kyis kyang mi srid pas mun pa sel bar byed pa kho na pas sngon me zhes bya'o//de ni 'di ltar mi shes pa sel ba'i shes pa nyid yin te//
336b3(rgyud): nyi mo'i snying po 'am rin po che'i sbyin ma la mun pa'i gzhi med pa bzhin shes pa'i rang bzhin la mi shes pa'i gzhi med de//dI yang 'di ltar sgron ma dam pa nub par gyur pa
336b4(rgyud): na kun gyi de nyid gcig kho na la khyad par gyi rnams pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/mun pa'i shes pa dang /ya mtshan gyi shes pa dang /byi ba rnams kyi shes pa dang /
336b5(rgyud): phyogs su rigs pa'i shes pa dang /mtha' dbus 'byed pa'i shes pa dang /dam pa nyid kyi shes pa'o//kye grogs po dag gang mun pa'i shes pa ni gang di lnga log par shes
336b6(rgyud): po'o//log sred can zhes pa ni tha dad smra zhing gnyis su 'dod pa'o//byis pa rnams ni 'di lta ste/gang med par smra zhing thams cad yod par 'dod pa'o//de yang 'di ltar
336b7(rgyud): rdul nas dpag tshad skad cig ma/bskal pa skar ma nyi zla dang //ri ba khor yug lus can lus//sems dang che la longs spyod chad//dus gnas 'jig nub mtshan nyid la
337a1(rgyud): da blug sam pa/ngagag sum smra na nas nga//mats+tsha nga sa rnams man/da 'du ma na gas ga//smra
337a2(rgyud): gang 'dir lon pas//dngas med rnam shis nyi du snang/ ces de bzhin nyid//yod pas chos su rtag par 'dod//des par ni sbyi pa'i rnal 'gyur ba//ga
337a3(rgyud): daM/ ma'i mtshan nyid du//snang gyis kun rdzob bye'i bye//oM bAr phye ba med pa'i//mi la de ltar de ngas te//de las mi gtugs de 'ong min//de nyid dos ni dam
337a4(rgyud): med byu//dab pa nyid du me pa'o//mi lo gang po yin pa'i byer//de snang ba ni ga na nga //phra rabs ni rnam kun sbyin//smra da pa ltar yod mi yin//dam
337a5(rgyud): da ni dus pa dang /rna sa sa la// de sa/seMnas su sar+b+ba sna nas dpa tsam du da par rlung/
337a6(rgyud): baji po tshig gi lam//bas+yA sa deng bral tshul/ ma da s+ho//gdu brje ny-id tshig sa ma 'das/rnamakha' 'din yid med kyi
337a7(rgyud): pa mas na rgyad par 'gyug/sekhas pa ni sa ni lta ba //dang //de bzhin nyid ni med med sa//byis pa rnams ni rtsed par 'gyun
337b1(rgyud): blogang+gA dku de lta min//rtsod pa shes rab 'chal bar zad//'di ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad//ye 'am ngang gi sangs rgyas la//min las yin par 'gyur ma yin//rnga
337b2(rgyud): nyid kyi de nyid la//yin dang min zhes ci byur yod//nu mkha' 'di ni med do zhes//mi shes gang gis rtog par byed//gang shes ye nas yong mi rtog/min par mi rtog tshig mi
337b3(rgyud): brjid//rgyu dang las dang rnams grangs lo//mtshan nyid nges pa ngo bo dang //'bras bu dgongs chad re re 'byung //'di ltar 'dir ni gang gi rgyu//rang 'byung de nyid rtog dpyod bcas//
337b4(rgyud): gang dag gang la skye mched pa//gnyis po 'di dag nyid kyi rgyu//gang las gang min rje snyed pa//khyad par bye brag tha dad pa//des 'byed 'jug 'bral sbyor bcas pa//de 'dzin
337b5(rgyud): phyin ni ma log pa//mngon 'byin don 'dod 'brel pa'o//rnam grangs rnam gnyis don bzhi no//kun la nges par byed pa yin//de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs pa//dngos
337b6(rgyud): meng mi rtog yongasu rdzogs//sau sa tha dad bsam mi khyab//ma 'dres de ltar ji bzhin byed//gang 'dir phyin ci ma log par//yongasu chub pa phul nyid do//kun nas ma
337b7(rgyud): rmongs thams cad gsal//gang la ma 'gags thogs pa med//kun la 'jug gang ma rig gcod//skye mched kun du gyur pa nyid//gang mched gang gi rlung zhugs pa//
338a1(rgyud): mkhas pa'i ye shes tshad myed pa'o//gang la log pa de nyid dag/de nyid phul du phyin pa'i phyir//dmigs bu gsal ba'i sgron ma yis//de nyid de
338a2(rgyud): la blta bar bya//sgron ma'i snang ba mi shes pa//mthong bya kun la mun pas bsgribs//rnams kyang snang bar mi 'gyur te//long ba'i grong khyer chen por 'gro//sgron
338a3(rgyud): 'bar b+ha grang stsal ba//kAnI lA mun pas sangs gas la ba'i//ma nair ma badz+ras de bzhin nyid//snron rtswa dmigs bus mthong bar 'gyur//de ltar dam pa'i grogs so//
338a4(rgyud): dag/rin chen sgron ma 'bar ba'i mi//mun snang dmigs bur ma bsrel bar//de nyid gser mtha dag la rigs//grogs po dag ni sgron ma dam pa srol bar bya'o//zhes
338a5(rgyud): dpongs pa dam pa legs pa bgros pa shes par bya'o//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rnal 'byor mig gi sgron ma bstan pa'i lo'u ste drug cu
338a6(rgyud): bya'o///de nas yang lang ka'i mnga' bdag la sogs pa dman pa dam pa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis dri ba yongasu dris pa/kyai gsang ba po'i bdeg
338a7(rgyud): po khyad par du bla mar 'gro bar bya'o zhes dam bca' bar dgongs pa de ji ltar yongasu shes par bgyi/de skad ces gsol ba las/gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa
338b1(rgyud): kyi grogs po dang khyad par du 'gro bar bya ba da ni lcags shin tu rab tu logasaso//sa dwe ni 'di ltar sa mkhan dam pa rnams kyi rnal 'byor gyis yong su snang ba zhes bya ba'i sgron ma
338b2(rgyud): legs par dkod pa ni 'di lta ste/sa dang sa'i khyad par ni//gang 'dir yangs kyis med pa la//shes bya gcod pa'i khyad par gyis//rang rig mthon dman rim par
338b3(rgyud): zad//dper na rgyal po'i sker mdzod nas//che chung thabs 'dod gang su dag/dka' thub phyi nang khyad par gyis//spyod sgo 'jug pa'i las thabs las//mthon dman rtsal
338b4(rgyud): gyis gang lan po//rgyal po gcig la spyod na yang //rin chen sna 'ga' khyud par dag/thabs chen sgra dgu saM sbyor spyod//rgyal por gyur na de nor kun//dbang skur byed
338b5(rgyud): pa'i bdag po yin//mi gnas ma bcos de bzhin nyid//shes bya de las med pa la//gang 'di rtsal gyi khyad par gyis/so so'i 'jug sgo kun nas spyod//de yi de nyid do/
338b6(rgyud): gcig la//rtsal 'phang mthon dman khyad par gyis//sa'i go 'phang khyad par du//rig pa de ltar snang ba yin//gang 'dir thams cad gi reg pa la//de mthong mi mthun de
338b7(rgyud): dbang gis//dper na 'byung gnas sgo mongs bzhin//sa dang rnam thar so so'i sgo//gcig la sna tshogs de ltar snang //sa dang rnam thar gang dag la//'jug pa la sogs
339a1(rgyud): sa sbyangs kyang //kun gyi rtsa bya 'dis bcad pas//gcig sto tha dad yongs kyis mod//de ni rI dang lhun po dang //kun tu rgyu dang gzhon nu wAr//
339a2(rgyud): mthong thos ston pa'i khyad par ni//don gyis de ltar yod pa yin//des na chos rnams thams cad kyi//gnas pa'i sa nyid sems yin pas//nam mkha' lta bu
339a3(rgyud): dpe'i mtshon te//kun gyis 'dir gang shes par bya//'di ltar gang shes rnal 'byor pa//lam gyi thabs la mkhas pa yi//lam stor lam btsal lam rnyed pas//
339a4(rgyud): nye ldam bder rnyid grub pa'o//gang rnyed de rnyed der gnas pas//rnal 'byor spyod pas sa pa ste//sa kun gcig tu yongs rdzogs la//reg pa mchog 'bring tha ma'i phyir//
339a5(rgyud): gcig pa'ang khyad par bcur snang ba//gang gi ched du bgrang bar bya//'di dag gnas 'dzin spyod pa'i sa//rnam pa bcu phyag gcig gis rdzogs//'gyur dbang ma
339a6(rgyud): nges pa 'di la//bcos ma 'phro men spyod pa dang //tshul rtogs 'dzin dang mos pa dang //legs par 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor lha//'jug ldog ltung dang bcas pa yi//
339a7(rgyud): kun tu 'khor zhing ma nges pa'o//'dun pa sems pa'i rnal 'byor pa//gnas shing spyod pa'i sa zhes bya//brten pas gzhi yi sa 'di la//dang po las can rnal
339b1(rgyud): /'byor pa//bslab pa sbyor dang byis pA la//ngag dang ma dag gis spyod pa'o//bka' snod las kyi rnal 'byor pa//gnas shing spyod pa'i sa zhes bya//gal chen skyong ba'i sa 'di la//
339b2(rgyud): rigs chen 'bying pa'i rnal 'byor nyid//gnas shing sbyor ba'i so yin te//yang mi de'i sa rnams kun//gcod sbyong sbyor ba'i tshul nyid kyis//legs nyes stobs chen 'gyed pa
339b3(rgyud): bslas pa rgyur gyis 'di la//gr-i yo dang thabs dang brtan pa'i drod//de bzhin rtags chen g.yo ba dang //thob pa nyid dang brtan pa yi//rnal 'byor rnams pa drug po dag/bslab pa'i/
339b4(rgyud): mtha' bcu mthar phyin cing //ji ltar zla ba yang gsal bzhin//bslab pa'i ye shes 'phel 'gyur te//don la mi sgrog ngo mtshar skya//spyod sems 'jug pa'i sems dpa'
339b5(rgyud): des//ngan 'gror mi ldog dgon par 'jug/bar chad dag kyang de la 'byung //gsang sgo lung gi rnal 'byor dang //spyod pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor dang //mtshan ma rtags kyi rnal 'byor
339b6(rgyud): gsum//gnas par sbyong ba'i sa zhes bya//bsod nams gter gyi sa 'di la//spyod pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor pa//mos pa dag cing 'dun pa'i gnas//rtsal chen blo yi bsti
339b7(rgyud): gnas sa//bslab pa'i mtha' bcu spyir cheb pa'o//brten pas khyad par 'gro 'di la//dbugs chen 'byor pa'i rnal 'byor pa//rigs chen 'dzin dang mnyam rdzogs tshe//
340a1(rgyud): nges par spyod dang rtsal chen sbyar//yul la 'jug dang rigs pa sbyor//bdud nyid rdzogs par 'gro ba ste//bslab pa'i rgyu 'bras mtha' bcu la//goms
340a2(rgyud): par byed pa'i tshul du sbyor//dal bso ba las thams cad mthong //mi ldogs la goms byar med//'di dag sbyor ba'i gzhi gcig kyang //so sa thun mong ma yin pa'i//sgrib
340a3(rgyud): pa las zhes rtse byed cing //ye shes re re 'char ba'o//des na bslab pa'i mtha' gcig la//mi ldog la sogs rdzogs chen rnams//gang der bded pa re re la//rtsal 'byung /
340a4(rgyud): re 'amar ba ste//tha ma rang 'byung nyid kyis rdzogs//mthar phyin pa dang thob pa dang //mi ldog rnams la rim rtsazhin//rmi la ma dang ni sgra brnyan dang //mngon sum ngas
340a5(rgyud): rigs pas//rnal 'byor rdo rje lung ston pa//rdo rje rdo rje rnal 'byor pa//zhes byar nyid dang sa khams dang //zhing khams kun tu sbags byas nas//rnal 'byor dam par
340a6(rgyud): 'byin pa'o//dmigs pa'i 'bras bu skye 'di la//grub pa'i rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che//nges par 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor gsum//rgyal ba'i thugs lam rgyal skyes shing //
340a7(rgyud): rgyal ba'i sras po gdung 'tsho ba pa//khyad par rtsal 'phang kun rdzogs shing //gang la ting 'dzin sbyor ba'o//gnas pas mi 'gyur sa 'di la//rmad 'byung rol pa'i rnam
340b1(rgyud): 'byor dang //tshegs chen 'dus dang rtsal chen rdzogs//gsum du rdzogs par shes bya ste//phyag rgya chen po sgyu ma yin//'khor los skur ba'i rgyal chen po//mthong ba'i gnas
340b2(rgyud): nas bcu drugs//rdzogs pa'i gnas na longs spyod pa'o//brdal ba chos nyid sa 'di la//rol po rgyan gyi rnal 'byor dang //bde ba tshon dang thog ler rdzogs//gsum nyid
340b3(rgyud): du ni snang ba la//yul de na ye shes des sbyar na//shes par byas pas thams cad rdzogs//sgyu ma'i sgyu ma yin spyod pa'o//rdzogs pa spyir 'chi ba sa 'di la//bcu pa tha ma
340b4(rgyud): dang po las//mthar rdzogs kun gyi rtog yin te//glong yangs na mkha'i snying po la//sprin med nyid ma 'bum gyis brdal//ci snang ci yang ma yin pa//mi skye mi 'gag
340b5(rgyud): ngo bo la//ji ltar bltas dgu der snang ba//brdal khyab mi rgya rlabs kyis bcad//de yang dam pa'i khyad par gyis//bdag nyid chen po'i rnal 'byor dang //lhun gyis grub dang

340b7(rgyud): 'phang mthon dman rnal 'byor pas//mthon dman go 'phangs bgod bya//gang 'dir dri ba'i mchog snang ba//dam par gyur pa'i long ka'i bdag/gang 'dir rnal 'byor
341a1(rgyud): kun sbyor ba//nges pa'i sa bcu rtsa ba 'dir//gang gi rtsa yan lag las//bcu gnyis bdun gnyis rdzogs pa'o//des na sa'i khyad par las//rgya che/
341a2(rgyud): ba dang grangs mang yang //rnal 'byor sa 'dir sbyar bar bya'o//sa dang sa yi 'byung gnas pa//kun bzhi kun gyis chen te//brang gi sa chen 'di nan na//sa rnams skad cig

341b1(rgyud): bya ba 'dzin pa ltar//gang 'dir las kyi dang blo las//gang de myur ba rab tu gtses//do skad ces smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lang kwa'i bdag po
341b2(rgyud): ngos 'di skad ces smra sa//gsazab pa'i bdag po gang thams cad nos thams cad du ye nas sangs rgyas pas na da gdod sangs rgyas par byar med phan chad dgongs pa'i yul la
341b3(rgyud): sbyor ba dang snying rje'i yul du gyur pa gang yang med lags na/'dir snying rje'i yul du gyur pa gang lags/su zhig snying rje'i yul du gyur/de skad ces smras pa dang /gsang
341b4(rgyud): ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/kye lang ka'i bdag po de de ltar kun kyang ye shes phan chad de kho na nyid pas snying rje'i yul dang dgongs pa'i yul gang yang med na yang gang ji

341b6(rgyud): pa ni snying rje chen po yin no//dgongs pa dam pa la 'jug mi dgos shes pa ni dgongs pa dam pa'i yul de kho na nyid la zhugs pa nyid du rig par bya'o//lung ka'i bdag po

342a1(rgyud): ci la'ang mi brnal lo//pra yang yongasu rdzogs pa gang //bya bas bya ba med na yang //de yi rang bzhin phran gzhan pa//yin pas brang 'dir

342a3(rgyud): pra rnal 'byor dam pa nyid las min//gal te gang gi dbang gis na//dam pa'i don dang 'gal 'gyur te//de dang mi mthun nyen chen 'byung //gal te de la de 'byung ///

342a5(rgyud): gyis ni dga' nas bya//slongs mo pa dang slongs la dga'//slong la 'tsho ba'i tshe spyod rnams//ste dang tshan dang brar byas te//snying rje khud pa'i zhing du bya//sman dang 'bru dang

342a7(rgyud): khas blangs te//nad gso' gang slob skyod sgom gra/btsugs te bsti gnas mchod bya zhing //dus kyi 'khor lo'i mchog sbyin bya//gang la dam pa'i lung byung ba//
342b1(rgyud): gsung gi mchod rten kun rten te//brjod dang bsnyen bkur bsti gnas kyis//rgya che yangs pa'i lam rnams bya//gang gi dam pa 'phel 'gyur ba//'di ltar nges pa'i dam pa
342b2(rgyud): dag/smra 'am sbyin nam bstan nam khrid//de ye shes tshad med 'gyur//go mos dang goms par byed po yi//gang de dag par bya ba'i phyir//bsam yul bya ba mang po

342b4(rgyud): kun bsal te//tshad med snying rje'i 'khor lo bskor//sbyin pa'i 'khor lo rgyun mi gcad//chu 'am sa 'am na mkha' 'am//me 'am de bzhin rlung rnams la//sku
342b5(rgyud): gdung spel mchog ring bsrel rnams//brtsam pa'i las tshon 'khor lor bya//mtshams med bzlog par byed pa yi//lus sems rgyud la rdul blags te//'phags
342b6(rgyud): pi'i sprin tshogs pho brang du//rdul skyed lus kyis mchod sems bshags//rgya lnga mnyes las kyi shing bsregs pa//thabs chen sbyor ba'i lam chen las//rnam bzhi
342b7(rgyud): me'i las mchog bya//des ni mtshams med bzlog pa yin//snying rje 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor dge/gang ltar goms ltar non tan bya//de la sogs pa'i rtsa ba
343a1(rgyud): dag/don du mi 'byur kun spang te//nan tan tshogs kyis dpung tshon bskyod//'di ltar las kyi ltung sogs pa//gzhan du spyod pa ma yin te/
343a2(rgyud): cig don ldan rnal 'byor pa//rgyud sbyong don ldan bya phyir dang //gal te rtsol zhen ma ldan no//dge bsags stang chen kun bsdongs te//gang 'dir bsags pa'i
343a3(rgyud): don bsgrangs shing //gdung ba'i shugs phyung rtsal sprugs na//nyi shar chu klung zla brnyan ltar//rang bzhin shugs kyis 'byung bar gtses//de phyir chung ngu yan chad kyang
343a4(rgyud): dam pa'i don du 'gyur par bya//gang 'dir zin dang ma zin pa'i//dngos po brtan g.yo la sogs kun//de bzhin nyid du blo bzhag na//snying rje chen po de nyid do//
343a5(rgyud): lang ka'i bdag po de ltar na//yul gang med pa'i tshul gyis ni//'jug pa med las gang 'jug pa//yul la 'jug pa dam pa'o//de skad ces smras pa las//lang
343a6(rgyud): ka'i bdag po la sogs pa/dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams gang gi rgyun du yul la 'jug pa'i sems pa dam pa rnyed par gyur to//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs
343a7(rgyud): pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las yul dam pa la 'jug pa'i le'u ste drug cu gnyis pa'o////de nas yang lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i seMr+tha
343b1(rgyud): pa de dag gis gsang ba pa'i badrag po la mtshon pa'i dre ba yongasu dris pa kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po me long brtag par bya'o zhes dam bca' bar dgongs pa de ji ltar yongs
343b2(rgyud): brtag par bgyi/de skad ces dris pa las/gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/kye grogs po dag gang la gang gis mtshon pas shes par 'gyur pa'i me long ni 'di ltar
343b3(rgyud): snang dang brtags dang 'byung ba dang //mi chags 'byung snang dag pa dang //gnas 'byung 'thun pa rnam pa bcu//sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla dang //rmi lam sgra brnyan mig yor dang //
343b4(rgyud): mgal me dri za'i grong khyer dang //sprul pa gzugs brnyan me long bcu//'thun pa'i dmigs bcu mtshon par gzhag/dngos po med kyang dngos por snang //dgos nor
343b5(rgyud): snang du btub pa'i dpe'//ji ltar sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ni//skyes bu gang gi rtsol ba dang //sman dang sngags kyi sbyor ba las//dbang po yid 'phrog cir snang yang //de la
343b6(rgyud): 'gro'o dngos po med//'di ltar gsang ba'i rang bzhin yang //med rgyu 'byung ba'i sbyor ba las//ji ltar snang 'byung rang bzhin med//gang 'dir smig rgyu'i rang bzhin
343b7(rgyud): ni//'jigs 'byung g.yo'i ba'i dus dag la//de dang de'i rang bzhin las//byis pa gdungs pa'i 'du shes kyis//chu'i 'du shes nyer bzhag kyang //tshim pa'i
344a1(rgyud): rgyu de rag la 'gyur//de bzhin de yi khyad par yang //kun nas rang bzhin stong pa la//tha snyad mtshan ma myed du gtags//de nyid stong pas de mi dmig/
344a2(rgyud): gang 'dir chu yi zla ba ni//sgrib med mkha' la zla shar ba//gzugs brnyan dang pa'i chu na snang //de la brtags pa'i dngos po med//de bzhin gang yang bkod med par/
344a3(rgyud): de nyid mkha' las gang gsol pa//gang 'dir snang ba de nyid de//de nyid dngos med 'dzin rtog bral//ji ltar mi lam rang bzhin ni//gang zhig gnyis kyis non pa na//
344a4(rgyud): skad cog thang cig yud tsam dang //lo la sogs pa ji skad du//bde sdug sna tshogs myong bar snang //di sangs ci yang mi dmigs ltar//stong nyid cir yang med pa
344a5(rgyud): la//steng pa'i khyad par cir spyad kyang //spyod lam ma chags ji bzhin pos//brtags na dmigs pa kun dang bral//sgra brnyan 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni//rang gi
344a6(rgyud): gnas laM sgras rkyen pas//de bzhin de ltar sgra brnyan 'byung //de nyid ci yang med 'byung yin//gsang sngags gresang ba'i byin rlabs dag/gang gi ched du med 'byung ba//
344a7(rgyud): ci yang med la tso yang 'byung //med rgyu btags chags bltas par snang //gang 'dir mig yor rang bzhin ni//mig nad can la rdzas snang ba//'khrul pa'i de la snang
344b1(rgyud): bar zad//ji ltar snang ba gang yang med//spros bral rang bzhin stong nyid las//cho 'phrul rnam pa ci snang ba//cho 'phrul nyid du snang bar zad//snang ba de drug gang yang med//chu dang
344b2(rgyud): nam mkha' dang bra las//chu bur sprin tshogs tha dad 'gyur//yang 'byung rang zhi'i rab bzhin pas//chu nyid na mkha' nyid du dag/snang dang mi snang ji snyed pa//thams cad
344b3(rgyud): thams cad de nyid las//rang 'byung rang zhi ji bzhin par//dag pa nyid du nges pa'o//dri za'i gnas de nges med pa//de'i gzugs ni gar byung bar//grong khyer de yang de
344b4(rgyud): bzhin 'byung //'byung ba nyid ni der mi brtag/bzhin pa yi de bzhin nyid//gnas pa gnas pa gar gnas par//de nyid gzhal med khang chen snang //snang ba de ltar/
344b5(rgyud): nas ma yin//ji ltar sprul pa'i rang bzhin ni//med 'byung gcig las du mar 'byung //gang 'byung 'khor lo'i rgyun ltar snang //snang ba'i 'byung rgyun 'chad ma yin//
344b6(rgyud): si mnyam mnyam pa'i rang bzhin las//ji lta ba ltar de 'byung ba//gang 'dir 'byung ba rgyun mi 'chad//de la zad med 'phel ba med//gang 'dir gzugs brnyan glang
344b7(rgyud): snang ba/bzhin dang bzhin 'byung dang ba las//brten nas de bzhin gzugs brnyan 'byung //de nyid de nyid tha dad min//gang 'dir rgyu 'bras so se bas//rgyu nyid
345a1(rgyud): 'bras bu de nyid rgyu//de bas de la de gnyis med//de bzhin nyid do de kho na'o//des ni ji snyed pa yi chos//ji bzhin nyid du gcig pas na//
345a2(rgyud): gang ltar ci snang ci byung yang //mi g.yo' ba las 'byung snang med//zab mo gsang ba dam pa 'di//mkha' la rtog 'dra gting dpag dka'o//rnal 'byor mi ldan
345a3(rgyud): gang rtog pa//brtogs pas rtogs par mi 'gyur ro//dper na nyi ma'i snying po ni//mig gi dbang pos rab brtags na//snying po de gang mi rtogs kyi/'od 'bar zil
345a4(rgyud): gyis ming rje la 'gyur//de bzhin byis pa blo zhan pas//snying po don la cir brtags kyang //gsang ba'i snying po mi mthong gis//blo zhan byis pa ga chad rgyal//
345a5(rgyud): des na gsang ba dam pa 'di//mtshon pas shes par mi nus kyang //gang la rmongs pa'i tshogs mtshon phyir//rnal 'byor can la phyogs tsa mo//bsam du med
345a6(rgyud): pa'i chos nyid 'di//bsam dang bral bas de bzhin bzhag/mi brtag bzhag pa'i chos 'di gang //byis pa rnams la ngas ma bstan//brjod pas mtshon pa las
345a7(rgyud): 'das pas//'di zhes bstan du ga la yod//med pas bstan pa'i dmigs mi rnyed//mi dmigs chos la tshig lam med//chos kun na mkha' lta bu ste//nam/
345b1(rgyud): mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med//na mkha'i dbus mtha' mi dmigs bzhin//chos kun mtha' dbus mu dang bral//nam mkha' gang ming brjod byed la//brjod pa de nyid dngos po ste//
345b2(rgyud): de yi tha snyad ming brjod kyang //nam mkha' de la 'gag mi 'gyur//'di la mi rtogs gang brjod pa//brjod pa de nyid rnam rtog ste//rnam rtog rnam rtog ci brjod kyang //de la gnyis
345b3(rgyud): med 'gag mi 'gyur//gang 'dir gnyi su 'dod pa dang //dpung mthar 'byed pa thams cad gol//mnyam zhes bya ba'i tha snyad kyang //gnyis dang dpung mthar rnam 'byed las//
345b4(rgyud): kye ma 'di gcig chos kyi spun//thams cad de las med bzhin du//gnyis 'di phan chad rnam rtog yin//kun kyang nges pa 'di ltar zhag/grogs po dag de dag ni me long brtag par
345b5(rgyud): bya'o zhes dgongs pa dam pa nges par bgros pa shes par bya'o//de skad smras pas lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams yang dag par nges par
345b6(rgyud): 'jog par gyur to//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las/nye bar mtshon pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug cu gsum pa'o////de nas yang lang ka'i
345b7(rgyud): bdag po la sogs pa dman pa dam pa rnams kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la gang du 'dir mdo bcu bkod pa'i dgu pa dri ba yang su dris pa/kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po che 'thun par
346a1(rgyud): sbyar bar bya'o zhes dam bca' bar dgongs pa de ji ltar yongasu shes par dgyi/de skad ces dris pa las/gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/
346a2(rgyud): lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni 'di ltar yongasu shes par bya ste/mun pa chen po mun 'khregs pa'i//byis pa'i khams kyi grol khyer du//rtag pa rgyun gyi 'khor mor 'dir
346a3(rgyud): nges par 'jug pa'i bya ba dag/dgongs pa dam pa kun 'dus pas//gang gi spyod yul ga 'gyur pa//ji ltar gsungs pa ji stod pa//'dir ni gsum du shes par bya//
346a4(rgyud): cha 'thun 'thun 'jug thibs 'dzud pa//sbyor dang spyod pa 'asre ba yis//thams cad thams cad ci rigs par//dam pa'i don du nges par sbyor//lang ka'i bdag po
346a5(rgyud): 'di lta ste//cha 'thun sbyor ba gang 'jug pa//gang zhig gang du der nges la//de dag nyid dang 'thun par spyad//yongs kyis de dang 'thun bsten na//de nyid de la 'gyur
346a6(rgyud): bar bya//de dag dam par bya ba'i phyir//de dag 'thun pas gang sbyar bas//yid kun drangs te bcu gcod bya//gang gi yid 'phrog 'dron 'jug pa//ji ltar yid
346a7(rgyud): 'od kho na//nan tan gyis ni de nyid do//dper na mun pa'i khams dag na//gang gis gang dag gang gyur pa//de yi yid la de zhugs te//de dang dacig mi gzhan
346b1(rgyud): pas//de nas de yi de rig nas//de yi dbang sgyur thab thob ste de nyid skur ba'i tshig lam 'byung //de 'das dam pa kho na yi//yid la zhubs pas e malo 'khrul//'dir nyes 'dir
346b2(rgyud): log lhangs sogs bsngo//de nang 'di ni kho nas byas//gang 'dir dam par 'jug 'di la//dam pa kho nar 'jug par 'os//de nas de yi de nyid de//'on pas gang gi de nyid kyang //
346b3(rgyud): 'on cing dam pa'i yul la 'jug/lang ki'i bdag po ji ltar mi de yang ji lta bu zhe na//kho bos mthong thos skad cig na//bdag gi bshes gnyen dam pa des//'dus pa phal mo
346b4(rgyud): che dag la//lam 'di rgya cher bstan pa'i tshe//'khor der 'dus par gyur pa yi//lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo//bu mo drug gi 'khor 'dus pas//dga' bas klu bro gar gyis
346b5(rgyud): bstan//dgyes pa chen po'i gnyis pas bstabs//de tshe dam pa'i yul min yang //dam pa gsang ba mchog nyid kyis//de nyid spyod 'thun grol ba yis//yul gyi dam pa
346b6(rgyud): nyid du dgongs//gang des sras kyi tshogs 'dus la//kye ma 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs//nga yi gdung rgyud rigs byung ba pa//lha yi rol mo klu bro gar//snyan dang 'jo sgeg mdzes
346b7(rgyud): pa'i stabs//gang gi yid 'phrog 'jug 'dren thabs//glu yi yan lag sum brgya dang //stabs dang gar thabs mi zad pas//kun sdud kun mnye ba tsha 'thun sbyor//dam pa da
347a1(rgyud): yis de gsungs pa//de nas mus kyi de kho na//blo gros zangs ldan nyid kyis 'dir//gang dag gang 'dul rig nas ni//'jig rten drug dang 'thun sbyor phyir/
347a2(rgyud): gang gi gnas nas 'thun g.yos te//gar mchog glon ltar 'gyur ba yi//dpal ldan lag pa bye ba yis//na mkha'i khams 'di yongs bkod nas//gom pa'i stobs
347a3(rgyud): kyis gar byed cing //klu yis yan lag sum brgya'i sgra//srid gsum 'brug sgras gang ba ltar//mtha' thug med pa'i 'jig rten drug/gang bas yid 'phrog 'dren par byed//
347a4(rgyud): theg chen rmod 'byung gsang ba'i tshig/tshig gcig bsgyur bas tshig mtha' yas//tshig lam rab tu bral ba'i don//zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ston//e ma'o ngo
347a5(rgyud): mtshar rmad kyi chos//rmad 'byung rol pa'i don 'byung /cha 'thun sbyor ba'i khyad par las//'jig rten drug tu rol pa 'byung //'khor ba'i lam rgyud gcad pa'i phyir//
347a6(rgyud): 'jig rten drug gi snying po la//thugs rje thabs kyi 'od 'phros pas//rgyud drug dngos po thams cad sregs//spyod lam ma chags ye shes kyis//cha 'thun thabs su
347a7(rgyud): sbyar ba'i phyir//'jig rten byis pa'i spyod pa bzhin//'jig rten bu mo drug dang rol//stabs drug baspyod pas 'gro drug bsgral//glu drug blangs pas yul drug
347b1(rgyud): drungs//tshig drug sbags pas don drug rdzogs//lo log g.yeng ba'i sa gzhi la//brtson 'grus myur bcang shes stabs//tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi bstan pa'i glu/don grub//
347b2(rgyud): rdo rje gsang ba'i chog/nga rgyal ri bo'i sa gzhi la//dpa' bo cham ngam gyad kyi stabs//sil snyan 'bum gyis snyan pa'i glu//zhi gnas mi rtog na mkha'i tshig/kun nas
347b3(rgyud): 'dus pa'i sa gzhi la//khyu mchog lnga yis rol ba'i stabs//glu gar yid 'brog snyan pa'i glu/'dzin pa'i rtod phur 'byin pa'i tshig/gti mug 'dus pa'i sa gzhi la//
347b4(rgyud): seng ge rngam pa'i rol pa'i stobs//kA la ping ka'i dbyangs snyan glu/ye nas don gyis gsal ba'i tshig/chag pa 'dus po'i sa gzhi la//rdo rje khyung chen ldings pa'i stab/
347b5(rgyud): 'brug chen 'dir bas snyan pa'i glu/yid bzhin nor bu 'bar ba'i tshig/zhe sdang 'dus pa'i sna gzhi la//khro bo ma rungs khro ba'i stabs//srin mo ma rangs gros pa'i glu//
347b6(rgyud): rdo rje bu yug skar gda'i tshig/rmad 'byung gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas//ye shes 'bar ba'i mi 'byung bas//khams gsum 'khor ba'i bud shing bsregs//srid gsum
347b7(rgyud): 'khor ba'i khrag mtsho skams//nga rgyal ri bo rmang nas bshig/zhe sdang 'bar ba'i me dpal bsad//gti mug mun pa gtan nas bcom//'khor ba 'dus pa'i 'dam rdzab
348a1(rgyud): skams/lang ka'i badrag po 'di dag ni//gang gri cha dang 'thun sbyar bas//dam pa'i don la sbyar ba yis//byis pa 'drid pa'i rol pa'o//lang kwa'i bad
348a2(rgyud): po gzhan yang gang //thabs 'dzud bsre ba'i brtul zhugs ni//'jig rten log srod ji lta bar//brtul zhugs spyod pa'i khyad par spyod//wa dang cang shes kyi ling dang ///
348a3(rgyud): shin tu glang chen myos 'dra ba/dpa' brtul za byed gtum rngam 'khrug/mkha' lding khyung chen gang mi lta//gtumi thung sdong chen 'jigs 'dril ba//gang thub mi ldog
348a4(rgyud): rgya mtsho'i gser//mun ltar lkug pa'i blo tshul ldan//lhun po mi 'gyur brtan pa che//mkha' ltar yangs dog kun dang bral//ga nam lcags lce'i drag shul can//
348a5(rgyud): grag shul chen po brtul zhugs bdag/khu 'phrog lta bu zan can blo//nges pa'i nga rgyal glang chen brtun//zla meng seng ge gcig brjod dang /reg 'angam bya ltar
348a6(rgyud): chags 'grogs pa//sgyu ma sgyu ma'i tshul 'drid pa//gang la rtogs med kun spyod nyid//thogs med myur spyod za byed kha//yud ltar myur 'gyogs glog ltar 'gyur//
348a7(rgyud): gang gi gang bsrung na mkha' lding //sa thub bag lan rgyal 'khor sbyong //rnal 'byor brtul zhugs chen po ni//bcu gnyis dang ni gsum blor ldan//gang 'dir
348b1(rgyud): nya masu len byed pa//rnal 'byor gsang ba'i thabs mchog ste//gang la 'jud pa bsro ba yi//tshul khrims thams cad gcag spyod pa'o//lad+ya kA'i bdag po gzhan yang gang /
348b2(rgyud): 'thun pas 'jug par spyod pa ni//de nyid de ltar de bzhin to//gang dang 'dra tshul gang yin pa'o//'dod chags pho mar gyur pa la//pho mor snang bya gang yin la/
348b3(rgyud): po mo med las po mo snang ba 'thun 'jug spyod//'dod la chags pas khri 'gyur la//khro bar 'dod las khro bar snang ba gang yin la//khro bar snang ba 'thun
348b4(rgyud): 'jug spyod//'dod la chags pas mun snang la//mun par 'dod las mun par gyur pa gang yin la//mun pa med las mun par snang ba 'thun 'jug spyod//ji ltar
348b5(rgyud): grang ltar de bzhin du//de la sogs pa mtha' yas par//thams cad thams cad der snang ba//'thun 'jug spyod pas don byed yin//lang ka'i bdag po de dag
348b6(rgyud): ni 'thun par 'jug par bya'o zhes de skad ces smras pas/lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa dam pa rnams mtha' thug pa med pa'i lta spyod la yongasu rtag
348b7(rgyud): pa med par gyur te//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las sgyu ma rol pas rnam par grol ba'i le'u zhes bya ste drug cu bzhi pa'o///
349a1(rgyud): de nas yang lang ka'i badrag pos gsang ba ba'i bdug po la dri ba yongs su dris pa/kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po nad gso' bar bya'o zhes dam bcwal
349a2(rgyud): bar dgongs pa de ji ltar yongasu shes par bgyi/de skad ces yongasu dris pa las/gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/lang ka'i bdag po 'di ltar grong khyer gsum gyi nad
349a3(rgyud): bapa gso bar bya'o//nad kyi gzhi rtsa la mkhas par bya'o//nad sbyang ba'i thabs la brtson par bya'o//sman pa dam pa rnams bsten par bya'o//gnyen po dam pa'i sman bsrel
349a4(rgyud): zhing spel bar bya'o//sman sbyar ba la mkhas par bya'o//sman gyi lam bsrung bar bya'o//nad pa'i tshogs dang mi 'bral bar bya'o//nod kyi rgyun gcad par bya'o//nad kyi
349a5(rgyud): gnyen por 'gyur bar bya'o//lang kwa'i bdag po de la grong khyer gsum ni mi snang ba'i grong khyer dang /kun snang ba'i grong khyor dang //phyed sgreng ba'i grong khyer ro//nad
349a6(rgyud): gzhi rtswa ni mun pa chen po las byung ba'i zug rngu'o//nad sbyang po'i thabs ni sman dang sman par sbyar ba'o//sman dam pa ni bshes gnyen dam pa'o//gnyen po dam pa'i
349a7(rgyud): sman ni zhi gnas nas lhag mthong ngo //sman sbyar ba ni de dag nyid du sbyor ba'o//sman gyi lam bsrung ba ni de bzhin nyid las mi 'da' ba'o//nad pa'i tshogs dang mi 'bral
349b1(rgyud): ba ni 'khor ba la mi skyo bya'o//nad kyi rgyan gcad par bya ba ni/thams cad de nyid du nges pa'o//nad kyi gnyen por gyur pa ni 'khor ba yongs su sgrol ba'o//lang ka'i bdug po de//
349b2(rgyud): yang gang //kho bos mthong thos skabs cig na//kun gyi bshes gnyen dam pa des//dur khrod bdag po btul ba'i tshe//'jig rten gtso' bo kun 'dus nas//skyes kyi chags
349b3(rgyud): su bkod pa yi//'dus pa phal po che dag las//'khor der 'dus par gyur pa yi//wAr las gyur pa'i log sde ba//sman gyi brtul zhugs cher spyad pa//drang srong nag po ka la
349b4(rgyud): yis//gang der 'dun nas don gsol pa//tshe mchog sman gyi rgyal po khyod//dug 'joms sman gyi dkyil 'khor 'dzini//nad do cog gi dgrar gyur pas//thug rngu'i nad rnams
349b5(rgyud): zhi bar mdzod//de skad zhu ba 'dun pa las//che mchog sman gyi rgyal po des//drang srong de la rjes dgongs nas//sngon 'dus gsungs pa gang gsungs pa//khams gsum za
349b6(rgyud): me tog nang du//srid gsum sems can dug chen rnams//dus gsum sangs rgyas rtsi sbyar bas//rang 'byung bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs//de skad nges par gsungs pa las/
349b7(rgyud): nag po ka las don gsol pa//rang bzhin snang ba'i lus 'od las//yo byad chen po lnga byung ba//dug lnga sel po'i bdud rtsi ste//drang srong rnams kyi sman gyi mchog/de skad
350a1(rgyud): des par 'dun pa lus//sman pa dam pas 'di skad gas su//rang 'byung bud nas dag pa ste//rgyu brgyad sto las sbyar ba'i smran//rigs lnga dam chog
350a2(rgyud): lnga'i dongos//ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas//rgyud lnga'i sems can kun sgrol phyir//dug lnga sel ba'i bdud rtsi mchog/de skad ces gsungs nas cing mi gsung bar
350a3(rgyud): bzhug so//de nas ka la nag pos yang gsol pa//rang las byung bas gzhan du min//dengs skyigs kho nar zad pas dag/rngu ba brgyad dang yan lag sbyong //nyis sbyar lnga dang /
350a4(rgyud): rdzogs par 'gyur//de skad zhu ba 'dun pa las//'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i sras//blo gros thabs ldan khyod nyid kyi//zhen pa 'grol ba'i thabs 'di smras//zagapa
350a5(rgyud): phyi ma rdzas lnga po//'byung ba dang ni zas khams kyi//rgyun gyi rgyu las byung bas na//rang las me byung gzhan 'byung yin//grogs po dam pas de smras pas//kau ya nag pos
350a6(rgyud): yang smras pa//ji ltar gal te de ltar na//'gal ba nyid du yin zin na/rang 'byung rang 'byung zhes bya ba'i//chos de gang nas rnyed par 'gyur//de skad dri ba dris pa las/
350a7(rgyud): dam pa nyid kyis des blan pa//rgyu dang rkyen las ma brten par//gang zhig 'byung ba'i chos yod na//gzhan las ma byung byed med pas//chos de rang 'byung nyid du 'dod/
350b1(rgyud): do skad smras pas de ldan du//ka la nag pos 'di skad du//spangs pas spongs par mi 'gyur te//bdag las rgyun du 'byung ba'i chos//gzhan las ma byung rgyu 'bras med//chos do/
350b2(rgyud): gang yi ni rang 'byung yin//de la de yis 'di skad du//mi spang dang du blang ba'i chos//dus dang rnam pa thams cad du//'du 'bral med pa'i gnas 'os na//'byung rgyun 'gag na de/
350b3(rgyud): rgyun 'gag/de la 'di ltar 'di skad du//nag po ka las slar bran pa//bdud rtsi yin pas rang gnyer gyi//las rnams so sor byed par nus//'jig rten dag na phan 'dogs pa//
350b4(rgyud): gang nas de la rtsi zhes grags//de la 'dir ni 'di skad du//grogs mchog dam pas de lon pa//bdud rtsi zhes ni brjod pa las//bdud rtsi'i las ni gnyis yod de//nad gser
350b5(rgyud): shi ba slong byed na//de gnyis mthu dang yong mi ldan//de smras lan du 'di skad du//ka la nag pos de blan pa//sngon gyi rgyal ba grangs med kyis//brtul zhugs 'di lnga gtsor
350b6(rgyud): spyad na//dom tshig dam par bzung bas na//sngon gyi dam tshig yin par grags//de la dam pas 'di skad du//sangs rgyas dam tshig yin nges na//dang po nas bzung rdzogs par
350b7(rgyud): do//de dang mi 'bral ldan dgos na//zag rgyun chad na 'bral 'gyur 'gal//de la ka las 'di skad du//bdag de rtag par 'gyur ba yis//zag pa de yang rtag pa ste//
351a1(rgyud): kun nas kun du mi 'bral zhing //zad nas bral ba ga la yod//de la dam pas 'di skad du//phyi dang nang gi zag pa rnams//thams cad thams cad kun
351a2(rgyud): zad pas//sa dang rnam thar las rnams lta//ci smos kun snang zag lam zad//de la ka las 'di skad du//ji ltar gal te de ltar na//'gal ba nyid du yin zin na/
351a3(rgyud): thams cad mnyam par 'ches pa rnams//mnyim pa nyid du mi 'gal lam//de la dam pas 'di skad du//kun du ma 'dres mi shes par//bzang po'i tshig la zla
351a4(rgyud): gtod cing //kun tu bzang por khas 'ches pa//mun pa'i skye mched nyid du 'gyur//yongasu rdzogs par kun mnyam yong //ma 'dres par yang kun du snang //yongs
351a5(rgyud): rdzogs don du ma mthong bar//rdzogs spyod log pa'i lam pa yin//gsang chen thag pa'i tshig dang sgra//gcig la mi gcig so sor snang //ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par phye//
351a6(rgyud): gang nyid nges par grol bar snang //nges par zag 'byung rtsar 'dod na//de dag de bzhin ma bcos par//ye nas stong nyid rtog med pa//yin par nges pa de kho na'o//
351a7(rgyud): de dag ci'i phyir ci zhe na//rnal 'byor nad ni rnam rtog ste//rtag par 'khor ba'i gting mthar 'chi//rtog pa'i rtsa ba phyi nang gi/kun nas zag pa rnam lnga yin//de kun
351b1(rgyud): tezhin nyid stong du//rtog bral mu mtha' med 'byung bas//nad gso shi ba slong ba'o//dam pa mchog des de blun pas//mtshan mas zhen nus dri 'grol to//de nyid der nges rnyed
351b2(rgyud): gzhan min//de nyid tshe mchog sman par 'gyur//lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni nad gso bar bya'o zhes nges par thos pa rnam par bgros pa ste 'di ltar nges par shes par bya'o//
351b3(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag pos de skad ces smras pas/lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman po dam pa rnams mtshan ma'i rtog pa las yongasu grol bar gyur to//sangs rgyas
351b4(rgyud): kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rang 'byung bdud rtsi'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o////bam po bcu pa ste tha mar zug pa//de nas yang lang ka'i
351b5(rgyud): bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la gsol pa/kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyid kyi rgya cher bgros pa'i gsang ba dam
351b6(rgyud): pa 'di ji skad du brjod par bgyi/mdo ni gang du 'dus pa lags/de skad ces gsol pa las/gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/kye lang ka'i bdag po kho bos ji lta ba bzhin
351b7(rgyud): bgros pa'i gsang ba dam pa 'di ni brjod pa'i rnam grangs brgyad brjod par bya'o//mdo ni bcur 'dus par shes par bya'o//lang ka'i bdag po de la rnam grangs brgyad gang
352a1(rgyud): zhe na/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po zhes kyang bya'o//snying po zhes kyang bya'o//rdo rje dgongs pa'i rgyud ces kyang bya'o//rnal 'byor rdzogs/
352a2(rgyud): pa'i lung zhes kyang bya'o//kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo zhes kyang bya'o//theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes kyang bya'o//chos kyi rnam grangs rnam par bkod pa zhes kyang bya'o//
352a3(rgyud): theg pa chen po byung tshul bstan pa'i mdo zhes kyang bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lang ka'i bdag po gang la dgongs po de nyid las mi 'da' ba dang /gang gi spyod yul ma yin zhing
