352a4(rgyud): med pa las thams cad 'byung ba dang /gang gi ye shes yongasu bkod pa dang /'di ltar gang nges pa rnal 'byor du lung ston pa dang /'dir kun rngub pa dang dam pa rnams
352a5(rgyud): kyis mngon par chud pa dang /gang la ma 'dres par bkod pa dang /gnas skabs bcu gnyi su nges par byung zhing 'byung ba'i phyir ro//lang ka'i bdag po mdo bcur 'dus pa
352a6(rgyud): gang she na/gang mtha' bcu kho nar 'dus pa ste/de yang 'di khyer gzhi gzung bar bya'o//rgyud dgrol bar bya'o//sgo dbye bar bya'o//mthar phyin par bya'o//'du bar bya'o//la
352a7(rgyud): dor bar bya'o//sa gcad par bya'o//nyams rnyed par bya'o//tshigs chung bar bya'o//mdo gcig tu bya'o//lang ka'i bdag po de la chos thams cad kyi gzhi na dam tshig yin/
352b1(rgyud): pAr shes par bya'o//dam tshig gnas ni 'di lta ste//bsrung bya bsrung du med pa ni//chos nyid du mchog dam pa yin//kun kyang dam pa nyid yin pas//gang la'ang 'gal bar/
352b2(rgyud): mi bya'o//su lo dam pa 'di gnas pa//reg 'dzin dam pa'os pa yin//bsrung bar bya ba'i yul rnams la//sgyu gsog g.yo med dam pa nyid//zab sangs rgya che dam pa
352b3(rgyud): 'dir//'di skad grugs pa'i tshul khrims dang //rtog pa'i bya ba ji snyed par//kun 'dir dam bsrungs rnam par dag/dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che//kun gyi thun ming me yin
352b4(rgyud): phyir//mos pa chung ngu thams cad la//bsrung ba'i mtshams dag gzung bar bya'o//theg chen yongasu gsang ba dag/snod ma yin par gyur pa la//phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi//
352b5(rgyud): spro ba'i thabasu bsrung bar bya'o//bstan pa'i gnas min snod gang dag/rnam po bzhis bsdus bye brag rnams//ma 'ongs rnal 'byor dam pa yis//bo rtags nas gsang bar bya/
352b6(rgyud): phyir bshad//gsang chen yid bzhin nor bu 'di//skyon yod nyes pa ma yin te//blo chung rnams lnga phan don du//thugs rjes thobs kyis shin tu gsang //'jig rten pa dang
352b7(rgyud): thig dam dang //log sred log la phyogs la zhe na//dad med blo nan g.yang rmugs shing //gang la mi brtson mun par mtshungs//'di log dam nyams 'di las log/
353a1(rgyud): chub zad ma ting nus chad//sems kyi myu gurgya chog pa//ngan 'gro'i mdam du kha stan yi//gsung ba'i don rnams sbyar smra yang //gab pa'i gsung
353a2(rgyud): 'di ma shes//g.yon can shes rnam glegs rnams la//gsang bar ltos pa lhag par sgra//yan lag rnam bzhi de nyid la//sgra thib don med nyams mi len//gang gis
353a3(rgyud): gang gtad mi thub pa//bcud med 'khor bar zag pa yi//lha dang dmachib spyod pa yi//dam pa'i mdzod gsum sbyar sgra yang //zhen pa'i mtha' med gnas ma gyur//g.yo
353a4(rgyud): sgyu phrag dog ser snas gdungs//bye med chos la dris 'dzin cing //de la de nyid de med par//rnal 'byor can lnga dman zer bu//dam pa pham 'gyur 'khor bar 'gro//tshul
353a5(rgyud): rtog rgyud ldan khyad tshig 'dzin//kho gsag lce gnyis skur byed cing //gang la smad rmongs dam can to//tshe gcig dregs pa'i chad phyir rung //chu ga mo sgra ldan sgyu 'drid pa/
353a6(rgyud): zang zing phyir 'bring tshig la dga'//rlom sems brjid 'dod tshul chos pa//lig sgra dug can tha mar lhung //'di ltar pham 'gyur snod ngan la//gsong chen gisang ba de
353a7(rgyud): na//zad cing gteng dpag dka' bas na//bstan kyang pham ljang gan su 'gyur//de bas bstan par bya ba min//gal te bstan par gyur na ni//ston sgra nyan byed de dag gang
353b1(rgyud): sang sun du byud /sa gyur//rnam 'byor ma khas gsas don lda /rnas rgyur chu ga dag gyis/gas shos cag dog das/
353b2(rgyud): rnam grwa mo ci ba spyod pa//de snying bal ba'i glang sa mnyam par//'bras bri ni bzang myong bar 'gyur//la te da nga rjes sbyin pa// pa skyelta bar gsong 'a thu /
353b3(rgyud): mkha' gsal don ldan gyis kya ni//gong ma bzhin du nges bsams na//de yid gnas ngan len pa ste//mkhas pas de la skyob mi nus//rnal 'byor tshul byung dpe
353b4(rgyud): mtshon cha'i tshig gi di rtags shing //sgro smyung gru glang ngan brjod na//dmyal ba'i rdo rjer de ltung 'gyur//zhar las byung ba'i rnam smin yang //ji lta ba nyid de ltar 'gyur//skal
353b5(rgyud): dman pa'i rnal 'byor pa//nyams skyon na ni rang bzhin ni//ngan rgyu khyo gtum ldan pa dang //mi zad 'dra med las spyod byed//gang dag mi shes ngang tshul can//byas par
353b6(rgyud): rlung bzhin bzhan pas//shin tu dman pa'i lta ba yis//chala'i chos pA la ltos par byed//bad+ma du dam pa'i dam par ldan//byams tshul rtag tu bzed gnas pa//
353b7(rgyud): tshul shis don rnams de bzhin spong //de la gang dag 'dun pa med//dam tshig spre ltar spyad bzhin du//byang chub skyeng ba thob pa yi//sangs rgyas nam yang mi 'gyung/
354a1(rgyud): 'byung bar yang dag das ma mthong //rgyal ba'i sras gyur rnal 'byor pa//lam ston skyon sel mkhas pa la//gang dag kha cig dregs dbang gis//du
354a2(rgyud): sdong thabs kyis de dmar byed//de ni 'khor ba'i gting rdo ste//nams kyang thar pa'i khor mi 'byung //me shes rmongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa//yang dag dam par tes 'gro ba'i///
354a3(rgyud): rdzi 'gro bar mi byed cing //zang zing 'dod par gang lta ba'i//rje su 'gro zhing der 'dun byed//de ni log pa'i lam pa yin//rnal 'byor lha dang byang chub khe//'ban thag chad par
354a4(rgyud): blo mi 'byung //zang zing 'dod dang g.yo sprul be//chung ngu'ang tse sgrub srog dang sngo//rnal 'byor dam pa'i rang bzhin can//bum snod nang gi sgron ma ltar//rig pa mdzod kyi don
354a5(rgyud): ldan yang //srog chags kun po'i sder mo ltar//khong nas gang sngas don ston la//gang 'dir blun pos cir mi mthong //dper na 'di 'dra tshul gcig ste//gang gi lus
354a6(rgyud): la gter 'chang mi//blun por gyur pa'i me dag gnyis//gnas gcig gnyis mtshungs khyad med 'dra//gsang 'di sngags pa rjod byed cing //gsang ba don du gnyer ba
354a7(rgyud): med//ting 'dzin bsngags pa rjod byed cing //ting 'dzin don du gnyer ba med//yang dag bsngags pa brjod byed cing //yang dag don du gnyer ba med//dam tshig
354b1(rgyud): bsngags pa brjod cing //dam tshig dran du gnyer ba med//ji ltar 'gro gang la la dag/nor bu rin chen 'di 'dra ste//'dod pa'i yon tan kun 'byung blas//de yi yon tan rgyu
354b2(rgyud): cher rjod//de la 'gro gang gzhan dgu gis//de ltar 'dod pa 'byung 'gyur ba//de dag cung zad yod dam zhes//dris kyang med pas slar smras pa//gang zhig dgos pa skong ba yi//
354b3(rgyud): yon tan chung zad smos par zad//de nyid dag la mod ces smra//de bzhin rnal 'byor mi rtson pas//bslab par bya ba'i chos bral bas//dam pa'i bsngags pa brjod byed kyang //
354b4(rgyud): de dag la ni dam pa med//de la sogs pa'i longs spyod rnams//dam pa nyid dang phrad par dka'//rnal 'byor chos 'dzin gang drug gis//rnal 'byor nyams 'gyur log sbed
354b5(rgyud): can//gsang ba 'jigs pa'i sgrar bltas nas//de dog sdig pa mthong ba ltar//'chad cings cing gang byed pa//skyes bu de ni dam pa'i sras//dper na gang dgang dag gis///
354b6(rgyud): gang gi rgyal khrims 'das 'gyur na//rang dga' mi gtong lugs dang sbyor//bka' yi yo spongs dka' ba de//rgyal ba'i thugs mnyes dam pa zhes//kun le snang ba grags
354b7(rgyud): par 'gyur//ldum rang dug gi sdong skyes na//ldum pas dug de shes mo thag/rtsad nas byung ste med par byed//ci phyir ldum zas de dag la//dug 'phel byur na 'tsho phyir//
355a1(rgyud): rlung drug nyams 'gyur du ba can da//rtul thugs n+dan gyi rnab 'byor pas//gnas sam lo yis shugs te sbyang //gang drug mo spong mgon byed pa/
355a2(rgyud): de dag gsang ba'i dam skye yin//don la rnal 'byor gang zhig gis//tha tshigs zab mor bcas rnams la//bsrung ba'i bsam pa mi g.yo bzhin//rtsa ba yan lag bca
355a3(rgyud): rnams la//gal te mtshor zhig 'gyur yang //rnam smin yod kyang rtsa mi nyams//ji ltar glang po e na ya//shi nas ror ni gyur mod kyang //'ag wang rtsis ni don byed ltar//
355a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor nyams to ror gyur kyang //gzhan gyi dam par de 'gyur zhing //de yi don byed nus pa yin//de lta mod kyang 'di kun rnams//rmi lam du yang mthong mi bya//ci phyir
355a5(rgyud): ma nyung ngu zhig/rus pas 'o ma kun zung bzhin//rnal 'byor nyams 'gyur gcig gis ni//rnal 'byor can kun ma ngas 'gyur//'khor ba'i g.yul rgyal byed pa yi//
355a6(rgyud): log pa'i rnal 'byor thams cad kun//don dam nges pa'i rnal 'byor pas//thams cad bsgrims te spang bar bya//gal tem sbyangs log spyod na//'khor ba'i g.yul ni d+hal
355a7(rgyud): 'gyur te//bden pa'i byin rlabs mthu chung 'gyur//kun kyang dge sbyong don chung zhes//yang dag don la yid 'byung zhing //log pa'i chos la gzhol bar 'gyur//kun
355b1(rgyud): log pa'i las spyad pas//yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs 'byung //nges na skur gnyis byas pas+ya//kA yi chad pa yang yin pa//ye shes can lta rang bzhin gyis//nam yang gnong /
355b2(rgyud): pa yongs mi mdzod//de yi 'khor na gnas phyi yi//de dag mu rungs mthu chen rnams//rnal 'byor log par spyod rnams kye//skyon mthong tsaman chad pas gcod//thams cad dun
355b3(rgyud): 'gror spyi'u tshugs ltung //sgrub pa'i gnod mchog gcig yod de//'di dang mi mthun kun rdzogs pa'i//rgyud ldan don ldan dang tshul bzang //ci la'ang chags med stong ldam
355b4(rgyud): sems//shes rab rnam grol lde mig gi/gti mug tha mar blo phye nas//chos kyi rgyal po'i mig ldan pas//mtha' dang dpung bral dam pa'i yul//ma nor lam du 'jug
355b5(rgyud): shes pas//stong chen sdong por rab tu dul//tha tshigs lung las 'byung ba bzhin//drang srong dka' thub dam pa de//dram pa'i dam pa nyid yin pas//de la gsang sgo dbye bar
355b6(rgyud): bya//ji ltar dge' thub thub pa ltar//de ltar yid bzhin nor bu ste//yid 'ong 'dod dang bde ba 'byung //rigs 'dzin rgyal bye phun yum mo//de bzhin dka' thub rlom pa
355b7(rgyud): 'di//gnas pas rten pa'i gzhi yin te//dka' thub kun gyi sreg kyang yin//dam pa kun gyi nor mchog go//dam pa 'di ni 'jigs par skyes//dam pa'i bgrod pa'i lam
356a1(rgyud): mi mchog/dam pa chu bo sgrol ba'i glu/de bzhin dngos grub dam pa yin//dam tshig grogs kyi mchog yin te//dam tshig lcong ba'i dmigs bu yin//
356a2(rgyud): gzhan sde 'joms pa'i dmag dpung yin//'khor ba'i g.yul las rgyal bar byed//des na dam pa'i gtan tshigs yin//ci nas gang gi sgo gsum po//dag pa gsum
356a3(rgyud): gyi mtha' bzung nas//gang 'dir dbang bzhi sun mi 'byung //sgo gsum mi gnod dang bcas zung //yongasu ma nyams mdo bzhi'o//mthar byin rgya rtags rnam bzhir bcas//
356a4(rgyud): mdo dran pa ya bgrang zhing bsngo//'dul ba'i rgyun ldan tha tshigs can//mos pa chung ba'i bu rnams kyis//phra mo'i phra mo pra yan cad//nanA tan gyis ni bsrung bar bya//sku dang //
356a5(rgyud): gsung thugs rdo rje yi//gsung dang spyod dang yid 'ong dang //mi mdor shes bya grub pa dang //med dang byal ba gcig po dang //lhun gyis grub pa rnams pa bcu//lta ba
356a6(rgyud): 'di las shum phrag 'byung //rnal 'byor rnal 'byor thams cad kyi//spyad par bya yi nor mchog yin//rnal 'byor dam pa'i rigs rgyud las//nges par brtags te
356a7(rgyud): spyod pa'i bu//zab mor rdzogs mchog bde ba yi//blo la nges pa'i lung 'di bstan//'di yi sngon 'gro dam tshig sde//zab mo la sogs kun sngon du//rdo rje tha tshigs
356b1(rgyud): d+ha pa yi//gcan 'phong lam+b+ha rnams bsrung ba'i phyir//spyi dang khyad par dam tshig rnams//des bu'i don gyis brtsan dgan+d+ha//de ni dbyig gi stong chen yin//de ltar dam pa
356b2(rgyud): sdom pa la//gnas nas dus kyi skabs dag du//bsrung bya thob par bya ba ni//brtul zhugs spyod pa'i dam tshig dag/dam tshig kun gyi thog mar 'gro/don du mi 'gyur kun
356b3(rgyud): spangs nas//kun dang 'thun phyir de ltar spyad//mi shogs pa ni seng ge ste//gcan zan rgyal po yin pas so//za ma tog ni rgyal po'i mdzad//dug spyo ba ni der mi rigs//
356b4(rgyud): rin chen myu gu'i lcug phran dag/breg sa te 'byung rgyun gcad ma yin//gangs kyi zhun chu phal pa yang //mkhas pas btung bar mi bya'o//pad+ma'i zo 'bru kha mi dbye//zla zer
356b5(rgyud): ma yin dbye mi bya//ma brtags bug rdal can snod du//bdud rtsi sman blugs zag par 'gyur//don med bcos ma'i tshul rtags can//bsrel zhing spyad par bya ba min//shel
356b6(rgyud): dkar rin chen sgo nga dag/mdam khung rdzab du bsgrib mi bya//seng ge dkar mo'i 'o ma dag/gser snod ma yin glugs mi bya//yid bzhin nor bu rin pa che//bsreg par
356b7(rgyud): bya ba yong ma yin//khyung chen gshog pa mkhar brkyang ba//de dag gcig par bya ba min//gan mi lcags mi yi ngur mi dag/brdab par bya ba ma yin no//stag sar
357a1(rgyud): rol pas las byas pa'i//las kyi rjes la bzlas mi bya//rdo rje brag chen gtams pa'i gzhi//gzhig par bya ba ga la yin//rdo rje ra ba'i re ga de//
357a2(rgyud): bsdam bya bral bar bya ba min//bud shing sreg pa'i sgron ma de//mthor rlung drag pos bskyod mi bya//rdo rje tshig gi chu rgyun dag/'ol kar gcad par bya ba min//rgyal po
357a3(rgyud): bka' rtags phyag brgyad dag/rnam gzhar dbyi bar mi bya'o//rdo rje pha lam gtams pa'i mkhar//rmang nas bzlog par mi bya'o//gtsug gi yid bzhin nor bu de//rgyal
357a4(rgyud): mtshan rtswa las dpog mi bya//rnal 'byor thabs kyis khyad par can//rtsal can rnams kyi dam tshig ste//skul ldan dag ni nor mchog yin//rgyun du spyad pa'i nor
357a5(rgyud): mchog ni//rdo rje las kyi bsam gtan dag/rdo rje go phur trom chen gyis//srog la bar chad byed pa'i sgra//nyon mongs thibs po de gzhom bya//snyoms las lo yi
357a6(rgyud): gzhir gyur pa//thugs thub ra gcod nga rgyal ri//dregs byed dbang po nyams pa'i bcud//dpa' byed rkyen yang bsdam par bya//theg chen gsang sngags ma gtogs
357a7(rgyud): pa//mtshan ma gang dag byil pa'i tshig/zur yang brjod par mi bya zhing //thams cad de nyid kho nar bya//ji ltar bsad pa'i mi gang dag/gshed ma mis ni bsod pa'i tshe///
357b1(rgyud): thar pa'i thabs la brtson pa ltar//lce lo dgra bcom brtson par 'bad//rnal 'byor bsgribs pa phyags bsol ba//bka' thub sdom pa'i mdud pa can//'dod spyod zhen
357b2(rgyud): dang me 'thun dang //gcig la gang 'dir mi gcig pa//phyi nang can dang gnod sbyor can//'dod myos bying rmugs brkam pa dag/dad med rtsa nyams 'phyar g.yod can/
357b3(rgyud): mkhas pa yongs kyis spang bar bya//de ni rnal 'byor bgegs yin te//rnal 'byor byar du gcod parlo byed//rnal 'byor dris pas zhugs pa la//rgyun gyi bar du gcod
357b4(rgyud): pa'i bdud//rnam rtog 'phrig pa chen po dang //gang la btang snyoms le lI dang //longs spyod 'du 'jig yeng ba dang //tshig rtsub mtshan tshwa rnon po dang //khro gtum dang
357b5(rgyud): thung shin tu 'khrug/rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i bdud lnga yin//yang dag don la sgrib pa ste//gnyen po byang chub sems mchog gis//zhi ba chen po'i ngang du bzlog/rnal 'byor
357b6(rgyud): nor la 'phro ba'i dgra/thabs la mkhas pas dul bar bya//gang gi rnal 'byor rang bzhin bcos//drang srong nyid las nyams 'gyur te//kha na ma tho grags pa yi//de dag
357b7(rgyud): bcas dgar 'gyur ba'i sgra//lce dman spyod rtsing 'tshol ba yis//lugs bor 'di las log par spyod//bka' log 'phra men las spyod pas//don du mi 'gyur
358a1(rgyud): 'chal ba'i dgra/'da' ka rdo rje dka' thub dam//klong du ma gyur phyal pas 'chal//rtsa ba rul pa'i ljon shing bzhin//'chad pas drug por 'byung
358a2(rgyud): ba'i dgra/rnal ma nyid la sbyor ba de//gang la nges pa'i tshig med na//don rnams brub pa ma yin te//'bras bur mi 'gyur gol ba'i dgra/rna lnga 'byor rnal 'byor spyod pa
358a3(rgyud): la||dam pa'i nor mchog 'phrog pa'i ngagra/thabs la mkhas pa'i blo gros kyis//skyon gyi dgra bzhi bzlog par bya//srid gsum snang ba'i zhing 'di dag/rnam dag zhing du nges
358a4(rgyud): pa ste/sa rnams gcig car sbyangs pas na//zhing rnams dam pa'i mchog yino//'dod spyod mchod pa'i cho gas 'di dag/yo byad chen po'i mchog yin te//dgongs pa dam
358a5(rgyud): pa kun mnyes pa'i//rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa'o//'khor ba dur khrod gnas 'dri dag/bde ba chen po'i gnas yin te//ma nor me bcos chos kyi dbyings//rnol med
358a6(rgyud): lhun gyis grub pa'i sa'o//kun gyi rtsa ba dug tshen lnga//ye shes chen po lnga nyid de//kun shes rang rig rang 'byung bas//rnal 'byor rang rig mig ldan pa'o//lung
358a7(rgyud): ka'i bdag po 'di dag ni//dam tshig gsang ba'i mchog yin te//dam pas gdams pa'i tshig 'di la//gang dag nges pa'i rnal 'byor yin//ji ltar sa gzhi
358b1(rgyud): gshin pa la//brten nas su bon btab pa las//dam pa kho na 'jug par 'os//thun pas gang gi de nyid kyang //kun cing dam pa'i yul la 'jug/lang ka'i 'dag po ji wAr+ya
358b2(rgyud): na de yang ji lta bu zhe na/kho bo mthong thos skabs gcig na//bdag gi bshes gnyen dam pa des//'dus pa phal po che dag la//lam 'di rgya cher bstan pa'i tshe//'khor
358b3(rgyud): 'dir 'dus par gyur pa yi//lha mo gru mo rigs ngan mo//bu mo drug gi 'khor 'dus pas//'bras drug smin par gyur pa yis//gang dag 'tsho ba'i srog 'dzin ltar//chos
358b4(rgyud): rnams kun gyi gzhir gyur pas//dam tshig 'di la gnas pa ni//bla med byang chub rnam smin pas//dge ba'i srog 'dzin dam pa'o//gal to nyams par gyur pa na//
358b5(rgyud): pa'i skye gnas dmyal chen brgyad//mi bzad sdug bsngal drag po yis//'khor lo mtshon cha bzhin du 'khor//lang ka'i bdag po gang 'di las//nyams par gyur pa
358b6(rgyud): gang zhe na//kun tu nyams pa chen po dang //rtsa ba nyams dang yan lag nyams//de bzhin bzlas tams zhar nyams lnga//rtag par rgyun gyi khor mor byung //gang de skad bar
358b7(rgyud): bya ba'i thabs//rnam pa lngar ni bshad par bya//las dang rdzas dang 'dun pa dang //ting nge 'dzin dang de nyid do//las ni rnam lngas bskongs 'gyur te//dang po 'bum
359a1(rgyud): khri gsum pa ste//rtsa nyams khri wa stong gsum mo//yan lag nyams par gyur pA la//stong lnga bcu gsum bon+da par bya//bzlas nyams brgyalnga
359a2(rgyud): bcu gabum mo//zhar gyis nyams par gyur pa lo//bcu lnga gcig gsum dag gis bskongs//rdzas ni rin chen sna lnga yis//rigs kyi dam tshig gang nyams las/
359a3(rgyud): bla ma rigs lnga gang dag la//tha tshigs gang rlag nor des b+hu//'dun pa dad pa dang ba yis//gdung ba'i shugs kyi nga ro yis//rtag par rmag chad pa ni//dmyal chen gan+da
359a4(rgyud): na skyong bzhin du//gnyen po mchog tu de 'gyur te//de ni stong pa dam pa'o//ting nge 'dzin gyi thabs chen yang //'jig rten sreg la me dgos kyang //bag chags sgeg la
359a5(rgyud): me mi dgos//rig pa'i ye shes me byung bas//sgrib pa'i dud shing thams cad bsregs//'jig rten gtor la rlung dgos kyang //mtshan ma 'bud la rlung mi dgos//rig pa'i ye shre
359a6(rgyud): rlung byung bas//mtshan ma'i rdul kun rnam par 'phyag/lus bkru ba la chu dgos kyang //sems bkru ba la chu mi dgos//rig pa'i ye shes chu byung bas//bag chags ldan ljin
359a7(rgyud): thams cad dag/stong nyid chu bo khrus kyi rdzing //de bzhin nyid kyi na mkha' nas//'bar 'phro me yi bskal par tshig/de ni snyoms pa dam pa'i mchog/de nyid de yi thabs mchod kyang //
359b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor dam+b+ha pa gang zhig dag/nyams pa'i chad pa byung ba lnga//de bzhin de nyid ma g.yos kyang //mgon skabs de las gzhan mod de//nyams dang mi nyams pa snyad med//bska/
359b2(rgyud): dam pa bskang tshig lam bral//lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni gzhi yongasu bzung ba rnam par dbros par shes par bya'o//de skad ces smras pas/lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman/
359b3(rgyud): pa dam pa rnams dman pa rnams kyi nor la yongasu spyod par gyur to//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las dam tshig gsang ba'i mchog gi le'u zhes bya ste
359b4(rgyud): drug cu drag pa'o///de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/kye grogs po dam pa dag rgyud yongasu grol ba ni dam pa la ragA las pa ste/de yang gang zhe
359b5(rgyud): na/'di lta ste/bla med snying po rmin pa'i rkyen//blo glos chen po dri ba'i yul//lam stor sa mkhan pashes gnyen mgon//mun sel sgron ma'i rin po che//mthong mig dbang po
359b6(rgyud): yid rnams shes//chu bo rab med sgrol ba'i gru//'jigs pa'i rjod chen rten pa'i mkhar//'khor ba'i gcong 'byin sman pa'i mchog/mtsho gling rin chen len byed pa'i//
359b7(rgyud): ded dpon dam pa'i bla ma de//mngon du nges par shes par bya//sde mdzod gter khyim khang chen dang //rnam 'brel lde mig bcu gnyis dang //nges mdo dam pa de nyid bcu//
360a1(rgyud): /mtha' bcu yan lag mdo rtsa ba//gang 'dir skabs bcu rdzogs ldan nam//sbyin gyi mtha' rnams zad 'gyur zhing //yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin//
360a2(rgyud): dam pa'i ched la bab ma bab//de la bshes gnyen mgon bltas na//mthar chub yongasu rdzogs she 'am//gang rig de yul ma yin par//thabs dang yan log
360a3(rgyud): bcas pa yis//gzhan gyi yul nas rtag par bya//brtags pas bsngo ba kun ldan na//gzhan gyi yul la 'gro mi bya//dam pa'i yo byad lnga rdzogs na//dman pa'i yo
360a4(rgyud): byad med la med//nges par kun tu bzang nyid na//gang gi lta yul ngan la min//sgron me 'tshub rlung bskyed la min//'dod 'tshul tshig 'tshal dman la min//blun rmugs
360a5(rgyud): rmongs la ga la srid//'jig rten pa'i skyon de bzhin du//dam pa de dag ji ltar yang //sa mkhan la mo lnga mkhas nges na//ji ltar bzod par bya dka' yang //thams cad
360a6(rgyud): thams cad bzod par bya//dam pa 'don sa mkhan te//'di ni bdag gi mgon yin pas//'jig rten pa yi tha snyad kun//nges par thams cad sgyu ma yin//gang 'dir gyi na
360a7(rgyud): tsam 'di dag//dam par gang la mgog ma yin//skad cig tsam gyi mthong 'di la//de lta zhig na 'di lta la//de srid tsam du bzod par zad//ci gar gar cig 'byung
360b1(rgyud): 'joms bsrubs//log pas gyen 'da' gyen 'da' 'di//dam pa'i don du mi sbyor ram//snyam du btags te dam par bya//yun gyi don skyid chen po la//dmigs nas blo gros
360b2(rgyud): phyir bskyed de//bde mchog bde ba'i dam pa dang //skad cig tsam gyi tha snyad 'dis//btang snyoms bya ba ga la srid//gang 'dir mgon med bdag 'khyams na//gang gis
360b3(rgyud): phyogs 'di dag la ni//phan 'byung rigs can su ga na//dam pa ma gtogs gcig 'ga' med//'di na phan dang mgon mang zhing //dman par 'brel pa gang yod kyang //
360b4(rgyud): log par bsgrub pa'i blo gros mkhan//g.yangs sar mtshangs pa'i snga bgros mkhan//don la 'gog snyam yod min to//bshes gnyen skyabs med ci slad du//kun kyang
360b5(rgyud): smang rigs grong khyer 'gro/byams blo'i yul du ga la rung //gang 'dir mun par 'khyams pa la//bde mchog snang ba'i lam ston pa//skyabs chen dam pa gang de lags//
360b6(rgyud): gzhan gyis skyab par nus ma yin//des na dam pa gang dag la//bstan pas shin tu bstan par bya//gang 'dir snang ba'i tshul 'byung na//dam pa nyid du 'dun par gsol
360b7(rgyud): dam par snang ba thob pan chad//dam pa de las 'gal 'gyur las//rdul gyi cha yang mi bya'o//rgya mi cag cing lung mi bor//'dun pa nas bzung las rung ba'i//bar du
361a1(rgyud): la ltos dgos so//gang 'dir ngo gang ma zin pas//btang snyoms tsam du tshul bsad na//de la dam pa'i don med de//de rkyen de dang mi ldan pas//
361a2(rgyud): bslab pa'i yul bzlas the tsam zos//le los yul lnga mi brtson zhing //phyal bas de la ma gus pas//shes bya mun pa'i tshogs kyi bsgribs//gang gis nam mthong thibs
361a3(rgyud): kyis 'gag/gang la byis pa shed mi 'bye//mdud pa'i bcing ba de las byung //shes rgyud grol bar ga la srid//dam pa'i yo byad lnga dbul ba'i//phongs pa de yis
361a4(rgyud): gzhan bsgral na//de yang dbul po nyid du 'gyur//'tsho ba dam pa dang bral bas//longs spyod chen pos phongs pa yi//mu ge'i dgon pa nyid du ltung //de lta'i gang zag
361a5(rgyud): dman pa de//dam par gzung bar gyur phan chad//dam par nges dang ma nges kyang //bka' cag lugs por ga la srid//gal te de yi rgyu nyams na//dmyal ba rdo rje de 'gro ste//
361a6(rgyud): mi bzad sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur//dmyal bsrungs khyi ni lu de zhes//grags pa seng ge gzugs 'dran//mche ba gza' rings dpal rno bas//dbang cing mtshon cha'i lam du
361a7(rgyud): bdas//spu gri rno dab lnga ral gri nags//nang du ga chad rgyugs skyabs med//khro chu khol ma thal skye yis//chu bo rab med nang du 'bying //rtse gsum mdung dang mda' po che/
361b1(rgyud): khab 'dra dpal rdo gzangs rings dang //chu gri ral gri rnaMs gang ba'i//mun dang mo 'bar nang du ltung //sdug bsngal rgyud pa de dag las//thar pa'i skabs ni mi srid do//slob mar
361b2(rgyud): gyur na sems ldan pas//dam pa de la nyes byed gang //sangs rgyas kun la nyes byas pas//de dag rtag tu spyi'u tshugs 'gro/dam pa kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//dam pa nyid las
361b3(rgyud): gang 'das pa//rnal 'byor dam pa dbang gyur po//thams cad 'khrugs nas khrag chen 'thung //dam pa'i yi ge 'bru bkod pa//dbugs chen nang du shar nas kyang //lcags kyi
361b4(rgyud): sdigs pa mgo dgu pa//rag sha yag shar gyur pa des//bsad nas dmyal ba chen por rgyud//rnam par 'tshe dang nor phrogs dang //bgegs dang sdig pa'i dug dpal gyis//
361b5(rgyud): nyams pa de la 'chi bar byed//sdig can yin te 'che bar 'gyur//rgyal po'i chad pa la sogs pa//'jigs pa brgyad rnams de la 'byung //sho gam can chen la sogs
361b6(rgyud): pa//gnod sbyin gyis bsod mi sder 'gro/ci phyir lha srin sde brgyad las//gtum po gtum po dam can kun//chos srung ka yi las mkhan yin//dka' yi las la
361b7(rgyud): dus mi 'dor//des na chos la spyod pa yi//dam par 'jug pa'i bu rnams kyis//nam yang zhabs la mi smod cing //bka' zur gcag par mi bya'o//klung shrI rtsegacig chos
362a1(rgyud): /bsrung na//chos la bsrung ba'i bsrungs ma rnams//gtum po mthu chen rnams kyis kyang //bu bzhin rtag tu dasrung bar byed//chos bsung ba yang gang zhe na//chos rnams
362a2(rgyud): kun la ma rmongs shing //nges par shes pa gang yin pa//chos bsrung ba la mkhas par 'gyur//gang zhig kun la mi mkhas shing //rmongs pa'i lta ba brtan pa can//bsgyur
362a3(rgyud): bas cis kyang mi 'gyur te//rnams kyang chos ni srung mi 'gyur//gal te dus ni thams cad du//dam pa de dang de gcig na//rgyud zhan skyongs sgyum las kyis//de dang 'galen
362a4(rgyud): smyung grib rgyu//des na dam pa'i lung me gtsug/tshad mar nges pa dam pa'i lung //thams cad ldem dgongs can yin te//yul dang mtshams par sbyor ba yin//de yang
362a5(rgyud): dz+r-IM lta bu zhe na/ji ltar log sred can dag gis//su dag 'jig rten 'dren gang lags/kye ma 'jig rten dga' byed khyed//thams cad dga' bar ston shes na//bdag ltar dag
362a6(rgyud): ba'i don bstan nas//'bras bu gdon mi za shes na//thams cad mkhyen ces de la bya//de ltar mos pa gang bstan pa//pa ma bram ze rgyal po rnams//bskyed brlab yongs su
362a7(rgyud): bcom byas na//de dag rtag tu bde ba'i mchog/de bstan de yis de spyad nas//bde mchog bdi dang ldan pa yin//de bzhin bag yi ldem dgongs la//mdo dang don gal tshe
362b1(rgyud): yod pas//skyabs chen dam par bzung ba de//chud ma dam par yid ches na//de yi lugs kyang dam par bya//lang ka'i bdag po gang gi tshe//gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des///
362b2(rgyud): kho bo la ni 'di skad bsgo//sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon//bskal pa 'bum gyi sangs rgyas pas//slob dpon mnyan par shes par bya//ci phyir bskal pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
362b3(rgyud): slob dpon dag la brten nas byung //slob dpon dag la ma brten par//sangs rgyas rnams kyang mi 'byung ste//'byungah+NA bar yang dag ngas mi mthong //byung na dam pa'i lugs dang
362b4(rgyud): 'gal//don dang ldan pa'i dam pa la//dus gsum dus ni thams cad du//phyogs bcu'i zhing na bzhugs pa yi//bde gshegs rgyal ba kun byin na//sngags dang 'dun pas
362b5(rgyud): phyag mdzad//sems dpa' lha dang mi dag dang //de bzhin klu dang gnod sbyin dang //srin po log lta can dag gis//rig pa 'dzin pa kun 'dus nas//sprul pa'i me tog kun
362b6(rgyud): mthor zhing //bla ma bshes gnyen dam pa khyod//bdag cag rnams kyi pho lagaso//bla ma bshes gnyen dam pa khyod//bdag cag rnams kye ma lags//bla ma bshes gnyen
362b7(rgyud): dam pa khyod//bdag cag rnams kyi mgon lagaso//me shes rmongs pa'i blo gros mkhan//lam stor rnams kyi sa mkhan lags//mun khung 'khyams pa'i sgron ma lags//
363a1(rgyud): gdung ba sel ba'i rin po che//nyi ma'i zhal la phyag 'tshal 'dud//na mkha'i thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud//zla ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal 'dud//pad+ma'i zhabs
363a2(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal 'dud//'di ltar dga' dang gus pa yis//sngags dang 'dun pas phyag mdzad do//de'i phyir rgyal ba thams cad dang //sems dpa' rig pa 'dzin pa rnams//
363a3(rgyud): dam pa'i dam pa las byung ba//dper na ma yis bu bskyed ltar//de bzhin dam pa shes par gyis//dam pa de yi rang bzhin yang //yid rten sems dang dul ba dang //tshad med/
363a4(rgyud): yangs pa'i blo gros dang //rkyen thub bzod ldan kun tu drang //gsong por spyod la gya gyu med//sems can nyan can thams cad la//thabs kyis mi 'jigs sna tshogs sbyin//
363a5(rgyud): dpa' bo mthur ldan brtson 'grus che//shes bya'i yul ni thams cad la//ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'byung //srid par zhugs kyang zad mi shes//rtags shing yon tan byi
363a6(rgyud): phyir 'byung //bden par spro zhing tshig mi 'gyur//ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed//legs dang nyes pa'i las rnams la//dga' dang mi dga'i rtog 'dzin med//ri dgas rgyal
363a7(rgyud): po seng ge ltar//gzi ldan brjid che yul mi 'jug/'du 'dzin dman pa'i las rnams spangs//'phyo dang g.yeng bral gang na rtag/seng ge phu ltar cig pu gnas//dgon pa'i
363b1(rgyud): rgyud dang dpon lam bstan//'di dang glang ldan dam pa'i 'os//dam pa thams cad bkur gnas//rang bzhin de dang mi ldan yang //dam pa'i mdzod dang gnyer ldan na//dam par
363b2(rgyud): gzung zhing dam par bya//chos kun mi shes ma rtogs kyang //dam par gyur pa'i bla ma la//bkur gnas rim gro cher byas pas//'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal 'gyur//ci
363b3(rgyud): phyir zhing rab gashrin pa la//swa bon btab na rgyas 'phel bzhin//bsod nams dam pa'i zhing rab la//til 'bru mi gtor 'phel mi 'gyur//'khor ba'i mtha' las skyob pa
363b4(rgyud): yi//bshes gnyen dam pa bzhi yod do//khungs dang lung dang dbang 'gyur dang //blo gros nges pa'i tshad ldan bzhi//de las gnyen po bzhi 'byung ste//sems bskyed stobs dang
363b5(rgyud): 'gyod stobs dang //las kyi stobs dang dmigs pa'i stobs//log pa'i stobs rnams 'joms par byed//chu bo bzhi las rgal bar 'gyur//rgyud kun yongasu grol 'gyur
363b6(rgyud): te//dam pa'i dam pa de nyid 'gyur//de skad gsungs nas cang mi gsung //des ni lang ka'i bdag po 'dir//blo ldan dga' dang gus pa yis//dam par gyur to 'chal
363b7(rgyud): rnams la//'dun sar lan gsum gus byas te//zhabs la spyi bos gtug par bya//dam pa 'am yang na mi nges rnams//dam pa'i chos sogs 'dus byas te//kha
364a1(rgyud): /na ma tho gzhom bya'i phyir//'jug rten srid zhu'i 'dun pa bya//lung 'byung gang rmod 'phol gtam la//yang du 'dun pas 'dun thabs sbyar/
364a2(rgyud): srid zhu sgra yis mtshams bzung ste//gong de rnams ni ci bder gren//bde dang blang ba langs pa dang //don byed zhu sogs skabs rnamasu//rgyud gnyen sri zhu gus ldan
364a3(rgyud): pas/nagyong sems med sngo nan tan byas//kun nas bzem mdog bag la gnas//gsong por smra zhing gya gyu med//ci phyir dam par gyur pa la//ma nges gya gyu'i las byas
364a4(rgyud): pas//dam par gyur pa kun bslus te//dmyal ba rdo rjer de ltung 'gyur//brtson dang 'grus ldan dang tshul bzang //bajig cing gsang thub spyod pa dag/ya bag bzhin
364a5(rgyud): bzengs mdzes thabs ldan//sgo gsum bzang spyod mtha' gsum bsnams//dam pa nyid du 'thun bzhin spyod//gsal la dag pas go rnams dbye//dam pa'i nang na bder
364a6(rgyud): 'dug tshe//kun gyi tshig lam la mi 'byung //gang dag bzang dang ngan spyod la//mthing slad smod pa yang mi bya//bdag la bzang dang ngan brjod cing //kun mthong kun brjod sgro skur
364a7(rgyud): dang //dang dag tshag lam 'dran 'dod na//tshig lam bcad na bde ba thob//dam pa'i yul na gnas rnams su//khong khro chig rtsub khyal mi smra//bag yangs tshul gyi bya ba min//
364b1(rgyud): tshul mod tshulnga dang mi ldan pa'i//nyam nga med par sgra mi bya//spyod dang lhogs dang gang mthong dang //snod 'byor rngom lngas sogs myi bya//gzhan la khyud kyis gsad pa'i tshig/gang
364b2(rgyud): gcad par mi bya'o//dam pa'i gnas su gyur pa la//rgyas su rigs dang 'thad pa'i yon//nor gyi dbyug dang na bza'i mchog/rtse mchog zas la sogs pa rnams//dbul dang
364b3(rgyud): gsol bas mnyes par bya//des ni nad dang dbul la sogs//bkres dang tsha ba'i sdug bsngal gyis//nams kyang 'debs par mi 'gyur ro//zhu ba dbul ba nad pa dang //lung
364b4(rgyud): 'byung 'dun par 'dug pa dang //dam pa'i spyod pa ma gtogs pa//dam pa dag dang gnas gcig tu//zha 'bring ma rtogs nams kyang min//'di ltar ma byas nyes byas//sku yi
364b5(rgyud): grib ma mi 'gong zhing //zhabs rjes brlam par mi bya'o//nam bza' chags gdan rten la sogs//nams kyang 'goms par bya ba min//dam pa'i lung byung ming gis bsgrubs//
364b6(rgyud): ming lcogs ma yin ma lcogs na//sku sogs med pa gnas dor ro//dam pa'i dkor rnams srog bzhin bsrung //de yi nye gnas dam pa bzhin//de yi 'khor g.yog nyi du
364b7(rgyud): bzhini//rtag tu mnyam po'i sems kyis blta//khri ma la bstan bde bla ma'i thabs//me gus la sogs mi tshul rnams//dam pa'i thad du yang mi mdzes//byas na sri zhu dam
365a1(rgyud): tshig nyams//mgo la zo ldir gdugs thogs dang //lag rten lus brten de bzhin stong //gang 'dir ma rabs thor bu'i thabs//snang ba'i yul nas bya ma
365a2(rgyud): yin//rmang rigs rdol pa g.yung mo'i tshul//dam pa'i gzigs yul nams kyang min//khu lho bsnyon pa kun tu rgyu'i//spyod pa dam pa'i yul du mini//snang ba'i lung la
365a3(rgyud): gang 'byung stong//ji ltar spyod byung spyod pa byung //'jam da la thos 'phrigs dogs bzhin spyad//dam pa'i spyod pa'i snang yul nas//bag med che ba'i thabs mi bya//
365a4(rgyud): bsgrubs nas mdzes pa'i tshul bzung ste//bag dang ldan pas gnas par bya//lus kyi dor ba gang dag kun//mthong tshor yul nas yong mi bya//snang ba lus kyi bya byed
365a5(rgyud): rnams//blo gros ldan pas bya ba min//'dus nas 'du gang byed spyod rnams//dam pa'i 'dun sar rig ma yin//'phyo g.yeng brkam dang ma zhi ba'i//spyod tshul yul
365a6(rgyud): nas mi bya'o//khams las byung ba'i lus spyod rnams//bsgribs sam phag gam basbyor bkab nas//thams cad bde skyang 'jam byas te//dam pa de la ci mdzes bya//
365a7(rgyud): dam pa gdan bskyod gang phyogs nas//bdag nas bsgrims te si zhu bya//bskyod bcag brdzi sad gdan thabs sbyar//ma ldan nyid las ci bder sbyar//sngon rtsol yung
365b1(rgyud): 'byung gyi zhu bas//de rdzogs nas kyang de bzhin no//blo ldan spyod lam bzhi spyod na//sri zhu gus pas de bzhin sbyar//glang ma gus dang byA tang snrums dag/nam yang bya ba yod ma
365b2(rgyud): yin//sri zhu bste gnas rim gro rnams/bya ba'i mdun dang de zan du//sre zhu bcug ste ci sder 'gro/bde shes la sogs sri zhus zhus//yang dag bka' thub mdun nyid du/
365b3(rgyud): gar spyod gire skabs sri zhu dbul//mtshan nas nam yang mi brjod cing //dam pa bla mA bshes gnyen zhes//brjod pa'i tha mAr zhus sgra gzhug/khyad par tsa re yang dbye bar bya//
365b4(rgyud): lung byung bka' bzhin zhus zhes brjod//thal sbyar gsung pa gzung bar bya//dam pa'i lung yul byung rjes 'brang //de kun sri zhus mtshon pa yin//mdzes pa'i tshul bzung gus
365b5(rgyud): 'dun nas//spobs pa nod pa gsum du zhu//gyong khengs med pa'i gnyen lcug gis//zhabs 'bri'i dgos pa thams cad bya//dge slong sbar pa'i spyod pa yis//bsgrags pa la
365b6(rgyud): sogs bya byed dang //brnyan dang mtshon thogs spang bar bya//blo gros gus pa de nyid kyang /nyid kyis nyid la dpyas bcug ste//gzhan gyis dpya ba'i gzhi rnams spang //kun tu
365b7(rgyud): mthun par bzang brjod pa'i//skyes bu gang yin de ltar bya//kun gyis mthun par ma sngags pa'i//tha shal gang yin de spyod spang //dkyil 'khor la sogs sbyin sreg dang /
366a1(rgyud): slob ma gzung dang chos smra ba//lung ma byung bar mi bar+Nam ste//dam pa'i yul nas de mi rigs//grul te gzhan gyi don byas na//de yi yau byad mi spyad do//
366a2(rgyud): de kun dam pa de la dbul//dam pas ci blangs lhag ma blang //dam pa'i slob ma slob mar yang //dam pa'i mdun du mi rigaso//bkur sti sri'u la sogs min//gang yin
366a3(rgyud): dam pa de nyid mnga'//snying rjes dam pas ci gnang ba//sri zhu mdun bsu lag gnyis kyis//blo dang ldan pas blang bar bya//rmugs med dran gsal rab bsgribs nas//rang gi spyod
366a4(rgyud): lam 'da' mi bya//blo gros ldan pa'i nyi ma des//dam pa lha ltar mchod bya'i phyir//mnyes par bya ba'i yo byad brgyad//dam pa de la rdzogs par dbul//skyo dub med pa'i
366a5(rgyud): dad pa dang //gyong khengs med pa'i mnyen lhag dang //ser sna med pa'i zang zing dang //som nyi med pa'i sr-i zhu dang //g.yo rgyu med pa'i dran rkan dang //kha gsag med pa'i rang rgyud dang ///
366a6(rgyud): rmongs pa med pa'i shes rab dang //dri ma med pa'i lhag sems brgyad//dam pa de la rdzogs par dbul//dam pas sgri ba bslab pa'i mtha'//chub par rdzogs pas rgyud
366a7(rgyud): dgrol te//shes bya kun la thogs med 'gro/rang rgyud mdud pa dgrol ba yi//shes rab mkha' la bya bzhin rgyu//mthar chib rgyud dgrol yul spangs te//rgyal srid dang ni
366b1(rgyud): rang gi lus//bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/rab tu gtses dang yid 'thad pa'i//nor mchog dam pa de la dbul//rang gi lus klu rtsi rigs par//rin thang gang yin nor gyis b+hA/
366b2(rgyud): de nas ji bzhin gar bde bar//rnal 'byor yang dag 'jog la zhugs//sngon gyi dam pa dam pa rnams//bde bar gshegs pa'i rjesu 'gro/sngon gyi dam pa bde gshegs rnams//
366b3(rgyud): ded dpon dam pa mnyes byas nas//skyon spangs dgon pa'i mthar gshegs pas//nyid las dam pa mnyes par 'gyur//des na ded dben dam pa dang //nam du yang 'bral ba ma
366b4(rgyud): yin te//ji ltar lus dang grib ma bzhin//blo gros dris na dam par 'gyur//ji ltar cang shes gi ling dag/sdom byed sgrog gis bcings 'gyur ba//bkrol byas bde brag byung
366b5(rgyud): 'gyur na//ci la'ang thogs med 'gro ba ltar//sems kyi cang shes dbang po 'di//mi shes bcings pas bcings 'gyur pa//dam pas rnams grol sgo phye bas//shes rgyud kun
366b6(rgyud): 'grel thogs med 'gro//'di na mi shes rgyud 'gro ba'i//mdud pa'i bcing ba 'gro ba ste//rgyud rnams grol ba'i bslab pa ru//goms par bya ba rab tu btsos//lang kwa'i bdag po
366b7(rgyud): de dag ni rgyud yongasu dgrol ba'i bslab pa'i mtha' yongasu bgros par shes par bya'o//de skad ces smras pas dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpo' rnams dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas
367a1(rgyud): rnams slob dpon dam par bskrun par shes par gyur to//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las bsnyen bkur dam pa mchog gi
367a2(rgyud): le'u ste drug cu bdun pa'o////de nas yang gsung ba pa'i bdag pos dam po'i lus kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la smras pa//kye grogs po dag bsgo dbye bar
367a3(rgyud): bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ji bzhin pa yi de kho na//nyid du nges pa'i ngo bo la//rig dang ma rig rnam pa yis//kun shes spyod dang kun tu rmongs//rnam pa gnyisu snang ba la//tha dad
367a4(rgyud): du ma mang por 'gyur//rmongs pa rnam pa gnyis snang ba//mi shes pa dang log par shes//mi shes phyal ba rgyang phan gronyis//log rtag mur thug mu stegs pa//de yang zhen
367a5(rgyud): chags log srad can//'jig rten 'jig rten pa zhes bya//mu stegs log dang gzhan rkyen log/zhar las 'byung ba zhes kyang bshad//mi shes 'di gnyis gzhir snang ba//
367a6(rgyud): dman rigs dang ni rigs ma nges//rigs chang 'du shes can 'di dag/kun nas bkrigs pa'i mun pa yin//'du shes can bzhi chags pa dang //gang la g.yeng dang yang
367a7(rgyud): can/dmos pa can zhes grags pa rnams//sa bon 'dzin pa'i zhing du snang //log par rtog 'di ya mtshan can//brgya drag gsum dang drug cu gnyis//nyi shu 'am sna
367b1(rgyud): bcu ste lnga gnyis dang //tha dad rnam pa du mar snang //yo byad med pa'i phyogs 'dzin las//'jig pa'i tshogs dang mthar 'dzin dang //log par 'dzin dang lta khyad dang //rang gi brtab
367b2(rgyud): zhugs mchog 'dzin te//rigs mi mthun pa bde lngar brags//rang bzhin log pas log pa nyid//gzhan rkyen log pa phra med spyod//lung la rten dang rtags tsom 'dzin//bcos
367b3(rgyud): mAr spyod dang mu co ra smra//lung gi phyogs tsam rten pa dang //phyogs lag gol dang bslad pas 'tshal//phyogs ltos spyod pa rnam bzhir grags//bcos ma gzhan las gyur pa dang /
367b4(rgyud): 'di los gyur pa gnyis kho na//gnas dang 'khor dang yo byad nor//longs spyod lnga ldan gzhan las gyur//dran pa rtag lto ltos 'dzin rgyu//med pa'i mtha' dang mtha' med shes//
367b5(rgyud): kun nas rnam par mi g.yeng ste//gang du shes pa yod smra lta//de bzhin med par lta ba dang //'di gang 'di las gyur lta ba//gang du yod min med min lta//bdag shi 'di
367b6(rgyud): tshe mya ngan 'das//gang 'dir phyogs tsam rten pa ni//gang ma yin pa ma yin nyid//phyogs log gol bar gang gyur pa//drug sde so so tha dad dang //spyir lta gang rig skyon med
367b7(rgyud): pa'o//rgyur lta byams pas dag par lta//'tsho ba bcos pas dag lta dang //rgyan la lham dang gos bcos pa//skra dpung bcas dang rgyan can dang //dka' thub rten po drug pa'o//
368a1(rgyud): bskrad pas 'tshal ba gang 'di la//brtan pas bdag wA dz+nyAn rtog dang //rten chags byin chags pa/shing mtshan//skyabs log yongs 'chal ba'o//phyogs
368a2(rgyud): ltos gcod pa gang zhe na//phyi rol pa dang yang dag pa//gsang sngags pa dang gsod chen pa'o//gang 'dor phyi rol rnam pa gsum//bye brog pa dang tha snyad pa//rang sngar gcig phyog
368a3(rgyud): gcod pa'o//yang dag phywa dang zab pa dang //rgya che yangs pa de kho na//gsang sngags rig byed rigs spyod dang //rigs sbyor dam par phyogs ltos gcod//glusang chen brtul zhug
368a4(rgyud): cher spyod dang //rgyal dpog pa dang rgyal thabs pa'o//zhar las byung ba ga 'di dag/mtha' yaso sde bcur rdzogs pa ste//gang mu zin pa de rtags 'dzin//sangs rgyas kun
368a5(rgyud): gyi nye gnas so//lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang //zhal nas byung ba ji lta ba//'jig rten sgron ma nub rjes na//grang dag mos pa tha dad pas//zhar las byung ba'ang de bzhin
368a6(rgyud): no//kun shes spyad pa'ang rnam pa gnyis//rim gyis pa dang gcig pa'o//rim gyis 'jug pa rnam gsum du//phyin ci ma log pa nyid dang //bsgrubs spyod mngon rtogs
368a7(rgyud): gsum nyid do//'di yang khyad par rnam gnyis kyis//gsum gsum gnyi su dam pa yis//gsung ba khyod ci mi shes sam//des na tshe chung gnyis gsum drug/sgrub pa zab
368b1(rgyud): b+hUthA rA g+huSh+Ta// stan pa ny-i //spyang ba rdu na rmA b+h+yan// man pa dngan ba d+hAng nan gas ba shad/ na rnams su r+b+ba //
368b2(rgyud): byi nang 'jug/ma mthun phyogs kyis gral babyung nis//chu gnyis so sngor 'dod po 'byung //phyi rol bye drug pa snyed gnyis//tshe gnyis gcig las rtsod ma 'byung //nur 'jug sems
368b3(rgyud): snying dbus mtha' med//phyi nang stsal zhir phyogs 'dzin cing //gang 'dir nges par gcod pa 'byung //mtha' dbus 'byed dang nges par 'jug/gtan lo 'bebs pa de bzhin 'byung //
368b4(rgyud): ring dang lbu ba'i phyogs 'dzin cing //brtsod pas the tshom 'byung ba dang //dbus mtha' 'byed dnganges par 'jug/gton le 'bebs pa de bzhin 'byung //gcig cer 'jug pa'i//
368b5(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa//bya dang bya thabs bya med pa//skyes dang mA skyes skye 'gag med//'di kun ma 'dres yong su rdzogs//ma 'dres mkha' la gza' skur bskum//yongasu rdzogs pa
368b6(rgyud): mkha' khrob dang //'jor snang ma par ltar mo 'dres gtsug/rmongs rims gcig cer 'jug spyod pa//'arjod pa'i yul la zhen slong dang //da sku shes rtogs spyod dbyung
368b7(rgyud): byed//shes pa 'jig rten rtogs 'phags pa//spyod pa blo ldan dbang sgyur zangs//gang 'di'i snod kyang bzhir gzigs te//zhin tshigs lag sr-id rig rgyud can//blo gros
369a1(rgyud): can gyi snod rams la//bstan bya rnam pa bzhir gsungs pa//'dod rkyen bkre drang brgyud pa'i tshig/ldem dgongs don dam nges pa bzhi//snod kyirten
369a2(rgyud): dang sbyar ba yin//'di kun shes bya'i gzhi gcig pa//'dod pas mthong ba tha dad pa'o//'di ltar mthong sgo tha dad bzhin//rnam par snang 'byung bkod pa la//gang gis rkun
369a3(rgyud): la zhugs bltas nas//gcig tu 'bebs pa dam pa'o//ji ltar bung ba khung tshol pa//kun du 'jug cing byung nas ni//rang gi gseng khung grang yin par//nges par 'jug cing
369a4(rgyud): gnas pa ltar//rnal 'byor don gyi rjes tshal ba//spyod sgo ci yod bstun te bsdu//lta sgor 'jug cing brtags bskur nas//don dam nges pa'i gsang nyid la'o//de nyid don gyi
369a5(rgyud): rjes bcad phyir//sgo mo kun nas bskur ba yi//bslab par bya ba'i thabs yin te//goms par bya ba rab tu gces//lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni//phyis 'byung bar snang
369a6(rgyud): ba'i sgo yongasu dbye ba yin te//kun nas bskur bar bslab pa'i mtha' yongasu bgros par shes par bya'o//de skad ces smras pas/dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams
369a7(rgyud): chos thams cad kyi sgo rang snang bar shes par gyur to//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo tshon po las chos thams cad kyi sgo rab tu dbye ba'i le'u zhes bya ste drug cu
369b1(rgyud): brgyad pam//de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag ngos dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams la smrasmra pa/grags pa dag mthar d+hinA pAr+ya byA byA ni glang zha na/'di lta ste/
369b2(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam pa ni bsam du med pa mthur phyin par bya'o//bsam du med pa ni sems kyi de kho ni nyid du mthar phyin par bya'o//sems kyi ngo kho na nyid ni dgangs pa dam pa
369b3(rgyud): 'dres pa'i de kha na nyid du mthar phyin par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dgongs pa dam pa 'dus pa'i de kho na nyid la mkhas na sems kyi de kho na nyid la mkhas par 'gyur ro//sems
369b4(rgyud): kyi de kho na nyid la mkhas na bsam du med pa la mkhas por 'gyuraro//bsam du med pa la mkhas na/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam pa la mkhas par 'gyuraro//bsam gyis mi
369b5(rgyud): khyab pa la mkhas na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin te/de ni dgongs pa kun nas 'dus pa nyid du shes par bya'o//grags pa dag de bas nA bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos
369b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi rnam pa ni rnal 'byor pa rnam pa gsum gyis yongasu 'grel pa ste/gsum gang zhe na/bya ba'i rnal 'byor dang //bya ba byed pa'i rnal 'byor dang /bya ba med pa'i
369b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor ro//grogs po dag bya ba'i rnal 'byor yang gsum du shes par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/phye'i rnal 'byor dang /nang gi rnal 'byor dang /phye nang gi rnal 'byor/
370a1(rgyud): grogs po dag de la phyi'i rnal 'byor gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po dang /de bzhin du chu rdo rje dang /me rdo rje dang /rlung rdo rje
370a2(rgyud): dang /na mkha' rdo rje dang /gzugs rdo rje dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg dang /chos rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po rnams dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar
370a3(rgyud): phyin cing phul du gyur pa'o//grogs po dag nang gi rnal 'byor ni 'di lta ste/sems rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po dang /de bzhin du rtog pa dang /pyod pa la sogs
370a4(rgyud): pa gang zin pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor rnams dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa'o//grogs po dag phyi nang gi rnal 'byor gang zhe na/
370a5(rgyud): 'di lta ste/thams cad dang /dkar po dang /nag po dang /dre ba dang /ma dre pa dang /dman pa dang /dam pa dang /'byung ba dang /mi 'byung ba dang /byas pa dang /ma byas pa dang /
370a6(rgyud): bcas pa dang /ma bcas pa dang /spyi mthun dang /khyad par gyi rnam pa rnams dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa'o//grogs po dag de
370a7(rgyud): dag ni bya ba'i rnal 'byor bu shes par bya'o//bya ba byed pa'i rnal 'byor gang zhe na/'di la ste/rten pa dang /spyod pa dang /mig dang /khyad par dang /mi 'gyur ba dang ///
370b1(rgyud): rtsal gyis gnan pa dang /kun nas rig pa'o//grogs po dag de dag kyang dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa'o//grogs po dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste/
370b2(rgyud): sbyor ba dang /mi gnas pa dang /bskyod pa dang /bsgyur ba dang /rtsal dang /'byung ba dang /'jug pa dang /sgo dang /shes pa dang /gnas dang /rig pa dang /lam dang /'jug pa
370b3(rgyud): drong /ye shes dang /khyab pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa yin pa'o//gzhan yang mthong ba dang /ma yengs pa dang /don dang /
370b4(rgyud): tshig dang /sngags dang /yi ge'i sgo rnam pa de dag kyang dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa'o//grogs po dag de dag ni bya ba byed pa'i rnal 'byor du shes
370b5(rgyud): par bya'o//kye grogs po dag bya ba med pa'i rnal 'byor gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sa dang /bslab pa dang /sbyor ba dang /rtog pa dang /ltung ba dang /ma nor ba dang /nges pa dang /dgongs pa
370b6(rgyud): dang /ye shes dang /tshogs dang /bsgrub pa dang /dngos sgrub dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /chen po dang /ye shes dang /byung tshul dang /che ba dang /rol pa dang /rngom pa dang /brjid pa dang //
370b7(rgyud): mthu dang /cho 'phrul dang /yongasu rdzogs pa'i rnam pa dag/dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid mthar byin cing phul du gyur par bya'o//de yang ji lta zhe na/grogs po dag 'di lta ste/
371a1(rgyud): de ltar mngon ri rtse dag la//sgyid mi lug par brtson 'dzegs na//mthon sar snang mdzod kun gsal bas//thams cad kun snang lam la mkhas//de bzhin/
371a2(rgyud): shes rab mthon ril//brtson pa dam pas kun bltas na//kun gyi phul du shes rab phyin//mkhas pa'i ye shes tshad med do//don la mkhas par bya ba de//phul du byab
371a3(rgyud): ba'i bslab pa ste//dgongs pa dam pa de nyid lta//mkhas par bya ba rab tu gces//grogs po dag de dag ni mthar phyin par bya ba rab tu shes par bya'o//de skad ces smras pas/
371a4(rgyud): dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams kun phul du gyur par dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid la bzod pa thob par gyur to//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen
371a5(rgyud): po las bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu dgu pa'o////de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos dam pa rnams la smras pa/grogs po dag thams
371a6(rgyud): cad du 'du bar byas pa ni 'di lta ste/bya ba dang /rang bzhin dang /bsgyur ba so//grogs pa dag de la bya ba ni bsdu ba'i bya bas so//rang bzhin ni chos nyid kyis so//bskur
371a7(rgyud): bas 'dul bar bya ba ni 'di lta ste/rgyu dang /dus dang /tshad dang /grags pa dang /gags dang /rtags dang /thob pa'o//grogs po dag de la rgyu ni yo byad chen po lnga kho na'o//
371b1(rgyud): dus ni mtha' bcu rdzogs pa dang /nywa bar dris pa dang /rlogs can 'dra ba dang /gsal ba thob pa dang /lus smra rung bya dang /mtshon ma 'byung ba dang /mang po sngags pa dang /tams/
371b2(rgyud): rnyed pa dang /byab rdzogs pa'o//grogs pa dag tshad ni 'di lta ste/ded dben dang /lha ltas dang /smin pa'o//grogs po dag rked dpon gang zhe na/'di lta ste/goms pa dang /
371b3(rgyud): rig pa dang /'du ba dang /thob pa dang /rdzogs pa'o//grogs po dag lnga ltas ni 'di lta ste/mthong ba dang /'byor pa dang /nus pa dang /thos pa'o//grogs po dag smin pa ni
371b4(rgyud): 'di lta ste/mngon spyod dang /mi bsgyur ba'o//grogs po dag grags pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gang chu bo bzhi'i rgyud du byung ba dang /gang dag las 'phags pa dang /gang dang ldan
371b5(rgyud): pa dang /gang la mkhas pa dang /gang thob pa nyid do//grogs po dag gags gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi thob pa dang /mi chags pa dang /mi gos pa dang /sreg pa'o//rtags
371b6(rgyud): gang zhe na/'di lta ste/grags pa dang /'gyur ba dang /brdzun pa dang /'byung ba'o//grogs po dag rdzob pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bskur bas thob pa dang /rtsal gyis thob
371b7(rgyud): pa'o//grogs po dag de yang 'di ltar thob par rig par bya ste/gang 'dir snying rje'i yul rnams la//byin rlabs 'byung ba gang yang rung //'dun pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag la/
372a1(rgyud): glegs pam ban gnyis sbyin par bya//gang sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor la//nyi zla gnyis ni smin par bya//dbugs chen 'byin pa'i rnal 'byor pas//rin chen
372a2(rgyud): bdun nyid nges par 'thob//lung chen thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas//yung drung brgyad dag thob pa yin//rtsalo chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas//rtsal bcu'i khyad par de nyid
372a3(rgyud): 'thob//kun gyi bla ma dam pas ni//rtog stong 'bar ba bla med 'thob//dgongs pa kun 'dus gsang chen 'di//ma thos gzu lums rang bshad pas//rab 'byam bstan pa
372a4(rgyud): kun brtsal yang //dam pa mthong bar mi 'gyuraro//ji ltar rgyal rigs rgyud byung ba//mang pos dbang por dpon stabs te//'khor lo la sogs rin chen gyis//kun la dbang
372a5(rgyud): sbyar thob pa ltar//de bzhin rnal 'byor rgyud byung ba//chos kyi rgyal por dbang bstabs te//tog stong 'bar ba la sogs pas//khyad par bla ma dam par 'gro/'di ni bla ma'i
372a6(rgyud): byed par te//rgyal sar nges par 'byung ba yi//rtsal gyis bgyod cing bslab pa'i thabs//goms par bya ba rab tu gces//kye gogs po dag de dag ni thams cad 'du bar
372a7(rgyud): bya ba yongasu bgros par shes par bya'o//de skad ces smras pa dang /dman pa dam pa dag lung dam pa bstan pa'i drod thob par gyur to//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus
372b1(rgyud): pa'i mdo chen pa las rnal 'byor dam pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun cu pa'o////de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po des dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams
372b2(rgyud): la smras pa//kye grogs po dag la dor bur bya ba ni 'ji lta ste/gang gi rma glon pa'i rje su ma ldog par 'gro ba ste/'di ltar ji bzhin pa'i rje su dza snyed pa 'gro bA/na mkha'i rdza su
372b3(rgyud): 'byung ba 'gro ba bzhin sems nyid kyi rje sa sems las byung ba 'gro ba yin/chos nyid kyi rjes chos thams cad 'gro ba yin/de bzhin du dgongs pa dam pa'i rje su gang gsung
372b4(rgyud): bdang /gang mdzad pa thams cad 'gro bas na//dgongs pi kun nas 'dus pa ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du gang du spyod pa de ltararo//kye grogs po dag de yang 'di lta ste/mnyam
372b5(rgyud): dang mi mnyam mi mnyam mnyam//kun nas mi mnyam yongasu mnyam//gsang sngags spyod pa'i khyad par yang //gang dang don gyi mnyam par spyad//byin gyi brlabs kyi spyod/
372b6(rgyud): pA 'am//dbang bsgyur thabs kyi spyod pa ste//dper na na mkha' rgyal po 'am//ji ltar me dpung chu bo 'dra//de yang de yul che chung gis//khyod par nyid kyis brlabs pa
372b7(rgyud): yin//rgyal po de yang khyad par gyis//dbang sgyur bya ba'i khams rnams la//tshe chung rim pa yod pa bzhin//rnal 'byor sngags tshul de ltar snang //babs chen
373a1(rgyud): spyod la 'jug pa yang //bab tshod thang du 'jug pa ste//dper na grang tshon chur 'jug pa//rab dang glang chen bab mi lta//de yang rtsal spyod drug zhan
373a2(rgyud): gyis//lA la thad du gcod pa la//la lA chu yi gzhol phyogs//de ltar rnal 'byor spyod 'jug pa//'bras bu don la bab gcod kyang //rtsal 'phang mthon dman
373a3(rgyud): khyad par gyis//ji ltar nus tshad de spyod phyir//sa dang gonas skabs ye shes dang //sgrib dang gol sa rtog pa dang //spyod dang dam tshig ting 'dzin dang //dus dang
373a4(rgyud): dngos grub mthar phyin dang //lta ba'i khyod par gnas gyur nas//thams cad gcig las med na yang //grangs sam dbye bo grags phrag rnams//snod kyi rtsal dang sbyar//
373a5(rgyud): nas ni//khyad par ci yang bstan pa yin//de yang rtsal gyi khyad par bgyi//dang po las kyi khyad par las//sogs pa'i rnal 'byor chung ngu rnams//rang rang rtsa ba bor
373a6(rgyud): nas ni//rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor las//sogs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i tshul//spyod par byed dang don 'dod pa//spel bus mkha' lding las spyad kyang //
373a7(rgyud): brtsal ba'i yul ni chang ma yin//nor bu las kyi 'phang dmas pa//rang skal 'tsho ba'i tshod bor nas//rgyal po thabs kyis 'phong mtho ba'i//longs spyod che la dmigs
373b1(rgyud): bcas kyang //de dag mi 'thob 'tsho bral zhing //skal ldan can gyi don 'di dag/skal zhan dag gis 'grub par dka'o//de phyir dgongs pa kun 'dus pa//gang 'dir rnal 'byor
373b2(rgyud): dman don du//gso dang sbyong ba'i spyod pa dag/dman pa dag dang mnyam par gsungs//gso dang bslang ba'i rtog pa 'di//rtog pa can dang 'thun par spyad//gsaM pa rtog pas
373b3(rgyud): zin pa'i nad//lta spyod nyam pa'i smon gyis gso//shi bslang ba yi rtog pa 'di//khams gsum 'khor ba'i nad pa rnams//rtag chad mthar shi ro gling nas//gi ta mug
373b4(rgyud): bamatshan re blangs to//skye 'gag med par blang ba'i phyir//ro la yid bzhin nor bu li//sngags kyis btab ste gnan par bya//ri yi gnyen par badrag gyur nas//ra/
373b5(rgyud): sngags rgyun mi 'chad pa ro bzlas//ro yi gzi byin byung ba na//bar chad med pa'i brtson 'grus bya//ro de 'gul bar gyur po dang //gang gi 'gyur rtsis byug par bya//ro//
373b6(rgyud): ye yan lag kun bcings nas//bzlas pa drog pi rgyun mi gcad//gang der nges par gyur pa dang //chos 'phrul 'jigs tshal ston par byed//brtul zhugs ldan
373b7(rgyud): pa'i skyes bu yis//de tshe raro yi lce bcad nas//ro la brdabs na gser du 'gyur//de bzhin ji ltar 'dod pa yi//rkyen gyis bsgyur na de ltar 'gyur//lce bshed
374a1(rgyud): ram gri mtshan rgyu dang //ro yi mgo bo gcad pa des//ji ltar 'dod pa'i rdzas 'grub ste//mgo thong go chur brgyung nas ni//lce'i ral g-i mtshan
374a2(rgyud): bogs nas//lha min g.yul yang bzlog par 'gyur//ro rangs grub pa'i rkang 'gyogs ni//dpag pa'i tshad las 'das pa ste//skyes bu rtul dang ldan pa yis/
374a3(rgyud): phyogs bzhir bltas te dus gcig tu//mda' 'phangs sa la ma byibs par//mtha' blangs spyad cig 'jig rten bskor//skyes bu log tshod ma yul bar//de ma
374a4(rgyud): thog tu gnas slobs//yud ltar shin du myur ba 'thob//de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa//ral 'dod pa thams cad 'byung //ram+bA ra bsgrubs ro grub na//ra yi
374a5(rgyud): dngos po mo snang bar//gang ltar bsgrubs pa de snang phyir//ro la rnam rtog ga la yod//ro la ro yi rang bzhin dag/med par shes pas thag tshad bzhin//spyod
374a6(rgyud): pas de ltar mi nyam spyod na//lta spyod mnyam zhes drim par bshad//'di ni shi ba slong ba yi//bdud rtsi dam pa'i spyod pa'o zhes//dgongs pa dam pa'i kun 'dus
374a7(rgyud): gsungs//grogs po dag de dag ni shi ba slong ba'i rtog pa yongasu spyod par shes par bya'o//grogs po dag de la sbyong ba'i spyod pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rtog pa
374b1(rgyud): b+hak+Sha d+hA smyung ba dang /rgyu yongs sbyang ba'o//de la rtog pa'i zlog d+hA sbyang ba ni gang rtog pa'i das pa snang ba'o//phyogs po dag rgyud yongasu sbyang ba ni bkod pa'i bya bas sbyang ba dang /
374b2(rgyud): mi'i bya bas sbyang ba'o//de la bkod pa'i bya bas sbyangs pa gi shi no//brtsam pa las kyi dang po dang /dam pa'i don la 'jug pa na//thabs mchog lngas ni spyad par bya//rdo rje dus
374b3(rgyud): tshigaso bsnyen pa dang //gang 'dir nye bar bsgrub pa dang //bsgrub pa chen pos sbyor ba la//grangs dus mtshan mar bcas par bya//rnal 'byor bcad pa'i dka' sgo 'dir//bsad
374b4(rgyud): go mi dbye skrag par 'gyur//ci phyir dang po yin pas na//byis pa blo shed mo bya ba//ma nges ldog 'jug bcas pa yis//thog chen don las gol bar 'gyur//gnas 'di
374b5(rgyud): 'jug pa'i byis pa dag/'jig rten drug las drangs nas kyang //'gyur dbang ma nges par bzhag ste//ji ltar 'tsham par bde thabs sbyar//rdo rje thabs chen tshom bu lnga//rdo rje 'dzin
374b6(rgyud): chags bcu drug ldan//dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje can//bri bya yang na bsam par 'am/brjod dam dngos sam mtshan ma la//'jig rten dbang po chos lugs kyis//chos
374b7(rgyud): pa la bskyed dran byas te//rang bzhin yul las phan nas ni//phyag bya la sogs mchod na ni//rdo rje dman dang rtsir sbyar ba//yo byad chen po la sogs pas//rdo rje thabs kyi chog/
375a1(rgyud): la dbul//rdo rje rnal 'byor bla blangs te//mnyes byas las grung drangs rdzogs nas//mnyes nas rgyud sbyangs 'dod par bya//snod du rung ba'i slod
375a2(rgyud): dag/dbang mkhyen la sogs bya ba yis//'jug tshul dbang dang dngos grub stsol//rdo rje tha tshigs rnam lnga yis//bslab pa'i gnyer rnams ci rigs par//rtsal gyi rnam
375a3(rgyud): par byin nas kyang //rdo rje gal chen mna' bor ro//de nas sgrub pa che chung rnams//ji ltar 'dod pa nan tan gyis//rdo rje rnal 'byor dka' bya'o//mi nus la sogs mi snang
375a4(rgyud): ba'i//rdo rje'i tshig gis nun chags bya//rmongs pa gang phyir sems bskyed de//ngo mtshar tshig gi 'du shes bsgyur//shes rab mig can shes bya'i yul//thams cad ri me
375a5(rgyud): bzhin bstan par bya//drong can blo dkyil che rnams la//rnal 'byor nang par gsang sgo dbye//rtsing po 'gras kyi dmu rgod la//gcan 'khrang 'khor ba'i g.yeng rnams
375a6(rgyud): bstan//rdo rje lung gi tshig can la//ji ltar nus pa de dbang bskur//rtsal med mi nus gang dag la//phan pa 'ba' zhig bsngags pa yin//gnas 'dir gsal
375a7(rgyud): dang mi gsal dang//'od mi dbab cing lding mi dbab//rdo rje blo'i yul can la/rtsal chen skyong zhes gdam par bya//rdo rje 'dus pa'i dbang gral du//rdo rje don gyi
375b1(rgyud): ljang chen bshor//rtsal dang rim pa khyad par dbya//so so'i rigs kyi phyag rgya dag/spyi'am yang na re re'o//gzhan yang shes rab gzungs kyi tshogs//ji ltar thabs kyi tshogs
375b2(rgyud): sbyor ltar//gang dag rnal 'byor mAr ldan rnams//rdo rje 'dzin ma la sogs pa//lho mo chog su bkod nas kyang //gnas 'dir 'jug dga' la sogs pa//thabs kyi byad rgya
375b3(rgyud): mtshan mas sbas//rdo rje mnyam pa'i gzungs rnams la//mnyam pa'i mchod pas mnyes par bya//bro gar glu tshigs la sogs pas rig 'dzin rnal 'byor ma rnams bsgrub//
375b4(rgyud): gzhan yang dus bzhi mnyam rig na//dus zhes bya bar ga la rigs//dus bzhi mnyam par rab shes ni//de nyid mnyam pa'i rang bzhin no//rdo rje lha mo dus kyi tshogs//'das
375b5(rgyud): dang da ltar byung ba dang //mi 'byung ma nges cha rnams la//dbang bsgyur mnyam pa'i rgyal mo rnams//'jig dang skye dang smin pa dang //stongs par gyur pa de dag tu//rdo rje rnam
375b6(rgyud): bar chad med dang //sems dang de bzhin mnyam pa yi//shes rab 'khor dang dam pa'i dkyil//ji ltar rim par rdo rje yi//glu gar la sogs yo byad kyi//mchod dang
375b7(rgyud): 'jug tshul ji ltar bar//cha rnams dus las mi 'da' bar//lha yi nyi ma rnams la'o//bde ba chen po la sogs pa//tshom bu 'am yang na phyag rgya rnams//sbyar ram
376a1(rgyud): re rer sbyar bya'o//'das pa rnam par tshogs bskrun te//de ltar 'byung dang mi 'byung la//tshad med sems dang rnam thar bskrun//de ni mnyam pa'i rgyal
376a2(rgyud): por 'gyur//gzhan yang rnal 'byoraro byang chub sems//rdzogs pa bcu drug zla rgyas tshul//snying rje ye shes shar ba na//mkha' la nyi shar tshul bzhin du//dam pa rdzogs pa'i
376a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa//yang dag nges pa'i sa pa yin//bcu gsum la la bgrod pa ni//rdo rje dus kyi rgyan tshogs sbyar//skar tshogs dbus na zla nya ba//bcu drug zhag gis rdzogs pa
376a4(rgyud): bzhin//bcu gsum rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i sa//bcu drug tshogs kyis rdzogs pas na//brdzes pa'i zla bo bcu drug gis//nyi gsal 'od kyi phyag rgya la//mdzes par spras
376a5(rgyud): pa'i bde ba de//bcu drug tshogs kyi rdzogs pa bskrun//rdzogs pa nyid na mi dmigs pa//de bzhin nyid du sbyangs pas na//mnyam pas stong par gyur pa la//thams cad
376a6(rgyud): chos skur rdzogs byang chub//sdug bsngal byang chub gnyis med de//rmad byung sems bskyed las chen spyad//phra mo drod du gyur pa nA//dam pa spyad na nyi ma 'char//dus
376a7(rgyud): 'di rgyan gyi bar chad na//bstan pa dag gis bzlog par dka'//bar chad byung na bskangs bya//mkha' lo zla gsal bra rgyas bzhin//sa la rnal 'byor bra rgyas spyad//
376b1(rgyud): gang 'di rgyas na bsod nams dang //bsngo ba chen po'i las rnams bya//des ni nyin zla zhon 'gro ba'i//rig 'dzin sa la gnas phan cad//bde chen bcu gsum sa la 'grub//
376b2(rgyud): gzhan yang rgyan tu bya ba ni//chos kun rgyal ba'i rang bzhin te//rgyal ba sku gsung thugasu snang //sku dang gsung thugs phyag rgya dag/yi ge phreng ba nyid la rdzogs//yi ge phyag
376b3(rgyud): rgya'i ye shes rnams//rgyun gyi rgyun du bya ba yin//des ni rgyun gyi ting 'dzin theb//rgyun gyi rgyun du mi gcad pa//rdo rje nam dang nyi tshed la//yi ge'i tshogs ni bskyed sbyar la//
376b4(rgyud): mchod bsnyen bcas sbyar de bzhin no//'di ni don dam nye ba'i lam//dam pa bskrun por 'gyur phyiraro//'dir ni rgyun gyi rgyun tshogs des//dam pa'i dam par de nyid 'gyur//
376b5(rgyud): gzhan yang rdo rje dra ba'i dbyings//thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'di//rdo rje rdo rje yin pas na//rdo rje dbang yul 'brel pas ni//thams cad 'byung bas dbyings zhes bya//
376b6(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin ma 'dzin rdzogs bcas//'khril mnyam pa yang de bzhin te//gzugs bstan ting 'dzin rang bzhin gnas//ji ltar rim bzhin sbyar byas na//ji ltar 'dod
376b7(rgyud): pa de ltar ni//'dod pa'i khams ltar mnyam par gsungs//gzhan yang gang du gang 'brel ba'i//gsang chen dam pa'i dkyil 'khor ni//chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin
377a1(rgyud): 'ad//phan tshun dA bas 'brel pa la//stong nyid na mkha'i rang bzhin las//sprul pa bye ba ni yang ni//kAnyis med dra ba'i tshul du 'brel//rnal 'drar
377a2(rgyud): chen po'i yul de nyid//rtsal dang ldan pa'i gsang sgo ba//'di la gsang sgo dbye bar bya'o//gsang 'dir chud pa'i bu rnams ni//blo gros chen po thabs ldan pas//mo skrag
377a3(rgyud): dga' ba'i ngo mtshar skye//gsang chen gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di//rdo rje rgyal po rgyal mor bcas//lnga gnyis zung du 'khril pa ni//g.yas nas g.yon du 'khril tshul
377a4(rgyud): sbyor//g.yas nyed byang chub rdo rje dang //rang rang mtshan ma 'bar ba'o//g.yon nyid sgra brnyan dril bu dang //rtags kyis mdzes par gsal ba la//'byo zhing 'dud pa'i
377a5(rgyud): mdangs ldan pas//chags shing g.yo ba'i tshul gyis ni//seng chen g.yo ba'i tshul gyis ni//seng chen khyu mchog la sogs pa//sems dpa' dman pa'i lus khri la//
377a6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i tshul gyi bsgyings bcas te//kha dog lnga'i 'od 'bar ba//bcu gsum cha lugs bsgregs pa rnams//rim gyis sam ni gcig car bskyed//gang 'dir 'dod
377a7(rgyud): khams chags zhen pa'i//dbang po rim par sbyang bar bya//de man yab yum yong mi dmigs//gsang nyid tshogs kyi 'khor rnams kyang //gnas 'gyur ba'i rang
377b1(rgyud): bzhin gyis//phyag rgya rgyal po rgyal por bcas//brgyad gnyis zung sgrol 'khrul 'khyud sbyor//sa dang na mkha' snyun du//byams dang rdo rje kun bzung dpal//nang dung byA y+ya yo byung /
377b2(rgyud): ni//bzhi gnyis dag gis gnyer skor ba//bsam bya la sogs de bzhin no//rdo rje skye dang bcas par ni//rdo rje 'khril 'khyud gsang ba'i tshogs//rnal 'byor longs spyod
377b3(rgyud): cher sbyar bas//mnyes nas sbyar phyiraro rim bzhin dbul//gsang ba'i 'jug tshul la sogs kyis//gsang ba'i don rnams bsgrub par bya//'jug sgo spyod dang lto ba 'thun//
377b4(rgyud): thams cad gcig par gyur po yi//rgyu dang rkyen ldan phun sum tshogs//'dza' 'phrod rkyen dang bgyes sbyor ldan//lha dang rig 'dzin rnal 'byor rIl//ma lus tshogs pas
377b5(rgyud): chos 'di spyad//skad cig yud tsam thong cig gam//yud tsam nyin cig zla re'am//lo yi nyi ma bkra shis kyi//dus la bab pa'i dus chen dag/byin gyis rlabs pa'i dus chen
377b6(rgyud): yin//ji ltar 'byor pa'i yo byad rnams//dag dang ma dag khyad par gyis//gtsang ma kha zas la sogs dang //rnam rtog nad 'joms bdud rtsi rnams//rgyal ba'i tshogs dang
377b7(rgyud): 'byung po la//ji ltar 'byor ldan nan tan bya//bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga dang //chos kyi don du mi 'gyur ba'i//skyon bzhi spangs te bzlog chu la sbyar//rnal 'byor
378a1(rgyud): snying dang mig lta bu ru//gdung ba'i 'du shes nyer bzhag s+ho//ji bzhin 'dod ltar bde bar sbyar//lha rnams mnyes par bya ba dang //bgogs rnams zhe
378a2(rgyud): bar bya ba dang //don grub shi ba gso ba'i phyir//las 'di spyad par shin tu gces//'di dag blo chung gser zhugs pa'o//mdun du brjod par bya ba'i rigs//rdzas dang yo
378a3(rgyud): byad thams cad kyang //cis 'dul de lta ro rtsal dang sbyar//des na las 'di khyad par yang //tshogs la tshogs bskyed sgrib sbyangs te//bsnyon pa dag la goms byas napa//
378a4(rgyud): bsgrubs pas 'bras bu mthar byin pa'o//de skad sems dpa' rdo rje des//'dus pa phal mo chel bshad//'dus po kun gyi don mthong ba//rdo rje 'dzin pa de la gos la//
378a5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po badrag cag gis//chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin ni//thabs nyid shes rab bkod pa dang //kun nas mnyam dang bcu drug che//yi ge tshogs dang
378a6(rgyud): 'byung ba'i dbyings//gnyis med dra bar 'brel la sogs//rang bzhin tring 'dzin gzugs brnyan du//snang bar nges par mthong lags//de skad gsol pas des gsungs
378a7(rgyud): pa//gang 'dir 'dus pa'i tshogs mang kun//ji ltar mthong ba de ltar yin//sa nas ma bcos ji bzhin nyid//rang bzhin dkyil 'khor de kho na//dgongs pa dam pa
378b1(rgyud): lhun grub pa//ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor dam pa nyid//de dag rtsa ba sems nyid pas//sems can gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor gsal//rang bzhin ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor de//
378b2(rgyud): thams cad ye nas zhugs bkod rdzogs//de las khyad par skal ldan mi//spyod yul gyur pa gzugs brnyed te//ras 'jam khong snyoms bzang la sogs//kha dog lnga 'am
378b3(rgyud): nyi shu lngas//ma mthong rmongs la bstan phyir mtshono//ma nyams mtshan mas do rangs 'gyur//bstan zhing nges 'jam khang bu la//kha dog 'bar bar gzugs mtshon te//
378b4(rgyud): phyag rgya ma nyams mdzes ldan na//mtshan ma'i cho 'phrul ston par nus//gser dngul zangs lcags la sogs pa//gang byugs rgyal ba'i sku byas te//phyag rgya ma nyams dang
378b5(rgyud): ldan no//de yang mtshan ma'i rten du 'gyur//shel rdo dung la sogs pa la//'bur las rgyal ba'i sku byas na//de bzhin ma nyams rgyas mdzad na//mtshan ma 'byung ba'i
378b6(rgyud): rten du 'gyur//glags sha byang chub shong sogs la//mkhas pas bzor bzhogs gzugs brnyan gyis//phyag rgya ma nyams kun rdzogs na//'di yang mtshan ma'i rten du 'gyur/
378b7(rgyud): sa la sogs la phyag rgya byas//kha dog mdzes dang ldan byas la//mtshan ma 'byung ba'i rten yin te//mtshan mas mtshan ma bral rig pa//gang dag sa las rgyal ba'i dpyin
379a1(rgyud): na rnamam par byas pas//nAmA sna mas pa ku na//rnam na su sgru pA/ ga sa na dang mad da//
379a2(rgyud): na n+tu/da par drod bang mad//'du lasbyinam la rig par 'gyu / gas hrI rje du
379a3(rgyud): mtshan ldan dben phyugs//kun nas ldum par mangs byas la//skad bu brgyad dang ldan byas te/bsdu ba'i bye bas mdzes byas pa//de nas sad thA ga tsog gis bsgo
379a4(rgyud): la rgyus du b+hur ba dang //na~M du l+h+wam bu myung bu brgyad/ tshe yin pa de ra 'gyuraH//mtho zad snyam tshad byas pa li// ni b+hi nang du spyad brag/
379a5(rgyud): phra ma dag gis mangs par brgyan//dgu yo chur ni bags pa la//sgo dang skye khyung sum cha'o//ka ba brgyad kyis rmongs byas la//rin chenA kA ba'i na'i legs//
379a6(rgyud): rgyas pa brang dab rtser bya//bsgob tshad mi rnam thar to//rim pa klasam gyis mdzes pA la//rta babs b+h+yo po smras kyis brgyan//dbus skye pho brang la /
379a7(rgyud): mau dpa la be'u 'drad do//rin chen zur brgyad la sags pa//stir rigs pa de bzhin to//rgyan ni rin chen sde tshogs dang //pan Ni raka d+ha ran//phreng ba dngan nga
379b1(rgyud): bArgyan//za rang chags dang chun 'phyang dang //dril bu g.yer ka the'u chung 'phyang //ral mo sgra sgrogs lha yi bu//mang pos phyi nang na mkha' las//mchod pa sna tshogs 'bul pa/
379b2(rgyud): bri//thag chen gdung bzhis rab brgyan te//rin chen kha bad mchod rten dang //rgyal mtshan rin chen 'od 'bar bas//gzhan yang mdzes par brgyan pa ni//chos kyi pho brang ci 'dra
379b3(rgyud): bar//de 'dra de nyid mtshan par bre//gzhal yas khang du gang skyur ba/kun gyis mdzes dang legs par brgyan//mchod pa bran yod med kun//ji ltar 'byor ltar nan tan dbul
379b4(rgyud): rgyal sed longs spyod bcas pa dang /glu bro gar dang rol mor bcas//dug 'joms sman dang bdud rtsi rnams//rgyal ba'i rgya mtsha snyed la dbul//mnyam po nyid kyi mchog sbyar
379b5(rgyud): bas//rgyud byung thams cad mnyam par 'gyur//de skad smras pas 'dun pa kun//thams nad rgyud byed rnam grol reg/grogs po dag de dag ni bkod pa'i bya bas yongasu sbyang bar
379b6(rgyud): shes par bya'o//grogs pa dag 'di la mo'i bya bas yongasu snang ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos thams cad chos nyid du sbyang ba'i phyir dngos po thams cad mo'i rang bzhon du byin
379b7(rgyud): gyis brlabs pas 'dus pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis chos thams cad ma'i rang bzhin du snang bar mthong ste/shin tu ngom nas ngo mtshar du spyod pa/e ma'o sems dpa' sems
380a1(rgyud): dpa' tshe//tsha ba'i che ba byin rlabs tshe//ting 'dzin chen po snang ba che//cho 'phrul chen po sna tshogs che//thabs mchog dpag gis me lang ste//rgyas kun ma dpung
380a2(rgyud): 'bar bar snang //de nyid ye shes gsal po'i klong //'bar 'phro gasngal par gyur bya ni//mun gsal dngos po thams cad bsregs//bde chen dbyingasu kun rdzogs par//
380a3(rgyud): dpa' bo khyod kyis mdzad pa lags//'bar ba chen po a la la//gzi brjid zer 'phro a la la//mtha' yas kun sdud a la la//thams cad sreg byed a la la//za byed chen po/
380a4(rgyud): a la la//mtha' dang dbus med a la la//thugs rje bde mchog a la la//dbang phyug 'jig byed a la la//gsang mchog rmad 'byung byin rlabs kyis//me'i rang bzhin chen
380a5(rgyud): po dag/bdag cag rnams la ba shad du gsol//de skad 'dus pas gsol ba las//de nyid dgyes pas 'di skad du//'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor ba//rdo rje me yi rang bzhin dag/
380a6(rgyud): nges par bshad kyis gus par nyon//khyad par bla ma'i lam mchog 'dis//rnal 'byor thabasu bde sbar bas//rgyal ba kun mnyes kun bsregs sbyangs//don grub las kyi
380a7(rgyud): mchog tu sbyangs//ji bzhin pa'i hom khung du//ji snyed pa'i yam shing la//de bzhin nyid kyi me byung bas//thams cad thams cad bsregs sbyangs thim//skye med rnam dag
380b1(rgyud): tam khung du//skye ba rnam bzhi'i yums shing la//ma skyes spyos bral me byung bas//mtshan ma'i brag chags bsregs sbyangs thim//bsam du med pa'i hom khung du//bskum gyis mi
380b2(rgyud): lhab yams shing la//'od dpag med pa'i me byung bas//mtha' yas rdul snyed bsngags sbyangs thim//chos nyid rnam dag tom khung du//cho sde can sna tshogs yams shing la//stong
380b3(rgyud): ye shes me 'bar bas//dngos po'i bag chags bsregs sbyangs thim//sems nyid rnam dag hom khung du//sems can skye 'gro yams shing la//rang 'byung ye shes me 'bar bas
380b4(rgyud): 'khor ba'i brag chags bsregs sbyangs thim//kun gzhi b+ha go'i hom khung du//nyon mongs lnga yi yams shing la//ye shes lnga yi me byung bas//gzung 'dzin rtog pa bskyegs sbyangs
380b5(rgyud): thim/snang srid na mkha'i ho ma khung du//'byung ba bzhi'i yams shing la//phyag rgya 'bar ba'i me byung bas//snang srid dngos po bsregs sbyangs thim//rnam bzhi las kyi hom khung du
380b6(rgyud): bzhi 'am bzhi yi yams shing la//rigs bzhi 'bar ba'i me byung bas//mchod sbyin dngos po bstsags sbyangs thim//'di yang so so'i khyad par gyis//phyogs dang kha dog dbyibs
380b7(rgyud): dang rdzas//gang ltar rigs pa de ltar sbyar//shar lho nub byang dkar ser dmar//mthing ka nag po b.lo mdog sbyar//zlum po pad+ma le'u tshe bzhi//'khor lo gru bzhi zung brgyad rgyas
381a1(rgyud): zla gam gru chad gzhu dbyibs dbang //klu gsum b+ha ga'i mkha' mngon spyod//gsum rtseg mdangs dang ri mor mdzes//las kyi yams shing rdzas kyis/
381a2(rgyud): brgyan/ye shes rdo rje las rgyud ldan//bla ma gsum gyi thabs mchog sbyar//dag pa yi mtha' mnyes mchog 'dzin//rdo rje gsang ba'i glu bro gar//mchod pa nges pa'i sbyor
381a3(rgyud): tshogs sbyar//rdo rje las kyi byin rlabs sbyor//gsang ba las kyi rgyud ldan pas//ba shar btab zhi ba'i lhar rgyud dang /rgyas dang dbang ba shrad rgyud bshad pas/lha dong
381a4(rgyud): sngags dong phyag rgya dang //de bzhin klu yi rgyud 'byor bya//rigs kyi rigs rgyud lnga rnams ni//so so ragesu bsher btab ste//glong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung du//dam rdzas
381a5(rgyud): bdud rtsi 'bar ba yis//sbyang dang thob phyir bsreg byar 'os//dpag med rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs//che ba bsngags pa'i yon tan dag/rdo rje glu yis brjod nas kyang //
381a6(rgyud): mnyes par bya ba'i thabs tshon brtsam//mnyes pa'i las rnams rdzogs pa dang //gang yang ma byang don chen rnams//grub dang ma grub de rnams dag/me la mkhas pa
381a7(rgyud): brtag par bya//me dgra gnyis dang kha dog gnyis//'bar tshul gnyis dang dbyibs rnams drug/de dag yongasu shes par bya//gal te mtshan la mi sdug na//yid du mi
381b1(rgyud): khyo rtags yin pas//phyag sbyang chen pos rgyas por bya//de nas yang 'dra 'ad 'byung ba//ma la 'dod pa'i mtshan mu rnams//rnam gsum gang ltar 'grub pa byung //'dus brnyan
381b2(rgyud): po gzhan yang gang //ro ya rdzas rnams pasreg spyang na//ro la sngags kyis btab nas kyang //shin tu dri zhim sna tshogs kyis//ro la byug kyang bkru bar bya//bdud rtsi zhun chen khu
381b3(rgyud): ba yis//ras la byug pas ro dkris par//ro yo gnas rnams gang yin par//sngags kyi sbyor ba kun bkod nas//phyag rgya'i mtshan mas gdab par bya//rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor
381b4(rgyud): bkod pa grang //de yi mtshan pa'i phyag rgya rnams//gang du bkod pa de nyid du//snying po grangs kyang de ltar bya//snying po dag la so so yi/ma nor rtsa ba'i yig 'bru dag/ras sam
381b5(rgyud): shing la bris te dgod//ro yi sbyor ba rdzogs pa dang //ro yi phyi rgyab thams cad de//nyon mongs 'khor ba kun bkod de//ras sam shing shun gang dag la//'khor ba'i sa
381b6(rgyud): pon thams cad dgod//nyon mongs lnga dang dug gsum bcas//skye bzhi las lnga rgyu drug rnams//ming dang gzugasu byas nas ni//gnas gnas ngag tu dgod par bya//sa bon/
381b7(rgyud): 'du byed dngos po lnga//gzung 'dzin ming du bcas pa rnams//bde'i yi tshul du dkod nas ni//ro rnams khyad par dgod par bya//de nas ro yi phung po de//sten nas grags ma
382a1(rgyud): /sngags bu yi/steng du mkhas pas gzhug par byu zhabs kyi cho ga bya ba yang//mjalA khor yug ran tsam la//brko dang kha khyer lugs bzhin bya//
382a2(rgyud): phyag rgya bzhugs pa'i pho brang dag/thig gis yul gcad so sor dbye//de yi steng du bsregs shing rtsig/dbyibs ni rigs bzhir gtams pa la//gri zur ka bas brtan par
382a3(rgyud): brten//sum rtsigs yang thog par khang bcas//tha ma yams shring brdungs pa s+ya btims//byar khang dag gi glegs bam la//ro yi bzhin phogs ro bzhir 'astan//ro yi
382a4(rgyud): steng du yang thog tu//ras la sogs la bris pa yis//phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsol bar dkod//ro khang glo skar bzhi phye la//rdo rje gzungs kyi spyad thag shas//btags nas
382a5(rgyud): bla ma'i phyag tu phul//shing gi bya ba rdzogs pa dang //de yi phyi mtha' stegs bu la//rnam bzhi las kyi lha rnams dwags//stegs bu rdzogs par gyur pa dang //rdo rje las kyi sgos
382a6(rgyud): bab po//rdo rje rgyal po bla ma lo//'khor zla sgeg par mnga' gsol te//mi g.yo ma chen rtse gcig pas//me yi 'du 'phro rgyun du bya//rdo rje sngags kyi las sbyar la//rnam
382a7(rgyud): bzhi las kyi mnga' gsol te//las kyi phreng ba phags par bya//bla ma rdo rje dam pa zhig ro yi nyes pa'i mtha' brji na/mas kyi bas sgrus pa 'greng zhing gshegs/
382b1(rgyud): skyabs sbyor rdo rje bla ma yis//zla med mchad pa rgyun du bya//go bAng+tha g+ha tshig snyoms chen gyis//mchod pa rol mo sna tshogs dbul//rdo rje las kyi smon lam god ba//mchod skabaso las
382b2(rgyud): kyi 'jug tu bya//rdo rje las kyi lta 'dzin pas//dkaro byang las kyi snying bzung ste//legs mtha' dam pa rnams la dbul//ro yi nyes mtha'i gang 'dzin pasra//mtshan mA nag po
382b3(rgyud): bud shing dag/ye shes me yi klong du bsreg/me sbyor me la ga ra~Ms bI'i lte//ma yi sangs rgyas 'od dpag med//me yi l+h+wam gros dkar mo//rgyal ba kun gyi 'od yin te/
382b4(rgyud): 'byung ba me la dbang sgyur zhing //thams cad kun gyi drod bdag yin//srid gsum sreg par zhal gyis 'ches//dngos po sreg po'i 'phrin las ni//thugs dam dbang gis yong ma
382b5(rgyud): 'da'//gang gi sgrib sreg de nyid mkhyen//ro yoM rnam shes byang ma byung //me la mkhas pas de bzhin rtag/mi sdug tshul 'byung sreg sbyang bya//gal te lags na me dbang bskur//
382b6(rgyud): thal ba sku gdung ring bsrel dang //phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor las sogs bya//dam pa zhig na gdung brtags te//bla ma'i rten du dbul bar bya//'di ni sbyor ba kun gyi mchog/de skad
382b7(rgyud): sems dpa' mchog des slasmras//grogs po dag de dag ni me'i bya bas yod su shes par bya'o//rdo rje gsang ba chas kyi spun//mi yi bya ba las byung ba//gdung zhes gags pa'i
383a1(rgyud): shA ri rA ma//dpag med ji srid dus dag nas//grangs med sprul pa'i rgyal ba dag/mya dran 'das par gyur byi na//med pa las byung sku gdung na//sku yi gdung //
383a2(rgyud): dang ring sel zhes//'gro ba'i bsod nams rten du drags//rgyal ba rnams ni dngos med pos//sku gdung ring bsrel mi srid na//sems can rnams la phan don du//ming lus
383a3(rgyud): thugs rje'acho 'phrul bzhig/de bzhin gang du gang byung ba'i//gang 'dir snang ba sgron ma dag/mya ngan 'das pa'i sku gdung yang //sha ri ram zhes grags par 'gyur//de yi las
383a4(rgyud): kyang de bzhin no//de las sogs pa'i rgya lnga ba rnams//rang 'byung rjes gnas 'byung bcas rnams//tshul 'thun gcig par gyur pa yi//sku gdung sa bon byin rlabs kyi//
383a5(rgyud): yon tan cha las rtsir 'phel ba//'dzam gling se khams khyab par snang //gdung las byung phyir sra khrigs zlum//tha snyad rdo rje rab tu grags//lhung bu zur gsum til
383a6(rgyud): ljang 'dra//gzhon tshe'i mar ram 'o mar snang //nar son smin rtags sra zhing mkhregs//tsan ka'i 'bru bzhin du//kar la tsan dmar kha dog gsal//zos pa'i
383a7(rgyud): yon tan bsam mi khyab//bdud rtsi sman gyi mchog tu grags//de bzhin rigs 'dzin sems dpa' rnams//ma yi lus su sprul pa dang //gang zag sa pa ches
383b1(rgyud): mag ldan//bsod nams dpal zhing dag pa dag/sdong bu snying por sbyangs byin//skal ba can la snang ba ni//la la dag la shar ram//la la dag la ring bsrel sku//skal
383b2(rgyud): ngan dag la snang mi 'gyur//la la snang bar gyur na yang //sbyor ba dag la yun tu rtag/ma dag nub cig 'bros par 'gyur//yid du 'ong dang mi 'ong ba'i//'byung ba'i lhas
383b3(rgyud): ni ston par byed//yod par rtag pa ma yin la//med pa rlag dor yong mi 'gyur//rnal 'byor las dang 'byor pa rnams//dag dang mi dag tshul la sbyor//de yang bsod nams
383b4(rgyud): drag pa yis//gang las rgya cher mas pa dang //rnal 'byor rtse gcig rmog btud na//rdo rjes spre la dang las 'thun na//rgyud rnams yongasu dag la 'bab//de yang khyad par
383b5(rgyud): rim pas ni//rgyal ba'i sku gdung sha ri ram//zhing khams kun tu khyab par ni//gar dang bzod ni bzlums pa bzhin//byas pa med las snang ba dag/dkar 'tsher mdog
383b6(rgyud): gsal 'jig 'dra ba/tsAn+da dmar mdang s+ya gsal pa yi//na mkha' gang bar chus bzhin 'bab//rig 'dzin sems dpa' sprul pa'i gdung //dka ljags la 'ga' 'gal
383b7(rgyud): du 'byung //gang zags pa'i rtags chen ni//mdog mnyam gcig gsum gnyis gsum gcig/la lar lnga 'am bcu 'byung zhing //yon tan de mi de ltaro//de yang
384a1(rgyud): sram zlogs du rdza sa//lcags kyi gtan rdzas ma ma tshogs/'di dag byebs pa rda yon tan yang //gang da gang du babs pa yi//yul khams de dag
384a2(rgyud): thams cad du//nad dang mo ngas bgegs rnams zhi//gnod sbyin srin po ma rungs pa//drag po gtum po'ang lha nar 'gyur//rgyal po 'khrugs dang khams 'khrugs dang /
384a3(rgyud): yul khams 'khrugs pa'ang zhi bar 'gyur//'bras bu lo tIg 'phel smin cing //yid du 'ong ba thams cad 'byung //yul de dmangs dang rgyal po yi//sa bon thams
384a4(rgyud): cad bu phor 'gyur//bder bcas mtshan ldan rigs mthon ni//bu po kun kyang 'byung bar 'gyur//'di dge su la 'chung ba rnams//rig 'dzin sa dang skul ba mnyam//
