384a5(rgyud): 'jig rten 'di yi bsod nams kyang //'khor los sgyur rgyal dag dang mnyam//de'i dgongs pa kun tu 'grub//chu dang skongs deng las 'grub 'gyur//phyin cad bla med
384a6(rgyud): byang chub ni//sa la reg pa'i rtogs chen yin//gzhon yang yon tan bsam mi khyab//de dag rang gi rang bzhin du//gnas pa'i yon tan de dag ga/bsgrubs na
384a7(rgyud): yon tan bsam mi khyab//sems can rnam pa thams cad la//byang chub snying po nyid yod pas//me yi las kyi bya ba yis//lnga phung sbyangs na med mi srid//'di
384b1(rgyud): dag sgrub par bya ba yang //shel b+h+yo zla mu tog nad du//basmras te phyag rgyu'i rgyus btabA nAs/la gyi g+ha bu'i nang du bca'//sgrub pas drol smon lam dang //skyob sbya /
384b2(rgyud): gsol 'phro 'dra bya//'gro 'du bya ba'i tshi gA yang //na mkha' gang ba'i sha ri ram//zhing khams gang ba'i rgyal ba las//tshang gyi rgyun bzhin de la 'bab//
384b3(rgyud): bzlas pa gsung gi rgyun//ma hA sha ri ram gyi lI hUM//grangs med par chad med par bzlas//mchog tu gastsal zhing 'tsher ba dang //'od kyi zer phyed nyi zer bzhin/
384b4(rgyud): zang zing brang brang snang bar 'gyur//za ma tog gi phyi rol na//gsal ba de la 'byung bar 'gyur//'gul zhing mang por 'phel pa dang //rgyal po sems pa'i reg 'dzin
384b5(rgyud): gyis//gzugs brnyan shol dang de las ni//gosal bar bdag la ston par 'gyur//dang po sdod de khengs pa yin//gnyis pa byed dam brgya rtsa brgyad /tha ma'ang
384b6(rgyud): grangs 'gas 'phel bar 'gyur//de dag grub pa rtags chen te//de tshe dngos grub blang bar bya//thob pa'i yon tan bsam mi khyob//tshe 'dor rig 'dzin sa la
384b7(rgyud): gnas//rgyal ba dag dang mnyam par 'gyur//zhar las byung ba'i yon tan yang //'gro ba kun gyi don spyod pa//sems dpa' che ltar 'grub par 'gyur//dran
385a1(rgyud): de la mchod dgos te//mchod na yon tan dam pa 'byung //mchod pa bya ba'i cho ga yang //sgrib sbyangs bsod nams dpung bskyed de//rang rgyud dag
385a2(rgyud): par byas nas ni//zla ba dus ni thams cad kyi//bcu drug cha la rdzogs pa'i tshe//bdag nyid gtsog pu sems yul du//gyur par byas na mchod pa ni//za ma tog drod bcas
385a3(rgyud): pa dag/rgyal mtshan rtse mor brtags byas te//ji ltar 'dod par smon lam btab//des ni 'dod pa thams cad skangs//de ni rnal 'byor skal ldan gyis//yid bzhin
385a4(rgyud): nor bu rin po che//rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i rdzas mchog tu//ming gis med du mi rung ngo //ji ltar ro dag gser 'gyur dang //de bzhin mo yis bsregs sbyangs bzhin//dngos
385a5(rgyud): par spyod pa ji snyed pa//de nyid dam pa la mi g.yo//de las sogs pa mtha' yas spyod//dngos po bzhi la gnas spyod pa//rdo rje sems dpa'i chos nyid de//spyod pa rmad
385a6(rgyud): 'byung dam pa yi//ji ltar glang po chur zhugs pa//thogs chags 'jigs pa yod med par//dga' ba'i longs spyod brod tshul gyis//mi ldog pha rol phyin pa ltar//
385a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor nges par spyod pa yang //brtul zhugs rgya mtsho'i chur 'jug pa//rtsal chen skyong ba'i brod tshul gyis//thogs chags med pA la dor ba'o//spyod pa gang bar
385b1(rgyud): byunga'o babs//goms pa klong du gyur pa gces//sgrogs pa dag de dag na la dar bar shes par bya'o//snangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i ma n+dan po las rnal
385b2(rgyud): spyod 'jug gi le'u zhes bya ste/bdun cu gcig pa'o//de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos dman pa dam pa rnams la smras pa/kye grogs po dag gis bcas
385b3(rgyud): por bya ba ni 'di lta ste/dag dus pa dam pa de kho na nyid do//de n+ti'i d+hA r+yA k+Shan/dgongs pa de kho na nyid gajug byaslabs pas bsnam b+his mi khyabye pa'i chos la bslabs pa'o//de khyon /
385b4(rgyud): gcig la mkhas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mkhas pa'o//de kho na nyid de la goms na bsam gyis mi khyab pa la bsgom pa'o//de kho na nyid las mu 'das na bsam gyis mi
385b5(rgyud): khyab pa'i dam pa bsrungs pa'o//de kho na nyid de la zhugs na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgor zhugs pa'o//de kho na nyid la spyod na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yo byad la spyod pa'o//
385b6(rgyud): de kho na nyid mngon du byas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgya mtsho snyed byas pa'o//de kho na nyid de ma nor bar bstan na chos kyo sgo dpab tu med pa bstan pa'o//de kho na nyid pa phyed
385b7(rgyud): ma log par thos ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyi sgo thos pa'o//de kho na nyid de mngon du gyur na/dpag tu med pa'i rgyal ba mthong bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na de dag
386a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi bcud du bya ba 'am snying por bya ba ni de kho na nyid de de las med pa'i phyir ro//grogs po dag dri bas na 'di ltar//de bzhin nyid kyi don
386a2(rgyud): mthong na//mthong bas thams cad sgyu ma yin//de nyid go 'phang mchog 'phags na//bla med mtho btsun mtha' dag brdzun//de bzhin nyid du nges phan chad//gang dman spu gong
386a3(rgyud): bum pa med//de bzhin nyid du thag tshang na//'jig rten gnas kyang chos kyi sku//dam par nges kyang 'jig rten 'jug/'khor ba'i mtha' la'ang skyo ba med//mu mtha' yas
386a4(rgyud): kyang gcig tu rdzogs/bdud kyi khams la nyam ming //me bzadang khams la bag mi che//'dod pa'i dngos po dbyings la sbyor//gcig char nges pa'i don mthong na//rim gyis
386a5(rgyud): sbyor ba sgyu 'drid 'dra//de la mos pa tsam gyis kyang //khams gsum zil gyis gnon par 'gyur//glong du gyur pa smos ci dgos//dper na seng phrug khyung sgong dgra/
386a6(rgyud): mog ma byi zhing mar blangs kyang //kun skrag sgo nga 'am 'khar 'gro ltar//de nyid nges par grang gyur pa//de dag 'jig rten gnas 'jug kyang //go 'phang dam pa de nyid du//
386a7(rgyud): des bco la 'ang bag mtsha//rim gyis mtshan mar spyod pa dang //med dang dmigs dang mi dmigs dang //bsgrub dang bgrod par byed pa yi//bye brag med par rtog
386b1(rgyud): 'jog pa//blun po de da ba stong smra //dam par dros pa bA l+yA smin//gdun gnan tha m+b+ha b+hU Ta 'ang //sgragacong dang pa/rang dranan//mtha ya spyod sa da zla
386b2(rgyud): rlung bzhin de ltar gnas pa bzhin//ma bcos byin ci ma log pa//de bzhin nyid du thug rjod pa'o//ji ltarar+ya ljang rten mkha' li bri//mdab ga shig rdul gyi nem 'byung
386b3(rgyud): spyod//ro brag rje kyad mtha' yas kyang //'phung rlobs 'gu tu kun chud wA rA//rnal 'byor chos nyid mkha gro ba~M//theg pa'i snodade sgo mtha' yus kyang // bzhin ma brjos
386b4(rgyud): don gyis na//gi phang rlabs kyis zag bcad ni//'di ni ri dang dgos pa yi//the tsom gcod pa'i nges pa ste//dam pa nyid mi lci ba yi// 'phang gcod pa nges par gces
386b5(rgyud): sgrogs po dag de dag ni sa yongasu gtsud phyur bzlas par shes par bya'o//de skad ces smras pas/dman pa dam pa rnams re dgas med par phyug gcod pa'i go 'phang
386b6(rgyud): ba par gyur /swA s+ya d+g+has sman gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i pa sa \u0f7fpa sa garjod pa'i mdu zhes bya ste/'dun du gnyis pa /na
386b7(rgyud): yang gas ba pa'i bdas pas dpon pa dam pa rnams la smras pa//gle grogs po dag ga shes rnyed par bya ba de 'di sa ste/dges pa dpa pa kun 'dus la//
387a1(rgyud): gtsor ni bsam gtan te//'khor los dbang sgyur ji bzhin du//chos kun dbang bsgyur bsam gtan yin//rnal 'byor bsam gtan chen po 'ang //
387a2(rgyud): dug dang mun pa gser 'gyur bzhin//rngams cad dbang bsgyur bsamAM gtan yin//des na dam pa'i bsom gtan bya//gal te bsam gautan 'dre med na//rgya mtsho
387a3(rgyud): 'dzang gi pha bong ltar//dpag tu med pa'i sgo gcad kyang //don med snying po skams pa yin//rnal 'byor chen po'i bsam gtan ni//ji bzhin pa yi de nyid la//ma bcos
387a4(rgyud): pa'i blo bzhag ste//ma yengs skye 'gag med pa'o//rnal 'byor dam paM ji bzhin pa//sems kyi chos nyid de nyid do//de bzhin nyid ces mi dmigs pa//rtsa ba'i kun shes
387a5(rgyud): kun gzhi nyid//ci phyir ma byas mo bcos pa//rang 'byung de bzhin nyid ces bshad//thams cad kun tu snang ba ni//'jug pa'i rnam shes yud tsam nyid//ci phyir kun tu
387a6(rgyud): snang 'jug pas//phyi nang kun tu snang bar bshad//rgyu yi rnam par dkod pa ni//'jug pa'i rnam shes sgo lnga nyid//thams cad gang gi rgyur dkod pas//thams cad 'byung
387a7(rgyud): ba'i rgyu zhes bshad//gang gi dgongs pa dam pa ni//stong pa ma yin ther zug med//dbu mar mi dmigs kun rig gsal//yong min med min las kyang 'das//gang
387b1(rgyud): 'dor tshor 'gro ma rabs dang //gang 'gog byas pa'i spyad yul dang //'di ga nyams pa'i log spyod can//yal ba byal ba dmigs pa gcig/gang 'dir lta bas mdongs pa da//bdagapa/
387b2(rgyud): gan nas mtha' thub ste//med mos des 'gro med snyam nas//de ma thag tu ngan 'gror 'gro/mos pa chung ngu thams cad ni//gang la bdag med brten bzhin mthong //gang dgag rtog
387b3(rgyud): yang dpyod med pa//bsam gtan dang po kha na'o//kun+da stong phra ba'i stong pa lngas//gnas drug med la dpyod pa gnyis//stong pa nyid la nges bzhag ste//dga' ba bskyod pa gsum
387b4(rgyud): pa'o//bdag gam gzhan gyis mthus bstan te//skyon med me ge mo gnas bzhi pa//gang yod mthar yang 'gyur skyid kyi//grang med gnas med mthar mi 'gyur//gang med mo
387b5(rgyud): mthong mi shes bzhin//btsal bas snyed par mi 'gyur yang //de nyid med par mi 'gyur bas//rgyu 'bras med kyang don med min//dper na lcags bsregs dpal med bzhin//
387b6(rgyud): chen po bzhi med stongs 'gyur kyang //de dang na mkha' med min bzhin//de nyid ma rlag med min 'gyur//drug gi spyod yul mtshan ma ste//mtshan mi dngos por snang bas na//
387b7(rgyud): ci dga' bzhag pas de bzlog med//de stong spang zhing bzlog tu med//thams cad sems kyi chos nyid du//tshig medo lta bas zag chod na//ma bcos ma yengs yongs thub snyom/
388a1(rgyud): rtsol bsgrub de ngog su ga la yod//mi mthun gnyen po pasgom mi dgos//skyon yon spong ldan bying dgod rnams/gang 'dir dbyer pang zung 'brel na/
388a2(rgyud): bra nas lhag mthong sems las byung //zhig pas na mkha' med mi 'gyur//'khyams pas byang chub sems ni stong //spangs pas mi spongs mtha' yas chos//bkrus pas
388a3(rgyud): mi 'dag stong nyid dbyings//gang stong yod pas chad rtag pas//thams cad rig pas stong ma yin//dngos po med pas rtag ma yin//ci yang med pas sbyang du med//bya ba/
388a4(rgyud): thams cad yongs btang na//ye nas ma bcos der bzhag na//de med pas na de yang med//de ni dam pa'i nyams rnyed pa'i//'dir ni theg chen dam pa yi//nang na rim gyis
388a5(rgyud): 'thob ma yin//rim gyis pa yi dug dgod ni//gcig car 'char ba'i de kho na'o//des na gang dang gang dag gis//ji ltar go dang mos bzhin du//bstan pa gang dang
388a6(rgyud): gang dag la//so so yid brtan yul du bya//de bas bsgron ma dpag med kyis//dam pa ji snyed gsungs pa rnams//gcig tu chad dam nges med de//ji ltar 'byung ba
388a7(rgyud): de ltar nges//'di la gang 'jug par gcod pa//le lo bye mang dgod pa dang //g.yeng dang rmugs dang 'dod pa dang //gnyid dang re dog the tsom dang //'du 'phro spyod dang
388b1(rgyud): dga' ba'o//dri yang rang bzhin de bzhin nyid//drug lnga la sogs kun 'byung nyid//rang 'byung rang bzhin de bzhin nyid//dam pa'i donA la gang sgrub pa/mi g.yo gsal bde thug
388b2(rgyud): bsngal dang //skye ba gsal ba 'byin pa dang //res dang khyad snyems 'byung zhe nyid//bsam gtan chen por nges snang ba//kun tu mi nyams re dogs med//dang ba mi skye me ge yo
388b3(rgyud): dang //ma chags mi 'chad len pa med//'khrug pa med ni rang bzhin nyid//rnal 'byor bdud kyi spyod yul ni//dam par 'dun mthong dam par smra//sprul pa grangs med 'byed
388b4(rgyud): mthong dang //dam pas smras kun gsal mthong dang //dus kun shes gsal mthong po dang //rgyud drug lam nas kun snang dang //de la gdung ba'i shugs 'byung dang //kun
388b5(rgyud): snang gsal bar mthong ba dang //tsa la'ang thogs med 'gro ba dang /mkha' la bya bzhin 'gro 'dug dang //dam pa'i phyag rgya lung ston dang //kun gyi skad du chos smra dang /
388b6(rgyud): dngos po brtan pa yo bsti gnas mthong /thams cad mnyam par bkod pa dang //de nyid rang bzhin gsal snang dang //las su rung ba thogs med dang //dam pa'i don la sgro
388b7(rgyud): ba dang //'jig rten gtso bos mchod pa dag/rang bzhin shes na dam pa'i rtags//gang mi shes pa lag pa'i bdud//sgo drug mtshan ma tsa skyes dang //rang 'byung rang zhi ci
389a1(rgyud): dgar bzhag/ma skyes pas na bzlog du med//de yang de bzhin de nyid do//'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi//nyes dang logs pa gang la yang //dgal
389a2(rgyud): dang 'gyod pa'i rtog pa med//rang 'byung rang zhi de nyid do//'dir ni dam pa gang nges pa//rnal 'byor mtshan ma'i lnga ltas yin//chu klung me gser ga na par//'du
389a3(rgyud): 'phro 'byung rtsi nges pa bzhin//dam par nges na dam par 'byung //dam par ma nges thams cad bdud//dam par des na chung ngu rtsam//gang 'byung dam pa'i snga ltaso///
389a4(rgyud): gang gi dam pa nyid thos na//mi skrag mi dngang dga' ba skye//gang zhig dam pa nyid lta ba//thams cad dam pa nyid du mthong //dam pa'i klung du gang gyur pa//rnam
389a5(rgyud): grangs mang po dam par sdud//dam pa nges pa mthong ba na//tshig lam rjes su de mi 'gro/de mthong thams cad dam par gsal//snang ba med pa'i dam pa ni//
389a6(rgyud): snang ba med pa mthong bar 'gyur//de nyid kun gyi rgyu yin te//cho 'phrul rgyu ba thams cad 'byung //g.yo dang drod thob brtan pa dang //gsal dang rtags thob brtan
389a7(rgyud): pa dang //nyi zer rdul phran smog sgyu dang //mtsho rlabs rlung dang char gyi rgyu ni//sprin lding ta la gang 'phar 'gro/sa g.yo 'byung ba'i skye mched snang //'byung rgyun
389b1(rgyud): zug rngu las sogs pa//gang gis yongasu nud zhi bya//mun bya'i skye mched choms pa dang //lus kyi bzod pa thob pa dang //kun la bde rlag ji bzhan pa'o//gang min gang
389b2(rgyud): du sgyur ba dang //gang med pa las gang 'byin pa'o//yid 'ong 'dong grub rdzas mchog rnyed//kun dga' kun 'dud kun yid dang //kun la dbang sgyur mchog 'grub ltas//
389b3(rgyud): yud las sngon du 'byung ba'i ltas//sgren mor byung dang rtag par 'khru//rnam dag chu bar 'bogs dang rgyal//char rgyun bum chu 'byung ba dang //gseg dang g.yeng dang
389b4(rgyud): rnam par 'byor//'di gang sbyong ba dag pa'i ltas//gang 'dir 'jigs dang bral ba yang //g.yul 'gyed zhi dang zung rngu byang //tha mar grol dang gshed las thar//
389b5(rgyud): gdug pa'i tshogs byal dug nod zhi//bcing grol bcad ltas bzang po yin//khyad par dam pa'i sngon 'byung ba//khri rkang shing dang ljon shing skas//'dzeg dang gyen
389b6(rgyud): du 'gro ba dang //ri rtse'i mchod rten na mkha'i skas//grong nas gong du 'phar ba'i ltas//gang la gnas dang non pa yang //khri mthon la 'dug glang chen zhon//seng
389b7(rgyud): chen khyud lding mdab chags dang //mchod rten rtse dang ri bo'i spo//nam pa'i dbyings na 'dug pa dang //lus la sprin byung nyi zla la//'dug pa gang la gnas pa'i rtag/
390a1(rgyud): dam pa rigs kyi sngon byang ba//bka' rtags dang por dbang sgyur byed//'jig rten skas la 'bebs pa dang //dbang sdud g.yul rgyal rgyal bar
390a2(rgyud): 'gyur//mgo la me tog mthong skyes pa'o//chos gang dbang sgyur sngon byung ba//glegaso bam rnyed dang dri spyod dang //gzhan la stan dang gtan la 'bibs//mo long bum
390a3(rgyud): gang lha rtog 'thung //nor bu thu dang 'khor lo babs//nyin zla zin dang ri rab skor//gang la sgra brgyas stong gsum gang //dngos po'i mtha' dag yi ger mthong //glags
390a4(rgyud): pas ngo mtshar kun snyed dang //mkha' las me tog char 'bab pa'o//dam pa mthong ba ston byung po//sngon ma mthong ba yul mthong dang //stong gsum mthong zhing gling rnams//
390a5(rgyud): bgrod//ri rab rtser phyin thams cad mthong //nam mkha' mtha' yas mthong ba dang //rgya mtsho gting du phyin pa dang //sgron ma thogs dang snang srid dpyod//nyi ma'i snying po lta ba'o//
390a6(rgyud): lung chen thob pa ston byung ba//rol mo 'brug sgra seng ge dang //chos kyi 'gro ba thos pa dang //gzugs brnyan zhalnga 'dzum 'od 'byung dang //dmA pa'i gsung thos sku mi mthong //
390a7(rgyud): lha mo glu dbyangs sgrogs pa dang //gzhal yas dag la sgra 'byung dang //grogs po dam pa zhes 'byung zhing //de nyid 'gro bar byed pa'o//rig 'dzin dam pa'i ltas shar na//
390b1(rgyud): byin rlabs mtha'i cho 'phrul yang //nyi zla zhon nas 'gro ba dang //ri rab rgan nas gsor ba dang //'jig rten rgyang mar 'phang ba dang //bsreg pa'i bskal pa gzhil ba las/
390b2(rgyud): sogs pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad kyang //khyad par rtsal gyis ston par nus//'dul ba'i 'gro ba thams cod la//so so skad du chos 'thun par//'dul ba'i sgo ni sna tshogs/
390b3(rgyud): gang la de ltar ston par nus//rnal 'byor rtsal gyi khyad par gyis//'jig rten khams kun g.yos nas kyang //thams cad ngo mtshar cher 'gyur te//dga' mgu rangs pa'i
390b4(rgyud): ro myong 'gyur//g.yeng ba'i yi ge phreng ba las//rdzu 'phrul chos kyi sgra bsgrogs pas//yid mthong rnam grangs chos rnams kun//sngags snang sngagasu ma gyur med//rnal 'byor
390b5(rgyud): tshe chung rim pa dag/rtsal gyi khyad par dag las byung //rim gyis 'jug dang gcig car pa//dbugs kyi yul dang tshor ba dang //thos dang mthong ba las sogs te//sems
390b6(rgyud): kyi yul dang na mkha'i dbyis/chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas par//rang bzhin yi ge bskur yi ge/yan lag yi ge so so yi//rtsa ba las sogs na na
390b7(rgyud): gcig bzlas//'phro 'dri'i tshad dang phyag rgya'i khyon//tshom bu'i grangs kyang de bzhino//'di ni dang po'i 'jug rims te//mthar byis 'dris shing goms byed pa'o//yi ge ye she
391a1(rgyud): las bskrun te//don byed pa'ang phyug rgyur 'byung //rgya mtsho gnon dang na mkha'i sgras//rlung 'ching ba dang rgyun bzlog pa//sreg pa'i bskul ba gzhil pa dang //
391a2(rgyud): nyi zla zhon nas 'jig rten 'phang //sa la 'dzul dang ri rab 'degs//stong gsum yungs 'brur 'jug tshul dang //gzhig drang sbar ba las sogs te//bsam bya bsam gyis
391a3(rgyud): mi khyab pa//goms pas las su rung ba yi//rnal 'byor rtsal chen spong bar zad//bzlas pa mthar phyin grub pa dang //bcing ba yongs rdzogs pa dang //bsam pa las su
391a4(rgyud): rung ba dang //don mthong ba dang tshig grub pa//bya ba yongasu dag pa dag/don gcig yul la so sor snang //des na ting 'dzin khyad par yang //de nyid gcig la bsgom mod kyi//
391a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor rtsal gyi khyad par ni//bsam pa'i yul ni sna tshogs te//dang po sa la gnas pa yi//brtsal ba las ni rnal 'byor pa//'dun pa'i sems pa'i rnal 'byor
391a6(rgyud): las//sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam drug po//shes rab rtsal gyi 'phang drams pas//ting 'dzin rtsal yang chung ba ste//de nyid mthong bar mi 'gyur pas//rang gi
391a7(rgyud): mos pa gang dmigs na//de yi sa bon gang yin pa//kha dog dbyibs kyi phye nas ni//sna yi dbus la rgyu byas te//de ya yul du gyur tshad du//'od zer 'bar 'phro
391b1(rgyud): gsal ba las//'phro 'du gnas su bskyed par bya//rang gi chag chad dang sbyar ba'i//sku yi khyon yang de tsam mo//gnyis pa'i so la gnas pa yi//bkra' sdod las kyi rnal 'byor/
391b2(rgyud): pas//sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam bzhi po//ting 'dzin rtsal gyi khyad par gyis//sa bon rang bzhi yi ge la//'od zer 'bar ba bcas pa de//dri 'byung sgro ni chun chad du//'phro 'du
391b3(rgyud): gsal bar bskyed pa las//rang gi chag tshad gnyis bsgyur ba'o//sku'i khyon yang de tsa mo//gsum pa'i sa la gnas pa yi//rnal 'byor lung gi bka' bsgo las//sogs
391b4(rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor rnam gsum po//dmigs pa'i ting 'dzin 'di ltar 'dod//lha yi sa bon gang yin pa//rang bzhin yi ger bsgyur byas te//'od zer 'bar dang bcas pa
391b5(rgyud): yis//thos pa'i yul ni tshun chad du//'phro 'du gsal bar byas pa las//rang gi chag tshad bzhi 'gyur tsam//sku yi khyon yang de tsam mo//de bzhin rnal 'byor rim
391b6(rgyud): pa bzhin//lha yi khyad par gang yin pa//yi ge'i rim pa bzhin sbyar nas//'phro 'du tshad kyang de bzhin te//rim pa ji bzhin sbyar nas kyang //'phro 'du gsol bar
391b7(rgyud): gyur pa dang //sems kyi yul ni ji tsam du//sku yi khyon gyi khyad par yang //chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pas//sku yi khyon gyis gang ba'o//ji ltar gser sbyangs
392a1(rgyud): /'tshor ba bzhin//sems nyid sbyangs pas de nyid gsal//'phro 'du sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin 'di//rim gyis sbyong la gcig car drod//lang ka'i bdug pa
392a2(rgyud): 'di lta ste//chos rgyun chen po 'di 'dzin 'dri//sems dpa' rdo rje dam pas bshad//'od kun 'phro 'du'i rgyun zhes bya//na mkha' don gyi glegs bam la//sna tshogs
392a3(rgyud): rig pa'i yi ge bris//'byung chen bzhi yi sgra bsgrags pas//theg chen gsang sngags rgyun mi 'chad//chos so cog gi rang bzhin ni//de bzhin nyid las mi g.yos
392a4(rgyud): pas//thams cad bdud rtsir rgyun mi 'chud//'khor ba rgya mtsho yo byad rnams//mchod pa rgya mtsho'i rang bzhin te//srid pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun//kun bzangs mchod/
392a5(rgyud): sbyin rgyun mi 'chod//kun gyi de bzhin nyid dbyings las//sems can sangs rgyas snying por shar//'gro gang bsam gyis mi khyab pa//rang 'byung sangs rgyas rgyun mi/
392a6(rgyud): 'chang //dngos po brtan g.yo las sogs pa'o//sgra skad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i//kun kyang gsang sngags gsang ba'i tshig/bzlas pa rgya mtsho rgyun mi 'tshod//de dang
392a7(rgyud): de yi dbyings nyid la//gang dang gang gi thabs sbyor ba//ye nas 'du 'bral med pas na//sbyor ba chen po rgyun mi 'chad//srad gsum bsgral ba'i zhing 'di dag/
392b1(rgyud): sdong ba'i mtshon cha'i rgyal po yis//dngos po med par bsad pasnga na//ye sgrol chen po rgyun mi 'chud//snang srid dag pa'i gzhal yAsu//kun gzhi dpal gyi maN Dal la//
392b2(rgyud): rnam shes thig chen srang bu brgyad//ye btab dkyil 'khor rgyun mi 'chad//'dod khams rmang gi ri rab la//gzugs khams bang rim khri 'phang brtan//gzugs med
392b3(rgyud): bum rten bum par bcas//gdung chen chos sku rgyun mi 'chad//nam mkha' me chu sa rlung rnams//rmang bzhi ri rab rten du snang //bang rim ri bdud bcas pa rnams//de nyid
392b4(rgyud): bing rim khri 'phang brtan//ri bo bum rten bum par bcas//'di yang gdung chen rgyun mi 'chad//'dzugs pa'i yan lag gzhi rmang rten//'khor lo tshigs chen khri 'phang brten
392b5(rgyud): yan lag dang po bum rten bcas//lcang lo cod pan phreng bas klubs//de bzhin nyid kyi sa gzhi la//ji bzhin pa yi gzhal yas khang //me nor ma bcos rmang chen brten//
392b6(rgyud): byang chub sems kyi rtseg chen gtams//ye shes lnga'i skar mthongs gsal//bsdu ba tshad med rnam thar sgo//dran pa yang dag them skad brgyad//rdzu 'phrul rta babs ngag
392b7(rgyud): gos brgyan//mi 'jigs rig pa'i gdung chen la//yang dag brgyad kyi ka bas mdzes//rang 'byung ye shes dbu rtse 'phags//don gnyis 'khyams kyis nges par mdzes
393a1(rgyud): yo shas thugs rje yon tan las//byin rngubs can gyis mdzes par bad+d+hAn//chos nyid rlabs kyi rna ri bres//sap+ta s+thAnA sgra b+h+yo kus theg chen sngags//
393a2(rgyud): ji bzhin chos kyi pho brang 'dir//rgyal ba bzhugs pa 'di ltar rim//kun bzangs sems kyi chos nyid las//kun gzhi ma 'dres yongs rdzogs chos//sems dpa'
393a3(rgyud): yud kyis nges thob pas//bstan pa rgya mtsho rgyun mi 'chad//rdo rje na mkha'i skas bskyod nas//na mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//snang srid mtha' thug med la lta///
393a4(rgyud): des ni dri yul yangs par 'gyur//rgya mtsho rdo rjes gtams byas te//de la gnas pa'i sems can la//rdo rje sems dpa' brtan byas te//thams cad dam pa'i rdo rjer
393a5(rgyud): bya nAM kha'i dbyings kyi ling kA la//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gonas par//myur mgyogs chu zla'i 'phen shugs kyis//zhing khams kun tu bgrod par bya//nA mkha'
393a6(rgyud): dbyings kyi ling ka la//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//shin tu nges par gyur pa dang //mun pa'i gnas rnams thams cad gsal//rnal 'byor sngags
393a7(rgyud): mdzub rtse mo la//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od gsal 'bar//shin tu brtan par red pa dang //chu des sreg pa'i bskal gzhi la//rnal 'byor lag gi dkyil 'khor du/
393b1(rgyud): /sto gsu ma 'jig rten khor yug bcas//na mkha'i dbyings 'phangs nas no//sanas sar nI sbyar bar bya//rnal 'byor sdig pa'i 'dzub ma la//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gas /
393b2(rgyud): laMs/zer las nyi ma 'bum 'phros pas//phyi nang mon pa thams cad gsal//rnal 'byor lag gri dkyil 'khor lngas//chu za'i dkyil 'khor rab gsal bas//bdud
393b3(rgyud): chu bo'i rgyun byung bas//sreg pa'i dmyal ba'i mi chen po sad//gzhan yang lang ka'i bdag po ting 'dzin gyis mngon 'di kho nar 'dus par gsungs pas/'di kho na ltar shes
393b4(rgyud): baiper bya'o//sems ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te//ji ltar brtags pa de ltar snang //de ma thag par ma gyur kyang //de nyid gang rtags de ltar snang //gdos bcas yul ni mi snang
393b5(rgyud): yang //yid gzugs mngon shes kun mkhyen snang //gang brtags de ltar de ltas nas//mngon gsum glas pa byor rid par 'gyur//yod med legs nyes rang bzhin
393b6(rgyud): rnams//chu khams rtas pa lta bur zad//bams cing 'di yis byed par 'gyur//des na ting 'dzin sems nyid gtso//dper na rgya mtsho nor len mi//sbrul dang chu srin
393b7(rgyud): snying ma las//sogs pa gdug pa'i sdug bsngal kun//dka' bas nyam su blangs pas 'grub//de bzhin rnal 'byor rnal tshol ba//rnam rtog bying rmugs 'phyar g.yeng dag/
394a1(rgyud): grazhom par dka' ba'i lngas 'di dag/nyams blangs na bde thob rnyed//'di ni ting 'dzin dam pa yi//nyamasu blang ba'i bslab pa ste//sems nyid
394a2(rgyud): goms par bya ba las//'dris par byed pa rab tu gces//grogs po dag de dag ni nyams rnyed pa nyid du shes par bya'o//de skad ces smras pas/dman pa dam pa rnams
394a3(rgyud): gang gi dgongs pa dam pa'i nyam drod rnyed par gyur to//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rnal 'byor dbang bsgyur gyi le'u ste/bdun cu gsum
394a4(rgyud): ba'o////de nas yang gasdang ba pa'i bdag po des dman pa'i lus kyis sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces smraso//grogs po dag gang 'di la tshogs
394a5(rgyud): chung bar bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ci la yang bya ba med pa nyid do//gang la bya ba med pa de gang zhe na/'di lta ste/de bzhin nyid do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'dri lta ste/
394a6(rgyud): sngags kyis yongasu zin pa'i nad//gang la'ang gnod pa'i byed mi nus//de bzhin nyid kyis zin pa yi//dus gsum dug lngas gnod mi 'gyur//de bzhin nyid kyis
394a7(rgyud): ma zin na//lam gyi phyogs rnams kun spyad kyang //bde 'gro tsam du des 'byung gi/go 'phang dam par ga la 'gyur//de bzhin nyid kyis kun nas par//gang shes
394b1(rgyud): nyon mongs rnam par grol//gang de zin par ma shes na//dam pa'i la mu rnams grol mi 'gyur//rnal 'byor de nyid blo ldan pas//nyon mongs zin pas gang spyad kyang //rnam bral
394b2(rgyud): rang 'byung mya ngan 'das//tshigs med byin mnga' dron po che//gang 'di blo dang mi ldan pas//blo ldan tshul du gang byed pa//dam par grol bar mi 'gyur gyi//'ching 'thar ram
394b3(rgyud): 'khor ba'i dngos//thams cad stong par shes pa yi//blo can mya ngan 'das pa ste//bya ba'i las la sha thang ba'i//tshegs chen dka' ba las dang bral//dam pa'i blo gros
394b4(rgyud): thabs med de//skyes bu dam pa rnams dang ni//'dul ba'i dbang gis dman pa'i lus//sten par byed pa'ang ltung bar 'gyur//dam pa'i blo gos thabs yod na//'khor ba
394b5(rgyud): dman pa'i dngos po yang //skyes bu dam par grol 'gyur te//grol ba rang 'byung gzhan las min//grol dang ma grol las sogs pa//gnyi su rtog pa thams cad
394b6(rgyud): mtha'//kun mkhyen rnams ni dbus la'ang min//de ni grol med grol ba'o//'di ni gsang ba dam pa ste//ma rtogs blo chung kun la gsang //skyon yod nyes pa ma yin te/
394b7(rgyud): blo chung rnams la phan phyir ro//de phyir blo gros thabs ldan la//rtsol sgrub yo byad gtsor ma gsungs//gal te byas na'ang 'gog pa med//ma byas na yang de ltar nges/
395a1(rgyud): de ltar zlogs thabs ldan na//mtshams med lnga yi sems can kun//byang chub snying rje mtshan gyis bsad//dpag me dkor 'gyur mya bsad na//
395a2(rgyud): kun gyi don du gnyer ba ni//gang gi sems nyid dbyings nyid kyi//gang gis bskul pa dpag mod du//snying gsum dkrugs pas de rig min//'dir ni blo gros thabs
395a3(rgyud): ldan pas//bya med kyi 'angar rang rig pas//don rgyun rnal 'byor ny+dzal me btsun//mye brtul lhun gyis grub pa yin//ji ltar mun pa drug dang rdzas//spyan sna
395a4(rgyud): gser du gyur pa na//'gyur rtsi man ngag med pa'i mis//dka' ba'i las chen sna tshogs pa//sdug bsngal spyad kyang mi 'grub ste//su zhig man ngag ldan pa'i mes/
395a5(rgyud): tshogs med kyi 'di'i tshul gyis ni//bsgyur bas sman snang gser 'gyur ltar//rnal 'byor chen po don 'grub pa//de nyid blo gros thabs ngag dang //gang dang mi ldan
395a6(rgyud): pa dag bris//dka' ba spyad kyang 'grub min te//sems kyi gsang 'di sus mthong ba//blo gros thabs dang ldan pa ste//'dod pa'i don mchog gang yin pa//de dag
395a7(rgyud): tshegs med kyi 'das 'grub//don rnams grub par gang byed pa//blo grom thabs kyis grub pa'i phyir//don rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba yi//bslab pa 'di dag rab tu
395b1(rgyud): gcas//grogs po dag de dag ni tshogs//chung la don che ba nyid du zhes bya'o//de skad ces smras pas/dman pa dam pa rnams blo dang ldan gros kyis tshod nga thabs kyis zin par
395b2(rgyud): gyur to//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las don nges par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/bdun cu bzhi pa'o///de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag
395b3(rgyud): bo des/lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams la shin tu rngam brjid tshul du bos te smras pa//kye grogs po dag mdo gcig tu bsdus pa ni gang zhe na
395b4(rgyud): 'di lta ste/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyur par
395b5(rgyud): 'dus nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa gcig tu 'dus par bshad pa//chos nyid rnam par dag pas na//chos kun rang bzhin rnam par dag/de bzhin
395b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi//thugs dam dbyig mchog rab nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pa las de skad ces 'byung ba'o//de ltar na yang 'di lta ste/mi phyed
395b7(rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig no//rdo rje de bzhin nyid las byung //chos nyid rdo rje dam tshig ni//grub na 'jig pa'o dus medo//grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid
396a1(rgyud): las de skad ces gsungs//grogs po dag yang 'di lta ste/rgyul ba kun gyi thugs dam ni//thams cad dam pa de nyid las//mi gzhan gzhan
396a2(rgyud): med yod ma yin//de las gang yang 'da' mi 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das rdzogs longs spyod pa ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungaso//yang grogs po dag 'di lta ste//
396a3(rgyud): dam pa rnams kyis gsungs po'i tshig/rdo rje go chad ma bcas pa//shin tu dam pa'i tha tshig 'di//gal+yA ta 'das na tshig par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i
396a4(rgyud): sku ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungaso//yang grogs po dag 'di lta ste/rgyal ba rnams kyi dam pa 'di//gsungs pas dam tshig mtha' yas kun//thams cad
396a5(rgyud): thams cad bsrungs pa ste//bsrung ba 'di ni rnyed par dka'o//bcom ldan 'das rgyun gyi 'byung ba ngo bo nyid dag pas/de skad ces gsung so//kye grogs po dag 'di
396a6(rgyud): lta ste/zhe sdang ngo bo tha dad pa//byang chub sems mnyam pas na//de bzhin nyin lces gzhan pa yin//ma spangs ma dag rdo rje dam//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
396a7(rgyud): dpa'i ngo bo nyid dag pas/de skad ces gsung so//grogs po dag 'di lta ste/'dod dang chags pa'i yul nyid ni//rang bzhin gang yin de bzhin nyid//longs spyod
396b1(rgyud): myong tshor rnam par dag/spyod la mchags rdo rje dam//bcom ldan 'das 'od mtha' yas ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsung so//yang 'di lta ste/thams cad de bzhin der mtshungs
396b2(rgyud): pas//khyad par bye brag dbyer med pa'i//rdo rje na mkha' 'od gsal bas//rmongs pa'i mun nag rnam dag gsal//bcom ldan 'das snang mdzad ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad
396b3(rgyud): ces gsungaso//yang 'di lta ste/rnam dag thug mtha' mu med pas//yangs dog tshig gi mtha' dang bral//kun bzang yangs pa'i lam du gcig/bde chen klong yang rdo rje
396b4(rgyud): dam//bcom ldan 'das thams cad grub pas de skad ces gsung so//yang 'di lta ste/de bzhin nyid las med pas na//yin dang ma yin gnyis las 'das//bdag/
396b5(rgyud): med rdo rje de bzhin nyid//du med mi 'gyur rdo rje dam//bcom lngar 'das yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungaso//grogs po dag gzhan
396b6(rgyud): yang 'di lta ste/yod mthong snang grags chos so cog/tha dad sna tshogs mtha' yas kyang //rang bzhin ma bcos de bzhin nyid//ma bsgribs 'od gsal rnam dag zhing //
396b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dri med sgra ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsung so//de bzhin du 'di lta ste/kun tu bzang ba'i ye shes 'di//sus kyang ma byas rang 'byung ste//thams
397a1(rgyud): cad 'byung ba'i rtsa bAs na/rang las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs//bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog sprin ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad ces gsungs//
397a2(rgyud): gzhan yang dgongs pa rnam par pashad pa ni 'di lta ste/ye nus ma bcos ji bzhin pa//chos so cag gi snying po ste//med pa las byung sna tshogs snang //snang med do
397a3(rgyud): bzhin dkyil 'khor rdzogs//bcom ldan 'das bkod pa'i 'byung gnas ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so//gzhan yid 'di lta ste
397a4(rgyud): rang 'byung rig pa'i sems nyid kyis//ma bcos chos nyid dbyings kyi don//lhun grub thabs dang shes rab lhas/yang dag rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gsal/
397a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das seng ge sgra ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsung so//gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa'i rtog ngo bo dag pas gsungs pa/'jig rten 'jig
397a6(rgyud): rten 'das pa yi//bde dang mi bde rnam pa kun//de bzhin nyid du ro gcig pas//tshor ba bde sdug gang yang med ces gsung so//gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das me
397a7(rgyud): pa'i rgyan ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/de bzhin nyid du don bstan du//de bzhin nyid du kun gcig pas//gang gis gang la gang zhig bstan//nyid la nyid gleng kho nar zad ces
397b1(rgyud): gsungs so//gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid la//dus gsum dus bzhir mi rigs te//ye shes rig pa'i khyad
397b2(rgyud): par las//skad cig bskal pa de skad cig ces gsungaso//gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das snying rje'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/'khor ba mya ngan 'das rtog pa//de
397b3(rgyud): bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid du//ye nas mya ngan 'das pas na//rang bzhin lhun grub tshogs gnyis rdzogs zhes gsungaso//yang bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du//
397b4(rgyud): chos so cog gi rang bzhin ni//ma skyes pa la thams cad skye//skyes pa nyid na skye ba med//rigs mchog rdo rje skye gnas dam zhes gsungaso//yang bcom ldan 'das yongasu
397b5(rgyud): dgongs pa'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pos 'di skad du/de bzhin nyid du kun rig no//des khyab gar gnas sangs rgyas zhing //yon tan rin chen sprin bkod pa//dgod par bya ba
397b6(rgyud): ci yang med ces gsung so//yang bcom ldan 'das gser gyi 'od zer ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/dpag tu med pa'i rgyal ba rnams/ji bzhin de bzhin nyid la bzhugs//
397b7(rgyud): de bzhin nyid dang thams cad kyang //gnyid med de bzhin nyid do zhes gsung so//yang bcom ldan 'das 'od kyi dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/'khor ba dang ni mya ngan las
398a1(rgyud): so sor snang ba ma yin te//ji bzhin de bzhin nyid nges na//ngo la 'khor ba'i rang bzhin mod ces gsungaso//yang bcom ldan 'das zhi ba'i dbang ba rma/
398a2(rgyud): nyid dag pas 'di bzhin du/de bzhin nyid kyi de nyid ni//dpag cing gzhal bar mtha' yas pas//dpag med rgyal po'i pho brang yin//de nas kun bkod der gcig nas
398a3(rgyud): zhes gsung ste//yang bcom ldan 'das sbyin gyi dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/thams cad 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul yang //tIr yang 'gyur ba'i ye shes te//gdos
398a4(rgyud): par gyur pa'i chos med pas//de ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'byung zhes gsungs so//yang bcom ldan 'das yid 'ong dbyangs ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/'jig rten
398a5(rgyud): 'khor ba'i kha brgyad pas//ma rig ngo bo de bzhin pa//gzhi rtsa med pa'i skad cig ma//de nyid rig ni bde chen gnas zhes gsung so//yang bcom ldan 'das me long 'ong
398a6(rgyud): snang ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/nyon mongs ye shes lngar rtogs pa//ji bzhin de la gnyis ka bsgrig/rtog dang mi rtog gnyis med de//rtog pa de nyid yang drag lam
398a7(rgyud): zhes gsung mo//yang bcom ldan 'das zla 'od dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/theg pa dpag med bstan pa yang //ji ltar mos pa tha dad pa//khrid pa bya ba'i thab su
398b1(rgyud): thog pa na sa gsag/yang bcom ldan 'das ma'i stong po das bad dag pas 'di skad du/kAngs drim pong ma ga/ kyang pa du
398b2(rgyud): da//srung dang snying kI de bzhin du//mngal spya lus kyi mings kyis sgrib ces gsung sa//yang bcom ldan 'das sas/ bad nyid /pas 'di skad du/
398b3(rgyud): sgyur byabs kyi ye shes kyis//sgyu ma'i chus la dbang thob pas//mun la snang 'dzu d+hi d+hi nan du//thams cad dbye ltar rang rig yon zhes gsung so//yang ba m+bi ldan 'dus
398b4(rgyud): sbyin su bya'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/rnam dag ye shes snga ma dang //oM/d+h+r-ig/mtshan ma'i sgyu ma gnyis//rang bzhin de nyid dag bsnu na//gnyi su shes pa nyid
398b5(rgyud): tshigs rdzog pa zhes gsang so//yang bcom waMni 'das drin rdzun rgyal pa ba nyid dgu pas 'di skad du/bcom ldan 'das chos 'di rnams//de bzhin nyid du gi c-ig pas na//
398b6(rgyud): ni shes pa/kun la dang gyu the bye yin nas gsung //yad bamam ldana'i 'od bar dang le de ba nyid dag pa'i 'drind du/sa sa rnams
398b7(rgyud): //shes nas de la ga gnas pa/rang ga nyid la dbang zing ba'o//de bzhin dag pa 'dzin pa nyid ces gsung //yang tsacom ldan 'das da/'bru'i rgyal ba
399a1(rgyud): nyid dag pas 'di skad du/de nyid ji bzhin mngon gyur na//mod la mi zad 'byung ba yi//che bya'i yon tan rgyan mi 'chad//tsirar+ya snang kun 'byung rin chen
399a2(rgyud): gter zhes gsung so//yang bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor snying po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ji bzhin ma bcos de nyid la//de bzhin pa yi blo gnas pa//de bzhin
399a3(rgyud): de nyid ma yin pa'i//sgrub pa dang bsgrub pa ga la yod ces gsungaso//yang bcom ldan 'das nges par gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid dag pa 'di skad du/mkha' la glo bur
399a4(rgyud): sprin 'thibs ltar//de bzhin glo bur stog pas bsgribs//mkha' dag nang du sbyin sangs ltar//rnam rtog sangs pas ngang gis sangs shes gsungs so//yang bcom ldan
399a5(rgyud): 'das nges par gsungs pa'i ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ji snyed dag pa'i gsung brjod kyang //rdo rje gsung la spros pa med//spros med gsung nyid kun gsal khyab/
399a6(rgyud): ma gsungs pa nyid rgya cher bshad//ces gsungaso//yang bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/thams cad yul la 'jug pa yi//thogs med ma chags de
399a7(rgyud): bzhin blos//ji snyed ji bzhin nyid du bsgyur//zad med gter ldan rin chen 'byung zhes gsungaso//yang bcom ldan 'das me tog dbang po dbyangs ngo bo nyid dag pas
399b1(rgyud): 'di skad du/ji bzhin nyid la bzhugs pas na//'di zhes chag tu mo gsungs kyang //khyab pas gcig pa'i byin rlabs kyang //ji ltar 'dod pa so sor mjal zhes gsungs//yang
399b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das grags pa'i dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/sangs rgyas sems can lnga sogs pa//thams cad mra lus lus pa med//rang rig ma rig rtog pa nyid//
399b3(rgyud): kun kyang rang byung ye shes nyid ces gsungs//yang bcom ldan 'das sprul pa'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/yi ge phyag rgya ye shes kyang //tshig las 'byung ba'i
399b4(rgyud): gzhi yin te//de nyid dag pas thams cad dag/gsung la gsung nyid mi ga nas pa'o zhes gsung so//yang bcom ldan 'das sgra dbyangs ma zad pa nyid dag pas 'di skad du/de bzhin
399b5(rgyud): nyid kyang rang bzhin du//lnga phung nyon mongs rnam par dag/rnam rtog rdul bral skye 'gag med//thams cad ngo bo nyid du bcom zhes gsungs//yang bcom ldan 'das sman gyi
399b6(rgyud): rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du//dpag med 'jig rten rdul rnyed na//'gro ba rdul phran bras ma yas la//khyad par de bzhin nyid snang bas//til 'bru mar gyis khyab
399b7(rgyud): ltar gnas shes gsungaso//yi bcom ldan 'das gser gyi 'od 'bring ba nyid dag pas 'di skad du/rdul phran gcig tsam gang zag la//dgongs te mdun du gsung
400a1(rgyud): brjod pa//dpag med mtha' yas rdul skyed tsam//de snyed kun du thos par grol zhes gsungaso//yang bcom ldan 'das bkod pa'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid
400a2(rgyud): dag pas 'di skad du/gsung gcig mi zad mtha' yas gsung //mtha' dang dbus med kun tu khyab//khyab dang khyab med rdo rje gsung //sna tshogs dngos med de bzhin nyid
400a3(rgyud): ces gsungaso//yang bcom ldan 'das gser gyi gsu ba ngo bo nyid drug pas 'di skad du/glang yang ma bcos de nyid la//phyogs dang lha phyi dus med de//thams cad de bzhin
400a4(rgyud): nyid kyi dbyings//de nyid rang rig rang nyid de zhes gsungaso//yang bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/de nyid de snyed rang bzhin de//de snyed de
400a5(rgyud): nyid yin pa la//byas pa rnams kyis gnyisu bzung //de la gnyisu dbyer byar med ces gsung so//yang bcom ldan 'das snang ba brtsegs pa'i dpal ngo bo nyid dag
400a6(rgyud): pas 'di skad du/stong nyid na mkha'i rang bzhin du//mi mthun pa dang gnyen pa gnyis//ye nas dbyer med gcig pas ni//gnod pas 'jigs pa ga la
400a7(rgyud): yod ces gsungs so//yang bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pa'i dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/mi 'gyur na mkha'i rang bzhin te//dag pa dag la dag pa
400b1(rgyud): nyid//rtog pa dag la rtog par snang //cis 'dul drir snang ci yang med ces gsung phye//yang bcom ldan 'das dpa' mchog dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/rang
400b2(rgyud): bzhin rang gisnga ma bcas pa//yong gi 'od gsal de bzhin nyid//kun gyi snying po de nyid pas//cis kyang ma bsgribs na mkha' che zhes gsung so//yang bcom ldan
400b3(rgyud): 'das gzi brjid dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ji bzhin pa nyid sa mchog te//de rig ye shes bla ma yis//ye nas de bzhin nyid la gnas//da gdod bgrod du
400b4(rgyud): ga la yod ces gsungaso//yang bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kun gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/stong pa nyid kyi snying po la//sna tshogs snang
400b5(rgyud): ba'i 'khor gyis bskor//sus kyang ma byas rang 'byung ba//ji bzhin pa yi dkyil 'khor nyid ces gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//yang bcom ldan 'das ngan srong thams
400b6(rgyud): cad sbyong ba'i ngo bo nyid dag pa gsang ba so 'di skad du/zad med ye shes dngos grub ni//de bzhin nyid du dngos grub pas//zad pa med cing 'phel ba med//du
400b7(rgyud): gdod bsgrub tu ga la yod ces gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//yang bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten kun gyi ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/chos kun rang bzhin med pa nyin//
401a1(rgyud): mya ngan 'das zhes dral bya//stong nyid rang bzhin rnam dag la//de nyid mi gnas byang chub sems//zhes gsang bya'i tshig tu'o//yang bcom ldan//
401a2(rgyud): 'das rnam par rgyal po nyid dag pas 'di skad du/rnam rtog chu ba'i rku mgo ste//stong nyid zhing du mo bsgyur na//'khor ba'i rgya mtsho g.yeng 'gyur ba//de mi shes
401a3(rgyud): la de ltar snang zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//yang bcom ldan 'das me tog bkod pa'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ji bzhin pa yi de bzhin nyid//
401a4(rgyud): thams cad 'byung ba'i ma yin pas//kun bzang shes rab pha rol phyin//sems can sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//yang bcom ldan 'das
401a5(rgyud): thams cad snang ba ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/stug po bkod pa'i sangs rgyas dang //sems can rnam pa thams cad dag/dngos po brtan g.yo la sogs pa//de nyid
401a6(rgyud): lngas byung dngos med sku zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//yang bcom ldan 'das yid dang ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/rang 'byung ye shes rtsa ba ni//byang chub sems nyid
401a7(rgyud): yin pas na//de yi rtse snying rje ste//pha rol phyin par thabs kyis zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//yang bcom ldan 'das seng ge 'bum gzugs ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad
401b1(rgyud): du//da rje bzhin da kyi na//yi ge ming rdzogs sgra mtshon pa//ming rdzogs sgyu sam+b+ha brten bAr//nyam drod bu yis rig pa ces gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//yang ba ma ldan
401b2(rgyud): 'das thub pa'i dbang po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/chos kun chos kyi rang bzhin ni//de bzhin nyid las mi gzhan pas//de nyid byang chub lam nyid des//yAm de lkug
401b3(rgyud): bkod pa'i gnas//zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//kye grogs po dag gzhan yang de dag la sogs pa/rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa'i sgron ma bye ba sa ya rnyid ngo bo nyid dag pa dang /
401b4(rgyud): chos kyi pho brang na bzugs pa mtha' thug pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid dag pas/gsang ba'i tshig 'di skad du/la la ni 'di ltar/rtog mod rang rig skad cig ma//sems can
401b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas gnyis kyi dbyings//rig dang ma rig gnyis kho na//dgra dang ma dag gnyi su snang zhes//gsang ba dam par bsngag so//la la ni 'di skad du/de nyid smra brjod me
401b6(rgyud): pa las//de mtshan phyir na tha dad brjod//gang brjod pa nyid de bzhin nyid//de nyid spros med rdo rje don//zhes gsang ba dam par bsngags//le la ni 'di skad du/de nyid
401b7(rgyud): mazungs// rkyen ma cig sring mig//des nyin nying byung ba 'ad//nga nyid ni byung ba 'id ces gamang bdas par 'jugs/la men du
402a1(rgyud): ji bzhin pa yi de kho na//sangs rgyas kyis kyang byar med na//gang gis bcos te su yis byas//byas pa po zhig ga la yod//ces gsang ba dam par
402a2(rgyud): bsngagaso//la la ni 'di skad du/ye shes can gyi spyod yul ni//de bzhin de nyid yin pas na//do khyab gang gis chos rnams kun//rang bzhin dag pas bsgribs pa
402a3(rgyud): med//ces gsang ba dam par bsngagaso//la la ni 'di skad du/de nyid mtshan nyid med pa lngas//mtshan nyid sna tshogs par snang bas//kun 'byung dbyings kyi rang
402a4(rgyud): bzhin pas//med la zad mi shes par mdzod ces gsang ba dam par bsngagaso//la la ni 'di skad du/sna tshogs theg pa'i lta ba dang //sdom pa srung ba'i bya ba kun///
402a5(rgyud): spyad par bya ba ma yin yang //kun kyang ma 'dres yongasu rdzogs zhes gsang ba dam par bsngags so//la la ni 'di skad du de la phyogs dang dus med par//gang gis
402a6(rgyud): phyogs dang dus brtags pa'i//de nyid de la rnam par snang //sangs rgyas kyi ni de mi mkhyen//zhes gsang ba dam par bsngagaso//la la ni 'di skad du/bsam
402a7(rgyud): gyis mi khyab kun shes nas//bsam du med par de bzhag na//dpag tu med pa'i yon tan 'byung //rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin//zhes gsang ba dam
402b1(rgyud): par bsngag so//la la ni 'di skad du/bsam gyis mi khyab mi shes par//bsam med drang du gang 'jog pa//byis pa de ni blun pa ste//mun pa'i skye mched nyid du 'gyur//zhes kun
402b2(rgyud): nas brtse ba dam par bsngags so//la la ni 'di skad du/bsam med bsam gyis me khyab chos//lhag por mthong nas zhi gnas pa//rnam rtog spong len gang byed pa/de dag sgrib
402b3(rgyud): pA mu mtha' yas zhes pa shes gnyen dam pa nyid du gdam so//la la ni 'di skad du/sna tshogs so so kun rig kyang //kun grol rnam dag lam med na//dam pa nyid las
402b4(rgyud): shin tu gol//nam yang nges pa rnyed pa min zhes bka' dam pa gdam so//la la ni 'di skad du/sna tshogs rim gyis 'jug pa dang /bsam spyod blo yi nang du 'gyur//bsam
402b5(rgyud): med yongs su rdzogs pa'i don//rim gyis pa yi dug chen yin//zhes khyad par dam par gdam sa//la la ni 'di skad du/sna tshogs so sor ma rig par//de bzhin nyid du
402b6(rgyud): nges ma rnyed//de nyid nges pa ma rnyed na//sna tshogs smra ba rung ma yin//zhes nan tan dam par gdam so//la la ni 'di skad du/mkha' la 'ja' snang ji bzhin du//bsam yas
402b7(rgyud): bsam snang de bzhin no//gcig tu nges pa med pa'i gsung //ji ltar 'byung ba de ltar yin//zhes dpag dka' ba dam par gsung so//la li ni 'di skad du/kun gyi rtsa ba
403a1(rgyud): //'dir ba shadra pas//'di don gang rnyibla zos pa'i mchog/rnams cad 'di las 'byung byas na//'di shes kun shes shes rab mchog ces shes
403a2(rgyud): mchog dam par bsngag so//la la ni 'di skad du/gsang bya'i nang na gsang chen 'di//nyid kyis nyid kyang mi mthong bar//gzhan gyis mthong bar glu la 'gyur//de nyid dam
403a3(rgyud): pa rnams kyis bsngags//zhes gsang ba dam par bsngag so//la la ni 'di skad du/chos rnams kun gyis snying po 'di//gser dang mkha' bzhin mi 'gyur bas//mi nub
403a4(rgyud): stor bral med pa'i phyir //chos kyi dam pa don po mchog/ces dam pa chen po bsngagasaso//la la ni 'di skad du/thog ma med nas bsngags pa yi//rnam rtog sbyin phung
403a5(rgyud): dpag med pa//stong nyid gcig car rig pa yis//de bzhin nyid du rnam par sgrol//zhes gsang ba dam par bsngag so//la la ni 'di skad du/ji snyed bsam gyis mi
403a6(rgyud): khyab pa'i//chos kun stong par rig des na//sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba//rnal 'byor chen po'i bsam gtan yin//zhes rnal 'byor dam par gangam so//
403a7(rgyud): la la ni 'di skad du/'khor ba ji srid yod par du//bstan pa'i snying po nyi ma sha ri//rang bzhin chos nyid 'khor lo 'di//mi nub rgyun mi 'chad par bskor zhes
403b1(rgyud): gsung ba dam pa 'phog par bsngags//la lA ni 'di skad du/mi 'gyur mi 'jigs rdo rje don//sna rdzogs kun 'byung rin pa che//ma chags rnam dag pad+mo nyid//thams cad ldan
403b2(rgyud): grub mdzad pa che//ma nor ma bcos de bzhin nyid/ces yang nges pa dam pa bstan to//la li ni 'di skad du/stong nyid gzugs med chos kyi skye//sman med yang las 'dis
403b3(rgyud): pa'i gsung //mtshan med rtog las 'dus pa'i thugs//rtog med re skod yon tan mdzad//thabs kyis gar thabs phrin las mdzad//ces che 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung
403b4(rgyud): bar bsngags//lnga la ni 'di skad du/mi rtog chos kyi me long gsal//gnyi su med pas thams cad mnyam//sna tshogs mtshan nyid ma 'dres mkhyen//nan tan chen po khyab
403b5(rgyud): grub mdzod//ye nyid kun gyi rang bzhin mkhyen//zhes ye shes rgyun du 'char bar bsngag so//la la ni 'di skad du/snang stong go 'byed kun khyab mkha'//thag dbyings la
403b6(rgyud): ni kun gnas sa//zhi gnas rnam dag chu chen po//lhag mthong ye shes 'od 'bar me//shes bya thogs med 'thor ba'i rlung //zhes thams cad 'byung bar bsdogs//
403b7(rgyud): la la ni 'di skad du/ma 'dres yongs rdzogs gsal sdang gzugs//khyab gsal rang bzhin 'gro ba'i sgra//dang bas sim byed chos kyi bri//don bcu nyam su myong ba'i ro//
404a1(rgyud): bde mchog don la reg pa nyid ces yan tan dam par bsngagaso//la la ni 'di skad du/ci yang mi sems gti mug la//dngos po kun bcom zha
404a2(rgyud): sdang nyid//ye 'byam nga rgyal bdag nyid cha//bde chen rang bzhin rjes chags pa//gang du ma 'gyur gzhan phrag dog/ces blang dor med par bsngag so//la la ni 'di skad du
404a3(rgyud): kun gyi rang bzhin gcig shes pas//de nyid dbang du thams cad 'dus//kun la dbang sgyur thos pas na//yi dbang chen po rdzogs pa'o zhes dbang dam par bsngag so//la la ni
404a4(rgyud): 'di skad du/thams cad kur 'dus rig pa'i med//kun la khyab gnas brtag dka' ba//zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul yin//rdo rje kun bkod rnal 'byor lung zhes bka'
404a5(rgyud): dam par bsngag so//la la ni 'di skad du/de nyid dang ni kun gcig pas//bdag dang gzhan du snang ba med//stong nyid rnam dag na mkha' la//gtsang slar dbye ba rdul yang
404a6(rgyud): med//ces bdud rtsi dam par bsngagaso//la la ni 'di skad du/byang chub snying pa dam pa la//rnam rtog rdul gyis ga la 'gro//de nyid chen por 'bru chung bso//cis kyang
404a7(rgyud): mi bskyod nyam ming zhes ri dogs med par bsngagaso//la la ni 'di skad du/rnam rtog mtshan ma'i ri bo 'di//seng ge'i khog pa rang zhig ltar//stong nyid rang nyid ma zhig
404b1(rgyud): na//gzhan gyis 'dzag par gal 'gyur//zhes rang bzhin dam par bsngags//la lani 'di skad du/bad chen rnam dag rtog byung bas//legs nye sA gan+d+ha ka rnam par rtog
404b2(rgyud): bdergyan nges pa'i rlung zhugs na//gang 'dir rnam par rtog pa med//ces yongasu rtog pa las 'dres par bsngags//la la ni 'di skad du/de nyid phyin ci ma log par//bsrung
404b3(rgyud): bya mi rtog mi gnas pa//le lo g.yeng ba'i dgra bsrung ste//de bzhin de las 'da' mi bya zhes tshigs dam par bsngagaso//la la ni 'di skad du/dpag tu med pa'i 'jig
404b4(rgyud): rten du/sgron ma bsam gyis mi khyab pas//ji snyed pa ye chos bstan pa//mtha' yas don ni gcig tu 'dus//zhes par bsngagaso//la lo ni 'di skad du/de nyid de las ma
404b5(rgyud): nyams na//dran bsam sgyu ma med pa yi//tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab nyid//bslab pa rnams gsum yongasu rdzogs shes bslab pa dam par bstsag so//la la ni 'di
404b6(rgyud): skad du/de nyid las mtha' zhi gnas dang //lhag pa'i don mthong 'dres pa yi//sde gsum nges par rdzogs pa na//'bum phrag mtha' yas brjod mi lang //zhes bkri drang
404b7(rgyud): /brgyad pa dam par bsngagaso//la la ni 'di skad du/tshig la dbang bas tshig bsgyur na//tshig mtha' yas pas bsdus na 'dus//tshig gcig rnam par spros gyur na//brjod pa
405a1(rgyud): de ni zad myi 'gyur//zhes gsung mi zad pa dam par bsdug s+ho//la la ni 'di skad du/sgra brjod tshig la gang dag pas//gang gis dgongs pa dpog mi num
405a2(rgyud): tshig tshogs rgya mtsha thos pa min//tshig gcig go tha thos pa'i mchog ces thos pa rgya mtsho'i dam par bsngagaso//la la ni 'di skad du/khyab dang mi gnas rnam mi rtag/

405a4(rgyud): don byed pa//dmus long dmu rgod rgyug pa 'dra//dbyings kyis dbyings la bris pa'i drin//gang rig 'don brjod 'di klog mchog/ces spyod pa dam par bsngags//la la ni
405a5(rgyud): 'di skad du/mtshan mar byas dang snang ba'i mchog/ma 'dres yongasu rdzogs pa yi//mkha' dang 'ja' ltar rnam rig pa//bsngo ba blo med byang chub nyid//ces bsngo/
405a6(rgyud): ba dam par bsngags//la la ni 'di skad du/chos gang sems kyi de nyid la//gnyis dang mtha' rwa gang lta ba//ma rig 'khrul pas phyin ci log/theg chen gsang
405a7(rgyud): sngags lam las log ces gdams ngag dam par gsungaso//la la ni 'di skad du/rgyu rkyen rten 'brel rim gyis pa//blo chung rmongs pos khrid pa'i thabs//ma
405b1(rgyud): bcos de bzhin nyid 'di la//rten 'brel rgyu 'bras rim gyis med//ces nges par dam par bsngagaso//la la ni 'di skad du/ma bcos de bzhin nyid 'di la//yid bzhin
405b2(rgyud): cir yang 'byung ba yi//cho 'phrul 'byung bas sems can rnams//ji ltar 'dul ba mthong thos snang //zhes thams cad rgyu med pa la bstug so//la la nI 'di skad du/
405b3(rgyud): zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba//ga srang bu'i dbyings na gnas pa yi//thams cad gsang ba'i snying po nyid//mthong bas 'gro don rgya mtshor rdzogs//shes thams cad
405b4(rgyud): lhun gyis grub par bsngag so//la la ni 'di skad du/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid//de mthong ngo bo nyid mi dmigs//dran ming bya dang byed med pa//gnas gsum
405b5(rgyud): menyam nyid rjesu dran//zhes ting nge 'dzin dam par bsngagaso//la la ni 'di skad du/gnas gsum dmigs pa'i 'du shes med//ming med tshig gi lam dang bral//

405b7(rgyud): cing zhan po'i mun pa gsum//de nyid tshul bzhin skad cig ma//kun gsal gcig gis yong du sangs//shes gsang ba dam par bsngag so//la la ni 'di skad
406a1(rgyud): du/mun pas 'thebs pa de dag gis//mi g.yo mi rtogs de nyid blta//de mthong mun pa rnam dag sangs//'gyod sangs kun gyi mchog tu

406a3(rgyud): gnyen po bstan du ci yang med ces la bcad pa dam par bsngag so//la la ni 'di skad du/thams cad rang bzhin ma bcos pa//ji bzhin pa yi de bzhin du/
406a4(rgyud): rang rig bla na med pa yi//byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa'o//zhes sems bskyed pa rnam par bsngagaso//la la ni 'di skad du/ci yang mi sems mi g.yo zhing //
406a5(rgyud): mi rtog rnam par mi g.yeng ba//kun la khyab par bdal ba'i dbyings//kun shong bya medo theg chen mchog ni sa theg pa chen po'i gsang ba dam par bsngagaso//la la ni 'di
406a6(rgyud): skad du/theg chen gsang ba'i snying po 'di//dbu mar mi dmigs mtha' las 'odas//gang 'dir dbu mar 'dod pa dag/mtha' las 'das par ga la 'gyur zhes dbus
406a7(rgyud): mthar mi dmigs par bsngagaso//la la ni 'di skad du/chos kun mi mthong chos nyid kyang //mi mthong sems can sems mi mthong //sangs rgyas mi mthong gang
406b1(rgyud): mthong ba//de yi don dam yang dag mthong //zhes mthong ba yongasu bsngags//la la ni 'di skad du/yo nas ma bcas ji bzhin pa//mi sgyu mo 'gag rnam kun mkhyen//sus kya ma/

406b3(rgyud): de la m+b+ha gtogs gang zhig na//sangs rgyas bya ba ga la yod//ces ye nas sangs rgyas par bsngags//la la ni 'di skad du/brdan g.yod dkyil 'khor phyag rgya rdzogs//

406b5(rgyud): ltar ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid las 'di skad du//thams cad thams cad ji snyed pa//tshig gi tha snyad tsam dag las//'di la bya
406b6(rgyud): ci yang med//rang bzhin de nyid ye sangs rgyas//a ho zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las 'das te/bde ba chen po lhun dang bar gyur to//de nas gsang ba'i drod
406b7(rgyud): po nyid kyis tshig su bcad de smras pa/dper na kun tu rgya ba'i mi//'dong pa'i yul du gang 'gro ba//yul gyi rnam pa mtha' yas kyang //pi grod yul lam gnas gcig
407a1(rgyud): las med//de bzhin bsam gyis mi khyub pa'o//rnam grangs chos su dza spyad kyang //bkrid pas drang ba'i tshig yin te//bsam pa'i yul ni gcig par//

407a3(rgyud): shes na//de yi ye shes mtha' yas te//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid pas//mdo don gcig tu bsdus par gsungs//grogs po dag de dag ni de bzhin gshegs
407a4(rgyud): thams cad dgongs pa de kho na nyid gcig tu 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas bshad pa ste/thams cad kyi mdo de kho na nyid du 'dus par shes par bya'o//

408b1(rgyud): grub pa'i gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor gsang ba yum gyi mkha' rnam par dag pa'i gzhal yas khang na/gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i phyir rgya phyogs bcur yongasu ma chad

408b5(rgyud): khang de na nyi ma dang zla ba rangs pa dang phyed kyis 'od gsal bar snang ba dang /che ba'i yon tan sna tshogs pa'i dril bu dang mu tig gi chun mdzes 'phyeng ba dang /shar bu'i rgyun
408b6(rgyud): dang /bla re dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan la sogs pa'i rgyan gyi khyad par dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ta la'i ljon shing re ba skang ba'i dpag bsam gyi shing dang yid bzhin gyi nor

409a1(rgyud): sna chags las grub pa'i gnas de nyid na smrazlas dang shes rab rang bzhin gyi 'dags lnga ba'i ny+Nin+da dang ma rgyags ma gas pa'i blang dang mi byed pa'i do pa/

409a4(rgyud): memi ri ser nag tu 'khyil cing 'bar ba/keng dros kyi ri rab las rak+ta'i khrag zhag gi nu 'bab pa/'bar ba'i 'bri ba mang po 'khrug pa'i gnas na degs pa shug dang
409a5(rgyud): sems can chen po'i gdan dang bcas pa'i gnas kun tu bzang po'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs grub pa/rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pa'i rdo rje gsang ba'i

409a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang /khrag 'thung rol pa'i chags dang /dad pas 'dus pa'i chags rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/na ma
409b1(rgyud): sa dang mnyam par nga nan sha btsun mo dang babs pa du banan gsheg su rnam par yang mdung dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ma spyod pa dang /da banan du na
409b2(rgyud): pa rin chen 'byung ldan deng /de bzhin ni shegs pa snang ba mtha' yas dang /de bzhin gshegs pa don med grub pa dang /btsun ma dam pa dbyings phyug ma dang /btsun

417a4(rgyud): zhugs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhug so//de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po kun tu bzang po de la lugasu btud de brkyang phyag btsal nas rmad du
417a5(rgyud): byung ba'i mchod pa sna tshogs byas nas gsol ba btab pa/smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang po khyod la bdag cagra zhu bar spobs na gsang ba'i skabs dbye bar

417b2(rgyud): gsang ba'i tshig lam gyis snyan par mi snang ba'i rgyu dang rkyen bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol/smra ba'i seng ge legs par bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa dang sgra

417b4(rgyud): ba rnams kyis ma bshad de//de ltar ston pa rgyal mchog kyang //rnam par brjod pa'i mi mdzad de//bka' mi stsol bar dgongs pa'o//'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyan
417b5(rgyud): tsug/de bas na gsang ba don dam pa'i byang chub kyi snying po de smra bas ma las 'das shing brjod du med pas de la tshig tu smra ba lags pa ma yin te/tshig tu smos pa'i dus
417b6(rgyud): nyid grol ba yin par phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rgyal ba rnams kyis kyang bshad de//da ltar ston pa nyid kyang de na de nyid dgongs nas ma gsungaso//'dus pa'i 'khor tshu gas
417b7(rgyud): rnams de bas na ma skyes pa'i snying po byang chub sems tshig tu spros pa dang bral gyis kyang kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i dbang du mtshan ma'i tshig gi rnal 'byor pa rnams tshig gi 'drang

418a2(rgyud): ba'i pang ge de ltar na bdag cag dang ma 'ongs po'i rnal 'byor pa'i tshig gi rje su 'brang ba rnams kyis don du rdo rje tshig gi lam du brjod pas don gsal bar byed pa de smi
418a3(rgyud): ba'i seng ge lus kyi bka' ba khyod nyid kyis zhu bar spobs shig/smra ba'i seng gre dbang bas na bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la zhus shig dang
418a4(rgyud): de nis smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis rnam par rtog pa mkhyen nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la
418a5(rgyud): lan stong du skor ba byas te/rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa rgyas pa de kho na nyid kyis mchod nas 'di skad gsol ba btab bo//e ma ho ston pa'i ngo mtshar khyod//phyogs bcu'i

418a7(rgyud): la zhi ba//tshig gi bsams pa rings bya'i phyir//snying po byang chub don 'di la//dpes mtshon tshig gi lde mig gis//gsang ba de nyid bshad du gsol zhes gsol ba
418b1(rgyud): btab pa las bcom ldan 'das gsangadra ba mchog gi bdag po smra ba'i seng ges gsol ba btab pa yang mkhyen/'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyis sems kyi rtog pa
418b2(rgyud): yang mkhyen nas tshig gi rjesu 'brang ba'i rnal 'byor yang thugasu chud nas rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum phyug ste/ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse dgu pa yang nas yang du gsor zhing rmad

418b6(rgyud): gang tshig dang yi ge las 'das pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi sku'o//gang tshig dang yi ges brjod du drang ba thams cad ni gzugs kyi sku'o//sngags kyi lta ba dang spyod pa yang

419a3(rgyud): de ltar lags na/bcom ldan 'ad sa sngags kyi lbu ba la blo gnas pa gang lags/smra b+ha dang spyod pa lha blo gnas pa nI gang lhags/spyod pa 'bar zhig la

419b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/smra ba'i seng ge gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul rnams bshad kyis nyon cig/ngas yid tshim par

420a7(rgyud): nyid can de snang ba meda'o//de bzhin du gsang sngags sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ting 'dzin dang /yig 'bru dang rdzas kyi sbyor ba las rtags dag snying yang de la rang bzhin/
420b1(rgyud): med do//smig rgyu zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyang 'gro ba skom gyis gdungs pa'i du su nyi ma dro ba las smig rgyu ba lnga chur mthong yang de la chu'i rung bzhin medo//de bzhin du gsang
420b2(rgyud): sngags ming gi khyad par yang gdags pa'i gzhi med pa la ming dang tha snyad btags pa yid ming nyid dmig su ga la yod/rmi lam zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni skyes bu/
420b3(rgyud): ge nyid log pa'i tshe bde sdug gi rnam pa mang po rmis kyang sangs nas ni yang dmigasu med do//de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi spyod pa yang ji ltar spyad na yang spyad pa'i dmigs

420b6(rgyud): nyid ni bar snang na dri ze gang na gnas pa der grong khyer yang de na gnas ta de byung ma thug tu rtog pa ma yin pa dang /gsang sngag gnas kyang rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid kyis kyang bskyed

421a2(rgyud): du snang yang chu la zla ba med do//de bzhin du phyug rgya'i dkyil 'khor la yang bzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa med do//chu'i chu byur zhes bya ba'i mtshon 'di ni chu'i rlangs chen gcig las
421a3(rgyud): chu bur mang du 'byung zhing slar yang 'du ba de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa'i ting 'dzin gyi rnam pa yang gcig tu mchad do//mig 'khrul pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni mi mig rang can gyi

421a6(rgyud): dbyibs med do//de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa'i sems kyi cho 'phrul cir yang snang zhing 'byung la dngos por ma grub pa'o//smra ba'i srong ge de ltar na gsang sngags kyi spyod pa ni de ltar

423b6(rgyud): bzang pob aM la la ho zhes sgra phyung ste//byang chub sems la bstod pa//e ma bde chen kun tu bzang //e ma'o stong nyid byang chub sems//e ma'o dog pa dri ma med//

424a1(rgyud): 'tshalo zhes bstod de/bcom ldan 'das nyid khyad par du gyur pa yang byang chub sems nyid yin zhing byang chub kyi sems thugasu chud pa'o//bdag cag
424a2(rgyud): rig 'dzin gyi tshogasu gyur pa rnams kyang byang chub sems la smon paro 'tshal/'jug por 'tshal/ldang bar 'tshalo//gnas par 'tshal te/bdag cag kyang rang
424a3(rgyud): rang gi sems g.yos par bgyi/reg par bgyi/nye bar bgyi/nyamasu myong bar bgyi bar 'chal na bdag cag de 'dra ba'i bsam pa can la snying rje chen por dgongs

424a5(rgyud): snying rje byang chub 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te gnyisu med par mngon par 'du mdzad do//gnyi su med par mngon par 'du mdzad pas
424a6(rgyud): byang chub sems kyi sprin gyis thams cad rgyas par khyab pa ni til 'bru mar gyis khyab pa bzhin no//de nas yang 'di gsungs//e ma'o ye shes rnam dag chos//
424a7(rgyud): sna tshogs snang yang rtog par gsang //ngo bo nyid ni brjod du med//snod ma yin la bstan par dka'o//e ma'o sred gsum le rnas rnam par dag pa'i ra
424b1(rgyud): bzhin la//bdag tu rtog pa srid rtsa'i nyes dmigs kyis//yun rings dus nas 'khyams pa'i 'gro ba rnams//mi sdug bde sdug gnas rnams so sor gzung //log rtog
424b2(rgyud): nor ba'i dbang gis kun brtags kyang //rang bzhin nyid las mnyam pa rdul tsam med//e ma'o yun rings dus nas rmongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams//ye nas don gyi sangs rgyas
424b3(rgyud): yin mod kyang //rmongs pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba'i 'khor lor 'khyams//log rtog nyid la dngos med byang chub sems//'khrul 'khor nyid kyang mi zad rgyan du che//snyigs
424b4(rgyud): ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnasu gsal//phung po lnga nyid mngon par rdzogs pa'i sku//srad rtsa'i nyes dmigs nyid kyang byang chub snying por gnas//phye nang snod bcud yab yum
424b5(rgyud): ngang du gsal zhes gsungs pas chos thams cad byang chub semasu gnas//'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa'i glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo las byang chub tu sems
424b6(rgyud): bskyed pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag nyid sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje las dkyil 'khor thams cad
424b7(rgyud): 'byung bar bzhed nas btsun mo dang gnyi su med par 'du mdzad do//mngon par 'du mdzad nas yang dkyil 'khor thams cad 'byung ba rdo rje'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
425a1(rgyud): la zhugs te dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mdo 'di gsung so//'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams nyon cig/gsang sngags byin rlabs bsam yas la//
425a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsam yas brjod mi lang //mdor bsdus rnam pa gsum yin te//rang bzhin lhun grub dkyil 'khor dang //ting 'dzin gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dang //
425a3(rgyud): bkri drang rdul tshon dkyil 'khor te//gsum po dag tu rgyal bas gsungs//shes ched du gleng ngo //de nas smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/bcom
425a4(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis chos thams cad ni dkyil 'khor gsum du brjod par mthong lagaso//de yang 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo//e ma'o gsang
425a5(rgyud): mchog bde ba che//ye nas lhun grub dag pa'i bdag/dkyil 'khor kun gyi 'byung nas gtso//rdo rje rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo//chos kun ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i//
425a6(rgyud): rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med//rang bzhin lhun grub zab mo'i don//bcom ldan snying pas bshad du gsol//a la la ho/de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog
425a7(rgyud): gi bdag po des gsol ba btab pa'i don thug su chud nas lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ba rdo rje rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
425b1(rgyud): zhugs nas yang rang bzlon don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor smras pa dang bral ba 'di gsungs//oM ma'o sang+yas rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems//thun mong rtogs 'byung na
425b2(rgyud): rgyal bas gsungs pa'i ye shes gang de ni dkyil 'khor snying po yin zhes gsungs//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po dus rang bzhin don dam
425b3(rgyud): bya'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam grangs 'di gsung so//de la 'di ni spyir bsdus pa'o//sems can kun gyi sems chen po//rang bzhin dag pas dri ma med//phung po lnga
425b4(rgyud): don sangs rgyas lnga//'byung ba lnga don dbyings phyug yum//khams dang skye mched mang po kun//semAs dpa' sems ma'i dkyil 'khor yin//des ni srid gsum
425b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor che zhes gsungaso//de la phung po lnga pa sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa yang //srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi//rgyu dang 'bras bu'i
425b6(rgyud): gzugs rnams kun//chos kyi dbyings las byung bas na//dbyer med don gyi gti mug pas//rnam par snang mdzad rang bzhin yin//srid gsum sems can thams cad
425b7(rgyud): kyi//bde sdug tshor ba'i phung po kun//mnyam nyid dbyings la snang bas na//nga rgyal chen po'i rang bzhin pas//myong ba rin tshan 'byung ba yin//srid gsum sems can
426a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi//yul dang shes pa phra rags kyi//byed pa'i phung po thams cad kun//mu 'dres dbyings la snang bas na//shes rab rlabs kyi 'dod chags
426a2(rgyud): pas//snang ba mtha' yas rang bzhi no//srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi//dge dang mi dge gnyis ga min//sems las byung dang ma byung ba'i//'du byed phung po thams
426a3(rgyud): cad kun//spro bas dbyings las byung bas na//rnam par grol ba'i phrag dog pas//don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin yin//srid gsum sems nan thams cad kyi//rnam
426a4(rgyud): smin rA sems rnam rig pa'i//shes brgyad rnam shes phung po kun//rig pa'i dbyings la shar bas na//zhe sdang chen po'i ye shes pas//rdo rje sems dpa'i
426a5(rgyud): rang bzhin yin zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni chen po lnga dbyings phyug lnga rang bzhin du gsungaso//snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi//gsal stong mi sgrib go 'byed
426a6(rgyud): pa'i//snang stong na mkha'i khams rnams kun//stong nyid dbyangs la shar bas na//thams cad gnas pa'i glog yin pas//bde gshegs dbyings phyug rang
426a7(rgyud): bzhin yin//snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi//sra brten skyed skun rten rnams kun//sa yi khams su grags pa rnams//mi 'gyur dbyings la shar bas na/
426b1(rgyud): thams cad spyod pa'i rten yin pas//rdo rje dbyings phrug rang bzhin yin//snad bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi//gyis srung gsher bang mtshan nyid kun//chu yi khamasmra smra
426b2(rgyud): pa ste/kun sdod dbyings shar bas na//yon tan tshogs chen kun sdud pas//rin chen dbyings phyug rang bzhin yin//snad bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi//gsal gro'i ngo bo
426b3(rgyud): thams cad kun//me yi khams grags pa rnams//snang gsal dbyings la shar bsta na//gsal dro sreg pa'i rang bzhin pas//pad ma'i dbyings phyug rang bzhin yin//
426b4(rgyud): snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi//yang g.yo 'degs ba sad thams cad kun//rlung gi khamasu grags pa ste//bskyod chen dbyings la shAr bos na//thogs med shun
426b5(rgyud): bskyed rang bzhin pas//las kyi dbyings phyug rang bzhin yin zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni rnam par shes pa bzhi byang chub chen po'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa//srid gsum
426b6(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi//kha dog dbyibs la gcod pa kun//mig gi rnam shes zhes su grags//mthong ba'i ye shes yin pa'i phyir//sa'i snying po'i rang bzhin
426b7(rgyud): yin//srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi//sgra rnams kun la gcod pa kun//rna ba'i rnam shes zhes su grags//thos pa'i ye shes yin pas na//lag na rdo rje
427a1(rgyud): /rlung bzhin na//spyod ga/ma snyoms can rnams cad b+h+yo//do rnams can la gcod pon//sku rnam+ba sha zlos pa blugs/byung na/
427a2(rgyud): shes yin las nA//na mkha'i snying po'i rang bzhin yin//snying gsum sems can thams cad kyi//ro rnams kun la gcod pa kun//lce yi rnam shes skye su brag/myong ba'i
427a3(rgyud): ye shes yin pa'i phyir//spyan ras gzigs kyi rang bzhin yin zhes gsungaso//de la yul bzhi byang chub chen mo bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa/snod bcud 'gro ba
427a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi//kha dog dbyibs dang mtshan ma kun//gzugs kyi skye mched nyid du brags//mthong bar bya ba'i yul yin pas//gzugs mdzes lA s+ye'i rang bzhin yin//
427a5(rgyud): snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi//zin dang ma zin gnyi ga las/byung po'i sgra yi khamasu glags//thos por bya ba'i yul yin pas//nir ti ma yi rang bzhin yin//snod
427a6(rgyud): bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi//lhan cig skyes dang sbyar dang gyur//zhim dang nga dang de bzhin gzhan//dri yi khams dang skye mched de//bsnam por bya ba'i yul yin pas//
427a7(rgyud): ma la nyid kyi rang bzhin yin//snod bcu do 'gro ba thams cad kyi//kha mngar lnga sogs ro rnams kun//ro yi skye mched nyid du grags//myong bar bya ba'i yul yin/
427b1(rgyud): bas 'bri ti nyid kyi rang bzhin yin zhes gsung so//de la 'di ni dbang po bzhi'i byang chub sems dpa' bzhi'i rang bzhin du grasu sa ga/srid bsnyam sems can thams cad kyi//mdzod
427b2(rgyud): byung dang rdo'i bdag nyid de//mig gi khams zhes b+ha bar klags//mthang du b+h+yo byed pa'i phyir//b+h+yam s+thA pa mo t+to rang bzhin yin//sbrid pasu ma sems can thams cad kyi/
427b3(rgyud): thos par byed pa'i bdag nyid de//rna ba'i khams zhes bya bar grags//bos pa'i bye ba byed pa'i phyir//sgrib pa kun sel rang bzhin yin//srid gasnam sems can thams
427b4(rgyud): cad kyi//sdo ma byed dang po'i bdag nyid de//sna'i khams zhes bya bar grags//tshor bar bya ba byed pa'i phyir//'jam dpal nyid kyi rang bzhin yin/snyi gsum sems can
427b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi//myong byed drag pa'i bdag nyid de//lce'i khams zhes bya bar grags//myong ba'i bya ba byed pa'i phyir//kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin yin zhes gsungaso//
427b6(rgyud): de la dus bzhi'i mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa/snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi//rgyu 'bras kun tu rnam par spyad//sngon 'das dus su rnam par brag/
427b7(rgyud): sngon 'das dpyid kyi rang bzhin yin//spos me'i rang bzhin nyid yin ni//snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi//rgyu spyad 'dres bu ma spyad kun//de ltar dbyar gyi rang bzhin
428a1(rgyud): /mU na yan//nA zung klung byanas m+b+hi//d+h+rU shAs yongs kyis ma sbyad pa//sa ngas sa su rnam par grags/28
428a2(rgyud): smon sbyin na/ nga ban // sa d+hA ga / u
428a3(rgyud): na /rang dzinan smin pa sa s+yA s+ho//de 'i 'dren kye+e ba dang /nub tu m+b+hi da /yad+g+ha
428a4(rgyud): byung ba'i byang chub sems khrim bzhi'i rang bzhin gsuM smra ba/mr-i gsu ma sems can pams ca ste//reg byed dru de'i bdag nyid de//lam gyi khams she
428a5(rgyud): bir wAg s+ho//reg par byed pa med dus nA//glai shin+da rje 'joms pa'i rang bzhin no//spyod brgyud 'gro bla thams cad kyi//reg bya kun le gtsad pakun//
428a6(rgyud): rnam shes sa gdus//rig pa'i ye shes sbyin pa'i b+h+yo//rnam par rmA sbyin//snyid sgras ma skyemasaldan thams da kyi//byung deng 'byung 'a
428a7(rgyud): ga kyi ma/na gyi phyi tsho gyi du gas//go sa kyi bu'i med pa'o/ phyog 'i gyu zhin // gsas sems
428b1(rgyud): mam mamacams sa ma ma cas ma tha/a malam thasamamathasamamacam tham mam yamamaca thathal thas mamana.a gas can yas ka/
428b2(rgyud): tshogs drug 'gags pa de ma thag/gau 'byed gsal ba'i bdag nyid de//yid kyi khams zhes bya bar grags//nges gcod bya ba byed pa'i phyir//bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rang bzhin
428b3(rgyud): yin/zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni phyin ci ma log bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa/snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi//'jig dang skad cig mi rtag pa//rtag par ma yin
428b4(rgyud): zhesu grags//sgyu ma lta bu yin pa'i phyir//lcags kyu ma yi rang bzhin yin//snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyis//kun rtog gzhan dbang med min pa//chad par ma yin//
428b5(rgyud): zhesu glegs//rmi lam lta bur sems snang phyir//zhags pa ma yi rang bzhin yin//snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi//gzung 'dzin dngos por ma grub pa//mtshan mar
428b6(rgyud): ma yin zhesu grags//smig rgyu lta bur sems snang phyir//lcags sgrog ma yi rang bzhin yin//snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi//skyes bu med par ma grub pa//bdag tu
428b7(rgyud): ma yin zhesu grags//skra brnyan lta bu'i sems cing phyi//dril bu ma yi rang bzhin yin zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni yid dang chos go nr-i gzungs gnyis kyi rang bzhin du
428b8(rgyud): bstan te/sred gsum sems can thams cad kyi//chos rnams kun la nges gcod pa'i//yid kyi rnam shes zhesu grags//rtog pa'i ye shes yin pa'i phyir//
429a1(rgyud): kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin yin//snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi//'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kun//chos kyi skyed byed yin par grags//
429a2(rgyud): rnam par shes pa'i yul yin pas//kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin yin//de las sogs te mtha' yas mchog/chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa//nam mkha'i
429a3(rgyud): khams kyi mtha' klas pa//ji snyed rnam grangs yod pa'i chos//kun kyang phyag brgya'i rang bzhin pas//rang bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po yi//rnam grangs yin par rgyal
429a4(rgyud): bas gsungs shes rjed du brjod pa gsungaso//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos des rang bzhin kun rdzogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungaso//
429a5(rgyud): kun rdzos mtshan ma'i gnas chen kyang //'og min bla min gnas mchog gam//lcang lo can nam bde ba can//pad+ma can las sogs pa yi//rang bzhin lhun grub dkyil
429a6(rgyud): 'khor de//mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor ngo la snang //de yang ji lta bu zhe na/mkha' 'am yid kyi na mkha' la//'byung chen brtsegs pa'i lhun gyis grub//de steng
429a7(rgyud): rin chen sna bzhi la//lhun gyis grub pa ched dpag med//de la brten pa'i sa gzhi ni//rin chen sna tshogs bcal du bkram//mnan nem bteg 'phar mdzes
429b1(rgyud): pa'i bzhi//de la pho brong dashal mod khang //gru bzhi lham pa mdzes par snang //rin tshon sna bzhi'i rgyu las grub//blo 'bur bzhi yang 'khar thabs tshul//bum pa'i rtse mo/
429b2(rgyud): chos kyi tog/rma bya'i mdongs dang ldan pa'o//sgo bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan//rta babs brgyad dang yang dag ldan//dbus na 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa//lte bar bcas
429b3(rgyud): shing rtsibs rten ljon//glu chad par 'khyams mdzes par ldan//rin chen 'od zer 'bar bas 'khrigs//sems can pad+ma nyi zla dang //rin chen 'bar ba'i gdan
429b4(rgyud): mchog ldan//rin chen khri rkang rnam rten ldan//po blang de yi gdun mchog kyang //nyi zla nor bu rin chen 'bar//bla re rgyal mitshan na bza' gdugs//dar dang ba ra mu
429b5(rgyud): tIg phreng //dril bu dang ni rnga yab sogs//rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs brgyan//'jug rten lha tshogs mdzes pa dang //de la sogs te rgyan rnams kyang //bsam gyis
429b6(rgyud): mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/gzhal yas de yi sgo bzhi na//glang chen rnams kyi mdzes par byas//rta babs rnams kyi tsong tsong dang //gser gyi dril bu 'bar ba dag/
429b7(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan yang sgrogs//sgo drung de dag re re na//ta la'i skye shing tsong tsong 'khril//dri dang gzugs dang 'od du ldan//ta la'i skyed shing de dag la//
430a1(rgyud): khu byug la sogs bkra shis pa'i//bya rnams snyan pa skad kyang 'byin//sgo drung de dag re re na//khrus kyi rdzing bu dbyibs legs pa//blo mchog yan
430a2(rgyud): lag ldan pa'i chu//grangs med de dag re re na//lha dang lha mo bsam mi khyab//phyi rol kho ra khor yug na//rtses 'chags sa brjod mo lang //de la sogs pa bsam
430a3(rgyud): yas mchug/ma bco la ye nas lhun gyis grub/lha mchog rnams kyi bsod nams kyis//rgyu las grub par rgyal bas gsungs//pho brang de na gnas pa yi//ye
430a4(rgyud): shes lha tshogs mang po rnams//gtso gzungs zung du 'khril ba ste//dbus kyi pho brang snying po la//rnam par snang mdzad snying po che//'dzam bu na ta'i gser 'od 'dra//
430a5(rgyud): rang rtags lag na 'khor lo bsnams//dpa' bo de'i spyan snga na//rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya chen yang //dring dang shel gyi kha dog 'dra//rang rtags lag na rdo rje 'dzin//
430a6(rgyud): g.yasu rin chen 'byung ldan te//bai DUr+ya'i kha dog 'dra//rang rtags rin chen 'bru brgyad 'dzin//rgyal ba snang ba mtha' yas gtso//pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra zhing //
430a7(rgyud): rang rtags pad+ma dmar po 'dzin//g.yon du don yod grub pa ste//in tA ni la ljang ku'i mdog/rang rtags phyag na ral gri 'dzin//kun kyang zhi ba'i tshe lugs te/
430b1(rgyud): por tshugs rnyogs lnga dbu la brgyan//rdzogs pa'i skyil krung tshul du bzhugs//dau shal dpung brgyan so mo do//phyag gdub snyan chas kun la mdzes//mtshan
430b2(rgyud): dang dang byad yang dag rdzogs//de dag gi ni g.yon rol na//kun tu bzang dang lo tsa na//mA ma gos dkar sgron ma rnams//g.yas pas thabs kyis gtso la mkhyud//
430b3(rgyud): g.yon pas rang rtags dril bu 'dzin//sku mdog cha lugs yab dang 'dra//'khor lo rtsibs la lhun gyis grub//spyan nga'i blo bur mdzes pa la//lag ni rdo rje sngo
430b4(rgyud): skya'i mdog/rang rtags rdo rje rtswa gsum 'dzin//g.yas na swa yi snying po ste//ljang sngon rin chen myug gu 'dzin//rgyab tu na mkho'i snying po ste//mthing ka rang rtags ral
430b5(rgyud): gr-I 'dzin//g.yon du mdzes pa'i glo 'bur la//spyan ras gzigs dbang dmar skya ste//rang rtags pad ma dkar po 'dzin//thor tshugs ye shes sems pas brgyan//
430b6(rgyud): sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs//rgyan dang tshwa lugs kun gyis brgyan//de dag gi ni g.yon rol na//ga rA dang sgeg mo phreng ba dbyangs//g.yas pas thabs kyi gtso
430b7(rgyud): la 'khyud//g.yon pa gar dang me long phreng //pi bang 'dzin cing cha lugs gzhan//gtso bo nyid kyang thun pa yin//mdzes pa'i gru chen rnams la ni//byams pa mai tri
431a1(rgyud): dkar ba ste//mdzes pa'i klu yis 'bru de bsnams//shar lho mtshams kyi gru chad la'o//sgrib pa rnam sel mthing ka ste//chos kyi 'khor lo 'dzin pa ste//
431a2(rgyud): lho nub mtsham su mdzes par gnas//'jam dpal gzhon nu ma ri skya'i mdog/rang rtags uta pa la mthing ka 'dzin//nub byung mtsham su mdzes par gnas//kun tu bzang po
431a3(rgyud): lIng ser mdog/rang rtags rin chen sna mya 'dzin//byang shir mtshams kyi tha la gnas//de dag gi ni g.yon rol ni//spos dang me tog gdug pad+ma//g.yas pa thabs kyi
431a4(rgyud): rgatsel 'khyud//g.yon par rang rtags 'dzin pa'o//tsha lugs thams cad snga ma bzhin//sgo khyud rnams la 'joms pa ni//gshin rje gshed po mthing nag 'bar//nir
431a5(rgyud): mgog dengs pa lag mtshan thogs//shar gyi sbyor ni rnam par gnas//rnam par rgyal ba ser nag 'bar//rdo rjes gnod pa lho sgor ro//rta 'grin dmar nag 'bar ba ste//
431a6(rgyud): thod sbrul thogs pa nub sgor gnas//bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ldang nag 'bar//rgyu gram gyis gnon byang gi sgor//stang thabs tshul du rab tu gnas//dur khrod rgyan gyis rnam par
431a7(rgyud): brgyan//rnam par gtsigs la 'jigs 'jigs lta//ma dpung 'bar ba'i klong du 'khyil//hU~M dang phaT kyi sgra chen sgrogs//de dag gi ni g.yon ral na//gshed mo dang ni
431b1(rgyud): malan sa bcamathacams sam bcas ma thatha/a mamatha thas mamathathasamamacam tham ma 'a thamamam ma yamags tshan ya thamams tham thamam mamatshacan ma Tha ka/mam ma
431b2(rgyud): rgyal ma dang //rta mgrin mo dang 'khyil mo rnams//lag mtshan lcags kyu zhags pa dang //sgrog dang dril bu thogs shing rngam//cha lugs 'joms pa dag dang 'dra//sgo khyud dag/
431b3(rgyud): tu lhun gyis grub//mdzes pa'i bar 'khyams de nyid la//sprul sru thugs pa tshan mo drugaces 'dul thabs kyi skur ston pas//cha lugs ma nges 'dul bar ston//mdzes
