431b4(rgyud): bir 'khyams de nyid las//mdun dang rgyab kyi phyogs rol la//byed pa po dang bya ba mo//na mkha'i yi ni mdog 'dra la//ting nge 'dzin du ldan par gnas//de las sogs te mtha'
431b5(rgyud): yas mchog/brjod med rjod du med pa yi//lha yi tshogs kyis gang bar gnas//dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub/lha yi tshogs chen de dag gi/thugs kar ye shes
431b6(rgyud): sems dpa' gnas//tshon gang 'od dang chas pa'o//ljang la rang rtag yi ge rnam//rang rtags phyag rgya'i steng du gsal//de lta'i sku mchog re re la//tshul dgu dag dang ldan pa ste//mnyen dang
431b7(rgyud): lcug dang 'khril bag dang //ldem bag chags dang gzhon tshul can//gsal dang 'chos dang lhun stug dang //gzi brjod 'bar bar rab tu gnas//de ltar rang bzhin dkyil 'khor
431b8(rgyud): nas//phyi rabs sngags 'chang rnal 'byor pas//spyan drangs mchod pa 'bul ba'i 'os shes gsungs pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub bo//
432a1(rgyud): /dom+b+ham+b+ha b+hA ba'i snong k+kol sa nas ng+ge'i 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams nga ga bsam par smra dang DUr+yaSh+Ta/yul la zhes bya ba'o rgyung nas
432a2(rgyud): mgrin gcig tu ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do//ya ho dmigs dang mi dmigs brtan g.yo chos kun ldan grub dpag mi lang //rang rig yon tan dpag mod pas ma yis mang
432a3(rgyud): po de kun brjod mi lang //gsung sngags rgya mtsho thugs rje bse y+Ya bas ma khyab ji snyed dpag mi long/sprul pa rgya mtsho gang+gA'i bye snyed 'gro ba chos ston zhing khams khyab ces
432a4(rgyud): ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des mi g.yo ba rnam por 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
432a5(rgyud): ti nge 'dzin gyis dkyil 'khor 'dri gsung so//'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams chos thams cad tingange 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur du rung ba tsam du rtogs shig/dri ci'i phyir ni
432a6(rgyud): /chosna thams cad ni ting 'dzin ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar dbang bsgyur bya'o//'dus pa'i 'khor rdzogs 'di lta ste/gsang sngags ya mtshan chen po 'di//
432a7(rgyud): 'dzin dkyil lakhor bas ma yas kyang //mdor bsdus rnam pa ni su ma yod de//bsgom pa'i ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor dang //bskyed de lhag pa'i ting 'dzin//thog pa'i rnam
432b1(rgyud): 'byor nyid bsgoms to//dkyil 'khor yin par rgyalta bas gsungs//de yang ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ting 'dzin kyang rnam kA sum ste//dang por de bzhin nyid kyi dang //de bzhin nyid/
432b2(rgyud): lo gnas bca'i phyir//stong pa chen po'i ting 'dzin bsgo//gnyis pa kun snang na mkha'i bar//snying rje yum gyis khyab pa'i phyir//mtshams sbyor chen po'i ting 'dzin bsgom//
432b3(rgyud): gsum pa rang gi sa bon nam//rab tu bstan pa'i yig 'bru a//de las phra mo a 'bros 'dus//spros shing bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med//de las bdag nyid chen po de bsgom//
432b4(rgyud): ma lus thams cad rdzogs par gsal//rgyas btab byin rlabs dbang bsgyur bas//rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs//de bzhin dbyings las shang bas na//bdag
432b5(rgyud): nyid chen po g.yon du ste//mkha' dbyings rdo rje pad mor ldan//de ni bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor yin//skyed pa yang ni 'di lta ste//lho chags bdag gis sra su bskyed//
432b6(rgyud): de nas bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor yin//de yang ji ltar bskyed ce na/thog mar yab yum mkha' rnams gnyis//rdo rje pad+ma mar byin gyis brlabs//gnyis med do byas
432b7(rgyud): par 'khyil ba las//b+ha ga'i dkyil du ling ga aM//'phro 'du dbyingasu thim pa las//dbang chen sa bon 'bru lngar gyur//oM yi ny-i du bruM a nying 'dus pa sa na mkhangags /
433a1(rgyud): yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyed//byi las bdud rtse'i rgya mtshor bskyod//m+b+ha lus gser gyi bris mar+ya bskyed//blo laswa ri rab gzhal med khang+tha/
433a2(rgyud): dbyibs dang kha dog tshad dpag med//'khor lo'i gdon dang rol mo'i tshigs//rang bzhin kun rdzob ci 'dra ba'o//de ru lha tshogs bskyed pa ni//brtan 'byung mkha'i yi
433a3(rgyud): gige a//'phel 'grib med par gnas pa ste//gnyis med dgyes pa'i 'phro 'dul//bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'od du shar//kA kha ga g+hA nga /ts+yai che dza d+hAnya//Tarba Da D+ha Na/ta thad
433a4(rgyud): d+hAn/pa pha ba d+h+ya ma/ya r+ya la wa/shuSha sa ha k+ShaM/i IM/u A/e AM/oM o//gsung gi dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis//sgro bsdu gsal bar gyur pa las//
433a5(rgyud): thugs mtshan pa ny-i cu rtsa gnyis 'bar//de las mngon rdzogs skur gsal ba//thi las sogs pa'i yig 'bru lnga//phung po lnga yi so bon yin//tha las sogs pa 'byung ba
433a6(rgyud): lnga//bskyed pa'i se bon yin par grags//ka las sogs pa'i yig 'bru lnga//rnam shes lnga yi sa bon yin//tsa las sogs pa'i yig 'bru lnga//mi gi kham+ba la sogs pa lnga//
433a7(rgyud): ba laso//po'i 'byung ba lnga//gzugs sogs skye mched rnam lnga'i yin//yaM las sogs pa'i yig 'bru ba na//dus bzhi la son rab tu grags//shaM las sogs pa'i
433b1(rgyud): yog su bya no//byin tsa ma log dus bzhir bA shud//oM la sogs pa'i yig 'bru drug/rdul snyed grub pa drug tu bshad//yod sgyid kyi khams yin te//kla na spyod kyi rnam shing/
433b2(rgyud): khams//oM ni chos kyi kham su bA shad//sngo so'i thugs mtshan gsal pA las//saM bA~M ni rnams kyis mngon rdzogs bskyed//oM hU~M byAdz+ra d+h+r-i ka/sA rad na d+ha kA/A~M A rI lIg/
433b3(rgyud): d+hu brAt+sA d+hI//mr-id+b+ha tu shA ri/laM dwe sha ra ti/myaM mo hA ra ti/pai R+Sha ga ra ti/dz+r-i badz+ra rA ti/k+ShI hA ra dza yaM/tri yU gar d+ho ai/d+hIHtAMdz+nyAM pad+h+waM/dzai ku ru ba naM d+hA/trUM wAM s+yait+ta/
433b4(rgyud): m+b+hi/ b+hI pyeH/a ni rA t+te/mAM d+hA rA na/b+hI mA ni smA ra b+hA ya/s+phA ra n+yai yA/swa sh+tsi U rAgrA ya/daM d+hA pa/d+h+waM puSh+Ta/bi d+hI pi tAM gr-in d+h+we/d+hI ya mAnat+te kr-iti/hUM pad mAn
433b5(rgyud): tak+ShauH/d+h+r-i bog+h+nan+ta kr-i/dzA bad+d+ha kro d+h+r-i d+h+r-i rad na kr-Id+d+hi/byaM pad ma kro d+hi/ho kar ma k+ko d+hI/d+h+r-i bad+d+hAnatwA/a badz+rI sa mA ya/mu ni kr-i/mu ni sr-i/mr-i nai tr-i/mu naM b+h+yAM/mu nautI/
433b6(rgyud): pr-i rnaMstongs pa'i stong b+h+rUM yem+b+ha/mngon rdzogs sbyar na gsal ba dang swA m+b+ha yi dbang bsgyur te//snga gsung thugs sbyin gyi skye brdeg/mA
433b7(rgyud): turten 'ja ba tu rmen tu/oM mahAs ti sha dz+nyAn badz+ras b+hA ba yang sag N+Di/oM ma~M trA sa man tu d+hI b+hUba~M nga mun tu/oMs sbyin m+ban
434a1(rgyud): badz+ra swa d+hU bA yA ma na ha/oM ma hA kr-i ta a nu ra ga dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma kau haM/oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra b+hA b+hA ba yAd ma kau hau/oM sarba ta thA/
434a2(rgyud): ga ta thAka badz+ra sa b+hA ba A ma kaM hUM/oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsi ti to badz+ra swa b+hA ba I ma rka ti/oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badz+ri swa b+hA ba Ad ma kau hi/de las rdzogs pas sangs
434a3(rgyud): rgyas rnams//sku mchog phyogs mtshan bzhugs tshul dang //thor tshu gas la sogs cha lugs kun//rang ba nI ni kun rdzob dkyil 'khor 'di//rnal 'byor rig pa'i
434a4(rgyud): rtsal yin te//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam//yang na gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor la'o//lhag pa'i ting 'dzin zhes bya ba//de ltar gsal ba'i rnam pa kranA/
434a5(rgyud): yab yum mkha' las gsal bar bsgom//rnal 'byor rig pa'i khyad par ro zhes gsungs pas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs thams cad kyis chos thams cad ting nge
434a6(rgyud): 'dzin gyis dbang bskung bar mthong ngo //'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las/ting 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par
434a7(rgyud): phye ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos gzugs brnyan lta bu rnam par 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'ang nas/
434b1(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas las dang ba pa'i rnal 'byor ba yod rgyas par bya ba'i phyor 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams la bka' stsal pa/'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams chos tha
434b2(rgyud): cad ni gzugs brnyan lta bu'i rnam pa yin par shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zho na/chos thams cad ni gzugs brnyan lta bu'i rnam par snang zhing de las 'dus pa'i
434b3(rgyud): phyir ro//de bas na gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor ci 'dra bar bya yis nyon cig/de la 'di ni rgyud kyis rnam grangs//mi shes pa yi 'gro ba la//mtshon pas gsal ba'i don
434b4(rgyud): ston phyir//gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bshad par bya//de yang ji lta bu zha na/brtan zhing mdzes pa'i khang bu la//'jam par zhal zhal byas nas ni//kha dog lnga yi
434b5(rgyud): gzugs bris pa//de yang dngos grub rten du bshad//ras sam gro gam shing shun nam//ta la'i lo ma 'am dur khrod pas//zhing chen ras la sogs pa la//phyag rgya'i gzugs
434b6(rgyud): dris na yang //mtshan ma 'byung ba'i rten du bshad//rdo dang shel rdo la sogs dang //drang ngam ba so'i rgyud la ni//phyag rgya'am gzugasu 'bur btod nas//de yang dngas grub 'byung
434b7(rgyud): ba'i rten//gser dngul bangs khang la sogs la//mkhas pas legs par lugs byas te//yan lag ma nyams gzugs byas ni//da yang mtshan ma'i rten du bshad//blab
435a1(rgyud): byang chung shing bu'i//rgyud shing mnyen la gzugs byas na//de rnams mtshan ma'i rten du bshad//sbyin zhing mnyen pa'i rgyu rnams la//phyag rgya gzugasu logs byas na/
435a2(rgyud): de yang mtshan mo'i rten yon//sa stengs dbyibs legs mdzes pa la//rdul tshon 'dus byas rgyu rnams kyis//brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor byas ni yang //de yang dngos grub
435a3(rgyud): rten du bshad//re shig las kyi dang po las//sa stengs dkyil 'khor byas par shig zhes gsung so//de la 'di ni gnas kyi mtshan nyid de/sa stengs pa yi gnas mchod
435a4(rgyud): kyang //skyon med bye brag shes pa las//spang blang gnyi su shes par bya//ri bo ri bran 'dus pa'i ste//gangs ri brag dkar 'dabs rtsa ni//seng can 'dra ba'i gnas zhes bya/
435a5(rgyud): zhi ba'i las la do shis so//phug chen dgon pa chen po dang //brag tshon rdo rje gtams pa'i dkyil//gcan can 'khra ba'i gnas zhes bya//mngon par gcod pa bsgrub pa'i/
435a6(rgyud): nas//dur khrod gnas dang ngam grog dang //sum mdzugag le bshung ba'i gnas//dur gcan 'khra ba'i gnas bya'o//dbang du bsdu ba bsgrub pa'i gnas//nags tshul mang
435a7(rgyud): po gtibs pa dang //shin tu btsan dang 'jigs pa'i ngos//stag gzig 'bri ba'i gnas zhes bya//'dod pa sgrub pa'i gnas yon//mtsho gle chu mdo rgya mtsho'i 'jings//
435b1(rgyud): chu lo rlo ma btsan pa'i gnas//chu ga can 'khra ba'i gnas zhes bya//las rnams kun la de shis so//ri bo bdun pa'i rtse rnams dang //tsan dan nags tshal me tog tshul//mad
435b2(rgyud): bkra shis nyams dga' yi//gan su dkyil 'khor bri bar shes//gnam dang sa dang bar snang rnams//legs par brtags te dkyil 'khor bya//tshon tsha lnga yi dbyabs dag
435b3(rgyud): /brtag pa na mngon pa'i na mkha' shes//bar snang khwa dog rnam lnga pa//sa sor ma 'dus gis la bu shis//sdug ni shin tu ma nyams dang //mthus mnyam por gnas pa ste/
435b4(rgyud): tshe sa len pa cha med//de ltar brtags par lasi bya'o//spang bar bye ba'i gnas ngan no//gshin rje gdug pa'i mdung rjes dang //srin po ngus pa'i mchi rjes dang //khro bo gnod
435b5(rgyud): sbyid lham rjes dang //ma mr-i rim pa'i skur rjes dang //'byung po rku bo'i 'joms dang //gdug pa klu yi rgyun srang dang //skyon rten rgyu ba'i lam srang dang //zhing blon gdug pa
435b6(rgyud): 'dugs dang //kha nas mtho'i 'dun sa dang //gnyen 'brel ba yi gnas rnams ni//sbrul gdug par du 'ongs pa ltar/wa yi brtul zhugs chen po yis//mo yi bai shugs
435b7(rgyud): te ba tu grang nas gsung so//de la 'di nis bslang ba'i las te//de nas bslang ba'i las rnams kyang //mngon dang mi mngon bdag po'o//rjod pa nye bar ni bya'i phyir//ser sna
436a1(rgyud): spas pa'i snyoms kyis ni//rin dang bden pas bsgom pa spang zhes gsungs//de la 'di ni sa gzung ba ste//de nas slob dpon bdag nyid kyis//rdo rje dril bur
436a2(rgyud): ldan pa yis//rtse gsum 'gros kyis kun tu bskor//khros pas hUM gi nga rgyal bya//dngos grub bar du gcod pa'i bgegs//dngas shig ces su bsgo nas kyang //seng ljang pur
436a3(rgyud): bu ser brgyad pa//khro bor byin brlabs gdab par bya zhes gsungaso//de la 'do ni sa'i lha mo spyan drang ba'o//de nas dbang gyur lha mo de//spyan drangs bskyed dang gnyis min par//
436a4(rgyud): mchod bstod tshul bzhin byas nas ni//bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po//bdud btul mngon par rdzogs pa'i tshe//ru tra tshogs kyis rgol ba la//dgyes pa'i las kyi don bgrangs
436a5(rgyud): te/bdag cag sa la bgrod pa'i tshe//ru tra'i rgol ba byung ba na//spyan ldan de la dbang bco lo zhes gsung so//de la 'di ni rtags brtag pa'o//mtshan mas mtshan ma gzhom
436a6(rgyud): pa'i phyir//ro lnga mtshan nyid brtag par bya//dge ba'i rtags na dngos grub 'byung //gal te shes par ma gyur na//thabs la mkhas pas spang bar bya//yang na sbyin sreg bya
436a7(rgyud): bar brtag ces gsung so//de la 'di ni rin chen gter sba ba'o//gnas te bsod nams gter ldan phyir//rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang //spos lnga 'bru lnga snying po lnga//go bu'i nang du
436b1(rgyud): blugs nas su//sa gzhi gter dang ldan par bya zhes gsung so//de la 'di ni sa sbyang ba'o//ma zhag spos chen rnam lnga yi//khu ba bres nas kun du na//gru bzhi dbyangs legs byang ta//bA ko tsam du
436b2(rgyud): skyong nul bya//de nas dkyil 'khor lha tshogs kyi//sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyong bar bya//des kyang dngos po kun sbyangs te//rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas rang bzhin du//ting nge 'dzin gyis sku
436b3(rgyud): shes gsung so//de la 'di ni lha sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o//de nas lha rnams ji snyed pa//rang bzhin kun rdzokhe spyan drangs te//spos kyi dkyil 'khor lha grangs bzhin//gdan sar byas
436b4(rgyud): yon mchod la//lan gcig gshegs zhasta gon bya//de nas 'dus pa'i sems can kun//gsang dang snying kor brim pa dang //ku sha brim dang srung srung gdags//so shing brim dang
436b5(rgyud): rmi ltas rtag/mchod pa'i yo byad ji snyed dang //rgyan du 'os pa'i rnam pa kun//tshang bar bsogs te byin gyis brlab//'dus pa'i sems can de dag kun//chos gtam rim pas dbugs
436b6(rgyud): ste//gsang sngags che bo'i yon tan bshad//ces zhes bla seMng so//de wA ng+gi ni dkyil 'khor bye ba 'dus/ byed dag gi yan lag las//dus rnams shes par bya ba ni/
436b7(rgyud): dkra shis lha yi nyi ma dang //'byor ldan dus tshod bzang ba ni//mtshan ma'i rtog pa yin mod kyang //brtags na dngos grub mtshan ma 'byung //zhes gsung ngo //de la 'doni thig
437a1(rgyud): gdab pa'i cho ga'o//tshon dang thig skud rnam lnga la//sangs rgyas lha yis byin brlabs te//sprul ba 'phro 'dra rgyun mi bcad//spos sam lho pog dkar po yi//
437a2(rgyud): dud pas rgyun mi bcad par bdug/khros pas drag po'i sngags zlos shing //khro bo khro mo'i stangs kyis bskor//bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs dam bskul//thig skud pha ra pa
437a3(rgyud): gtsang ma 'am//gsang ba'i lcang lo 'khril mdangs sam//rdo rje rgyun thag la sogs la//yul gyi grangs dang mthun par bsgrim//rdo rje rtse lnga'i lu gu rgyud//byang chub sems
437a4(rgyud): su byin gyis brlab//thig g.yog las kyi sems ma ste//mtshan ldan byin gyis brlabs nas ni//phyag rgya gar dang bcas pa yis//rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gnam thig
437a5(rgyud): gdag//de nas sa thig gdab pa yang //'dul ba'i dbang gi bye brag las//maN+Da Da la tshad ma nges po med//sor bzhi pa nas brtsam nasu//ji srid dpag tshad thub par ro//
437a6(rgyud): AM dz+nyA na tsakra su tra ma ta kra ma hUM zhes gsungs//de la 'di ni tshon dgye ba'i cho ga'o//rang bzhin kun rdzob ci 'dra dang //ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor de 'dra dang //brnyan ma yang
437a7(rgyud): ni de 'dra bri//tshon sna 'bras dang 'byung khungs sam//rdo khams rin chen dag la bya//sna gsum sna lnga dag dang ni//rin chen phung po'i tshon gyis ni//dbus kyi pho brang
437b1(rgyud): rlu ba s+ho//la rnam lus bsgyur bar bya//b+hag d+hA gzhan la brgyung bas pa//dkar dmar sor ldang nus po rnams//ga rnams da ya m+b+ha pa// pUr b+ha/gtso ga zug
437b2(rgyud): rdzogs par bri//'khor rnams phyag rgya dag tu b+h+yo//bol pa dag la yig 'brus zhes gsung po//de yi 'don dkyil 'khor gyi btsun dgod pa'i cho ga'o//de nas bsgrub pa'i dkyil
437b3(rgyud): 'khor la//pre re rgyal mtshan 'phen dang gdugs//pi ljang gling bu brdab pa dang //rdza rnga mu kun rnga chen dang //du rnga ra dang mu tsar dang //dbyangs dang gar dang bzhad pa che/
437b4(rgyud): rol mo'i yo byad ji snyed pas//dga' byed dkyil 'khor dag la brgyan//bum pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi//gser dang dngul las byas pa'o//rigs dang mthun pa'i gos kyis
437b5(rgyud): gris//me tog 'bras bu brgyan pa la//bdud rtsi lnga yi gang byas pa//sman dang rin chen 'bru rnam lngas//gang ba brgyud dam bcu drug gzhag/dkyil 'khor bdag pos
437b6(rgyud): mngon bsngags pa'i//rnam rgyal bum pa de bzhin du//dbus nyid du ni gzhag par bya//yang na bum pa'i sbyin par ro//zla ba nyi ma dri chu dang //btung bar btu sum pa dang
437b7(rgyud): dbang po kun nas 'byung ba rnams//shasung gcig gis rab bsres pas//gang ba'i ngand de bzhin gzhag/zang du byung ba'i gtor ma dgram//de la sogs pa mtha' ma
438a1(rgyud): mchog/ci rigs rnams kyis mdzes par bya//zhes gsung so//de la 'di dag ni 'bor sdud kyis las byung bstan pa'o//de nas sngags pa mnyam bzhag ste/
438a2(rgyud): ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom//gsal ba gnyis med dkyil 'khor du//rang bzhin kun rdzob spyan drangs dang //dbab dang bzhugs dang brtan pa dang //mi
438a3(rgyud): g.yo dam tshig zil gnon dang //phyag 'tshal mchod pa brjod pa dang //gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du//'jug dang dngos grub gsol ba dang //dbang bskur ba yi las
438a4(rgyud): rnams bye//des ni tshe 'di nyid la yang //sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob 'gyur na//dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos zhes gsung so//'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa
438a5(rgyud): glag gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba'i le'u sti bdun pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag
438a6(rgyud): po de chos thams cad lhun gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya las mi 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas phyag rgya dam tshig gi mtshan nyid rnams nyid kyi sku dang gsung
438a7(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //gsang sngags rgya mtsho chen po 'di//phyag brgya bsam yas ji snyed pa//mdor bsdus rnam pa bzhi du 'dus//dang por phyag rgya chen po ste//gnyis
438b1(rgyud): ba dam tshig rgya yin no//gsum pa chos kyi phyag rgya ste//bzhi pa las kyi phyag rgya ste//phyag rgya chen po sku yi chu//rang bzhin chos sku dngos med rgya//bzugs sku mtshan ma'i rgyu zhes
438b2(rgyud): bshad//gzugs sku rang bzhin kun rdzob dang //bsgom dang bskyed pa yin par bshad//gnyis pa'i rgyal gsum yod de//bsgom dang gzung dang bcing ba'o//bsgom pa dam chog
438b3(rgyud): gsungs yin te//gsal ldan ma 'am byin brlab pa'o//gzung ba thubs mtshan nyid gzung ba'o//dam tshig lag rgya bcing bar bshad//yang na so so'i gtso gzung rnams//
438b4(rgyud): sbyor thabs phyag rgya nyid yi no//gsum pa'i rgyal gsum yod//rang bzhin bsgom dang bzlas brjod do//rang bzhin chos kyi phyag rgya ni//chos kyi dbyings rgyal bas gsungs//bsgo
438b5(rgyud): po mtshan ma'i yig 'bru dag/lce stod snying kha mkha' sogs su//mtshan ma'i rnam pa gsal ba'o//rtsa ba bskyed dang bzlas pa yis//snying po tshig brjod bzlas pa'i rgya//
438b6(rgyud): bzhi pa las kyi phyag rgya la//rnam pa gsum du dpa' bos gsungs//bsgom dang 'phro 'du bcing ba'o//las kyi lha yi rnal 'byor gang //bsgom pa sgom pa las kyi rgya//lta
438b7(rgyud): 'og mkha' 'am thugs kha nas//rnam bzhi las kyi 'phro 'du ni//'phro 'du las kyi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya bca' dang stangs tshul rnams//bcing ba las kyi phyag rgya bshad//
439a1(rgyud): lag brgya dam tshig phyag rgya rnams//rang gi sku ru rnam sgoms nas//bcings shing mkha' la rnam dkrol na//sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing //
439a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob 'gyur na//dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos//bdag nyid phyag rgya cher bsgom pa//dbu ni rnam par snang mdzad de//lag g.yas rdo rje sems dpa'i
439a3(rgyud): rgya//lag g.yon rin chen 'byung ldan rgya//rkang pa g.yon pa snang mtha' yas//rkang gi yas las kyi sems dpa'i rgya//yan lag rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bas//bskul bskyod
439a4(rgyud): thams cad phyag rgya yin//sor mo rnams la bsgom bya ba//gung mo gnyis la oM dang laM//mdzub mo gnyis la hUM dang muM//dbang mo gnyis la swa dang maM//chungangu gnyis la oM
439a5(rgyud): dang paM//sbom po gnyis la he dang tAM//g.yas pa'i 'bru gdan nyi ma ste//g.yon pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khoraro//aM dang mu du rtse sbyar te//de bzhin hUM dang lam du sbyar//
439a6(rgyud): ha dang paM yang de bzhin te//aM dang taM du sbyar ba la//rgyab sbyar swa dang mi bsgreng ba//'di ni yab kyi spyi rgya yin//lag pa thal myo sbyor ba las//oM dang muM sbyar hUM dong ni//
439a7(rgyud): lam sbyar swa dang paM du sbyar//aM dang me sbyor haM taM bsgre ngo //yum gyi spyi rgya yin par bshad//rdo rje khu tshur snying khar bcangs//oM bsgreng rtse mor 'khor lo 'bor//rin chen//
439b1(rgyud): d+hA nA rgyas la ga//'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pan//nam par rma ma da phyu ston//don can sam+WAr stong lda ba sa//bdun sa rnams 'angadu
439b2(rgyud): rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril//'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni//bde gshegs dbyings phyug ma yi rgya//rdo rje khu tshur snying khar brtan//hUM bsgreng rtse la rdo rje 'bar//
439b3(rgyud): cheni dril gsil chos la brtan//'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni//rdo rje sems mo'i phyag rgya yin//rin chen khu tshur snying khar brtan//muM bsgreng rtswa la dril gsil 'gro na/
439b4(rgyud): thal mo lnga la 'brel//'dzu ba'i mdangs dang brla pa ni dzaM dbyings phyug phyag rgya yin//rdo rje khu tshur snying khar brtan//sra bsgreng rtse la rin tshan 'bar//rin chen khu tshur snying khar brtan/
439b5(rgyud): 'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni//rin tshon 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yin//rin chen khu tshur snying khar brtan//maM bsgreng rtse la dril gsil 'bar//rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril
439b6(rgyud): 'jim pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni//rin chen dbyings phyug phyag rgya yin//rdo rje khu tshur snying khar brtan//a bsgreng rtse le pad+mo 'bar//rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan//
439b7(rgyud): 'dzus pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni//snang ba mtha' yas phyag brgya yin//rin chen khu tshur snying khangar brtan//paM bsgreng rtse la dril gsil 'bar//rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril/
440a1(rgyud): 'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni//pad+ma dbyings phyug phyag rgya yin//rdo rje khu chur skyong khur brtan//hUM bsgreng rje la ral bri 'bar//rin chen dril gsil
440a2(rgyud): chechos la brtan//'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni//don yod grub po'i phyag rgya yin//rin tshan khu tshur snying khar brtan//taM basbrang rtse la dril gsil 'bar//rdo rje thal mo las
440a3(rgyud): la 'khril//'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni//las kyi dbyings phyug phyag rgya yin/rdo rje khu chur thugs ka naM//rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan//'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis
440a4(rgyud): lta ba ni//lag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya yin//rin chen gar thabs bskor nasu//rdo rje thal mo las la 'khrel//'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa'i tshul//gar gyi phyag rgyar dpa' bos
440a5(rgyud): bshad//rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan//'dzum pa'i mdangs kyi lta ba ni//sa yi snying po'i phyag rgya yin//rdo rje khu tshul bcangs pa ni//sku yi phyag kAr 'dzin pa dang /
440a6(rgyud): 'dzum pa'i madrangs kyis 'dud pa ni//sgeg mo'i phyag rgya yin par bshad//rdo rje ral gri thugs kha na//rin chen dril gsil chol brten//'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lha
440a7(rgyud): ba ni//na mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya yin//rdo rje rin tshan rno rtag gzhag/rin chen phreng ba gzung na su//'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa ni//phreng ba'i phyag rgya yin par grag/
440b1(rgyud): rdorje pad ma thugs kha na//dran chen dril gsol chos la brtan//'dzum pa'i mdangs hUM lta ba nI//spyan ngas pa zigs kyi phyag rgya ldan//rin chen po pang 'dzin pa lnga//rdo rje len par byas nas
440b2(rgyud): ni//'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa ni//dbyangs kyi phyag rgya yin par grags//rdo rje klu shing thugs kha na//rin chen drob go sil chos la brtan//'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba ni/
440b3(rgyud): byams pa me tri'i phyag rgya yin//rin chen bdug spos thugs khar 'dzin//rdo rje las la rab tu 'khril//'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa ni//bdug pa'i phyag rgya yin par bshad/
440b4(rgyud): rdo rje po Ti thugs khor 'dzin//rin chen dril gsol chos la brtan//'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba ni//sgrib pa kun sel phyag rgya yin//rdo rje rin chen rna rtog tu//me tog snad bcas
440b5(rgyud): 'dzin pa la//'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa ni//me tog phyag rgya yin par bshad//rdo rje ud pa la thugs kha na//rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan//'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis
440b6(rgyud): lta ba ni//'jam dpal gyi ni phyag rgya yin//rin chen mang me thugs kha nas//rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril//'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa ni//mar mo'i phyag rgyar dpa' bos
440b7(rgyud): bshad//rdo rje snyim thugs kho na//rin chen dril gsal chos la brten//'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba ni//kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgya yin//rin chen dbyug thugs ka na//dza
441a1(rgyud): rje thal mo las la 'khrul//rdo rje nyug par byed pa ni//dr-i yo phyag rgya yin par bshad//nod mgo gdengs ka gshed pa'i d+d+ha//rdo rje gnod pa stobs pa
441a2(rgyud): tshe//thod sbrul gnan par+t+ta ya rgya//rgya glum gnon pa bdud rtsi 'khyil//'jub gnyis 'khyud pa lcags kyu'i rgyu//'jub gnyis rtse sbrang 'gas pa'i rgyu//'jub gnyis 'khrud
441a3(rgyud): ba laM gu rgyud//bskyod par gyur pa 'bebs ma'o//pi bang len pa lha yi rgyu//mi yi sog par 'dzin pa ste//lha min phyag rgya go che yin//chos kyi dkyil 'khor byol song
441a4(rgyud): rgya//za me tog ne yau dgas rgya//me chu gnyis ni dmyal ba'i rgya//yab kyi spyi rgya kun bzang gi'o//yum gyi spyi rgya bzang mor bshad//yang na kun bzang yab yum gyi//
441a5(rgyud): rdo rje thal mo gnyi su bshad//bde gshegs rnams la rdzogs dkyilo//sems dpa' rnams la sems dpa'i dkyil//'joms dang thub pa langs te bcing zhes gsungs
441a6(rgyud): so//'phabs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa klog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o////de nas smra
441a7(rgyud): ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po he ru ka rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ji lta bu lags pa
441b1(rgyud): bdag cag rnams la byashad du gsol/gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bshad du gsol zhe gsol ba btab pa wa bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des de bzhin gsheg
441b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi khro bo rnam par 'phro ba'i rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/nyid kyi sku khro bo chen por 'du mdzad de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
441b3(rgyud): 'jig rten na dregs pa chen po la sogs pa gdug pa'i dbang du 'gro ba rnams gyur te/khams gsum 'di na/de bzhin go shegs pa gsung rab ze bar ston pa dang /'jug pa dang
441b4(rgyud): bstan pa la gnas shing dkon mchog gsum la 'jug pa ni 'ga' yang med/khros pas gtum po rab tu gdug pa'i sems dang /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gisra bsgreb
441b5(rgyud): pa gtum zhing 'khrug dang /gzhan gyi srob dang sems 'phrog pa dang /mi dge ba bcu'i las kyis nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pas gzhan la gtses pa dang /gcig sha
441b6(rgyud): gcig pi za ba dang /log pa'i lam la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gsum po 'di ba rlag go zhes sngon gyi smon lam la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /gsang ba
441b7(rgyud): mchog gi bdag po chen pos rnam par gzigs nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor klong rnam par 'phro ba 'di phyung //oM badz+ra ma hA tsaN Da sarba duSh+TAn
442a1(rgyud): ka tA na da ha pa tsa/bi shwa kro d+ha dzA ma Na Ta la/phaT phaT phaT ha la ha la/'di phyung ma thag tu khro bo chen po'i mthus khams gsum 'di dag thams cad g.yos/
442a2(rgyud): rab tu g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yos/'ura'ur rab tu 'ur 'u ra/kun tu rab tu'u ra 'u ro//shig shig/rab tu shig shig/kun tu rab tu shig shig/gtor gtor/rab tu gtor
442a3(rgyud): gtor/kun tu rab tu gtor gtor ro//lha dang /gru dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /nam pa' lding dang /srin po la sogs pa rnams 'khrugs pa chen por gyur to//de nas 'jig
442a4(rgyud): pas nyen pa de dag brgya byin la skyabasu song /brgya byin yang 'jigs pas nyin te tshangs pa'i thad du phyin/tshangs pa yang khyab 'jug thad du song /khyab 'jug kyang dbang phyug
442a5(rgyud): chen po'i thad du spong /dbang phyug chen po rang gi mthu yod yod pa ston cing lnga rnams ma skrag/klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin dang /'khor du gtogs pa
442a6(rgyud): rnams ma skrag shig/nga'i mthu 'di la gzhan gang gis kyang brje bar mi nus zhes spo ba sringaso//kra baN+ya byin dang tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug rnams khyod kyang 'jig rten na mthu che/
442a7(rgyud): ba'i chen po yin pas rang rang gi mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ci yod pas rang rang gi 'khor gdug pa de dag dbugs dbyung bar mdzod cig ces bsgo'o//de nas brgya byin dang /tshangs
442b1(rgyud): pa dang /khyab 'jug rnams de ma thag tu rang rang gi mtha ci yod pa ston cing rdo rje'i skad dang gang mo drag po 'byin cing rang rang gi 'khor rnams la ma skrag ma drangangs shig/bdag cag gi
442b2(rgyud): mthu 'di lta bu gzhan gang gis kyang zil gyis gnon par mi nus so zhes spro sring ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po des de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas yum
442b3(rgyud): rngam pa'i kr-i d+hi'i rgyal po mngon par phyung ste/hi haM dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyi rol pa'i dgyes pas thim par mdzad nas/byang chub sems kyi sprin las/phaT phaT badz+ra kro d+ha dz+wA la
442b4(rgyud): maN Da la ha la ha la zhes pas stong gsumo khro bo tshol pas gang bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po nyid no dbu dgu phyag bco brkyang zhabs rnam pa brgyad kyi
442b5(rgyud): rnam par snangango //de nas dgyes te hrIM hUM hUM zhes brjod pas dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad las 'dul ba'i dbang gis dbu gsum phyag drag zhabs bzhir gyur te/khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khrugs
442b6(rgyud): pa'i dkyil na keng rus kyi steng na rnam par gnas//khro bo chel ba de dag gis kyang phyogs bcu'i dregs pa ji snyed pa kun bsgral te slar 'dus nas/la la ni las kyi khrag 'thung chen
442b7(rgyud): por gyur nas brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa bsngal/la la ni rin chen khrag mthung ngu gyur te tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas pa bskal/la la ni pad ma khrag 'thung chen por gyur
443a1(rgyud): sgyu sgyu smra na sa rgyu tu rgyu na ga rdzu du
443b1(rgyud): tshogs dang /'ug pa'o gdong gi chags rnams 'dzin to//de na snga yang na gyes te phaT ces brjod pas byang chub sems las rtag gdong gi tshogs dang /phag gdong gi tshogs da //
443b2(rgyud): seng gdong gA tshogs dang /sbrul gdong gi tshogs mthon nas nyi shu brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa rnamaso rang rang gi gdan ga la ba der yud tsam gyis phyin par phaT ces smos//de'i
443b3(rgyud): tshe 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams na drags pa gang ji snyed yod pa thams cad tshul ji ltar 'dul ba dang /thabs cis 'dul ba sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'dra/
443b4(rgyud): kyis 'dzus 'dul bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo de dag la dregs pa'i tshogs slar gsar gsos shig ces bka' stsal pas/khro bo de dag gis gsol pa/
443b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gso bar gsol zhes pa dang /bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis khro bo de dag gcig tu hUM zhes pas bsdus te/dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad pa'i tshul du rnam
443b6(rgyud): par gnaso//de nas ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po des phyag bcwo brgyad bsnol te btsir bas mi gtsang ba'i 'dam chen por 'khyil to//de nas bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i ting 'dzin la zhugs
443b7(rgyud): nas bdud rtsi 'byung zhes bya ba gnam nas rnam par phyung//oM badz+ra a mr-i ta ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri us+thi tra/badz+ra a mri ta hI a/de nas bro mo bdud rtsi chen mo de smin ma sbyar zhing shin
444a1(rgyud): du rngam pa'i bag pas ru lu ru lu khA hA khA ha zhes bdud rtsir bsgrub te gsol bas gdugs rgyan thaMng snga ma bzhin du rang rang gi lus sos par gyur te/sems dran
444a2(rgyud): nas dpal chen ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po'i sku dbu dgu brgya'i phyag steng brgyad brgya/zhabs brgyad brgyar gau nas shing yab khro bo brgya rtsa brgyad lhun gyis grub par mthong //
444a3(rgyud): 'phra men ma nyi shu'i tshogs kyang shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs rang rang gi stan dong lag char gnas pa mthong nas/shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas zhum po ling ros gsol ba btab
444a4(rgyud): pa/bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams//rngam chen rgyal ba'i 'bang su mchi//'brangasu nan tan ma bgyis na/mgo lus snying yang rul nas ni/btso bsreg gnasu
444a5(rgyud): 'bod sgrogs shog/bdag cag rnams kyi ma dang sring //mchis brang dang ni bu mo rnams//'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhesu gsol//bdag cag rnams kyi mgo bcad la//
444a6(rgyud): 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyan du bzhes//bdag cag rnams kyi snying phyung la//dpal chen nyid kyi zhal du gsol//bdag cag rnams kyi lkugs shus la/dpa' bo chen po sku
444a7(rgyud): la gsol//a la la ho zhes gsol ba btab ste/laM las ni rang gi lus gdan khrir phul/la las ni rang gi 'gro bcad nas 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis zhal bur phul//
444b1(rgyud): las ni rang byi snying phyung nas zhal du gsol/la la ni rang gi lpags pa bshus te sku lta g.yang gzhar gsal to//dbang phyug chen po rnams dpal chen po'i srul sbrul ltar 'khril pas nges
444b2(rgyud): dregs pa'i tshogs rnams kyang shes bya'i sgrib pa byang ste/bden pa mthong nas dam tshig dang ldan par mthong bar gyur te/de'i tshe 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyang rab tu spro ba'i sems kyis
444b3(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du ma dang ldan te/la la ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgyang ma ring du 'phen/la la ni ri rab glad la skor/la la ni nyi zla zhabs 'og gnon/la la ni 'jig rten rnam pa drug
444b4(rgyud): tu g.yo ba la sogs pa'i cho 'phrul rnam pa du ma ston cing a la la zhes pa'i sgra rnam par 'byin to//de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des 'jigs byed tshogs
444b5(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen du//rag ta'i rba rlabs 'khrugs pa'i dkyil//keng rus ri rab 'bar
444b6(rgyud): ba'i steng //me 'bar sreg pa'i klong dkyil na//dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yos khang //tshad dang rgya yongs ma chad pa//phyi nang med par gsal ba'i 'od//'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs
444b7(rgyud): bzhi pa//gru chad par 'khyams bzhis brgyan pa/gru bzhi sgo khyud 'bar bas mdzes//bar 'khyams gnyis ni 'bar bar gsal//nyi zla sbrul dang thod pas
445a1(rgyud): brgyan//khyu mchog dang ni ma he gzig/stag dang gtum thung dom dag gis//sder mos dregs pa brgya byin dang //tshangs pa dbang phyug bzung ba na//
445a2(rgyud): gdan tshan rnams kyang bzung ba'o//dbus su 'jigs byed chen po ni//smug nag chen po 'jigs pa'i gzugs//dbu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad//spyan 'bar ba ni nyi shu bdun/
445a3(rgyud): zhabs brgyad thur du gtams pa'o//rtsub pa'i phyag mtshan skal bar thogs//rdo rje gshog pa phyogs bcur gtams//dur khrod rgyan gyis rab tu bzhugs//btsun mo rngam pa
445a4(rgyud): kro d+hi yang //cha lugs 'jigs byed chen po ltar//de yi phyogs kyi khro bo yang //khrag 'thung rdo rje rin chen dang //pad ma las kyi he ru ka/kun kyang dbu gsum phyag drug ste//zhabs
445a5(rgyud): bzhi dag tu rnam par bgrad//kre d+hi'i tshogs kyis rab tu 'khril//'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mtshan la//dkar mo la sogs ral pa can//rang stan lag char chas te gnas//
445a6(rgyud): phyi rol shar gyi phyogs dag nas//seng gdong la sogs mgo brnyan tshogs//stan dang lag cha de bzhin chas//sgo srungs gdong mo la sogs gnas//rang gi lag mtshan stan dang /
445a7(rgyud): chos//'bar ba'i bar 'khyams gnyis pa la//rdo rje srin po khro bo bcu//hUM chen rnam rgyal dbyug sngon can//gshed po mi g.yo rta mgrin rgyal//gzhan gyis mi thub
445b1(rgyud): bdud rtsi 'khyil//khams gsum rnam rgyal stobs po che//de dag rnams dang gnyis med pa'i//rdo rje srin mo khra mo bcu//rlung 'byin snyoms mo sngar ma dang //dur khrod gtun khung gtum mo dang /
445b2(rgyud): mdo' snyoms sgyu 'byin gaskyed ma dang //sbrul byed rnams kyis rab tu 'khril//kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug ste//zhabs drug rdo rje brag steng sa na//'jig rten skyong bas bdud tshul lo//
445b3(rgyud): dri dag rnams kyis bka' sdod ni//rdo rje 'phro mon gtum bgu can//mcheg shig 'bar ba'i tshogs dang 'khor//sras dang bye mo bran mo dang //ci bgyi lo sogs pho nya'i tshogs
445b4(rgyud): phyi rol myu ran dag la gnas//zhes gsungs pas snang snyid thams cad khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos gsung gi dkyil 'khar
445b5(rgyud): 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung //oM bruM bi shwa bi shud d+he dz+nyA na tsakra b+h+r-i/oM a~M a~M a~M a~M/ba ba bA ba be/dza dz+ra dz+ra dz+r-i dzA/ma ma ma ma ma/hU d+hA tA tA hA/
445b6(rgyud): bababab pa/dadza dza dza dz+ra/dung d+he/badz+ri/din d+mo/karma d+hI/shA hU~M/ra ro //bababababababapa/
446a1(rgyud): dz+wa dzA dzA dz+ra/gan+da ra/tsa'u ri/prA mo hA/be ta li/pu ka sau/gasma ri/sma shA nau/tsaN Da l-i/ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha/ba ba ba bA bA bA bA ba/
446a2(rgyud): dz+wa dz+ra dz+ra dzA dz+wa dz+wa dz+ra dz+wa/sing ha/bya gr-i/sri la/sho na/kri ta/kang ka/kha kha/u lu/mu mu mu mu mu mu mu mu/ka ka ka ka ka ka ka ka/he he he he he he he he/ba ba
446a3(rgyud): ba ba/dz+ra dz+ra dz+ra dr-i/aR+YA te tsa/te da tse/a mo ka/lo ka pasmi pa lA ya/dzaHhU bi hoHba ba ba ba ba bra ba ba ba ba/dz+nyA dz+ra dz+wa dza dz+wa dzA dz+ra dz+ra dz+ra dza/krokr-i kr-i kr-i kA kr-i kro kre kro kr-i/
446a4(rgyud): d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha/hUM ka ra/bi dzA ya/nI la daN Da/ya mAn ta ka/Ar+ya a tsa la/ha ya grI ba/a pa ra tsau ta/a mr-i ta kuN Da li/tri lo ka bi dz+ra yA/
446a5(rgyud): hrId+hUhrIts+tshan+dadz+dza/n+d+ha phaT Ta phaT pAT phaT phan phaT phaT+Ta phaT/kra krak+Sha kr-i kAkr-i k+Shak+Sha~Mkadz+nyAd+had+hId+hi/bas 'o//shi bar
446a6(rgyud): le ni ki/d+haHsbyin pati/mr-i tA la/tsiN+Da TA lI/ya ti/shA ya bA tI/ba ye be/ma raNA/tsun d+hi/d+h+r-idz+dzaHd+hAdz+dzat+ma/phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT
446a7(rgyud): phaT phaT phaT phaT/b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+ya b+h+yo b+h+yAM b+h+yAM b+h+yo/b+hUr+N+Na b+h+yog+h+nAn+d+ha b+hU b+h+yo/N+yA b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+ye b+h+rUM b+hU b+h+yAM/b+h+ye b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yAM b+h+yo b+hU b+h+yAM/ru lu ru l+r-i ruM mu~M hU~M hUM hU~M/phaT phaT phaT/
446b1(rgyud): man thamabamacams sam bcas ma thas/a mkham thasamams thasamam can thamams mamam yamamamatsham thamam pas thamamamamamams yas ka/mas
446b2(rgyud): zhes gsungs pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gsung gi dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'o////'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor
446b3(rgyud): le'i mdo zhes bya ba las 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das rngam po'i rgyal po des stang stabs kyi rnam par
446b4(rgyud): rgyal ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas stang stabs 'di dag nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //chos kun mnyam pa'i ngang rtogs
446b5(rgyud): na//bskul zhing gsogs pa thams cad kun//phyag rgya yin par dpal bos bshad//rang gi lha yi ting 'dzin gyis//stang thabs 'di la gang gnas pa//sangs rgyas nyid kyang
446b6(rgyud): skrag 'gyur na//dregs pa'i tshogs lta smos ci dgos//lag gnyis thal sbyar spyi gtsug bzhag/rkang gnyis mthil sbrad rtse mo bcugs//mgo mtshan rdo rje snying por bsgom
446b7(rgyud): tse gcig rtse gsum rtse lnga dang //rtse dgu bcu gcig rdo rje bsgom//sa steng so kun du 'tshangs byas pa//'jigs byed chen po'i phyag rgya yin//de nyid g.yon gyi phyogs
446b8(rgyud): nas 'chang //'jigs byed ma yi phyag rgya bshad//lag g.yas gung me snying por bya//g.yon pa ban d+ha ltar byas nas//dkrugs nas zhal du gsol ba ni//rdo rje khrag
447a1(rgyud): rmA'abyung b+hag rgyu na//gnas pa gsul ldang nal du//rdza d+ha kun maH//lag pa g.yas pa byu to//gson pa da dmang ga tu 'jug
447a2(rgyud): namatshan khrag /deny-id sbyin lan nan pa//rmu nga d+d+ha /da krisas pa gyur hU~M /
447a3(rgyud): sa// sa / rlung hU~M /nga gas shAldan rnas hU~Mg
447a4(rgyud): gzhan pargyang glu mas ma rgyal//bskumacheng bar dpa' bas bshad//g.yas pa'i khu ra brdungs nas bad+mad//g.yin pa 'dzin pa ltar byas pa//gams
447a5(rgyud): gzhon du lci zhing sgyur//gtsu chags kyi phyag rgya yin//mda' gzhu'i gangs pa'i tshul dunA~M//'di rmugs mi 'gyur sti byed pa//rkun ma'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin/
447a6(rgyud): b.las san rnams pa ni// m-i ma na rlung babyung bar byes//gastan pas 'dzin pa'i ts+tsha mA lta//bla ma'i phyag rgyang po'i bos bshad//
447b1(rgyud): 'dron na/'i tshul//pu ka'i phyag brgyar bshad pa yin//g.yon pa dung khrag 'dzin pA la//g.yas pa 'khrug cing rngam tshul ston//gas ma ri yi phyag rgya yin//g.yon pas byas
447b2(rgyud): pa'i lus mnan nas//g.yas pas snying 'dren za tshul du//sbrel tshul lta bas sma sha'i rgya//g.yas pas mgo bcad phyar nas kyang //g.yon pas lus 'dzin stobs pa ltar//
447b3(rgyud): tsAN+Da Da li yi phyag rgya yin//lag gnyis brang la bsnol nas naM//nga na re thogs ral gamigs pa//seng gdeng tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin//lag gnyis thur du bsngal nas ni//zhing
447b4(rgyud): 'bri chugs mche ba bsnyer//stag gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin//lag gnyis zhing khong kha phye nas//lce yis ldag pa ltar byed na//wa gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin//lag gnyis
447b5(rgyud): zhing khang kha phye nas//'bri tshugs lta ba she na'i rgya//lagro gnyis spu gri thigs tshul du//g.yon pas rgyu ma bzang zhing za//bzhad sdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin//zhing chen phrag la
447b6(rgyud): bkal nas ni//keng rus thogs pa ltar byas pa//dur bya'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya yan//g.yan pa ban d+ha g.yas pa gre/glo skyed 'dzin pa ltar byed pa//khwa khA ma yi phyag rgya yin//g.yas
447b7(rgyud): pa rdo rje khu tshur la//lcags kyu 'dzin pa hu lu'i rgya//'dzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du byas//rta skad mtshar ba ltar byas pa//rta gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin//'dzub gnyis rtse spyang
448a1(rgyud): phag gdong gis//tha rgod rlog pa'i tshul bstan pa//phag gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin//'dzub gnyis lu gu rgyud du 'khyud//seng ge'i tshul du ralnga
448a2(rgyud): gsags pa//seng gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin//lag gnyis rab tu bskyod bya zhing //phyogs bcur lto bar byed pa ni//sbrul gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin//lag pa'i phyag/
448a3(rgyud): rgya bcings byas shing //rkang pa 'jog tshul stabasu mchong //g.yas pa'i sdog 'dzub na mkhar 'phyar//g.yon pa ku ru brten pa ni//druM ka ra yau phyag rgya yin//lag pa gal+la
448a4(rgyud): pa sder mo ro gdeng//g.yon pa 'dzin pa rnam rgyal rgyu//g.yas kyi sor mo dbyug par brkyang //g.yon pa gar thabs skor byed pa//dbyug sngon can gyi phyag rgya yin//g.yas
448a5(rgyud): pa'i khu tshur na mkhar 'phyar//g.yon pas gru mo brten pa ni//g.yas po'i gung 'dzub srin lag brkyang //mthe'u chung mthe bos mnan par bya//g.yon pa'ang de
448a6(rgyud): bzhin shugasu byA//mi g.yo ral gri'i phyag rgya yin//lag gnyis mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud//lhag ma lu rgyur bcangs pa las//dpal ba'i thang kor bzung ba ni//rta mchog
448a7(rgyud): dpal gyi phyag rgya yin//lag gnyis khu tshur mdun du bcangs//zhags pa'i tshul du dngas pa ni//gzhan gyis mi thub phyag rgya yin//lag gnyis khu tshur gyen du bsnol/
448b1(rgyud): dril bu bsil tshul bdud rtsi 'khyil//lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur phyar//rdeg pa'i stabs byas pa ni//khams gsum rnam rgyal phyag rgya yin/lag gnyis khu tshur thur du brkyang //
448b2(rgyud): gnon pa'i stabasu bgrod pa ni//stobs po che yi phyag rgya yin//gyad kyi nor stabs tshul du gnas//stobasu 'chang pa khro bo'i rgyu//srin mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni//rkang lag gar
448b3(rgyud): thabs bskor ba yin//yang na khro bo'i phyag rgya las//g.yas g.yon zlog pa yin par gsungs//ci bgyid bka' nyan phyag rgya ni//g.yas g.yon sor mo drag sprugs pa'o//zhes
448b4(rgyud): gsungs//'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las 'jigs byed rnams kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//
448b5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des bsnyen bsgrub rgyun gyi tingange 'dzin lo snyoms par zhugaso//zhugs nas kyang bsnyen bsgrub zab mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di dag
448b6(rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //bsnyen bsgrub yan lago bsam yas kyang //dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad la//rnal 'byor 'jug pa'i don gyi phyir//mdor
448b7(rgyud): bsdus rnam pa bzhir bshad//thog mar bsnyen pa yin par bshad//gnyis pa dag ni nye bsnyen pa//gsum pa bsgrub pa zhesu brjod//tha ma bsgrub chen po zhes bya//bye brag tu/
449a1(rgyud): ni shes byas la//de nas las rnams brtsam par bya//bsnyen bsgrub bye brag shes bya zhing //de la gnas pa rab tu gces//de dag mi shes mi gnas pas//
449a2(rgyud): bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te//las rnams brtsams kyang don med 'gyur//de bgi nan tan bskyed de bya//bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin rab sbyor bas//byang chub sems ni shes
449a3(rgyud): par bya//nye bar bsnyen pa la gnas pas//bdag nyid phyag rgya chen por bsgom//de yang gsang sngogs bdag po nyid//rig ma bskyed dang bskul bya bo//bsgrub pa zhes su
449a4(rgyud): rgyal bas gsungs//thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba las//rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gsungs//gang yin rdo rje 'grub 'gyur ba//bsgrub pa chen po zhes su bya//byang chub
449a5(rgyud): sems zhes bya ba yang //dam pa'i don gyi sems yin te//chos rnams thams cad dngos med pas//rang gi sems kyis shes bya ba//bsnyen pa'i dam tshig yin par gsus/
449a6(rgyud): bdag nyid phyag rgya chen po ni//sngags kyi bdag po'i cha lug su//ting 'dzin nan tan khugs par bsgom//thams cad lha'i rang bzhin la//bdag nyid lha yi mtshan nyid de//
449a7(rgyud): phyag rgya bzhi dang rnams ldan par//shes pa nye bsnyen dam tshig yin//rig ma bskyod dang bskul bya ba'i//rten du bya ba shes rab ma//mtshan ldan bkra shis gsang ba'i
449b1(rgyud): gzungs//b+ha ga gsang ba'i pad+ma ni//rgyal ba rnams kyi pho brang ste//'dus pa'i sangs rgyas byung ba'i gnas//slad kyis byon pa gshegs pa'i shul//da ltar sangs rgyas bzhugs pa
449b2(rgyud): rtend/rnal 'byor ngo la de ltar snang //ma rtags pa la 'khor ba'i lam//sgrub pa rnams kyi bsrub pa'i rten//rnal 'byor can gyis shes par bya'o//chen po lngas bsdus thams cad
449b3(rgyud): kun//de nas yum du gnas mod kye//mtshan ma bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pa//bsgrub phyir rigs kyi dbye ba bya//smin ma'i sgras ring lag sor phra//tshigs pa zlum la rkad skabs byed//
449b4(rgyud): phra bshad ud dpal ngang ldang zhing //so dkar sgra 'jam mthon 'thil 'khril//mig kyang zar mya'i me tog 'dra//sgra mtshams 'khyug la mdog kyang gsal//sna bzang ske rang sems
449b5(rgyud): ma 'dra//lus drang nu ma'i dkyil na mtho//khong dril 'gro na 'jab pa 'dra//skad ni dang pa'i rgyal po 'dra//ci yang mdzes pa'i stabs ldan pa//spyi'i rigs dang mchin du bshad//bzhin
449b6(rgyud): dbyibs sogs ka mdog kyang dmar//mig rings chags rab tu dam//sa la shel chags ko ko 'dra//lus la zhim pa'i dri 'byung ba//pad+ma tsan zhes bya bar bshad//zla ba'i mngangs
449b7(rgyud): lhor dkaral gsal//gtsug phud g.yas 'khril skad kyang che//bong chung lus mdzes tshig tu spyan//dung ltar lus bzhin g.yas 'khril//dung can ma zhes bya bar grags//'dod pa/
450a1(rgyud): tshe la brtul shugs che//shes pa gsal la byang bzhin yangs//bu mo mig mangs ma ru bshad//smras pa'i brda dang thabs la mkhas//phyi nang rlung khur
450a2(rgyud): gser ltar lci//bsdig cing kun gyis drod mi lonaHdon la gzhol la rtog pa medaHzla gsang dkar dmar rlung khar lci//rigs dang mtshan du bshad pa yin//sgra ni mthon ting
450a3(rgyud): lhung lor bshad//srid du ring la phra la ldem//lcug phran mang pa 'dab rgyas pa//ljon pa ma zhes bshad pa yin//phra zhing bsha na la bzangs ring ba//bcu gnyis nyi shu
450a4(rgyud): lnga'i bar//mu la rag ta 'dzag pa la//rdo rje mtshon gyis ma phob paHlcug phran ma yi rig su bshad//sor mo gru bzhi sgra yang kham//smin tshogs che zhing mig kyang 'bur//
450a5(rgyud): 'gram rlung ring la sgra mtshams dma'aHsha mdog che zhing rna ba ring //ba lang can zhes bya bar bshad//bzhin mdog gru gsum kha dog nag/skra rtsub shel la khro gnyer
450a6(rgyud): mang //ri mo can zhes bya bar bshad//skye rgyud med cing bkra mi shis//gcig pur 'dug pa gdong gcig ma'o//yan lag thams cad mes tshig bzhin//gtan du 'phel
450a7(rgyud): ba'i rgyu med pa//me rog ma'i rigasu bshad//gzhan yang lha 'am lha min nam//gnod sbyin srin po la sogs pa//mdor na 'jig rten khams rnams na//mo yi rigs
450b1(rgyud): can gang yang rung /ming du 'ong dang mi 'ong rnams//dngos grub sgrub pa'i rten yin te//thugs rje'i yul bas kun snyoms bya'o//de drag gang rnyed byin gyis brlab//de yi spyi bo gtsug
450b2(rgyud): tu ne//zla dkyil mi las kun bzang mo//snying khar zla dkyil l-i bsams te//yangs pa'i spyan du bsgom par bya//lce ljongs zla dkyil yi gye pi//gos dkar ma yi lte ba li/
450b3(rgyud): zla dkyil maM las ma ma ki/yan lag bzhi yi dkyil 'khor la//ti las sgrol ma'i phyag rgyar gsal//lagro g.yas lcags kyu'i sku ru sgom//lag g.yon dril bu lcags sgrog
450b4(rgyud): kha//zhags pa pad+ma dag la'o//rdo rje la ni yab rnams sgom//de ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang //b+ha ga'i dbyib su me ri bsgom//byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du las//lhag pa'i ting 'dzin
450b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sgom//gsal ldan ma 'am byin rlabs bya'o//mtshan ldan shes rab de nyid laHrin chen sna tshogs rgyan du gdags//gser gyi rna cha gdu bu dang //do shal dpung
450b6(rgyud): rgyan se mo do//'jam zhing gsal bar byas pa yis//chos gos lnga dang ldan par bya//a ka ru dang du ru ki/dri spos rtsen dran sbyar ba yi//khrus kyi cho ga dag par bya//dri zhom byug
450b7(rgyud): pas lus la byug/rdzas kyi chu dang rdzas sbyar bas//nang yang dag pa'i khrus bya'o//de nam byang chub sems bskyed de//mi dmigs don la sems sbyar phyir//skye med byang chub
451a1(rgyud): soms kyadan//rgya tshor rab tu ba shud par bya//shA skyed b+hakar+b+ha dul 'khor du//snyun gyis sgrub par yod na s+yA d+ha//don sa bskal ba sh+tsa
451a2(rgyud): phyir//gsang ba'i badz+ra yis bsre bar bya//sa ma ya ho zhes brjod ni//sa ma ya stim zhes pas byas/ra ga~M ya mi zhes brjod na/rA ho ho zhes kyang nI byA/ti pA su ga
451a3(rgyud): zhes brjod na//gan de tsi ta zhes pas mtshon//a ti pra ho zhes brjod na//pra tI pu to zhes pas mtshon//g.yas pa smin ma bskyod nA ni//g.yon pa'i sprin mos de bzhin
451a4(rgyud): mtshan//de bzhin brda' sna tshogs pas bsre'o//de nas bsgral bar bya ba ni//shes rab nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis//thabs mtshig zla ba'i 'od zer la//bskul ba'i cho ga 'diska /
451a5(rgyud): migaya mchog gi rgyal po dgongasu gsol//rnam par rtog bral shin du dri med sgra//'od zer zla rgyas 'dra ba'i mdangs ldan zhal//dgyes pa'i rol pa'i don la gshegs kyi
451a6(rgyud): gsol//thabs mchog zla ba'i 'od zer gyis//shes rab nyi ma'i 'od zer la//bskul ba'i tshi ga 'di skad do//'byor lhan yang 'ong rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dbyings//shes rab za
451a7(rgyud): mo rnam dag pad+ma'i mdangs//rdzu 'phrul babs la mkhas pa'i spyod mchog ma//'byor ldan yid 'ang tshe 'phru lo sna tshogs ston//ho nyi ma'i zer gyis bskul ba//e mar
451b1(rgyud): bA dbya'i zla 'bru'//'dzum pa'o mdungs kyis 'bul logs na//dgyes pa'ordo rje rab bskur nas//byang chub sems sbyin dbab tu gsol//zla ba'i 'od zer rnaMs bskul gru
451b2(rgyud): e me'//'od zer dga' ste yid 'ong ma//sems 'phreng gdung ba'i shes rab gzung //ge'u 'khril ba'i pad+ma la//rdo rje ba ba'i byang chub 'bar//A la la ho//de nas gnyis
451b3(rgyud): med pa de mchog sems//sangs rgyas sbyin gyi tshogs chen lo//dgyes mnyam mchog gi mchod pa 'bul//grub pa nyi zla'i snying po de//rnal 'byor rdo rje chen pos blang //'dra drug
451b4(rgyud): sems can bag chag bsreg/zhi ba'i mtha' la shi ba bslang //phyogs bcu'i rnal 'byor thugs dam bskul//de ltar bya ba'i dam tshig ni//bsgrub pa yin par rgyal bsdu
451b5(rgyud): gsungs//de dag dngos grub thob pa'i rgyu//rig pa'i dam tshig bsgoms pa'i lam//sngags kyi bdag po bdag 'grib ste//gang yin las la 'jug nus pa'i//dam tshig
451b6(rgyud): sgrub po chen po yin zhes gsungs//'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rnam pa glog gi 'khor mo'i mdo zhes bya ba las/bsnyen bskyeb rnam pazhi bshid pa'i le'u sa
451b7(rgyud): gnag pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog zhe bdan po des 'dod pa thams cad rab tu bsgrub ze'i sprin dkod pa zhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin la
452a1(rgyud): par zhugs nas/bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid la dngos grub kyi bye brag 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje lus phyung//de la 'di ni phra mo'i ting 'dzin la bsgrub
452a2(rgyud): pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi//thams cad mkhyen pa bsgrub pa'i phyir//rang sems shin tu sbyangs pas na//phra mo'i dngos grub bsgrub pa gces//rab tu dben
452a3(rgyud): pa'i gnas dag tu//bdag nyid na mkha'i dbus su ni//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o//rang gi lhar no rang bsgoms nas//phra mo'i sbyor ba kun du brtsam//rin chen rgyu las
452a4(rgyud): grub pa yi//brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du//so so'i gsung gi yig 'bru rnams//che chung yungs kar 'bru tshong tsam//snying kha'i dkyil du gsal ba las//hUM gis
452a5(rgyud): khang du drangs nas ni//khong nas kha ru byung bar bsam//hU~M gi dbugs la zhon nasu//sna yi rtse mor byung ba dang //sA rje nyid du gsal bar bsgom//ting 'dzin gsal bar khugs
452a6(rgyud): pa dang //sna yi rtse nas na mkha' la//je ring je ring phaT kyis spro//ring du spro ba goms pa dang //'od dang bcas pa'i yig 'bru des//phyogs bcur gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi//
452a7(rgyud): gsung gi yi ge ji snyed pa//dbyar gyi sprin spung 'dus pa bzhin//hU~M gis snying kha nyid du bsdu//yungs kar 'bru tshod de nyid la//stong gsum 'jig rten kun bcug kyang //de/
452b1(rgyud): man mamamamab camasas nam macas ma byabya/a ma mtha thas mamamathasatsham can tham thams thamamam nyam am kham mam yang thamamatha tham byamaman nyam/mtshan mas/Sha ka/mas ma ma
452b2(rgyud): yo nang du sa lo gsal//sngags kyis brtags pa'i lha rnams kyis//gnas su'ang de nyid gsal bar bsgom//de lta'i 'gro 'du yang dang yang //goms par na nus dag tu bya//de ni gsung gi
452b3(rgyud): phra mor bshad//so so'i gsung gi yig 'bru las//phyag mtshan nyungs dkar tsam du gsal//snying kha nyid du gsal bas nas//rgyal po'i pho brang 'dus kyi bar//gong ma'i go rims
452b4(rgyud): de yos bya//de ni thugs kyi phra mor bshad//so so'i thun mtshams gsal ba las//rang rang lha yi rnam par gsal//thugs khar yungs kar 'bru tshod tsam//gong ma'i tshul du bya
452b5(rgyud): bar bshad//de ni sku yi phra mo yin//de ltar lha tshogs ma lus par//rims kyi sku yang na cig char ro//cig char bsgom pa shin tu dka'//bde gshegs rgyal ba sangs rgyas kyi//
452b6(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen po'i spyod yul min//rnal 'byor can gyis rims kyis ni//gtso nas 'khor gyi bar dag tu//yang nas yang du gsal bar bsgom//'di dag bsgoms pa'i
452b7(rgyud): yon tan ni//sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par nges//thams cad mkhyen pa bsgrub pa'i mchog/sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor kun//'di las 'byung bar gdon mi za//'di thos
452b8(rgyud): dngos grub gzhan rnams kun//bsgrub mi dgos par grub pa yin//rnal 'byor can gyis bsgom byas na//zla ba drug gis nges par 'grub//za su bshad ci za ba 'am//sha
453a1(rgyud): rnams zos na 'grub pa yin//zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni rdo rje mi snang ba bsgrub pa'i thab so//dgon par gnas samA ri bo dben//me tog 'bras bu
453a2(rgyud): rgyas pa ru//rang gi lus ngag sems rdo rje'o//snying khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la//'jam dpal sa bon mam du bsgom//bdag lus dang ni zla ba dang //mi rnams rim par
453a3(rgyud): je zhi la//steng pa nyid kyi rnam pa las//snying rje mi dang zla ba las//rdo rje 'jam pa'i phyag rgya bsgom//lus dang ngag sems rdo rje las//rdo rje 'jam pa rab 'phros pas//
453a4(rgyud): 'jam dpal nyid dang 'dri bar 'gyur//dpag tshad brgya'i khyon tsam du//rdo rje 'jam pa'i 'od dang bcas//rgyan rnams kun gyis legs brgyan pa'i//'jam dpal nyid du
453a5(rgyud): kun gyis mthong //mngon shes ldan pa'i lha rnams kyis//lus kyi rnam pa mthong mi 'gyur//de nas slar ni bsdus pa las//thugs ka'i mi la thim bsams na//mchog//
453a6(rgyud): tu shes rab rno ba dang //mkhyen rab kun gyi bdag por 'gyur//thams cad mkhyen pa'ang thob 'gyur na//'jig rten shes bya smos ci dgos//zhes gsungaso//de la 'di
453a7(rgyud): ni rdo rje rig 'dzin bsgrub pa'i thab so//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus dag tu//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas su//rang nyid gang 'dod lhar bsgoms te//sku gsung thugs
453b1(rgyud): byin brlabs pa'o//dam rdzas bdud rtsi rnam lnga la//sradang dam b+hi rai lu bya//lcags gsum ga'ur bcug nas na//khar bcug rang gi snying po las//rab tu goms par 'dre byas na//
453b2(rgyud): gang 'dod rigs 'dzin gdon mi zo//mtha' yas zhing khams thams cad kyi//rdul rnyed bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun//de yi rjesu 'brang bar 'gyur//de la sogs te mtha' yas
453b3(rgyud): mchog ces gsung so//yang na rang gi phyag rgya ste//nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus dag tu//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng du ni//bdag nyid gang 'dod ltar sgoms pa//rang gi phyag rgya brnyan
453b4(rgyud): mar bya//lag tu thogs la rang rigs sngags//bzlas na rigs 'dzin gang yin 'gyur//rang gi lha ni gang yin pa'i//yon tan dag ni de thob 'gyur//zhes gsungaso//de la
453b5(rgyud): 'di ni rdo rje lnga dang lha mo dgug pa'i cho ga'o//shing gcog drung ngam bzhi mdo 'am//mtshan ma gcig dang zhi gnas su//bdag nyid btso bzung ldan byas nas//sku gsung thugs kyi
453b6(rgyud): bdag nyid bsam//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las//lag na kyo ba thogs pa yi//sprul pa bsam yas 'phro bar bya//dza yA ra NA phaT//gang dgug lha 'am bud med dam//yaM las
453b7(rgyud): rlung gis bteg bsams te//kye bas gdan nam snying ka nas//bzung ste hUM gis bsdus byas na//sangs rgyas grags pa chen po yang //rang dbang med par khugs 'gyur na//'jig
454a1(rgyud): rten du ma smras tsa dkris//gang 'dod las da pyod bar 'gyur zhes gsungs//de ni 'di na rdo rje lho bsgrub pa'i za //dag nyid sngags kyi sgros bu /
454a2(rgyud): rdo rje'i skur ni rab bsgoms te//l-I lA pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du//rdo rje'i sbyor bas d+d+hi du bsam//de las rdo rje gdung du gyur//bsam yas aM gI 'phro 'du las//sangs rgyas
454a3(rgyud): gsung dang sems can ngag/bdag gi lho la 'dus pa ru//yang nas yong du goms par bsdu//'jig rten tshig gom chos kyi sgra//ngag brjod bden zhing nyan pa dang //brdzun
454a4(rgyud): dang phra ma tshig rtsub sogs//ngag gis nyes pa ci brjod kyang //lce grib spangs par gdon mi za//zhes gsung so//de la 'di ni sha rnam pa lnga'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thab so//bdag nyid
454a5(rgyud): lus ngag sems rdo rje//rdo rje gsum du rnam par bsgom//mtshan dang dper byad yang dag ldan//ye shes dam tshig snying khar bsgom//dbu rgyan rdo rje gsal bar bya//sha chen
454a6(rgyud): dag ni thams cad la//sa bon oM gyis rnam par sbyang //srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi//shwa chen ji snyed yod pa kun//AM gyis 'phro 'dus bsdus nas ni//spyad che
454a7(rgyud): bdag la thim par bsgom//glang po dag gi sha rnams la//hUM lce'i dam tshig rdo rje la//rdo rje can gyis hU~M du bsgom//ye shes lnga'i sbyor ba yis//zos na dam tshig sgo gas
454b1(rgyud): thugs//rdo rdobab par ga na ma sa//b+hag da ma stobs 'phru//gas rnams de las na//thang po dgag sha rnamam+b+ha la// sa rA m+b+ha t+ya//sa rnam na shes
454b2(rgyud): bru~M 'gyur//d+hA sha dag ni thams padu'o// 'gro 'dur ba sgyu mit+ta//dz+has nA mI snang kun gyi mtsha sha dag ni rnams dul//trai li 'bru' ba m+b+ha s+'un+tu/
454b3(rgyud): dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma kun//yid bzhin nor bu lta bur 'o gyur//gnyis kyi dkri yang mong la 'joms//bya ya sha ni thams cad la//oM gyi 'phro 'dus sbyar byas te//cho ga bzhin
454b4(rgyud): du zos na ni//sangs rgyas kun gyi longs spyod 'phro//mthu chen kun gyis bu mo yang //spyod par 'gyur ba gdon mi za//zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni rdo rje mngon par shes pa lnga bsgrub
454b5(rgyud): thab so//rab tu dben pa'i gnas dag tu//bdag nyid rnam pa kun ldan pa'i//sngags kyi lus su rnam sbyangs nas//mig gi dbang po thams cad la//yig 'bru lnga yis rab sbyangs
454b6(rgyud): te//'od zer lngar ni 'phro ba las//sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi//mig gi mngon shes kun bsdus nas//dbang po de la thim pa dang //zos sam mig la rtags bslus ma
454b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi//spyod yul ji snyed yod pa kun//shing thogs lag tu bzhag pa bzhin//rdo rje mig gis gsal bar mthong //cho ga gong ma'i rtsol gyis ni//rno ba'i
455a1(rgyud): dbang po thams cad la//sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi//rna ba'i mngon shes kun bsdus nas//zas sam rna ba'i nang bzhag na//sangs rgyas spangs//
455a2(rgyud): can thams cad kyi//sgra rnams thams cad ji snyed pa//rna ba'i drung du 'dod pa bzhin//snying gi bye brag thams cad la//sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi//dran pa'i mngon
455a3(rgyud): shes kun bsdus nas//zos sam snying khar bzhag na ni//sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi//thugs dang sems kyi rgyud dag ni//mkhyen cing rig pa kun shes 'gyur//
455a4(rgyud): yum gyis mkha' las byung ba yi//rag ta dag ni thams cad la//sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi//gnas rnams ma lus kun bsdus na//zos sam snying khar gzhag na
455a5(rgyud): ni//sngon gyi gnas kyi gtan tshigs rnams//zhag gsum lon bzhin gsal bar 'gyur//snying khar ye shes sems dpa' bsgom//phyogs bcur gnas pa'i sangs rgyas rnam/
455a6(rgyud): bkug nas de dag rdzu 'phrul rnams//phrogs nas snying khar bsdu byas na//sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyi//rdo rje rdzu 'phrul thams cad kun//'grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/
455a7(rgyud): zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni rdo rje bsrung ba bsgrub pa'i thabaso//sku gsung thugs ni rnam bsgoms la//snying khar nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor las//khro bo 'od kyis phreng ba yis//
455b1(rgyud): /bsrung bar bya ba'i zug rngu rnams//phyung ste med par bsams nas ni//lha rnams dag ni thams cad kyi//phyag rgya dgu ni thams cad dam//yang nardo d+hA N+ya bra ma 'am//rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya
455b2(rgyud): yis//lus dang ngag sems rab bsrungs na//sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi tshugs na//phal pa rnams kyis smos ci dgos//zhes gsungaso//las 'od sbyar bar bya ba yang //ljongs sam
455b3(rgyud): grong khyer gong dag tu//sngags kyi bdag po rab gnas la//nad kun spong ba'i las 'di bya//rdo rje rtse lnga 'od 'phro ba//bskal pa'i me bzhin bsams nasu//spros pas nad rnams
455b4(rgyud): bsregs nas ni//slar yang rdo rje nyid la bsdu//de nas rdo rje de nyid las//'od zer ser po spos pa yis//nad rnams gtong ba'i gnas de dag/bskal pa yun du gang bsams te/
455b5(rgyud): gom par yang dang yang bsams na//nad rnams thams cad sel bar byed//de na 'khod pa'i skye bo rnams//sprul pa'i bde ba thob par 'gyur//bde gshegs rnams kyis byin gyis
455b6(rgyud): rlab//tshe ring las 'tsho bde bar 'gyur//zhes gsung so//de la 'di ni zhi ba bsgrub pa'i thab so//rab tu dben zhing nyams dga' bar//rnam par snang mdzad bsgom pa ni//na mkha'
455b7(rgyud): dbus su zla ba la//dkyil 'khor zlum po bsams nasu//rnam par snang mdzad dkyil 'khor bskyed//snying khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la//bud d+ha li tsa'i snying po bsam//de las lnga
456a1(rgyud): ma'i skur spros pas//mkha' dbyangs yongasu gang bar bskum//slar 'dus 'ad kyi thig khor gas la//de nyid bdag gi lus la dbab//bdag gi baspu'i bugs/
456a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas sprin chen rab 'phros te//'dod pa'i lus nang gang bar bya//sangs rgyas sprin gyis de lus la//dbang bskur ba ni rab tu stsol//de yis skad ces de'i tshe//drag pa gtum/
456a3(rgyud): po'ang lhan ner 'gyur//zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni rgyus bI bsgrub pA \u0f7f'o//na mkha'i dbusu zla ba la//chos kyi sems dpa' bsgom par bya//snying khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la//
456a4(rgyud): gos dkar can gyi snying po bsam//de las gos dkar nyid 'phros pas//mkha' dbyings yongasu gang bar bsgom//de las 'od kyi gong bu ni//gru bzhi lam par gsal bar bsdu//
456a5(rgyud): ba spu rnams kyi bu gnas//rin chen sprin chen rab spros pas//rdo rje cho su bsgoms na su//'dod par bya ba'i lus nang dgang //yang nas yang du 'di byas na//bar snang ci 'dod rgyas
456a6(rgyud): bar 'gengs//nor bu rin chen bzhin 'drar 'gyur//dgos pa phra mo smos ci dgos//zhes gsungs//de la 'di ni rdo rje dbang du bsdu ba bsgrub pa'i thab so//rdo rje dkyil 'khor zla
456a7(rgyud): gram ni//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus bsam//rdo rje chos mchog gzugasu bsam//snying khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la//nyid kyi snying po bsam par bya//rgyal ba sras da
456b1(rgyud): bcas rnams kyi//mkha' dbyings thams cad gang bar bsgom//'od zer sna lnga 'phros pa yis//'dod pa la ni dbab par bya//de nas bsdus te bdag nyid kyis//sku gsung thugs kyi byin
456b2(rgyud): bsdus na//sangs rgyas nyid kyang dbang 'dun//'gro ba dbang med smos ci dgos//zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni drag po bsgrub pa'i thab so//nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbusu ni//nyi ma'i dkyil
456b3(rgyud): 'khor steng du ni//khros pa'i gzugs rnams bsgoms bya ste//bsgril ba'i me dpung 'phros pa las//khros pa'i rdo rje srin po dang //sna tshogs lnga dang bya reg dang //bya rgod khyi la sogs pa'i//
456b4(rgyud): 'phra men bsam yas mi zad pas//mkha' dbyings gang bar bsgoms na su//sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed na//dngos sam yid na bsams nas kyang //mtshon cha thogs pa de dag gi/
456b5(rgyud): snying dang nang grol dbang po kun//drangs te zos par rab bsgoms na//dgra rnams 'chi bar nges pa ste//de ltar rab tu bsgoms na ni//rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin pa yang //zla ba phyed kyis
456b6(rgyud): mchi 'gyur na//dam tshig nyams pa smos ci dgos//zhes gsung so//de lnga 'di ni skye 'gro 'dul ba'i phur bu bsgrub pa'i thab so//sdig pa byed dam gnod byed pa//rdo rje phur bus gdu
456b7(rgyud): bar bya//dur khrod gnas sam rkang gcig tu//bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'am ka li 'am//gang yang rung bar gnas byas la//rdo rje phur bu rab tu bsgom//me stag 'phro ba'i 'od 'phro ba/
457a1(rgyud): rI rab gling bzhi'i gzugs byas la//rang gi sngags kyis gdab par bya//de ltar rab tu grad ba byas na//'gro dang mi 'gro thams cad kun//dul bar gyur du
457a2(rgyud): gdon ma za/zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni gzhan gyi rag sngags gnan pa bsgrub pa'i thab so//nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus ni//dbang chen dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas ni//las kyi
457a3(rgyud): sems par bdag gnas la//g.yas pa rdo rje rtse lnga bzhag/rig sngags byed pa bsams nas ni//las kyi rdo rje'i rkang pa dag/de yi spyi nas mnan par bsgom//rig sngags
457a4(rgyud): nyid kyang mnan par bsam//des ni mu stegs can dag dang //phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kun//mnan par 'gyur te the tsom med//ces gsungaso//de la 'di ni gzhan
457a5(rgyud): gyi dpung mnan pa bsgrub pa'i thab so//na mkha' dbyings kyi dbusu ni//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//gzhan gyis mi thub khro bo che//pad+ma dmar ser mdog 'dra ba//
457a6(rgyud): shin tu rje zhing brjid par bsgom//pha rol dmag dpung 'og dag tu//rlung dang mtsho dang sa skyed pa//de la gnas pa'i dpung rnams kyis//steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam//
457a7(rgyud): de steng rdo rje rgya gram gyi//steng du ri rab rnam par bsgom//sangs rgyas dpung rnams gnon par nus//ma rgyal dpung la smos ci dgos//zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni dga'i dpung
457b1(rgyud): rmongs par bya ba bsgrub pa'i thabs//dgra 'am dpung gi gzugs brnyan dag/bsams sam gzugasu byas nas ni//rdo rje phur bu chad ldan la//d+hu las khro bo'i skur bskyed nas//rang gi rag
457b2(rgyud): sngags rab bzlas te//snying khar btab par rab bsgoms nas//khros pa byas na sangs rgyas kyi//dpung yang myos par gdon mi za//zhes gsung so//de la 'di ni tshul 'byang ba med pa
457b3(rgyud): bsgrub pa'i thab so//nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbu su ni//sngags kyi bdag po rab tu bsgom//chu yi steng ni thams cad du//sangs rgyas dag gis gtams par bsgom//steng nas dal gyis
457b4(rgyud): btsog par bsam//sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyi//spyi bo'i steng du rkang pa bsgom//de ltar rab tu bsgoms pa dang //sa la 'gro bzhin nus par 'gyur//zhes gsungaso//de la 'di
457b5(rgyud): ni thogs med rlung gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thab so//na mkha' rdo rje dbus ni//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//lha'i rnal 'byor sgom par bya//'og gi phyagasu yAM lngas ni/
457b6(rgyud): rlung gis rab tu brtag par bsgom//de ltar rab tu sgom byas na//mkha' la bya bzhin 'gro bar nus//zhing khams kun tu bgrod par 'gyur//zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni nyi ma gsal
457b7(rgyud): bi zhes bya ba'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thab so//sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi//snying khar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam//de las 'od du 'phros pa las//mun pa'i gnas rnams gsal
458a1(rgyud): bar nges//zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni rlung bcad pa bsgrub pa'i thab so//bdag nyid rlung gi phyogs song la//skyegs bu gru bzhi lhum par bya//smras kyi thig
458a2(rgyud): le bdun byas te//yi las rlung bdun bskyed par bya//rlung lha dgug par byas na su//khaM bor gyis ni dgab byas te//de steng laM las raM rab bsgom/ri rab rtse la khro bo ni//'bab pa
458a3(rgyud): dag gis mnan par bsgom//des ni 'jigs pa'i rlung rnams kyang //bcings par 'gyur bar gdon mi za//zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni char dbab pa'i thab so//na mkha' dbyings kyi
458a4(rgyud): dbusu ni//pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsgom//dbusu khro bo stobs po che//'dab ma la ni klu brgyad po//bsgoms sam yang na bris kyang rung //khro bo'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis ni//glu
458a5(rgyud): rnams rab tu mnan nasu//hUM gnyis bar du glu rnams kyi//snying po spel cing gzir nas//klu rnams gnas pa'i sa phyogs//hUM zhes bya ba bzlas brjod bya//khro bos mnan pas
458a6(rgyud): klu rnams kyi//khwa nAs chur pa skyugs bsamos ni//'jig dus lta bu'i char pa'ang 'bab ces gsungs//de la 'di ni cher pa dang sor ba gcad pa'i thob so//nam mkha'i dbyings
458a7(rgyud): kye dbus ni//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//rta mchog dpal ni rnam par bsam//nyi ma'i mdog 'dra 'od bzang zhal//nam mkha' khyab par rnam par gdas/
458b1(rgyud): oM sto du hU~M bzhag ste//mi ra 'ang dang bcas pa yis//char chus glang ba'i sbyin rnams kun//rkam zhing lce yis blangs bsams na//skam par 'gyur bar gdan mi za//yang na lce/
458b2(rgyud): stengs de nyid du//yam las rlung du bsgoms nas ni//bus pas sprin rnams gtor bar 'gyur//yang nr-i ral gri'i phyag rgya yis//char sprin dang ni klu'i gzugs//bcad cing du mi
458b3(rgyud): buMr btub bsams te//hUM zhes bya ba'i sdig 'dzub kyis//bsdus te rang rig sngags bzlas na//'jigs pa'i char che de rnams kyang //skad cig ni ni med par 'gyur//zhes gsungaso//
458b4(rgyud): de la 'di ni bgegs bsngal ba'i thab so//na mkha'i dbus su nyi ma yi//dbusu khro bo rnams bsgom pa//mi g.yo mgon po'i phyag rgya che//rig pa mang pos bskor ba'o//rang rig
458b5(rgyud): sngags dang stangs tshul gyis//hUM dang phaT ces rnam bsgrags na//khams gsum dregs pa thams cad kyang //rdul phran bzhin du brlag par 'gyur//zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni chom
458b6(rgyud): nun bcing ba'i thabs//rkang rjes sa dang khyi khrag las//mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya//mi yi rus pa'i phur bu la//'od zer can gyi sngags bzlas pas//lan grangs nyi shur bsdug
458b7(rgyud): nas ni//mig gnyisu ni gdab par bya//gzugs brnyan tshogs la phul nas ni//rdo rje gtun shing dag gis brdung //oM sum b+ha badz+ra mu sa le na nu ra nA ya na ra ban+den hUM phaT//las 'di
459a1(rgyud): brtsam pa byas nas ni//mi rgod zlog par gdon mi za//zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni me bsad pa'i thab so//me ni mched pa'i sa phyogasu//mkha' lding rgyal//
459a2(rgyud): bopo bya khyud ni//stang zil lta bu'i kha dog la//sbrul nag stong gis rab brgyan pa'i//gshog pa mkha' la gdengs pa bsgom//klu rnams la ni sprin dag la//rdo rje tshig tu bsgo ba ni//
459a3(rgyud): char chen phob la me song ces//thos nas sprin tshags bum pa yi//char gyis me yang gsod par 'gyur//gshog pas me nyid bkab na su//mchus brkos chus ni mtshams
459a4(rgyud): bcad na//bskal pa'i mes kyang 'tshig mi nus//oM badz+ra na ra ya na//nir ba ba ya ti na baM bu me g+he hUM/zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni thog bzlog pa'i thab so//na mkha' dbyings kyi dbus
459a5(rgyud): su ni//bde ba chen po zhes bya ba//zhal gsum phyag bzhir rnam par gnas//ston ka'i zla ba'i mdog 'dra ba//snyems ma dang ni byams ma dang //chu srin rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba///
459a6(rgyud): me tog rol pa zhes bya yi//lha mo bzhi yas rnam par bskor//g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje gsor//g.yon de'i dril bu skur brten pa//phyag gnyis ma k+Sh+mazhu 'gengs pa ste//
459a7(rgyud): sku las sems dpa' 'byung ba'i sprin//thor tshugs gsal ba rnam par bsgom//na mkha' las ni bab pa yi//thog na rang rig sngags kyis bzlog/oM ma hA su ka badz+ra che ge/
459b1(rgyud): mo dadz+ra//oM su ra ta ban d+ha hU~M phaT ces gsung so//dri la 'di ni gzhan gyi lce gnas pa'i thabaso//mAr gyi chos brgyad bcu bzhi la//dur khrod sol ba blangs nasu//sngags kyi bdag por
459b2(rgyud): bsgoms na su//dbang chen dkyil 'khor steng du ni//mi snyan smra 'am shags rgol ba'i//lce yi gzugasu bris pa yi//steng du za ba'i dkyil 'khor la//rdo rje rgya gram bsgoms pa yi
459b3(rgyud): dbusu ri rab bskyed par bya ste//de steng bdag gis mnan bsams na//tshig dbang lha yang dbang 'gyur na//shags la sogs pa smos ci dgos//zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni dra
459b4(rgyud): dbab pa bsgrub pa'i thabs//lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa yi//khye'u bu mo gang yang rung //mtshon nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa//dbab pa'i don du rab tu brtag/ting 'dzin
459b5(rgyud): rnal dang ldan pas bya//gzhan gyis byas na dpyas par 'gyur//dang por phyi nang khrus byas te//sdig pa sbyang phyir 'dul khrims dbog/'od kyi 'phro 'dus byin gyis brlab//rgyan
459b6(rgyud): gyi khyad par rnams kyi brgyan//snying khar hUM ni bsgom par bya//skye bo gtsug tu hA bsgom mo//a ni kha ru de bzhin te//de nas mdun gyi na mkha' la//'phags pa kun mkhyen
459b7(rgyud): spyan drangs te//de las 'od zer bskul zhing dbab//dz+nyo ni bskul ba'i sngags tshig te//gang gdab dzaM yis bskul bar bya'o//byis pa'i lus la thim par bsam//byis
460a1(rgyud): pa'i tsi ta gzhal med khang //dbab pa'i lha nyid bzhugs bsams te//lag rgyal thal mo las//sor mo phyir bsnol kha srub la//mtheb gnyis sa
460a2(rgyud): so'i mthil bkug pa'o//rdo rje tshig tu bzlas pa'i sngags//che ge mo zhig u a zhes//brjod cing rab tu bskul byas na//'gul ba dang ni g.yo bar 'gyur//khru gang tsam
460a3(rgyud): nas lnga ya bar//'jigs skrag nas ni 'phar bar 'gyur//snying la gnas pa'i lha des ni//sgra gsung kun dang ldan pa ste//'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i//ci 'dod gtam
460a4(rgyud): ni smra bar 'gyur//rtog pa thams cad bral ba yi//rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yang //cho ga 'di yis 'bab 'gyur na//'jig rten pa lta smos ci dgos//zhes gsungs pa//
460a5(rgyud): de la 'di ni dug gtad ba'i thabaso//sbrul ni mi sdug gdug cing khro//'jigs byed nag po rab tu 'bar//dug gi lce gnyis mche ba can//sol ba rdo rgyus dag gis gri//bskul
460a6(rgyud): pa'i yi ge snying po 'di//sbrul gyi khong par rab tu bsam//khaM kha de'i nang mi zad dug/'jigs par byed pa rab bsgoms na//sbrul de rab tu 'gul bar 'gyur//de nas zos
460a7(rgyud): shig ces bskul te//mchin pa nas ni zhugs nas ni//khong du song ste zos bsams na//dug gis gzung bar gdon mi za//zhes gsung so//de la 'di ni dug dbyung ba'i thab so//
460b1(rgyud): nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus ni//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus granas par//spyan ras gzigs ni bsgom par bya//kha dog dkar po hri spros te//dug can khong du zhugs pa yis//dug rnams hri
460b2(rgyud): la 'dus nas ni//hA gAs khong nas phyir phyung dang //phaT kyis bar snang kham su gtor//yang na gzhan gyi khong du spo//des ni re ma thag tu yang //dug rnams 'byung bar gdon mi za zhes
460b3(rgyud): gsungaso//de la 'di ni dug spo ba'i thob so//dug can snying kar oM dkar las//'od zer dkar pos dug bsdus pas//oM nyid nag por snar byung nas//gzhan gyi lce 'am mtshan ma
460b4(rgyud): 'am//khong du zhugs par rab bsgoms na//'pho ba rtag tu gdon mi za//zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni nye ba'i dug gso ba'i thab so//'dze 'bras shu ba phol mig dang //'brum bu
460b5(rgyud): la sogs nad rnams kun//a dkar dag gi 'phro 'du yis//gong ma bzhin du dbyung bar bya//spo ba yang ni de bzhino//de ni khams las gyur pa yis//nad rnams thams cad
460b6(rgyud): sel bar nges//zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni bkres skom zhi ba bsgrub pa'i thab so//bkres skom can gyi nyon mongs pa 'am//yang na bsgrub pa'am gang yang rung //sbyor ba 'dir ni
460b7(rgyud): brtsam par bya//rnam par snang mdzad gzugs chen po//nam mkha'o dbus su bsgom par bya//ba ni kha yin nang du bsgom//oM ni lce la rnam bsams te//yid bzhin bdud rtsi lta
461a1(rgyud): bu yi//bza' ba'i gnas su de nyid bsam//des ni bkres skom sdug bsngal sel//zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni rnam par dag pa bsgrub pa'i thab so//oM
461a2(rgyud): ni mig la rab bsams te//yul kun rnam snang mdzad du bsgom//de ltar rtag tu goms pa dang //chos kun sku gsung rdo rje mthong //de nyid rnam dag sman du grags//zhes gsungs
461a3(rgyud): so//de la 'di ni 'jig rten po'i lha mthu'o che rnams zil gyis mnan cing tshig nyan pa bsgrub pa'i thab so//nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus ni//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//
461a4(rgyud): khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba bas//b+hi zhes bya ba'i snying po yis//mthu chen rnams ni drangs nasu//bsdigs pa dag kyang byas nas ni//zil gyis gnon cing nyan par
461a5(rgyud): 'gyur zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni lha mo tsu na d+ha bsgrub pa'i thab so//sngags kyi bdag por bdag gnas pa'i//snying khar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la//tsuM zhes bya ba'i 'phro
461a6(rgyud): 'du las//bdag nyid tsun d+ha'i gzugasu bsgyur//rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i//kha dog dkar po rab tu bsgom//'di ni chos dbyings grub pa ste//bud med thams cad
461a7(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur//zhes bshad//de la 'di ni dzaM b+ha la nor bsgrub pa'i thabs so//nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//snying
461b1(rgyud): khar dza gyi 'phro 'du las//dzo b+ha la yi gzugs dag gis//bar snang khams kun gang ba ni//mdog sngon thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa//gsus po che la mi thung gzugs//yid bzhin nar/
461b2(rgyud): bu thogs pa yis//dbul ba thams cad sel bar bsam//'dod pa la ni de dag dbab//des ni dbul ba sel bar byed//nor dang gter gyi bdag por 'gyur//zhes gsung so//de la
461b3(rgyud): 'di ni rdo rje a dza na bsgrub pa'i thabaso//shing cig drung ngam bzhi mdo 'am//ma mo'i gnas sam zhi gnasu//rdo rje oM dza bsgrub par bya//pad+ma ban d+ha kha sbyar du//tshil chen gshang gci
461b4(rgyud): khu ba dang //ma hA rag ta las byung ba'i//du ba ban d+ha ra chags pa dang //bshang gci rag tas sbrus nas ni//ri lu lcags dang gsum gyis dkris pa//gsum du byas na de nyid la//
461b5(rgyud): rang gi gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad//nyi shu dgu yi nam phyed na//btab na dngos grub grub 'gyur te//mig la bskus na ci yang mthong //mi snang ba dang rkang mgyogs dang //de la sogs
461b6(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub rnams//thob par 'gyur te gdon mi za//zhes gsung so//de la 'di ni rdo rje rol pa bsgrub pa'i thab so//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus ni//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus
461b7(rgyud): gnas par//bdud rtsi 'khyil pa rnam par bsgom//du khrod ri brag gnyen pa'i sar//ro yi rdzas btsal de nas kyang //ro yi gnyen po bdag bsams te//de yi steng du bdag
462a1(rgyud): gnas la//de la dkyil 'khor chang bar bskum//de sngags rgyun du bzlas bya zhing //dgug pa'i pho nya drug tu bskul//mdog mdangs bkrag snum
462a2(rgyud): byung ba dang //bdud rtsi yos ni bskur bar bya//de nas 'gul bar gyur pa dang //phyag rgya bzhi yos gzhum par bya//sngags kyi 'phro 'du rgyun mi gcad//de nas rab tu 'bar
462a3(rgyud): ba dang //'gro ba rigs drug gang yin pa//rdo rje drag tu gdab par bya//rdo rje so yis gcad bya zhing //sngags zlos khong du bstim par bya//de nas langs par gyur pa dang /
462a4(rgyud): rdo rje byin nas dbang yang bskur//bdud rtsi'i chu yang blud par bya//las rnams gang 'dod byed du gzhug/yang na gser ram gos mtshan nam//rkang mgyogs la sogs
462a5(rgyud): dngos grub rnams//ji ltar 'dod pa rkyen gyis bsgyur//gang 'dod pa de gdon mi za//zhes gsungs//de la 'di ni rdo rje sgyu ma sgrub pa'i thab so//bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor
462a6(rgyud): gyis//rde'u shing bu'i rgyu dag las//ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs byas te//she'u re sman gyis byugs byas nas ni//rdo rje sngags kyis tshig 'di bzlas//she'u re'u i no
462a7(rgyud): ya//a mo ka a g+hus saM g+hus//shing bu dag gis gdab bya zhing //ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugasu 'gyur//des ni sna tshogs gzugasu 'gyur//bsdu bar 'dod na slar la bzlog/
462b1(rgyud): de yang bkri drung thab su 'gyur//zhes gsungs//de la 'di ni ro bsreg pa'i thab so//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni//bdag nyid 'jigs byed skur sgoms te//ro la sngags kyi btab nas ni
462b2(rgyud): dri zhim chu yis byug par bya//zhun chen khu bas bcos pa yi//ras kyis kyang ni dkri bar bya//dbang po rnams kyi gnas dag tu//lha'i phyag rgya dgod par bya//gnas der sdong bu re re la/
462b3(rgyud): lha rnams snying po bris par gdags//ro'i phyi rol shun pa la//'gro drug sa bon bkod nas ni//rims kyi sbyangs pa'i lasu bya//thab khung dkyil gang yin pa yi//phyag rgya gzhung
462b4(rgyud): dang 'thun par dgod//bar khang kro dkar phyogs bzhi nas//gzungs thag phyogs bzhir bla ma dbul//de mthur 'khor gyi lha rnams dgod//de nas rdo rje rgyal po yis//mo yi
462b5(rgyud): 'phro 'du rgyun mi gcad//rdo rje las kyi kar ma yis//las kyi phreng ba rdzogs par rol//rdo rje bla ma gcig gis ni//ro yi nyes pa bgrang zhing bshags//rdo rje skabs sbyor chen
462b6(rgyud): po yis//rdo rje mchod pa skab su dbul//bkra shris gnas kyi smon lam ni//skabs sam mjug tu gdab par bya//rdo rje grangs kyi ting 'dzin gyis//grangs gzung dkar byong bla/
462b7(rgyud): ma dbul//sdig pa'i gnag sbyang gshegs shing bsreg/mi lha spyan drang mchod pa bya//bstod pa dag kyang shes par bya//ro yi sgrib pa 'byongs ma 'byongs//me la ltas su
463a1(rgyud): blta bar bya//mtshan ma mi sdug byung ba nas//'phrog sbyang tshog rgyu cher bya//don chags rnams rdzogs par 'gyur//zhes gsungs//de la 'di na rdo rje dang /
463a2(rgyud): chen sgrub pa'i thab so//de la thal ba thams cad kun//gu gul nag po dang sbyar ba//ri lu ljags gsum gyis dkris pa//rdo rje 'joms pa'i phyag rgya dang //rdo rje drag po'i sngags
463a3(rgyud): btab ni//bar du gcod pa'i gnyen por 'gyur//zhes gsung so//de la 'di ni 'phrin las bzhi'i bsgrub thab so//las bzhi so so'i khyad par gyis//rdzas dang kha dog phyogs dang
463a4(rgyud): dbyibs//yam shing khyad par bsreg rdzas las//dkar dang dmar ser 'thing nag las//shar lho nub byang phyogs dag tu//zlum po le'u tshe pad+ma bzhi//gru bzhi zur brgyad
