463a5(rgyud): 'khor lo rgyas//gru tshod bzhu dbyibs zla gam dbang //gru gsum b+ha ga mngon spyod pa'o//ting 'dzin byams dang dang bas zhi//snying rje dga' bas rgyas pa ste//dga' dang
463a6(rgyud): chags pas dbang du 'gyur//btang snyoms khros pas drag por 'gyur//so so'i las kyi lha rgyud la//sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs dang //glu rgyud 'byor pas mchod par
463a7(rgyud): bya//zhal du gyur pa'i me bos la//khro bos ye shes me ru sbyang //so so'i rgyud du bshad bstabs te//klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hong khung du//dam rjes bdud rtsi 'bang
463b1(rgyud): pa yis//sbyang dang thob phyir bsreg par bya//nyon mongs lnga yi dram rdzas ni//ye shes lnga yi klong du dbul//phud po lnga ni yab lnga la//'byung ba yum gyi dbyingasu bstim//shes
463b2(rgyud): pa brgyad la mo brgyad la'o//yul brgyad 'phra men brgyad la bstems//sgrib dang dngos grub don rnams ni//me la mkhas pas rtag par bya//so so'i dbyibs dang kha dog la//
463b3(rgyud): dbyibs dang kha dog shes par bya zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni rdzas sgrub pa'i thabs gsang ba'o//pun sum tshogs pa bzhi ldan nas//gnas dang sa bzhi brtags par ni/
463b4(rgyud): stongs tshon gyis bri bar bya//dbu su thig bzhi le'u tshe dgu/de mtha' 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bya//sgo bzhi sgo khyud bcas par bri//mtha' zad bskal pa'i me ri 'bar
463b5(rgyud): dbus su zla gam kha sprod bri//phyogs mtshams brgyad du khaM brgyad bri//'khor lo'i bar 'khyams mu khyud la//nang du bltas pa'i kham brgyad gsal//rtsibs la nang du lta ba
463b6(rgyud): brgyad//mu khyad brgyad la phyir lhas brgyad//gru tshad bzhi la nang ltas bzhi//sgo bzhir phyir lta bri bar bya//phyir rim par 'khyams de dag la//phyi lta nyi shu rtsa brgyad bri//
463b7(rgyud): bskal pa'i mau ri phya khyams la//phyir lta bcu ni bri bar bya//de la phyag rgya rim par dgod//ro yi chol lhangs rnams bzhi yis//dur khrod rdzas mchog ma nyams btsal//
464a1(rgyud): ye shes spyan gyis lta ba dang //rdo rje 'bros kyis rtsal ba dang //phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis rol pa dang //ma mo'i tshogs kyis 'jol tshul dang //btsal/
464a2(rgyud): nas maN Dal sgo bzhi nas/khro chen bzhi yis sbyang bar bya//shar du dug gsum 'joms pa'i bro//lho ru khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro//nub du rta mchog zhal gyi bro//byang du gdul
464a3(rgyud): stong drag po'i bros//sbyang bar bya ba rab tu gceso//de nas dbu su gzhag bya ste//mgo bo shar du bstan pa de'i//phung po bruM las gzhal med khang //de ru phyag rgya'i tshogs
464a4(rgyud): mchog sgom//so so'i rdzas kyi gnas rnams la//rigs kyi lha rnams rim par dgod//bsnyen pas byin phebs rtags byung nas//bam de byang shar mtshamasu bsgral//rdo rje thig/
464a5(rgyud): gis btab nas kyang //rdzas rnams so so'i sko su gdab//des mtshon rnam lngas bgro bar bya//'khor lo'i spyi bo nyid nas bkro/rdo rjes snying kha'i phyogs nas bkra/rin chen
464a6(rgyud): zur brkyang lte ba nas//pad mas kha'i phyogs nas so//ral gris yan lag rnams nas spro//de nas phyag rgya'i gnas rnamasu//rdzas rnams go rims bzhin du dgod//
464a7(rgyud): dpal dang ldan pa'i gdan dgu la//sku gsung thugs dang ldan par ni//gsal ba'i 'od dang bcas par dgram//rdzas kyis mdzes par brgyan par bya//rmad du zung
464b1(rgyud): ba'i gtor ma dgram//mchod pa'i dam rdzas tshong bar bsham//de nas rnal 'byor chen po kun//bdag nyid phyag rgyar gnas pa ste//bskyed pa'i ting 'dzin tshul bzhin bskyed//
464b2(rgyud): rang bzhin rdzogs chen spyan drangs mchod//bsgrub pa nyams len bzlog par bya//dngos grub gsol dang dbang bskur bya//de nas gtor ma mtsho gsum du//dang por bcad de
464b3(rgyud): sbyin sreg bya//bar mas mkha' gro tshim par bya//tha ma mi bzang gter du sgo//las rnams rdzogs par byas nas ni//dpal tshan nyid kyang 'grub 'gyur na//dngos grub gzhan
464b4(rgyud): lto smos ci dgos//zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni rdo rje mchog chen po bsgrub pa'i thab so//don dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas//sa stengs chag phyed tshad du bya//sum rtseg byas dbus
464b5(rgyud): zla gam brgyad//phyi mtha' thod pas bskor ba'o//de yi phyi rim dmar chen rgyus//dbusu ban d+ha mtshan ldan la//yab yum snying po bris la bzhag/zla gam brgyad la ma brgyad
464b6(rgyud): gzhag/mthing nag ma tha me ri 'bar//de 'og thod tshar gsum du bya//sgo khyams dur khrod rdzas kyis brgyan//sgo rtsug sgo khyud tha ma branra//gnas mchog rab tu dben pa yi//
464b7(rgyud): ri ye rtse 'am nags tshal lam//sde dpung phra mos mi tshugs shing //'du 'dzi 'gro 'od chad par shis//rnal 'byor sdang dang sa ldan zhing //brjod cing sran tshugs khu 'brig chung
465a1(rgyud): na nadu na na na tshun ma sman tu ga sunan smad du da/
465a2(rgyud): tshig do lta thA//dge blags kyim gzung bsgyud nas//byin gyis brlab pa rab tu b+hi//d+hA ma rlung sa dbang po bsgyur/ mi thig ma chis//
465a3(rgyud): da pa \u0f7f/da tan no d+hapa'am//migs nyis rlob 'gro yod //rnam shes ba'i skyon pa ste//ba gas kyi kyi rgyas /da
465a4(rgyud): la bir bya// zhigan se las du \u0f7f//rlung sbrus thams cad myur rnams s+ho//bsgras sa sgyur ba sbyis na na//mdzad dang ma nga na nga /do
465a5(rgyud): sum nas byeng //nas gas so//de la 'ang mchog banag zla /oM ldan la//gas ga /
465b1(rgyud): ldan phyag tu dbul//phyag rgya rdzas dang bcas par dgram//de yaM khong du gzhal ya su//ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang ba'i//thugs kar nor bu rin chen 'bar//dbusu nyi ma'i ga
465b2(rgyud): le//dpal be'u zhungs 'bru'i snying po la//til 'bru tsam gyi hU~M dmar gnas//rdo rje 'phro 'du rgyun mi gcad//rdo rje pra yang dbab par bya//de nas mtshan rtags bzang ba dang //dngos grub/
465b3(rgyud): blangs te bsgral bar bya//bsnams te bdud rtsi'i rtsa ba shes//zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni dregs pa can bsgrub pa'i bab so//phun sum tshogs pa bzhi ldan nas//ji ltar reg pa 'dus
465b4(rgyud): pa dang //maN Dal gzhi gcig brkyang nul bya//chag rams bstod pa'i maN ral bzhi//gru bzhir gzhi las spags par bya//de dag ma tang gzugasu bya//snying kha man chad dbus
465b5(rgyud): su bsnol//marka Dal chen po'i 'og tu gzhug/dbusu 'khor lo'i thig btab la//dpal chen lnga yi phyag rgya gzhag/bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes pa la//gnas dang yul
465b6(rgyud): g+hi phyag rgya dgod//sgo bzhir sgo srungs de bzhin gzhag/yan lag sprul pa'i mgo brnyan gnas//phyi rol khyams la mi ring bya//de mtha' thod pa char gsum bsnams//de yi
465b7(rgyud): byi rim mo dur 'chub//gu gu rdul dang zer chags//zhing dang sbrul tshon sgo khyud la//bin d+ha snying por bcas pa dag/so so'i gan su de bzhin gzhag/rdo rje'i dbying su bcings
466a1(rgyud): pa'i thab//zur bzhi kha bzhi dag la bya//snying khur 'khor lo'i zab du bya//rigs dang 'thun pa'i yam shing brtsig/hom lnga 'brel ba'i las tshon la//zab
466a2(rgyud): khrung lnga yi bye brag tu//rgyud drug yam shing spungs pa la//ye shes sku yi mA mong du//nyon mongs lnga yi bsreg sbyang thim//bya bar 'os pa mtha' dag kun//rnal 'byor can gyis kyi
466a3(rgyud): rig bya//zhes gsungs//de la 'di ni ma tang 'greng bu gnan pa'i thab so//dkyil 'khor ma tang gzugs bya//mgo bo lho nub mtsham su bstan//mgo lus yan lag rnams la ni/
466a4(rgyud): maN la bcu gcag rab tu bya//zhal du hom khung gru gsum la//yam shing dag gis brdzangs nas ni//sbyin bsreg hom gyi las rnams bya//snying khar gru gsum rje gsum la/
466a5(rgyud): bang rim gsum par byas nas ni//phur bu nyi shu rtsa gsum dgod//zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting 'dzin bya//legs par gru gsum mthing nag la//zur la thaMd pa char gsum bris//gzhu 'dun
466a6(rgyud): dadrasta brgyad kyang dgod//phur bu dgu dang kha T+wAM dgu/rtsang dmar drug cu rtsa brgyad dgod//yum gyi mkha' ru bsgoms nAs//gzir gnan drag po'i las rnams bya//yan lag mog
466a7(rgyud): mtshan g.yas g.yon la//gnas kyi ma mo brgyad rnams kyi//bri 'am mtshan ma gzhag par bya//gzhan rnams kyang ni ci rigs par//ma tang dbug dang dbab dang gnan//byin
466b1(rgyud): brlabs mkhas pas tshul bzhin bya//bya ba thams cad ci rigs bya//ngas ni gnan pa'i las tshon 'grub//ces gsungs//de la 'di ni rdo rje tshe bsgrub pa'i thab so//thams cad 'byor bar byas
466b2(rgyud): nas ni//sa stengs brgyang nul legs byas la//dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad la//za gam dmar po sgo bzhir ldan//rdo rje'i ra bas bskor bar bya//dpal ldan tshe yi phyag rgya dgod//rin cher sna
466b3(rgyud): chabras bum pa la//tshe yi rdzas kyis gang ba de//pad+ma ba ni das kha bkab la//gzungs thag btags nas dbu su gzhag/tshe dpag med par de mngal gsol//bum pa rin chen las byas
466b4(rgyud): bzhi//gsang ba'i yum du de mnga' gsol//rigs dang mthun pa'i bum pa bzhi//rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas gtso gzungs dang //so so'i 'khor gyi sems dpa' rnams//gtso
466b5(rgyud): gzungs zung du 'brel bar ni//phyogs phyogs dag tu chom bur bri//sgo bzhir sgo srungs la sogs gzhag/sems dpa'i phyag rgya kun bkod nas//tshe dpag med pa'i thugs ka nas//
466b6(rgyud): 'khyil cang 'char ba'i byang chub sems//nyi zla'i ga'u gnas pa de//A yu byang chub semasu zhu//de las rgyal mtshan mchod ldan dang //rin chen gter dang dbang bskur mdzad//gsang
466b7(rgyud): ba'i tshe gter 'dzin dang bzhi//thugs kar 'phros nas de bzhin du//tshom bu rims kyis spros nas ni//dkar dmar 'od kyis bdag la bstims//skye med dbyings sras nas ni//mi 'gyur
467a1(rgyud): sa 'a byur //yang nA tI 'dzin dAngA sa//khaM'am zla ba'i man 'a dun //sbya ngas 'char ba'i dus//phyug rgya chen po s+ya gnas pa dang //
467a2(rgyud): phyogs ngab su khyabasgru po te//lha mug nad skyon ji skud po//shar phyogs nam khar gnas pa rnams//thams cad khyod du rngubs pa lngas//phyir mi 'byung bar khod du bstims//
467a3(rgyud): do tha mar stA ru srid //phyogs bcur de sbyor goms byas nas//dpal tshig ni byin thams cad thob//ces gsung sa//de la 'di ni bdud rtsi bsrung po'i zlabs//maN+DaDal tshad da
467a4(rgyud): 'thun pa 'i//dbus pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri//glu chad zla gam bzhi par bya//gzhon yang thA ga ma ci rigs dgram//pad+ma lce la rin pa che//go ser dag gis mdzes par bya/
467a5(rgyud): phyag rgya 'bar ba'i lha mchog dgod//dbus chings pa'i srung ba can//yul med dung can 'khor bar gzhag/shar du sul 'greng de bzhin te//mA ru dpag bsam shing bra can//
467a6(rgyud): nub du shing bu gnyis pa gzhag/byung du bas 'or rgya gram mo//snod kyi mtshan nyid bkod na su//dri chen zhu ba mAM sa dang //rag ta dri chu phyogs phyogasu//de dag skad su sbyar
467a7(rgyud): /kal la dang du ru//'dzati ba la 'dzi nam//sna g-i bar thos bzhi sbyis 'di dag rgya ni rim pa bzhin//ma ga tsud dgazur dag//sum nus
467b1(rgyud): /t+yar//de nas ra sa ya nA'i chags//rigs dang las dang kha dog gis//ci rigs so sor dbye bar bya//sa bon lnga yis rnam par sbyangs//gsang chen de nyid dam pa yi//rigs gcig
467b2(rgyud): rigs lnga rigs brgya yis//sbyad pa mchog tu bya ba yin//khrol bu dag ni sbyang ba na//gsal dang bsngo dang bsdu dang dbye//khrus dang bshags dang yon tan brjod//byin dbab bzlas
467b3(rgyud): pa rtags byung dang //bsdu dang btag bcag gzhal 'a bya//mtshan ldan snod du rgyu yis gdab//rigs dang 'thun pa'i gzungs kyis gdags//dbang bskur byin brlab tshul bzhin bya//
467b4(rgyud): ting 'dzin mi g.yeng 'byangs pa dang //dngos grub blang ba la sogs bya//de nas ri lu 'am 'de gu 'am//skye ma la sogs ci rigs par//rnal 'byor mchog gis spyad par bya//
467b5(rgyud): zhes gsung so//de la 'di ni stan bsgrub pa'i thab so//gang yang rung ba'i sems can de//las bab pa yi rnal 'byor pas//raM yaM khaM gis bsreg sbyong bya//rgyud drug sa bon 'bru
467b6(rgyud): lngas sbyang //rol pa'i tshul gyis bsgral bya zhing //rnam shes sbyor ba'i lhum su 'phang //byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du yis//sku bskyed ye shes skur spros te//rdzogs sangs rgyas
467b7(rgyud): la so mo nyi med//ces gsung so//de la 'di ni gan bsgrub pa'i thab so//yid dam bcas pa btang na yang //bdag lus phyal bar mi gtang zhing //de nyid dran pa chen por bya/
468a1(rgyud): 'phags pa mchod par brtson pa dang //rang gi lta ba gsal ba dang //gsung sngags sdom la gnas pa dang //sngags dang phyag rgya ma nyams dang //yo byad
468a2(rgyud): tshogs na nges par 'grub//mi ldan don rnams brlag par 'gyur//zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni mi 'grub pa'i chad pa'o//bsnyen bsgrub rim par ma rdzogs par//dngos la
468a3(rgyud): zhen cing bsgrub byed pa//rang rgyud sreg par gdon mi za//zhes gsung so//de la 'di ni bsgrubs nas ma grub pa yi chad pa'o//bka' bzhin sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas//dus bzhin
468a4(rgyud): grub par ma gyur na//rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i//ye shes las grub lha rnams kyang //tshal bar 'grags pa gdon mi za//zhes gsungaso//dngos grub gzhan dag de
468a5(rgyud): dag tu//mi zad bsam gyis mi khyab ste//de dag la sogs bsam yas mchog/chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam dang //na mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa//brjod med
468a6(rgyud): brjod las 'das pa yi//dngos grub ji ltar 'dod pa 'grub//ces gsungaso//'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las dngos grub
468a7(rgyud): bsgrub pa'i rnam grangs bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de mi 'da' ba dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
468b1(rgyud): ti 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas//nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las sdom pa zab mo 'di byung //de la 'di ni dam tshig gi sngam pa ci'i phyir bsrung ba'o//srid gsum sems can
468b2(rgyud): thams cad la//log rtog 'khrul pa bsam mi khyab//de nyid gzhal ba'i gdul thebs//phye nang sdom pa ji snyed pa//rtog 'dul thab su de snyed gsungs//zhes gsu so//de la 'di ni dam tshi gi mad
468b3(rgyud): kun 'dir 'dus pa'o//ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas kun//gsang sngags rgya mtsho chen po lngas//'dul ba'i thabasu so sor snang //snang yang rtog 'dul ma grub phyir//rmad byung dang
468b4(rgyud): du cig par 'dus//de bas gsang sngags ngo mtshar tshe zhes gsungaso//de la 'di ni dam tshig rnam par dag pa'o//chos kun ye nas dag pa'i phyir//log rtog ye nas rnam par
468b5(rgyud): dag/de bas sdom pa rnam par dag/dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che//zhes gsungaso//de lnga 'di ni bsrung ba med pa'i sdom pa'o//thams cad thig la rdo rje bas//bsrung ba'i thA
468b6(rgyud): snyad rnams dang bral//kun khyab bdal pa'i dang nyid la//bsrung du med na sdom pa yin//na mkha' bzhin du kun tu khyab//ces gsungaso//de la 'di ni rtags pa'i
468b7(rgyud): dam tshig go/bde chen rnam dog lhun grub par//lta bas rtogs shing chud zar na//dam tshig nyid kyang rnam dag ste//lte ba khyad par ji bzhin du//'dul po'i khyad par

469a3(rgyud): sngags rgya mtsho chen po yi//dam tshig bsam yas ji snyed pa//rtsa ba yan lag gnyi su 'dus//rtsa ba'i dam tshig gsum yin te//sku gsung thugasu rgyal bas gsungs//
469a4(rgyud): san lag dam tshig mi spang dang //mi 'dir spyad dang shes pa dang //grub pa yin te rnam lnga po//mdor nA rnam pa brgyad du grags//zhes gsung so//dri la 'di ni mdo rgyu

469a6(rgyud): shes rab rgyud//man ngag lung ston slob dpon la//mngan dang dbye ba'i sems bar na//lus ngag sgo nas smos ci dgos//mgro dang mig dang gsang ma snying //rtag tu 'bral
469a7(rgyud): brar 'bangs pa ltar//bla ma rdo rje slob dpon la//mi 'bral sems kyis de ltar lta//de yi phyi bzhin be'u ltar 'brang //de yi dgos pa ci yang rung //skongs na srog la'ang
469a8(rgyud): mi lta na//zang zing gzhan lta smos ci dgos//lus la dbang ba'i rgyal po 'am//lus srog bskyed pa'i pha ma bas//shin tu gnyen zhing bkur bar bya//ci phyir dbyings
469b1(rgyud): dang rnam par gyi// d+hAm sA de yo ston pa yin//dngos grub bye brag dza snyed pa//de lta rag las rdza su 'brang //ma rig mun pas gtibs pa la//sems kyi sgron mya de yis 'dug pa
469b2(rgyud): lha mi yongs kyi 'dran ston yin//dus gsum sangs rgyas zhal mthong yin//dge ba'i rtsa ba'i srog shing yin//yon tan kun gyi gter mdzad yin//gal te yon tan mi ldan yang
469b3(rgyud): za mar bzung nas spang byas na//kun gyi slob dpon brnyas pa yin//dus gsum sangs rgyas bskur ba yin//de yi nyams pa brjod mi lang //yon tan ldan pa'i bla ma de//phyogs bcu
469b4(rgyud): sang+yas thams cad dang //rgyal sras dang ni mthu chen rnams//phyag 'tshal mchod cing bkur sti byed//'jig rten 'di na mthu chen kun//de yi dgongs pa skong ba dang //khur zhing bran
469b5(rgyud): du khas len na//rdo rje slob mas smos ci dgos//rdo rje dpun la gdung sems kyang //'dres dang ma 'dres yongs kyi spun//yang dag lam du zhugs pa la//mngan dang dpyas kyi sems
469b6(rgyud): tsam yang //rtag tu spang bar bya ba yin//brtse zhing gdung ba'i shugs phyung la//gcig la gcig ni mig bzhin blta//mdor na srog la mi chags par//spun dang meng sring
469b7(rgyud): dgos pa bsgrub//ci phyir rdo rje spun rnams ni//'di nas byang chub theg pa ru//mi 'bral 'grogs pa'i grogs mchog ste//mar me 'od dang sdong dang 'dra'o//dper ni 'jig
470a1(rgyud): rnams kyang //mang po 'dus na dka' ba'ang 'grub//de bzhin rdo rje ming sring spun//dngos grub bsgrub pa'i grogs mchog yin//dper na grogs dang ldan pa'i
470a2(rgyud): mi 'tsho ba rnams kyis mi tshugs bzhin//de bzhin rnal 'byor grogs ldan yang //rgol ba rnams kyis mi tshugs shing //'bras bu myur du 'grub par 'gyur//de bas
470a3(rgyud): nan tan bskyed de bsrung //de yang sku yi dam tshig de//bsrung ba yin par rgyal bas gsungs//mdor na snang srid thams cad ni//gzugasu snang ba mtha' yas kun//chos kyi//
470a4(rgyud): sku lo sa mgo myos par//gzugs sku 'ju chen tshul du gsal//de nyid don las mi 'da' bar//rtogs pa sku yi dam tshig ces//rgyal ba rnams kyis rab tu gsungs/

471a3(rgyud): rtsa ba'i dam tshig gi mdo rgyas par bshad pa'o//me spang dam tshig ces bya ba//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang //nga rgyal phrag dag lnga rnams ni//rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas

471b1(rgyud): bya ba'i dram chug ste//'od dag bsrung bar rab tu gnas//da yang na phyir bsrung zhan/'dadu chags rang dang sbyor sdang ba//chags shing zhon pa thams cad kun//pad+ma rigs kyang ba yin/
471b2(rgyud): sdang de bzhin rdo rje'i rigs//gti mug sangs rgyas yin par gsungs//nga rgyal yid bzhin nor bu ste//phrag dag zhes bya la su bshad//de bas spang bar bya ba mi ni//dri chen snang ma
471b3(rgyud): gtso bo yin//dri chu gdon me za grub pa//rag ta snang ba mtha' yas sku//mangs rin chen 'byung ldan gtso//byang chub sems ni rdo rje sems//des na dang du blang bar gsungs/
471b4(rgyud): sems can thams cad gsad bya ba//rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig yin//bud med rnams la chags bya ba//snang ba mtha' yas dam tshig ste//gzhan gyi nor 'phrog rnam snang gi//
471b5(rgyud): rin chen 'byung ba'i brdzun phra mo//ngag drug gdon mi za 'grub pa'o//dam tshig yin par rgyal bas gsungs//de bas spyad par bya ba'o//gzugs snang ba rnam snang mdzad//char/
471b6(rgyud): ba rin rten 'byung ldan gtso//'du shes snang ba mtha' yas te//'du byed gdon mi za grub pa//rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa'o//sa ni rdo rje zhes su bshad//ring chen chu ste pad+ma me//
471b7(rgyud): thogs med rlung gi rang bzhin te//na mkha'i khams ni rnam sang mdzad//mig gi dbang po rnam snang mdzad/rna ba ran chen 'byung ba'i tshul//snang ba mtha' yas snang zhes gag
472a1(rgyud): lce ni gdon mi za grub pa//lus ni mi bskyod pa ru bshad//gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul//sgra ni rin chen 'byung ba ste//dri ni snang ba mtha' yas so//
472a2(rgyud): ro ni don yod grub pa yin//reg rnams mi bskyod pa ru bshad//de bzhin dkar po rdo rje'i rigs//ser po bder gshegs rigasu bshad//mthing ka rin chen dmar po chos//
472a3(rgyud): ljang khu las kyi rigasasu bshad//de phyir shes par bya ba yi//dam tshig yin par dpa' bos gsungs//grub par bya ba'i 'bras bu yang //rigs lnga nyid du grub pas nu//
472a4(rgyud): de grub pa yi dam tshig yin//dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che//yan lag dam tshig 'da' ba'o//zhes gsungs//yan lag gi dam tshig mdo rgyas pa'o//de la 'di ni dbye

472a7(rgyud): bskal pa grangs med bgrangs par yang //dmyal ba'i gnasu ltung bar 'gyur//rdo rje bla ma'i sku smad na//dus gsum sangs rgyas brnyas pa yin//byang chub sems la//
472b1(rgyud): bskur bas na//rno yI sdig pa brjod mi lang //dro bor na 'jig rten sa yi rdul//grangs kyis bgrang bar shos kyang srid//rgya mtsho chen po'i chu thigs kyang //grangs kyis bgrang zhing
472b2(rgyud): shes rung //'di yi sdig pa brjod mi nus//shin+da tu mi zad sdug bsngal las//thar par nams kyang mi 'gyur te//srid gsum sems can gsad pas ni//bla ma'i bka' bcag
472b3(rgyud): char mi phod//rdo rje spun la smad pa ni//nyams pa'i skyon yang brjod par dka'//bskal pa gcig gri bar dag tu//dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur//tshe 'dir bsgrub pa

473a1(rgyud): dam tshig nyams gyur na//dngos grub 'bras bu mi 'thob cing //yi dgas spro'u'i gnasu skye//spyad pa'i dmachog nyams gyur na//'du shes mod

473a3(rgyud): rtog pa'i dam tshi ge nyams gyur na//ru tra chen po gan su ltung //de la sogs te bsam mi khyab ces gsungs//de la 'di ni nyams pa bskang ba'i tshad do//dmi tshig nyam/

473a5(rgyud): gshegs drag pos 'gyod byas na//de ni snyengs pa'i la su 'gyur//gal te bdag gam bla ma spun ma bskangs par du tshe 'phos nas//de ni bskang pa'i tshad las 'das//
473a6(rgyud): gsung gi tha tshig ral gyur no//rdo rje cho su bdag bsgoms la/tha tshig gang brlag 'bum 'bum gdon//thugs kyi tha tshig ral gyur na//rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms
473a7(rgyud): pa la//lo gsum bar du mi smra bar//bsam gtan sbyor bar rab tu bya//yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na//so so'i rigs kyis de bzhin bskang //zhes gsungaso///
473b1(rgyud): hUM skad ces gsungs pas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi dam tshig ni rang rang gi stong la gnas par mthong nas/A lA la zhes pa'i sgra phyung nus rang rang gi dam
473b2(rgyud): tshig la dmigaso//'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las dam tshig rnam par bkod pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o///
473b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang po mchog gi bdag pos brtul zhugs rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//zhugs nas kyang gsang sngags thams cad
473b4(rgyud): kyi brtul zhugs rnam par rol pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //gsang sngogs rgya mtsho chen po yi//brtul zhugs ngo mtshar rmad byung ba//chos kun rol par
473b5(rgyud): snang ba'i phyir//ji ltar spyad kyang brtul zhugs te//dka' thub dka' ba spyad mi dgos//dka'i thub sdom la rten pa'i mis//bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te//dka' thub
473b6(rgyud): sdo ma la mi gnas shing //'dod pa'i 'od spyod rab brten pas//bsgrubs na myur du 'grub par 'gyur//rigs ngan dang ni sme sha can//rtag tu gsod la brtson pa dang //
473b7(rgyud): me byin len dang mi tshangs spyod//brdzun po smra la dga' ba dang /rtsub pa'i ngag la dga' ba ni//gsang sngags bsgrubs pa'i snod du 'gyur//pha dang khu bo mes po la/
474a1(rgyud): zhwa sdang sems kyis bsgral byas na//rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub thob//ma dang bu mo sring mo la//'dod chags sems kyis sbyar byas na//chags pa chen
474a2(rgyud): po'i dngos grub thob//snying rje med par gsod pa dang //'jigs pa med par sbyor ba la//bshang gi ci zas su za ba dang //rang gi khu bas mchod pa dang //dur khrod rgyan la
474a3(rgyud): dga' ba ni//theg mchog 'di la 'grub par 'gyur//bsod snyoms zas la mo chags shing //ma bslabs pa la'ang chags mi bya//nags tshal dgon pa'i sa phyogs//
474a4(rgyud): bsod snyoms blangs te bza' bar bya//sems kyi brtul zhugs chen po yis//ting 'dzin stobs dang ldan par bya//lus kyi brtul zhugs chen po yis//thogs med/
474a5(rgyud): skye thabs tshul du gnas//ngag glo brtul zhugs chen po yis//sngags kyi yi ge drug tu brjod//dben pa'i phyogasu gnas bcas la//g.yang gzhi gos gon nas ni//
474a6(rgyud): che ba'i nga rgyal rtag tu bskyed//wa yI brtul zhugs chen po yis//spang bar bya ba'i thab su spyad//cang shes brtul zhugs chen po yis//shes bya kun la 'jug par
474a7(rgyud): bya//lus kyi rtsal gyi bya ba dag/gyi ling brtul zhugs chen pos bya//phag gi brtul zhugs chen po yis//gtsang sme med par kun la spyad//glang chen mos pa'i
474b1(rgyud): brtul zhugs kyis//mi 'byed rmongs tshul bstan par bya//rtag mchog rngam pa'i brtul zhugs kyis//ngaprA'i brtul gtum pa'i las tshon bya//khyung chen mkha' lding
474b2(rgyud): brtul zhugs kyis//lta bo spyi rgya rlabs kyis gcad//gau tu ma thung dron gyi brtul zhugs kyis//re ba med pa'i las chen bya//rgya mtsho gter gyi brtul zhugs kyis//yid thub
474b3(rgyud): mi ldog brtan par bya//lkugs pa lug gi brtul zhugs kyis//gti mug bzhin du shes rab ldan//ri bo lta bu'i brtul zhugs kyis//mi 'gyur rab tu brtan par bya//nam
474b4(rgyud): mkha' lta bu'i brtul zhugs kyis//yangs dag kun dang bral bar bya//gnam lcags lta bu'i brtul zhugs kyis//drag shul las la sbyar bar bya//lag na rdo rje'i
474b5(rgyud): brtul zhugs kyis//mthu stobs dag la spyad par bya//kha rog brtul zhugs chen po yis//zon bag khu 'phrig spyad par bya//glang che no chur 'jug brtul zhugs kyis//
474b6(rgyud): nges pa'i nga rgyal spyad par bya//ri dgas seng ge'i brtul zhugs kyis//grogs dan+da la sogs spang bar bya//reg 'jam bya'i brtul zhugs kyis//'grogs
474b7(rgyud): na bde zhing chags par bya//sgyu ma rgya yi brtul zhugs kyis//thabs la mkhas pa'i las chen bya//lce spyang khro yi brtul zhugs kyis//gotsang sme med par spyad pa dang //
475a1(rgyud): thugs mod gsod la brtson par bya//nga rgyal stug mchog brtul zhugs kyis//che ba'i nga rgyal bskyed par bya//mkha' lding lta bu'i brtul zhugs/
475a2(rgyud): kyisakun tu mdzes pa'i spyod pa spyad//rgyal po 'khor skyong brtul zhugs kyis//sa thub 'khor dang ldan par bya//bcu gnyis dang ni gsum dag gi/brtul zhugs blo dang
475a3(rgyud): ldan par bya//de la sogs te bsam mi khyab//ces gsung so//'phags brgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa klog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las rnal 'byor gyi rig pa'i
475a4(rgyud): brtul zhugs kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pa chen pos 'phrin las rgya mtsho lhun gyis grub pa zhes bya ba'i
475a5(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//zhugs nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces gsung so//'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon cig/brtsal med lhun gyis
475a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor las//'phrin las rgya mtsho bsam yus kyang //rnal 'byor dgos pa'i dbang dag tu//las bzhi dag tu rgyal bas gsungs//dang po zhi ba'i lha yan te//
475a7(rgyud): gnyis pa rgyas pa zhesu bya//gsuM po dbang du sdud pa'i las//bzhi pa drag pa'i lasu gsungs//de dag lha yi dkyil 'khor dang //gnas dang dus dang rdzas rnams dang /

475b5(rgyud): la' dkun tu bzang pos ci yod byed//skyon ni zhi ba'i mchog yin to//bsrung ba ma ma kI yis byed//gos dkar can gyi dbang du byed//sgro la ma las rnams kun la skye

481b1(rgyud): mtshar rmad byung cho 'phrul sna chags kun tu snang //rtog med mnyam nyid dbyings las ci srid 'phrul gyang dbyings la g.yos pa rul gyi chu tsam med//don dam bden pa'i cho 'phrul kun
481b2(rgyud): rdzob gsang sngags che ba'i khyad par rmad 'byung e ma'o de mtshar che zhis mgrin gcig tu gsol ba btab ste/'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams la la ni byang chub sems kyi mtshan
481b3(rgyud): nyid la sems shing cang mi smra bar 'khod do//la la ni dkyil 'khor rnams rims kyis dgod/la la ni lhun gyis grub pa'i gar dang phyag rgya nye bar ston//la la ni gsang sngags kyi/
481b4(rgyud): sgo zab mo bsnyen bsgrub rnam pa bzhir 'jug cing mi ldog/la la ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i che ba dag ston te/la la ni gsang sngags kyi dam tshig snying la gnas par sdom/
481b5(rgyud): la la ni brtul zhugs zab mo la 'jol nyag tu rol/le la ni gdug pa'i tshogs nyen cing tshar gcod//la la ni rmugs pa dang /rengs pa dang /'dod gzir dang /dregs pa rnams
481b6(rgyud): dang /sbyor ba'i las kyi rol pas dgyes/la la ni nan tur gyi che ba ston cing ling ldong phyed/thams cad bla 'khyal pa'i spyod pa can du gyur to//bcom ldan 'das gsang ba
481b7(rgyud): mchog gi bdag po ni yum rngam pa kro d+hi'i rgyal mo dang gnyi su med par de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings la dgongs shing cad mo gsung bar gyur to//'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye
482a1(rgyud): shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las nan tur gyi las rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa rdzogaso///rgya gar gyi mkhan/
482a2(rgyud): po badz+ra bi shwa mi tra dang /zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba gor bai ro tsa na ra khyi tos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o///de nas yang smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu
482a3(rgyud): bzang pos bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de de bzhin nyid kyi rang la mi g.yo bar brnal bzhin du cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i klu 'dis rnam par bskul te/
482a4(rgyud): ma'o mi dmigs chos dbyings dag pa las//'bar ba'i sku mchog bdag la bstan du gsol//ral pa'i cho 'phrul mi zad rgyan du che//don la rngam pa'i spyod pas rol
482a5(rgyud): tu gsol//a la la ho zhes bskul bas bskul bar thug su chung nas sku nyi ma'i snying pa lta bu mngon du phyung ste cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa snod bcud dang sa'i khyad par
482a6(rgyud): thams cad la snang bar mdzad pa'o//de nas smra ba'i seng ge byed pa rdo rje kun tu bzang pos mchod pa rgyas pa de kho na nyid kyisku mngon par mchod de brkyang phyag 'tshal nas gsol
482a7(rgyud): ba btab pa//e ma'o gsang mchog dag po'i bdag/ye shes shes bgyi ji ltar lags//rngam pa zhes ni gang la bgyi//glog phreng zhes pa ji ltar lags//'khor lo
482b1(rgyud): nos pa de lta b+hA//mdo' don ni ji ltar lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol//zhes gsol ba byatag//gsang ba mchog gos bdag pos gtsul ba btab pa drug tu
482b2(rgyud): chud nas ye shes snying po can rnams nyon cig/ye shes ye shes shes bya ba//shes dang shes bya tha dad min//rig pa'i ngo bo rnam pa lnga//stong nyid snying rje dbyar med pas//
482b3(rgyud): byang chub sems rgyal bas gsungs//dregs pa 'dul zhing nan thur gyis//thogs chags med pa'i brtul zhugs pas//sngags spyod rngam pa'i khyad par de//rngam pas rngam
482b4(rgyud): pa'i mtshan nyid yin//glog ni myur du 'jug pa'i phyir//'jug pa'i yan lag bzhi dag dang //sdom dang las bzhi'i khyad par gyis//dngos grub la spru la myur 'jug pa'o//
482b5(rgyud): rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dang //phyag rgya dngos grub 'brel bcas ni//'khor lo zhesu rgyal bas gsungs//de bas ming ni don 'thun grags//rigs cing gsal ba/
482b6(rgyud): ngo bo bas//yas sha su brjod pa yin//rngam pa zhes pa drag shul spyod//myur zhing bar chad med pas na//glog gi phreng ba zhes su bya//skor dang gcod dang rgyun mi gcad//
482b7(rgyud): 'khor lo lta bu'i rnam pa dang //gsang ba kun 'dus mdo bya'o//zhes gsung so//de nas smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/rgyud ces bgyi ba ji lta bu/
483a1(rgyud): mdo 'di 'brel ba ji ltar lags//de bzhin dgos dang yang dgos //brjod pa ji ltar shes par brtse//bcom ldan gsang ba mchog go bdag pos bka'
483a2(rgyud): stsal pa//'brel dang ma tshang ming pa dang //phun sum tshogs phyir rgyud ces bya//'di don rig pa'i skyes bu yis//gsang ba kun de ni shes pa'i phyir//phyogs bcu kun tu
483a3(rgyud): rab grags pa'i//rgyud kun dang ni 'brel par bshad//gsang ba'i sgor zhugs rnal 'byor pa//byang chub sems dang dkyil 'khor dang //phyag rgya bsnyen dang dngos grub dang //
483a4(rgyud): sdom dang brtul zhugs ma rungs mnyes//las dang nan dur bya ba'i rnams//mchog tu dgos pos dgos pa yin//bde gnyis rtogs nas bdag gzhan don//grub pa yang
483a5(rgyud): dgos yin par bshad//dgos pa'i don yang brjod byed pa'o//don bsdus mdo 'di brjod pa yin//de bas rnam pa bzhi po yis//bde blag tu ni rtogs par 'gyur zhes
483a6(rgyud): gsung so//yang smra ba'i seng ges gsol pa/dbang mchog dam pa mi thob par//bsgrub pa ci yang mi 'grub pa//ji ltar dbang bsgyur mtshan nyid lags//snod ni
483a7(rgyud): ji lta bu dag lags//rnam grangs dag gi mtshan nyid ci//dbang thob rtags dang mtshan mi ci//bcom ldan snying pos bshad du gsol//gsang ba mchog gi 'dig
483b1(rgyud): pos bka' stsal bya//gsang ba'i tshig lnga gsal 'dris shing //don la gzhi pa zhing yid ches kyang //dbang bskur dka' rtags ma byin par//nor bu blon glal bsgos pa
483b2(rgyud): ltar nan sa rnams thob par mi 'gyuraro//sems kyis chos la dbang thob na//rdzas tshig gang zag dbang rnams kun//ma skur na yang thob por 'gyur//bskur na'ang nyes pa med par
483b3(rgyud): bshad//rig pa rang dbang thob 'gyur na//bskur ba'i dbang la thogs pa med//de ni dbang gi mtshan nyid yin//ra chod byed cing tshul mchos pa'i//dad dang mi ldan brtson 'grus
483b4(rgyud): chung //blo zhan nges med 'phyar la g.yeng //sgyu ma spun la sri zhu chung //de ni dbang gi snod ma yin//dad dang ldan zhir brtson 'grus che//mnyan bsam slob la mi skyo bo//bla ma spun
483b5(rgyud): la bkur sti byed//gsang po nyan pa'i dbang bskur//rnam bzhi las kyi dgos pa tshang //bya ba'i las la ma rmongs na//kar ma las kyi dbang bskuro//lta bas mnyam pa'i don
483b6(rgyud): rtogs na//rgyal 'theb 'chad cing ston pa'i dbang //tshad ma gsum dang rab ldan zhing //rkyen thub rdo rje slob dpon dbang //theg pa'i rim pa thams cad la//phyogs ris med
483b7(rgyud): cing ma rmongs na//rab 'byam rgyal po'i dbang thob pa'o//rkyen thub brtul zhugs che ba dang //skyon rnams spangs shing dam tshig ldan//gsang ba sgrub pa'i dbang thob bo//dang po
484a1(rgyud): gsang ba nyan pa'i dbang //rin chen rigs kyi rna ba la'o//de nas rdo rje las kyi dbang //las kyi rigs kyi yan lag lnga'o//de nas gsang ba bsgrub pa'i
484a2(rgyud): dbang //rdo rje rigs kyi snying khar ro//de nas rgyal 'thab rgyal po'i dbang //sangs rgyas rigs kyis spyi bo la'o//de nas gsang ba 'chad pa'i dbang //pad+ma'i rigs kyis
484a3(rgyud): la bskur//de nas rab 'byam rgyal po'i dbang //yon lag rigs lngas dbang bskuro//dang po gsum pa bdag gi don//gnyis pa bzhi pa gnyi ga ste//lnga pa drug pa
484a4(rgyud): gzhan don du//dbang mchog bskur ba'i go rims yin//rnam grangs go rims mtshan nyid ni//dang por phyi yi dbang bcu bskur//de nas nang dbang bcu dang gcig/
484a5(rgyud): de nas bsgrub pa'i bcu dang gsum//tha mar gsang ba rnam pa gnyis//bcu phrag gsum dang drug dag gis//dbang mchog dam pa bskur ba yin//dang po bka' rtags
484a6(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dbang //gnyis pa rtags kyi mtshan ma'i dbang //gsum pa shes rab gzugs kyis te//bzhi pa bkra shis bum pa'i dbang //lnga pa bkra shos rdzas kyi dbang //
484a7(rgyud): drug po rin chen sna bdun dbang //bdun pa gdan mchog dam pa'i dbang //brgyad pa mdzes pa rgyan gyi dbang //dgu pa gsang ba ming gi dbang //bcu pa rgyal rtags
484b1(rgyud): /Na swa ste//bye dbang bcu po rdzogs pa dang //rdo rje nang du gzhug par bya//dang po gsang ba ny+dzan cing slob pa'i dbang //gnyis pa sgrogs pam zang mo gtad par bya//gsum pa
484b2(rgyud): rnam bde las kyi rnaMs kyang sbyin//zhi ba rgyal 'tshe dam pa'i mdzod pa sam sbyin//lbu pa sgrub dben pazhi'i theg rten rtags//d+hen pa nyi zla pad+ma sams can gdan//'dun
484b3(rgyud): pirgyal po gsang ba'i rin che ni bdun//brjod pa gzugs brnyan skye bair gnano//dgu pa sku gsum ye shes sbyin//b+hanu pa bkra shis dri ma rjes dbang //de nas lag+sa
484b4(rgyud): rdo rje sbyin//bcu dadu gcig gis ning btsug nas/sgrub pa'i dpyong mchag sbyin par bya//dang por sems kyitan tshigs sbyin//gnyis bste kyi bang bsla sti /
484b5(rgyud): gsum pa yi grwa 'khor lo sbyin//bzhi pa thong gshol 'byar ba sbyin//banod gang ba sbyin dang lnga//drug pa mtshan cha sna tshogs te//bdun pa skyon med pad+ma sbyin//
484b6(rgyud): brgyad pa sti rta'i dbyug pa sbyin//dgu pa sprul nag chun po sbyin//bcu pa dri med lha mo sbyin//gcig pa 'dod pa'i long ste spyod kun//gnyis pa d+mo brdzuswA d-i tu smin//
484b7(rgyud): gcom pa rdo rje gsing mi sbyin//bcu dang gisupa po rdzogs pa dang //gsang ba dam pa sbyin pa yang //dkar dmar 'dres pa'i byang chub sems//bri mtshan rnam
485a1(rgyud): gzhag/sna bdun dum byang chub sems//da ya zla la gzhag par bya//dbang mchog rdzob pa'i ltas rnams kyang //d+hIHlA rgyu ba'i bdag nyid dang /
485a2(rgyud): snang ba lus kyi lha ltas dang //ngo mtshar che ba'i rjes snyed dang //mtshan ma bra yo rma ltas 'byung //blo rtsal che ba'i khyad par du//yang dag bden pa'i don rnams la//mi
485a3(rgyud): sgeg dga' dbu skye bar 'gyur//'khor ba'i chos la skyo sems 'byung //rnam grangs chos la dang mi 'gyur//ji ltar snang ba'i mtshan ma kun//sgyu ma bzhin du shes par
485a4(rgyud): 'gyur//'jig rten pa yi mthu chen la//'jigs shing nyam du med par 'gyur//de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog/snang ba lus kyi lde ltas kyang //lus kyis
485a5(rgyud): bzod pa thob pa dang //'du ba'i nad dang bral ba dang //khams kyi zas dang bral ba dang //dbang po'i gzi mdangs gsal ba dang //bar snang dag la lding ba dang //shing
485a6(rgyud): bal lta bur yang ba dang //chul mi 'bying mas mi tshig/rlung gis khyer bar nus myi 'gyur//de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog/ngag gi ji snyed brjod pa bzhin//
485a7(rgyud): 'gyur ba yin par shes par bya//rdzas kyi dam pa yon tan ldan//snyed cing thob pa dag tu 'gyur//nyams dang rmi lam dag tu yang //dbang mchog
485b1(rgyud): lhur bskur ba bzhin//da dug nus pa'i rnam pa 'byung //de dag dbang bskur thob pa'i rtags//shes gsung so//de nas yang smra ba'i sang gi byed pa po rdo rje kun tu babang pos 'di skad ces
485b2(rgyud): gsol ba btab bo//ye shes rnal 'byor can rnams kyis//gsang ba sbas pa'i thabs tshul du//sbas pas grub pa'ang myur ba dang //gsang ba'i dam la gnas bya dang //brda la
485b3(rgyud): dga' ba'i mi rnams kun//nye zhing gdong bar bya ba'i phyir//lus dang ngag gi badz+ra rnams kun//gsang ba'i bdag pos bshad du gsol//zhes gsol ba btab pa dang
485b4(rgyud): gsang ba'i bdage bos bka' stsal pa/gsang ba sras po'i thabs tshul du//brda yi dam tshig bshad par bya//'dus pa'i 'khor rnams legs par nyon//lus brda ma chig
485b5(rgyud): phyag rgya ni//lag pa g.yas pas bya ba kun//rnal 'byor pa yis bya ba'i brda//g.yon pas bya ba mA yo brda//spyi bor nyug pa'i leg brda ni//phyag 'tshal ba yi brda ya N+ya//
485b6(rgyud): dpral por rag par phyag lan yin//lag pa g.yas pa brkyang byas te//mgo bo gtud pA byas pa ni//khams bde 'am zhes 'dri ba'i brda//log pa g.yon pa 'argyad nas ni/
485b7(rgyud): g.yon du 'dud pa bde ba'i lam//mig gnyis dag la reg pa ni//gzugs mdzes ston cig ces pa'i brda//g.yas pa skyes pa mdzes pa yin//g.yon pa bud med bzang
486a1(rgyud): mar bshad//rna ba dag la reg pa'i brda//g.yon pa lags pa'i glu smyan brda//g.yas pa tshig spyan smra ba'i brda//sna phug gnyis la reg pa ni//
486a2(rgyud): g.yas pa bdug pa 'dod pa ste//g.yon pa dri dge slong ba'i brda//lces ni ldag par byed pa'i brda//g.ya su ldag pa shi 'dod pa'o//g.yon du chang 'dod brda ru bshad//
486a3(rgyud): mche bas ma mar+g+ha mnan pa ni//gson pa bud med reg bya 'dod//grayas pa sgyus po de bzhino//rnyog mar rig pa g.yang ba yi//theb mchog gsang ba smra ba'i badz+ra//
486a4(rgyud): ske la reg par byed pa ni//bdag nyid dbyangs stan len pa'i brda//snyid dka'i dkyil du reg pa ni//don rtogs pa'i brda ru bshad//reg nas phyir la 'gyed pa ni/
486a5(rgyud): smos pa'i brda ru shes par bya//slar yong snying khar gtugs pa ni//slar bsdu ba'i brda yin no//lte ba'i dkyil du reg pa ni//dbu ma'i nan tan spyod pa yin//dbang/
486a6(rgyud): bo rab tu gsal byas na//ting 'dzin sgrim zhes bya ba yin//phrag pa gnyis ni ston pa'i brda//g.yas pa 'gugs pa'i brda yin no//g.yon pa slar gtong ba'i brda//
486a7(rgyud): dpung pa gnyis lo nyug pa'i brda//g.yas pa dregs pa 'dul ba'i brda//g.yon pa longs spyod grub pa'i brda//khu tshur g.yas bcangs dbang du bsdud//g.yon pa
486b1(rgyud): bcangs na thongs shig pa'o//bAR+Ya gnyis myags pa'i brda dag kyang //g.yas pa chos la sbyor ba'i brda//g.yon pa 'dod chags rtsom pa'i brda//pus mo lha nga'i brda dag
486b2(rgyud): kyang //g.yon pa rab tu 'dud pa yin//yang na bcing pa yin par bshad//gyayas pas rab tu dbul ba yin//rkang pas gnod pa'i brda dag kyang //g.yon pas thams cad
486b3(rgyud): gnon par byed//g.yas pas 'joms par byed pa yin//'dzub mo bsgreng ba'i brda tshul gyis//khro bo'i brda ru bshad pa yin//dbang po gyen du bsgreng ba ni//de tshe mdza'
486b4(rgyud): bar 'dod pa'i brda//chung ngu'i rtse mo bsgreng ba ni//de tshe sbyor bar 'dod pa'o brda//sngon po mngon par ston pa na//bkres shes bya ba'i brda yino//gang tshe shin tu mthor ston
486b5(rgyud): na/mngon pa'i nga rgyal bskyed pa'i brda//khro mo lcags kyur drangs byas na//de tshe tshur shog brda yin no//de nyid bzlog pa khyod cig pa'o//lag gnyis gar thabs bskor
486b6(rgyud): nas kyang //se gol drag rdo bos 'don pa'i brda//bskor nas sbyar ba phyag rgya'i brda//bskor nas thal mo spyi bor gzhag/'di ni mchod pa'i brda yin no//bskor nas snying khang
486b7(rgyud): gzhag pa ni//bsam gtan rtse gcig brda yin no//bskor nas gnyis kyis ston pa ni//mchod pa stob pa'i brda yin no//dbang mo lce la reg pa ni//tshogs mchog dus
487a1(rgyud): /la bab pa'i bad+ma///gyur thabs bskor nas dpa mor mthor//gnas lha lta rog lda na//maN+Da ga thob pa'i brda yod no//del zag du
487a2(rgyud): blas mA mi khyag//dag brda dam ga phyug rgyu yang //a ti buM zhes bya ba ni//phyag 'tshal zhes pa'i brda yin no//prAt+ti pu zhes bya ba nI//phyag len 'tshal ba'i nga
487a3(rgyud): na/nas sa kyi / d+hU d+hA b-i shA/da del 'ang med do//ra seM son/
487a4(rgyud): zhes pa rab tu reg/sbyor ba zhes pa chos bshad//me tog zhes bya khrag yin no//bdug pa zhes pa mdangs kyi brda//mar me zhes pa shA tshon la'o//dpa' bo ches
487a5(rgyud): bachang du bshad//spros shes thal chen dag la'o//'dod chags sra ba tshwa yin te//khu ba g.yon can sbyar ba yin//bran mo rgod ma'i brda yin no//chung ba zhal
487a6(rgyud): zlaR+Sha nas te//slad kyi mchog ni sha ye brda//zan+da ni tshe zhes bya ba'i bar//a rba mI zhes bya ba'i bang//rgun 'brum zhes pa NA yi brda//glang po ban sa zhes bya/
487a7(rgyud): na li ki ri kyi mi brda//a ru ka ni pa lang ngo //ti zhes mkha'agro'i brdar bstan to//oM ral zhes pa mkha' gro ma//dar dir sil snyan sgra ru bshad//dzo zhes
487b1(rgyud): /bya ba 'dran pa'i brda//hU~M ni sdud pa'i brda yin//bi mi sdom pa yin par bshad//ho ni zhugs nas dbang du 'gyur//o hiM zhes pa chur ston brda//ya hi par bzhud zhus pa'o//
487b2(rgyud): taustA ha ni drongs shig pa'o//khaM kha khyA hA zo shig pa'o//e ba'i zhes pa yang nas yang //de ra da ra byin cig pa'o//ru tA ma tA rol zhes pa'o//hUM lu hUM lu zhugs shig pa'o//
487b3(rgyud): a ra ra ra bskul cig pa'o//de la sogs te bsam yas mchog zhes gsungaso//de nas yang sla ba'i seng ge'i byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos gsol ba/e ma'o gsang
487b4(rgyud): chen bde ba che//mi 'gyur na mkha' dngos po med//snyun grub bde chen rnam par dag/dag mchog lha la phyag 'tshal bstod//gsang ba zhes bgyi rnam pa du//spras pa zhes brgya
487b5(rgyud): rnam b+ha du//thig le zhes bgyi ji ltar gnas//mnyam nyid zhes pa rnam pa du//dag pa zhes pa rnam pa du//rtogs pa rnam pa du ru bzhed //mtshan nyid gsum zhes ji lta bu//
487b6(rgyud): ti 'dzin gsum po ji ltar lags//bdag cag rnams la spyan bslang du//bde bar gshegs pas baishad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pas/gsang ba mchog go bdag
487b7(rgyud): pos bug su chung de bka' stsal pa/gsad ba ces pa rnam pa bzhi//rang bzhin don gyi gsang ba dang //gab po sbas po'i gsang ba dang //bstan med rdzas kyi gsang ba dang /
488a1(rgyud): snod med bka'i gsang ba dang //chos nyid rang bzhin gsang ba dang //thugs kyi klong nas bsnyungs pa dang //dman la ma bstan rdzas rnams dang //gsang
488a2(rgyud): sngags theg chen zab mo'i don//rab tu shes pa bka' ba'i phyir//bstan par yang ni mi bya bas//gsang ba zhe su rgyal bas gsungs//de nyid sbas pas sbas pa'i don//
488a3(rgyud): sbas pa rnam pa gsum yin te//pI yi sbas pa gsang ba dang //de bzhin nang gi sbas pa dang //gnyi gar ma nges sbas pa de//rmad 'byung sngags kyi spyod pa ste//phyi rol tu
488a4(rgyud): bas mthong thos na//de la bzod pa thob min pas//de ni sbas pa phyi zhes bya//lhun grub bde chen zab mo de//ming gi rnal 'byor phal dag gis//rtogs shing khong du chud
488a5(rgyud): par dka'//de ni nang gi sbas pa yin//phyi nang gnyi su tha dad min//bden pa gnyi su dbyer med pa//rgyal ba sangs rgyas spyod yul de//ma nges sbas par rgyal bas gsungs//
488a6(rgyud): sbas pa'i don rnams gsal 'byin pa//bla ma rdo rje'i thugs la gnas//de nA sras shos nges par gsungs//thabs dang shes rab zhes bya ba//gnyisu med pa'i byang chub
488a7(rgyud): sems//de nyid thig le rnam gsum ste//thabs mchog yab kyi mkha' nyid dang //shes rab yum gyi klong nyid dang //gnyis med bde chen dang nyid du//chos kun
488b1(rgyud): /'dus shing gcig pa dang //spros med thog ltar gnas pa'i phyir//thig lo zhesu rgyal bas gsungs//mnyam pa nyid kyang rnam gsum ste//don dam dbyingasu mnyam pa
488b2(rgyud): dang /kun rdzob sgyu mar mnyam pa dang //dbyer med gcig par mnyam pa ste//ma skyes ma grub dbyer med par//chos kun ma rnam par gnas pas ni//mnyam pa cesu
488b3(rgyud): brjod pa yin//snod dang bcud dang rgyud rnams kun//dag pas dag pa gsum yin te//yum gyi dbyings dang yab kyi mkha'//ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin du//snod bcud rgyud//
488b4(rgyud): kun dag pa'i phyir//dag pa gsum du rgyal bas gsungs//rtogs pa yang ni rnam pa bzhir//rnal 'byor nang pa bzhed pa'i ste//rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshu li//byin
488b5(rgyud): gyis brlabs dang mngon gsum pas//rdzogs chen don la 'jug 'gyur te//rgyu ni bdan gnyis gcig pa ru//gcig pas gcig pa'i mtshan nyid dang //sku gsung thugs kyi
488b6(rgyud): yi ge ru//chos kun rang bzhin rtogs pa dang //skyed med dbyings kyi byin rlabs las//chos kun snang bar shes pa dang //de lta bu yi rang bzhin te//gzhan la ma rten mi
488b7(rgyud): 'gal bar//mngon sum rig pas thag chod na//rnal 'byor sa la slabs pa yin//ma rtogs pa yang bzhi yin te//ye nas ma rtogs blun pa dang //log pa'i rnam par
489a1(rgyud): rtogs pa dang //phyogs gcig rtogs pa'i khyad par dang //gsang ba de nyid ma gtogs par//bad gshegs rgyal ba nyid kyis gsungs//des na rtogs/
489a2(rgyud): pa rnam bzhi yid//rnal 'byor pa la bstan pa yin//shes pa dang ni 'jug pa dang //'bras bu'i mtshan nyid ces bya bas//sa la nye dang sar chung dang //sa thob 'bras bu rnam
489a3(rgyud): pa gsum//rgyu 'bras tshul du gnas pa ni//dus mthur ldan pa'i shes rab kyis//rigs 'dzin zhing ste shes rab gsum//yum yang mtshan nyid gsum yin te//kun du
489a4(rgyud): brtags dang gzhan dbang dang //yongasu grub pa zhesu brjod//log pa'i bsam pas mthong brtags pa//kun tu brtags te yod pa min//bden gnyis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i
489a5(rgyud): tshal///'brel pa gzhan dbang yin par gsungs//bden gnyis rgyu 'bras dbyer med par//yongasu grub par bde gshegs gsung //kun brtags log par shes pa ni//
489a6(rgyud): shes pa'i mtshan nyid cesu bya//gzhan dbang tshul du goms bya ba//'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya//yongasu grub la gnas bcas ni//de nyid 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid
489a7(rgyud): yin//de bzhin nyid dang kun du snang //rgyu yi ting 'dzin rab bsgoms pas//rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa ste//yongasu grub pa'i blo gsal na//de bzhin nyid du rnam par
489b1(rgyud): grags//kun dang d+hA dab dang //yig 'bru kha dog gsal ba yi//rgya yi tid 'dzin gsal pa ni//bskyed pa gzhan gyi dbang yin te//cad lag d+hA ba kun brtags dang //dag
489b2(rgyud): na rnal 'byor skyes bu yis//mtshan med drang la gnas bcas nas//mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor bsgom par bya'o//mtshan ma med dang mtshan ma yang //tha dad med par shes par bya//
489b3(rgyud): de ltar rig po'i rnal 'byor ba//de nyid nga yin pa thob yin//sangs rgyas shes kyang de la bya//sangs rgyas rnams kyang mchod pa byed//byang chub sems dpa' smras ci dgos//'jig
489b4(rgyud): lha klu mthu chen yang //de la mchod cing bkur sti byed//phyi bzhin 'bring zhing dgos pa skong zhes gsungs pas//'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyis/rang rang gi lus sa la brdo rje
489b5(rgyud): nas a la la zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ste/shin tu ngo mtshar to//de nas smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das te
489b6(rgyud): tsam thams cad gcod pa'i bdag pa mchog rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po 'di nyid ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo chen po zhes bya ba rgyud kyi 'grel pa/rtags kyi rol pa/don gyi
489b7(rgyud): bkod pa rdo rje rnam par rol pa'i gzhung chen po 'di yi bla ma rdo rje slob dpon skyes bu dam pas ma nor bar rtogs shing /gzhan dag la yang ma nor bar ston pa de la bdag rnams kyi
490a1(rgyud): ji ltar blta bar bgyu/bcom ldan 'das lung bstan du gsol/bde bar gshegs pa lung bstan du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba
490a2(rgyud): mchog gi bdag pos gsol ba btab pa de mkhyen nas 'di skad ces gsungs//smra ba'i seng ge nga la zhu bar spobs pa legs/rab tu legs kyis nyon cig/gzhung 'di
490a3(rgyud): bla mu rdo rje slob dpon de ni skyes bu dam pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad te/de ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du blta bar bya/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
490a4(rgyud): de ni rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dang /dbyer med cing tha mi dad te//bla ma de ni bskal pa chen po grangs med pa'i pha mtha' yi yang mtha' 'das pa nas rgyal ba sangs rgyas brjod

490a6(rgyud): shing gsang ba'i don 'di lta bu'i bla ma rdo rje slob dpon chen po nyid du rig par bya ste/de na sangs rgyas nyid dang tha mi dad cing byang chub kyi sems nyid du blta bar bya'o//de
490a7(rgyud): la 'di ni phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa rnams kyang spyi bo gtsug gis khur zhing
490b1(rgyud): phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa byed cing rjes 'byeng na gzhan byang chub sems dpa' dang rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams la byug 'tshal zhing mchod pa ci zhig smos te/'jig rten gyi mnamache

490b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid du blta bar bya'o//de ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba/'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ston pa chen po yin par lta'o//sem+ba can
490b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi mgon dang skyabs dang /rten dang /gling dang /ded dpon dang /'dren pa dang /sgrol ba'i gru lta bu yin par shes par bya'o//de ni ye shes kyi sgron ma chen po

490b7(rgyud): rna ba'i dbang pos nyan cing gzhung bzhin du sgrub pa'i gang zag rnal 'byor pa de'i rnam par smin pa ji lta bu zhigs bdag cag rnams kyi ji ltar 'tshal par bgyi/gsang

491b1(rgyud): ma na thas bamabacams sa ma macas ma tha/amasan thas mthatha thasatsham can tham thama' thamamamam yamasam mam ya thamam thas thamamatha tham mamatshatsham bas Sha ka mam ma sa

491b4(rgyud): pa de'i rnam par smin pa'i legs pa'i yon tan yang brjod cing tshad bzung bar rab tu dka'o//la la dag gis so so skye bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu gang ba la sbyin pa byin pa 'am///
491b5(rgyud): dge ba bcu dang /tshad med pa bcu dang /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis rgya'i theg pa'i sgo nas 'gro ba'i don byas pa bsngo ni bla ma 'khor dang bcas pa dang gsang po'i theg pa 'di'i
491b6(rgyud): sgo nas skad cig tsam 'gro ba gcig gi don byas pa'i bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bum gyi cha yang mi 'bod do//rigs kyi bu la la ngag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu gang
491b7(rgyud): ba'i nyan thos sam/rang sangs rgyas sam/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de snyed la rim 'gro bkur sti tshul bzhin du bskal pa grangs med pa'i yun du byas pa'i bsod nams
491b8(rgyud): kyis ni gsang ba'i theg pa 'di la gnas pa'i gang zag rnam 'byor pa gcig la tha na gro gcig gam//skad cig yud tsam du skur ti tshul bzhin du byas pa'i bsod nams
492a1(rgyud): kyi 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do//de ci'i phyir zhu na/de ni gsang ba'i theg pa 'di nyid las nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dang
492a2(rgyud): theg pa rnams 'byung zhing gsang ba'i theg pa nyid la 'gro ba bzud pa'i thab su bsti ba'i gnasu gsungs pa yin gyi gtan du bzhag pa'i sa ni ma yin no//de bas na nga nyid

492a4(rgyud): zag la la dag gis bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par rgyu'i theg pa'i sgo nas dge ba'i rtsa bo rgyas par spyad pa bas ni gsang ba'i theg pa 'di'i don
492a5(rgyud): skad cig tsam yid la byas pa'i bsod nams khyad par du 'phags te 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do//rigs kyi bu gang zag la la zhig gis bskal pa gang ga'i klung
492a6(rgyud): gi bye ma snyed du so so'i skye bo 'am/nyan thos sam//rang rgyal ba 'am/byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu gang ba snyed la me tog dang /phreng ba dang /

492b2(rgyud): tsam bteg cing long spyad pa'i bsod nams khyad par du 'phags te 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/so so'i skye bo 'am/nyan thos sam/rang sangs rgyas
492b3(rgyud): sam/byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi phung po de dag pas gsang ba'i theg pa la gnas pa gcig gi ba spyi'i cha gcig gi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
492b4(rgyud): phung po khyod par du 'phags te 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do//de bzhin du gang zag la la zhig gis me tog la sogs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu gang ba'i bsod nams
492b5(rgyud): dang /ye shes kyi phung po gang yin pas 'dod pa'i yon tan tshogs chen po gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi cha tsam gyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi phung po gang yin pa de bas
492b6(rgyud): 'dod pa'i yon tan tshogs chen po gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi tshe tsam gyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi phung po khyad par du 'phags te 'bum gyi cher yang mi phod do//rigs
492b7(rgyud): kyi bu de bas na dad pa can gyi skye bo gsang ba'i theg pa nyid dang /gsang ba'i theg pa la gnas pa'i bla ma 'khor dang bcas pa la dad pa'i sems kyis g.yo sgyu dang gsog
493a1(rgyud): 'jog spangs pa der bsod nams dang ye shes kyi phung ban chad med do//de bsad nams dang ye shes kyi phung po ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sangs

493a4(rgyud): sngon 'das pa'i lo rgyus kyi gtan tshigs rnams zhu bar 'tshal na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/smra ba'i
493a5(rgyud): seng+ge khyod da la zhu bar spobs kyis ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o//de nas smra ba'i seng ges gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i

493a7(rgyud): cig/gsang ba'i theg pa 'di rna ba'i dbang pos thos pa'i yon tan ni ming tsam thos pas kyang ngan 'dro las skyob par 'gyuraro//de yang ji ltar yangasu shes zhe na
493b1(rgyud): snron 'das pa'i dub dran pa thog ma'i tsho gsang ba'i thag pa'i lha'i gnas rim pa gsum na rdul bzhin du snad pa las 'di ldan zhes bya ba'i lta' bu zhing mI rtag pa'i dus la
493b2(rgyud): sAskyes rnams byung bar 'gyur te/de rab tu mi dga' ba'i 'du shes gyur nas rgyu ts+tsho ma la gling du ste snyim pa'i 'du shes 'ba' 'gro skyes pa las/lha'i bu de nyid mngon par shes
493b3(rgyud): las mi ga tsang bza ba'i byol song gi rigs skye bar mthong ste shin du 'jigs pa'i sems skyes nas mgon skyabs gzhan med par mthong ste gabang ba'i theg pa'i mtshan
493b4(rgyud): thos nas de bzhin du yid la dran par byas//de'i tshe 'od ldan zhes bya ba lha'i bu de ngan 'gro'i lam de las grol te gsang ba'i theg pa 'dzin pa'i glen pa ga lA ba der skyes so//
493b5(rgyud): der skyes nas kyang tshogs chen po la longs spyod pa skal pa can du gyur pa de bzhin du shes par bya'o//yang gsol pa/gsang ba mchog gi bdag po gasdang ba'i theg pa 'di la

493b7(rgyud): pa/gzang ba'i theg pa 'di la dga' zhing mos pa dang 'dun pa skyed pa'i gang zag dam pa de ni rig 'dzin rgyal po'i srab dam par 'gyur bar gdon mi za'o//de yang
494a1(rgyud): ltar yongasu shes zhe na/sngon 'das pa'i dus nga dran pa thog ma'i tshe bram ze rgyal byed ces bya ba'i bu byams ldan zhes bya ba zhag gsang ba'i thug pa

494a4(rgyud): pha mdan thog ma skyes nas sbas bar du//'bad de gsang ba'i don btsal yang //gsang ba ma rnyed las re ngan///de yongs ji ltar btsal na rnyed//btsal yang

494b2(rgyud): drangs nas 'phags pa rnams la mchod pa de nyid du gsang ba'i don mthong te rig 'dzin rgal ba'i sras dran par gyur pa de bzhin shes par bya'o//de nas yang smra ba'i seng kres

494b6(rgyud): lhar yongasu shes zhe na/sngon 'das pa'i dus nga dran pa thog ma'i tshe lha'i gnas rim pa gsum na gsang ba spyod pa las dge ba'i rgyal po bkod pa zhes bya ba'i lha'i bu

495b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de nyid du 'dug par gsol ba btab pa las rgyal pos ma gnang ste gsang sgo bsdam so//bram ze de dad pa ma log par 'byor pa'i yo byad ci yod la rgyal po'i
495b2(rgyud): spyan ngar phul te rgyal po gnas pa'i yul phyogasu yid kyis phyogs te smon lam btab cing rje su yid rang bar byaso//de'i rnam par smin pos rgyal po dang bram ze gnyis 'bras bu//
495b3(rgyud): mthon dman med par thob pa bzhin du shes par bya'o//yang smra ba'i seng ges gsol pa/gsang ba'i theg pa 'di slab pa mthar byin pa 'di yon tan gyi khyad par ji lta bu/
495b4(rgyud): lags/gsang ba mtshig gi bdag pos bka' stsol pa/gsang ba'i theg pa 'di'i bslab pa mthar phyin pa'i che ba'i khyad par gyis theg pa mtha' dag gi bslob pa yang /
495b5(rgyud): mthar phyin cing lung bstan pa yang thob par 'gyuraro//de yang ji ltar yong su shes zhe na/sngon 'das pa'i dusu nga dran pa thog ma'i tshe bram ze'i bu gsal sbyin zhes bya bas
495b6(rgyud): gsang ba chen po 'di'i bslab pa mthar phyin te/rang gi sems goms par byas pas theg pa mtha' dag gi bslab pa mthar phyin cing de nyid du bar snang las lung bstan pa'i
495b7(rgyud): sgra rigs kyi bu khyod dus phyi ma'i tshe/chos kyi rgyal por gyur nas zhing khams rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar sangs rgyas nas smra ba'i seng ge zhes bya bar grags par 'gyu
496a1(rgyud): zhes bya bar lung bstan pa de bzhin du shes par bya'o////yang smra ba'i song gos gsol bya/tshogs chen po gcig gis bsod nams
496a2(rgyud): kyi khyad par ji lta bu lags/gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/smra ba'i seng ge so so'i skye bo 'am/nyan thos sam/rang sangs rgyas sam/sa la gnas

503a3(rgyud): dbyings kyi ngang las mi 'da'i dam tshig can//zhi khro'i 'khor tshogs rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod//hodi a la la ho zhes brjod pas thams cad mnyes par gyur
503a4(rgyud): to//de nas bcom ldan 'das gsong ba mchog gi bdag pos hUM zhes brjod pa tsam gyis dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad gsang ba'i mdzod du thim par gyur te mi snang ngo
503a5(rgyud): gsang ba mchog gi bdag po nyid kyang dus bzhi mnyam pa'i dbyings las mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis rnam par gnaso//'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi
503a6(rgyud): 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las gsang ba phyi ma rnam par bkod pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o///'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam
503a7(rgyud): pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho//mang+ga laM
